Valvular insufficiency. Angina pectoris; faintness, and anxious sweat. Ebullition of blood, veins distended. *Surging of heart into chest, as if it would force out upward*. Hypertrophy of heart, especially right, with asthmatic symptoms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Swelling and induration of glands*; also exophthalmic; cervical glands swollen with tensive pain on turning head, painful on pressure; Goitre. Itching; measles

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Awakes in a fright, and feels as if suffocating*. Generally worse after sleep, or sleeps into and aggravation (*Lach*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Attacks of heat with anxiety*; heat and redness of face and perspiration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, ascending, wind, before midnight. *Better*, descending, lying with head low.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Acon; Hep; Brom; Lach; Merc prot; Iod* (Goitre).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second trituration, or tincture to third potency.

sambucus.name: Sambucus Nigra
sambucus.essence: Suffocative cough in children - cannot breathe, sits up

agg: sleep, during rest, after eating fruit

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to sixth potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Elder
Acts especially on the respiratory organs. Dry coryza of infants, snuffles, oedematous swellings. *Profuse sweat* accompanies many affections.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sees images when shutting eyes. *Constant fretfulness*. Very easily frightened. Fright followed by suffocative attacks.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Turns blue with cough. Red, burning spots on cheeks. Heat and perspiration of face.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Colic, with nausea and flatulence; frequent watery, slimy stools.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Profuse urine with dry heat of skin. Frequent micturition, with scanty urine. Acute nephritis; dropsical symptoms, with vomiting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chest oppressed with pressure in stomach, and nausea Hoarseness with tenacious mucus in larynx. Paroxysmal, *suffocative cough, coming on about midnight*, with crying and dyspnoea. Spasmodic croup. Dry coryza. *Sniffles of infants*; nose dry and obstructed. Loose choking cough. When nursing child must let go of nipple, nose blocked up, cannot breathe. *Child awakes suddenly, nearly suffocating, sits up, turns blue. Cannot expire* (*Meph*). Millar's asthma.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hands turn blue. OEdematous swelling in legs, insteps, and feet. Feet icy cold. Debilitating night-sweats (*Salvia; Acet ac*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry heat while sleeping. *Dreads uncovering. Profuse sweat over entire body during waking hours*. Dry, deep cough precedes the fever paroxysm.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry heat of skin during sleep. Bloated and swollen; general dropsy; *profuse sweat on waking*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, sleep, during rest, after eating fruit. *Better*, sitting up in bed, motion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Ipec; Meph; Opium; Sambucus Canadensis* (great value in dropsies; large doses required-fluid extract, 1/4 to 1 teaspoonful three times daily).
Antidotes: *Ars; Camph*.

aurum-met.name: Aurum Metallicum
aurum-met.essence: Profound syphilitic remedy. Loathing of life, self-condemnation, and vascular congestion.

agg: in cold weather when getting cold. Many complaints come on only in winter

complementary: Syphilin: Kali iod; Hep; Merc; Mez; Nit ac; Phosph

aurum-met.dosing: 200C for deep emotional states. Monitor carefully.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Metallic Gold
Given full play, Aurum develops in the organism, by attacking the blood, glands, and bone, conditions bearing striking resemblance to mercurial and syphilitic infections; and it is just for such deteriorations of the bodily fluids and alterations in the tissues, that Aurum assumes great importance as a remedy. Like the victim of syphilis, mental states of great depression are produced by it. Hopeless, despondent, and *great desire to commit suicide*. Every opportunity is sought for self-destruction. Exostosis, caries, nightly bone-pains, especially cranial, nasal, and palatine. Glands swollen in scrofulous subjects. Palpitation and congestions. Ascites often in conjunction with heart affections. Frequently indicated in secondary syphilis and effects of mercury. This use of gold as an anti-venereal and anti-scrofulous remedy is very old, but has been well-nigh forgotten by the old school until rediscovered and placed on its scientific basis by homeopathy, and now it can never be lost again. When syphilis is implanted on the scrofulous constitution, we have one of the most intractable morbid conditions, and gold seems to be especially suited to the vile combination. *Ennui*. Ozaena; sexual hyperaesthesia. Arterio-sclerosis, high blood pressure; nightly paroxysms of pain behind sternum. Sclerosis of liver, arterial system, brain. Pining boys; low spirited, lifeless, weak memory.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feeling of self-condemnation and utter worthlessness. Profound despondency, with increased blood pressure, with thorough *disgust of life*, and thoughts of suicide. *Talks of committing suicide*. Great fear of death. Peevish and vehement at least contradiction. Anthropophobia. Mental derangements. Constant rapid questioning without waiting for reply. Cannot do things fast enough. *Oversensitiveness*; (*Staph*) *to noise*, excitement, confusion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Violent pain in head; worse at night*, outward pressure. Roaring in head. Vertigo. Tearing through brain to forehead. Pain in bones extending to face. Congestion to head. Boils on scalp.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Extreme photophobia*. Great soreness all about the eyes and into eyeballs. Double vision; *upper half of objects invisible*. Feel tense. Sees fiery objects. Violent pains in bones around eye (*Asaf*). Interstitial keratitis. *Vascular cornea*. Pains from without inward. *Sticking pains inward*. Trachoma with pannus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Caries of ossicula and of mastoid. *Obstinate fetid otorrhoea* after scarlatina. External meatus bathed in pus. Chronic nerve deafness; Labyrinthine disease due to syphilis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Ulcerated, painful*, swollen, obstructed. Inflammation of nose; caries; fetid discharge, purulent, bloody. Boring pains in nose; worse at night. *Putrid smell* from nose. Sensitive smell (*Carbol ac*). Horrible odor from nose and mouth. Knobby tip of nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Foul breath in girls at puberty. Taste putrid or bitter. Ulceration of gums.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tearing in zygoma. Mastoid and other facial bones inflamed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stitches when swallowing; pain in glands. Caries of the palate.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Appetite and thirst increased, with qualmishness. Swelling of epigastrium. Burning at stomach and hot eructations.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Right hypochondrium hot and painful. Incarcerated flatus. Swelling and suppuration of inguinal glands.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Turbid, like buttermilk, with thick sediment. Painful retention.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constipation, stools hard and knotty. Nocturnal diarrhoea, with burning in rectum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain and *swelling of testicles*. Chronic induration of testicles. Violent erections. *Atrophy of testicles in boys*. Hydrocele.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Great sensitiveness of vagina. Uterus enlarged and prolapsed. Sterility; vaginismus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Sensation as if the heart stopped beating* for two or three seconds, immediately followed by a tumultuous rebound, with sinking at the epigastrium. Palpitation. Pulse *rapid, feeble, irregular*. Hypertrophy. *High Blood Pressure*-Valvular lesions of arterio-sclerotic nature (Aurum 30)

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dyspnoea at night. Frequent, deep breathing; stitches in sternum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Destruction of bones, like secondary syphilis. Pain in bones of head, lumps under scalp, exostosis with nightly pains in bones. Caries of nasal, palatine and mastoid bones. Soreness of affected bones, better in open air, worse at night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: All the blood seems to rush from head to lower limbs. Dropsy of lower limbs. Orgasm, as if blood were boiling in all veins. Paralytic, tearing pains in joints. Knees weak.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sleepless. Sobs aloud in sleep. Frightful dreams.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, in cold weather when getting cold. Many complaints come on only in winter; from sunset to sunrise.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Aur ars* (chronic aortitis; lupus, phthisis in syphilitic headaches; also in anaemia and chlorosis. It causes rapid increase of appetite).
*Aur brom* (in headaches with neurasthenia, megrim, night terrors, valvular diseases).
*Aur mur* (Burning, yellow, acrid leucorrhoea; heart symptoms, glandular affections; warts on tongue and genitals; sclerotic and exudative degeneration of the nervous system. Multiple sclerosis. Morvan's disease. Second trituration. Aur mur is a sycotic remedy, causing suppressed discharges to reappear. Valuable in climacteric haemorrhages from the womb. Diseases of frontal sinus. Stitching pain in left side of forehead. Weariness, aversion to all work. Drawing feeling in stomach. Cancer, tongue as hard as leather; induration after glossitis).
*Aur mur kali*.--Double chloride of Potassium and gold (In uterine induration and haemorrhage).
*Aur iod* (Chronic pericarditis, valvular diseases, arterio-sclerosis ozaena, lupus, osteitis, ovarian cysts, myomata uteri, are pathological lesions, that offer favorable ground for the action of this powerful drug. Senile paresis).
*Aur sulph* (Paralysis agitans; constant nodding of the head; affections of mammae; swelling, pain, cracked nipples with lancinating pains).
Also, *Asafaet* (in caries of bones of ears and nose). *Syphilin: Kali iod; Hep; Merc; Mez; Nit ac; Phosph*.
Antidotes: *Bell; Cinch; Cupr; Merc*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency. Latter potency especially for increased blood pressure.

baryta-carb.name: Baryta Carbonica
baryta-carb.essence: Arrested development - physical, mental, or emotional. Dependency and lack of confidence.
baryta-carb.dosing: 30C for recurrent tonsillitis or developmental support.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Awakes with dry mouth. Gums bleed and retract. Teeth ache before menses. Mouth filled with inflamed vesicles, foul taste. Paralysis of tongue. Smarting, burning pain in tip of tongue. Dribbling of saliva at dawn. Spasm of oesophagus when food enters.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Carbonate of Baryta (BARYTA CARB)
Specially indicated in *infancy and old age*. This remedy brings aid to scrofulous children, especially if they are backward mentally and physically, are dwarfish, do not grow and develop, have scrofulous ophthalmia, swollen abdomen, take cold easily, and then *always have swollen tonsils*. Persons subject to quinsy which is prone to suppurate; gums bleed easily. Diseases of old men when degenerative changes begin;-cardiac vascular and cerebral;-who have hypertrophied prostate or indurated testes, very sensitive to cold, offensive foot-sweats, very weak and weary, must sit or lie down or lean on something. Very averse to meeting strangers. Catarrh of posterior nares, with frequent epistaxis. Often useful in the dyspepsias of the young who have masturbated and who suffer from seminal emissions, together with cardiac irritability and palpitation. Affects glandular structures, and useful in general degenerative changes, especially in coats of arteries, *aneurism*, and senility. Baryta is a cardio-vascular poison acting on the muscular coats of heart and vessels. Arterial fibrosis. Blood-vessels soften and degenerate, become distended, and aneurisms, ruptures, and apoplexies result.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Loss of memory, mental weakness. Irresolute. Lost confidence in himself. Senile dementia. Confusion. *Bashful*. Aversion to strangers. Childish; grief over trifles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo; stitches, when standing in the sun, extending through head. Brain feels as if loose. Hair falls out. Confusion. *Wens*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Alternate dilatation and contraction of pupils. Photophobia. Gauze before eyes. Cataracts (*Calc; Phos; Sil*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hardness of hearing. *Crackling noise. Glands around ears painful and swollen*. Reverberation on blowing nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry; sneezing; *coryza, with swelling of upper lip and nose*. Sensation of smoke in nose. Discharge of thick, yellow mucus. Frequent bleeding. Scabs around wings of nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pale, puffed; sensation as of cobweb (*Alumina*). Upper lip swollen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Submaxillary glands and tonsils swollen. *Takes cold easily, with stitches and smarting pain. Quinsy. Suppurating tonsils from every cold*. Tonsils inflamed, with swollen veins. Smarting pain when swallowing; worse empty swallowing. Feeling of a plug in pharynx. Can only swallow liquids. Spasm of oesophagus as soon as food enters oesophagus, causes gagging and choking (*Merc cor; Graphit*). Throat troubles from over use of voice. Stinging pain in tonsils, pharynx or larynx.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Waterbrash, hiccough, and eructation, which relieves pressure as of a stone. Hungry, but refuses food. Pain and weight immediately after a meal, with epigastric tenderness (*Kali carb*). Worse after warm food. Gastric weakness in the aged with possible malignancy present.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Hard and tense, distended*. Colicky. Enlarged mesenteric glands. Pain in abdomen swallowing food. Habitual colic, with hunger, but food is refused.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constipation, with hard, knotty stools. Haemorrhoids protrude on urinating. Crawling in rectum. Oozing at anus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Every time patient urinates, his piles come down. Urging to urinate. Burning in urethra on urinating.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diminished desire and premature impotence. Enlarged prostate. Testicles indurated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Before menses, pain in stomach and small of back. Menses scanty.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry, suffocative cough, especially in old people, full of mucus but lacking strength to expectorate, worse every change of weather (*Senega*). Larynx feels as if smoke were inhaled. Chronic aphonia. Stitches in chest; worse inspiration. Lungs feel full smoke.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Palpitation and distress in region of heart. Aneurism (*Lycop*). Accelerates the heart's action at first, blood pressure much increased, contraction of blood vessels. Palpitation when lying on left side, when thinking of it especially; pulse full and hard. Cardiac symptoms after suppressed foot-sweat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Swollen glands in nape of occiput*. Fatty tumors about neck. Bruised pain between scapulae. Stiffness in sacrum. Weakness of spine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in axillary glands. Cold, clammy feet (*Calc*). *Fetid foot-sweats*. Numbness of limbs. Numb feeling from knees to scrotum; disappears when sitting down. Toes and soles sore; soles painful when walking. Pain in joints; burning pains in lower limbs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Talking in sleep; awakens frequently; feels too hot. Twitching during sleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, while thinking of symptoms; from washing; lying on painful side. *Better*, walking in open air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Digitalis; Radium; Aragallus; Oxytrop; Astrag*. Complementary: *Dulc; Silica; Psorin*. Incompatible: *Calc*. Antidote for poisonous doses: *Epsom salts*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency, the latter to remove the predisposition to quinsy. Baryta is slow in action, bears repetition.

reckeweg-r1.name: R1 - Inflammation Drops
reckeweg-r1.essence: Combination for local inflammations, acute and chronic, of catarrhal and purulent nature.
reckeweg-r1.dosing: 10-15 drops in water every 1-2 hours in acute fever. 3 times daily for chronic.

reckeweg-r2.name: R2 - Gold Drops (Heart)
reckeweg-r2.essence: Myocardial weakness, insufficiency, dilatation, and nervous heart disorders.
reckeweg-r2.dosing: 10-15 drops in water 3 times daily. Consult physician.

reckeweg-r3.name: R3 - Heart Drops (Insufficiency)
reckeweg-r3.essence: Insufficiency of the heart muscles, endocarditis, and valvular affections.

reckeweg-r4.name: R4 - Diarrhea Drops
reckeweg-r4.essence: For acute and chronic gastroenteritis, diarrhea, and intestinal catarrh.

reckeweg-r5.name: R5 - Stomach Drops
reckeweg-r5.essence: Gastritis, acute and chronic, heartburn, bad taste in mouth, frequent belching.

abies-canadensis.name: Abies Canadensis
abies-canadensis.essence: Mucous membranes are affected by Abies can and gastric symptoms are most marked, and a catarrhal condition of the stomach is produced. There are peculiar *cravings* and chilly sensations that are very characteristic, especially for women with uterine displacement, probably due to defective nutrition with debility. Respiration and heart action labored. Wants to lie down all the time; skin cold and clammy, hands cold; very faint. Right lung and liver feel small and hard. Gleet.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Uterine displacements. Sore feeling at fundus of uterus, relieved by pressure. Prostration; wants to lie down all the time. Thinks womb is soft and feeble.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cold shivering, as if blood were ice-water (*Acon*). Chills run down back. Cold water feeling between shoulders (*Ammon mur*). Skin clammy and sticky. Night-sweat (*China*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Hemlock Spruce
Mucous membranes are affected by Abies can and gastric symptoms are most marked, and a catarrhal condition of the stomach is produced. There are peculiar *cravings* and chilly sensations that are very characteristic, especially for women with uterine displacement, probably due to defective nutrition with debility. Respiration and heart action labored. Wants to lie down all the time; skin cold and clammy, hands cold; very faint. Right lung and liver feel small and hard. Gleet.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels light-headed, tipsy. Irritable.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Canine hunger with torpid liver. *Gnawing, hungry, faint feeling* at the epigastrium. Great appetite, craving for meat, pickles, radishes, turnips, artichokes, coarse food. *Tendency to eat far beyond capacity for digestion*. Burning and *distention of stomach and abdomen with palpitation*. Flatulence disturbs the heart's action. Pain in right shoulder-blade, and constipation, with burning in rectum.

abies-nigra.name: Abies Nigra
abies-nigra.essence: A powerful and long-acting remedy, in various forms of disease, whenever the characteristic stomach symptoms are present. Most of the symptoms are associated with the gastric disturbances. *In dyspeptic troubles of the aged*, with functional heart symptoms; also after tea or tobacco. *Constipation*. Pain in external meatus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Black Spruce
A powerful and long-acting remedy, in various forms of disease, whenever the characteristic stomach symptoms are present. Most of the symptoms are associated with the gastric disturbances. *In dyspeptic troubles of the aged*, with functional heart symptoms; also after tea or tobacco. *Constipation*. Pain in external meatus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hot, with flushed cheeks. Low-spirited. Dull during the day, wakeful at night. Unable to think.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pain in stomach always comes on after eating*. Sensation of a lump that hurts, *as if a hard-boiled egg had lodged in cardiac end of stomach*; continual distressing constriction just above the pit of the stomach, as if everything were knotted up. Total loss of appetite in morning, but great craving for food at noon and night. Offensive breath. Eructations.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Painful sensation, as if something were lodged in the chest and had to be coughed up; lungs feel compressed. Cannot be fully expanded. Worse coughing; waterbrash succeeds cough. Choking sensation in throat. Dyspnoea; worse lying down; sharp, cutting pain in heart; *heart's action heavy and slow; tachycardia*, bradycardia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in small of back. Rheumatic pains and aching in bones.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Wakeful and restless at night, with hunger. Bad dreams.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Alternate heat and cold; chronic intermittent fever, with pain in stomach.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica

A very useful remedy in *marasmus*, especially of lower extremities *only*, yet with good appetite. Metastasis. Rheumatism following checked diarrhoea. Ill effects of suppressed conditions especially in gouty subjects. *Tuberculous peritonitis. Exudative pleurisy* and other exudative processes. After operation upon the chest for hydrothorax or empyaemia, a pressing sensation remains. Aggravation of haemorrhoids when rheumatism improves. Nosebleed and hydrocele in boys.

Great weakness after infl...

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica

absinthium.name: Absinthium
absinthium.essence: A perfect picture of epileptiform seizure is produced by this drug. Nervous tremors precede attacks. Sudden and severe giddiness, delirium with hallucinations and loss of consciousness. Nervous excitement and sleeplessness. Cerebral irritation, hysterical and infantile spasms come within range of this remedy. Poisoning by mushrooms. Chorea. *Tremor*. Nervousness, excitement, and sleeplessness in children.

complementary: Alcohol; Artemisia; Hydrocy acid; Cina; Cicuta

It is indicated in incipient phthisis, with hard, racking cough, bloody expectoration, arterial haemorrhage, but no febrile disturbance. Very weak in the morning, gains strength during day. Progressive emaciation. All pathological haemorrhages having notably a *morning aggravation*.

complementary: Millefol; Phosphor; Acetic acid; Kali nit

Haemorrhage from any part. Especially indicated in pale, lean persons, with lax, flabby muscles. *Wasting and debility*. Acetic acid has the power to *liquefy albuminous and fibrinous deposits*. Epithelial cancer, internally and locally (W Owens). Sycosis with nodules and formations in the joints. Hard chancre. The 1x so...

complementary: Benzoin oderiferum--Spice-wood (night sweats). Ars; China; Digitalis; Liatris (General anasarca in heart and

This drug produces a condition of profound anaemia, with some dropsical symptoms, great debility, frequent fainting, dyspnoea, weak heart, vomiting, profuse urination and sweat. materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica

Cancer of stomach. Sour belching and vomiting. Burning waterbrash and profuse salivation. Hyperchlorhydria and gastralgia. *Violent burning pain in stomach and chest, followed by coldness of skin and cold sweat on forehead*. Stomach feels as if she had taken a lot of vinegar.

Morning sickness, *diabetes*, and rheumatism offer a field for this remedy. *Troubles in the breasts*. Locally, in the tuberculous ulceration of vocal cords.

Hot, acrid eructation. *Nausea*; better, *eating*. Burning, hot gas from stomach to throat, causing profuse secretion of tenacious mucus, *worse smoking*.

actaea-spicata.essence: Is a rheumatic remedy, especially of the *small joints*; tearing, tingling pains characterize it. *Wrist-rheumatism*. Pulsations over whole body, especially liver and renal region. Cardiovascular spasm. Pains worse from touch and motion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica

Baneberry (ACTEA SPICATA)
Is a rheumatic remedy, especially of the *small joints*; tearing, tingling pains characterize it. *Wrist-rheumatism*. Pulsations over whole body, especially liver and renal region. Cardiovascular spasm. Pains worse from touch and motion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fearful, starts easily; confused. Ebullition of blood to head excited by drinking coffee. Vertigo, tearing headache, better in open air, throbbing in brain, pain from crown to between eyebrows; heat in forehead, pain in left frontal eminence as if bone were crushed. Itching of scalp alternating with heat; nose red at tip, fluent coryza.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica

Wrist swollen*, red, worse any motion. Paralytic weakness in the hands. Lame feeling in arms. Pain in knee. Sudden lassitude after talking or eating.

Most valuable in cardiac dropsy. Low vitality, with weak heart and slow, weak pulse. Hydrothorax, ascites. Anasarca.

materiaMedica.text: Five to ten drops of the tincture.

A heart medicine, after rheumatism or influenza, or Bright's disease, where the muscles of the heart are in stage of fatty degeneration, regulating the pulse and increasing the power of contractions of heart, with increased urinary secretions. materiaMedica.text:
*Adonidin* is a cardiac tonic and diuretic. Quarter grain daily, or two to five grains of first decimal trit increases arterial pressure and prolongs the diastole, favoring emptying engorged veins. Is an excellent substitute for Digitalis and is not cumulative in action.
Compare: *Digit; Cratoeg; Conval; Strophanthus*.

adrenalinum.name: Adrenalinum
adrenalinum.essence: An Internal Secretion of Suprarenal Glands (ADRENALIN)
adrenalinum.dosing:
Hypodermically, 1-5 m (1: 1,000 solution, as chloride) diluted in water. Internally, 5-30m of 1: 1,000 solution.
*Caution* On account of its affinity for oxygen, the drug easily decomposes in watery and dilute acid solutions. The solution must be protected from air and light. It must not be too frequently repeated, owing to cardiac and arterial lesions. For homeopathic use 2x to 6x attenuation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
An Internal Secretion of Suprarenal Glands (ADRENALIN)
Adrenaline or Epinephrine, the active principle of the medulla of the suprarenal gland, (cortical secretion not as yet isolated), is employed as a chemical messenger in the regulation of the activities of the body; in fact, its presence is essential to the activity of the sympathetic nerve. Adrenaline action on any part is the same as *stimulation of the sympathetic nerve endings* thereto. Local application (1: 1,000 solution) to mucous membranes promptly induces transient ischemia, seen in a *blanching*, persisting several hours from conjunctival instillation. Its action is very prompt, efficient, *evanescent*, owing to rapid oxidation and therefore practically harmless, *unless* too frequently repeated, when atheroma and heart lesions--myocardial--in animals have been reported. Arteries, heart, supra-renal bodies and vaso-motor system are prominently affected. The main action of Adrenaline is stimulation of the *sympathetic endings*, notably the splanchnic area, causing *constriction of the peripheral arterioles*, with resulting *rise in blood pressure*. This is especially observed in stomach, intestines; less in uterus, skin; nil in brain and lungs. Furthermore, is noticed, *slowing of pulse*, (medullary vagus stimulation), and *strengthening of heart beat* (increased myocardial contractility), resembling Digitalis; increased glandular activity, glycosuria; depression of respiratory center; contraction of muscular tissue of eye, uterus, vagina; relaxation of muscular tissue of stomach, intestines, bladder.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Its chief therapeutic use depends on its *vaso-constriction* action; therefore a most powerful and prompt *astringent* and *haemostatic*; and invaluable in *checking* capillary haemorrhages, from *all* parts, where *local* or direct application is feasible: nose, ear, mouth, throat, larynx, stomach, rectum, uterus, bladder. Haemorrhagic condition not due to defective coagulation of the blood. Complete *bloodlessness*, ischemia, may be induced with impunity. Locally, solutions (1: 10,000-1: 1,000) sprayed or applied on cotton have been very efficient in bloodless operations about the eye, nose, throat, and larynx.
Congestions of the ethmoid and sphenoid sinuses, also hay fever, have been markedly alleviated by warm spray of Adrenaline chloride, 1: 5,000. Here compare, Hepar 1x, which will start up secretions and so facilitate drainage. Werlhoff's disease, hypodermically, 1: 1,000. Externally, it has been used in neuritis, neuralgia, reflex pains, gout, rheumatism, as an ointment, 1-2 m of (1: 1,000) solution, along the nerve trunk at point of skin nearest its origin which could be reached (H. G. Carlton).
Therapeutically, Adrenaline has been suggested in acute congestion of lungs, *Asthma*, Grave's and Addison's diseases, arterio-sclerosis, chronic aortitis, angina pectoris, haemophilia chlorosis, hay fever, serum rashes, acute urticaria, etc. Dr. P. Jousset reports success in treating, homeopathically, cases of angina and of aortitis, sub-acute and chronic, when Adrenaline has been prescribed *per os* and in infinitesimal dose. The symptom guiding to this is, *Sensation of thoracic constriction with anguish*. This, with vertigo, nausea and vomiting have been produced by the drug. *Abdominal pain*. Shock or heart failure during anaesthesia, as it causes very prompt rise of blood pressure by its action on nerve endings in the vessel wall.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Hypodermically, 1-5 m (1: 1,000 solution, as chloride) diluted in water. Internally, 5-30m of 1: 1,000 solution.
*Caution* On account of its affinity for oxygen, the drug easily decomposes in watery and dilute acid solutions. The solution must be protected from air and light. It must not be too frequently repeated, owing to cardiac and arterial lesions. For homeopathic use 2x to 6x attenuation.

aesculus-hippocastanum.name: Aesculus Hippocastanum
aesculus-hippocastanum.essence: The action of this drug is most marked on the lower bowel, producing engorged haemorrhoidal veins, with characteristic backache, with absence of actual constipation. Much pain but little bleeding. Venous stasis general, varicose veins of purple color; everything is slowed down, digestion, heart, bowels, etc. Torpor and congestion of the liver and portal system, with constipation. The back aches and gives out and unfits the patient for business. Flying pains all over. *Fullness in various parts*,...

agg: in morning on awaking, and from any motion, *walking*

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Horse Chestnut
The action of this drug is most marked on the lower bowel, producing engorged haemorrhoidal veins, with characteristic backache, with absence of actual constipation. Much pain but little bleeding. Venous stasis general, varicose veins of purple color; everything is slowed down, digestion, heart, bowels, etc. Torpor and congestion of the liver and portal system, with constipation. The back aches and gives out and unfits the patient for business. Flying pains all over. *Fullness in various parts*, dry, swollen mucous membranes. Throat with haemorrhoidal conditions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Depressed and *irritable*. Head dull, confused, aching as from a cold. Pressure in forehead, with nausea, followed by stitches in right hypochondrium. Pain from occiput to frontal region, with bruised sensation of the scalp; worse in the morning. Neuralgic stitches from right to left through forehead, followed by flying pains in epigastrium. Vertigo when sitting and walking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heavy and hot, with lachrymation, with *enlarged blood vessels*. Eyeballs sore.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry; inspired air feels cold, *nasal passages sensitive to it. Coryza*, sneezing. Pressure at root of nose. Membrane over turbinate bones distended and boggy, dependent upon hepatic disorders.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scalded feeling. Metallic taste. Salivation. Tongue thickly coated, feels as if scalded.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hot, *dry*, raw, stitching pain into ears when swallowing. Follicular pharyngitis connected with hepatic congestion. *Veins in pharynx distended* and tortuous. Throat sensitive to inspired air; feels excoriated and constricted, burns like fire on swallowing, in afternoon. Early stages of atrophic pharyngitis in dried-up, bilious subjects. Hawking of ropy mucus of sweetish taste.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Weight of a stone, with gnawing, aching pain; most manifest about three hours after meals. Tenderness and fullness in region of liver.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull aching in liver and epigastrium. Pain at umbilicus. Jaundice; throbbing in hypogastrium and pelvis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry, aching. *Feels full of small sticks*. Anus raw, sore. Much pain after stool, with prolapse. *Haemorrhoids*, with sharp shooting pains up the back; blind and bleeding; worse during climacteric. Large, hard, dry stools. Mucous membrane seems swollen and obstructs the passage. Irritation caused by ascarides and aids their expulsion. *Burning in anus with chills up and down back.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frequent, scant, dark, muddy, hot urine. Pain in kidneys, especially left and ureter.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Discharge of prostatic fluid at stool.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Constant throbbing behind symphysis pubis*. Leucorrhoea, with *lameness of back across the sacro-iliac articulation*; dark yellow, sticky corroding; worse after menses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels constricted. Heart's action full and heavy, can feel pulsations all over. Laryngitis; coughs *depending on hepatic disorders*; hot feeling in chest; pain around heart in haemorrhoidal subjects.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aching and soreness in limbs, in left acromion process with shooting down arms; finger tips numb.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lameness in neck; aching between shoulder blades; region of *spine feels weak*; back and legs give out. *Backache affecting sacrum and hips*; *worse walking or stooping*. When walking feet turn under. Soles feel sore, tired, and swell. Hands and feet swell, and become red after washing, feel full.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chill at 4 pm. Chilliness up and down back. Fever 7 to 12 pm. Evening fever, skin hot and dry. Sweat profuse and hot with the fever.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, in morning on awaking, and from any motion, *walking*; from moving bowels; after eating, afternoon, standing. *Better*, cool open air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Aesculus glabra*-Ohio-Buckeye Proctitis. Very painful, dark purple, external haemorrhoids, with constipation and vertigo and portal congestion. Speech thick, tickling in throat, impaired vision, paresis. *Phytolacca* (throat dry, more often in acute cases). *Negundium Americanum*--Box-elder--(Engorgements of rectum and piles with great pain, ten-drop doses of tincture every two hours). Compare also: *Aloe, Collinson. Nux. Sulphur*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency.

aethusa-cynapium.name: Aethusa Cynapium
aethusa-cynapium.essence: The characteristic symptoms relate mainly to the brain and nervous system, connected with gastro-intestinal disturbance. Anguish, crying, and expression of uneasiness and discontent, lead to this remedy most frequently in disease in children, during dentition, summer complaint, when, with the diarrhoea, there is *marked inability to digest milk*, and poor circulation. Symptoms set in with *violence*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Fool's Parsley
The characteristic symptoms relate mainly to the brain and nervous system, connected with gastro-intestinal disturbance. Anguish, crying, and expression of uneasiness and discontent, lead to this remedy most frequently in disease in children, during dentition, summer complaint, when, with the diarrhoea, there is *marked inability to digest milk*, and poor circulation. Symptoms set in with *violence*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Restless, *anxious, crying*. Sees rats, cats, dogs, etc. Unconscious, delirious. *Inability to think, to fix the attention*. Brain fag. Idiocy may alternate with furor and irritability.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels bound up, or in a vise. *Occipital pain* extending down spine; better lying down and by pressure. Head symptoms relieved by expelling flatus (*Sanguin*) and by stool. *Hair feels pulled. Vertigo with drowsiness, with palpitation; head hot after vertigo ceases.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Photophobia; *swelling of Meibomian glands*. Rolling of eyes on falling asleep. *Eyes drawn downward*; pupils dilated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Feel obstructed*. Sense of something hot from ears. Hissing sound.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stopped up with much thick mucus. *Herpetic eruption* on tip of nose. Frequent ineffectual desire to sneeze.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Puffed*, red-spotted, collapsed. Expression anxious, full of pain; *linea nasalis* marked.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry. Aphthae. Tongue seems too long. Burning and pustules in throat, with difficult swallowing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Intolerance of milk*; vomiting as soon as swallowed or in large curds. Hungry after vomiting. *Regurgitation of food about an hour after eating*. Violent vomiting of a white frothy matter. Nausea at sight of food. Painful contraction of stomach. Vomiting, *with sweat and great weakness*, accompanied by anguish and distress, followed by sleepiness. Stomach feels turned upside down, with burning feeling up to the chest. Tearing pains in the stomach extending to oesophagus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cold, internal and external, with aching pain in bowels. Colic, followed by vomiting, vertigo, and weakness. Tense, inflated, and sensitive. Bubbling sensation around navel.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Undigested, thin, greenish*, preceded by colic, with tenesmus, and followed by exhaustion and drowsiness. Cholera infantum; child cold, clammy, stupid, with staring eyes and dilated pupils. Obstinate constipation; feels as if all bowel action is lost. Choleraic affections in old age.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cutting pain in bladder, with frequent urging. Pain in kidneys.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lancinating pains in sexual organs. Pimples; itching when warm. Menses watery. Swelling of mammary glands, with lancinating pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Difficult, oppressed, anxious respiration; crampy constriction. Sufferings render patient speechless.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent palpitation, with vertigo, headache and restlessness. Pulse rapid, hard and small.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Want of power to stand up or hold head up. Back feels as if in a vise. Aching in small of back. Weakness of lower extremities. Fingers and thumbs clenched. Numbness of hands and feet. Violent spasms. Squinting of eyes downward.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Excoriation of thighs in walking. Easy perspiration. *Surface of body cold and covered with clammy sweat. Lymphatic glands swollen*. Itching *eruption around joints*. Skin of hands dry and shrunken. Ecchymosis. Anasarca.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Great heat; no thirst*. Profuse, cold sweat. *Must be covered during sweat*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Disturbed by *violent startings*; cold perspiration. Dozing after vomiting or stool. *Child is so exhausted, it falls asleep at once.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
*Worse*, 3 to 4 am, and evenings; warmth, summer. *Better* in open air and company.
Compare: *Athamantha* (confused head, vertigo better lying down, *bitter* taste and saliva. Hands and feet icy cold); *Antimon; Calc; Ars; Cicuta*. Complementary: *Calc*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

aethiops-mineralis.name: Aethiops Mineralis
aethiops-mineralis.essence: Sulph and Quicksilver, or Black Sulphide Mercury (AETHIOPS MERCURIALIS-MINERALIS)
aethiops-mineralis.dosing: The lower triturations, especially the second decimal.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Sulph and Quicksilver, or Black Sulphide Mercury (AETHIOPS MERCURIALIS-MINERALIS)
This preparation is of use in *scrofulous* affections, ophthalmia, otorrhoea, painful, irritating, scabby eruptions, hereditary syphilis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Eruptions. Favus-like, scrofulous, herpetic and eczematous.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Aethiops Antimonalis*--(Hydrargyrum stibiato sulfuratum).--(often more effective than the above in scrofulous eruptions, glandular swellings, otorrhoea and *scrofulous eye affections*, corneal ulcers. Third trituration). Compare: *Calc; Sil; Psorin*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: The lower triturations, especially the second decimal.

agave-americana.name: Agave Americana
agave-americana.essence: Indicated in stomachache, and painful erections in gonorrhoea. Strangury. Hydrophobia. Scurvy; countenance pale, gums swollen and bleeding, legs covered with dark purple blotches, swollen, painful and hard. Appetite poor; bowels constipated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Century Plant
Indicated in stomachache, and painful erections in gonorrhoea. Strangury. Hydrophobia. Scurvy; countenance pale, gums swollen and bleeding, legs covered with dark purple blotches, swollen, painful and hard. Appetite poor; bowels constipated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Anhalonium; Lyssin; Lach*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture

agnus-castus.name: Agnus Castus
agnus-castus.essence: The most effective point of attack of Agnus upon the organism is the sexual organism. It lowers sexual vitality, with corresponding mental depression and loss of nervous energy. It shows this distinctive influence in both sexes, but is more pronounced in men. Premature old age from abuse of sexual power. History of repeated gonorrhoea. A prominent remedy for sprains and strains. *Gnawing itching in all parts, especially eyes*. Tachycardia caused by tobacco in neurotic young men.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
The Chaste Tree
The most effective point of attack of Agnus upon the organism is the sexual organism. It lowers sexual vitality, with corresponding mental depression and loss of nervous energy. It shows this distinctive influence in both sexes, but is more pronounced in men. Premature old age from abuse of sexual power. History of repeated gonorrhoea. A prominent remedy for sprains and strains. *Gnawing itching in all parts, especially eyes*. Tachycardia caused by tobacco in neurotic young men.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sexual melancholy. Fear of death. *Sadness with impression of speedy death*. Absentminded, forgetful, lack of courage. Illusion of smell-herrings, musk. Nervous depression and mental forebodings.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pupils dilated* (*Bell*). Itching about eyes; photophobia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Odor of herring or musk. Aching in dorsum better pressure.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Spleen swollen, sore. Stools soft, recede, difficult. Deep fissures in anus. Nausea *with sensation as if intestines were pressed downwards*; wants to support bowels.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Yellow discharge from urethra. No erections. *Impotence. Parts cold, relaxed. Desire gone (Selen; Con; Sabal).* Scanty emission without ejaculation. Loss of prostatic fluid on straining. Gleety discharge. Testicles, cold, swollen, hard, and painful.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scanty menses. Abhorrence of sexual intercourse. Relaxation of genitals, with leucorrhoea. *Agalactia*; with sadness. Sterility. Leucorrhoea staining yellow; transparent. Hysterical palpitation with nose bleed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Selenium; Phosph ac; Camphor; Lycop*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to sixth potency.

agraphis-nutans.name: Agraphis Nutans
agraphis-nutans.essence:
A relaxed condition of the system generally and a proneness to take cold on exposure to cold winds.

Catarrhal conditions; obstruction of nostrils. *Adenoids, throat deafness. Enlarged tonsils*. Mucous diarrhoea from cold. Chill from cold winds. Throat and ear troubles *with tendency to free discharge from mucous membranes*. Mutinism of childhood unconnected with deafness.

complementary: Hydrast; Cepa; Calc phos; Sulph jod; Calc jod

agraphis-nutans.dosing: Third potency. Single doses of tincture (Dr. Cooper).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Bluebell
A relaxed condition of the system generally and a proneness to take cold on exposure to cold winds.
Catarrhal conditions; obstruction of nostrils. *Adenoids, throat deafness. Enlarged tonsils*. Mucous diarrhoea from cold. Chill from cold winds. Throat and ear troubles *with tendency to free discharge from mucous membranes*. Mutinism of childhood unconnected with deafness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Hydrast; Cepa; Calc phos; Sulph jod; Calc jod*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency. Single doses of tincture (Dr. Cooper).

ailanthus-glandulosa.name: Ailanthus Glandulosa
ailanthus-glandulosa.essence: This remedy shows by its peculiar skin symptoms its pronounced power of disorganizing the blood, causing conditions we meet with in low fevers, low types of eruptive diseases, diphtheria, *follicular tonsillitis*, Streptococcus infection, Haemorrhagic diathesis, etc. *The skin appears livid or purplish*; face dark as mahogany, hot; sordes; throat swollen, purple, livid; semi-conscious, delirious; weak pulse, general torpor and prostration. Symptoms remarkably alike to malignant scarlatina. Diarr...

complementary: Ammon carb; Bapt; Arn; Mur ac; Lach; Rhus

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Chinese Sumach
This remedy shows by its peculiar skin symptoms its pronounced power of disorganizing the blood, causing conditions we meet with in low fevers, low types of eruptive diseases, diphtheria, *follicular tonsillitis*, Streptococcus infection, Haemorrhagic diathesis, etc. *The skin appears livid or purplish*; face dark as mahogany, hot; sordes; throat swollen, purple, livid; semi-conscious, delirious; weak pulse, general torpor and prostration. Symptoms remarkably alike to malignant scarlatina. Diarrhoea, dysentery and *great weakness* are very marked. *Adynamia* characterizes all its conditions. Lividity, stupor and malignancy. Mucous membranes haemorrhagic and ulcerative (*Lach. Ars*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: General stupor, with sighing. Confused mind, mental depression. *Headache, frontal*, with drowsiness. Passive congestion headaches. *Suffused, dilated eyes*; photophobia. Face dusky. Thin, *copious, ichorous*, bloody nasal discharge.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Inflamed, oedematous, dusky red. *Much swelling, internal and external*. Dry, rough, scraping, choking feeling. *Neck tender and swollen*. Hoarse, croupy voice. *Tongue dry and brown. Teeth covered with sordes. Pain in swallowing* extends to the ears.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hurried breathing; irregular. Dry, hacking cough. Lungs sore and tired.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Drowsy, restless. Heavy, disturbed, unrefreshing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Miliary, livid rash, returns annually. Large blisters filled with dark serum. *Irregular, patchy, livid eruption*, disappearing on pressure. Cold. Raynaud's disease.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Rhus; Nux*.
Compare: *Ammon carb; Bapt; Arn; Mur ac; Lach; Rhus*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to sixth potency.

aletris-farinosa.name: Aletris Farinosa
aletris-farinosa.essence: An anaemic, relaxed condition, especially of the female organism, is portrayed by this remedy. The patient *is tired all the time*, and suffers from prolapsus, leucorrhoea, rectal distress, etc. Marked anaemia. Chlorotic girls and pregnant women.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Disgust for food. Least food causes distress. Fainting spells, with vertigo. Vomiting during pregnancy. Nervous dyspepsia. Flatulent colic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Loads up with feces-paretic condition. Stool large, hard, difficult, great pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Premature and profuse menses, with labor-like pains (Bell; Cham; Kali c; Plat).* Retarded and scanty flow (*Senecio*). Uterus seems heavy. Prolapse, with pain in right inguinal region. Leucorrhoea due to weakness and anaemia. Habitual tendency to abortion. Muscular pains during pregnancy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Helonias; Hydrastis; Tanacet; China*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture to third potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Stargrass
An anaemic, relaxed condition, especially of the female organism, is portrayed by this remedy. The patient *is tired all the time*, and suffers from prolapsus, leucorrhoea, rectal distress, etc. Marked anaemia. Chlorotic girls and pregnant women.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Power and energy weakened. Confused feelings. Cannot concentrate mind. Fainting, with vertigo.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Much frothy saliva.

alfalfa.name: Alfalfa
alfalfa.essence: >From its action on the sympathetic, Alfalfa favorably influences nutrition, evidenced in "toning up" the appetite and digestion resulting in greatly improved mental and physical vigor, with gain in weight. Disorders characterized by malnutrition are mainly within its therapeutic range, for example, neurasthenia, splanchnic blues, nervousness, insomnia, nervous indigestion, etc. Acts as a fat producer, corrects tissue waste. Deficient lactation. Increases quality and quantity of milk in nursing ...

complementary: Avena sat; Dipodium punct; Gels; Hydr; Kali phos; Phos ac; Zinc

alfalfa.dosing: The best results are elicited with material doses (5-10) drops of tincture, several times daily. Continue its use until tonic effects ensue.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull, heavy feeling in occiput, in and above the eyes, worse toward evening. Pain in left side of head. Violent headache.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stuffed feeling in eustachian tubes (*Kali mur*) at night; patulous in morning.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Increased thirst. Appetite impaired, but chiefly increased even to bulimia. He must eat frequently, so that he cannot wait for regular meals; hungry in forenoon (*Sul*). Much nibbling of food and craving for sweets.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Flatulence with distention. Shifting, flatulent pain along colon several hours after meals. Frequent, loose, yellow, painful stools, with burning of flatulence. Chronic appendicitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Kidneys inactive; frequent urging to urinate. Polyuria (*Phos ac*). Increased elimination of urea, indican and phosphates.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Slept better than usual, especially in early morning; it induces quiet, reposeful and refreshing sleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Avena sat; Dipodium punct; Gels; Hydr; Kali phos; Phos ac; Zinc*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: The best results are elicited with material doses (5-10) drops of tincture, several times daily. Continue its use until tonic effects ensue.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Medicago Sativa, California Clover or Lucerne
>From its action on the sympathetic, Alfalfa favorably influences nutrition, evidenced in "toning up" the appetite and digestion resulting in greatly improved mental and physical vigor, with gain in weight. Disorders characterized by malnutrition are mainly within its therapeutic range, for example, neurasthenia, splanchnic blues, nervousness, insomnia, nervous indigestion, etc. Acts as a fat producer, corrects tissue waste. Deficient lactation. Increases quality and quantity of milk in nursing mothers. Its pronounced urinary action suggests it clinically in diabetes insipidus and phosphaturia; and it is claimed to allay vesical irritability of prostatic hypertrophy. The rheumatic diathesis seems especially amenable to its action.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: It induces mental exhilaration of buoyancy,*i.e*, a general feeling of well being; clear and bright, so that all blues are dissipated. Dull, drowsy, stupid (*Gels*); gloomy and irritable, worse during evening.

allium-cepa.name: Allium Cepa
allium-cepa.essence: A picture of coryza, with *acrid nasal* discharge and laryngeal symptoms, eye secretion *bland*; singers' cold, *worse in warm room* and toward evening; better in open air is presented by this remedy. Specially adapted to phlegmatic patients; colds in *damp cold weather*. Neuralgic pains, *like a fine thread*, following amputations or injuries to nerves. Traumatic chronic neuritis. Burning in nose, mouth, throat, bladder and skin. Sensation of glowing heat on different parts of the body.

agg: in the evening, in warm room
amel: in open air, and in cold room

complementary: Gels; Euph; Kali hyd; Aconite; Ipecac

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Red Onion
A picture of coryza, with *acrid nasal* discharge and laryngeal symptoms, eye secretion *bland*; singers' cold, *worse in warm room* and toward evening; better in open air is presented by this remedy. Specially adapted to phlegmatic patients; colds in *damp cold weather*. Neuralgic pains, *like a fine thread*, following amputations or injuries to nerves. Traumatic chronic neuritis. Burning in nose, mouth, throat, bladder and skin. Sensation of glowing heat on different parts of the body.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Catarrhal headache, mostly in forehead; *worse in warm room* towards evening. Thread-like pains in face. Headache ceases during menses; returns when flow disappears.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Red. Much *burning* and smarting lachrymation. *Sensitive to light*. Eyes suffused and watery; profuse, *bland* lachrymation, better in open air. Burning in eyelids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Earache, shooting in eustachian tube.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sneezing, especially when entering a warm room. *Copious, watery and extremely acrid discharge*. Feeling of a lump at root of nose. Hay-fever (*Sabad; Sil; Psor*). Fluent coryza with headache, cough, and hoarseness. Polypus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Canine hunger. Pain in pyloric region. Thirst. Belching. Nausea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rumbling, offensive flatus. Pains in left hypogastrium. Colic sitting, moving about.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diarrhoea with very offensive flatus. Stitches in rectum; itching and rhagades in anus. Glowing heat in rectum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation of weakness in bladder and urethra. Increased secretion of urine with coryza. Urine red with much pressure and burning in urethra.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Hoarseness. Hacking cough on inspiring cold air. Tickling in larynx. Sensation as if larynx is split or torn. Oppressed breathing* from pressure in middle of chest. Constricted feeling in region of epiglottis. Pain extending to ear.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lame joints. Ulcers on heel. Painful affections of fingers about nails neuralgia of stump. Bad effects from getting feet wet. Limbs, especially arms, feel sore and tired.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Yawning with headache and drowsiness. Gaping in deep sleep. Dreams. Wakes at 2 am.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, in the evening, in warm room. *Better*, in open air, and in cold room.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Gels; Euph; Kali hyd; Aconite; Ipecac*.
Complementary: *Phosphor; Thuja; Puls*.
Antidotes: *Arn; Cham; Verat*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

allium-sativum.name: Allium Sativum
allium-sativum.essence:
Acts directly on intestinal mucous membrane increasing peristalsis. Colitis, with pathological flora. Has vaso-dilatory properties. Arterial hypotension begins usually in 30 to 45 minutes after twenty to forty drop doses of the tincture.

Adapted to fleshy subjects with dyspepsia and catarrhal affections. High livers. Patients who eat a great deal more, *especially meat*, than they drink. *Pain in hip, pain in psoas and iliac muscles. Pulmonary tuberculosis*.

Cough and expectoration diminishes,...
allium-sativum.dosing: Third to sixth potency. In tuberculosis, dose, four to six grammes in moderate state of dessication daily, in divided doses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Garlic
Acts directly on intestinal mucous membrane increasing peristalsis. Colitis, with pathological flora. Has vaso-dilatory properties. Arterial hypotension begins usually in 30 to 45 minutes after twenty to forty drop doses of the tincture.
Adapted to fleshy subjects with dyspepsia and catarrhal affections. High livers. Patients who eat a great deal more, *especially meat*, than they drink. *Pain in hip, pain in psoas and iliac muscles. Pulmonary tuberculosis*.
Cough and expectoration diminishes, temperature becomes normal, weight is gained, and sleep becomes regular. *Haemoptysis*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heavy; pulsation in temples; catarrhal deafness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Much sweetish saliva after meals and at night. Sensation of a hair on tongue or throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Voracious appetite. Burning eructations. Least change in diet causes trouble. Constipation, with constant dull pains in bowels. *Tongue pale, red papillae*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constant rattling of mucus in bronchi. Cough in the morning after leaving bedroom, with mucous expectoration, which is tenacious and difficult to raise. Sensitive to cold air. Dilated bronchi, with fetid expectoration. Darting pain in chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in swelling of breasts. Eruption in vagina and on breasts and vulva during menses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
*Allium Sat* according to Dr. Teste, belongs to the Bryonia group, including Lycopod. Nux. Colocy, Digital and Ignatia which affect deeply all flesh eating animals and hardly at all vegetarians. Hence their special applicability to meat eaters rather than to exclusive vegetarians.
Compare: *Capsicum; Arsenic; Senega; Kali nit.*
Complementary: *Arsenic*.
Antidote: *Lycopod*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to sixth potency. In tuberculosis, dose, four to six grammes in moderate state of dessication daily, in divided doses.

alnus-serrulata.name: Alnus Serrulata
alnus-serrulata.essence: Has some reputation as a remedy for skin affections, glandular enlargements, and indigestion from imperfect secretion of gastric juice. It stimulates nutrition, and thus acts favorably upon strumous disorders, enlarged glands, etc. Ulcerated mucous membranes of mouth and throat. Fingers covered by crust caused by pustules, disagreeable odor. Indigestion from imperfect secretion of gastric juice.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Red Alder (ALNUS)
Has some reputation as a remedy for skin affections, glandular enlargements, and indigestion from imperfect secretion of gastric juice. It stimulates nutrition, and thus acts favorably upon strumous disorders, enlarged glands, etc. Ulcerated mucous membranes of mouth and throat. Fingers covered by crust caused by pustules, disagreeable odor. Indigestion from imperfect secretion of gastric juice.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Leucorrhoea, with erosions of cervix, bleeding easily. Amenorrhoea, with burning pains from back to pubis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chronic herpes. Enlarged sub-maxillary glands. Eczema, prurigo. Purpura haemorrhagica. Poison-oak. Use locally.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture to third potency.

aloe-socotrina.name: Aloe Socotrina
aloe-socotrina.essence: An excellent remedy to aid in re-establishing physiological equilibrium after much dosing, where disease and drug symptoms are much mixed. There is no remedy richer in symptoms of portal congestion and none that has given better clinical results, both for the primary pathological condition and secondary phenomena. Bad effects from sedentary life or habits. Especially suitable to lymphatic and hypochondriacal patients. The rectal symptoms usually determine the choice. Adapted to weary people, the...
aloe-socotrina.dosing: Sixth potency and higher. In rectal conditions, a few doses of the third, then wait.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thick lumps of tough mucus. Varicose condition of veins in pharynx. Dry, scrapy feeling.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aversion to meat. Longing for juicy things. After eating, flatulence, *pulsation in rectum* and sexual irritation. Nausea, with headache. Pain in pit when making false step.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Socotrine Aloes (ALOE)
An excellent remedy to aid in re-establishing physiological equilibrium after much dosing, where disease and drug symptoms are much mixed. There is no remedy richer in symptoms of portal congestion and none that has given better clinical results, both for the primary pathological condition and secondary phenomena. Bad effects from sedentary life or habits. Especially suitable to lymphatic and hypochondriacal patients. The rectal symptoms usually determine the choice. Adapted to weary people, the aged, and phlegmatic, old beer-drinkers. Dissatisfied and angry about himself, alternating with lumbago. Heat internally and externally. Has been used successfully in the treatment of consumption by giving the pure juice.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Headache alternates with lumbago, with intestinal and uterine affections. Disinclination to mental labor. *Aches above forehead, with heaviness in eyes, must partially close them*. Headache after stool. Dull, pressive pain; worse from heat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compelled to make small during pain in forehead. Flickering before eyes. Redness of eyes with *yellow* vision. *Pain deep in orbits*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Marked redness of lips.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cracking when chewing. Sudden explosion and clashing in left ear. Tinkling as of some thin, shivered, metallic globe in head.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coldness of tip. Bleeding in morning on awakening. Full of crusts.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Taste bitter and sour. Tasteless eructations. Lips cracked and dry.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain around navel, worse pressure. Fullness in region of liver, pain under right ribs. *Abdomen feels full, heavy, hot, bloated*. Pulsating pain around navel. Weak feeling, as if diarrhoea would come on. Great accumulation of flatus, pressing downwards, causing distress in lower bowels. *Sensation of plug between symphysis pubis and os coccygis,* with urging to stool. Colic before and during stool. Burning, copious flatus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constant bearing down in rectum; bleeding, sore, and hot; relieved by cold water. Feeling of weakness and loss of power of sphincter ani. *Sense of insecurity in rectum,* when passing flatus. Uncertain whether gas or stool will come. Stool passes without effort, almost unnoticed. Lumpy, watery stool. Jelly-like stools, with soreness in rectum after stool. *A lot of mucus, with pain in rectum after stool*. Haemorrhoids protrude like grapes; very sore and tender; better cold water application. Burning in anus and rectum. Constipation, with heavy pressure in lower part of abdomen. Diarrhoea from beer.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Incontinence in aged, bearing-down sensation and enlarged prostate. Scanty and high colored.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bearing down in rectum, worse standing and during menses. Uterus feels heavy, cannot walk much on that account. Labor-like pains in loins; extend down legs. Climacteric haemorrhage. Menses too early and too profuse.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Winter coughs, with itching. Difficult respiration, with stitches from liver to chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in small of back; worse moving. Stitches through sacrum. *Lumbago alternating with headache and piles*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lameness in all limbs. *Drawing pains in joints*. Soles pain when walking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse* early morning; summer; heat; in hot, dry weather; after eating or drinking. *Better* from cold, open air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Complementary: *Sulphur;* compare: *Kali bich; Lycop; Allium sat.*
Antidotes: *Opium; Sulph*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency and higher. In rectal conditions, a few doses of the third, then wait.

alstonia-scholaris.name: Alstonia Scholaris
alstonia-scholaris.essence: Malarial diseases, with diarrhoea, dysentery, anaemia, feeble digestion, are the general conditions suggesting this remedy. Characteristics are the gone sensation in stomach and sinking in abdomen, with debility. *A tonic after exhausting fevers*.
alstonia-scholaris.dosing: Tincture to third potency. Locally, for ulcers and rheumatic pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Dita Bark
Malarial diseases, with diarrhoea, dysentery, anaemia, feeble digestion, are the general conditions suggesting this remedy. Characteristics are the gone sensation in stomach and sinking in abdomen, with debility. *A tonic after exhausting fevers*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent purging and cramp in bowels. Heat and irritation in lower bowels. Camp diarrhoea, bloody stool, *dysentery*; diarrhoea from bad water and malaria. *Painless watery stools (Phosph ac).* Diarrhoea immediately after eating.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: Similar in action to *Alstonia constricta*, the bitter bark or native quinine of Australia. *Ditain* (active principle, is anti-periodic, like quinine, but without unpleasant effects). *Cinchona* (similar in diarrhoea, chronic dyspepsia and debility). *Hydrastis; Fer cit et chin*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture to third potency. Locally, for ulcers and rheumatic pains.

alumina.name: Alumina
alumina.essence: A very general condition corresponding to this drug is *dryness* of mucous membranes and skin, and *tendency to paretic muscular states*. Old people, with lack of vital heat, or prematurely old, with debility. Sluggish functions, heaviness, numbness, and staggering, and the characteristic constipation find an excellent remedy in Alumina. Disposition to colds in the head, and eructations in spare, dry, thin subjects. Delicate children, products of artificial baby foods.

agg: from potatoes. *Worse*, in morning on awaking
amel: in evening and on alternate days. *Better* damp weather

alumina.dosing: Sixth to thirtieth and higher. Action slow in developing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stitches. Gnawing pain, as if from hot iron. Pain along cord, with paralytic weakness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Oxide et Aluminum-Argilla
A very general condition corresponding to this drug is *dryness* of mucous membranes and skin, and *tendency to paretic muscular states*. Old people, with lack of vital heat, or prematurely old, with debility. Sluggish functions, heaviness, numbness, and staggering, and the characteristic constipation find an excellent remedy in Alumina. Disposition to colds in the head, and eructations in spare, dry, thin subjects. Delicate children, products of artificial baby foods.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
