materiaMedica.text: Low-spirited; fears loss of reason. Confused as to personal identity. *Hasty, hurried*. Time passes slowly. *Variable mood*. Better as day advances. Suicidal tendency when seeing knife or blood.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stitching, burning pain in head, with vertigo, worse in morning, but relieved by food. Pressure in forehead as from a tight hat. Inability to walk except with eyes open. Throbbing headache, with constipation. Vertigo, with nausea; better after breakfast. Falling out of hair; scalp itches and is numb.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Objects look yellow. Eyes feel cold. Lids dry, burn, smart, thickened, aggravated in morning; chronic conjunctivitis. Ptosis. Strabismus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Humming; roaring. Eustachian tube feels plugged.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain at root of nose. Sense of smell diminished. Fluent coryza. Point of nose *cracked*, nostrils sore, *red*; worse touch. *Scabs with thick yellow mucus*. Tettery redness. *Ozoena atrophica sicca*. Membranes distended and boggy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels as if albuminous substance had dried on it. Blood-boils and pimples. Twitching of lower jaw. Rush of blood to face after eating.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sore. Bad odor from it. Teeth covered with sordes. Gums sore, bleeding. Tensive pain in articulation of jaw when opening mouth or chewing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Dry*, sore; food cannot pass, oesophagus contracted. Feels as if splinter or plug were in throat. Irritable, and relaxed throat. Looks parched and glazed. Clergyman's sore throat in thin subjects. Thick, tenacious mucus drops from posterior nares. Constant inclination to clear the throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Abnormal cravings-chalk, charcoal, dry food, tea-grounds. Heartburn; feels constricted. Aversion to meat (*Graph; Arn; Puls*). *Potatoes disagree*. No desire to eat. *Can swallow but small morsels at a time*. Constriction of oesophagus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Colic, like painter's colic. Pressing in both groins toward sexual organs. *Left-sided abdominal complaints*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Hard* dry, knotty; *no desire*. Rectum sore, dry, inflamed, bleeding. Itching and burning at anus. *Even a soft stool is passed with difficulty. Great straining*. Constipation of infants (*Collins; Psor; Paraf*) and old people from inactive rectum, and in women of very sedentary habit. Diarrhoea on urinating. *Evacuation preceded by painful urging long before stool, and then straining at stool.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Muscles of bladder paretic, *must strain at stool in order to urinate*. Pain in kidneys, with mental confusion. Frequent desire to urinate in old people. Difficult starting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Excessive desire. Involuntary emissions when straining at stool. Prostatic discharge.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses too early, short, *scanty, pale, followed by great exhaustion* (*Carb an; Coccul*). Leucorrhoea *acrid, profuse* transparent, *ropy*, with burning; worse during daytime, and after menses. Relieved by washing with cold water.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cough soon after waking in the morning. Hoarse, aphonia, tickling in larynx; wheezing, rattling respiration. Cough on talking or singing, *in the morning*. Chest feels constricted. Condiments produce cough. Talking aggravates soreness of chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Pain in arm and fingers, as if hot iron penetrated. Arms feel paralyzed. Legs feel asleep, *especially when sitting with legs crossed. Staggers on walking. Heels feel numb*. Soles tender; on stepping, feel soft and swollen. Pain in shoulder and upper arm. Gnawing beneath finger nails.
*Brittle nails*. Inability to walk, except when eyes are open or in daytime. Spinal degenerations and paralysis of lower limbs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Restless; anxious and confused dreams. Sleepy in morning.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chapped and dry tettery. Brittle nails. *Intolerable itching when getting warm in bed*. Must scratch until it bleeds; then becomes painful. Brittle skin on fingers.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, periodically; in afternoon; from potatoes. *Worse*, in morning on awaking; warm room. *Better*, in open air; from cold washing; in evening and on alternate days. *Better* damp weather.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Aluminum chloridum* (Pains of loco-motor ataxia. Lower trits in water). *Slag Silico-Sulphocalcite of Alumina* 3x (anal itching, piles, constipation, flatulent distention); *Secale; Lathyr; Plumb. Aluminum acetate* solution. Externally a lotion for putrid wounds and skin infections. Arrests haemorrhage from inertia of uterus. Parenchymatous haemorrhage from various organs-23 % solution. Haemorrhage following tonsillectomy is controlled by rinsing out nasopharynx with a 10 % sol.
Complementary: *Bryonia*.
Antidotes: *Ipecac; Chamom*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth and higher. Action slow in developing.

alumen.name: Alumen
alumen.essence: The clinical application of this remedy points to its bowel symptoms, both in obstinate constipation and in haemorrhage from bowels in the course of typhoid-one phase of the *paralytic weakness* of the muscles in all parts of the body. *Tendency to induration* is also marked, a low form of tissue-making is favored. Hardening of tissues of tongue, rectum, uterus, etc; ulcers with indurated base. Adapted to old people, especially bronchial catarrhs. *Sensation of dryness and constriction*. Mental ...

agg: cold except headache, which is relieved by cold

alumen.dosing: First to thirtieth potency. The very highest potencies have proved efficacious. Powdered alum, 10 grains, placed on tongue, said to arrest an attack of asthma.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Common Potash Alum
The clinical application of this remedy points to its bowel symptoms, both in obstinate constipation and in haemorrhage from bowels in the course of typhoid-one phase of the *paralytic weakness* of the muscles in all parts of the body. *Tendency to induration* is also marked, a low form of tissue-making is favored. Hardening of tissues of tongue, rectum, uterus, etc; ulcers with indurated base. Adapted to old people, especially bronchial catarrhs. *Sensation of dryness and constriction*. Mental paresis; dysphagia especially to *liquids*. Tendency to induration, Scirrhus of the tongue.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Burning pain as of weight on top of lead better by pressure* of hand. Vertigo, with weakness in pit of stomach. Alopecia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Throat relaxed. Mucous membrane red and swollen. Cough. Tickling in throat. Tendency to throat colds. *Enlarged and indurated tonsils*. Burning pain down the oesophagus. Complete aphonia. Every cold settles in throat. Constriction of oesophagus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Palpitation, *from lying down on right side*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Constipation of the most aggravated kind*. No desire for stool for days. Violent ineffectual urging to stool. No ability to expel stool. *Marble-like masses pass, but rectum still feels full*. Itching after stool. Itching in anus. Long lasting pain and smarting in rectum after stool; also haemorrhoids. Yellow, like an infant's. Haemorrhage from bowels.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tendency to induration of neck of uterus and mammary glands (*Carb an; Con*). Chronic yellow vaginal discharge. Chronic gonorrhoea, yellow, with little lumps along urethra. Aphthous patches in vagina (*Caul*). Menses watery.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Haemoptysis, great weakness of chest; difficult to expel mucus. Copious, ropy morning expectoration in old people. Asthma.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Ulcers, with indurated base*. To be thought of in indurated glands, epithelioma, etc; veins become varicose and bleed. Indurations resulting from long-continued inflammatory irritations. Glands inflame and harden. Alopecia, Scrotal eczema and on back of penis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Weakness of all muscles*, especially arms and legs. Constricted feeling around limbs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, cold except headache, which is relieved by cold.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to thirtieth potency. The very highest potencies have proved efficacious. Powdered alum, 10 grains, placed on tongue, said to arrest an attack of asthma.

aluminium-silicicum.name: Aluminium Silicicum
aluminium-silicicum.essence: Deep acting remedy for chronic complaints of brain, spine and nerves. Constriction is a marked general symptom, also constriction of orifices. Venous distention. Weakness, especially spinal. Aching and burning in spine. Formication, numbness, pain in all limbs. Epileptiform convulsion. Coldness during pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Andalasite rock-Alumina 63, Silica 37 parts
Deep acting remedy for chronic complaints of brain, spine and nerves. Constriction is a marked general symptom, also constriction of orifices. Venous distention. Weakness, especially spinal. Aching and burning in spine. Formication, numbness, pain in all limbs. Epileptiform convulsion. Coldness during pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Congestion of brain. Constriction of scalp. Pain in head, better heat, perspires. Pain in eyes, flickering. Frequent coryzas. Swelling and ulceration of nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Catarrh of chest, pain, raw feeling. Feeling of great weakness in chest. Stitching pains. Spasmodic cough with purulent viscid expectoration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heaviness, jerking, numbness, aching and pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Formication along course of nerves, veins feel full and distended. Sore to touch and pressure.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, cold air, after eating, standing. *Better*, warmth, fasting, resting in bed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Higher potencies. -Lower triturations.

ammonium-benzoicum.name: Ammonium Benzoicum
ammonium-benzoicum.essence: One of the remedies for albuminuria, especially in the gouty. Gout, with deposits in joints. Urinary incontinence in the aged.

complementary: Terebinth; Benz ac; Ammonia salts; Caust
Kalmia; Helon; Merc cor; Berb; Canth

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Benzoate of Ammonia
One of the remedies for albuminuria, especially in the gouty. Gout, with deposits in joints. Urinary incontinence in the aged.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heavy, stupid.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bloated, swollen eyelids. Swelling under tongue like ranula.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Smoky, scanty. Albuminous and thick deposits.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain across sacrum, with urgency to stool. Soreness in region of right kidney.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Terebinth; Benz ac; Ammonia salts; Caust*.
In albuminuria compare: *Kalmia; Helon; Merc cor; Berb; Canth*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second trituration.

ammonium-bromatum.name: Ammonium Bromatum
ammonium-bromatum.essence: Indicated in chronic laryngeal and pharyngeal catarrh, neuralgic headaches, and obesity. Constrictive pain in head, chest, legs, etc. Irritable feeling under finger nails; relieved only by biting them.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sudden, short cough, strangling. Tickling in trachea and bronchial tubes. Wakes at 3 am with cough. Feels suffocated; continuous cough, when lying down at night; sharp pain in lungs. Whooping Cough.--Dry, spasmodic cough on lying down.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Hyos; Con; Arg nit; Kali bich*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Bromide of Ammonia
Indicated in chronic laryngeal and pharyngeal catarrh, neuralgic headaches, and obesity. Constrictive pain in head, chest, legs, etc. Irritable feeling under finger nails; relieved only by biting them.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cerebral congestion. Feeling of a band above ears. Sneezing; thick nasal discharge.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Edges of lids red and swollen, also Meibomian glands. Eyeballs feel large and pain around eyes into head.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Smarting in mouth. Tickling in throat, *with inclination to dry, spasmodic cough, especially at night*. Burning in fauces. White, sticky, mucus. Chronic speakers' catarrh.

ambra-grisea.name: Ambra Grisea
ambra-grisea.essence:
Suitable to excitable, nervous children and thin, nervous patients. Extreme

*nervous hypersensitiveness*. External numbness of whole body in the morning and weakness. Nervous bilious temperament. Thin, scrawny women. Adapted to hysterical subjects, or those suffering from spinal irritation, with convulsive cough, eructation, etc. Also for patients *weakened by age or overwork*, who are anaemic and sleepless. Great remedy for the aged, with impairment of all functions, weakness, coldness and *nu...
ambra-grisea.dosing: Second and third potencies; may be repeated with advantage.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nymphomania, *Itching of pudendum, with soreness and swelling*. Menses too early. Profuse, bluish leucorrhoea. Worse at night. *Discharge of blood between periods, at every little accident*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Voluptuous itching of scrotum. Parts externally numb; burn internally. Violent erections without voluptuous sensations.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Slow comprehension. Vertigo, with weakness in head and stomach. Pressure on front part of head with mental depression. *Tearing pain in upper half of brain. Senile dizziness*. Rush of blood to head, when listening to music. *Hearing impaired*. Epistaxis, especially in the morning. Profuse bleeding from teeth. Hair falls out.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Eructations, with violent, convulsive cough. Acid eructations, like heartburn. *Distention of stomach and abdomen* after midnight. Sensation of coldness in abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Ambergis-A Morbid Secretion of the Whale
Suitable to excitable, nervous children and thin, nervous patients. Extreme
*nervous hypersensitiveness*. External numbness of whole body in the morning and weakness. Nervous bilious temperament. Thin, scrawny women. Adapted to hysterical subjects, or those suffering from spinal irritation, with convulsive cough, eructation, etc. Also for patients *weakened by age or overwork*, who are anaemic and sleepless. Great remedy for the aged, with impairment of all functions, weakness, coldness and *numbness*, usually of single parts, fingers, arms, etc. One-sided complaints call for it. *Music aggravates symptoms*. Ebullitions and pulsations after walking in open air. One-sided complaints.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dread of people, and desire to be alone. Cannot do anything in presence of others. Intensely shy, blushes easily. *Music causes weeping*. Despair, loathing of life. Fantastic illusions. Bashful. Loss of love of life. Restless, excited, very loquacious. Time passes slowly. Thinking, difficult in the morning with old people. Dwells upon unpleasant things.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in bladder and rectum at the same time. Burning in orifice of urethra and anus. *Feeling in urethra as if a few drops passed out*. Burning and itching in urethra while urinating. *Urine turbid, even during emission* forming a brown sediment.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Asthmatic breathing with eructation of gas. *Nervous, spasmodic cough*, with hoarseness and *eructation*, on waking in morning; worse in presence of people. Tickling in throat, larynx and trachea, chest oppressed, gets out of breath when coughing. *Hollow, spasmodic, barking cough, coming from deep in chest*. Choking when hawking up phlegm.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Palpitation, with pressure in chest as from a lump lodged there, or as if chest was obstructed*. Conscious of the pulse. Palpitation in open air with pale face.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Cannot sleep from worry; must get up*. Anxious dreams. Coldness of body and twitching of limbs, during sleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching and soreness, especially around genitals. Numbness of skin. Arms "go to sleep".

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Cramps in hands* and fingers, worse grasping anything. Cramps in legs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, music; presence of strangers; *from any unusual thing*; morning, warm room. *Better*, slow motion in open air; lying on painful part; cold drinks.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Do not confound with *Amber*-Succinum q v. *Moschus* frequently follows advantageously. Compare: *Oleum succinum* (hiccough). *Sumbul; Castor; Asaf; Crocus; Lilium.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second and third potencies; may be repeated with advantage.

ambrosia-artemisiaefolia.name: Ambrosia Artemisiaefolia
ambrosia-artemisiaefolia.essence: A remedy for hay-fever, *lachrymation* and *intolerable itching of the eye-lids*. Some forms of whooping-cough. Respiratory tract in its entire length stopped up. *Many forms of diarrhoea*, especially during summer months, also dysentery.

complementary: Sabadilla, Wyethia; Succin ac; Ars jod; Arundo

ambrosia-artemisiaefolia.dosing: Tincture, to third potency; 10 drops in water during and after attack of epistaxis. In hay-fever high potencies.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Rag-Weed (AMBROSIA)
A remedy for hay-fever, *lachrymation* and *intolerable itching of the eye-lids*. Some forms of whooping-cough. Respiratory tract in its entire length stopped up. *Many forms of diarrhoea*, especially during summer months, also dysentery.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Watery coryza; sneezing; watery discharge. *Nosebleed*. Stuffed up feeling of nose and head. Irritation of trachea and bronchial tubes, with asthmatic attacks (*Aral; Eucalypt*). Wheezy cough.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Smart and burn. Lachrymation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare in hay-fever: *Sabadilla, Wyethia; Succin ac; Ars jod; Arundo*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency; 10 drops in water during and after attack of epistaxis. In hay-fever high potencies.

ammonium-carbonicum.name: Ammonium Carbonicum
ammonium-carbonicum.essence: The diseased conditions met by this remedy are such as we find often in rather stout women who are always tired and weary, take cold easily, suffer from cholera-like symptoms before menses, lead a sedentary life, have a slow reaction generally, and are disposed to frequent use of the smelling-bottle. Too frequent and profuse menses. Mucous membranes of the respiratory organs are especially affected. Fat patients with weak heart, wheezing, feel suffocated. Very sensitive to cold air. Great aversi...

agg: evenings, from cold, wet weather, wet applications, washing, and during 3 to 4 am, during menses
amel: lying on painful side and on stomach

ammonium-carbonicum.dosing: Lower potencies deteriorate with age. Sixth potency best for general use.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Carbonate of Ammonia (AMMONIUM CARB)
The diseased conditions met by this remedy are such as we find often in rather stout women who are always tired and weary, take cold easily, suffer from cholera-like symptoms before menses, lead a sedentary life, have a slow reaction generally, and are disposed to frequent use of the smelling-bottle. Too frequent and profuse menses. Mucous membranes of the respiratory organs are especially affected. Fat patients with weak heart, wheezing, feel suffocated. Very sensitive to cold air. Great aversion to water; cannot bear to touch it. Malignant scarlatina, with somnolence, swollen glands, dark red sore throat, faintly developed eruption. Uraemia. *Heaviness in all organs*. Uncleanness in bodily habits. Swelling of parts, glands, etc. Acid secretions. Prostration from trifles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Forgetful, ill-humored, gloomy during *stormy weather. Uncleanliness*. Talking and hearing others talk affects greatly. Sad, weepy, unreasonable.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pulsating forehead; better, pressure and in warm room. Shocks through head.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning of eyes with aversion to light. Eye-strain (*Nat mur*). Asthenopia. Sore canthi.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hardness of hearing. Shocks through ears, eyes, and nose, when gnashing teeth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Discharge of sharp, burning water. *Stoppage at night, with long-continued coryza. Cannot breathe through nose. Snuffles of children. Epistaxis after washing and after eating*. Ozaena, blows bloody mucus from nose. Tip of nose congested.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tetters around mouth. Boils and pustules, during menses. Corners of mouth sore, cracked, and burn.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Great dryness of mouth and throat. Toothache. *Pressing teeth together sends shocks through head, eyes, and ears*. Vesicles on tongue. Taste sour; metallic. Cracking of jaw on chewing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Enlarged tonsils and glands of neck. Burning pain all down throat. Tendency to gangrenous ulceration of tonsils. Diphtheria *when nose is stopped up*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain at pit of stomach, with heartburn, nausea, waterbrash, and chilliness. Great appetite, but easily satisfied. Flatulent dyspepsia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Noise and pain in abdomen. Flatulent hernia. Stools difficult, hard, and knotty. *Bleeding piles; worse during menses*. Itching at anus. Protruding piles, worse after stool, better lying down.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frequent desire; involuntary at night. Tenesmus of bladder. Urine white, sandy, bloody, copious, turbid and fetid.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching and pain of scrotum and spermatic cords. Erection without desire. Seminal emissions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching, swelling and burning of pudendum. Leucorrhoea burning, acrid, watery. Aversion to the other sex. Menses too *frequent, profuse*, early, copious, clotted, black; colicky pains, and hard, difficult stool, with *fatigue*, especially of thighs; yawning and chilliness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hoarseness. Cough every morning about three o'clock, with dyspnoea, palpitation, burning in chest; worse ascending. Chest feels tired. Emphysema. *Much oppression in breathing*; worse after any effort, and entering *warm room*, or ascending even a few steps. Asthenic *Pneumonia*. Slow labored, stertorous breathing; bubbling sound. Winter catarrh, with slimy sputum and specks of blood. Pulmonary oedema.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Audible palpitation with fear, cold sweat, lachrymation, inability to speak, loud breathing and trembling hands. *Heart weak*, wakes with difficult breathing and palpitation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tearing in joints relieved by heat of bed; inclination to stretch limbs. Hands cold and blue; distended veins. Fingers swell when arm is hanging down. Panaritium, deep-seated periosteal pain. Cramps in calves and soles. Big toe painful and swollen. Felons in the beginning. Heel painful on standing. Tearing in ankle and bones of feet, better when warm in bed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Sleepiness* during the day. Starts from sleep strangling.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent itching and burning blisters. Scarlet rash. Miliary rash. Malignant scarlatina. Faintly developed eruptions from defective vitality. Erysipelas in the aged, with brain symptoms. Eczema in the bends of extremities, between legs, about anus and genitals.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, evenings, from cold, wet weather, wet applications, washing, and during 3 to 4 am, during menses. *Better*, lying on painful side and on stomach; in dry weather.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Inimical to *Lachesis*. Similar in action.
Antidotes: *Arnica; Camphor*.
Compare: *Rhus; Muriatic acid; Tartar emet*.
Of use in poisoning by charcoal fumes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lower potencies deteriorate with age. Sixth potency best for general use.

ammonium-causticum.name: Ammonium Causticum
ammonium-causticum.essence:
This is a powerful cardiac stimulant. As such in *syncope*, thrombosis, haemorrhage, snake-bites, chloroform narcosis, may be given by inhalation.

The oedema and ulceration of mucous membranes produced by this powerful drug have been utilized as guiding symptoms for its use; hence in membranous croup with burning in oesophagus. Aphonia. See *Causticum*.
ammonium-causticum.dosing: First to third potency; also five to ten minims, well diluted with water.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Hydrate of Ammonia-Ammonia Water
This is a powerful cardiac stimulant. As such in *syncope*, thrombosis, haemorrhage, snake-bites, chloroform narcosis, may be given by inhalation.
The oedema and ulceration of mucous membranes produced by this powerful drug have been utilized as guiding symptoms for its use; hence in membranous croup with burning in oesophagus. Aphonia. See *Causticum*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Difficult respiration. Accumulation of mucus with incessant coughing. *Loss of voice. Burning rawness in throat*. Spasm of the glottis with suffocation; patient gasps for breath. Pain in oesophagus on breathing deeply. Scraping and burning in throat and oesophagus. Uvula covered with white mucus. Nasal diphtheria, with burning excoriating discharge.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Excessive exhaustion* and muscular debility. Rheumatism of shoulders. Skin hot and dry.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third potency; also five to ten minims, well diluted with water.

ammonium-iodatum.name: Ammonium Iodatum
ammonium-iodatum.essence: Indicated when iodine has but partially relieved its cases of laryngitis and bronchitis, catarrhal pneumonia, oedema of lungs.
ammonium-iodatum.dosing:
Second and third trit.
Compare: *Ammonium tartaricum* (Dry hacking cough after every cold).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Iodide of Ammonia (AMMONIUM JODATUM)
Indicated when iodine has but partially relieved its cases of laryngitis and bronchitis, catarrhal pneumonia, oedema of lungs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull headache, especially in young people, face stupid, heavy; vertigo, Meniere's disease.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Second and third trit.
Compare: *Ammonium tartaricum* (Dry hacking cough after every cold).

amylenum-nitrosum.name: Amylenum Nitrosum
amylenum-nitrosum.essence: On inhaling this drug, it rapidly dilates all arterioles an capillaries, producing flushings of face, heat, and throbbing in the head.--Superficial arterial hyperaemia. Palpitation of the heart and similar conditions are readily cured by it, especially the flushings and other discomforts at climacteric. *Hiccough and yawning*. Often relieves temporarily epileptic convulsions. Seasickness.
amylenum-nitrosum.dosing:
Third potency.
For *palliations*. In all conditions where the blood-vessels are *spasmodically contracted*, as in angina pectoris, epileptic seizure, megrim, accompanied by cold, pallor, etc, also in paroxysms of asthma, chloroform asphyxia, inhalation of the *Amyl nit* will give immediate relief. For this non-homeopathic application, two to five minims (put up in pearls) dropped on a handkerchief and inhaled may be required.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Amyl Nitrite (AMYL NITROSUM)
On inhaling this drug, it rapidly dilates all arterioles an capillaries, producing flushings of face, heat, and throbbing in the head.--Superficial arterial hyperaemia. Palpitation of the heart and similar conditions are readily cured by it, especially the flushings and other discomforts at climacteric. *Hiccough and yawning*. Often relieves temporarily epileptic convulsions. Seasickness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Anxiety*, as if something might happen; *must have fresh air*. *Surging of blood to head and face*; sensation as if blood would start through skin, with heat and redness. *Flushings, followed by sweat at climacteric*. Ears hyperaemic. Throbbing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constriction; collar seems too tight.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dyspnoea and asthmatic feelings. Great oppression and fullness of chest; spasmodic, suffocative cough. Praecordial anxiety. *Tumultuous action of heart*. Pain and constriction around heart. Fluttering at slightest excitement.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: After-pains; haemorrhage associated with facial flushing. *Climacteric headache and flushes of heat, with anxiety and palpitation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Much flushing of heat; sometimes followed by cold and clammy skin and profuse sweat. Throbbing throughout whole body. *Abnormal sweat after influenza*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Constant stretching for hours*. Veins of hands dilated; pulsations felt in tips of fingers.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Glonoine; Lachesis*.
Antidotes: *Cactus; Strychn; Ergot*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Third potency.
For *palliations*. In all conditions where the blood-vessels are *spasmodically contracted*, as in angina pectoris, epileptic seizure, megrim, accompanied by cold, pallor, etc, also in paroxysms of asthma, chloroform asphyxia, inhalation of the *Amyl nit* will give immediate relief. For this non-homeopathic application, two to five minims (put up in pearls) dropped on a handkerchief and inhaled may be required.

ammonium-muriaticum.name: Ammonium Muriaticum
ammonium-muriaticum.essence: A state of prostration bordering on a typhoid state is produced by this remedy. All mucous secretions are increased and retained. It is especially adapted to fat and sluggish patients who have respiratory troubles. Coughs associated with catarrhs and affections of liver. A tendency to irregular circulation, blood seems to be in constant turmoil, pulsations, etc. Many groups of symptoms are accompanied by cough, *profuse glairy secretions*. Its periods of aggravations are peculiarly divided as to...

agg: head and chest symptoms in the morning

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Sal Ammoniac
A state of prostration bordering on a typhoid state is produced by this remedy. All mucous secretions are increased and retained. It is especially adapted to fat and sluggish patients who have respiratory troubles. Coughs associated with catarrhs and affections of liver. A tendency to irregular circulation, blood seems to be in constant turmoil, pulsations, etc. Many groups of symptoms are accompanied by cough, *profuse glairy secretions*. Its periods of aggravations are peculiarly divided as to the bodily region affected; thus the head and chest symptoms are worse mornings, the abdominal in the afternoon, the pains in the limbs, the skin and febrile symptoms, in the evenings. "Boiling" sensation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Melancholy, apprehensive; like from internal grief. *Desire to cry*, but cannot. Consequences of grief.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hair falls out, with itchings and dandruff. Feels full, compressed; worse mornings.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Mist before eyes, optical illusions in incipient cataract; capsular cataract.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Free acrid, hot watery discharge* corroding the lip. Sneezing. Nose sore to touch; ulcerative pain in nostrils. *Loss of smell. Obstructed, stuffy feeling*; constant and unavailing efforts to blow it out. Itching.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Inflammatory face-ache. Mouth and lips sore and excoriated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Throbbing in, and swelling of tonsils, can scarcely swallow. Sore spot behind uvula, relieved by eating. Internal and external swelling of throat *with viscid phlegm*. So touch, it cannot be hawked up. Tonsillitis. Stricture of oesophagus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thirst for lemonade, regurgitation of food, bitter waterbrash. Nausea. Gnawing in stomach. Epigastric pain immediately after eating. Cancer of stomach.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Splenic stitches, especially in the morning, with difficult breathing. Pain around navel. Abdominal symptoms appear during pregnancy. Chronic congestion of liver. Excessive fatty deposit around abdomen. Much flatus. Strained feeling in groin.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Itching and haemorrhoids, soreness with pustules. Hard,
*crumbly* stool, or covered with glairy mucus. Stinging in perineum. Green mucus stools alternate with constipation. During and after stool, burning and smarting in rectum. Haemorrhoids after suppressed leucorrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses too early, too free, dark, clotted; *flow more at night*. Pain as if sprained in left side of abdomen during pregnancy. Diarrhoea, greenish mucous stools, and navel pain *during menses*. Leucorrhoea, like white of an egg (*Alum; Bor; Calc p*); with pain about the navel; brown, slimy *after every urination*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Hoarseness and burning in larynx*. Dry, hacking, scraping cough; worse lying on back or right side. Stitches in chest. Cough loose in afternoon, with profuse expectoration and rattling of mucus. Oppression of chest. Burning at small spots in chest. Scanty secretion. Cough with profuse salivation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Icy coldness between shoulders*; not relieved by warm covering, followed by itching. Bruised pain in coccyx when sitting. Backache, as if in a vise when sitting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain as from ulceration in finger tips. Shooting and tearing in *tips of finger* and toes. Ulcerative pain in heels. *Contraction of hamstring tendons*. Sciatica, *worse sitting, better lying*. Neuralgic pain in amputated limbs. Offensive sweaty feet. Pain in feet during menses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching, generally evenings. Blisters on various parts. Intense burning better cold applications.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Chilliness evenings after lying down* and on awakening, without thirst. Heat in palms and soles. Sub acute, low fevers due to unhealthy climate. Lowest potencies.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Better*, open air. *Worse*, head and chest symptoms in the morning; abdominal symptoms in the afternoon.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Coffea; Nux; Caust*.
Compare: *Calcarea; Senega; Caustic*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to sixth potency.

ammoniacum-gummi.name: Ammoniacum Gummi
ammoniacum-gummi.essence: A remedy for the aged and feeble, especially in chronic bronchitis. Ill humor. Sensitive to cold. Sensation of burning and scratching in neck and oesophagus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Gum Ammoniac (AMMONIACUM-DOREMA)
A remedy for the aged and feeble, especially in chronic bronchitis. Ill humor. Sensitive to cold. Sensation of burning and scratching in neck and oesophagus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Catarrhal headache due to closure of frontal sinuses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dim sight. Stars and fiery points float before eyes. Easily fatigued from reading.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Throat dry; worse inhaling fresh air. Full feeling, burning and scraping sensation. Immediately after eating, sensation as if something stuck in oesophagus, causing swallowing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Difficult breathing*. Chronic bronchial catarrh. Large accumulation of purulent matter and feeble expectoration; worse cold weather. Mucus tough and hard. Heart beats stronger, extends to pit of stomach. Coarse rattling of chest in old people.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Bry; Arnica*.
Compare: *Senega; Tart emet; Balsam Peru*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third trituration.

ammonium-phosphoricum.name: Ammonium Phosphoricum
ammonium-phosphoricum.essence: A remedy for chronic gouty patients uric acid diathesis, indicated in bronchitis and *nodosities of the joints* of the fingers and backs of the hands. Facial paralysis. Pain in shoulder-joint. Tightness around chest. Heaviness of limbs, unsteady, tottering gait. Coldness from least draft of air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Phosphate of Ammonia
A remedy for chronic gouty patients uric acid diathesis, indicated in bronchitis and *nodosities of the joints* of the fingers and backs of the hands. Facial paralysis. Pain in shoulder-joint. Tightness around chest. Heaviness of limbs, unsteady, tottering gait. Coldness from least draft of air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sneezing with excessive running from nose and eyes, only in morning.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Deep rough cough with greenish expectoration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rose-colored sediment.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third decimal trituration.

ampelopsis-quinquefolia.name: Ampelopsis Quinquefolia
ampelopsis-quinquefolia.essence: Renal dropsies, hydrocele, and chronic hoarseness in scrofulous patients have been benefited by this drug. Choleric symptoms. Generally worse about 6 pm. Dilated pupils. Left costal region sore and sensitive. Elbow joints pain, back sore. Soreness of all limbs. Vomiting, purging with tenesmus. Rumbling in abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Virginia Creeper (AMPELOPSIS)
Renal dropsies, hydrocele, and chronic hoarseness in scrofulous patients have been benefited by this drug. Choleric symptoms. Generally worse about 6 pm. Dilated pupils. Left costal region sore and sensitive. Elbow joints pain, back sore. Soreness of all limbs. Vomiting, purging with tenesmus. Rumbling in abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second to third potency.

ammonium-picricum.name: Ammonium Picricum
ammonium-picricum.essence: A remedy for malarial fever and neuralgias and so-called, bilious headaches. Pain in occiput and mastoid region. Whooping cough.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Pictrate of Ammonia (AMMONIUM PICRATUM)
A remedy for malarial fever and neuralgias and so-called, bilious headaches. Pain in occiput and mastoid region. Whooping cough.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Periodical neuralgia *in right side of occiput*; boring extends to ear, orbit, and jaw. Vertigo on rising. Periodic bilious headaches (*Sanguin*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third trituration.

ammonium-valerianicum.name: Ammonium Valerianicum
ammonium-valerianicum.essence: A remedy for nervous, hysterical people, suffering with neuralgia headaches and insomnia. Great nervous erethism is always present.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Valerianate of Ammonia
A remedy for nervous, hysterical people, suffering with neuralgia headaches and insomnia. Great nervous erethism is always present.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pains in cardiac region. Functional disturbances, tachycardia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lower triturations.

amygdalus-persica.name: Amygdalus Persica
amygdalus-persica.essence:
A most valuable remedy in vomiting of various kinds; *morning sickness*. Irritation of eyes. Ischuria and haematuria.

Haemorrhage from the bladder.

Gastric irritation of children; no form of food tolerated. Loss of smell and taste. Gastric and intestinal irritation when the tongue is elongated and pointed, tip and edges red. Constant nausea and vomiting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Peach Tree
A most valuable remedy in vomiting of various kinds; *morning sickness*. Irritation of eyes. Ischuria and haematuria.
Haemorrhage from the bladder.
Gastric irritation of children; no form of food tolerated. Loss of smell and taste. Gastric and intestinal irritation when the tongue is elongated and pointed, tip and edges red. Constant nausea and vomiting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Amygd amara*-Bitter Almond (Pains through tonsils, throat dark, difficult swallowing, vomiting, cough with sore chest).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fresh infusion or mother tincture.

anacardium-orientale.name: Anacardium Orientale
anacardium-orientale.essence:
**(ANACARDIUM)**

The Anacardium patient is found mostly among the neurasthenics; such have a type of nervous dyspepsia, relieved by food; *impaired memory*, depression, and irritability; diminution of senses (smell, sight, hearing). Syphilitic patients often suffer with these conditions. Intermittency of symptoms. Fear of examination in students. Weakening of all senses, sight, hearing, etc. Aversion to work; lacks self-confidence; irresistible desire to swear and curse. *Sensation of a plug* i...

amel: from eating. When lying on side, from rubbing

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Marking Nut
**(ANACARDIUM)**
The Anacardium patient is found mostly among the neurasthenics; such have a type of nervous dyspepsia, relieved by food; *impaired memory*, depression, and irritability; diminution of senses (smell, sight, hearing). Syphilitic patients often suffer with these conditions. Intermittency of symptoms. Fear of examination in students. Weakening of all senses, sight, hearing, etc. Aversion to work; lacks self-confidence; irresistible desire to swear and curse. *Sensation of a plug* in various parts-eyes, rectum, bladder, etc; also of a *band*. Empty feeling in stomach; *eating temporarily relieves all discomfort*. This is a sure indication, often verified. Its skin symptoms are similar to Rhus, and it has proved a valuable antidote to Poison-Oak.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fixed ideas. Hallucinations; *thinks he is possessed of two persons or wills*. Anxiety when walking, as if pursued. Profound melancholy and hypochondriasis, *with tendency to use violent language. Brain-fag. Impaired memory. Absent mindedness. Very easily offended*. Malicious; seems bent on wickedness. Lack of confidence in himself or others. Suspicious (*Hyos*). Clairaudient, hears voices far away or of the dead. Senile dementia. Absence of all moral restraint.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo. Pressing pain, *as from a plug*; worse after mental exertion-in forehead; occiput, temples, vertex; *better during a meal*. Itching and little boils on scalp.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pressure *like a plug* on upper orbit. Indistinct vision. *Objects appear too far off*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pressing in the ears as from a plug. Hard of hearing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frequent sneezing. *Sense of smell perverted*. Coryza with palpitation, especially in the aged.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Blue rings around eyes. Face pale.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Painful vesicles; fetid odor. Tongue feels swollen, impending speech and motion, with saliva in mouth. Burning around lips as from pepper.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Weak digestion, with fullness and distention. *Empty feeling in stomach*. Eructation, nausea, vomiting. *Eating relieves the Anacardium dyspepsia*. Apt to choke when eating or drinking. Swallows food and drinks hastily.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pain as if dull plug were pressed into intestines*. Rumbling, pinching, and griping.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bowels inactive. *Ineffectual desire; rectum seems powerless, as if plugged up*; spasmodic constriction of sphincter ani; even soft stool passes with difficulty. *Itching at anus; moisture from rectum*. Haemorrhage during stool. Painful haemorrhoids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Voluptuous itching; increased desire; seminal emissions without dreams. Prostatic discharge during stool.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Leucorrhoea, with soreness and itching. Menses scanty.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pressure in chest, as from a dull plug. Oppression of chest, with internal heat and anxiety, driving him into open air. Cough excited by talking, in children, after fit of temper. Cough after eating with vomiting of food and pain in occiput.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Palpitation, with weak memory, with coryza in the aged; stitches in heart region. Rheumatic pericarditis with double stitches.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull pressure in the shoulders, as from a weight. Stiffness at nape of neck.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Neuralgia in thumb. Paralytic weakness. Knees feel paralyzed or bandaged. Cramps in calves. Pressure as from a plug in the glutei. Warts on palms of hands. Fingers swollen with vesicular eruption.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Spells of sleeplessness lasting for several nights. Anxious dreams.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Intense itching*, eczema, with mental irritability; vesicular eruption; *swelling*, urticaria; eruption like that of Poison-Oak (*Xerophyl; Grindel; Croton*). Lichen planus; neurotic eczema. Warts on hands. Ulcer formation on forearm.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, on application of hot water. *Better*, from eating. When lying on side, from rubbing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidote: *Grindeleia; Coffea; Juglans; Rhus; Eucalyptus*.
Compare: *Anacard occidentale* (cashew nut) (erysipelas, vesicular facial eruptions), (anaesthetic variety of leprosy; warts, corns, ulcers, cracking of the skin on soles of feet). *Rhus; Cypriped; Chelidon; Xerophyl*.
Platina follows well. *Cereus serpentina* (swearing).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to two hundredth potency.

anagallis-arvensis.name: Anagallis Arvensis
anagallis-arvensis.essence: Marked action on skin, characterized by great itching and tingling everywhere. Favors expulsion of splinters. An old medicine for hydrophobia and dropsy. Possesses power of softening flesh and destroying warts.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Scarlet Pimpernel (ANAGALLIS)
Marked action on skin, characterized by great itching and tingling everywhere. Favors expulsion of splinters. An old medicine for hydrophobia and dropsy. Possesses power of softening flesh and destroying warts.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Great hilarity; headache over supra-orbital ridges, with rumbling in bowels and eructations; better from coffee. Sick headache. Pain in facial muscles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rheumatic and gouty pains. Pain in shoulder and arm. Cramp in ball of thumbs and fingers.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: More or less irritation in urethra, inclining to coition. Burning pain on urinating, with agglutination of orifice. Urine passes in several streams; must press before it passes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Itching;* dry, bran-like eruption, especially *on hands and fingers*. Palms especially affected. Vesicles in groups. Ulcers and swellings on joints.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Anagallis contains Saponin, q. v.
Compare: *Cyclamen; Primula obcon*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third potency.

anantherum-muricatum.name: Anantherum Muricatum
anantherum-muricatum.essence:
A skin remedy of high order.

Painful swelling of various parts, going on to suppuration. Glandular inflammation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Cuscus-An East Indian Grass (ANATHERUM)
A skin remedy of high order.
Painful swelling of various parts, going on to suppuration. Glandular inflammation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pains pierce brain like pointed arrows; worse in afternoon. Herpes, ulcers, and tumors on scalp. Wartlike growth on eyebrows. Boils and tumors on tip of nose. Tongue fissured, as if cut on edges; copious salivation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Turbid, thick, full of mucus. *Constant urging*. Bladder cannot hold smallest quantity. Involuntary. Cystitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chancre-like sores. Scirrhus-like swelling of cervix. Breasts swollen, indurated, nipples excoriated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diseased and deformed nails. Offensive foot-sweat. *Abscesses* boils, *ulcers*. Erysipelas. Pruritus, herpes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Staphisag; Mercur; Thuja*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

angustura-vera.name: Angustura Vera
angustura-vera.essence:
Rheumatic and paralytic complaints-great difficulty in walking. Crackling in all joints.

The greatest craving for coffee is a characteristic symptom. Caries of long bones. Paralysis. Tetanus. Stiffness of muscles and joints. *Oversensitive*.

Principal action on spinal motor nerves and mucous membranes.

complementary: cries for fear of being touched

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Bark of Galipea Cusparia
Rheumatic and paralytic complaints-great difficulty in walking. Crackling in all joints.
The greatest craving for coffee is a characteristic symptom. Caries of long bones. Paralysis. Tetanus. Stiffness of muscles and joints. *Oversensitive*.
Principal action on spinal motor nerves and mucous membranes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Oversensitive. Headache, with heat of face. Acute pain in cheeks. Drawing in facial muscles. Pain in temporal muscles, when opening the jaws. Pain in articulation of jaw, in masseter muscles, as if fatigued by chewing too much. Cramp-pain on the zygomatic arch.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bitter taste. *Irresistible desire for coffee*. Pain from navel into sternum. Atonic dyspepsia. Belching, with cough (*Ambra*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diarrhoea and colic. Tenesmus with soft stool; chronic diarrhoea, with debility and loss of flesh. Burning in anus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching along back. Pain in cervical vertebrae. Drawing in the neck. Pain in spine, at nape of neck and sacrum, worse on pressure. Twitching and jerking along back. Bends backward.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stiffness and tension of muscles and joints. Pain in limbs on walking. Arms tired and heavy. Caries of long bones. Coldness of fingers. *Pain in knees*. Cracking in joints.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Caries, very painful ulcers which affect the bone.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Nux; Ruta; Mercur; Brucea*. -Bark of Nux vomica or angustura falsa (Tetanic spasms with undisturbed consciousness, worse noise, liquids, paralyzed lower extremities, worse least touch, *cries for fear of being touched*. Painful jerking of legs; cramp-like pain in knees; rigid and lame limbs of paralytics. For pain in the passing of calculus).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency.

anhalonium-lewinii.name: Anhalonium Lewinii
anhalonium-lewinii.essence:
Mescal is a strong intoxicating spirit distilled from *Pulque fuerte*. Pulque is made from the Agave Americana of Mexico, locally known as Maguey and is the national beverage of Mexico. Indians call it Peyote. It weakens the heart, produces insanity. Its most striking effects appear in the *auditory nerve* for it makes each note upon the piano a center of melody which seems to be surrounded by a halo of color pulsating to the rhythm of the music" (Hom. World).

Causes a form of intoxication acco...

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Mescal Button (ANHALONIUM)
Mescal is a strong intoxicating spirit distilled from *Pulque fuerte*. Pulque is made from the Agave Americana of Mexico, locally known as Maguey and is the national beverage of Mexico. Indians call it Peyote. It weakens the heart, produces insanity. Its most striking effects appear in the *auditory nerve* for it makes each note upon the piano a center of melody which seems to be surrounded by a halo of color pulsating to the rhythm of the music" (Hom. World).
Causes a form of intoxication accompanied by wonderful visions, remarkably beautiful and varied kaleidoscopic changes, and a sensation of increased physical ability. Also visions of monsters and various gruesome forms. A cardiac tonic and respiratory stimulant. Hysteria and insomnia. A remedy for brainfag, delirium, megrim, hallucinations, with colored brilliant visions. Motor inco-ordination. Extreme muscular depression; increased patellar reflex. Paraplegia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Loss of conception of time. Difficult enunciation. Distrust and resentment. Lazy contentment.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aches, with disturbed vision. Fantastic, brilliant, moving colored objects. Affected by beating time. Pupils dilated, vertigo, brain tired. *Polychrome spectra*. Exaggerated reverberation of ordinary sounds.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare *Agave*. The intoxication of *Anhalonium* is similar to that of *Cannabis Indica* and *Oenanthe*.

anilinum.name: Anilinum
anilinum.essence: Marked giddiness and pain in head; *face has a purple hue*. Pain in penis and scrotum with swelling. *Tumors of the urinary passages*. Profound anaemia with discoloration of skin, blue lips, anorexia, gastric disturbances. Swelling of skin.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Coal Tar Product-Amidobenzene
Marked giddiness and pain in head; *face has a purple hue*. Pain in penis and scrotum with swelling. *Tumors of the urinary passages*. Profound anaemia with discoloration of skin, blue lips, anorexia, gastric disturbances. Swelling of skin.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Arsenic; Antipyrin*.

anisum-stellatum.name: Anisum Stellatum
anisum-stellatum.essence: Should be remembered in the treatment of flatulent conditions. So-called three-months' colic, especially if it recurs at regular hours; much rumbling in abdomen. One symptom is worthy of special remembrance-*pain in region of third rib*, about an inch or two from the sternum, generally on right side, but occasionally on left. Frequent cough with this pain. Purulent tracheal and gastric catarrh of old drunkards. Old asthmatics. Vomiting, epileptiform convulsions with biting of tongue.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Anise (ILLICIUM)
Should be remembered in the treatment of flatulent conditions. So-called three-months' colic, especially if it recurs at regular hours; much rumbling in abdomen. One symptom is worthy of special remembrance-*pain in region of third rib*, about an inch or two from the sternum, generally on right side, but occasionally on left. Frequent cough with this pain. Purulent tracheal and gastric catarrh of old drunkards. Old asthmatics. Vomiting, epileptiform convulsions with biting of tongue.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sharp stitches beneath lip. Acute catarrh. Burning and numbness of inner lower lip.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dyspnoea. Pain near third intercostal cartilage. Cough, with pus-like phlegm. Palpitation, with aphthae. Haemoptysis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

antimonium-arsenicosum.name: Antimonium Arsenicosum
antimonium-arsenicosum.essence: Found useful in *emphysema with excessive dyspnoea* and cough, much mucous secretion. Worse on eating and lying down. Catarrhal pneumonia associated with influenza. Myocarditis and cardiac weakness. Pleurisy, especially of left side, *with exudation* and pericarditis, with effusion. Sense of weakness. Inflammation of eyes and oedema of face.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Arsenite of Antimony
Found useful in *emphysema with excessive dyspnoea* and cough, much mucous secretion. Worse on eating and lying down. Catarrhal pneumonia associated with influenza. Myocarditis and cardiac weakness. Pleurisy, especially of left side, *with exudation* and pericarditis, with effusion. Sense of weakness. Inflammation of eyes and oedema of face.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third trituration.

antimonium-crudum.name: Antimonium Crudum
antimonium-crudum.essence: For homeopathic employment, the mental symptoms and those of the gastric sphere, determine its choice. *Excessive irritability and fretfulness*, together with a *thickly-coated white tongue*, are true guiding symptoms to many forms of disease calling for this remedy. All the conditions are aggravated by *heat and cold bathing*. Cannot bear heat of sun. Tendency to grow fat. An absence of pain, where it could be expected, is noticeable. Gout with gastric symptoms.

agg: in evening, from heat, acids, wine, water, and washing. Wet poultices
amel: in open air, during rest. Moist warmth

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nostrils *chapped and covered with crusts. Eczema of nostrils, sore, cracked and scurfy*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pimples, pustules, and boils on face. *Yellow crusted eruption on cheeks* and chin. Sallow and haggard.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Cracks in corners of mouth*. Dry lips. Saltish saliva. Much slimy mucus. *Tongue coated thick white, as if whitewashed*. Gums detach from teeth; bleed easily. Toothache in hollow teeth. Rawness of palate, with expectoration of much mucus. *Canker sores*. Pappy taste. No thirst. Subacute eczema about mouth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Much thick yellowish mucus from posterior nares. Hawking in open air. Laryngitis. Rough voice from over use.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Black Sulphide of Antimony
For homeopathic employment, the mental symptoms and those of the gastric sphere, determine its choice. *Excessive irritability and fretfulness*, together with a *thickly-coated white tongue*, are true guiding symptoms to many forms of disease calling for this remedy. All the conditions are aggravated by *heat and cold bathing*. Cannot bear heat of sun. Tendency to grow fat. An absence of pain, where it could be expected, is noticeable. Gout with gastric symptoms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Much concerned about his fate. Cross and contradictive; whatever is done fails to give satisfaction. Sulky; does not wish to speak. Peevish; vexed without cause. *Child cannot bear to be touched or looked at*. Angry at every little attention. Sentimental mood.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aching, worse in vertex, on ascending, *from bathing*, from *disordered stomach*, especially from eating candy or drinking acid wines. Suppressed eruptions. Heaviness in forehead with vertigo; nausea, and nosebleed. Headache with great loss of hair.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull, sunken, red, itch, inflamed, agglutinated. *Canthi raw and fissured*. Chronic *blepharitis*. Pustules on cornea and lids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Redness; swelling; pain in eustachian tube. Ringing and deafness. Moist eruption around ear.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Loss of appetite. Desire for acids, pickles*. Thirst in evening and night. *Eructation tasting of the ingesta*. Heartburn, nausea, vomiting. After nursing, the child vomits its milk in curds, and refuses to nurse afterwards, and is very cross. Gastric and intestinal complaints from bread and pastry, acids, sour wine, cold bathing, overheating, hot weather. *Constant belching*. Gouty metastasis to stomach and bowels. Sweetish waterbrash. *Bloating after eating*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Anal itching (*Sulpho-calc. Alum*).
*diarrhoea alternates with constipation*, especially in old people. Diarrhoea after acids, sour wine, baths, overeating; slimy, flatulent stools. Mucous piles, *continued oozing of mucus. Hard lumps mixed with watery discharge. Catarrhal proctitis*. Stools composed entirely of mucus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frequent, with burning, and backache; turbid and foul odor.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Eruption on scrotum and about genitals. Impotence. Atrophy of penis and testicles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Excited; parts itch. Before menses, toothache; menses too early and profuse. Menses suppressed from cold bathing, with feeling of pressure in pelvis and tenderness in ovarian region. Leucorrhoea watery; acrid, lumpy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cough worse *coming into warm room*, with burning sensation in chest, *itching of chest*, oppression. Loss of voice from becoming overheated. *Voice harsh and badly pitched*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching and pain of neck and back.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Twitching of muscles. Jerks in arms. *Arthritic pain in fingers*. Nails brittle; grow out of shape. Horny warts on hands and soles. Weakness and shaking of hands in writing followed by offensive flatulence. *Feet very tender*; covered with large horny places. Inflamed corns. Pain in heels.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Eczema with gastric derangements. Pimples, vesicles, and pustules. Sensitive to cold bathing. Thick, hard, honey-colored scabs. *Urticaria*; measle-like eruption. Itching when warm in bed. Dry skin. *Warts (Thuja; Sabina; Caust).* Dry gangrene. Scaly, pustular eruption with burning and itching, worse at night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Continual drowsiness in old people*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chilly even in warm room. Intermittent with disgust, nausea, vomiting, eructations, coated tongue, diarrhoea. Hot sweat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, in evening, from heat, acids, wine, water, and washing. Wet poultices. *Better*, in open air, during rest. Moist warmth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Antimonium Chloridum*. Butter of Antimony (A remedy for cancer. Mucous membranes destroyed. Abrasions. Skin cold and clammy. Great prostration of strength. Dose-third trituration).
*Antimon iodat* (Uterine hyperplasia; humid asthma. Pneumonia and bronchitis; loss of strength, and appetite, yellowish skin, sweaty, dull and drowsy). In sub-acute and chronic colds in chest which have extended downwards from head and have fastened themselves upon the bronchial tubes in the form of hard, croupy cough with a decided wheeze and inability to raise the sputum, especially in the aged and weak patients (Bacmeister). Stage of resolution of pneumonia slow and delayed.
Compare: *Kermes mineral*-Stibiat sulph rub (Bronchitis). Also *Puls, Ipecac, Sulph*.
Complementary: *Sulph*.
Antidote: *Hepar*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to sixth potency.

anthemis-nobilis.name: Anthemis Nobilis
anthemis-nobilis.essence: This remedy is akin to the ordinary Chamomilla. Gastric disturbance with coldness. Sensitive to cold air and cold things.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Roman Chamomile
This remedy is akin to the ordinary Chamomilla. Gastric disturbance with coldness. Sensitive to cold air and cold things.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coryza with much lachrymation, sneezing, and discharge of clear water from the nose. Symptoms worse indoors. Constriction and rawness of throat. Cough, tickling; worse in warm room.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aching in region of liver; griping and *chilliness inside of abdomen* and into legs. Itching of anus, with white putty-like stools.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bladder feels distended. Pain along spermatic cord, which feels full, as if varicosed. Frequent urination.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching of the soles, as if from chilblains. Gooseflesh.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Use the third potency.

anthracinum.name: Anthracinum
anthracinum.essence: This nosode has proven a great remedy in epidemic spleen diseases of domestic animals, and in septic inflammation, *carbuncles* and *malignant ulcers*. *In boils* and boil-like eruptions, acne. Terrible burning. Induration of cellular tissue, abscess, bubo, and all inflammation of connective tissue in which there exists a purulent focus.

complementary: Pyrogen; Lachesis; Crotalus; Hippozoen; Echinac; Silica

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Anthrax Poison
This nosode has proven a great remedy in epidemic spleen diseases of domestic animals, and in septic inflammation, *carbuncles* and *malignant ulcers*. *In boils* and boil-like eruptions, acne. Terrible burning. Induration of cellular tissue, abscess, bubo, and all inflammation of connective tissue in which there exists a purulent focus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Haemorrhages, black, thick, tar-like, rapidly decomposing, from any orifice. Glands swollen, *cellular tissues oedematous and indurated*. Septicaemia. Ulceration, sloughing and *intolerable burning*. Erysipelas. Black and blue blisters. Dissecting wounds. Insect stings. Bad effects from inhaling foul odors. Gangrenous parotitis. *Succession of boils*. Gangrene. Foul secretions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Similar to Arsenic, which it often follows. Compare: *Pyrogen; Lachesis; Crotalus; Hippozoen; Echinac; Silica* follows well. In the treatment of carbuncles, remember the prescription of the prophet Isaiah for King Hezekiah's carbuncle-i.e the pulp of a fig placed on a poultice and apply.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thirtieth potency. *Tarant. Cubensis*.

anthrakokali.name: Anthrakokali
anthrakokali.essence:
Anthracite Coal Dissolved in Boiling Caustic Potash (ANTHRAKOKALI)

Useful in skin affections, scabies, prurigo, chronic herpes, cracks and ulcerations. Papular-like eruption with a vesicular tendency, especially on scrotum, also on hands, tibia, shoulders and dorsum of feet. Intense thirst. Chronic rheumatism. Bilious attacks, vomiting of bile, tympanic distention of abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Anthracite Coal Dissolved in Boiling Caustic Potash (ANTHRAKOKALI)
Useful in skin affections, scabies, prurigo, chronic herpes, cracks and ulcerations. Papular-like eruption with a vesicular tendency, especially on scrotum, also on hands, tibia, shoulders and dorsum of feet. Intense thirst. Chronic rheumatism. Bilious attacks, vomiting of bile, tympanic distention of abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Low triturations.

antipyrinum.name: Antipyrinum
antipyrinum.essence: Antipyrine is one of the drugs that induce leucocytosis, similar to ergotin, salicylates, and tuberculin. Acts especially on the vaso-motor centers, causing dilation of capillaries of skin and consequent circumscribed patches of hyperaemia and swelling. In large doses causes profuse perspiration, dizziness, cyanosis, and somnolence, albumen and blood in urine. Acute erythema multiforme.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Phenazone-A Coal-tar Derivative (ANTIPYRINE)
Antipyrine is one of the drugs that induce leucocytosis, similar to ergotin, salicylates, and tuberculin. Acts especially on the vaso-motor centers, causing dilation of capillaries of skin and consequent circumscribed patches of hyperaemia and swelling. In large doses causes profuse perspiration, dizziness, cyanosis, and somnolence, albumen and blood in urine. Acute erythema multiforme.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fear of becoming insane; nervous anxiety; *hallucinations of sight and hearing*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Throbbing headache; *sensation of constriction*. Flashes of heat. *Headache under ears with earache*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
