materiaMedica.text: Puffiness of lids. Conjunctiva red and oedematous, *with lachrymation*. Red spots (*Apis*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pains and buzzing. *Tinnitus*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: OEdema and puffiness. Red and swollen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Swelling of lips. Burning of mouth and gums. Ulceration of lips and tongue; vesicles and bullae. Small lump in cheek. Tongue swollen. Bloody saliva. Toothache along lower jaw.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain on swallowing. Expectoration of fetid pus. Abscess, white false membrane. Sensation of burning.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nausea and vomiting; burning and pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diminished. Penis black.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching and burning in vagina. Menses suppressed. Watery leucorrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fluent coryza. Nasal mucous membrane swollen. Dull pains in frontal sinus. Aphonia. Oppression and dyspnoea. Cheyne-Stokes respiration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Faintness, with sensation of stoppage of heart. Throbbing throughout the body. Rapid, weak, irregular pulse.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Epileptiform seizures. Contractures. Trembling and cramps. Crawling and numbness. *General prostration*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Erythema*, eczema, pemphigus. *Intense pruritus*. *Urticaria*, appearing and disappearing suddenly, with internal coldness. Angioneurotic-oedema. Dark blotches on skin of penis, sometimes with oedema.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second decimal potency.

antimonium-sulphuratum-auratum.name: Antimonium Sulphuratum Auratum
antimonium-sulphuratum-auratum.essence: A remarkable remedy for many forms of chronic nasal and bronchial catarrh. Acne. Amaurosis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Golden Sulphuret of Antimony
A remarkable remedy for many forms of chronic nasal and bronchial catarrh. Acne. Amaurosis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Nosebleed on washing*. Increased secretion in nose and throat. Rough and scrapy feeling. Loss of smell. Metallic styptic taste.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tickling in larynx. *Increased mucus* with fullness in bronchi. Respiration difficult, pressure in bronchi, with constriction. Tough mucus in bronchi and larynx. Dry hard cough. Congestion of upper lobe of left lung. Winter coughs patient is sore all over. Pneumonia, when hepatization occurred and resolution failed to take place.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Acne (pustular variety). Itching on hands and feet.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second or third trituration.

apium-graveolens.name: Apium Graveolens
apium-graveolens.essence: Contains a soporific active principle. Obstinate retention of urine, throbbing headaches and heartburn, have been produced by celery. Swelling of throat, face, and hands. Rheumatic pain in muscles of neck also in sacrum. Growing pains. Hungry for apples. Dysmenorrhoea, with sharp, short pains, better flexing legs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tickling, dry cough. *Intense constriction over sternum*, with drawing feeling through to back on lying down. Throat swollen, dyspnoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching blotches; burning, creeping sensation. Profuse discharge from granulating ulcers. Urticaria with shuddering.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Unrefreshed; sleepless. Wakes from 1 to 3 am.Eating does not help sleep. Not fatigued from loss of sleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to thirtieth potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Depressed; energetic; feeling of fidgets; cannot sleep from thinking. Headache; better eating. Eyeballs feel sunken. Itching in eyes. Itching and smarting in inner canthus of left eye.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sore; sharp sticking pain as if stool was coming on; diarrhoea, sharp pain in left iliac region going over to right. Nausea increases with pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sharp sticking pains in both ovarian regions, left, better bending over, by lying on left side, *with legs flexed*; nipples tender.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Common Celery
Contains a soporific active principle. Obstinate retention of urine, throbbing headaches and heartburn, have been produced by celery. Swelling of throat, face, and hands. Rheumatic pain in muscles of neck also in sacrum. Growing pains. Hungry for apples. Dysmenorrhoea, with sharp, short pains, better flexing legs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Plant-lice from Chenopodium (CHENOPODI GLAUCI APHIS)
Partakes largely of the properties of the plant upon which the insect lives.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sad; aching, worse from motion. Brain seems swashed hither and thither. Coryza, with burning or biting in nostrils. Noise in ears, as of cannon. Yellow face. Orbital right neuralgia, with profuse lachrymation. *Toothache, relieved by general warm sweat* (*Cham*). Toothache extends to ear, temple, and cheek-bone (*Plantago*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: No appetite for meat and bread. Vesicles at end of tongue. Much mucus. Colic with much rumbling and ineffectual urging to stool.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hard and knotty. Diarrhoea in morning, with painful urging and burning in anus, and pressure in rectum and bladder.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Voluptuous feeling in glans. Burning in urethra. Urination frequent, copious, frothy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Severe pains in region of *lower inner angle of left shoulder-blade*, running into chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Shuddering all over; burning in palms; hot sweat in bed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Nat sulph; Nux*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth potency.

apocynum-cannabinum.name: Apocynum Cannabinum
apocynum-cannabinum.essence: Increases secretions of mucous and serous membranes and acts on cellular tissue, producing oedema and dropsy and on skin causing diaphoresis. Acute hydrocephalus. A diminished frequency of the pulse is a prime indication. This is one of our most efficient remedies, in *dropsies*, ascites, anasarca and hydrothorax, and urinary troubles, especially suppression and strangury. In the digestive complaints of Bright's disease, with the nausea, vomiting, drowsiness, difficult breathing, it will be foun...
apocynum-cannabinum.dosing: Tincture (ten drops three times daily) and in acute alcoholism 1 dram of decoction in 4 oz water.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Indian Hemp
Increases secretions of mucous and serous membranes and acts on cellular tissue, producing oedema and dropsy and on skin causing diaphoresis. Acute hydrocephalus. A diminished frequency of the pulse is a prime indication. This is one of our most efficient remedies, in *dropsies*, ascites, anasarca and hydrothorax, and urinary troubles, especially suppression and strangury. In the digestive complaints of Bright's disease, with the nausea, vomiting, drowsiness, difficult breathing, it will be found of frequent service. The dropsy is characterized by great thirst and gastric irritability. Arrhythmia. *Mitral and tricuspid regurgitation. Acute alcoholism*. Relaxation of sphincters.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bewildered. Low spirited.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Long-continued sneezing. Snuffles of children (*Sambucus*). Chronic nasal catarrh with tendency to acute stuffiness with dull, sluggish memory. Dull headache. Takes cold easily, nostrils become congested and blocked up easily.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nausea, with drowsiness. Thirst on walking. *Excessive vomiting*. Food or water is immediately ejected. Dull, heavy, sick feeling. Oppression in epigastrium and chest, impeding breathing (*Lobelia infl*). Sensation of sinking in stomach. Abdomen bloated. Ascites.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Watery*, flatulent, with soreness in anus; worse after eating. Feeling as if sphincter were open and stools ran right out.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bladder much distended. Turbid, hot urine, with thick mucus and burning in urethra, after urinating. Little expulsive power. Dribbling. Strangury. *Renal Dropsy*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Amenorrhoea, with bloating; metrorrhagia with nausea; fainting, vital depression. Haemorrhages at change of life. Blood expelled in large clots.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Short, dry cough. *Respiratory short and unsatisfactory*. Sighing. Oppression about epigastrium and chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tricuspid regurgitation; rapid and feeble, irregular cardiac action, low arterial tension, pulsating jugulars, general cyanosis and general dropsy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Great restlessness and little sleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, cold weather; cold drinks; uncovering.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Cymarin* is the active principle of Apocyn, lowers pulse rate and increases blood-pressure. *Strophanthus* (extreme cardiac depression with intense gastric disturbance; dropsy). *Aralia hispida*-Wild Elder-a valuable diuretic, useful in dropsy of the cavities, either due to hepatic or renal disease with constipation. Urinary disorders, especially with dropsy. Scudder advises doses of five to thirty drops in sweetened cream of tartar, (Solution). *Apis, Arsenic, Digital; Helleb*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture (ten drops three times daily) and in acute alcoholism 1 dram of decoction in 4 oz water.

apocynum-androsaemifolium.name: Apocynum Androsaemifolium
apocynum-androsaemifolium.essence: The rheumatic symptoms of this remedy promise most curative results. Its pains are of a wandering nature, with much stiffness and drawing. Everything smells and tastes like honey. Worms. Trembling and prostration. Swollen sensations.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Dogbane
The rheumatic symptoms of this remedy promise most curative results. Its pains are of a wandering nature, with much stiffness and drawing. Everything smells and tastes like honey. Worms. Trembling and prostration. Swollen sensations.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in all joints. Pain in toes and soles. Swelling of hands and feet. Profuse sweat, with much heat in soles. Tingling pain in toes. Cramps in soles. Violent heat in soles (*Sulph*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture and first potency.

apomorphinum-hydrochloricum.name: Apomorphinum Hydrochloricum
apomorphinum-hydrochloricum.essence: Alkaloid from Decomposition of Morphine by Hydrochloric Acid (APOMORPHIA)

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Alkaloid from Decomposition of Morphine by Hydrochloric Acid (APOMORPHIA)
The chief power of this drug lies in the speedy and effective vomiting that it produces, which becomes a strong guiding symptom to its homeopathic use. The vomiting is preceded by nausea, lassitude and increased secretion of sweat, saliva, mucus and tears. Pneumonia with vomiting. *Combined alcoholism*, with constant nausea, constipation, insomnia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo. Dilated pupils. *Nausea and vomiting*. Violent inclination to vomit. Hot feeling all over body, especially head. Empty retching and headache; heartburn; pain between shoulder-blades. Reflex vomiting-pregnancy. *Seasickness*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: The hypodermic injection of one-sixteenth of a grain will cause full emesis within five to fifteen minutes in an adult without developing any other direct action apparently. Do not use in opium poisoning. *Apomorph* hypodermically, one-thirtieth grain or less, acts as a safe and sure hypnotic. Acts well even in delirium. Sleep comes on in half an hour.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to sixth potency.

aquilegia-vulgaris.name: Aquilegia Vulgaris
aquilegia-vulgaris.essence: A remedy for hysteria. Globus and clavus hystericus. Women at climaxis, with vomiting of green substance, especially in the morning. *Sleeplessness*. Nervous trembling of body; sensitive to light and noise. Dysmenorrhoea of young girls.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Columbine (AQUILEGIA)
A remedy for hysteria. Globus and clavus hystericus. Women at climaxis, with vomiting of green substance, especially in the morning. *Sleeplessness*. Nervous trembling of body; sensitive to light and noise. Dysmenorrhoea of young girls.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses scanty, with dull, painful, nightly increasing pressure in the right lumbar region.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First potency.

aragallus-lamberti.name: Aragallus Lamberti
aragallus-lamberti.essence: Acts principally on nervous system, producing a bewildered, confused state. Symptoms of incoordination and paralysis. Locomotor ataxia. Tired in the morning.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
White Loco Weed-Rattle Weed
Acts principally on nervous system, producing a bewildered, confused state. Symptoms of incoordination and paralysis. Locomotor ataxia. Tired in the morning.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Great depression; worse in morning or evening. Cannot study. Cross, irritable, restless. *Bewildered*. Mental confusion and apathy. Desires to be alone. Difficulty in concentrating mind, absent-minded. Lack of ambition. Defective expression in writing. Restlessness and aimless wandering. Must concentrate his mind on walking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diplopia. Burning in eyes. Cracking of lower lip.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aches. Feels dull. Sore with nausea. Pharynx dark, swollen, glazed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Weight on chest in region of ensiform cartilage. Constriction as of a wide band. Soreness of chest under sternum. Oppression.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Weakness of limbs. Pain in left sciatic nerve. Cramps of muscles on front of leg while walking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Astragallus* and *Oxytropis*, two varieties of Loco Weed; also *Baryta*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth and two hundredth potencies.

aralia-racemosa.name: Aralia Racemosa
aralia-racemosa.essence: This is a remedy for asthmatic conditions, with *cough aggravated on lying down*. Drenching sweat during sleep. Extreme sensitiveness to draughts. Diarrhoea, prolapse of rectum. Aching in rectum extending upwards; worse lying on side lain upon.

complementary: Ars iod; Naphthaline; Cepa; Rosa; Sabad; Sinapis

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
American Spikenard
This is a remedy for asthmatic conditions, with *cough aggravated on lying down*. Drenching sweat during sleep. Extreme sensitiveness to draughts. Diarrhoea, prolapse of rectum. Aching in rectum extending upwards; worse lying on side lain upon.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
*Dry cough coming on after first sleep*, about middle of night. *Asthma on lying down* at night with spasmodic cough; worse after first sleep, with tickling in throat. Constriction of chest; *feels as if a foreign body were in throat*. Obstruction worse in spring. Hay-fever; *frequent sneezing*. Rawness and burning behind sternum.
The least current of air causes sneezing, with *copious watery, excoriating nasal discharge, of salty acrid taste*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses suppressed; leucorrhoea foul-smelling, acrid, with pressing-down air. Lochia suppressed, with tympanites.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse* about 11 pm (cough).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Pecten-Scallop* (humid asthma. Quick, labored breathing. Constriction of chest, especially right side. Asthma preceded by coryza and burning in throat and chest. Attacks ends with copious expectoration of tough, frothy mucus. Worse at night). *Ars iod; Naphthaline; Cepa; Rosa; Sabad; Sinapis*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency.

aranea-diadema.name: Aranea Diadema
aranea-diadema.essence:
All spider poisons powerfully affect the nervous system (See tarentula, Mygale, etc).

All symptoms of Aranea are characterized by *periodicity, and coldness*, and great susceptibility to dampness. It is the remedy for the constitution favorable to malarial poisoning, where every damp day or place favors chilliness. Patient feels cold to the very bones. Coldness not relieved by anything. *Feeling as if parts were enlarged and heavier*. Wake up at night with hands feeling twice their natural size...

agg: late in afternoon, and at midnight

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Papal-Cross Spider
All spider poisons powerfully affect the nervous system (See tarentula, Mygale, etc).
All symptoms of Aranea are characterized by *periodicity, and coldness*, and great susceptibility to dampness. It is the remedy for the constitution favorable to malarial poisoning, where every damp day or place favors chilliness. Patient feels cold to the very bones. Coldness not relieved by anything. *Feeling as if parts were enlarged and heavier*. Wake up at night with hands feeling twice their natural size. Spleen swollen. *Hydrogenoid* Constitution*, i.e*, Abnormal sensitiveness to damp and cold, inability to live near fresh water, lakes, rivers, etc, or in damp, chilly places (*Nat. Sulph. Thuja*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in right trifacial nerve from periphery inwards. Confusion; *better by smoking in open air*. Heat and flickering in eyes; worse in damp weather. Sudden violent pain in teeth at night immediately after lying down.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Menses too early, too copious*. Distention of abdomen. Lumbo-abdominal neuralgia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in intercostal nerve from nerve endings to spine. Bright red haemorrhage from lungs (*Millefol; Ferr phos*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cramps after eating a little; epigastrium painful to pressure.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Enlarged spleen. Colic returns same hours. Heaviness in lower abdomen, as of a stone. Diarrhoea. Arms and legs feel as if asleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bone-pains in extremities. Pain in *os calcis*. *Sensation of swelling*, and of parts going to sleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Restless and waking, as if hands and forearms were swollen and heavy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Coldness, with pain in long bones*, and feeling of stone in abdomen at the same hour daily. *Chilly day and night*; always worse during rain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, damp weather; late in afternoon, and at midnight. *Better*, smoking tobacco.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
*Tela aranearum*-Spider's web.--Cardiac sleeplessness, increased muscular energy. Excitement and nervous agitation in febrile states. Dry asthma, harassing coughs; periodic headaches with *extreme nervous erethism*. *Obstinate intermittents*. Acts immediately on arterial system, pulse full, strong, compressible.
Lowers pulse rate frequency. Masked periodical diseases, hectic, broken down patients. Symptoms come on *suddenly* with cool, *clammy* skin. Numbness of hands and legs when at rest. *Continued chilliness*.
*Aranea Scinencia*-Grey Spider--(constant twitching of under eyelids. Sleepiness. Worse in warm room).
*Heloderma; Cedron; Arsenic*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture to thirtieth potency.

arbutus-andrachne.name: Arbutus Andrachne
arbutus-andrachne.essence: A remedy for eczema associated with gouty and rheumatic symptoms. Arthritis; especially larger joints. Urine rendered more clear. Lumbago. Symptoms shift from skin to joints. Vesical symptoms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Strawberry Tree
A remedy for eczema associated with gouty and rheumatic symptoms. Arthritis; especially larger joints. Urine rendered more clear. Lumbago. Symptoms shift from skin to joints. Vesical symptoms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Arbutin; Ledum; Bryonia; Kalmia*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency.

argentum-metallicum.name: Argentum Metallicum
argentum-metallicum.essence: Emaciation, a gradual drying up, desire for fresh air, dyspnoea, sensation of expansion and left-sided pains are characteristic. The chief action is centered on the articulations and their component elements, bones, cartilages, and ligament's. Here the small blood vessels become closed up or withered and carious affections result. They come on insidiously, lingering, but progress. The larynx is also a special center for this drug.

amel: cough at night when lying down (opposite Hyoscy)

argentum-metallicum.dosing: Sixth trituration and higher. Not too frequent repetition.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Mercur; Puls*.
Compare: *Selen; Alum; Platina; Stannum; Ampelopsis* (Chronic hoarseness in scrofulous patients).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth trituration and higher. Not too frequent repetition.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Silver
Emaciation, a gradual drying up, desire for fresh air, dyspnoea, sensation of expansion and left-sided pains are characteristic. The chief action is centered on the articulations and their component elements, bones, cartilages, and ligament's. Here the small blood vessels become closed up or withered and carious affections result. They come on insidiously, lingering, but progress. The larynx is also a special center for this drug.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hurried feeling; time passes slowly; melancholy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull paroxysmal neuralgia over left side, gradually increasing and ceasing suddenly. Scalp very tender to touch. Vertigo, with intoxicated feeling, on looking at running water. *Head feels empty, hollow*. Eyelids red and thick. Exhausting coryza, with sneezing. Pain in facial bones. Pain between left eye and frontal eminence.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Raw, hawking, gray, *jelly-like mucus*, and throat sore on coughing. *Profuse and easy* morning expectoration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Hoarseness* Aphonia. Raw, sore feeling when coughing. Total loss of voice of professional singers. Larynx feels sore and raw. *Easy expectoration, looking like boiled starch. Feeling of raw spot near supra sternal fossa. Worse from use of voice. Cough from laughing*. Hectic fever at noon. On reading aloud, must hem and hawk. *Great weakness of chest*; worse left side. Alteration in timbre of voice. Pain in left lower ribs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Severe backache; must walk bent, with oppression of chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diuresis. Urine *profuse, turbid*, sweet odor. Frequent urination. Polyuria.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rheumatic affections of joints, especially elbow and knee. Legs weak and trembling, worse descending stairs. Involuntary contractions of fingers, partial paralysis of forearm; writer's cramp. *Swelling of ankles*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Crushed pain in testicles. *Seminal emissions, without sexual excitement*. Frequent micturation with burning.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ovaries feel too large. Bearing-down pain. Prolapse of womb. *Eroded spongy cervix. Leucorrhoea* foul, excoriating. Palliative in scirrhus of uterus. Pain in left ovary. *Climateric haemorrhage*. Sore feeling; throughout abdomen; worse by jarring. Uterine disease with pain in joints and limbs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse* from touch, toward noon. *Better* in open air; cough at night when lying down (opposite Hyoscy).

argemone-mexicana.name: Argemone Mexicana
argemone-mexicana.essence: Colicky cramp and spasm of bowels. Painful neuro-muscular conditions, preventing sleep. Rheumatic disease associated with Bright's disease (D. MacFarlan).
argemone-mexicana.dosing: Sixth potency. Fresh juice is applied to ulcers and warts.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Prickly Poppy
Colicky cramp and spasm of bowels. Painful neuro-muscular conditions, preventing sleep. Rheumatic disease associated with Bright's disease (D. MacFarlan).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Throbbing headache in eyes and temples. Head hot. Throat very dry, pain on swallowing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels sick, like vomiting. Griping in pit of stomach. No appetite. Belching and passing gas.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Passes less urine. Changing color.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses suppressed. Diminished sexual desire with weakness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Left knee stiff and painful. Feet swollen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse* at noon (weakness).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency. Fresh juice is applied to ulcers and warts.

aristolochia-milhomens.name: Aristolochia Milhomens
aristolochia-milhomens.essence: Stitching pains in various parts. Pain in heels, burning in anus and frequent irritation. Flatulence in stomach and abdomen. Pain in back and extremities. Stiffness of legs. Pain in tendo-Achillis. Itching and swelling around the malleoli.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Brazilian Snake Root
Stitching pains in various parts. Pain in heels, burning in anus and frequent irritation. Flatulence in stomach and abdomen. Pain in back and extremities. Stiffness of legs. Pain in tendo-Achillis. Itching and swelling around the malleoli.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Aristolochia Serpentaria*-Virginia Snake Root--(Symptoms of intestinal tract; colliquative diarrhoea, meteorism. Flatulent dyspepsia. Brain congestion. Distention and cutting pains in abdomen. Symptoms like those of Poison-Oak).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lower potencies.

arsenicum-bromatum.name: Arsenicum Bromatum
arsenicum-bromatum.essence: Has proven a great anti-psoric and anti-syphilitic remedy. Herpetic eruptions, syphilitic excrescences, glandular tumors and indurations, carcinoma, locomotor ataxia, and obstinate intermittents, and *diabetes* are all greatly influenced by this preparation.
arsenicum-bromatum.dosing: Tincture, two to four drops daily in water. In diabetes, three drops three times a day in a glass of water.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Bromide of Arsenic
Has proven a great anti-psoric and anti-syphilitic remedy. Herpetic eruptions, syphilitic excrescences, glandular tumors and indurations, carcinoma, locomotor ataxia, and obstinate intermittents, and *diabetes* are all greatly influenced by this preparation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Acne rosacea*, with violet papules on nose; worse in the spring. *Acne* in young people.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, two to four drops daily in water. In diabetes, three drops three times a day in a glass of water.

arsenicum-hydrogenisatum.name: Arsenicum Hydrogenisatum
arsenicum-hydrogenisatum.essence: The general action of Arsenic more accentuated. Anaemia. Anxiety; despair. *Hoematuria*, with general blood disorganization. Haemorrhages from mucous membranes. Urine suppressed, followed by vomiting. Prepuce and glans covered with pustules and round superficial ulcers. Collapse. Coldness; prostration. Sudden weakness and nausea. Skin becomes dark brown.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Arseniuretted Hydrogen
The general action of Arsenic more accentuated. Anaemia. Anxiety; despair. *Hoematuria*, with general blood disorganization. Haemorrhages from mucous membranes. Urine suppressed, followed by vomiting. Prepuce and glans covered with pustules and round superficial ulcers. Collapse. Coldness; prostration. Sudden weakness and nausea. Skin becomes dark brown.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent vertigo on going upstairs. Eyes sunken; broad, blue circles around. Violent sneezing. Nose cold. Must be wrapped up with warm cloths.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue enlarged; deep, irregular ulcer; nodular swelling. Mouth hot and dry; little thirst.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

arsenicum-iodatum.name: Arsenicum Iodatum
arsenicum-iodatum.essence: Is to be preferred for persistently irritating, corrosive discharges. The discharge irritates the membrane *from* which it flows and *over* which it flows. The discharge may be fetid, watery, and the mucous membrane is always red, angry, swollen; itches and burns. Influenza, *hay-fever*, old nasal catarrhs, and catarrh of middle ear. Swelling of tissues within the nose. Hypertrophied condition of eustachian tube and deafness. Senile heart, myocarditis and fatty degeneration. Pulse shotty. Chroni...
arsenicum-iodatum.dosing: Second and third trituration. Ought to be prepared fresh and protected from light. Continued for some time. Clinically, it has been found advisable in tuberculosis to begin with about the 4x and gradually go lower to the second x trit, 5 grains 3 times a day.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Iodide of Arsenic
Is to be preferred for persistently irritating, corrosive discharges. The discharge irritates the membrane *from* which it flows and *over* which it flows. The discharge may be fetid, watery, and the mucous membrane is always red, angry, swollen; itches and burns. Influenza, *hay-fever*, old nasal catarrhs, and catarrh of middle ear. Swelling of tissues within the nose. Hypertrophied condition of eustachian tube and deafness. Senile heart, myocarditis and fatty degeneration. Pulse shotty. Chronic aortitis. Epithelioma of the lip. Cancer of breast after ulceration has set in.
It seems probable that in Arsenic iod, we have a remedy most closely allied to manifestations of tuberculosis. In the early stages of tuberculosis, even though there is an afternoon rise in temperature, *Ars jod* is very effective. It will be indicated by a profound prostration, rapid, irritable pulse, recurring fever and sweats, emaciation; tendency to diarrhoea. Chronic pneumonia, with abscess in lung. Hectic; debility; night sweats.
This remedy is also to be remembered in phthisis with hoarse, racking cough and profuse expectoration of a purulent nature, and attended with cardiac weakness, emaciation and general debility; in chronic, watery diarrhoea in phthisical subjects; in cases of emaciation with good appetite; in amenorrhoea, with anaemic palpitation and dyspnoea. In chronic pneumonia, when abscess is about to form. Great emaciation. Arteriosclerosis, myocardial degeneration and senile heart. Threatened pyaemia (*Pyrog; Methyl blue*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Vertigo*, with tremulous feeling, especially in aged.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
*Thin, watery, irritating, excoriating discharge from anterior and posterior nares; sneezing*. Hay-fever. Irritation and tingling of nose constant desire to sneeze (*Pollanin*).
*Chronic nasal catarrh*; swollen nose; profuse, thick, yellow discharge; ulcers; *membrane sore and excoriated*. Aggravation by sneezing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning in pharynx. Tonsils swollen. Thick membrane from fauces to lips. Breath fetid, glandular involvement. Diphtheria. Chronic follicular pharyngitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scrofulous ophthalmia. Otitis, with fetid, corrosive discharge. Thickening of tympanum. *Burning*, acrid coryza.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain and pyrosis. Vomiting an hour after food. Nausea distressing. Pain in epigastrium. Intense thirst; water is immediately ejected.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Slight hacking cough, with dry and stopped-up nostrils. Pleuritis exudativa. Chronic bronchitis. Pulmonary tuberculosis. Pneumonia that fails to clear up. Broncho-pneumonia after grippe. Cough dry, with little difficult expectoration. Aphonia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Recurrent fever and sweats. *Drenching night-sweats*. Pulse rapid, feeble, weak, irregular. Chilly, cannot endure cold.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Dry, scaly, itching. *Marked exfoliation* *of skin in large scales*, leaving a raw exuding surface beneath. *Ichthyosis. Enlarged scrofulous glands*.
*Venereal bubo*. Debilitating night-sweats. Eczema of the beard; watery, oozing, itching; worse, washing. Emaciation. Psoriasis. Acne hard, shotty, indurated base with pustule at apex.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Tuberculinum; Antimon iod*. In hay-fever, compare: *Aralia; Naphthalin; Rosa; Sang nit*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second and third trituration. Ought to be prepared fresh and protected from light. Continued for some time. Clinically, it has been found advisable in tuberculosis to begin with about the 4x and gradually go lower to the second x trit, 5 grains 3 times a day.

arsenicum-metallicum.name: Arsenicum Metallicum
arsenicum-metallicum.essence: Arouses latent syphilis. Periodicity very marked; symptoms recur every two and three weeks. Weakness. Swollen feeling of parts.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sore pain in liver goes through to shoulders and spine. Pain in spleen down to groin. Pain in breast extends to hip and spleen. Diarrhoea, burning watery stools with relief of pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Metallic Arsenic
Arouses latent syphilis. Periodicity very marked; symptoms recur every two and three weeks. Weakness. Swollen feeling of parts.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Low spirited, memory weak. *Desire to be alone*. Annoyed by visions, causing her to cry. Head feels too large. Left-sided headache up to eyes and into ears. Headache worse stooping and lying down. OEdematous swelling of forehead.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Red, itching, burning and bloated. Eyes swelled and watery, burn with coryza. Eyes weak, day and gas light unpleasant.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: The tongue coated white, and shows imprint of the teeth. Mouth sore and ulcerated.

arsenicum-sulphuratum-flavum.name: Arsenicum Sulphuratum Flavum
arsenicum-sulphuratum-flavum.essence: Yellow Sulphuret of Arsenic. Orpiment (ARSENIC TRISULPH.)

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Yellow Sulphuret of Arsenic. Orpiment (ARSENIC TRISULPH.)
Needle pricks from within outwards in chest; also on forehead, right side. Sticking behind ear. Difficult respiration. Skin chafed about genitals.
Leucoderma and squamous syphilides. Sciatica and pain around the knee.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Arsenic sulph rub* (influenza with intense catarrhal symptoms, great prostration and high temperature, purulent discharges, psoriasis, acne, *and sciatica*. Chilly even before a fire. Itching in various parts. Pellagra).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third trituration.

artemisia-vulgaris.name: Artemisia Vulgaris
artemisia-vulgaris.essence: Has some reputation as a remedy for epileptic conditions, and convulsive diseases of childhood and girls at puberty. Locally and internally is injurious to eyes. *Petit mal*. Epilepsy without aura; after fright and other violent emotions and after masturbation. Several convulsions close together. Somnambulism. Gets up at night and works, remembers nothing in the morning (*Kali phos*).
artemisia-vulgaris.dosing: First to third potency. Said to act better when given with wine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Mugwort
Has some reputation as a remedy for epileptic conditions, and convulsive diseases of childhood and girls at puberty. Locally and internally is injurious to eyes. *Petit mal*. Epilepsy without aura; after fright and other violent emotions and after masturbation. Several convulsions close together. Somnambulism. Gets up at night and works, remembers nothing in the morning (*Kali phos*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Drawn back by spasmodic twitchings. Mouth drawn to left. Congestion of brain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Colored light produces dizziness*. Pain and blurring of vision; better; rubbing; worse, using eyes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Profuse menses. Violent uterine contractions. Spasms during menses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Profuse sweat, *smelling like garlic*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Absinth; Cina; Cicuta*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third potency. Said to act better when given with wine.

arum-dracontium.name: Arum Dracontium
arum-dracontium.essence: A remedy for Pharyngitis with sore, raw and tender throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Green Dragon
A remedy for Pharyngitis with sore, raw and tender throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heavy; shooting pain in ears, aching pain behind right ear.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry, sore, worse swallowing. Raw and tender. Continued disposition to clear throat. Croupy, hoarse cough with sore throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Irresistible desire to pass urine, burns and smarts.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hoarseness; excess of mucus in larynx. Asthmatic at night. Expectoration thick, heavy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Arum Italicum* (Brain-fag, with headache in occipital region). *Arum maculatum* (inflammation and ulceration of mucous membranes. Nasal irritation with polypus).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First potency.

arum-triphyllum.name: Arum Triphyllum
arum-triphyllum.essence: Arum maculatum, Italicum, Dracontium, have the same action as the Triphyllum. They all contain an irritant poison, causing inflammation of mucous surfaces and destruction of tissue. *Acridity* is the keynote of the kind of action characteristic of Arum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Jack-in-the-Pulpit
Arum maculatum, Italicum, Dracontium, have the same action as the Triphyllum. They all contain an irritant poison, causing inflammation of mucous surfaces and destruction of tissue. *Acridity* is the keynote of the kind of action characteristic of Arum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bores head in pillow. Headache from too warm clothing, from hot coffee.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Quivering of upper eyelids, especially left.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Soreness of nostrils. *Acrid, excoriating discharge*, producing raw sores. *Nose obstructed; must breathe through mouth. Boring in the nose*. Coryza; discharge blood-streaked, watery. Nose completely stopped, with fluent, acrid discharge. Hay-fever, with pain over root of nose. Large scabs high up on right side of nose. Face feels chapped, as if from cold wind; feels hot. *Constant picking at nose until it bleeds*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Raw feeling at roof and palate*. Lips and soft palate sore and burning. Lips chapped and burning. *Corners of mouth sore and cracked*. Tongue red, sore; whole mouth raw. Picking lips until they bleed. Saliva profuse, acrid, corroding.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Swelling of sub-maxillary glands. *Constricted and swollen; burns*; raw. Constant hawking. *Hoarseness*. Expectoration of much mucus. Lungs feel sore. Clergyman's sore throat. Voice uncertain, uncontrollable. Worse, talking, singing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scarlet rash; *raw, bloody surfaces* anywhere. Impetigo contagiosa.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse, northwest wind*; lying down.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
*Compare: Ammon carb; Ailanthus; Cepa*.
Antidotes: *Buttermilk; Acet ac; Puls*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

asa-foetida.name: Asa Foetida
asa-foetida.essence: The flatulence and spasmodic contraction of stomach and oesophagus with reverse peristalsis are the most marked symptoms. In its selection, its relation to the hysterical and hypochondriacal patients, must be borne in mind. Besides these superficial symptoms, it has been found to affect favorably deep ulcerations, caries of bones, especially in the syphilitic organism; here the *extreme sensitiveness* and terrible throbbing, nightly pains, guiding to its use.

agg: left side, during rest, warm applications

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Gum of the Stinkasand (ASAFOETIDA)
The flatulence and spasmodic contraction of stomach and oesophagus with reverse peristalsis are the most marked symptoms. In its selection, its relation to the hysterical and hypochondriacal patients, must be borne in mind. Besides these superficial symptoms, it has been found to affect favorably deep ulcerations, caries of bones, especially in the syphilitic organism; here the *extreme sensitiveness* and terrible throbbing, nightly pains, guiding to its use.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Irritable; complains of her troubles; sensitive. Boring above eyebrows. *Pressive pain from within outward*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Orbital neuralgia; better, pressure and rest. Iritis and intraocular inflammations, with boring, throbbing pains at night. Stitches under left frontal eminences. Boring pains in and around eyes. Syphilitic iritis. Superficial corneal ulcer with digging pains; worse at night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Offensive otorrhoea, with boring pains in mastoid bone. Mastoid disease with pain in temporal region with *pushing out sensation*. Offensive, purulent discharge.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Syphilitic ozaena, with very offensive purulent discharge. *Caries of nasal bones* (*Aurum*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Globus hystericus*. Ball rises in throat. Sensation as if peristaltic motion were reversed, and oesophagus were driven from stomach to throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Great difficulty in bringing up wind. *Flatulence and regurgitation of liquid*. Hysterical flatulence. Great distention. Sensation of emptiness and weakness, with distention and beating in stomach and abdomen. Forcible eructation of gas. *Pulsation in pit* of stomach. Violent gastralgia; cutting and burning in stomach and region of diaphragm. Gurgling and rolling of wind, which escapes afterwards with loud and difficult eructation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Mammae turgid with milk in the unimpregnated. *Deficient milk*, with oversensitiveness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Distended, griping, with hunger. Obstinate constipation. Pain in perineum, as if something dull pressed out. *diarrhoea, extremely offensive, with meteorism*, and regurgitation of food.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Spasmodic tightness*, as if lungs could not be fully expanded. Palpitation more like a tremor.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Darting pain and caries in bones. Periosteum painful, swollen, enlarged. Ulcers affecting bones; thin, ichorous pus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching, better scratching; ulcers painful on edges. Suppressed skin symptoms produce nervous disorders.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, at night; from tough; left side, during rest, warm applications. *Better*, open air; from motion, pressure.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *China; Mercur*.
Compare: *Moschus; China; Mercur; Aurum*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second to sixth potency.

asarum-officinale.name: Asarum Officinale
asarum-officinale.essence: A remedy for nervous affections, loss of energy, with excessive *erethism. Scratching on silk or linen or paper unbearable*. Pains and spasmodic muscular actions. Nervous deafness and asthenopia. Cold shivers from any emotion. Feels as if parts were pressed together. Tension and contractive sensations. *Always feels cold*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
European Snake-root (ASARUM EUROPUM)
A remedy for nervous affections, loss of energy, with excessive *erethism. Scratching on silk or linen or paper unbearable*. Pains and spasmodic muscular actions. Nervous deafness and asthenopia. Cold shivers from any emotion. Feels as if parts were pressed together. Tension and contractive sensations. *Always feels cold*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thoughts vanish, with drawing pressure in forehead. *Sensibility increased, even from mere imagination*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compressive pain. Tension of scalp; hair painful (*China*). Coryza, with sneezing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feel stiff; burn; feel cold. Better, in cold air or water; worse, sunlight and wind. Darting pains in eyes after operations. Asthenopia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation as if plugged up. Catarrh with deafness. Heat of external ear. Noises.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Loss of appetite, flatulence, eructation, and vomiting. *Desire for alcoholic drinks*. Smoking tobacco tastes bitter. Nausea; worse after eating. Clean tongue. Great faintness. Accumulation of cold, watery saliva.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Strings* of odorless, yellow mucus pass from bowels. Diarrhoea of tough mucus. *Undigested stools*. Prolapse.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses too early, long lasting, black. Violent pain in small of back. Tenacious, yellow leucorrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nervous, hacking cough. Short respiration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Paralytic pain in muscles of nape of neck. Weakness, with staggering.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chilliness, single parts get icy cold. Easily excited perspiration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, in cold dry weather; penetrating sounds. *Better*, from washing; in damp and wet weather.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Asarum Canadensa*-Wild Ginger (Colds, followed by amenorrhoea and gastro-enteritis. Suppressed colds). Compare: *Ipecac*, especially in diarrhoea; *Silica; Nux; China*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to sixth potency.

asclepias-cornuti.name: Asclepias Cornuti
asclepias-cornuti.essence: Seems to act especially on nervous system and urinary organs. A remedy for dropsy, hepatic, renal or cardiac and post-scarlatinal; causes diaphoresis and augments the urinary secretion. Acute rheumatic inflammation of large joints. Intermittent, pressing-down uterine pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Silk-weed (ASCLEPIAS SYRIACA)
Seems to act especially on nervous system and urinary organs. A remedy for dropsy, hepatic, renal or cardiac and post-scarlatinal; causes diaphoresis and augments the urinary secretion. Acute rheumatic inflammation of large joints. Intermittent, pressing-down uterine pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels as if *a sharp instrument were thrust through from temple to temple*. Constriction across forehead. Nervous headache, after suppressed perspiration, followed by *increased urine, with increase of specific gravity*. Headache from retention of effete matters in system.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Asclepias Vincetoxicum*.--Swallow-wart.--*Cynanchum*--(A gastro-intestinal irritant, producing vomiting and purgation).--(Useful in dropsy, diabetes, great thirst, profuse urination).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture.

asclepias-tuberosa.name: Asclepias Tuberosa
asclepias-tuberosa.essence: Its action on the chest muscles is most marked and has been verified. Sick headache, with flatulence in stomach and bowels. Dyspepsia. Bronchitis and pleurisy come within its range. Catarrhal states from cold and damp weather. Irritation of larynx with huskiness; grip, with pleuritic pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Pleurisy-root
Its action on the chest muscles is most marked and has been verified. Sick headache, with flatulence in stomach and bowels. Dyspepsia. Bronchitis and pleurisy come within its range. Catarrhal states from cold and damp weather. Irritation of larynx with huskiness; grip, with pleuritic pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Respiration painful, especially at base of left lung. Dry cough; throat constricted; causes pain in head and abdomen. Pain in chest; shooting downward from left nipple. A general eliminative remedy, acting specially on the sudoriparous glands. Chest pains are relieved by bending forward. Spaces between ribs close to sternum tender. Lancinating pain between shoulders. Catarrh, with frontal headache, and sticky yellow discharge.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fullness, pressure, weight. Flatulence after meals. Sensitive to tobacco.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Catarrhal dysentery, with rheumatic pains all over*. Stools smell like rotten eggs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rheumatic joints give sensation as if adhesions being broken up on bending.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Asclepias Incarnata*-Swamp Milk Weed (Chronic gastric Catarrh and leucorrhoea. Dropsy with dyspnoea) *Periploca groeca*-One of the Asclepiades--(Cardiac tonic, acts on circulation and respiratory center, accelerating respiration in a ratio disproportionate to pulse). *Bryonia; Dulc*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture and first potency.

asimina-triloba.name: Asimina Triloba
asimina-triloba.essence:
Produces a series of symptoms much like scarlet fever; sore throat, fever, vomiting, scarlet eruption; tonsils and submaxillary glands enlarged, with diarrhoea. Fauces red and swollen, face swollen. Desire for ice-cold things. *Hoarseness*. Languid, drowsy irritable.

Acne. Itching in evening on undressing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
American Papaw
Produces a series of symptoms much like scarlet fever; sore throat, fever, vomiting, scarlet eruption; tonsils and submaxillary glands enlarged, with diarrhoea. Fauces red and swollen, face swollen. Desire for ice-cold things. *Hoarseness*. Languid, drowsy irritable.
Acne. Itching in evening on undressing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Capsic; Bellad*.

asparagus-officinalis.name: Asparagus Officinalis
asparagus-officinalis.essence: Its marked and immediate action on the urinary secretion is well known. It causes weakness and cardiac depression with dropsy. Rheumatic pains. Especially about left shoulder and heart.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Common Garden Asparagus
Its marked and immediate action on the urinary secretion is well known. It causes weakness and cardiac depression with dropsy. Rheumatic pains. Especially about left shoulder and heart.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Confused. Coryza, with profuse, thin fluid. Aching in forehead and root of nose. Migrainious morning headache with scotoma. Throat feels rough, with hawking copious tenacious mucus throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frequent, with fine stitches in orifice of urethra; burning; of peculiar odor. Cystitis, with pus, mucus and tenesmus. Lithiasis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Palpitation, with oppression of chest*. Pulse intermits, weak, pain about left shoulder and heart, associated with bladder disturbances. Great oppression in breathing. Hydrothorax.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rheumatic pain in back, especially near shoulder and limbs. Pain at acromion process of left scapula under clavicle and down arm, with feeble pulse.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidote: *Acon; Apis*.
Compare: *Althae*-Marshmallow--(contains asparagin; irritable bladder, throat and bronchi). Physalis Alkekengi. Digital; Sarsap; Spigelia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Crawfish (CANCER ASTACUS)
Skin symptoms most important. *Urticaria*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nettle-rash over whole body. Itching. Crusta lactea, with enlarged lymphatic glands. Erysipelas, and *liver affections with nettle-rash*. Swelling of cervical glands. Jaundice.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Inward chilliness; very sensitive to air, worse uncovering; violent fever, with headache.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Bombyx*-Caterpillar-Itching of whole body (Urticaria). *Apis; Rhus; Nat m; Homar*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

asterias-rubens.name: Asterias Rubens
asterias-rubens.essence: A remedy for the sycotic diathesis; flabby, lymphatic constitution, flabby with red face. Lancinating pains. Nervous disturbances, neuralgia, chorea, and hysteria come within the range of this remedy. Has been used for cancer of the breast, and has an unquestioned influence over cancer disease. Excitement in both sexes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Red Starfish
A remedy for the sycotic diathesis; flabby, lymphatic constitution, flabby with red face. Lancinating pains. Nervous disturbances, neuralgia, chorea, and hysteria come within the range of this remedy. Has been used for cancer of the breast, and has an unquestioned influence over cancer disease. Excitement in both sexes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cannot bear contradiction. Shocks in brain; throbbing; *heat in head, as if surrounded by hot air*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Red. Pimples on side of nose, chin and mouth. *Disposition to pimples at adolescence*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Colic and other sufferings cease with appearance of flow. Breasts swell and pain in breasts; worse left. Ulceration with sharp pains, piercing to scapulae. Pains down left arm to fingers, worse motion. Excitement of sexual instinct with nervous agitation.
Nodes and indurations of mammary gland, dull aching, neuralgic pain in this region (*Conium*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Breasts swollen, indurated. Neuralgia of left breast and arm (*Brom*). Pain under sternum and in muscles of praecordial region. *Left breast feels as if pulled inward*, and pain extends over inner arm to end of little finger. Numbness of hand and fingers of left side. *Cancer mammae even in ulcerative stage. Acute, lancinating pain. Axillary glands swollen hard and knotted*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Gait unsteady; muscles refuse to obey the will. Epilepsy; preceded by twitching over whole body.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constipation. Ineffectual desire. Stool like olives. Diarrhoea, watery brown, gushing out in jet.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Destitute of pliability and elasticity. Itching spots. Ulcers, with fetid ichor. Acne. Psoriasis and herpes zoster worse left arm and chest. Enlarged axillary glands, worse, at night and in damp weather.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Plumb; Zinc*.
Compare: *Conium; Carbo; Ars; Condurango*.
Incompatible: *Nux; Coffea*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, coffee, night; cold damp weather, left side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency.

astragalus-mollissimus.name: Astragalus Mollissimus
astragalus-mollissimus.essence: Affects animals like effects of alcohol, tobacco and morphine in man. First stage, period of hallucination or mania with defective eye sight during which the animal performs all sorts of antics. After acquiring a taste for the plant it refuses every other kind of food. Second stage brings emaciation, sunken eyeballs, lusterless hair and feeble movements-after a few months dies as from starvation (U. S. Dept. Agriculture). Irregularities in gait-paralytic affections. Loss of muscular coordination...

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Purple or Woolly Loco-weed
Affects animals like effects of alcohol, tobacco and morphine in man. First stage, period of hallucination or mania with defective eye sight during which the animal performs all sorts of antics. After acquiring a taste for the plant it refuses every other kind of food. Second stage brings emaciation, sunken eyeballs, lusterless hair and feeble movements-after a few months dies as from starvation (U. S. Dept. Agriculture). Irregularities in gait-paralytic affections. Loss of muscular coordination.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fullness in right temple and upper jaw. Pain over left eyebrow. Painful facial bones. Dizzy. Pressive pain in temples. Pain and pressure in maxillae.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Weakness and emptiness. Burning in oesophagus and stomach.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Purring sensation in right foot outer side from heel to toe. Icy coldness of left calf.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Aragallus Lamberti*-White Loco-Weed-Rattleweed; *Baryta; Oxytropis*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency.

aurum-muriaticum-natronatum.name: Aurum Muriaticum Natronatum
aurum-muriaticum-natronatum.essence: This remedy has a most pronounced effect on the female organs, and most of its clinical application has been based thereon. Has more power over uterine tumors than any other remedy (Burnett). Psoriasis syphilitica. Periosteal swelling on lower jaw. Swelling of testicle. High blood pressure due to disturbed function of nervous mechanism. Arterio-sclerosis Syphilitic ataxia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Sodium Chloroaurate
This remedy has a most pronounced effect on the female organs, and most of its clinical application has been based thereon. Has more power over uterine tumors than any other remedy (Burnett). Psoriasis syphilitica. Periosteal swelling on lower jaw. Swelling of testicle. High blood pressure due to disturbed function of nervous mechanism. Arterio-sclerosis Syphilitic ataxia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning; stitches, and induration. Old cases of rheumatism and gouty pains. Hepatic cirrhosis. Interstitial nephritis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Indurated cervix. Palpitation of young girls. Coldness in abdomen. Chronic metritis and prolapsus. Uterus fills up whole pelvis. Ulceration of neck of womb and vagina. Leucorrhoea, with spasmodic contraction of vagina. Ovaries indurated. Ovarian dropsy. Sub-involution. Ossified uterus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second and third trituration.

avena-sativa.name: Avena Sativa
avena-sativa.essence:
Has a selective action on brain and nervous system, favorably influencing their nutritive function.

Nervous exhaustion, sexual debility, and the morphine habit call for this remedy in rather material dosage. Best tonic for debility after exhausting diseases. Nerve tremors of the aged; chorea, paralysis agitans, epilepsy. Post-diphtheritic paralysis. Rheumatism of heart. *Colds*. Acute coryza (20 drop doses in hot water hourly for a few doses). Alcoholism. Sleeplessness, especially of alcoholics...
avena-sativa.dosing: Tincture ten to twenty drop doses, preferably in hot water.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Numbness of limbs, as if paralyzed. Strength of hand diminished.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Alfalfa* (General tonic similar to avena-also in scanty and suppressed urine).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture ten to twenty drop doses, preferably in hot water.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Common Oat
Has a selective action on brain and nervous system, favorably influencing their nutritive function.
Nervous exhaustion, sexual debility, and the morphine habit call for this remedy in rather material dosage. Best tonic for debility after exhausting diseases. Nerve tremors of the aged; chorea, paralysis agitans, epilepsy. Post-diphtheritic paralysis. Rheumatism of heart. *Colds*. Acute coryza (20 drop doses in hot water hourly for a few doses). Alcoholism. Sleeplessness, especially of alcoholics. Bad effects of *Morphine* habit. Nervous states of many female troubles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Inability to keep mind on any one subject.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nervous headache at menstrual period, with burning at top of head. Occipital headache, with phosphatic urine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Amenorrhoea and dysmenorrhoea, with weak circulation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Spermatorrhoea; impotency; after too much indulgence.

azadirachta-indica.name: Azadirachta Indica
azadirachta-indica.essence: An afternoon fever and rheumatic pains in various parts are caused by this remedy. Pain in sternum and ribs, in back and shoulders and extremities; heat, pricking and aching in hands, especially palms, fingers, also toes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Margosa Bark
An afternoon fever and rheumatic pains in various parts are caused by this remedy. Pain in sternum and ribs, in back and shoulders and extremities; heat, pricking and aching in hands, especially palms, fingers, also toes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Forgetful; giddy on rising; head aches, scalp sensitive; eyes burn, pain in right eyeball.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Slight chill, afternoon fever, glowing heat in face, hands, and feet, copious sweat on upper part of body.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Cedron; Natr mur; Arsenic*.

bacillinum-burnett.name: Bacillinum Burnett
bacillinum-burnett.essence: A Maceration of a Typical Tuberculous Lung introduced by Dr. Burnett (BACILLINUM)
bacillinum-burnett.dosing: The does is important. Should not be given below the thirtieth and not repeated frequently. One dose a week often sufficient to bring about reaction. It is *rapid in action*, and good results ought to be seen, otherwise there is no need of repetition.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
A Maceration of a Typical Tuberculous Lung introduced by Dr. Burnett (BACILLINUM)
Has been employed successfully in the treatment of tuberculosis; its good effects seen in the change of the sputum, which becomes decreased and more aerated and less purulent. Many forms of chronic non-tubercular disease are influenced favorably by Bacillinum, especially when bronchorrhoea and dyspnoea are present. Respiratory pyorrhea. *The patient expectorates less.*
Bacillinum is especially indicated for lungs of old people, with chronic catarrhal condition and enfeebled pulmonary circulation, attacks of suffocation at night with difficult cough. Suffocative catarrh. Tubercular meningitis. Favors falling off of tartar of teeth. Constant disposition to take cold.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Irritable, depressed. Severe, deep-in headache, also as of a tight hoop. Ringworm. Eczema of eyelids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Abdominal pains, enlarged lands in groins, tabes mesenterica. Sudden diarrhoea before breakfast. Obstinate constipation, with offensive flatus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Oppression. Catarrhal dyspnoea. Humid asthma. Bubbling rales and muco-purulent expectoration*. Note. This muco-purulent expectoration of bronchitic patients is equally poly-bacillary; it is a mixture of diverse species and hence Bacillinum is truly indicated (Cartier). Often relieves congestion of the lungs, thus paving way for other remedies in Tuberculosis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Ringworm*; pityriasis. Eczema of eyelids. Glands of neck enlarged and tender.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, night and early morning; cold air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
*Antimon iod; Lach; Arsenic iod; Myosotis. Levico*, 5-10 drops, follows as an intercurrent where much debility is present (Burnett).
Complementary: *Calc phos; Kali carb*.
Compare: Its effects seem to be identical to that of Koch's Tuberculinum. Both are useful in the tubercular diathesis before phthisis had developed. In the *early stages* of tubercular disease of glands, joints, skin and bones. *Psorinum*. Seems to be its chronic equivalent. *Bacillin testium* acts especially on lower half of the body.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: The does is important. Should not be given below the thirtieth and not repeated frequently. One dose a week often sufficient to bring about reaction. It is *rapid in action*, and good results ought to be seen, otherwise there is no need of repetition.

badiaga.name: Badiaga
badiaga.essence: Soreness of muscles and integuments; worse motion and friction of clothes, with sensitiveness to cold. Glands swollen. General paresis. Basedow's disease. Lues, bubo, roseola.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Fresh-water Sponge
Soreness of muscles and integuments; worse motion and friction of clothes, with sensitiveness to cold. Glands swollen. General paresis. Basedow's disease. Lues, bubo, roseola.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation of enlargement and fullness. Pain in forehead and temple, *extending to eyeballs*, worse in afternoon. Blueness under eyes. *Dandruff*; scalp sore, dry, tetter-like. Dull, dizzy feeling in head. *Coryza*, sneezing, watery discharge, with asthmatic breathing and suffocative cough. Influenza. Slight sounds are greatly accentuated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Twitching of *left* upper lid; eyeballs tender; aching in eyeballs. Intermittent sore pain in eyeball, coming on at 3 pm.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cough; worse in afternoon, better in warm room. *The mucus flies out of mouth and nostrils*. Whooping-cough, with thick yellow expectoration; flies out. Hay-fever, with asthmatic breathing. Pleuritic stitches in chest, neck, and back.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Mouth hot. Much thirst. Lancinating pain in pit of stomach extending to vertebra and scapula.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Metrorrhagia; worse at night, with feeling of enlargement of head (*Arg*). Cancer of breast (*Asterias; Con; Carbo an; Plumb iod*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Indescribable bad feeling about the heart with soreness and pain, flying stitches all over.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sore to touch. *Freckles. Rhagades*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stitches in nape, scapulae. Pain in small of back, hips and lower limbs. Very stiff neck. *Muscles and skin sore*, as if beaten.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse* by cold. *Better*, by heat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Merc* similar but opposite modalities. *Spongia; Kali hyd; Phytol; Conium*.
Complementary: *Sulph; Merc; Iod*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to sixth attenuation.

balsamum-peruvianum.name: Balsamum Peruvianum
balsamum-peruvianum.essence: Useful in bronchial catarrh, with copious, purulent expectoration. *Debility; hectic fever*.
balsamum-peruvianum.dosing:
First attenuation: In hectic 6x.
Extra homeopathic uses locally. As a stimulant to raw surfaces in indolent ulcers, scabies, cracked nipples, rhagades, itch. Promotes granulation, removes fetor. A one per cent solution in alcohol or ether may be used with the atomizer in respiratory affections. Internally, as an expectorant, in chronic bronchitis. Dose, 5 to 15 M, made into an emulsion with mucilage or yolk of egg.
