materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Peruvian Balsam from Myroxylon Pereirae
Useful in bronchial catarrh, with copious, purulent expectoration. *Debility; hectic fever*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Profuse, thick discharge. Eczema, with ulceration. Chronic, fetid, nasal catarrh.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vomiting of food and mucus. Catarrh of stomach.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bronchitis, and phthisis, *with muco-purulent, thick, creamy expectoration*. Loud rales in chest (*Kali sulph; Ant tar*). Very loose cough. Hectic fever and night-sweats, with irritating, short cough and scanty expectoration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scanty; much mucus sediment. Catarrh of bladder (*Chimaph*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Balsamum Tolutanum*-the balsam of Myroxylon toluifera--(chronic bronchitis with profuse expectoration) (*Oleum caryophyllum*-oil of cloves-in *profuse* septic expectoration-3 to 5 minims in milk or capsules).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
First attenuation: In hectic 6x.
Extra homeopathic uses locally. As a stimulant to raw surfaces in indolent ulcers, scabies, cracked nipples, rhagades, itch. Promotes granulation, removes fetor. A one per cent solution in alcohol or ether may be used with the atomizer in respiratory affections. Internally, as an expectorant, in chronic bronchitis. Dose, 5 to 15 M, made into an emulsion with mucilage or yolk of egg.

baptisia-tinctoria.name: Baptisia Tinctoria
baptisia-tinctoria.essence:
The symptoms of this drug are of an asthenic type, simulating low fevers, *septic conditions* of the blood, malarial poisoning and extreme prostration. Indescribable sick feeling. *Great muscular soreness and putrid phenomena always are present*. All the secretions are offensive-breath, stool, urine, sweat, etc. Epidemic influenza. Chronic intestinal toxaemias of children with fetid stools and eructations.

Baptisia in low dilutions produces a form of anti-bodies to the bac typhosus, viz, the ag...

complementary: Rhus; Muriat acid; Arsenic; Bryon; Arnica; Echinac. Pyrogen

baptisia-tinctoria.dosing: Tincture, to twelfth attenuation. Has rather short action.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Wild Indigo (BAPTISIA)
The symptoms of this drug are of an asthenic type, simulating low fevers, *septic conditions* of the blood, malarial poisoning and extreme prostration. Indescribable sick feeling. *Great muscular soreness and putrid phenomena always are present*. All the secretions are offensive-breath, stool, urine, sweat, etc. Epidemic influenza. Chronic intestinal toxaemias of children with fetid stools and eructations.
Baptisia in low dilutions produces a form of anti-bodies to the bac typhosus, viz, the agglutinins (*Mellon*). Thus it raises the natural bodily resistance to the invasion of the bacillary intoxication, which produces the typhoid syndrome. Typhoid carriers. After inoculation with anti-typhoid serum. Intermittent pulse, especially in the aged.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Wild, wandering feeling. Inability to think. Mental confusion. Ideas confused. Illusion of divided personality. *Thinks he is broken or double, and tosses about the bed trying to get pieces together* (*Cajeput*). Delirium, wandering, muttering. Perfect indifference. Falls asleep while being spoken to. Melancholia, with stupor.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Confused, swimming feeling. Vertigo; pressure at root of nose. Skin of forehead feels tight; seems drawn to back of head. Feels too large, *heavy, numb*. Soreness of eyeballs. Brain feels sore. Stupor; falls asleep while spoken to. Early deafness in typhoid conditions. Eyelids heavy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Besotted look*. Dark red. Pain at root of nose. Muscles of jaw rigid.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Taste flat, bitter. Teeth and gums sore, ulcerated. *Breath fetid. Tongue feels burned*; yellowish-brown; edges red and shining. Dry and brown in center, with dry and glistening edges; surface cracked and sore.
*Can swallow liquids only*; least solid food gags.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dark redness of tonsils and soft palate. *Constriction, contraction of oesophagus* (*Cajeput*). Great difficulty in swallowing solid food. Painless sore throat, and offensive discharge. *Contraction at cardiac orifice*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Can swallow only liquids, vomiting due to spasm of oesophagus. Gastric fever. No appetite. Constant desire for water. *Sinking feeling at stomach*. Pain in epigastric region. Feeling of hard substance (*Abies nig*). All symptoms worse from beer (*Kali bich*). Cardiac orifice contracted convulsively and ulcerative inflammation of stomach and bowels.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Right side markedly affected. Distended and rumbling. Soreness over region of gall-bladder, with diarrhoea. Stools very *offensive, thin, dark, bloody*. Soreness of abdomen, in region of liver. Dysentery of old people.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Threatened miscarriage from mental depression, shock, watching, low fevers. Menses too early, too profuse. Lochia acrid, fetid. Puerperal fever.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lungs feel compressed, breathing difficult; seeks open window. Fears going to sleep on account of nightmare and *sense of suffocation*. Constriction of chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Neck tired. Stiffness and pain, aching and drawing in arms and legs. Pain in sacrum, around hips and legs. *Sore and bruised*. Decubitus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sleepless and restless. Nightmare and frightful dreams. Cannot get herself together, feels scattered about bed. Falls asleep while answering a question.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Livid spots all over body and limbs. Burning and heat in skin (*Arsenic*). Putrid ulcers with stupor, low delirium and prostration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chill, with rheumatic pains and soreness all over body. Heat all over, with occasional chills. Chill about 11 am.*Adynamic fevers*. Typhus fever. Shipboard fever.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*; Humid heat; fog; indoors.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Bryonia* and *Arsenic* may be needed to complete the favorable reaction. *Ailanthus* differs, being more painful. Baptisia more painless. *Rhus; Muriat acid; Arsenic; Bryon; Arnica; Echinac. Pyrogen*.
*Baptisia confusia* (Pain in right jaw and oppression in left hypochondrium, producing dyspnoea and necessity to assume erect position).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to twelfth attenuation. Has rather short action.

baryta-acetica.name: Baryta Acetica
baryta-acetica.essence: Produces paralysis beginning at the extremities and spreading upward. Pruritus of aged.
baryta-acetica.dosing: Second and third trituration in repeated dosage.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Acetate of Barium
Produces paralysis beginning at the extremities and spreading upward. Pruritus of aged.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Forgetful; wavering long between opposite resolutions. Lack of self confidence.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feeling of cobweb in face.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Drawing pain down whole left leg. Crawling, with burning stitches. *Paralysis*. Lumbago and rheumatic pain in muscles and joints.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second and third trituration in repeated dosage.

baryta-iodata.name: Baryta Iodata
baryta-iodata.essence: Acts on the lymphatic system, *increased leucocytosis. Quinsy. Indurated glands, especially tonsils and breasts*. Strumous ophthalmia, with tumefaction of cervical glands and stunted growth. Tumors.

complementary: Lapis; Con. Merc iod; Carbo an

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Iodide of Baryta
Acts on the lymphatic system, *increased leucocytosis. Quinsy. Indurated glands, especially tonsils and breasts*. Strumous ophthalmia, with tumefaction of cervical glands and stunted growth. Tumors.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Acon lycotonum* (swelling of cervical, axillary, and mammary glands). *Lapis; Con. Merc iod; Carbo an*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second and third trituration.

baryta-muriatica.name: Baryta Muriatica
baryta-muriatica.essence: The different salts of Baryta are called for in organic lesions of the aged and dwarfish, both mentally and physically. Arterio-sclerosis and cerebral affections due to this condition. Headaches, but without acute crisis, occurring in old people; heaviness rather than pain. Vertigo, due to cerebral anaemia and noises in ears. Acts on lower alimentary canal, especially rectum; on muscles and joints, giving stiffness and weakness as from overwalking. The white blood corpuscles increased. Hypertens...
baryta-muriatica.dosing: Third trituration. Bears repetition of dosage well.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Barium Chloride
The different salts of Baryta are called for in organic lesions of the aged and dwarfish, both mentally and physically. Arterio-sclerosis and cerebral affections due to this condition. Headaches, but without acute crisis, occurring in old people; heaviness rather than pain. Vertigo, due to cerebral anaemia and noises in ears. Acts on lower alimentary canal, especially rectum; on muscles and joints, giving stiffness and weakness as from overwalking. The white blood corpuscles increased. Hypertension and vascular degeneration. Increased tension of pulse. Arterio-sclerosis (*Aurum; Secale*) where a high systolic pressure with a comparatively low diastolic tension is attended by cerebral and cardiac symptoms.
This remedy has indurated and *narrowing of the cardiac orifice with pain*, immediately after eating, and epigastric tenderness, which has been repeatedly verified, also its use in *aneurism* and chronic hypertrophy of the tonsils. Nymphomania and satyriasis. Convulsions. In every form of mania when the sexual desire is increased. *Icy coldness of body, with paralysis*. Multiple sclerosis of brain and cord. *Voluntary muscular power gone but perfectly sensible*. Paresis after influenza and diphtheria. General feeling of lassitude in the morning, especially weakness of the legs, with muscular stiffness. Children who go around with their mouth open and who talk through the nose. Stupid-appearing, hard of hearing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Whizzing and buzzing. Noises on chewing and swallowing, or sneezing. Earache; better sipping cold water. Parotids swollen. Offensive otorrhoea. Inflates middle ear on blowing nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Difficult swallowing. *Tonsils enlarged*. Paresis of pharynx and eustachian tubes, with sneezing and noises. Tubes feel too wide open.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Bronchial affection of old people* with cardiac dilation. *Facilitates expectoration*. Great accumulation and rattling of mucus with difficult expectoration. Arterio-sclerosis of the lung, thus in senile asthma, modifies the arterial tension.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Gone feeling at epigastrium* a good guiding symptom for it in chronic affections. Retching and vomiting. Sensation of heat ascending to head.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Great increase in uric acid*, diminution of chlorides.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Throbbing (*Selen*);
*induration of* pancreas; abdominal aneurism. Inguinal glands swollen. Spasmodic pain in rectum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare in sclerotic degenerations, especially of spinal cord, liver, and heart. *Plumbum met and Plumb iod*. Also *Aurum mur* (which will often accomplish more in sclerotic and exudative degenerations than other remedies. Multiple sclerosis, fulgurating pains, tremors, Morvan's disease, hypertrophy of fingers).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third trituration. Bears repetition of dosage well.

barosma-crenulata.name: Barosma Crenulata
barosma-crenulata.essence: Marked specific effects on genito-urinary system; *muco-purulent discharges*. Irritable bladder, with vesical catarrh; prostatic disorders. Gravel. Leucorrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Buchu (BAROSMA CRENATA)
Marked specific effects on genito-urinary system; *muco-purulent discharges*. Irritable bladder, with vesical catarrh; prostatic disorders. Gravel. Leucorrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: Copaiva; *Thuja; Populus; Chimaph*. See Diosma.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture or tea from leaves.

bellis-perennis.name: Bellis Perennis
bellis-perennis.essence:
It acts upon the muscular fibers of the blood-vessels. Much muscular soreness. Lameness, as if sprained. Venous congestion, due to mechanical causes. First remedy in injuries to the deeper tissues, after major surgical work. Results of injuries to nerves with intense soreness and intolerance of cold bathing. After gout, debility of limbs.

Traumatism of the pelvic organs, auto-traumatism, expresses the condition calling for this remedy; ill effects from masturbation. Excellent remedy for sprains...

agg: hot bath and warmth of bed

complementary: Arnica; Arsenic; Staphis; Hamamelis; Bryonia; Vanadium

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Daisy
It acts upon the muscular fibers of the blood-vessels. Much muscular soreness. Lameness, as if sprained. Venous congestion, due to mechanical causes. First remedy in injuries to the deeper tissues, after major surgical work. Results of injuries to nerves with intense soreness and intolerance of cold bathing. After gout, debility of limbs.
Traumatism of the pelvic organs, auto-traumatism, expresses the condition calling for this remedy; ill effects from masturbation. Excellent remedy for sprains and bruises. Complaints due to cold food or drink when the body is heated, and in affections due to cold wind. Externally, in naevi. Acne. *Boils all over. Sore, bruised feeling in the pelvic region*. Exudations, stasis, swelling, come within the range of this remedy. Rheumatic symptoms. Does not vitiate the secretions. "It is a princely remedy for old laborers, especially gardeners" (Burnett).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo in elderly people. Headache from occiput to top of head. Forehead feels contracted. *Bruised soreness*. Itching around scalp and over back, worse from hot bath and bed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Breasts and uterus engorged. Varicose veins in pregnancy. *During pregnancy inability to walk*. Abdominal muscles lame. *Uterus feels sore, as if squeezed*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Wakes early in morning and cannot get to sleep again.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Soreness of abdominal walls and of uterus*. Stitches in spleen, sore, enlarged. Yellow, painless diarrhoea, foul odor, worse at night. Bloated; rumbling in bowels.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Boils*. Ecchymosis, swelling, very sensitive to touch. Venous congestion due to mechanical causes. Varicose veins with bruised sore feeling. Exudations and swellings. Acne.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Joints sore, muscular soreness. Itching on back and flexor surfaces of thighs. Pain down anterior of thighs. Wrist feels contracted as from elastic band around joint. Sprains feels contracted as from elastic band around joint. Sprains with great soreness. *Railway spine*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Arnica; Arsenic; Staphis; Hamamelis; Bryonia; Vanadium* (degenerative states).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse, left side*; hot bath and warmth of bed; before storms; cold bathing; cold wind.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture to third potency.

benzolum.name: Benzolum
benzolum.essence:
The most striking fact in the proving of Benzol seems to be the influence it had on the circulatory system. It caused a slowing of the pulse stream which in the guinea-pigs brought about the formation of infarcts. In the human provers it resulted in a *decrease of the red and increase of white cells* (R. F. Rabe, M. D).

It ought to be of use in Leucaemia. Eye symptoms striking. Hallucinations-Epileptiform attacks, coma, and anaesthesia.

complementary: Rolling of eyeballs in their vertical axis; pupils dilated

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Benzol, C6, H6 (BENZENUM - COAL NAPHTHA)
The most striking fact in the proving of Benzol seems to be the influence it had on the circulatory system. It caused a slowing of the pulse stream which in the guinea-pigs brought about the formation of infarcts. In the human provers it resulted in a *decrease of the red and increase of white cells* (R. F. Rabe, M. D).
It ought to be of use in Leucaemia. Eye symptoms striking. Hallucinations-Epileptiform attacks, coma, and anaesthesia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Sense of falling through bed and floor. Pains from below upward. Tired and nervous.
Frontal headache to root of nose. Dizzy. Pressing feeling in head. Right sided headache.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Illusion of vision with wide open eyes. Twitching of lids. Photophobia, objects blurred. Aching in eyes and lids. Marked dilation of pupils. Failure to react to light, particularly daylight.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Profuse fluent coryza. Especially in afternoon. Violent sneezing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Swelling of right testicle. Severe pain in testicles. Itching of scrotum. Profuse urination.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heavy limbs, cold legs, exaggerated knee-jerk. Pains from below upward.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Eruption like measles. Perspiration on side not lain upon. Itching all over back.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse* at night. Worse right side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Benzin*.--Petroleum ether-not as pure a compound as Benzene (Benzol). It is the same, but with a mixture of hydrocarbons. It seems to exercise a special influence on the nervous system and on the blood. Oxyhemoglobinemia. Physical weakness, cramps, exaggeration of knee jerks, nausea, vomit, dizziness, *heaviness* and coldness of limbs. Tremor of eyelids and tongue. *Benzin, dinitricum*--D. N. B.--(The most obvious results of poisoning by skin absorption are changes in the red blood corpuscles and liver degeneration in amblyopia, color-blindness, retinitis. Field of vision contracted. Black urine). *Benzin nitricum. Mirbane* (Dark, black blood, coagulates with difficulty; venous hyperaemia of the brain and general venous engorgement. Burning taste in mouth. Blue lips, tongue, skin, nails and conjunctivae. Cold skin, pulse small, weak, breathing slow and irregular, unconsciousness, symptoms of apoplectic coma. *Rolling of eyeballs in their vertical axis; pupils dilated*. Nystagmus. Respiration very slow, difficult, sighing). *Trinitrotoluene* (T. N. T), Trotyl-is a high explosive, obtained by nitrating toluene-a product of coal tar distillation.
When the skin or hair is exposed to T.N.T by contact a characteristic yellow or tawny-orange stain is produce, which lasts for some weeks. Indicated in graver forms of anaemia (pernicious) and jaundice. Produces fatal toxic jaundice.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency.

benzoicum-acidum.name: Benzoicum Acidum
benzoicum-acidum.essence: The most marked characteristic pertains to the odor and color of the urine. It has a marked action on metabolism. It produces and cures symptoms of a uric acid diathesis, with urine highly colored and very offensive, and gouty symptoms. Renal insufficiency. Child wants to be nursed in the arms, will not be laid down. Pains suddenly change their locality. Anti-sycotic. Gouty and asthmatic.

complementary: Nitric acid; Ammon benz; Sabina; Tropoeolum

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cold hands, feet, back, knees. Chilliness; cold sweat. Internal heat on awakening.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Red spots. Itching in spots.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, in open air; by uncovering.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Useful after Colchic fails in gout; after Copavia in gonorrhoea.
Compare: *Nitric acid; Ammon benz; Sabina; Tropoeolum*.
Garden Nasturtium--(*fetid urine*).
Antidote: *Copaiva*.
Incompatible: *Wine*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to sixth potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Benzoic Acid
The most marked characteristic pertains to the odor and color of the urine. It has a marked action on metabolism. It produces and cures symptoms of a uric acid diathesis, with urine highly colored and very offensive, and gouty symptoms. Renal insufficiency. Child wants to be nursed in the arms, will not be laid down. Pains suddenly change their locality. Anti-sycotic. Gouty and asthmatic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Prone to dwell on unpleasant things in the past. Omits words in writing. Depression.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo inclination to fall sideways. Throbbing in temporal arteries, causes puffing around ears. Noises when swallowing. Ulceration of tongue. Swelling behind ears (*Caps*). Cold sweat on forehead. Pricking, puckered constriction of mouth, bluish and bleeding gums. Wens.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching of septum. Pain in nasal bones.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Copper-colored spots. Red, with little blisters. Circumscribed redness of cheeks.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sweat while eating; pressure in stomach, sensation of a lump.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cutting about navel. Stitching in liver region.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stitches and *constricted* feeling. Puckering constriction of rectum. Itching and watery elevations around anus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frothy, *offensive, liquid*, light-colored, like soapsuds, bowel movements, mostly windy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Repulsive odor*; changeable color; brown, acid. *Enuresis*; dribbling, *offensive urine of old men*. Excess of uric acid. Vesical catarrh from suppressed gonorrhoea. Cystitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hoarse in morning. Asthmatic cough; worse at night; lying on right side. Chest very tender. Pain in region of heart. Expectoration, green mucus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pressure on spinal column. Coldness in sacrum. Dull pain in region of kidneys; worse, wine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Joints crack on motion. Tearing with stitches. *Pain in tendo Achillis*. Rheumatic gout; nodes very painful. Gouty deposits. Ganglion; swelling of the wrist. Pain and swelling in knees. Bunion of great toe. Tearing pain in great toe.

berberis-vulgaris.name: Berberis Vulgaris
berberis-vulgaris.essence:
Rapid change of symptoms-pains change in regard to place and character-thirst alternates with thirstlessness, hunger, and loss of appetite, etc. Acts forcibly on the venous system, producing pelvic engorgements and haemorrhoids.

Hepatic, and rheumatic affections, particularly with urinary, haemorrhoidal and menstrual complaints.

Old gouty constitutions. Pain in region of kidneys is most marked; hence its use in renal and vesical troubles, gall-stones, and vesical catarrh. It causes inflammatio...

agg: motion, *standing*. It brings on, or increases, urinary complaints

complementary: Aloe; Lycopod; Nux; Sarsap. Xanthorrhea arborea

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, motion, *standing*. It brings on, or increases, urinary complaints.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cold sensation in various parts, as if spattered with cold water. Warmth in lower part of back, hips, and thighs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Barberry
Rapid change of symptoms-pains change in regard to place and character-thirst alternates with thirstlessness, hunger, and loss of appetite, etc. Acts forcibly on the venous system, producing pelvic engorgements and haemorrhoids.
Hepatic, and rheumatic affections, particularly with urinary, haemorrhoidal and menstrual complaints.
Old gouty constitutions. Pain in region of kidneys is most marked; hence its use in renal and vesical troubles, gall-stones, and vesical catarrh. It causes inflammation of kidneys with haematuria. Pains may be felt all over body, emanating from small of back. It has also marked action on the liver, promoting the flow of bile. Often called for in arthritic affections with urinary disturbances. Wandering, *radiating* pains. Acts well in fleshy persons, good livers, but with little endurance. Spinal irritation. All Berberis pains radiate, are not worse by pressure, but worse in various attitudes, especially standing and active exercise.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Listless, apathetic, indifferent. Puffy sensation, feeling as if becoming larger. Vertigo with attacks of fainting. Frontal headache. Chilliness in back and occiput. Tearing pain in auricle, and gouty concretions. *Sensation of a tight cap pressing upon the whole scalp*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry; obstinate catarrh of left nostril. Crawling in nostrils.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pale, sickly. Sunken cheeks and eyes, with bluish circles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sticky sensation. Diminished saliva. Sticky, frothy saliva, like cotton (*Nux mosch*). Tongue feels scalded, vesicles on tongue.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Nausea before breakfast*. Heartburn.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stitches in region of gall-bladder; worse, pressure, extending to stomach. Catarrh of the gall-bladder with constipation and yellow complexion. Stitching pain in front of kidneys extending to liver, spleen, stomach, groins, Poupart's ligament. Sticking deep in ilium.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constant urging to stool. Diarrhoea painless, clay-colored, burning, and smarting in anus and perineum. Tearing around anus. *Fistula in ano*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning pains. Sensation as if some urine remained after urinating. Urine with thick *mucus and bright-red*, mealy sediment. Bubbling, sore sensation in kidneys. Pain in bladder region. *Pain in the thighs and loins on urinating*. Frequent urination; urethra burns when not urinating.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Neuralgia of spermatic cord and testicles. Smarting, burning, stitching in testicles, in prepuce and scrotum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pinching constriction in mons veneris, vaginismus, contraction and tenderness of vagina. Burning and soreness in vagina. Desire diminished, cutting pain during coition. Menses scanty, gray mucus, with pain in kidneys and chilliness, pain down thighs. Leucorrhoea, grayish mucus, with painful urinary symptoms. Neuralgia of ovaries and vagina.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hoarseness; polypus of larynx. Tearing stitches in chest and region of heart.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stitches in neck and back; worse, respiration. Sticking pain in region of kidneys radiating thence around abdomen, to hips and groins. Numb, bruised sensation. Stitches from kidneys into bladder. Tearing, sticking with stiffness, making rising difficult, involving hips, nates, limbs, with numbness. Lumbago (*Rhus; Tart em*). Metatarsus and metacarpus feel sprained. Post-operative pain in lumbar region; soreness with sharp pain following course of circumflex iliac nerve to bladder with frequent urination.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rheumatic paralytic pain in shoulders, arms, hands and fingers, legs and feet. *Neuralgia under finger-nails*, with swelling of finger-joints. Sensation of cold on outside of thighs. Heels pain, as if ulcerated. Stitching between metatarsal bones as from a nail when standing. Pain in balls of feet on stepping. Intense weariness and lameness of legs after walking a short distance.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Flat warts. *Itching*, burning and smarting; *worse, scratching*; better, cold applications. Small pustules over whole body. Eczema of *anus* and *hands*. *Circumscribed pigmentation* following eczematous inflammation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Ipomea-Convolvulus Duratinus*-Morning Glory. --(Pain in left lumbar muscles on stooping. Kidney disorders with pain in back. Much abdominal flatulence. Aching in top of right shoulder renal colic; aching in small of back and extremities), *Aloe; Lycopod; Nux; Sarsap. Xanthorrhea arborea* (severe pain in kidneys, cystitis and gravel. Pain from ureter to bladder and testicles; pain in small of back returns from least chill or damp). *Xanthoriza apifolia*-Shrub Yellow Root--contains Berberine. Dilatation of stomach and intestines, atony, enlarged spleen.
Antidotes: *Camphor; Bell*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to sixth potency.

berberis-aquifolium.name: Berberis Aquifolium
berberis-aquifolium.essence: A remedy for the skin, chronic catarrhal affections, secondary syphilis. Hepatic torpor, lassitude and other evidences of incomplete metamorphosis; stimulates all glands and improves nutrition.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Mountain Grape (BERBERIS AQUIFOLIUM - MAHONIA)
A remedy for the skin, chronic catarrhal affections, secondary syphilis. Hepatic torpor, lassitude and other evidences of incomplete metamorphosis; stimulates all glands and improves nutrition.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation of a band just above ears. Bilious headache. "Scald head". Scaly eczema.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Acne. Blotches and pimples. Clears the complexion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue thickly coated, yellowish-brown; feels blistered. Burning in stomach. Nausea and hunger after eating.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stitching, crampy pains; thick mucus, and bright-red, mealy sediment.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pimply, dry, rough, scaly*. Eruption *on scalp extending to face* and neck. Tumor of breast, with pain. Psoriasis. Acne. Dry eczema. Pruritus. Glandular induration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Carbol acid; Euonym; Berb vulg; Hydr*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture in rather material doses.

bismutum-subnitricum-o.name: Bismutum Subnitricum (+ -o.)
bismutum-subnitricum-o.essence: Irritation and catarrhal inflammation of the alimentary canal, is the chief and action of this drug.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Precipitated Sub-Nitrate of Bismuth (BISMUTHUM)
Irritation and catarrhal inflammation of the alimentary canal, is the chief and action of this drug.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Solitude is unbearable. *Desire for company*. Complains about his condition. *Anguish*. Discontented.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Headache alternates with gastralgia. Neuralgic pain, as if torn by pincers; involves face and teeth; worse, eating; better, cold; alternate with gastralgia. Cutting or pressure above right orbit extending to occiput. Pressure in occiput; worse, motion; with heaviness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Gums swollen*. Toothache; better, cold water in mouth (*Coff*). Tongue white. Swollen. Black, gangrenous looking wedges on dorsum and sides of tongue. Profuse salivation, teeth loose. Thirst for cold drinks.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Vomits, with convulsive gagging and pain. *Water is vomited as soon as it reaches the stomach*. Eructation after drinking. Vomits all fluids. *Burning; feeling of a load*. Will eat for several days; then vomit. Slow digestion, with *fetid* eructations. Gastralgia; pain from stomach through to spine. Gastritis. *Better, cold drinks*, but vomiting when stomach becomes full.
Tongue coated white; sweetish, metallic taste. Inexpressible pain in stomach; must bend backwards. Pressure as from a load in one spot, alternating with burning, crampy pain and pyrosis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Painless diarrhoea, with great thirst, and frequent micturition and vomiting. Pinching in lower abdomen, with rumbling.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pinching in middle of diaphragm, extending transversely through chest. Angina pectoris; pain around heart, left arm to fingers.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cramps in hands and feet. Tearing in wrist. Paralytic weakness, especially right arm. Tearing in tips of fingers under nails (*Berb*). Itching erosion near tibia and back of feet near joints. Cold limbs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Restless on account of voluptuous dreams. Sleepy in morning, a few hours after eating.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Nux; Capsic; Calc*.
Compare: *Antimon; Ars; Bellad; Kreosot*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to sixth potency.

blatta-orientalis.name: Blatta Orientalis
blatta-orientalis.essence:
A remedy for asthma. Especially when associated with bronchitis. Indicated after arsenic when this is insufficient.

Cough with *dyspnoea* in bronchitis and phthisis. Acts best in stout and corpulent patients. Much pus-like mucus.
blatta-orientalis.dosing: Lowest potencies during an attack. After the spasm, for the remaining cough, use the higher. Stop with improvement to prevent return of aggravation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Indian Cockroach
A remedy for asthma. Especially when associated with bronchitis. Indicated after arsenic when this is insufficient.
Cough with *dyspnoea* in bronchitis and phthisis. Acts best in stout and corpulent patients. Much pus-like mucus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lowest potencies during an attack. After the spasm, for the remaining cough, use the higher. Stop with improvement to prevent return of aggravation.

blatta-americana.name: Blatta Americana
blatta-americana.essence: Ascites. Various forms of dropsy. Yellow complexion. Extreme weariness. Pain in urethra on urinating. Weariness on going upstairs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Cockroach
Ascites. Various forms of dropsy. Yellow complexion. Extreme weariness. Pain in urethra on urinating. Weariness on going upstairs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency.

polyporus-officinalis.name: Polyporus Officinalis
polyporus-officinalis.essence: Quotidian intermittent fever. Sweat is light, and without relief. Night-sweat in phthisis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
White Agaric (POLYPORUS OFFICINALE)
Quotidian intermittent fever. Sweat is light, and without relief. Night-sweat in phthisis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels light and hollow with deep frontal headache. Thick, yellow coating of tongue; teeth indented. Constant nausea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chilliness along spine, with frequent, hot flashes. Yawns and stretches when chilly. Severe aching in shoulders and joints and small of back. *Profuse perspiration at night*, with hectic chills and fever.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hot and dry, especially in palms. Itching more between scapulae and on forearms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Agaricin*, active constituent of Polyporus officinale (phthisical and other enervating nightsweats 1-4 to 1-2 gr doses; also in chorea, in dilatation of heart with pulmonary Emphysema, fatty degeneration, profuse perspiration and erythema). *Boletus luridus* (Violent pain in epigastrium, urticaria tuberosa). *Boletus satanus* (dysentery, vomiting, great debility, cold extremities, spasm of extremities and face).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First attenuation.

boricum-acidum.name: Boricum Acidum
boricum-acidum.essence:
Used as an antiseptic disinfectant, since it arrests fermentation and putrefaction.

Pain in region of ureters, with frequent urging to urinate. *Coldness* (*Heloderm*). *Diabetes*, tongue dry, red, and cracked. Cold saliva.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Boracic Acid
Used as an antiseptic disinfectant, since it arrests fermentation and putrefaction.
Pain in region of ureters, with frequent urging to urinate. *Coldness* (*Heloderm*). *Diabetes*, tongue dry, red, and cracked. Cold saliva.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Multiform erythema of trunk and upper extremities. OEdema around eyes. Exfoliating dermatitis. OEdema of tissues around eyes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Climacteric flushings (*Lach; Amyl nit*). Vagina cold, as if packed with ice. Frequent urination with burning and tenesmus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third trituration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: When the diplococcus of Weichselbaum is present in the sputum of pharyngitis or bronchitis, pneumonia with tenacious sputum, hacking cough and pain, five-grain doses six times daily. A solution of Boracic Acid, as an injection, in chronic, cystitis, or, a teaspoonful to a glass of hot milk, taken internally. Boro-Glyceride in solution (1:40) is a powerful antiseptic. *Styes*, 15 gr to 1 oz water externally. As a dusting powder on ulcerated surfaces. In cystitis as an irrigating fluid.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Yellow Viper (BOTHROPS LANCIOLATUS - LACHESIS LANCIOLATUS)
Its venom is most coagulating, (also *Lachesis*). We should expect to find under these remedies the symptomatology of thrombosis, also thrombotic phenomena, as hemiplegia, aphasia, inability to articulate (Linn J. Boyd).
Broken-down, haemorrhagic constitutions; septic states. Great lassitude and sluggishness; haemorrhages from every orifice of the body; black spots. Hemiplegia with aphasia. Inability to articulate, without any affection of the tongue. Nervous trembling. Pain in right big toe. Diagonal course of symptoms. Pulmonary congestion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Amaurosis; blindness from haemorrhage into retina. Hemoralopia, day blindness, can hardly see her way after sunrise; conjunctivial haemorrhage.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Swollen and puffy. Besotted expression.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Red, dry, constricted; swallowing difficult, cannot pass liquids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Epigastric distress. Black vomiting. Intense haematemesis. Tympanitis and bloody stools.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Swollen, livid, cold with haemorrhagic infiltration. Gangrene. Lymphatics swollen. Anthrax. Malignant erysipelas.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, right side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Toxicophis*.--Moccasin Snake (pain and fever *recur* annually, after bite from this snake, and sometimes change location with disappearance of first symptoms. An unusual dryness of skin follows the bite. OEdematous swellings and periodical neuralgia. Pain travels from one part to another). Other snake poisons, notably *Lachesis*.
*Trachinus*,-Stingfish (intolerable pains, swelling, acute blood, poisoning, gangrene).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth potency.

botulinum.name: Botulinum
botulinum.essence:
Food poisoning from canned spinach produced a clinical picture suggested in a bulbar paresis.

Eye symptoms, ptosis, double vision, blurred vision.

Difficulty in swallowing and breathing, choking sensation; weakness and uncertainty in walking, "blind staggers", dizziness, thickening of speech. Cramping pain in stomach.

Mask-like expression of face, due to weakness of facial muscles. Severe constipation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Toxin of Bacillus Botulinum
Food poisoning from canned spinach produced a clinical picture suggested in a bulbar paresis.
Eye symptoms, ptosis, double vision, blurred vision.
Difficulty in swallowing and breathing, choking sensation; weakness and uncertainty in walking, "blind staggers", dizziness, thickening of speech. Cramping pain in stomach.
Mask-like expression of face, due to weakness of facial muscles. Severe constipation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Higher potencies.

bovista-lycoperdon.name: Bovista Lycoperdon
bovista-lycoperdon.essence: Has a marked effect on the skin, producing eruption like eczema, also upon the circulation, predisposing to haemorrhages; marked languor and lassitude. Adapted to stammering children, old maids with palpitation; and "tettery" patients. Stage of numbness and tingling in multiple neuritis. Asphyxia due to charcoal fumes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Puff-Ball (BOVISTA)
Has a marked effect on the skin, producing eruption like eczema, also upon the circulation, predisposing to haemorrhages; marked languor and lassitude. Adapted to stammering children, old maids with palpitation; and "tettery" patients. Stage of numbness and tingling in multiple neuritis. Asphyxia due to charcoal fumes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Enlarged sensation* (*Arg n*). Awkward; *everything falls from hands*. Sensitive.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation *as if head were enlarging*, especially of occiput. Distensive headache; worse early morning, open air, lying. Discharge from nose *stringy*, tough. Dull, bruised pain in brain. *Stammering* (*Stram; Merc*). Scalp itches; worse, warmth; sensitive; must scratch until sore.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scurf and crusts about nostrils and corners of mouth. Lips chapped. Bleeding of nose and gums. Cheeks and lips feel swollen. *Acne* worse in summer; due to use of cosmetics.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation as of a lump of ice. Intolerant of tight clothing around waist.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Diarrhoea before and during menses*. Menses too early and profuse; *worse at night*. Voluptuous sensation. Leucorrhoea acrid, thick, tough, greenish, follows menses. *Cannot bear tight clothing around waist (Lach). Traces of menses between menstruation*. Soreness of pubes during menses. Metrorrhagia; Parovarian cysts.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
*Colic*, with red urine; *relieved by eating*. Must bend double. Pain around umbilicus. Stitches through perineum towards rectum and genitals.
Chronic diarrhoea of old people; worse at night and early morning.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Great weakness of all joints; clumsiness with her hands, drops things from hands. Weariness of hands and feet. Sweat in axillae; *onion smell*. *Tip of coccyx itches intolerably*. Moist eczema on back of hand. Itching of feet and legs. OEdema in joints after fracture.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Blunt instrument leave deep impression on the skin. *Urticaria on excitement*, with rheumatic lameness, palpitation and diarrhoea (*Dulc*). Itching on getting warm. Eczema, moist; formation of thick crusts. Pimples cover the entire body; scurvy; herpetic eruptions. Pruritus ani. Urticaria on waking in the morning, worse from bathing. Pellagra.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
*Bovista* antidotes tar applications. Suffocation from gas. After *Rhus* in chronic urticaria.
Compare: *Calc; Rhus; Sepia; Cicuta*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to sixth potency.

brachyglottis-repanda.name: Brachyglottis Repanda
brachyglottis-repanda.essence: *Fluttering sensation* (*Caladium*). Kidney and bladder symptoms predominate. Produces symptoms of albuminuria. Itching in ears and nostrils. *Bright's disease*. Oppression of chest. Writer's cramp.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Puka-Puka (BRACHYGLOTTIS)
*Fluttering sensation* (*Caladium*). Kidney and bladder symptoms predominate. Produces symptoms of albuminuria. Itching in ears and nostrils. *Bright's disease*. Oppression of chest. Writer's cramp.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feeling as if something rolling about. Fluttering in region of ovary.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pressure in neck of bladder; urging to urinate. Sense of swashing in bladder. Soreness in urethra; feeling as if urine could not be retained. Urine contains mucous corpuscles and epithelium, albumen and casts.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cramp in fingers, thumb, and wrist when writing-soreness extending along flexor carpi ulnaris.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Apis; Helonias; Merc cor; Plumbum*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

bromum.name: Bromum
bromum.essence: Most marked effects are seen in the respiratory symptoms, especially in larynx and trachea. It seems to affect especially scrofulous children with enlarged glands. *Blond type*. Enlarged parotid and goitre. Tendency to spasmodic attacks. *Left-sided mumps*. Sense of suffocation; excoriating discharges, profuse sweats and great weakness. Complaints from being over-heated. *Tendency to infiltrate glands, become hard, but seldom suppurate*.

agg: from evening, until midnight, and when sitting in warm room
warm damp weather when at rest and lying left side

complementary: Conium; Spongia; Iod; Aster; Arg nit

bromum.dosing: First to third attenuation. Must be prepared fresh, as it is liable to rapid deterioration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, from evening, until midnight, and when sitting in warm room; warm damp weather when at rest and lying left side. *Better*, from any motion; exercise, at sea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Bromine (BROMUM)
Most marked effects are seen in the respiratory symptoms, especially in larynx and trachea. It seems to affect especially scrofulous children with enlarged glands. *Blond type*. Enlarged parotid and goitre. Tendency to spasmodic attacks. *Left-sided mumps*. Sense of suffocation; excoriating discharges, profuse sweats and great weakness. Complaints from being over-heated. *Tendency to infiltrate glands, become hard, but seldom suppurate*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Delusion that strange persons are looking over patient's shoulder and that she would see some one on turning. Quarrelsome.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Megrim of left side; worse stooping, especially after drinking milk. Headache; worse heat of sun and by rapid motion. Sharp pain through eyes. Dizzy when crossing stream of water.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coryza, with corrosive soreness of nose. Stoppage of right nostril. Pressure at root of nose. *Tickling, smarting, as from cobwebs*. Fan-like motion of alae (*Lyc*). Bleeding from nose relieving the chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Throat feels raw, evening, with hoarseness. Tonsils pain on swallowing, deep red, with network of dilated blood vessels. Tickling in trachea during inspiration. Hoarseness coming on from being overheated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sharp burning from tongue to stomach. Pressure as of stone. Gastralgia; better eating. Tympanitic distention of abdomen. Painful haemorrhoids, with black stool.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Whooping cough (Use persistently for about ten days). *Dry cough, with hoarseness* and burning pain *behind sternum. Spasmodic cough, with rattling of mucus* in the larynx; suffocative. *Hoarseness. Croup* after febrile symptoms have subsided. Difficult and painful breathing. Violent cramping of chest. Chest pains run upward. *Cold sensation when inspiring*. Every inspiration provokes cough. *Laryngeal diphtheria*, membrane begins in larynx and spreads upward. Spasmodic constriction. Asthma; difficulty in getting air *into* lung (*Chlorum*, in expelling). Better at sea, of seafaring men when they come on land. Hypertrophy of heart from gymnastics (*Rhus*). Fibrinous bronchitis, great dyspnoea. Bronchial tubes feel filled with smoke.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Swelling of testicles. Indurated, with pains worse slight jar.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Swelling of ovaries. Menses too early; too profuse, with membranous shreds. Low spirited before menses. Tumor in breasts, with stitching pains; worse left. Stitch pains from breast to axillae. Sharp shooting pain in left breast, worse, pressure.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Full of dreams and anguish; jerking and starting during sleep, full of fantasy and illusions; difficult to go to sleep at night, cannot sleep enough in morning; trembling and weak on awaking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Acne, pimples and pustules. Boils on arms and face. *Glands stony, hard, especially on lower jaw* and throat. Hard goitre (*Spong*). Gangrene.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Ammon carb; Camph*. Salt inhibits the action of Brom.
Compare: *Conium; Spongia; Iod; Aster; Arg nit*. Avoid milk when taking Brom. *Hydrobromic acid* (Throat dry and puckering; constriction in pharynx and chest; waves of heat over face and neck; pulsating tinnitus with great nervous irritability (Houghton); vertigo, palpitation; arms heavy; seemed as if parts did not belong to him. Seems to have a specific effect on the inferior cervical ganglion, increasing the tonic action of the sympathetic, thus promoting vaso-constriction. Relieves headache, tinnitus and vertigo, especially in vaso-motor stomach disturbance. Dose, 20 minims).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third attenuation. Must be prepared fresh, as it is liable to rapid deterioration.

bufo-rana.name: Bufo Rana
bufo-rana.essence:
Acts on the nervous system and skin. Uterine symptoms marked. Lymphangitis of septic origin. Symptoms of paralysis agitans. Striking rheumatic symptoms.

Arouses the lowest passions. Causes a desire for intoxicating drink, and produces impotence.

Of use in feeble-minded children. Prematurely senile. Epileptic symptoms. Convulsive seizures occur during sleep at night. More or less connected with derangements of the sexual sphere, seem to come within the range of this remedy. Injuries to fingers;...

amel: from putting feet in hot water

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Poison of the Toad (BUFO)
Acts on the nervous system and skin. Uterine symptoms marked. Lymphangitis of septic origin. Symptoms of paralysis agitans. Striking rheumatic symptoms.
Arouses the lowest passions. Causes a desire for intoxicating drink, and produces impotence.
Of use in feeble-minded children. Prematurely senile. Epileptic symptoms. Convulsive seizures occur during sleep at night. More or less connected with derangements of the sexual sphere, seem to come within the range of this remedy. Injuries to fingers; pain runs in streaks up the arms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Anxious about health. Sad, restless. Propensity to bite. Howling; impatient; nervous; imbecile. *Desire for solitude. Feeble-minded*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation as if hot vapor rose to top of head. Numbness of brain. Face bathed in sweat. Epistaxis with flushed face and pain in forehead, better, nosebleed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cannot bear sight or brilliant objects. Little blisters form on eye.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Music is unbearable (*Ambra*). Every little noise distresses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels too large. Palpitation. Constriction about heart. Sensation of heart swimming in water.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses too early and copious, clots and bloody discharge at other times; watery leucorrhoea. Excitement, with epileptic attacks. Epilepsy at time of menses. Induration in mammary glands. Palliative in cancer of the mammae. Burning in ovaries and uterus. Ulceration of cervix. Offensive bloody discharge. Pains run into legs. Bloody milk. Milk-leg. Veins swollen. Tumors and polypi of womb.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Involuntary emissions; *impotence*, discharge too quick, spasms during coition. *Buboes*. Disposition to handle organs (*Hyos; Zinc*). Effects of onanism.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pains in loins, numbness of limbs, cramps, staggering gait, feeling as if a peg were driven in joints; swelling of bones.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Panaritium; *pain runs up arm*. Patches of skin lose sensation. Pustules, suppuration from every slight injury. Pemphigus. Bullae which open and leave a raw surface, exuding and ichorous fluid. Blisters on palms and soles. Itching and burning. Carbuncle.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Baryt carb; Asterias; Salamand* (Epilepsy and softening of brain).
Antidotes: *Laches; Seneg*.
Complementary: *Salamandra*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, in warm room, on awakening. *Better*, from bathing or cold air; from putting feet in hot water.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency and higher.

butyricum-acidum.name: Butyricum Acidum
butyricum-acidum.essence: A volatile acid obtained chiefly from butter (BUTYRIC ACID)

agg: at night, fast walking, going upstairs

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: A volatile acid obtained chiefly from butter (BUTYRIC ACID)

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Worries over trifles; impulsive thoughts of suicide; constant state of fear and nervousness. Headache makes him apprehensive about trifles; worse going upstairs or rapid motion. Dull, hazy ache of head.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Poor appetite. Much gas in stomach and bowels. Cramps in pit of stomach, worse at night. Stomach feels heavy and overloaded. Cramp in abdomen below umbilicus. Bowels irregular. Stool accompanied by pain and straining.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tired feeling and dull pain in small of back, worse walking. Pain in ankles and up back of leg. Pain low down in back and extremities.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pronounced sleeplessness; dreams of serious nature while asleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Perspiration on slight exertion. *Profuse, offensive sweat of feet*. Crumbling away of finger-nails.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, at night, fast walking, going upstairs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third attenuation.

cactus-grandiflorus.name: Cactus Grandiflorus
cactus-grandiflorus.essence: Acts on circular muscular fibers, hence constrictions. It is the heart and arteries especially that at once respond to the influence of Cactus, producing very characteristic *constrictions* as of an iron band. This sensation is found in various places, oesophagus, bladder, etc. The mental symptoms produced correspond to those found when there are heart affections, sadness, and melancholy. *Haemorrhage, constrictions, periodicity, and spasmodic pains*. Whole body feels as if caged, each wire bein...

agg: about noon, lying on left side
walking, going upstairs, 11 am and 11 pm

complementary: Digital; Spigel; Convallar; Kalmia; Naja; Magnol

cactus-grandiflorus.dosing: Tincture (best made from flowers), to third attenuation. Higher in nervous palpitation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: OEdema of hands and feet. Hands soft; feet enlarged. Numbness of left arm. Icy-cold hands. Restless legs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sleepless on account of pulsation in different parts of body. Frightful dreams.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Night-blooming Cereus (SELENICEREUS SPINULOSUS)
Acts on circular muscular fibers, hence constrictions. It is the heart and arteries especially that at once respond to the influence of Cactus, producing very characteristic *constrictions* as of an iron band. This sensation is found in various places, oesophagus, bladder, etc. The mental symptoms produced correspond to those found when there are heart affections, sadness, and melancholy. *Haemorrhage, constrictions, periodicity, and spasmodic pains*. Whole body feels as if caged, each wire being twisted tighter. Atheromatous arteries and weak heart. Congestions; irregular distribution of blood. *Favors formation of clots speedily*. Great periodicity. Toxic goitre with cardiac symptoms. Cactus is pulseless, panting and prostrated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Melancholy, taciturn, sad, ill-humored. Fear of death. Screams with pain. Anxiety.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Headache if obliged to pass dinner hour (*Ars; Lach; Lyc*). *Sensation as of a weight on vertex*. Right-sided pulsating pain. *Congestive headaches*, periodical, threatening apoplexy. Blood-vessels to the head distended. Feels as if head were compressed in a vise. Pulsation in ears. Dim sight. *Right sided prosopalgia*, constricting pains, returns at same hour daily (*Cedron*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Profuse bleeding from nose. Fluent coryza.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constriction of oesophagus. Dryness of tongue, as if burnt; needs much liquid to get food down. Suffocative constriction at throat, with full, throbbing carotids in angina pectoris.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Constriction*, pulsation, or heaviness in stomach. Vomiting of blood.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hard, black stools. Diarrhoea in morning. Haemorrhoids swollen and painful. Sensation of great weight in anus. Haemorrhage from bowels in malarial fevers and with heart symptoms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constriction of neck of bladder, causing retention of urine. Haemorrhage from bladder. Clots of blood in urethra. Constant urination.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constriction in uterine region and ovaries. *Dysmenorrhoea*; pulsating pain in uterus and ovaries. Vaginismus. Menses early, dark, pitch-like (*Cocc; Mag c*); cease on lying down, with heart symptoms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Oppressed breathing as from a weight on chest. *Constriction in chest, as if bound, hindering respiration*. Inflammation of diaphragm. *Heart-constriction, as from an iron band*. Angina pectoris. Palpitation; pain shooting down left arm. Haemoptysis, with convulsive, spasmodic cough. Diaphragmitis, with great difficulty of breathing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Endocarditis with mitral insufficiency together with violent and rapid action*. Acts best in the incipiency of cardiac incompetence. Heart weakness of arterio-sclerosis. Tobacco heart. Violent palpitation; *worse lying on left side, at approach of menses*. Angina pectoris, with suffocation, cold sweat, and ever-present iron band feeling. Pain in apex, shooting down left arm. Palpitation, with vertigo; dyspnoea, flatulence. *Constriction*; very acute pains and stitches in heart; pulse feeble, irregular, quick, without strength. Endocardial murmurs, excessive impulse, increased praecordial dullness, enlarged ventricle. Low blood pressure.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fever every day at same hour. Coldness in back and icy-cold hands. Intermittent; paroxysms about midday (11 am) incomplete in their stages, accompanied by haemorrhages. Coldness predominates; cold sweat, with great anguish. Persistent subnormal temperature.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, about noon, lying on left side; walking, going upstairs, 11 am and 11 pm. *Better*, open air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Acon; Camph; China*.
Compare: *Digital; Spigel; Convallar; Kalmia; Naja; Magnol*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture (best made from flowers), to third attenuation. Higher in nervous palpitation.

cadmium-bromatum.name: Cadmium Bromatum
cadmium-bromatum.essence: An important addition to the Materia Medica, especially since the provings by Diffenbach have precisionized its use. Radium brom of 1,800,000 radio-activity was employed. Found effective in the treatment of rheumatism and gout, in skin affections generally, acne rosacea, naevi, moles, ulcers and cancers. Lowered blood pressure. *Severe aching pains all over*, with restlessness, better moving about. Chronic rheumatic arthritis. Lateness in appearance of symptoms. Ulcers due to Radium burns, take ...

amel: open air, continued motion, hot bath, lying down, pressure

complementary: X-Ray; Rhus; Sepia; Uranium; Ars; Pulsat; Caustic

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Radium Bromide (RADIUM)
An important addition to the Materia Medica, especially since the provings by Diffenbach have precisionized its use. Radium brom of 1,800,000 radio-activity was employed. Found effective in the treatment of rheumatism and gout, in skin affections generally, acne rosacea, naevi, moles, ulcers and cancers. Lowered blood pressure. *Severe aching pains all over*, with restlessness, better moving about. Chronic rheumatic arthritis. Lateness in appearance of symptoms. Ulcers due to Radium burns, take a long time to heal. Marked increase in the polymorphonuclear neutrophiles. Great weakness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Apprehensive, depressed; fear of being alone in the dark; great desire to be with people. Tired and irritable.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo, with pain in back of head, left when in bed. Occipital and vertex pain, accompanying severe lumbar aching. Severe pain over right eye, spreading back to occiput and to vertex, better in open air. Head feels heavy. Frontal headache. Both eyes ache. Itching and dryness of nasal cavities, better in open air. Aching pain in angle of right lower jaw. Violent trifacial neuralgia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dryness of mouth. Metallic taste. Prickling sensation on end of tongue.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Empty feeling in stomach. Warm sensation in stomach. Aversion to sweets, ice-cream. Nausea and sinking sensation, belching of gas.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain, violent cramps, rumbling, full of gas; pain over McBurney's point, and at location of sigmoid flexure. Much flatulence. Alternating constipation and loose movements. Pruritus ani and piles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Increased elimination of solids, particularly of chlorides. Renal irritation, albuminuria, granular and hyaline casts. Nephritis with rheumatic symptoms. Enuresis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pruritus vulvae. Delayed and irregular menstruation and backache. Aching pains in abdomen over pubes when flow comes on. Right breast sore, relieved by hard rubbing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Persistent cough with tickling in suprasternal fossa. Dry, spasmodic cough. Throat dry, sore, chest constricted.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aching in back of neck. Pain and lameness in cervical vertebrae, worse dropping head forward, better standing, or sitting erect. *Lumbar and sacral* backache, pain appears to be in *bone*, continued motion relieves. Backache between shoulders and lumbar-sacral region, better after walking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Severe pain in all the limbs, *joints*, especially in knee and ankles, sharp pains in shoulders, arms, hands and fingers. Legs, arms and neck feel hard and brittle, as though they would break on moving. Arms feel heavy. Cracking in shoulder. *Pain in toes*, calves, hip-joint, popliteal spaces. Muscles of legs and hips sore. *Arthritis*, aching pains, *worse* at night. Dermatitis of the fingers. Trophic changes in the finger nails.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Small pimples. Erythema and dermatitis, with itching, burning, swelling and redness. Necrosis and ulceration. *Itching all over body*, burning of skin, as if afire. Epithelioma.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Restless. Sleepiness with lethargy. Dreams vivid, busy. Dreams of fire.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cold sensation internally, with chattering of teeth until noon. Internal chilliness followed by heat of the skin, associated with bowel movements and flatulence.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Better*, open air, continued motion, hot bath, lying down, pressure. *Worse*, getting up.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Anacardium* (the ulceration produced by it is like *Radium*. It may appear elsewhere than on place of contact and appear late). Compare: *X-Ray; Rhus; Sepia; Uranium; Ars; Pulsat; Caustic*.
Antidotes: *Rhus ven; Tellur*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thirtieth and twelfth trituration.

cadmium-sulphuratum.name: Cadmium Sulphuratum
cadmium-sulphuratum.essence:
Its pathogenesis gives symptoms corresponding to very low forms of disease, as in cholera, *yellow fever*, where, with exhaustion, vomiting, and *extreme prostration*, the disease runs deathward. Important gastric symptoms. Carcinoma ventriculi; persistent vomiting.

The attack is upon the stomach more especially. Patients must keep quiet.

*Chilliness and coldness* even when near the fire.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Cadmic Sulphate
Its pathogenesis gives symptoms corresponding to very low forms of disease, as in cholera, *yellow fever*, where, with exhaustion, vomiting, and *extreme prostration*, the disease runs deathward. Important gastric symptoms. Carcinoma ventriculi; persistent vomiting.
The attack is upon the stomach more especially. Patients must keep quiet.
*Chilliness and coldness* even when near the fire.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Unconscious. Vertigo; room and bed seem to spin around. Hammering in head. Heat in head.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Ozaena*. Tightness at root. Nose obstructed; *polypus*. Caries of nasal bones. Boils on nose. Nostrils ulcerated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Opacity of cornea*. Blue circle around eyes. One pupil dilated. Night blindness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Distortion of mouth. Trembling of jaw. *Facial paralysis*; more left side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Difficult swallowing. OEsophagus constricted (*Bapt*). Salty belching. Intense nausea, with pain and cold. Stringy, offensive exudation on mucous membrane. Salty taste.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sore throat, constant tickling; gagging and nausea, worse deep breathing; chilliness and aching.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Soreness in pit of stomach on pressure. Violent *nausea*; retching. *Black vomit*. Vomiting of mucus, green slime, blood, with great prostration, and great tenderness over the stomach. Burning and cutting pains in stomach. Carcinoma, helps the persistent vomiting. Coffee ground vomiting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sore, tender, tympanitic. Region of liver sore. Coldness. Black, offensive clots of blood from bowels. Pain in abdomen, with vomiting. Tenderness and tympanites.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bloody, black, and offensive. Gelatinous, yellowish green; semi-fluid, with urinary suppression.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rawness and soreness in urethra, urine mixed with pus and blood.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Palpitation, with constriction of chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Icy coldness* *(Camph; Verat; Heloderm). Yellow fever (Crotalus; Carbo).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Blue, yellow, sallow, scaly, cracking. Itching; better scratching. Chloasma, yellowish stains on nose and cheeks; worse exposure to sun and wind. Chilblains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stops breathing on going to sleep. Wakes up suffocating. Fears to go to sleep again. Protracted sleeplessness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, walking or carrying burdens; after sleep; from open air, stimulants. *Better*, eating and rest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Cadmium oxide; Cad brom* (pain and burning in stomach, and vomiting); *Cadmium jodat* (Itching of anus and rectum felt during the day only; constipation frequent desire, tenesmus, abdomen bloated); *Zinc; Ars; Carbo; Verat*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

cainca.name: Cainca
cainca.essence: This remedy has been found of use in dropsical affections. Its urinary symptoms are well marked. Albuminuria, with dyspnoea on lying down at night. Ascites and anasarca, with dry skin.
