materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Brazilian Plant-Chiococca (CAHINCA)
This remedy has been found of use in dropsical affections. Its urinary symptoms are well marked. Albuminuria, with dyspnoea on lying down at night. Ascites and anasarca, with dry skin.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constant desire to urinate. Polyuria while travelling. Urine fiery. Burning pain in urethra, especially glandular portion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Drawing in of testicles and spermatic cord. Pain worse during passage of pungent smelling urine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in region of kidneys; better lying bent backward. General fatigue.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Apocyn; Ars; Coffea* (similar botanically and in relieving effects of fatigue)

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency or lower.

cajuputum.name: Cajuputum
cajuputum.essence: Acts like Oil of Cloves. A remedy for *flatulence* and affections of the tongue. *Sense of enlargement*. Causes copious diaphoresis. Retrocedent gout. Neuralgic affections not inflammatory. Nervous dyspnoea.

complementary: Bovist; Nux mosch; Asaf; Ign; Bapt

cajuputum.dosing: First to third potency (5 drops of oil).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Cajuput Oil (OLEUM WITTNEBIANUM)
Acts like Oil of Cloves. A remedy for *flatulence* and affections of the tongue. *Sense of enlargement*. Causes copious diaphoresis. Retrocedent gout. Neuralgic affections not inflammatory. Nervous dyspnoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels much enlarged. As if he could not get himself together (*Baptisia*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Persistent sensation of choking. *Spasmodic stricture of oesophagus*. Constricted sensation on swallowing solid food. *Tongue feels swollen*, fills whole mouth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Hiccough*, on slightest provocation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Flatulence colic*; tympanites (*Tereb*). Nervous distention of bowels. Urine smells like cat's urine. Spasmodic cholera.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, about 5 am; night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Bovist; Nux mosch; Asaf; Ign; Bapt*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third potency (5 drops of oil).

caladium-seguinum.name: Caladium Seguinum
caladium-seguinum.essence: This remedy has a marked action on the genital organs, and pruritus of this region. Coldness of single parts and inclination to lie down, with aggravation on lying on left side. Slightest noise startles from sleep. *Dread from motion*. Modifies craving for tobacco. Tobacco heart. Asthmatic complaints.

amel: after sweat, after sleeping in daytime

complementary: Capsic; Phosph; Caust; Selen; Lyc. Ikshugandha

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sweet sweat-attracts flies. Insect bites burn and itch intensely. Itching rash alternates with asthma. *Burning sensation* and erysipelatous inflammation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Larynx seems constricted. Breathing impeded. Catarrhal asthma; mucus not readily raised. Patient afraid to go to sleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Better*, after sweat, after sleeping in daytime. *Worse*, motion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Incompatible: *Arum triph*.
Complementary: *Nitr ac*.
Compare: *Capsic; Phosph; Caust; Selen; Lyc. Ikshugandha* (sexual weakness, emissions, prostatic enlargement).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to sixth attenuation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
American Arum
This remedy has a marked action on the genital organs, and pruritus of this region. Coldness of single parts and inclination to lie down, with aggravation on lying on left side. Slightest noise startles from sleep. *Dread from motion*. Modifies craving for tobacco. Tobacco heart. Asthmatic complaints.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Headaches and mental states of smokers. Very forgetful, does not know about the occurrences of things. Confused headache with pain in shoulder, pressure in eyes and forehead; extremely sensitive to noise, throbbing in ear.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Gnawing in orifice of stomach, which prevents deep breathing and eructations. Eructations. *Stomach feels full of dry food; sensation of fluttering*. Acrid vomiting, thirstless and tolerates only warm drinks. Sighing respiration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pruritus*. Glans very red. Organs seem larger, puffed, relaxed, cold, sweating; skin of scrotum thick. Erections when half-asleep; cease when fully awake. *Impotency*; relaxation of penis during excitement. No emission and no orgasm during embrace.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pruritus of vulva* (*Ambr; Kreos*) and vagina during pregnancy (Hydrogen peroxyd 1: 12 locally). Voluptuousness. Cramp pains in uterus at night.

calcarea-acetica.name: Calcarea Acetica
calcarea-acetica.essence: Has had brilliant clinical results in inflammation of mucous membranes characterized by a *membranous exudation*; otherwise its action and application is like the carbonate. Cancer pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Acetate of Lime
Has had brilliant clinical results in inflammation of mucous membranes characterized by a *membranous exudation*; otherwise its action and application is like the carbonate. Cancer pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo in open air. *Senses obscure while reading. Megrim*, with great coldness in head and sour taste.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Membranous dysmenorrhoea (*Borax*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rattling expiration. *Cough loose, with expectoration of large pieces* like casts of bronchial tubes. Breathing difficult; better bending shoulders backward. Constrictive anxious sensation in chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Brom; Borax*; also *Calc oxal*, in excruciating pains of open cancer.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third trituration.

calcarea-arsenicosa.name: Calcarea Arsenicosa
calcarea-arsenicosa.essence: Epilepsy with rush of blood to the head before attack; aura felt in region of heart; flying sensation. Complaints in fat women around climacteric. Chronic malaria. Infantile enlarged liver and spleen. *Nephritis*, with great sensitiveness in kidney region. Complaints of drunkards after abstaining (*Carbon sulph*). Fleshy women at climacteric, *slightest emotion causing palpitation*. Dyspnoea, with feeble heart. *Chilliness*. Albuminuria. Dropsy. Affections of spleen and mesenteric glands. Hemogl...

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Arsenite of Lime (CALCAREA ARSENICA)
Epilepsy with rush of blood to the head before attack; aura felt in region of heart; flying sensation. Complaints in fat women around climacteric. Chronic malaria. Infantile enlarged liver and spleen. *Nephritis*, with great sensitiveness in kidney region. Complaints of drunkards after abstaining (*Carbon sulph*). Fleshy women at climacteric, *slightest emotion causing palpitation*. Dyspnoea, with feeble heart. *Chilliness*. Albuminuria. Dropsy. Affections of spleen and mesenteric glands. Hemoglobin and red corpuscles are low.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Anger, anxiety. Desire for company. Confusion, delusions, illusions. Great depression.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent rush of blood to head with vertigo. Pain in head *better by lying on painful side*. Weekly headache. Benumbling headache mostly around ears.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Region of stomach distended. Enlarged liver and spleen in children. Pancreatic disease; relieves burning pain in cancer of pancreas. Belching with saliva and beating of heart.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Kidney region sensitive to pressure*. Albuminuria, passes urine every hour.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constriction and pain in region of heart, suffocating feeling, *palpitation*, oppression and throbbing and pain in back extending to arms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Offensive, bloody leucorrhoea. Cancer of uterus; burning pain in uterus and vagina.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain and stiffness near nape of neck. Violent backache, throbbing, drives out of bed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Removes inflammatory products in veins of lower extremities. Weariness and lameness of lower limbs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse* from slight exertion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third trituration.

calcarea-fluorica.name: Calcarea Fluorica
calcarea-fluorica.essence: A powerful tissue remedy for hard, stony glands, varicose and enlarged veins, and malnutrition of bones. Hard knots in female breast. Goitre. Congenital hereditary syphilis. *Induration threatening suppuration*. Many cases of cataract have undoubtedly been influenced favorably by it. Congenital syphilis manifesting itself in ulcerating of mouth and throat, caries and necrosis with boring pains and heat in parts. Arterio-sclerosis; threatened apoplexy. Tuberculosis. Used after operations, the ten...

complementary: Con; Lapis; Baryt mur; Hecla; Rhus; Cacodylate of Soda

calcarea-fluorica.dosing: Third to twelfth trituration. A "chronic" remedy. Needs some time before manifesting its effects. Should not be repeated too frequently.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Fluoride of Lime (FLUOR SPAR)
A powerful tissue remedy for hard, stony glands, varicose and enlarged veins, and malnutrition of bones. Hard knots in female breast. Goitre. Congenital hereditary syphilis. *Induration threatening suppuration*. Many cases of cataract have undoubtedly been influenced favorably by it. Congenital syphilis manifesting itself in ulcerating of mouth and throat, caries and necrosis with boring pains and heat in parts. Arterio-sclerosis; threatened apoplexy. Tuberculosis. Used after operations, the tendency to adhesions is reduced.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Great depression; groundless fears of financial ruin.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Creaking noise in head. Blood-tumors of new-born infants. Hard excrescences on the scalp. Ulcers on the scalp with callous, hard edges.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Flickering and sparks before the eyes, spots on the cornea; conjunctivitis; cataract. *Strumous phlyctemular keratitis. Subcutaneous palpebral cysts*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Calcareous deposits on tympanum; sclerosis of ossicula and petrous portion of temporal bone, with deafness, ringing and roaring. *Chronic suppuration of middle ear*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cold in the head; stuffy cold; dry coryza; ozaena. Copious, offensive, thick, greenish, lumpy, yellow nasal catarrh. Atrophic rhinitis, especially if crusts are prominent.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hard swelling on the cheek, with pain or toothache, hard swelling on jaw-bone.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Gum-boil, with hard swelling on the jaw. Cracked appearance of the tongue, with or without pain. Induration of the tongue, hardening after inflammation. Unnatural looseness of the teeth, with or without pain; teeth become loose in their sockets. Toothache, with pain if any food touches the tooth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Follicular sore throat; plugs of mucus are continually forming in the crypts of the tonsils. Pain and burning in throat; better by warm drinks; worse, cold drinks. Hypertrophy of Luschka's tonsil. Relaxed uvula, tickling referred to larynx.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vomiting of infants. Vomiting of undigested food. Hiccough (*Cajup; Sulph ac*). Flatulency. Weakness and daintiness of appetite, nausea and distress after eating in young children who are overtaxed by studies. *Acute indigestion from fatigue and brain-fag*; much flatulence.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diarrhoea in gouty subjects. Itching of anus. Fissure of the anus, and intensely sore crack near the lower end of the bowel. Bleeding haemorrhoids. Itching of anus as from pin-worms. Internal or blind piles frequently, with pain in back, generally far down on the sacrum, and constipation. Much wind in lower bowels. Worse, pregnancy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hydrocele; indurations of the testicles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hoarseness. *Croup*. Cough with expectoration of tiny lumps of yellow mucus, with tickling sensation and irritation on lying down. Spasmodic cough. *Calc. Fluor* removes fibroid deposits about the endocardium and restores normal endocardial structure (Eli G. Jones, M. D).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chief remedy for vascular tumors with dilated blood-vessels, and for *varicose or enlarged veins*. Aneurism. Valvular disease. When the tuberculous toxins attack the heart and blood-vessels.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chronic *lumbago*; aggravated on beginning to move, and ameliorated on continued motion. Osseous tumors. *Rachitic enlargement of femur in infants*. Pain lower part of back, with burning.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ganglia or encysted tumors at the back of the wrist. Gouty enlargements of the joints of the fingers. Exostoses on fingers. Chronic synovitis of knee-joint.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vivid dreams, with sense of impending danger. Unrefreshing sleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Marked whiteness of skin. Scar tissue; adhesions after operations. Chaps and cracks. Fissures or cracks in the palms of the hands, or hard skin. Fissure of the anus. Suppurations with callous, hard edges. Whitlow. Indolent, fistulous ulcers, secreting thick, yellow pus. Hard, elevated edges of ulcer, surrounding skin purple and swollen. Knots, kernels, hardened glands in the female breast. *Swellings or indurated enlargements* having their seat in the *fasciae* and capsular ligaments of joints, or in the tendons. *Indurations of stony hardness*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, during rest, changes of weather. *Better*, heat, warm applications.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Con; Lapis; Baryt mur; Hecla; Rhus; Cacodylate of Soda* (Tumors).
*Calcar sulph-stibiata* (acts as an haemostatic and absorptive in uterine myoma).
*Mangifera indica* (varicose veins).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to twelfth trituration. A "chronic" remedy. Needs some time before manifesting its effects. Should not be repeated too frequently.

calcarea-iodata.name: Calcarea Iodata
calcarea-iodata.essence: It is in the treatment of scrofulous affections, especially enlarged glands, tonsils, etc, that this remedy has gained marked beneficial results. Thyroid enlargements about time of puberty. Flabby children subject to colds. Secretions inclined to be profuse and yellow. Adenoids. Uterine fibroids. *Croup*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Iodide of Lime
It is in the treatment of scrofulous affections, especially enlarged glands, tonsils, etc, that this remedy has gained marked beneficial results. Thyroid enlargements about time of puberty. Flabby children subject to colds. Secretions inclined to be profuse and yellow. Adenoids. Uterine fibroids. *Croup*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Headache while riding against cold wind. Lightheaded. Catarrh; worse at root of nose; sneezing; very little sensation. Polypi of nose and ear.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Enlarged tonsils are filled with little crypts.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chronic cough; Pain in chest, difficulty breathing after syphilis and mercurialization (Grauvogl). Hectic fever; green purulent expectoration. Croup. *Pneumonia*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Indolent ulcers, accompanying varicose veins*. Easy perspiration. Copper-colored and papulous eruptions, tinea, favus, crusta lactea, swelling of the glands, skin cracked, falling out of hair.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Agraphis*-Bluebell (adenoids with enlarged tonsils). Here *Sulph iod* follows both *Agraphis* and *Calc iod. Acon lycotonum* (swelling of glands, Hodgkin's disease).
Compare also: *Calc fluor; Sil; Merc iod*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second and third trituration.

calcarea-phosphorica.name: Calcarea Phosphorica
calcarea-phosphorica.essence: One of the most important tissue remedies, and while it has many symptoms in common with *Calcarea carb*, there are some differences and characteristic features of its own. It is especially indicated in tardy dentition and troubles incident to that period, bone disease non-union of fractured bones, and the anaemias after acute diseases and chronic wasting diseases. *Anaemic children who are peevish, flabby, have cold extremities and feeble digestion*. It has a special affinity where bones form s...

agg: exposure to damp, cold weather, melting snow

calcarea-phosphorica.dosing: First to third trituration. Higher potencies often more effective.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Phosphate of Lime
One of the most important tissue remedies, and while it has many symptoms in common with *Calcarea carb*, there are some differences and characteristic features of its own. It is especially indicated in tardy dentition and troubles incident to that period, bone disease non-union of fractured bones, and the anaemias after acute diseases and chronic wasting diseases. *Anaemic children who are peevish, flabby, have cold extremities and feeble digestion*. It has a special affinity where bones form sutures or symphyses, and all its symptoms are worse from any change of weather. *Numbness and crawling* are characteristic sensations, and tendency to perspiration and glandular enlargement are symptoms it shares with the carbonate. Scrofulosis, chlorosis and phthisis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Peevish, forgetful; after grief and vexation (*Ignat; Phos ac*). Always wants to go somewhere.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Headache, *worse near the region of sutures, from change of weather*, of school children about puberty. Fontanelles remain open too long. Cranial bones soft and thin. Defective hearing. Headache, with abdominal flatulence. Head hot, with smarting of roots of hair.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diffused opacity in cornea following abscess.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Swollen tonsils; cannot open mouth without pain. Complaints during teething; teeth develop slowly; rapid decay of teeth. *Adenoid growths*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Infant wants to nurse all the time and vomits easily. *Craving for bacon, ham, salted or smoked meats. Much flatulence*. Great hunger with thirst flatulence temporarily relieved by sour eructations. Heartburn. Easy vomiting in children.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *At every attempt* to eat, colicky pain in abdomen. *Sunken and flabby*. Colic, soreness and burning around navel.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bleeding after hard stool. Diarrhoea from juicy fruits or cider; during dentition. Green, slimy, *hot*, sputtering, undigested, *with fetid flatus*. Fistula in ano, alternating with chest symptoms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Increased, with sensation of weakness. Pain in region of kidneys when lifting or blowing the nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses too early, excessive, and bright in girls. If late, blood is dark; sometimes, first bright, then dark, with *violent backache*. During lactation with sexual excitement. Nymphomania, with aching, pressing, or weakness in uterine region (*Plat*). After prolonged nursing. Leucorrhoea, like *white of egg*. Worse morning. Child refuses breast; milk tastes salty. Prolapsus in debilitated persons.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Involuntary sighing. Chest sore. Suffocative cough; better lying down. Hoarseness. Pain through lower left lung.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rheumatic pain from draught of air, with stiffness and dullness of head. Soreness in sacro-iliac symphysis, as if broken (*Aesc hip*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stiffness and pain, *with cold, numb* feeling, worse any change of weather. Crawling and coldness. Buttocks, back and limbs asleep. Pains in joints and bones. Weary when going upstairs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Complementary: *Ruta; Hepar*.
Compare: *Calcar hypophosphorosa* (is to be preferred when it seems necessary to furnish the organism with liberal doses of phosphorus in consequence of continued abscesses having reduced the vitality. Give first and second decimal trits. Loss of appetite, rapid debility, night sweats; Acne pustulosa.--Pallor of skin, habitually *cold extremities*. Phthisis-diarrhoea and cough; acute pains in chest. Mesenteric tuberculosis. Bleeding from lungs; angina pectoris; asthma; affection of arteries. Veins stand out like whipcords. Attacks of pain occurring two hours after meals (relieved by a cup of milk or light food). *Cheiranthus* (effects of cutting wisdom teeth). *Calcarea renalis*-Lapis renalis--(arthritic nodosities. Rigg's disease; lessens tendency to accumulation of tartar on teeth; gravel and renal calculi). *Conchilion*.--Meter perlarum.--Mother of pearl (Osteitis.--Has a wide range of action in bone affections, especially when the growing ends are affected. *Petechiae*). *Silica; Psorin; Sulph*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, exposure to damp, cold weather, melting snow. *Better, in summer*; warm, dry atmosphere.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third trituration. Higher potencies often more effective.

calcarea-sulphurica.name: Calcarea Sulphurica
calcarea-sulphurica.essence: Eczema and torpid glandular swellings. Cystic tumors. Fibroids. Suppurative processes come within the range of this remedy, after pus has found a vent. *Mucous discharges are yellow, thick and lumpy*. Lupus vulgaris.
calcarea-sulphurica.dosing: Second and third trituration. The twelfth potency has been found effective in Lupus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Sulphate of Lime-Plaster of Paris
Eczema and torpid glandular swellings. Cystic tumors. Fibroids. Suppurative processes come within the range of this remedy, after pus has found a vent. *Mucous discharges are yellow, thick and lumpy*. Lupus vulgaris.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scald-head of children, if there be purulent discharge, or yellow, purulent crusts.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Inflammation of the eyes, with discharge of thick, yellow matter*. Sees only one-half an object. Cornea smoky. Ophthalmia neonatorum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Deafness, with discharge of matter from the middle ear, sometimes mixed with blood. Pimples around ear.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cold in the head, with thick, *yellowish, purulent secretion*, frequently tinged with blood. One-sided discharge from nose. *Yellowish discharge* from posterior nares. Edges of nostrils sore.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pimples and pustules on the face*. Herpes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Inside of lips sore. Tongue flabby, resembling a layer of dried clay. Sour, soapy, acrid taste. Yellow coating at base.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Last stage of ulcerated sore throat, with discharge of yellow matter. Suppurating stage of tonsillitis, when abscess is discharging.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in region of liver, in right side of pelvis, followed by weakness, nausea, and pain in stomach.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Purulent diarrhoea mixed with blood. Diarrhoea after maple sugar and from change of weather. Pus-like, slimy discharge from the bowels. *Painful abscesses about the anus* in cases of fistula.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses late, long-lasting, with headache, twitching great weakness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cough, with purulent and sanious sputa and hectic fever. Empyaema, pus forming in the lungs or pleural cavities. Purulent, sanious expectoration. Catarrh, with thick, lumpy, white-yellow or pus-like secretion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Burning-itching of soles of feet*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hectic fever, caused by formation of pus. With cough and burning in soles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cuts, wounds, bruises, etc, unhealthy, discharging pus; they do not heal readily. Yellow, purulent crusts or discharge. Purulent exudations in or upon the skin. Skin affections with yellowish scabs. Many little matterless pimples under the hair, bleeding when scratched. Dry eczema in children.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Hepar; Silica*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second and third trituration. The twelfth potency has been found effective in Lupus.

calcarea-silicata.name: Calcarea Silicata
calcarea-silicata.essence:
A deep, long acting medicine for complaints which come on slowly and reach their final development after long periods. Hydrogenoid constitution (*Nat sulph*). Very sensitive to *cold*.

*Patient is weak, emaciated, cold and chilly, but worse from being overheated*; sensitive generally. Atrophy of children.
calcarea-silicata.dosing: All potencies from lowest to high.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Silicate of Lime
A deep, long acting medicine for complaints which come on slowly and reach their final development after long periods. Hydrogenoid constitution (*Nat sulph*). Very sensitive to *cold*.
*Patient is weak, emaciated, cold and chilly, but worse from being overheated*; sensitive generally. Atrophy of children.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Absent-minded, irritable, irresolute, lacks self-confidence. *Fearful*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo, head cold, especially at vertex; catarrh of nose and posterior nares, discharge thick, yellow, hard crusts. Corneal exudation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation of coldness, especially when empty. Sinking sensation at pit. Great thirst. Flatulence and distention after eating. Vomiting and eructations.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Uterus heavy, prolapsed. Leucorrhoea, painful and irregular menses. Flow between periods.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensitive to cold air. Difficult respiration. Chronic irritation of air passages. Copious, yellow-green mucus. Coughs with coldness, weakness, emaciation, sensitiveness and peevishness, worse from cold air. Pain in chest walls.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching, burning, cold and blue, very sensitive. Pimples, comedones, wens. Psoric eruptions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Arsenic; Tubercul; Baryt carb; Iod*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: All potencies from lowest to high.

calendula-officinalis.name: Calendula Officinalis
calendula-officinalis.essence: A most remarkable healing agent, applied locally. Useful for open wounds, parts that will not heal, ulcers, etc. Promotes healthy granulations and rapid healing by first intention. Haemostatic after tooth extraction. Deafness. Catarrhal conditions. Neuroma. Constitutional tendency to erysipelas. Pain is excessive and out of all proportion to injury. *Great disposition to take cold, especially in damp weather*. Paralysis after apoplexy. Cancer, as an intercurrent remedy. Has remarkable power to p...

complementary: Ferr pic; Kal iod; Calc; Mag c; Graph

calendula-officinalis.dosing: Locally. Aqueous Calendula (*Marigoldin*) for all wounds, the greatest healing agent. Also as an injection in leucorrhoea; internally, tincture, to third potency. For burns sores, fissures, and abrasions, etc, use Calendula Cerate.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Marigold
A most remarkable healing agent, applied locally. Useful for open wounds, parts that will not heal, ulcers, etc. Promotes healthy granulations and rapid healing by first intention. Haemostatic after tooth extraction. Deafness. Catarrhal conditions. Neuroma. Constitutional tendency to erysipelas. Pain is excessive and out of all proportion to injury. *Great disposition to take cold, especially in damp weather*. Paralysis after apoplexy. Cancer, as an intercurrent remedy. Has remarkable power to produce local exudation and helps to make acrid discharge healthy and free. Cold hands.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Extremely nervous; easily frightened; tearing headache; weight on brain. Submaxillary glands swollen, painful to touch. Pain in right side of neck. Lacerated *scalp* wounds.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Injuries to eyes which tend to suppuration; after operations; blenorrhoea of lachrymal sac.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Deafness; worse in *damp* surroundings and with eczematous conditions. Hears best on a train, and distant sounds.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coryza in one nostril; with much green discharge.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hunger immediately after nursing. Bulimia. *Heartburn with horripilations*. Nausea in *chest*. Vomiting. Sinking sensation. Epigastric *distention*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cough, with green expectoration, hoarseness; with distention of inguinal ring.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Warts at the os externum*. Menses suppressed, with cough. Chronic endocervicitis. Uterine hypertrophy, sensation of weight and fullness in pelvis; stretching and dragging in groin; pain on sudden movements. Os lower than natural. Menorrhagia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Yellow*; goose-flesh. Promotes favorable cicatrization, with least amount of suppuration. Slough, proud flesh, and raised edges. Superficial burns and scalds. Erysipelas (use topically).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Coldness, great sensitiveness to open air*; shuddering in back, skin feels warm to touch. Heat in evening.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, in damp, *heavy, cloudy* weather.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Hamamel; Hyperic; Symph; Arn*.
Compare in deafness: *Ferr pic; Kal iod; Calc; Mag c; Graph*.
Antidote: *Chelidon; Rheum*.
Complementary: *Hepar*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Locally. Aqueous Calendula (*Marigoldin*) for all wounds, the greatest healing agent. Also as an injection in leucorrhoea; internally, tincture, to third potency. For burns sores, fissures, and abrasions, etc, use Calendula Cerate.

calotropis-gigantea.name: Calotropis Gigantea
calotropis-gigantea.essence:
Has been used with marked success in the treatment of *syphilis* following Mercury; also, in elephantiasis, leprosy, and acute dysentery. Pneumonic phthisis. Tuberculosis.

Increases the circulation in the skin; has powerful effects as a sudorific. In the secondary symptoms of syphilis, where Mercury has been used but cannot be pushed safely any farther, it rapidly recruits the constitution, heals the ulcers and blotches from the skin, and perfects the cure. *Primary anaemia of syphilis. Heat in...

complementary: Merc; Potass iod; Berb aqui; Sarsap; Ipecac

calotropis-gigantea.dosing: Tincture, one to five drops; three times a day.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Madar Bark (CALOTROPIS)
Has been used with marked success in the treatment of *syphilis* following Mercury; also, in elephantiasis, leprosy, and acute dysentery. Pneumonic phthisis. Tuberculosis.
Increases the circulation in the skin; has powerful effects as a sudorific. In the secondary symptoms of syphilis, where Mercury has been used but cannot be pushed safely any farther, it rapidly recruits the constitution, heals the ulcers and blotches from the skin, and perfects the cure. *Primary anaemia of syphilis. Heat in stomach* is a good guiding symptom. *Obesity*, while flesh decreases, muscles become harder and firmer.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Merc; Potass iod; Berb aqui; Sarsap; Ipecac*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, one to five drops; three times a day.

caltha-palustris.name: Caltha Palustris
caltha-palustris.essence: Pain in abdomen, vomiting, headache, singing in ears, dysuria and diarrhoea. Anasarca.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Cowslip
Pain in abdomen, vomiting, headache, singing in ears, dysuria and diarrhoea. Anasarca.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pemphigus. Bullae are surrounded by a ring. Much itching. Face much swollen, especially around the eyes. Itching eruption on thighs. Pustules. *Uterine cancer*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture.

camphora-officinalis.name: Camphora Officinalis
camphora-officinalis.essence:
Hahnemann says: "The action of this substance is very puzzling and difficult of investigation, even in the healthy organism because its *primary action*, more frequently than with any other remedy, alternates and becomes intermixed with the vital reactions (after effects) of the organism. On this account it is often difficult to determine what belongs to the vital reactions of the body and what to the alternating effects due to the primary action of the camphor."

Pictures a state of collapse. *...
camphora-officinalis.dosing: Tincture, in drop doses, repeated frequently, or smelling of Spirits of Camphor. Potencies are equally effective.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Camphor
Hahnemann says: "The action of this substance is very puzzling and difficult of investigation, even in the healthy organism because its *primary action*, more frequently than with any other remedy, alternates and becomes intermixed with the vital reactions (after effects) of the organism. On this account it is often difficult to determine what belongs to the vital reactions of the body and what to the alternating effects due to the primary action of the camphor."
Pictures a state of collapse. *Icy coldness* of the whole body; sudden sinking of strength; pulse small and weak. After operations, if temperature is subnormal, low blood pressure, 3 doses camph. 1x, 15-minute intervals. This condition is met with in cholera, and here it is that Camphor has achieved classical fame. *First stages of a cold, with chilliness and sneezing*. Subsultus and extreme restlessness. Cracking of joints. Epileptiform convulsions. Camphor has a direct relationship to muscles and fascia. In local rheumatic affections in cold climates necessary. Distention of veins. As a heart stimulant for emergency use of Camphor is the most satisfactory remedy. Drop doses on sugar as often as every five minutes.
It is characteristic of Camphor that the patient *will not be covered*, notwithstanding the icy coldness of the body. One of the main remedies in shock. *Pain better while thinking of it*. Very sensitive to cold and to touch. Sequelae of measles. *Violent convulsion*, with wandering and hysterical excitement. Tetanic spasms. Scrofulous children and irritable, weakly blondes especially affected.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo, tendency to unconsciousness, feeling as if he would die. Influenza; headache, with catarrhal symptoms, sneezing, etc. Beating pain in cerebellum. Cold sweat. *Nose cold and pinched*. Tongue cold, flabby, trembling. *Fleeting stitches in temporal region and orbits*. Head sore. *Occipital throbbing, synchronous with the pulse*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fixed, staring; pupils dilated. Sensation as if all objects were too bright and glittering.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stopped; sneezing. Fluent coryza on sudden change of weather. Cold and pinched. *Persistent epistaxis*, especially with goose-flesh state of skin.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pale, haggard, *anxious*, distorted; *bluish*, cold. Cold sweat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pressive pain in pit of stomach. *Coldness*, followed by burning.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Blackish; involuntary. *Asiatic cholera*, with cramps in calves, coldness of body, anguish, great weakness, *collapse*, tongue and mouth cold.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Burning and *strangury*, with tenesmus of the neck of the bladder. Retention with full bladder.
**Male--**Besire increased. Chordee. *Priapism*. Nightly emissions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Praecordial distress. Suffocative dyspnoea. Asthma. Violent, dry, hacking cough. Palpitation. *Breath cold*. Suspended respiration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Insomnia*, with cold limbs. Subsultus and extreme restlessness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rheumatic pain between shoulders. Difficult motion. Numbness, tingling and *coldness*. Cracking in joints. Cramps in calves. Icy cold feet, ache as if sprained.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pulse small, weak, slow. *Icy coldness of the whole body*. Cold perspiration. *Congestive chill. Tongue cold*, flabby, trembling.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Cold*, pale, blue, livid. Cannot bear to be covered (*Secale*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, motion, night, contact, cold air. *Better*, warmth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Camphor antidotes or modifies the action of nearly every vegetable medicine--tobacco, opium, worm medicines, etc. *Laffa acutangula* (whole body ice-cold, with a restlessness and anxiety; burning thirst). *Camphoric acid*--(a prophylactic against catheter fever; cystitis 15 grains three times a day; also for prevention of night sweats).
Incompatible: *Kali nit*.
Complementary: *Canth*.
Antidotes: *Opium; Nitr sp dulc; Phos*.
Compare: *Carbo; Cuprum; Arsenic; Veratr*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, in drop doses, repeated frequently, or smelling of Spirits of Camphor. Potencies are equally effective.

camphora-bromata.name: Camphora Bromata
camphora-bromata.essence: *Nervous excitability* is the guiding condition. Suppression of milk. Nightly emissions. Painful erections. Paralysis agitans. Cholera infantum, and infantile convulsions. Intensifies the action of Quinine and renders it more permanent.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Mono-bromide of Camphor (CAMPHORA MONO-BROMATA)
*Nervous excitability* is the guiding condition. Suppression of milk. Nightly emissions. Painful erections. Paralysis agitans. Cholera infantum, and infantile convulsions. Intensifies the action of Quinine and renders it more permanent.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Directions appear reversed, i.e, north seems south, and east seems west. Hysteria; weeping and laughing alternately. Trance-like state.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second trituration.

canchalagua.name: Canchalagua
canchalagua.essence: Used extensively as a fever remedy and bitter tonic (*Gentiana*), antimalarial and antiseptic. Of use in severe type of intermittent fever in hot countries; also, in influenza. Sore, as if bruised all over. Sensation of drops falling from and upon different spots.
canchalagua.dosing: Tincture, in drop doses. Must be made from the fresh plant. Its medicinal properties are lost in the dry.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Erythraea venusta-Centaury
Used extensively as a fever remedy and bitter tonic (*Gentiana*), antimalarial and antiseptic. Of use in severe type of intermittent fever in hot countries; also, in influenza. Sore, as if bruised all over. Sensation of drops falling from and upon different spots.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Congested. Scalp feels tight; head feels as if bound; burning in eyes; buzzing in ears.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chill all over; worse in bed at night. Sensitive to cold trade-winds on Pacific Coast. General sore and bruised feeling; nausea and retching.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Wrinkled like a washer-woman's. Scalp feels tight, as if drawn together by India-rubber.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, in drop doses. Must be made from the fresh plant. Its medicinal properties are lost in the dry.

cannabis-indica.name: Cannabis Indica
cannabis-indica.essence:
Inhibits the higher faculties and stimulates the imagination to a remarkable degree without any marked stimulation of the lower or animal instinct. A condition of *intense exaltation*, in which all perceptions and conceptions, all sensations and all emotions are exaggerated to the utmost degree.

Subconscious or *dual nature state*. Apparently under the control of the second self, but, the original self, prevents the performance of acts which are under the domination of the second self. Apparent...

amel: from fresh air, cold water, rest

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Hashish
Inhibits the higher faculties and stimulates the imagination to a remarkable degree without any marked stimulation of the lower or animal instinct. A condition of *intense exaltation*, in which all perceptions and conceptions, all sensations and all emotions are exaggerated to the utmost degree.
Subconscious or *dual nature state*. Apparently under the control of the second self, but, the original self, prevents the performance of acts which are under the domination of the second self. Apparently the two natures cannot act independently, one acting as a check, upon the other (Effects of one Dram doses by Dr. Albert Schneider).
The experimenter feels ever and anon that he is distinct from the subject of the hashish dream and can think rationally.
Produces the most remarkable hallucinations and imaginations, *exaggeration of the duration of time and extent of space, being most characteristic*. Conception of time, space and place is gone. Extremely happy and contented, nothing troubles. Ideas crowd upon each other. Has great soothing influence in many nervous disorders, like epilepsy, mania, dementia, delirium tremens, and irritable reflexes. Exophthalmic goitre. Catalepsy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Excessive loquacity; *exuberance of spirits. Time seems too long; seconds seem ages; a few rods an immense distance*. Constantly theorizing. Anxious depression; constant fear of becoming insane. Mania, must constantly move. *Very forgetful; cannot finish sentence*. Is lost in delicious thought. *Uncontrollable laughter*. Delirium tremens. Clairvoyance. Emotional excitement; rapid change of mood. Cannot realize her identity, chronic vertigo as of floating off.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels *as if top of head were opening and shutting and as if calvarium were being lifted*. Shocks through brain (*Aloe; Coca*). Uraemic headache. Throbbing and weight at occiput. Headache with flatulence. *Involuntary shaking of head.* Migraine attack preceded by unusual excitement with loquacity.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fixed. Letters run together when reading. Clairvoyance. Spectral illusions without terror.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Throbbing, buzzing, and ringing. Noise like boiling water. Extreme sensitiveness to noise.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Expression drowsy and stupid. Lips glued together. *Grinding of teeth in sleep*. Mouth and lips dry. Saliva thick, frothy, and sticky.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Increased appetite. Pain at cardiac orifice; better, pressure. Distention. Pyloric spasm. Sensation of extreme tension in abdominal vessels-feel distended to bursting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation in anus as if sitting on a ball.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Urine loaded with slimy mucus. Must strain; *dribbling*; has to wait some time before the urine flows. Stitches and burning in urethra. Dull pain in region of right kidney.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: After sexual intercourse, *backache*. Oozing of white, glairy mucus from glans. Satyriasis. Prolonged thrill. Chordee. Sensation of swelling in perineum or near anus, as if sitting on a ball.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses *profuse*, dark, painful, without clots. Backache during menses. Uterine colic, with great nervous agitation and sleeplessness. Sterility (*Borax*). Dysmenorrhoea with sexual desire.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Humid asthma. Chest oppressed with deep, labored breathing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Palpitation awakes him. Piercing pain, with great oppression. *Pulse very slow* (*Dig; Kalmia; Apocyn*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pain across shoulders and spine; must stoop; cannot walk erect*. Thrilling through arms and hands, and from knees down. *Entire paralysis of the lower extremities*. Pain in soles and calves; sharp pains in knees and ankles; *very exhausted after a short walk*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Very sleepy, but unable to do so. Obstinate and intractable forms of insomnia. Catalepsy. Dreams of dead bodies; prophetic. Nightmare.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, morning; from coffee, liquor and tobacco; lying on right side. *Better* from fresh air, cold water, rest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Bellad; Hyoscy; Stram; Laches; Agaric; Anhalon* (time sense disordered; time periods enormously overestimated, thus, minutes seem hours, etc).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture and low attenuations.

cannabis-sativa.name: Cannabis Sativa
cannabis-sativa.essence: Seems to affect especially the urinary, sexual, and respiratory organs. It has characteristic sensations as of dropping water. Great fatigue, as from over-exertion; weary after meals. Choking in swallowing; things go down the wrong way. *Stuttering*. Confusion of thought and speech. Wavering speech. Wavering speech, hasty, incoherent.

complementary: Canth; Apis; Copaiva; Thuj; Kal nit

cannabis-sativa.dosing: Tincture to third attenuation. In stuttering the 30th.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Hemp
Seems to affect especially the urinary, sexual, and respiratory organs. It has characteristic sensations as of dropping water. Great fatigue, as from over-exertion; weary after meals. Choking in swallowing; things go down the wrong way. *Stuttering*. Confusion of thought and speech. Wavering speech. Wavering speech, hasty, incoherent.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lectophobia. Vertigo; sensation of dropping water on head. Pressure on root of nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Opacity of cornea*. Cataract from nervous disturbances, abuse of alcohol and tobacco; patient feels deeply approaching blindness. Misty sight. Pressure from back of eyes, forward. Gonorrhoeal ophthalmia. Eyeballs ache. Scrofulous eye troubles (*Sulph; Calc*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Retained, with obstinate constipation. Painful urging. Micturition in split stream. Stitches in urethra. Inflamed sensation, with soreness to touch. *Burning while urinating, extending to bladder*. Urine scalding, with spasmodic closure of sphincter. Gonorrhoea, acute stage; urethra very sensitive. Walks with legs apart. Dragging in testicles. Zigzag pain along urethra. Sexual overexcitement. Urethral caruncle (*Eucalypt*), phimosis. Stoppage of urethra by mucus and pus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Amenorrhoea when physical powers have been overtaxed, also with constipation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Oppression of breathing and palpitation; *must stand up*. Weight on chest; rattling wheezing breathing. Cough, with green viscid, also bloody, expectoration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation as if drops were falling from the heart. Painful strokes and tension with palpitation. Pericarditis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frightful dreams. More tired in morning. Sleepy during day.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Contraction of fingers after a sprain. Dislocation of patella on going upstairs. Feet feel heavy on going upstairs. Paralytic tearing pains. Affections of the ball of the foot and under part of toes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, lying down; going upstairs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Camph; Lemon juice*.
Compare: *Hedysarum*-Brazilian Burdock--(Gonorrhoea and inflammation of penis); *Canth; Apis; Copaiva; Thuj; Kal nit*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture to third attenuation. In stuttering the 30th.

capsicum-annuum.name: Capsicum Annuum
capsicum-annuum.essence: Seems to suit especially persons of lax fiber, weak; diminished vital heat. A relaxed plethoric sluggish, cold remedy. Not much reactive force. Such persons are fat, indolent, opposed to physical exertion, averse to go outside of their routine, get homesick easily. *General uncleanliness of body*. Abstainers from accustomed alcoholics. It affects the mucous membranes, producing a sensation of *constriction*. Inflammation of petrous bone. Burning pains and general chilliness. Older people who hav...
capsicum-annuum.dosing: Third to sixth attenuation. In delirium tremens, dram doses of tincture in milk or tincture or orange peel.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Cayenne Pepper (CAPSICUM)
Seems to suit especially persons of lax fiber, weak; diminished vital heat. A relaxed plethoric sluggish, cold remedy. Not much reactive force. Such persons are fat, indolent, opposed to physical exertion, averse to go outside of their routine, get homesick easily. *General uncleanliness of body*. Abstainers from accustomed alcoholics. It affects the mucous membranes, producing a sensation of *constriction*. Inflammation of petrous bone. Burning pains and general chilliness. Older people who have exhausted their vitality, especially by mental work, and poor living; blear-eyed appearance; who do not react. Fear of slightest draught. Marked tendency to suppuration in every inflammatory process. Prostration and feeble digestion of alcoholics. Myalgia, aching and jerking of muscles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Excessive peevishness. *Homesickness*, with sleeplessness and disposition to suicide. Wants to be let alone. Peppery disposition. *Delirium tremens*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bursting headache; worse, coughing. Hot face. Red cheeks. Face red, though cold (*Asafaet*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning and stinging in ears. *Swelling and pain behind ears. Inflammation of mastoid. Tenderness over the petrous bone*; extremely sore and tender to touch (*Onosmod*). Otorrhoea and mastoid disease before suppuration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Hot feeling in fauces*. Subacute inflammation of Eustachian tube with great pain. *Pain and dryness in throat* extending to the ears. *Sore throat of smokers and drinkers*. Smarting in; constriction. Burning constriction worse between acts of deglutition. Inflamed uvula and palate; swollen and relaxed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Herpes labialis (Apply one drop of the mother tincture). *Stomatitis*. Disagreeable smell from mouth. *Fetid odor from mouth*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning in tip of tongue. Atonic dyspepsia. Much flatulence, especially in debilitated subjects. Intense craving for stimulants. Vomiting, sinking at pit of stomach. *Much thirst; but drinking causes shuddering*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Bloody mucus, with burning and tenesmus*; drawing pain in back after stool. *Thirsty after stool, with shivering. Bleeding piles*, with soreness of anus. Stinging pain during stool.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Strangury, frequent, almost ineffectual urging. *Burning in orifice*. Comes first in drops, then in spurts; neck of bladder spasmodically contracted. Ectropion of meatus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Coldness of scrotum*, with impotency, atrophied testicles, loss of sensibility in testicles, with softening and dwindling. Gonorrhoea, with chordee, excessive burning, pain in prostate.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Climacteric disturbances with burning of tip of tongue (*Lathyrus*). Uterine haemorrhage near the menopause, with nausea. Sticking sensation in left ovarian region.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Constriction* of chest; arrests breathing Hoarseness. Pain at apex of heart or in rib region, worse touch. Dry, hacking cough, expelling an offensive breath from lungs. Dyspnoea. Feels as if chest and head would fly to pieces. Explosive cough. Threatening gangrene of lung. *Pain in distant parts on coughing*-bladder, legs, ears, etc.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain from hips to feet. Sciatica, worse bending backward; *worse, coughing*. Tensive pain in the knee.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coldness, with ill-humor. *Shivering after drinking*. Chill begins in back; better, heat. Must have something hot to back. Thirst before chill.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Better*, while eating, from heat. *Worse*, open air, uncovering, draughts.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidote: *Cina; Calad*.
Compare: *Pulsat; Lycop; Bell; Centaurea* (surging of blood; homesickness; intermittent fever).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to sixth attenuation. In delirium tremens, dram doses of tincture in milk or tincture or orange peel.

carbolicum-acidum.name: Carbolicum Acidum
carbolicum-acidum.essence:
Carbolic Acid is a powerful irritant and anaesthetic. A languid, foul, painless, destructive remedy. Stupor, paralysis of sensation and motion, feeble pulse and depressed breathing, death due to paralysis of respiratory centers. Acts primarily on the central nervous system. *Increased olfactory sensibility*.

Produces mental and bodily languor, disinclination to study, with headache like a band. Very marked *acuteness of smell* is a strong guiding symptom. Stomach symptoms are also important. Pa...
carbolicum-acidum.dosing: Third to thirtieth potency. Phenol in Arthritis, according to Goodno. Must be absolutely pure. Crystals Solution (25 %) in equal parts of water and glycerine, dose 20 minims well diluted 3 times daily (Bartlett).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Phenol-Carbolic Acid
Carbolic Acid is a powerful irritant and anaesthetic. A languid, foul, painless, destructive remedy. Stupor, paralysis of sensation and motion, feeble pulse and depressed breathing, death due to paralysis of respiratory centers. Acts primarily on the central nervous system. *Increased olfactory sensibility*.
Produces mental and bodily languor, disinclination to study, with headache like a band. Very marked *acuteness of smell* is a strong guiding symptom. Stomach symptoms are also important. Pains are terrible; come and go suddenly. Physical exertion brings on abscess somewhere. Putrid discharges (*Bapt*). Scarlet fever, with marked tendency to destruction of tissue internally, and fetid odor. Spasmodic coughs. Arthritis (See Dose).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Disinclined to mental work. Tight feeling, as if compressed by a rubber band (*Gels; Mahonia*). Orbital neuralgia over right eye. Headache, better, by green tea; while smoking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Smell very acute*. Putrid discharge. Ozaena, with fetor and ulceration. Influenza and resulting debility.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ulcerated patches on inside of lips and cheeks. *Burning in mouth to* stomach. Fauces red, and covered with exudation. Uvula whitened and shriveled. *Putrid discharge*. Almost impossible to swallow. *Diphtheria, fetid breath, regurgitation* on swallowing liquids, but little pain (*Bapt*). Face dusky red; white about mouth and nose. Rapid sinking of vital forces.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Appetite lost. *Desire for stimulants and tobacco*. Constant belching, nausea, *vomiting*, dark olive green. Heat rises up oesophagus. Flatulent distention of stomach and abdomen. Painful flatulence often marked in one part of the bowel (*Sulpho-Carbolate of Soda*). *Fermentative dyspepsia* with bad taste and breath.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constipation, with *very offensive breath*. Bloody, like scrapings of intestines. Great tenesmus. Diarrhoea; stools thin, black, putrid.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Almost black. Diabetes. Irritable bladder in old men with frequent urination at night, of probable prostatic nature. Use 1x.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Discharges always offensive (*Nitr ac; Nux; Sep*). Pustules about vulva containing bloody pus. Agonizing backache across loins, with dragging-down thighs. Pain in left ovary; worse walking in open air. Erosions of cervix; fetid, acrid discharge. Leucorrhoea in children (*Cann s; Merc; Puls; Sep*). Puerperal fever, with offensive discharge. Irritating leucorrhoea, causing itching and burning (*Kreos*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cramps in fore part of leg, close to tibia *during walking*. Gnawing pains in shin bones. Arthritis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching vesicles, with burning pain. Burns tend to ulcerate.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Chrysarobin* (local *in ringworm* of the scalp 5-10 per cent in glycerine and alcohol. Equal parts). Ars; *Kreosot; Carbo; Guano* (Violent headache as from a band around head. Itching of nostrils, back, thighs, genitals. Symptoms like hay-fever).
Antidote: *Alcohol; Vinegar; Chalk; Iod*. Glauber's Salt in watery solution.
Incompatible: *Glycerine* and *vegetable oils*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency. Phenol in Arthritis, according to Goodno. Must be absolutely pure. Crystals Solution (25 %) in equal parts of water and glycerine, dose 20 minims well diluted 3 times daily (Bartlett).

carbo-animalis.name: Carbo Animalis
carbo-animalis.essence: Seems to be especially adapted to scrofulous and venous constitutions, old people, and after debilitating disease, with feeble circulation and lowered vitality. *Glands are indurated*, veins distended, skin blue. *Stitch remaining after pleurisy*. Easily strained from lifting. Weakness of nursing women. Ulceration and decomposition. All its secretions are offensive. Causes local congestions *without* heat.

agg: after shaving, loss of animal fluids

carbo-animalis.dosing: Third to thirtieth potency. The third trituration for insufflation in aural polypi.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Animal Charcoal
Seems to be especially adapted to scrofulous and venous constitutions, old people, and after debilitating disease, with feeble circulation and lowered vitality. *Glands are indurated*, veins distended, skin blue. *Stitch remaining after pleurisy*. Easily strained from lifting. Weakness of nursing women. Ulceration and decomposition. All its secretions are offensive. Causes local congestions *without* heat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Desire to be alone, sad and reflective, *avoids conversation*. Anxiety at night, with orgasm of blood.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Headache, as if head had been blown to pieces. Rush of blood with confusion. Sensation as if something lay above eyes so that she could not look up. Bluish cheeks and lips. Vertigo followed by nose-bleed. Nose swollen, tip bluish small tumor on it. Hearing confused; *cannot tell direction of sound*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Eating tires patient. Weak, empty feeling in stomach. Burning and griping. *Weak digestion. Flatulence*. Ptomaine poisoning. Repugnance to fat food. Sour water from mouth. Pyrosis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nausea of pregnancy; worse at night. Lochia offensive (*Kreos; Rhus; Secale*). Menses too early, frequent long lasting, *followed by great exhaustion*, so weak, can hardly speak (*Cocc*), flow only in morning (*Bor; Sep*). Burning in vagina and labia. Darting in breast; *painful indurations* in breast, especially right. Cancer of uterus, burning pain down thighs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pleurisy, typhoid character, and remaining stitch. Ulceration of lung, with feeling of coldness of chest. Cough, with discharge of greenish pus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Spongy ulcers, copper-colored eruption. Acne rosacea. Chilblains, worse in evening, in bed and from cold. Verruca on hands and face of old people, with bluish color of extremities. *Glands indurated*, swollen, painful, in neck, axillae, groin, mammae; pains lancinating, cutting, burning (*Con; Merc iod flav*). Burning, rawness and fissures; moisture. *Bubo*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in coccyx; burns when touched. Ankles turn easily. Straining and over-lifting produce great debility. Joints weak. Easy discoloration. Pain in hip joints at night. *Night sweat* fetid and profuse. Wrist pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, after shaving, loss of animal fluids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
The Carbon group all have putrid discharges and exhalations. All act on the skin, causing interrigo and excoriations. Glandular enlargements and catarrhal states, flatulency and asphyxiation.
*Carbon Tetrachlorid* is said to cause fatty liver (*Phosph; Ars; Chlorof*). Paralysis of interosseus muscles of feet and hands. Wonderful clinical results in the treatment of Hook worm disease. *See Thymol* (Relationship).
Complementary: *Calc phos*.
Antidotes: *Ars; Nux*.
Compare: *Badiaga; Sepia; Sulph; Plumb iod*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency. The third trituration for insufflation in aural polypi.

carboneum-hydrogenisatum.name: Carboneum Hydrogenisatum
carboneum-hydrogenisatum.essence: Symptoms resemble an apopletic attack. Spasm as in lockjaw. Trismus. Involuntary stools and urine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Carburetted Hydrogen
Symptoms resemble an apopletic attack. Spasm as in lockjaw. Trismus. Involuntary stools and urine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stupefaction. Extraordinary sensation of contentment. All thoughts appear in a moment as if seen in an inner mirror.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lids half closed. Oscillation of eyeballs. Pupils insensible to light.

carboneum-oxygenisatum.name: Carboneum Oxygenisatum
carboneum-oxygenisatum.essence: Herpes zoster, pemphigus, and trismus are produced by this drug. Coldness, *sleepiness*, loss of consciousness are marked. Vertigo.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Carbonous Oxide
Herpes zoster, pemphigus, and trismus are produced by this drug. Coldness, *sleepiness*, loss of consciousness are marked. Vertigo.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cerebral congestion; hallucination of vision, hearing and touch. Inclination to turn in a circle. *Jaws firmly clenched*. Trismus. Heaviness of head. Sticking pain in temples. Roaring ears.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ocular paralysis, hemianopsias, disturbed pupillary reaction, optic neuritis and atrophy, subconjunctival and retinal haemorrhages.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Anaesthesia; vesication along course of nerves; *herpes zoster*; pemphigus, with large and small vesicles. Hand icy cold.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Deep. *Prolonged*; sleepiness for several days.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First attenuation.

carboneum-sulphuratum.name: Carboneum Sulphuratum
carboneum-sulphuratum.essence:
This drug has a deep and disorganizing action and an immense range of action judging from the symptomatology. Very useful in patients broken down by abuse of alcohol. Sensitive patients worse cold, wasted muscles, and skin and mucous membranes anaesthetic. Special affinity for eyes. Chronic rheumatism, sensitive and cold. Lack of vital heat. Diarrhoea every four to six weeks. Paralysis with intense congestion of nerve centers. Tabes. Sensory difficulties in limbs.

*Impotence*, sciatica, come wi...

agg: bathing. Sensitive to warm, damp, weather

complementary: Tuberculin; Radium; Carbo; Sulph; Caust; Salicyl ac; Cinch

carboneum-sulphuratum.dosing: First attenuation. Locally in facial neuralgia and sciatica.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First attenuation. Locally in facial neuralgia and sciatica.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Alcohol Sulphuris-Bisulphide of Carbon
This drug has a deep and disorganizing action and an immense range of action judging from the symptomatology. Very useful in patients broken down by abuse of alcohol. Sensitive patients worse cold, wasted muscles, and skin and mucous membranes anaesthetic. Special affinity for eyes. Chronic rheumatism, sensitive and cold. Lack of vital heat. Diarrhoea every four to six weeks. Paralysis with intense congestion of nerve centers. Tabes. Sensory difficulties in limbs.
*Impotence*, sciatica, come within the therapeutic sphere of this remedy. Chronic plumbism. *Diminished sensibility* of arms, hands and feet. Peripheral neuritis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Irritable, anxious, intolerant; *stupor*. Sluggishness of mind. Hallucinations of sight and hearing. Changeable mood. Dementia alternating with excitement.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Headache and dizziness. Aches as from a tight cap. Ears feel obstructed. *Noises in head*. Ulceration of the lips, anaesthesia of mouth and tongue.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Myopia, asthenopia, and dis-chromotopia, cloudiness and atrophy of optic disc and central scotoma for light and for red and green not for white. Optic neuritis advancing toward atrophy. Arteries and veins congested. Retinal congestion; optic disc pale. Everything seems in a fog. Vision greatly impaired. Color-blindness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hearing impaired. Buzzing and singing noises like an aeolian harp. *Tinnitus aurium. Meniere's disease*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain with *wandering swellings* as from flatus. Distention, with soreness and rumbling.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Desire lost, parts atrophied. Frequent profuse emissions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Herpes on dorsal surface of hands. Sore, bruised limbs; anaesthesia of arms and hands. Cramps in limbs. Lightning-like pains, with cramps. Fingers swollen, *insensible*, rigid, stiff. Gait unsteady, tottering; worse in dark. Feet insensible. *Sciatica. Flying pains, returning regularly* for a long time. Pain in lower limbs, with cramps and formication. *Neuritis*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Deep morning sleep with anxious, vexatious dreams.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Anaesthesia; burning; itching; ulcers; small wounds fester. Useful to restrain the growth of cancer. Furunculosis. Chronic skin diseases with much itching.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Better*, in open air. *Worse*, after breakfast; bathing. Sensitive to warm, damp, weather.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Potass. Xantate*--(Similar in action. Acts on cortical substance; loss of memory, marked blood degeneration; impotence and senility). *Tuberculin; Radium; Carbo; Sulph; Caust; Salicyl ac; Cinch*. In eye symptoms compare: *Benzin dinitric. Thyroidin* (progressive diminution of sight with central Scotoma).

carcinosinum.name: Carcinosinum
carcinosinum.essence:
It is claimed the Carcinosin acts favorably and modifies all cases in which either a history of carcinoma can be elicited, or symptoms of the disease itself exist (J. H. Clarke, M. D).

Carcinoma of the mammary glands with great pain and induration of glands; of uterus, the offensive discharge, haemorrhage and pain are greatly relieved.

Indigestion, accumulation of gas in stomach and bowels; rheumatism-Cancerous cachexia.
carcinosinum.dosing: Thirtieth and 200th potency, a dose at night or less frequently.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
A nosode from Carcinoma (CARCINOSIN)
It is claimed the Carcinosin acts favorably and modifies all cases in which either a history of carcinoma can be elicited, or symptoms of the disease itself exist (J. H. Clarke, M. D).
Carcinoma of the mammary glands with great pain and induration of glands; of uterus, the offensive discharge, haemorrhage and pain are greatly relieved.
