Indigestion, accumulation of gas in stomach and bowels; rheumatism-Cancerous cachexia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Bufo; Conium; Phytolacca, Asterias*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thirtieth and 200th potency, a dose at night or less frequently.

carduus-marianus.name: Carduus Marianus
carduus-marianus.essence: The action of this drug is centered in the liver, and portal system, causing soreness, pain, jaundice. Has specific relation to the vascular system. Abuse of alcoholic beverages, especially beer. *Varicose veins* and ulcers. Diseases of miners, associated with asthma. Dropsical conditions depending on liver disease, and when due to pelvic congestion and hepatic disease. Disturbs sugar metabolism. Influenza when liver is affected. Debility. Haemorrhages, especially connected with hepatic disease.

complementary: Chelidon; Chionanthes; Merc; Podophyl; Bry; Aloe

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
St. Mary's Thistle
The action of this drug is centered in the liver, and portal system, causing soreness, pain, jaundice. Has specific relation to the vascular system. Abuse of alcoholic beverages, especially beer. *Varicose veins* and ulcers. Diseases of miners, associated with asthma. Dropsical conditions depending on liver disease, and when due to pelvic congestion and hepatic disease. Disturbs sugar metabolism. Influenza when liver is affected. Debility. Haemorrhages, especially connected with hepatic disease.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Despondency; forgetful, apathetic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Contractive feeling above eyebrows. Dull heavy, stupid, with foul tongue. Vertigo, with tendency to fall forward. Burning and pressure in eyes. Nose-bleed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Taste bitter. Aversion to salt meat. Appetite small; tongue furred; nausea; *retching; vomiting of green, acid fluid*. Stitches in left side of stomach, near spleen (*Ceanoth*). Gallstone disease with enlarged liver.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in region of liver. Left lobe very sensitive. Fullness and soreness, with moist skin. Constipation; *stools hard, difficult, knotty*; alternates with diarrhoea. Stools bright yellow. Swelling of gall bladder with painful tenderness. Hyperaemia of liver, with jaundice. Cirrhosis, with dropsy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Haemorrhagic piles, prolapse or rectum, burning pain in anus and rectum, hard and knotting, clayey stools. Profuse diarrhoea due to rectal cancer. 10 drops doses (Wapler).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cloudy; golden-colored.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stitching pains in lower right ribs and front; worse, moving, walking, etc. *Asthmatic respiration*. Pain in chest, going to shoulders, back, loins and abdomen, with urging to urinate.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching on lying down at night. *Varicose ulcers* (*Clematis vitalba*). Eruption on lower part of sternum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in hip-joint, spreading through buttocks and down thigh; *worse from stooping*. Difficult rising. Weakness felt in feet, especially after sitting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Card benedictus* (strong action on eyes, and sensation of contraction in many parts; stomach symptoms similar); *Chelidon; Chionanthes; Merc; Podophyl; Bry; Aloe*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture and lower potencies.

carlsbad-aqua.name: Carlsbad Aqua
carlsbad-aqua.essence: Famous for its action on the liver and in the treatment of obesity, diabetes, and gout. In homeopathic potencies useful in weakness of all organs, constipation, great liability to take cold. Periodicity, effects repeated after from two to four weeks (*Oxal ac; Sulph*). *Flashes of heat all over*. Itching on various parts.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
The Waters of the Sprudel Springs (CARLSBAD)
Famous for its action on the liver and in the treatment of obesity, diabetes, and gout. In homeopathic potencies useful in weakness of all organs, constipation, great liability to take cold. Periodicity, effects repeated after from two to four weeks (*Oxal ac; Sulph*). *Flashes of heat all over*. Itching on various parts.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Discouraged and anxious about domestic duties.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aches, with swollen temporal veins (*Sang*); better, motion, in open air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Yellow; sallow; red and hot; pain in zygomatic process; feels as if cobwebs were on it.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue coated white. Offensive smell from mouth. Furry sensation. Sour or salty taste. Hiccough and yawning. Heartburn (*Carbo*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stream *weak and slow*; only passed by pressing abdominal muscles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Feces held back*. Stool slow, and only passed by much abdominal pressure. Burning in rectum and anus. Bleeding piles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Nat sulph; Nux*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lower potencies.

cascarilla.name: Cascarilla
cascarilla.essence: Acts on the digestive tract; constipation. Aversion to smell of tobacco. *Inclination to vomit* very marked.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Sweet Bark
Acts on the digestive tract; constipation. Aversion to smell of tobacco. *Inclination to vomit* very marked.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hunger after meals. Desire for hot drinks. *Nausea and vomiting*. Pain in stomach as from a shock. Pressing colic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constipation; stools hard, covered with mucus (*Graph*). Bright blood with stool. Diarrhoea alternating with hard, lumpy stool, with backache and lassitude, preceded by griping. Gnawing pain high up in rectum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third potency.

cascara-sagrada.name: Cascara Sagrada
cascara-sagrada.essence: Introduced as a palliative for constipation (non-homeopathic), fifteen drops of fluid extract here it restores normal function by its tonic effects, but it has a wider sphere of action, as careful provings will show. Chronic indigestion, cirrhosis and jaundice. Haemorrhoids and constipation. Gastric headache. Broad, flabby tongue; foul breath.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Sacred Bark (RHAMNUS PURSHIANA)
Introduced as a palliative for constipation (non-homeopathic), fifteen drops of fluid extract here it restores normal function by its tonic effects, but it has a wider sphere of action, as careful provings will show. Chronic indigestion, cirrhosis and jaundice. Haemorrhoids and constipation. Gastric headache. Broad, flabby tongue; foul breath.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Must wait for minute before flow starts then first in drops.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Rheumatism of muscles and joints, with obstinate constipation*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Hyd; Nux; Rhamnus Californica* (tincture for constipation; tympanites and appendicitis and especially *rheumatism*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture to sixth potency.

castoreum-canadense.name: Castoreum Canadense
castoreum-canadense.essence:
A great remedy for hysteria. Prostration marked.

Hysterical symptoms. Day-blindness; cannot endure the light. Nervous women who do not recover fully, but are continually irritable, and suffer from debilitating sweats. Spasmodic affections after debilitating diseases. Constant yawning. Restless sleep with frightful dreams and starts.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
The Beaver (CASTOREUM)
A great remedy for hysteria. Prostration marked.
Hysterical symptoms. Day-blindness; cannot endure the light. Nervous women who do not recover fully, but are continually irritable, and suffer from debilitating sweats. Spasmodic affections after debilitating diseases. Constant yawning. Restless sleep with frightful dreams and starts.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Swollen. Rounded elevation size of a pea in center, with drawing sensation from center to hyoid bone.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dysmenorrhoea; blood discharged in drops with tenesmus. Pain commences in middle of thighs. Amenorrhoea, with painful tympanites.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Predominant chilliness. Attacks of chilliness with ice-coldness in back.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Ambra; Moschus; Mur acid; Valeriana*.
Antidote: *Colch*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, and lower potencies.

castanea-vesca.name: Castanea Vesca
castanea-vesca.essence:
A useful remedy in *whooping-cough*, especially in the early stage, with dry, ringing, violent, spasmodic cough. Desire for warm drinks. Very thirsty. Loss of appetite. Diarrhoea. Thick urine.

Lumbago, weak back, can hardly straighten up.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Chestnut Leaves
A useful remedy in *whooping-cough*, especially in the early stage, with dry, ringing, violent, spasmodic cough. Desire for warm drinks. Very thirsty. Loss of appetite. Diarrhoea. Thick urine.
Lumbago, weak back, can hardly straighten up.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Pertussin*-Whooping-cough (when symptoms return again after being allayed). *Dros; Mephitis; Naphthal; Ammon brom*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture.

castor-equi.name: Castor Equi
castor-equi.essence: General action on thickening of the skin and epithelium. *Psoriasis linguae*. The clinical experience of Hering and his fellow-provers has shown this to be highly useful remedy in *cracked and ulcerated nipples*. Affects principally female organs. Acts on the nails and bones; pain in right tibia and coccyx. Warts on forehead. Warts on breast. Chapped hands.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Rudimentary Thumb-nail of the Horse
General action on thickening of the skin and epithelium. *Psoriasis linguae*. The clinical experience of Hering and his fellow-provers has shown this to be highly useful remedy in *cracked and ulcerated nipples*. Affects principally female organs. Acts on the nails and bones; pain in right tibia and coccyx. Warts on forehead. Warts on breast. Chapped hands.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cracked, sore nipples, excessively tender. Swelling of mammae. Violent itching in breasts; areola reddened.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Graphites; Hippomanes; Calc. Oxal*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth and twelfth potency.

cataria-nepeta.name: Cataria Nepeta
cataria-nepeta.essence: Children's remedy for *Colic*, also for nervous headache and hysteria, abdominal complaints, pain, flexing of thighs, twisting of body, crying. Similar to chamomilla and magnes phosph.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Catnip
Children's remedy for *Colic*, also for nervous headache and hysteria, abdominal complaints, pain, flexing of thighs, twisting of body, crying. Similar to chamomilla and magnes phosph.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: 5 to 10 drops of the tincture.

caulophyllum-thalictroides.name: Caulophyllum Thalictroides
caulophyllum-thalictroides.essence: This is a woman's remedy. Want of tonicity of the womb. During labor, when the pains are deficient and the patient is exhausted and fretful. Besides, it has a special affinity for the smaller joints. *Thrush*, locally and internally.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Blue Cohosh (CAULOPHYLLUM)
This is a woman's remedy. Want of tonicity of the womb. During labor, when the pains are deficient and the patient is exhausted and fretful. Besides, it has a special affinity for the smaller joints. *Thrush*, locally and internally.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Cardialgia, spasms of stomach*. Dyspepsia with spasmodic symptoms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Extraordinary rigidity of os (*Bell; Gels; Ver v*). Spasmodic and severe pains, which fly in all directions; shivering, without progress; false pains. Revives labor pains and furthers progress of labor. After pains. Leucorrhoea, with moth-spots on forehead. Habitual abortion from uterine debility (*Helon; Puls; Sab*). Needle-like pains in cervix. Dysmenorrhoea, with pains flying to other parts of body. Lochia protracted; great atony. Menses and leucorrhoea profuse.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Discoloration of skin in women with menstrual and uterine disorder.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Severe drawing, erratic pain and stiffness in small joints, fingers, toes, ankles, etc. Aching in wrists. Cutting pains on closing hands. Erratic pains, changing place every few minutes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Incompatible: *Coffea*.
Compare: *Viol. Odor* (rheumatic carpal and metacarpal joints); *Cimicif; Sepia; Pulsat; Gels*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture to third attenuation.

ceanothus-americanus.name: Ceanothus Americanus
ceanothus-americanus.essence: This remedy seems to possess a specific relation to the spleen. Ague cake of malaria. A left-sided remedy generally. Anaemic patients where liver and spleen are at fault. Chronic bronchitis with profuse secretion. Marked blood pressure, reducing powers. Active hemastatic, materially reducing the clotting of blood.
ceanothus-americanus.dosing: First attenuation. Locally as hair tonic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
New Jersey Tea (CEANOTHUS)
This remedy seems to possess a specific relation to the spleen. Ague cake of malaria. A left-sided remedy generally. Anaemic patients where liver and spleen are at fault. Chronic bronchitis with profuse secretion. Marked blood pressure, reducing powers. Active hemastatic, materially reducing the clotting of blood.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Enormous enlargement of the spleen. *Splenitis; pain all up the left side*. Deep-seated pain in left hypochondrium, hypertrophy of spleen. Leucaemia. Violent dyspnoea. Menses profuse, and yellow weakening leucorrhoea. Unable to lie on left side. Pain in liver and back.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diarrhoea; bearing down in abdomen and rectum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constant urging to urinate. Green; frothy; contains bile, sugar.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Tinospora cordifolia* (a Hindoo medicine for chronic cases of fever with enlarged spleen). *Polymnia uvedalia*-Bearsfoot--(acute splenitis with tenderness over left hypochondriac region; spleen enlarged, ague cake. Vascular atony, tissues sodden, flabby and non-elastic. Enlarged glands; influences all ductless glands). *Ceanothus thrysiflorus*-California Lilac--(Pharyngitis, tonsillitis, nasal catarrh, diphtheria. Tincture internally and as a gargle).
Compare: *Berberis; Myrica; Cedron; Agaricus* (spleen).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, motion, lying on left side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First attenuation. Locally as hair tonic.

cedron.name: Cedron
cedron.essence: Periodicity is the most marked characteristic of this drug. Its particularly useful in tropical or in damp, warm, marshy countries. It has been found curative in malarial affections, especially neuralgia. Adapted to persons of a voluptuous disposition, excitable, nervous temperament. Has powers of antidoting snake-bites and stings of insects. Tincture of pure bean scraped on wound. Mania.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Rattlesnake Bean (SIMARUBA FERROGINEA)
Periodicity is the most marked characteristic of this drug. Its particularly useful in tropical or in damp, warm, marshy countries. It has been found curative in malarial affections, especially neuralgia. Adapted to persons of a voluptuous disposition, excitable, nervous temperament. Has powers of antidoting snake-bites and stings of insects. Tincture of pure bean scraped on wound. Mania.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain from temple to temple across eyes. Pain over whole right side of face, coming on about 9 am.Crazy feeling from pain across forehead; worse, working on black. Roaring in ears produced by Cinchona. Whole body seems numb with headache.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Shooting over left eye. Severe *pain in eyeball, with radiating pains around eye*, shooting into nose. Scalding lachrymation. *Supra-orbital neuralgia periodic*. Iritis, choroiditis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lancinating pain in joints; worse, feet and hands. Sudden pain in ball of right thumb, extending up arm to shoulder. Pain in ball of right foot, extending to knee. Shingles, with radiating pain. Dropsy of knee-joint.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chilliness towards evening; then frontal headache extending into parietal region. Red eyes. Heat, with itching of eyes, tearing in limbs, *numbness of limbs*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidote: *Lach*.
Compare: *Ars; China*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture to third attenuation.

cenchris-contortrix.name: Cenchris Contortrix
cenchris-contortrix.essence: Like the other snake poisons, it affects the system profoundly. Like arsenic, it has dyspnoea, mental and physical restlessness, thirst for small quantities of water, necessity for having clothing loose, like Laches. Marked alternation of moods; vivid dreams. Is a wonderful restorative and deep acting remedy. Increased sexual desire in both sexes. Ineffectual attempts to recline. Right ovarian region painful.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Copperhead Snake (ANCISTRODON)
Like the other snake poisons, it affects the system profoundly. Like arsenic, it has dyspnoea, mental and physical restlessness, thirst for small quantities of water, necessity for having clothing loose, like Laches. Marked alternation of moods; vivid dreams. Is a wonderful restorative and deep acting remedy. Increased sexual desire in both sexes. Ineffectual attempts to recline. Right ovarian region painful.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Forgetful, absent-minded, alternating moods. Aching pain in left frontal eminence and left side of teeth. Swelling around eyes, aching and itching in eyes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels distended, fills whole chest, as if it fell down in abdomen; sharp stitches, fluttering under left scapula.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dreams horrible and vivid; lascivious.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, pressure; lying down; afternoon and night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Ars; Laches. Clotho Arictans--*Puff Adder.--Should have a great sphere of usefulness in many conditions where excessive swelling is a leading feature (John H. Clarke, M. D).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in neck, back, shoulders, down arms, hands and fingers. Pain in knees and joints of lower extremities.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Convulsive pains at the heart; feels as if transfixed. Pain in chest through heart, with pain running toward spleen. Pain in left pectoral muscle and cartilages of left lower ribs. Sensation of a great weight on heart, and pricking pain. Hypertrophy of heart. Difficult, sighing respiration, as from some compression of chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching of skin (*Dolich; Sulph*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: A Night-blooming Cereus

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Great desire to work and to be doing something useful.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Occipital headache and *pain through the globe of the eyes and orbits* (*Cedron; Onos*). Pain across the brain from left to right. Pain along right malar bone running to temple.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Cactus; Spigel; Kalmia; Cereus serpentinus* (Very irritable with tendency to swear; wild anger and low morals. Disturbance in speech; in writing leaves off the last syllable. Paralyzed feeling. Pains in heart, and dwindling of sexual organs. Emissions, followed by pain in testicles).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to sixth attenuation.

cerium-oxalicum.name: Cerium Oxalicum
cerium-oxalicum.essence: Spasmodic reflex vomiting and spasmodic cough are within the sphere of this remedy. *Vomiting of pregnancy*, and of half-digested food. Whooping cough, with vomiting and haemorrhage. Dysmenorrhoea in fleshy, robust women. Better when flow is established.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Oxalate of Cerium
Spasmodic reflex vomiting and spasmodic cough are within the sphere of this remedy. *Vomiting of pregnancy*, and of half-digested food. Whooping cough, with vomiting and haemorrhage. Dysmenorrhoea in fleshy, robust women. Better when flow is established.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Ingluvin*--(made from gizzard of a fowl). Vomiting of pregnancy; gastric neurasthenia. Infantile vomiting and diarrhoea. 3x Trit. *Amygdal; Lactic ac; Ipecac*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First trituration.

chaparro-amargoso.name: Chaparro Amargoso
chaparro-amargoso.essence:
Chronic diarrhoea. Tenderness over liver. Stools little pain, but with much mucus. Dysentery. Acts as a tonic and antiperiodic.

Compare: *Kali carb; Cup, ars; Caps*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Goat-bush
Chronic diarrhoea. Tenderness over liver. Stools little pain, but with much mucus. Dysentery. Acts as a tonic and antiperiodic.
Compare: *Kali carb; Cup, ars; Caps*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third attenuation.

chelidonium-majus.name: Chelidonium Majus
chelidonium-majus.essence: A prominent liver remedy, covering many of the direct reflex symptoms of diseased conditions of that organ. The jaundiced skin, and especially the *constant pain under inferior angle of right scapula*, are certain indications. Paralytic drawing and lameness in single parts. The great general lethargy and indisposition to make any effort is also marked. Ailments brought on or renewed by change of weather. *Serous effusions. Hydrocele. Bilious complication during gestation*.

agg: right side, motion, touch, change of weather, very early in morning

complementary: Nux; Sulph; Bry; Lyc; Opium; Podophyl; Sanguin; Ars

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constipation; stools hard, round balls, like sheep's dung, bright yellow, pasty; clay-colored, stools float in water; *alternation of diarrhoea and constipation*. Burning and itching of anus (*Ratanh; Sulph*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses too late and too profuse.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Celandine
A prominent liver remedy, covering many of the direct reflex symptoms of diseased conditions of that organ. The jaundiced skin, and especially the *constant pain under inferior angle of right scapula*, are certain indications. Paralytic drawing and lameness in single parts. The great general lethargy and indisposition to make any effort is also marked. Ailments brought on or renewed by change of weather. *Serous effusions. Hydrocele. Bilious complication during gestation*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Icy coldness of occiput from the nape of neck; *feels heavy as lead*. Heavy, lethargic; drowsiness very marked, with general numbness; vertigo, associated with hepatic disturbance. Inclination to fall forward. Right-sided headache down behind ears and shoulder-blade. *Neuralgia over right eye*, right cheek-bone and right ear, with excessive lachrymation, preceded by pain in liver.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Flapping of alae nasi (*Lyc*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dirty yellow color of whites. Sore sensation on looking up. Tears fairly gush out. Orbital neuralgia of right eye, with profuse lachrymation; pupils contracted, relieved by pressure.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Yellow*; worse nose and cheeks. Wilted skin.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue yellow, with imprint of teeth; large and flabby (*Merc; Hyd*). Taste bitter, pasty. Bad odor from mouth. *Prefers hot food and drink*. Nausea, vomiting; *better, very hot water*. Pain through stomach to back and right shoulder-blade. Gastralgia. *Eating relieves temporarily*, especially when accompanied with hepatic symptoms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Jaundice due to hepatic and gall-bladder obstruction. Gall-colic. Distention. Fermentation and sluggish bowels. Constriction across, as by a string. Liver enlarged. Gallstones (*Berberis*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Profuse, foaming, yellow urine, like beer (*Chenop*) dark, turbid.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Very quick and short inspirations; pain on deep inspiration. Dyspnoea. Short, exhausting cough; sensation of dust not relieved by cough. Whooping-cough; spasmodic cough; loose, rattling; expectoration difficult. Pain in *right* side of chest and shoulder, with embarrassed respiration. Small lumps of mucus fly from mouth when coughing. Hoarse in afternoon. Constriction of chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in nape. Stiff neck, head drawn to left. *Fixed pain under inner and lower angle of right scapula*. Pain at lower angle of left scapula.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Pain in arms, shoulders, hands, tips of fingers.
*Icy coldness of tips of fingers*; wrists sore, tearing in metacarpal bones. Whole flesh sore to touch. Rheumatic pain in hips and thighs; intolerable pains in heels, as if pinched by too narrow a shoe; worse, right. Feels paralyzed. Paresis of the lower limbs with rigidity of muscles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry heat of skin; itches, *yellow*. Painful red pimples and pustules. Old, spreading, offensive ulcers. Wilted skin. Sallow, cold, clammy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, right side, motion, touch, change of weather, very early in morning. *Better*, after dinner, from pressure.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
*Chelidonin*.--(Spasm of smooth muscle everywhere, intestinal colic, uterine colic, bronchial spasm, tachycardia, etc). *Boldo*-Boldoa fragrans--(Bladder atony; cholecystitis and biliary calculus. Bitter taste, no appetite; constipation, hypochondriasis languor, congestion of liver; burning weight in liver and stomach. Painful hepatic diseases. Disturbed liver following malaria). *Elemuy Gauteria*--(Stones in kidneys and bladder; grain doses of powdered bark in water or 5 drops of tincture. Pellagra).
*Sulph* often completes its work.
Complementary: *Lycop; Bryon*.
Antidote: *Chamom*.
Compare: *Nux; Sulph; Bry; Lyc; Opium; Podophyl; Sanguin; Ars*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture and lower attenuations.

chelone-glabra.name: Chelone Glabra
chelone-glabra.essence: A remedy in liver affections with pain or soreness of the left lobe of the liver and extending downwards. Dumb ague. Soreness of external parts, as if skin were off; debility. Malaise, following intermittents. Dyspepsia with hepatic torpor. Jaundice. *Round and thread worms*. It is an enemy to every kind of worm infesting the human body.
chelone-glabra.dosing: Tincture, in one to five drop doses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Snakehead (CHELONE)
A remedy in liver affections with pain or soreness of the left lobe of the liver and extending downwards. Dumb ague. Soreness of external parts, as if skin were off; debility. Malaise, following intermittents. Dyspepsia with hepatic torpor. Jaundice. *Round and thread worms*. It is an enemy to every kind of worm infesting the human body.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, in one to five drop doses.

chenopodium-ambrosioides-var-anthelminti.name: Chenopodium Ambrosioides & Var. Anthelminticum
chenopodium-ambrosioides-var-anthelminti.essence: Characteristic pain in scapula very marked. Symptoms of apoplexy, right hemiplegia, and aphasia. Stertorous breathing (*Opium*). Sudden *vertigo*. Meniere's disease. Affections of auditory nerves (*Nat salicyl*). Oil of Chenopodium for hookworm and roundworm.
chenopodium-ambrosioides-var-anthelminti.dosing: Third potency. Oil of Chenopodium for hookworm, 10 minim doses every 2 hours for 3 doses; also *Carbon tetrachloride*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Jerusalem Oak
Characteristic pain in scapula very marked. Symptoms of apoplexy, right hemiplegia, and aphasia. Stertorous breathing (*Opium*). Sudden *vertigo*. Meniere's disease. Affections of auditory nerves (*Nat salicyl*). Oil of Chenopodium for hookworm and roundworm.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Torpor of auditory nerve. Hearing better for *high-pitched* sounds. Comparative deafness to sound of voice, but *great sensitiveness to sound, as of passing vehicles* and also a shrinking from low tones. Buzzing in ears. Enlargement of tonsils. *Aural vertigo*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Intense pain between angle of right shoulder-blade near spine*, and through the chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Copious, yellow, foaming urine, with acrid sensation in urethra. Yellowish sediment (*Chel*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Opium; China; Chelid*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency. Oil of Chenopodium for hookworm, 10 minim doses every 2 hours for 3 doses; also *Carbon tetrachloride*.

chimaphila-umbellata.name: Chimaphila Umbellata
chimaphila-umbellata.essence:
Acts principally on kidneys, and genito-urinary tract; affects also lymphatic and mesenteric glands and female mammae. Plethoric young women with dysuria. Women with large breasts. Hepatic and renal dropsies; chronic alcoholics. Incipient and progressive cataracts.

One of the remedies whose symptoms point to its employment in bladder affections, notably catarrh, acute and chronic. *Scanty urine, and loaded with ropy, muco-purulent sediment. Prostatic enlargement*.

agg: from sitting on cold stones or pavements

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Pipsissewa
Acts principally on kidneys, and genito-urinary tract; affects also lymphatic and mesenteric glands and female mammae. Plethoric young women with dysuria. Women with large breasts. Hepatic and renal dropsies; chronic alcoholics. Incipient and progressive cataracts.
One of the remedies whose symptoms point to its employment in bladder affections, notably catarrh, acute and chronic. *Scanty urine, and loaded with ropy, muco-purulent sediment. Prostatic enlargement*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in left frontal protuberance. Halo about the light. Itching of eyelids. Stabbing pain in left eye with lachrymation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Toothache, worse after eating and exertion, better cool water. Pain as if tooth was being gently pulled.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Urging to urinate. Urine turbid, offensive, containing ropy or bloody mucus, and depositing a copious sediment. Burning and scalding during micturition, and straining afterwards. *Must strain* before flow comes. Scanty urine. Acute prostatitis, retention, and *feeling of a ball in perineum* (*Cann ind*). Fluttering in region of kidney. *Sugar in urine*. Unable to urinate without standing with feet wide apart and body inclined forward.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Labia inflamed, swollen. Pain in vagina. Hot flashes. Painful *tumor of mammae*, not ulcerated, with undue secretion of milk. Rapid atrophy of breasts. Women with *very large breasts* and tumor in the mammary gland with *sharp* pain through it.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Smarting in urethra from neck of bladder to meatus. Gleet. Loss of prostatic fluid. Prostatic enlargement and irritation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scrofulous ulcers. Glandular enlargements.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feeling of a band above left knee.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, in damp weather; from sitting on cold stones or pavements; left side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Chimaph maculata* (intense gnawing hunger; burning fever; sensation of swelling in arm pits); *Uva; Ledum; Epigoea*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third attenuation.

chininum-arsenicosum.name: Chininum Arsenicosum
chininum-arsenicosum.essence: The symptoms of general *weariness and prostration* produced by the drug have been utilized in prescribing it homeopathically as a general tonic, often with very marked beneficial and prompt effect. In diphtheria with great prostration, cases that are prolonged, especially, and in malarial affections, neuralgia, etc, it has been found curative. Asthmatic attacks which recur periodically, with great prostration. Icy skin. Pressure in the solar plexus, with tender spine back of it.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Arsenite of Quinine
The symptoms of general *weariness and prostration* produced by the drug have been utilized in prescribing it homeopathically as a general tonic, often with very marked beneficial and prompt effect. In diphtheria with great prostration, cases that are prolonged, especially, and in malarial affections, neuralgia, etc, it has been found curative. Asthmatic attacks which recur periodically, with great prostration. Icy skin. Pressure in the solar plexus, with tender spine back of it.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tired feeling. Head feels too full. Throbbing. Great anxiety. Great irritability. Vertigo; worse looking up. Dull, heavy headache, frontal and occipital. Darting pains running up into head.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Intense photophobia and orbicular spasm; gushing hot tears. Flickering with pain and lachrymation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue thickly furred; yellow, slimy coating. Bitter taste. No appetite.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Alternation of hyperacidity and decrease of acid. Hyperchlorhydria (*Robinia; Arg nit; Orexine tannate*). Thirst for water, yet it disturbs. *Anorexia. Eggs produce diarrhoea*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Palpitation. Sensation as if heart stopped. Suffocative attacks, occurring in periodical paroxysms. Must have open air. Short of breath on ascending; cardiac dyspnoea; circulatory weakness after acute infections; early myocardial degeneration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sleeplessness due to nervous causes (Single dose of 5th or 6th potency).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Weak limbs. *Coldness of hands and feet, knees and limbs*. Tearing pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Continuous, with weakness. System depleted.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Chininum*; also *Ferrum Citricum* (in nephritis with great anaemia; acid dyspepsia in chlorosis. Morbus maculosus Werlhoffii); *Chinin mur* (in severe neuralgic pains around eyes, with chills; exaggerated sensitiveness to alcohol and tobacco; prostration and restlessness). *OEnothera* (effortless diarrhoea with nervous exhaustion; incipient hydrocephaloid). *Macrozamia spiralis* (extreme debility after illness; collapse).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second and third trituration.

chininum-sulphuricum.name: Chininum Sulphuricum
chininum-sulphuricum.essence: A dose of Chinin sulph in high potency sometimes arouses suppressed malaria, and brings back the paroxysm. Aside from its undoubted influence over malaria, it is indicated homeopathically whenever there is marked periodicity and spinal sensitiveness. *Acute articular rheumatism*. Polyarticular gout. Pruritus and congested conditions of the rectum. Symptoms of *chronic interstitial nephritis*. Retro-bulbar neuritis with sudden loss of sight. Thready vessels. Hiccough.

complementary: Ars; Eupat; Methyl blue. Camphor mono-bromide

chininum-sulphuricum.dosing: First to third triturations; also thirtieth potency and higher.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Neuralgia commences under eye; extends into and around it. Pains return with great regularity; *relieved by pressure*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Great sensitiveness of the dorsal vertebrae*; pain on pressure. Last cervical sensitive. Pain extends to head and neck.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Sulphite of Quinine
A dose of Chinin sulph in high potency sometimes arouses suppressed malaria, and brings back the paroxysm. Aside from its undoubted influence over malaria, it is indicated homeopathically whenever there is marked periodicity and spinal sensitiveness. *Acute articular rheumatism*. Polyarticular gout. Pruritus and congested conditions of the rectum. Symptoms of *chronic interstitial nephritis*. Retro-bulbar neuritis with sudden loss of sight. Thready vessels. Hiccough.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: An immediate and rapid decrease in red blood cells and reduction in hemoglobin with increase in elimination of chlorides. Tendency to polynucleated leucocytosis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in forehead and temples, increasing gradually at noon, of malarial origin, with vertigo and pulsation. Worse left side. Falling in street. Inability to remain standing. Amaurosis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent ringing, buzzing, *and roaring in ears, with deafness*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bloody. Turbid, slimy, clay-colored, greasy sediment. Small amount of urea and phosphoric acid with excess of uric acid and abundance of chlorides, accompanied by subnormal temperature. Excessive flow. Albuminuria

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching; erythema, urticaria, icterus, vesication, pustules, purpura. Great sensitiveness. Shriveled skin.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chill daily at 3 pm. Painful swelling of various veins during a chill. Shivering even in a warm room. Anguish. Subnormal temperature.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Chin salicyl* (Deafness, tinnitus, and Meniere's disease). *Ars; Eupat; Methyl blue. Camphor mono-bromide* (is said to intensify the action of Quinine and render it more permanent). *Baja*, an East Indian drug, (said to be almost infallible in intermittent fever, quartan type; pulsating headache injected eyes, flushed face. Liver and spleen enlarged. OEdema). Also *Pambotano*, Mexican remedy for intermittent and tropical fevers.
Antidotes: *Parthenum; Natr mur; Lach; Arn; Puls*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third triturations; also thirtieth potency and higher.

chionanthus-virginica.name: Chionanthus Virginica
chionanthus-virginica.essence:
This remedy is often of service in many types of headaches, neurasthenic,

*periodical sick*, menstrual and bilious. Taken for several weeks, drop doses, will often break up the sick headache habit. The pain in the forehead, chiefly over eyes. Eyeballs very painful, with pressure over root of nose. Hepatic derangements. *Jaundice*. Enlarged spleen (*Ceanoth*). Jaundice with arrest of menses. A prominent liver remedy. *Gallstones* (*Berberis; Cholest; Calc*). *Diabetes mellitus*. Paroxysmal, abdo...

complementary: Cinchona; Ceanoth; Chelidon; Carduus; Podophyl; Lept

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Fringe-tree (CHIONANTHUS)
This remedy is often of service in many types of headaches, neurasthenic,
*periodical sick*, menstrual and bilious. Taken for several weeks, drop doses, will often break up the sick headache habit. The pain in the forehead, chiefly over eyes. Eyeballs very painful, with pressure over root of nose. Hepatic derangements. *Jaundice*. Enlarged spleen (*Ceanoth*). Jaundice with arrest of menses. A prominent liver remedy. *Gallstones* (*Berberis; Cholest; Calc*). *Diabetes mellitus*. Paroxysmal, abdominal pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Listless, apathetic. Dull frontal headache, over root of nose, over eyes, through temples, worse stooping, motion, jar. *Yellow conjunctiva*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Broad with thick yellow fur.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry sensation not relieved by water, also profuse saliva.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aching in umbilical region, griping. Feels as if a string were tied in a "slip-knot" around intestines which was suddenly drawn tight and then gradually loosened. *Sore; enlarged, with jaundice* and constipation. Clay-colored stool, also soft, yellow and pasty. Tongue heavily coated. No appetite. Bilious colic. Hepatic region tender. Pancreatic disease and other glandular disorders.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Large amount of high specific gravity; frequent urination; bile and sugar in urine. Urine very dark.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Yellow; marked moisture of skin. Sallow, greenish, itching.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Cinchona; Ceanoth; Chelidon; Carduus; Podophyl; Lept*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture and first attenuation.

chloroformum.name: Chloroformum
chloroformum.essence:
General anaesthetic, antispasmodic. Complete muscular relaxation. Weak and quick pulse, shallow or stertorous breathing. Convulsions, nephritic or biliary colic, gastralgia.

Symptoms obtained by Dr. D. Macfarlan with the 6th potency.

Great weakness, especially on right side. Limbs very tired from knees down. Much perspiration all over face and chest; drowsy and dizzy; dry lips and throat; dry tickling cough at night. Flatulence; food regurgitates; sore and bruised feeling in stomach; catching ...
chloroformum.dosing: Higher attenuations, or sixth. *Phosphorus* is the remedy to give in narcosis of chloroform.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Chloroform (CHLOROFORMUM)
General anaesthetic, antispasmodic. Complete muscular relaxation. Weak and quick pulse, shallow or stertorous breathing. Convulsions, nephritic or biliary colic, gastralgia.
Symptoms obtained by Dr. D. Macfarlan with the 6th potency.
Great weakness, especially on right side. Limbs very tired from knees down. Much perspiration all over face and chest; drowsy and dizzy; dry lips and throat; dry tickling cough at night. Flatulence; food regurgitates; sore and bruised feeling in stomach; catching pain around heart. Sharp pain in right chest when he takes long breath; shortness of breath on exertion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Delirium where excitement and violence predominate. Head drawn down upon the shoulders, eyes opened and closed rapidly, pupils contracted; rapid convulsive movements of face, of muscles, of extremities.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Ether* Post-operative Bronchitis (Prof. Bier). *Spiritus Aetheris Compositus*.--(Hoffman's Anodyne)--(Flatulence; angina pectoris. Dose 5m to 1 dram in water).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Higher attenuations, or sixth. *Phosphorus* is the remedy to give in narcosis of chloroform.

chloralum-hydratum.name: Chloralum Hydratum
chloralum-hydratum.essence: This drug, used in physiological doses, is a powerful hypnotic and cardiac depressant. It has a marked effect on the skin, producing erythema, ecchymosis, etc, which symptoms have been utilized homeopathically with much success, especially in the treatment of hives. Emotional excitability, hallucinations. Night terrors in children. Muscular prostration.

agg: after hot drinks, stimulants, eating, night

chloralum-hydratum.dosing: First trituration in hives, otherwise, higher potencies. Locally, in offensive foot-sweat, bathe with one per cent solution. For its physiological effects, five to twenty grains. Use cautiously.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Chloral Hydrate (CHLORALUM)
This drug, used in physiological doses, is a powerful hypnotic and cardiac depressant. It has a marked effect on the skin, producing erythema, ecchymosis, etc, which symptoms have been utilized homeopathically with much success, especially in the treatment of hives. Emotional excitability, hallucinations. Night terrors in children. Muscular prostration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Morning headache; worse in forehead, also in occiput, on motion; better in open air. Passive cerebral hyperaemia (use 30th). Feeling as if hot band were drawn from temple to temple. Hears voices.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Eyes blood-shot and watery. Circles of light, black spots. Illusions of sight where eyes are closed or at night. Dim vision. Conjunctivitis, burning in eye and lids; eyeball feels too large; everything looks *white*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Red blotches, like measles. *Urticaria, worse, spirituous liquors, hot drinks*. Erythema aggravated by alcoholic drinks, with palpitation; causes pain in tendons and extensors. Intense itching. Surface of body *stone-cold*. Wheals come on from a chill; better, warmth. Purpura (*Phos; Crotal*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Extreme dyspnoea, with sensation of weight and constriction of chest. Asthma, with sleeplessness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Insomnia, hallucinations, horrid dreams. Somnolence.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, after hot drinks, stimulants, eating, night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Ammon; Atrop; Dig; Mosch*.
Compare: *Bell; Opium; Apis; Veronal*--(a dangerous drug made by the action of alcohol upon urea and contains the same radical that alcohol does. Makes a man just as drunk as pure alcohol. Staggers, cannot stand up) (Dr. Varney). (Confluent reddish spots; dermatitis, itching of glans and prepuce; circumscribed dermatitis patch on first metacarpal phalangeal joint). *Luminal*--(Sleeplessness with skin symptoms in migraine; lethargy like epidemic encephalitis) (Dr. Royal).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First trituration in hives, otherwise, higher potencies. Locally, in offensive foot-sweat, bathe with one per cent solution. For its physiological effects, five to twenty grains. Use cautiously.

chlorum.name: Chlorum
chlorum.essence: The marked effect on the respiratory organs, producing spasm of the glottis, is the chief symptom of the drug. Asthma to relieve the spasm of glottis. Useful externally and internally in gangrene.
chlorum.dosing: Chlorine water, when required of full strength, must be freshly prepared. Fourth to sixth potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Chlorine Gas in Water
The marked effect on the respiratory organs, producing spasm of the glottis, is the chief symptom of the drug. Asthma to relieve the spasm of glottis. Useful externally and internally in gangrene.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fear of becoming crazy. Marked loss of memory, *especially for names*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sooty, smoky nostrils. Coryza with sudden gushes of sharp, corroding fluid, making nose sore inside and about the alae. *Constriction, with suffocation. Spasm of the glottis*. Irritation of epiglottis, larynx, and bronchi. Loss of voice from damp air. *Sudden dyspnoea from spasm of the vocal cords*, with staring protruding eyes, blue face, cold sweat, pulse small. *Inspiration free, with obstructed expiration.* (*Mephit*). Livid face. Prolonged, loud, whistling rales. Extreme dryness of tongue.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chlorine water, when required of full strength, must be freshly prepared. Fourth to sixth potency.

cholesterinum.name: Cholesterinum
cholesterinum.essence: Cholesterine--The proximate principle--Furnished by the epithelium lining of gall bladder and the larger ducts

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Cholesterine--The proximate principle--Furnished by the epithelium lining of gall bladder and the larger ducts
For cancer of the liver. *Obstinate hepatic engorgements*. Burning pain in side; on walking holds his hand on side, hurts him so. Opacities of the vitreous. Jaundice; gallstones. Cholesterine is the physiological opponent of Lecithin. Both seem to play some unknown part in the growth of tumors. Gallstones and insomnia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Taurocholate of soda* in Homeopathy.--Dr. I. P. Tessier, in an interesting study of the action of bile and its salts, in hepatic affections, analyzes a number of experiments by leading authorities, with the object of determining this action, and concludes that in the *Taurocholate of Soda*, homeopathy has a useful remedy against certain forms of hypoglobular anaemia. The claim that its pathogenesis and toxicology clearly indicate its value, and that it should also serve us as a remedy in cases of hypertrophy of the spleen and ganglia. He calls our attention to the fact, that it produces dyspnoea, the Cheyne-Stokes rhythm, acute pulmonary oedema, and intense exaggeration of the cardiac pulsations, offering a good field for clinical studies and experimentation of great interest, which may give fruitful and important results.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third trituration.

chromicum-acidum.name: Chromicum Acidum
chromicum-acidum.essence: Diphtheria, post-nasal tumors, and epithelioma of the tongue have been benefited by this drug. Bloody, foul-smelling lochia. Symptoms come and go *suddenly*, and return periodically; offensive discharges.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Chromic Acid
Diphtheria, post-nasal tumors, and epithelioma of the tongue have been benefited by this drug. Bloody, foul-smelling lochia. Symptoms come and go *suddenly*, and return periodically; offensive discharges.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ulcer and scabs in nose. Offensive smell. Corrosive pain. Ozaena (*Aur*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diphtheria; sore throat. Tough mucus, with inclination to swallow it; worse, causing hawking. Post-nasal tumors.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Uneasiness in limbs. Pain in shoulder-blades and back of neck. Pain in knees and balls of feet. Drawing pain in soles while walking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Watery, frequent, copious, with nausea and vertigo. Haemorrhoids, internal and bleeding. Weakness in small of back.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Kali bich; Rhus; Chromium Sulphate* (in locomotor ataxia, goitre, *prostatic hypertrophy*. Herpes preputialis. Wry neck. Also exophthalmic, inhibits the vagus, relieving tachycardia. Acts like a nerve tonic where there is lack of nervous tone. Fibroid tumors. Infantile paralysis. Dose for adults, 3 to 5 grains after meals and at bedtime).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Homeopathically, third to sixth trituration.

chrysarobinum.name: Chrysarobinum
chrysarobinum.essence: Acts as a powerful irritant of the skin and used successfully in skin diseases especially in *ringworm, psoriasis*, herpes tonsurans acne rosacea. Vesicular or squamous lesions, associated with foul smelling discharge and crust formation, tending to become confluent and to give the appearance of a single crust covering the entire area (Bernstein). *Violent itching*, thighs, legs and *ears*. Dry, scaly eruption, especially around eyes and ears, scabs with pus underneath (*Mezer*).
chrysarobinum.dosing: Locally, as a cerate, 4-8 grains to the ounce, of vaseline. Internally, third to sixth potency. Used externally; should be used with caution on account of its ability to produce inflammation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Goa Powder-Andira araroba
Acts as a powerful irritant of the skin and used successfully in skin diseases especially in *ringworm, psoriasis*, herpes tonsurans acne rosacea. Vesicular or squamous lesions, associated with foul smelling discharge and crust formation, tending to become confluent and to give the appearance of a single crust covering the entire area (Bernstein). *Violent itching*, thighs, legs and *ears*. Dry, scaly eruption, especially around eyes and ears, scabs with pus underneath (*Mezer*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Blepharitis, conjunctivitis keratitis. Intense photophobia. Optical hyperaesthesia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Eczema behind ears. Filthy, scabby condition with tendency to form thick crust. Whole ear and surrounding tissue appears to be one scab.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chrysarobinum contains chrysophan, which is rapidly oxidized into chrysophanic acid. This is also contained in Rhubarb and Senna.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Locally, as a cerate, 4-8 grains to the ounce, of vaseline. Internally, third to sixth potency. Used externally; should be used with caution on account of its ability to produce inflammation.

cicuta-virosa.name: Cicuta Virosa
cicuta-virosa.essence: The action on the nervous system, producing spasmodic affections, viz, hiccough, trismus, tetanus, and convulsions, give the pathological picture calling especially for this remedy, whenever this is further characterized, by the more individual symptoms of the drug. Among these, are the *bending of the head, neck, and spine backwards*, and the general action of the patient is *violent*, with frightful distortions. Violent, strange desires. Sensation of internal chill. Moaning and howling. Does a...

agg: from touch, draughts, concussion, tobacco smoke

complementary: Hydrocy acid; Con; Oenanth; Strychnia; Bellad

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Eczema; no itching, exudation forms into a *hard, lemon-colored crust*. Suppressed eruption causes brain disease. Elevated eruptions, as large as peas. Chronic impetigo.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, from touch, draughts, concussion, tobacco smoke.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Spasms and cramps in muscles of nape of neck, and spasmodic drawing backward of head. Curved limbs cannot be straightened nor straight ones bent. *Back bent backward like an arch*. Jerking, tearing in coccyx, especially during menses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Water Hemlock
The action on the nervous system, producing spasmodic affections, viz, hiccough, trismus, tetanus, and convulsions, give the pathological picture calling especially for this remedy, whenever this is further characterized, by the more individual symptoms of the drug. Among these, are the *bending of the head, neck, and spine backwards*, and the general action of the patient is *violent*, with frightful distortions. Violent, strange desires. Sensation of internal chill. Moaning and howling. Does absurd things. Marked action on the skin.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Delirium, with singing, dancing and funny gestures. Everything appears strange and terrible. Confounds present with the past; feels like a child. Stupid feeling. Melancholy, with indifference. Mistrustful. Epilepsy; moaning and whining. Vivid dreams.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Head turned or twisted to one side. Cerebro-spinal meningitis. Cervical muscles contracted*. Vertigo, with gastralgia, and muscular spasms. Sudden, violent shocks through head. Stares persistently at objects. *Convulsions* from concussion of brain. Thick, yellow scabs on head. Head symptoms relieved by emission of flatus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: When reading, letters disappear. *Pupils dilated, insensible strabismus*. Objects recede, approach, and seem double. Eyes stare. Pupils get behind upper lids as head inclines. Effects of exposure to snow. Spasmodic affections of eyes and its appendages. Strabismus; periodic, spasmodic after a fall or a blow.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Difficult hearing. Sudden detonations especially on swallowing. *Haemorrhage from ears*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pustules which run together forming thick, yellow scabs on face and head, corners of mouth and chin, with burning pain. *Red face*. Trismus; disposition to grind teeth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry. Feels as if grown together. Spasms of oesophagus; cannot swallow. Effects on oesophagus from swallowing sharp piece of bone.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thirst; burning pressure; *hiccough*. Throbbing in pit of stomach, which has become raised to size of fist. Desire for unnatural things, *like coal* (*Alum; Calc*). Indigestion, with insensibility, frothing at mouth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Flatulence with anxiety and crossness. Rumbling in. Distended and painful. Colic with convulsions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diarrhoea in morning, with irresistible desire to urinate. Itching in rectum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chest feels tight; can hardly breathe. Tonic spasm in pectoral muscles. Heat in chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Opium; Arn*.
Compare: *Cicuta Maculata*-Water Hemlock--(Effects very similar; the most prominent symptoms being; Falls unconscious, tetanic or clonic convulsions. Body covered with sweat. Consider in epilepsy and tetanus. Tincture and lower potencies). *Hydrocy acid; Con; Oenanth; Strychnia; Bellad*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to two hundredth attenuation.

cimicifuga-racemosa.name: Cimicifuga Racemosa

agg: the more profuse the flow, the greater the suffering

cimicifuga-racemosa.dosing: First to thirtieth attenuation, third most frequently used.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Black Snake-root (CIMICIFUGA - ACTAEA RACEMOSA - MACROTYS)
Has a wide action upon the cerebrospinal and muscular system, as well as upon the uterus and ovaries. Especially useful in rheumatic, nervous subjects with ovarian irritation, uterine cramps and heavy limbs. Its muscular and crampy pains, primarily of neurotic origin, occurring in nearly every part of the body, are characteristic. *Agitation and pain* indicate it. Pains like electric shocks here and there. Migraine. Symptoms referable to the pelvic organs prominent. "It lessens the frequency and force of the pulse soothes pain and allays irritability".

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation of a cloud enveloping her. Great depression, with *dream of impending evil*. Fears riding in a closed carriage, of being obliged to jump out. Incessant talking. Visions of rats, mice, etc. Delirium tremens; tries to injure himself. Mania following disappearance of neuralgia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Wild feeling in brain. Shooting and throbbing pains in head after mental worry, over-study, or reflex of uterine disease. Waving sensation or *opening and shutting sensation in brain*. Brain feels too large. *Pressing-outward* pain. Tinnitus. Ears sensitive to least noise.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Asthenopia associated with pelvic trouble. Deepseated throbbing and *shooting pains* in eyes, with photophobia from artificial light. *Intense aching of eyeball. Pain from eyes to top of head*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nausea and vomiting caused by pressure on spine and cervical region. Sinking in epigastrium (*Sep; Sulph*). *Gnawing pain*. Tongue pointed and trembling.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Amenorrhoea (use Macrotin preferably). Pain in ovarian region; shoots upward and down anterior surface of thighs. Pain immediately before menses. Menses profuse, dark, *coagulated*, offensive with backache, nervousness; always irregular. Ovarian neuralgia. *Pain across pelvis, from hip to hip*. After-pains, with great sensitiveness and *intolerance to pain*. Infra-mammary pains worse, left side. Facial blemishes in young women.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tickling in throat. Dry, short cough, *worse speaking* and at night. Cough when secretion is scanty-spasmodic, dry with muscular soreness and nervous irritation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Irregular, slow, trembling pulse. Tremulous action. Angina pectoris. Numbness of left arm; feels as if bound to side. Heart's action ceases suddenly, impending suffocation. Left-sided infra-mammary pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Spine very sensitive, especially upper part. *Stiffness and contraction in neck and back*. Intercostal rheumatism. Rheumatic pains in muscles of back and neck. Pain in lumbar and sacral region, down thighs, and through hips. Crick in back.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Uneasy, restless feeling in limbs. Aching in limbs and *muscular soreness*. Rheumatism affecting the belly of muscles, especially large muscles. Choreic movements, accompanied by rheumatism. Jerking of limbs. Stiffness in tendo-Achilles. Heaviness in lower extremities. Heavy, aching, tensive pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sleeplessness. Brain irritation of children during dentition.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Locally and internally for ivy poisoning.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, morning, cold (except headache), during menses; the more profuse the flow, the greater the suffering. *Better*, warmth, eating.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Rhamnus Californica* (*muscular pains*, lumbago, pleurodynia, acute rheumatism). *Derris pinnata* (Neuralgic headaches of rheumatic origin). *Aristolochia milhomens* (pain in tendo-Achilles; diabetes). *Caulophyl; Pulsat; Lilium; Agar; Macrotin* (especially for lumbago).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to thirtieth attenuation, third most frequently used.

cimex-lectularius.name: Cimex Lectularius
cimex-lectularius.essence: Of use in intermittent fever, with weariness and inclination to stretch. Hamstrings feel too short (*Ammon mur*). Flexors mostly affected. Sensation of retraction of arm tendons. Stretching.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Bedbug (CIMEX - ACANTHIA)
Of use in intermittent fever, with weariness and inclination to stretch. Hamstrings feel too short (*Ammon mur*). Flexors mostly affected. Sensation of retraction of arm tendons. Stretching.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent headache, caused by drinking. Great rage; vehement at beginning of chilly stage. Would like to tear everything to pieces. Pain under right frontal bone.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Shooting pain from vagina up towards left ovary.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chilliness of whole body. Sensation as of wind blowing on knees. *Pains in all joints, as if tendons were too short*, especially knee-joints. Chill; worse lying down. Thirst during apyrexia, but little during chilly stage; still less during hot stage, and none during sweating. Musty, offensive sweat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constipation, feces dry and in small balls (*Op; Plumb; Thuj*) and hard. Ulcer of rectum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to two hundredth attenuation.

cineraria-maritima.name: Cineraria Maritima
cineraria-maritima.essence: Has some reputation in the cure of cataract and corneal opacities. Is used externally, by instilling into the eye one drop four or five times a day. This must be kept up for several months. Most effective in traumatic cases. Compare in cataract *Phosph; Platanus; Cannabis; Causticum; Naphthalin; Ledum; Nat mur; Silica*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Dusty Miller (CINERARIA)
Has some reputation in the cure of cataract and corneal opacities. Is used externally, by instilling into the eye one drop four or five times a day. This must be kept up for several months. Most effective in traumatic cases. Compare in cataract *Phosph; Platanus; Cannabis; Causticum; Naphthalin; Ledum; Nat mur; Silica*.

cinnamomum-zeylanicum.name: Cinnamomum Zeylanicum
cinnamomum-zeylanicum.essence: Cancer where pain and fetor are present. Best when skin is intact. Its use in haemorrhages has abundant clinical verification. Nosebleed. Haemorrhages from bowels, haemoptysis, etc. A strain in loins or false step brings on a profuse flow of bright blood. *Post-partum haemorrhage*. Flatulency and diarrhoea. Feeble patients with languid circulation.
cinnamomum-zeylanicum.dosing: Tincture to third potency. For cancer, strong decoction, one-half pint in a day. *Oil of cinnamon* in aqueous solution best local disinfectant. 3-4 drops in two quarts of water as a douche, wherever a germicide and disinfectant is needed. Three drops on sugar for hiccough.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Cinnamon (CINNAMOMUM)
Cancer where pain and fetor are present. Best when skin is intact. Its use in haemorrhages has abundant clinical verification. Nosebleed. Haemorrhages from bowels, haemoptysis, etc. A strain in loins or false step brings on a profuse flow of bright blood. *Post-partum haemorrhage*. Flatulency and diarrhoea. Feeble patients with languid circulation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bearing-down sensation. Menses *early, profuse, prolonged, bright red*. Sleepy. No desire for anything. Fingers seem swollen. Uterine haemorrhages caused by overlifting, during puerperal state; menorrhagia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Ipec; Sil; Trill*.
Antidote: Acon.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture to third potency. For cancer, strong decoction, one-half pint in a day. *Oil of cinnamon* in aqueous solution best local disinfectant. 3-4 drops in two quarts of water as a douche, wherever a germicide and disinfectant is needed. Three drops on sugar for hiccough.

cinnabaris.name: Cinnabaris
cinnabaris.essence: For certain forms of ciliary neuralgia and ulceration upon a syphilitic base, this remedy is most effective. Sleepless during night.

agg: lying on right side (feels as if contents of body were being dragged over to that side)

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Mercuric Sulphide (MERCURIUS SULPHURATUS RUBER)
For certain forms of ciliary neuralgia and ulceration upon a syphilitic base, this remedy is most effective. Sleepless during night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Congestion to head; face purple red.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pains from lachrymal duct around eye to temple, from inner canthus across brows to ear. Severe shooting pain in bones of orbit, especially running from inner to outer canthus in the bone. Redness of whole eye*. Lids granulated; canthi and lids red.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pressive sensation, as from heavy spectacles. Pain about root, extending into bones on each side (*Aur; Kal hyd*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stringy mucus passed through posterior nares into throat. Dryness of mouth and throat; must rinse the mouth. Fiery-looking ulcers in mouth and throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Prepuce swollen; *warts* on it which bleed easily; testicles enlarged; buboes; angry-looking chancres. Syphilides, squamous and vesicular.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Leucorrhoea. Feeling of pressure in vagina.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in forearm from elbow down, including hands. Pain in long bones when barometer lowers; coldness of joints.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Very fiery-red* looking ulcers. Nodes on shin-bones. Buboes. Condyloma, easily bleeding.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, lying on right side (feels as if contents of body were being dragged over to that side).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Hepar; Nitr ac; Thuja; Sep*.
Antidotes: *Hepar; Sulph*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third trituration.

cistus-canadensis.name: Cistus Canadensis
cistus-canadensis.essence: A deep-acting anti-psoric remedy, with marked action in glandular affections, herpetic eruptions, chronic swellings, when patient *is extremely sensitive to cold. Sensation of coldness in various parts*. Scrofulous ophthalmia. Poisoned wounds, bites, phagedenic ulcers. *Malignant disease of the glands of the neck*. Cistus has affinity for naso-pharynx; aborts colds that center in posterior nose. Sniffling.
cistus-canadensis.dosing: First to thirtieth attenuation. Locally as a wash to arrest fetid discharges.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Rock Rose
A deep-acting anti-psoric remedy, with marked action in glandular affections, herpetic eruptions, chronic swellings, when patient *is extremely sensitive to cold. Sensation of coldness in various parts*. Scrofulous ophthalmia. Poisoned wounds, bites, phagedenic ulcers. *Malignant disease of the glands of the neck*. Cistus has affinity for naso-pharynx; aborts colds that center in posterior nose. Sniffling.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
