materiaMedica.text: Itching, burning, and crusts on right zygoma. Lupus, caries; open, bleeding cancer. Tip of nose painful.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scorbutic swollen gums. *Mouth feels cold*; putrid, impure breath. *Pyorrhea* (*Merc cor; Caust; Staph; Kreos*). *Hurts to protrude the tongue*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Watery discharge; also fetid pus. Tetter on and around ears, extending to external meatus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Spongy feeling; *very dry* and *cold air passing over parts causes pain*. Breath, tongue, and throat feel cold. Uvula and tonsils swollen. A small, dry spot in throat; must sip water frequently. Hawking of mucus. Swelling and suppuration of glands of throat. Head drawn to one side by swellings in neck. Sore throat from inhaling the least *cold air*. Heat and itching in throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Cool feeling* in stomach before and after eating. *Cool feeling* in whole abdomen. Desire for cheese.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diarrhoea from coffee and fruit, thin, yellow, urgent; worse in morning.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coldness in chest. The neck is studded with tumors. Induration of mammae. Haemorrhage from lungs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sprained pain in wrist. Tips of fingers sensitive to cold. Tetter on hands. Cold feet. Syphilitic ulcers on lower limbs, with hard swelling around. White swelling.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cannot sleep from coldness in throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Induration and inflammation of mammae. Sensitive to cold air. Bad smelling leucorrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Asthmatic after lying down (trachea feels narrow), preceded by formication.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching all over. Small, painful pimples; lupus. *Glands inflamed and indurated*. Mercurio-syphilitic ulcers. Skin of hands hard, thick, dry, fissured; deep cracks. Itching of swollen hands and arms; general itching which presents sleep. Hemicrania.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, slightest exposure to cold air; mental exertion, excitement. *Better* after eating.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Rhus; Sepia*.
Compare: *Conium; Carbo; Calc; Arg n*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to thirtieth attenuation. Locally as a wash to arrest fetid discharges.

citrus-aurantium-l.name: Citrus Aurantium L.
citrus-aurantium-l.essence: Headache with nausea, vomiting and vertigo. Facial neuralgias mostly right-sided. Thoracic oppression. Frequent and irresistible yawning. Disturbed sleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Bitter Orange
Headache with nausea, vomiting and vertigo. Facial neuralgias mostly right-sided. Thoracic oppression. Frequent and irresistible yawning. Disturbed sleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Citrus decumana*-Grape-fruit (Tinnitus, *head noises* and ringing in ears. Sensation of pressure in the temporal region). *Aurantium*-Orange (neuralgic and skin symptoms. Itching, redness and swelling of hands. Diseases of the aged with coldness and chilliness. Boiled dried *orange peel* excites the intestine in a manner similar to other forms of cellulose or agar. There is an increased flow of bile which continues for hours. It unites both a cholagogue action with a mechanical stimulus to peristalsis). Compare: *Citrus Limonum* (scorbutus, sore throat and cancer pains; checks excessive menstruation). (*Citric Acid*.--Useful in *scurvy* and chronic rheumatism and haemorrhages. All forms of *Dropsy* are benefited with Citric acid and lemon juice, tablespoonful every 3-4 hours. Pain from cancer of tongue. Used as a local application and mouth wash, one dram to 8 ozs of water. For cancer pains generally, often effective).

clematis-erecta.name: Clematis Erecta
clematis-erecta.essence: Scrofulous, rheumatic, gonorrhoeal, and syphilitic patients. Acts especially on skin, *glands* and genito-urinary organs, especially testicles. A remedy of much importance in disturbances of sleep, and neuralgic *pains* in various parts. Many of these pains are relieved by perspiration. Muscles relaxed or twitching. Great emaciation. *Great sleepiness*. Distant pulsation in whole body.

agg: at night, and warmth of bed (washing in cold water)

complementary: Sil; Staph; Petrol; Oleand; Sarsap; Canth; Phos ac; Pulsat

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Virgin's Bower
Scrofulous, rheumatic, gonorrhoeal, and syphilitic patients. Acts especially on skin, *glands* and genito-urinary organs, especially testicles. A remedy of much importance in disturbances of sleep, and neuralgic *pains* in various parts. Many of these pains are relieved by perspiration. Muscles relaxed or twitching. Great emaciation. *Great sleepiness*. Distant pulsation in whole body.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Boring pain in temples. *Confused feeling; better in open air*. Eruption on occiput at base of hair, moist, pustular sensitive, itching.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heat in eyes and *sensitive to air*; must close them. Chronic blepharitis, with sore and swollen meibomain glands. Iritis, great *sensitiveness to cold*. Flickering before eyes. Pustular conjunctivitis, with tinea capitis; eyes inflamed and protruding.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: White blisters on face and nose, as if burned by sun. Swelling of submaxillary glands, with hard tubercles, throbbing, aggravated on being touched. Pain in right side of face to eye, ear and temple; better, holding cold water in mouth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Ache; worse, at night and from tobacco*. Teeth feel too long.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: After eating, weakness in all limbs and pulsation in arteries.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ilio-scrotal neuralgia. *Testicles indurated with bruised feeling*. Swelling of scrotum (*Orchitis*). Right half only. Troubles from suppressed gonorrhoea. Violent erections with stitches in urethra. Testicles hang heavy or retracted, with pain along spermatic cord; worse, right side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tingling in urethra lasting some time after urinating. Frequent, scanty urination; burning at orifice. *Interrupted flow*. Urethra feels constricted. Urine emitted drop by drop. Inability to pass all the urine; dribbling after urinating. Pain worse at night, pain along the spermatic cord. Commencing stricture.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Red, burning, vesicular, scaly, scabby. Itches terribly; worse, washing in cold water; worse face and hands and *scalp around occiput. Glands* hot, painful, *swollen*; worse inguinal glands. Glandular indurations and tumors of breast. Varicose ulcers.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Better*, in open air. *Worse*, at night, and warmth of bed (washing in cold water); new moon--(monthly aggravation).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Clematis vitalba* (varicose and other ulcers); *Sil; Staph; Petrol; Oleand; Sarsap; Canth; Phos ac; Pulsat*.
Antidotes: *Bryon; Camph*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

cobaltum-metallicum.name: Cobaltum Metallicum
cobaltum-metallicum.essence: Adapted to neurasthenic spinal states. Sexual disturbances. Fatigue, agitation, and bone pains, worse in morning.

complementary: Cannab. Ind; Sepia; Zinc; Agnus; Selen

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry and pimply. Pimples about nates, chin, hairy scalp.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Cannab. Ind; Sepia; Zinc; Agnus; Selen*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
The Metal Cobalt (COBALTUM)
Adapted to neurasthenic spinal states. Sexual disturbances. Fatigue, agitation, and bone pains, worse in morning.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: All mental excitement increases suffering. Constant interchange of mental moods.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aches; worse, bending head *forward*. Itching of hairy scalp and beard.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feel too long. Pain in teeth. Cracks across tongue. Coated white (*Ant cr*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Shooting in liver. Pain in spleen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constant dropping of blood from the anus, no blood from the stools.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in right testicle; better, urinating. *Emissions* without erection. Impotence. Backache in lumbar region and weak legs. Lewd dreams. Pain in end of urethra; greenish discharge; brown spots on genitals and abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pain in back and sacrum; worse while sitting*; better, walking or lying. Weakness in legs and backache after emissions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aching in wrist-joints. Shooting into thighs from liver. *Weak knees*. Trembling in limbs. Tingling in feet. Foot-sweat, mostly between toes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Unrefreshing; *disturbed by lewd dreams*.

coca.name: Coca
coca.essence: The Divine Plant of the Incas-but the Spanish priests denounced it as "un delusion del demonio"

amel: riding, quick motion in open air

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
The Divine Plant of the Incas-but the Spanish priests denounced it as "un delusion del demonio"
The mountaineer's remedy. Useful in a variety of complaints incidental to mountain climbing, such as palpitation, dyspnoea, anxiety and insomnia. Exhausted nervous system from physical and mental strain. Caries of teeth. *Loss of voice*.--Give 5-6 drops, every half hour, two hours before expected demand on voice. Nocturnal enuresis. Emphysema (*Quebracho*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Melancholy; bashful, ill at ease in society, irritable, delights in solitude and obscurity. Sense of right and wrong abolished.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Fainting fit from climbing mountains. Shocks coming from occiput with vertigo. *Noises in ear*. Headache with vertigo, preceded by flashes of light. Like a band across forehead. Diplopia. Tongue furred.
*Headaches of high altitudes*. Tinnitus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Peppery sensation in mouth. Longing for alcoholic liquors and tobacco. Great satiety for a long time. Incarcerated flatus; rises with noise and violence, as if it would split the oesophagus. Tympanitic distention of abdomen. No appetite but for sweets.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Palpitation*, with weak heart and dyspnoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diabetes, with impotency (*Phos ac*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hawking of small, transparent pieces of mucus. Weak vocal cords. *Hoarseness*; worse after talking. *Want of breath, short breath*, especially in aged athletes, and alcoholic users. Haemoptysis. *Asthma*, spasmodic variety.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Can find no rest anywhere, but sleepy. Nervousness and nightly restlessness during teething.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Better*, from wine; riding, quick motion in open air. *Worse*, ascending, high altitudes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Ars; Paulin; Cyp; Chamom*.
Antidote: *Gels*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture to third attenuation.

cocainum-hydrochloricum.name: Cocainum Hydrochloricum
cocainum-hydrochloricum.essence:
Besides the great usefulness of Cocaine as a local anaesthetic, it has specific homeopathic uses, though the symptoms are mainly clinical only.

Sensation as *if small foreign bodies or worms were under the skin*.
cocainum-hydrochloricum.dosing: Lower potencies. As a local application to mucous membranes, 2-4 %.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
An Alkaloid from Erythroxylon Coca (COCAINA)
Besides the great usefulness of Cocaine as a local anaesthetic, it has specific homeopathic uses, though the symptoms are mainly clinical only.
Sensation as *if small foreign bodies or worms were under the skin*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Talkative. Constant desire to do something great, *to undertake vast feats of strength*. Cerebral activity. Frightful persecutory hallucinations; *sees and feels bugs and worms. Moral sense blunted*. Personal appearance neglected. Thinks he hears unpleasant remarks about himself. Hallucinations of hearing. Irrational *jealousy*. Insomnia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Throbbing and bursting sensation. *Pupils dilated*. Hearing greatly increased. Roaring and noises in head.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Glaucoma, increased tension, decreased corneal sensibility. Eyes staring, expressionless.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry, burning, tickling, constricted, paralysis of muscles of deglutition. Speech difficult.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Loss of appetite for solid food. *Likes sweets. Haemorrhages* from bowels, stomach.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chorea; paralysis agitans; alcoholic tremors and senile trembling. Local sensory paralysis. Formication and numbness in hands and forearms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Restless, cannot sleep for hours after retiring.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coldness with intense pallor.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Stovain* (an analgesic, a vasomotor dilator). Antidote to disagreeable effects occasionally resulting from injection of cocaine into skin or gums, drop doses of nitroglycer. 1 % sol.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lower potencies. As a local application to mucous membranes, 2-4 %.

coccus-cacti.name: Coccus Cacti
coccus-cacti.essence: The clinical application of the symptoms of this remedy, place it among the medicines for spasmodic and whooping coughs, and catarrhal conditions of the bladder; spasmodic pains in kidneys, with visceral tenesmus. Anuria, anasarca, ascites.

agg: left side, after sleep, touch, pressure of clothing, brushing teeth, slightest exertion

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Cochineal
The clinical application of the symptoms of this remedy, place it among the medicines for spasmodic and whooping coughs, and catarrhal conditions of the bladder; spasmodic pains in kidneys, with visceral tenesmus. Anuria, anasarca, ascites.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Early morning or afternoon sadness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Suboccipital soreness; worse after sleep and exertion. Headache, worse from lying on back, better with the head high. Dull pain over right eye in morning. *Sensation of a foreign body between upper lid and eyeball*. Distress from cinders lodged in eye.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constant hawking from enlarged uvula; coryza, with inflamed fauces; *accumulation of thick viscid mucus*, which is expectorated with great difficulty. *Tickling in larynx*. Sensation of a crumb behind larynx, must swallow continually; brushing teeth causes cough. Fauces very sensitive. Suffocative cough; worse, first waking, with tough, white mucus, which strangles. Spasmodic morning cough. *Whooping cough attacks end with vomiting of this tough mucus*. Chronic bronchitis complicated with gravel; large quantities of albuminous, tenacious mucus, are expectorated. Walking against wind takes breath away.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation as if everything were pressed toward the heart.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Urging to urinate; *brick-red sediment. Urinary calculi, haematuria, urates*, and uric acid; lancinating pains from kidney to bladder. Deep-colored, thick urine. Dysuria.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses too early, profuse, *black* and thick; *dark clots*, with dysuria. Intermittent menstruation; flow only in evening and at night. *Large clots* escape when passing water. *Labia* inflamed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, left side, after sleep, touch, pressure of clothing, brushing teeth, slightest exertion. *Better*, walking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Canth; Cact; Sars*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lower triturations.

cocculus-indicus.name: Cocculus Indicus
cocculus-indicus.essence: Within the sphere of action of Cocculus are many spasmodic and paretic affections, notably those affecting one-half of the body. Affects the cerebrum, will not cure convulsive seizures proceeding from the spinal cord (A. E. Hinsdale) *Painful contracture* of limbs and trunk; tetanus. Many of the evil *effects of night-watching* are relieved by it. It shows a special, attraction *for light-haired females*, especially during pregnancy, causing much nausea and backache. Unmarried and childless wome...

agg: eating, after loss of sleep, open air, smoking, riding, swimming, touch, noise, jar
afternoon. Menstrual period. After emotional disturbance

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Paralysis of facial nerve. Cramp-like pain in masseter muscle; *worse, opening mouth*. Prosopalgia in afternoon, with wide radiations of pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Indian Cockle (COCCULUS)
Within the sphere of action of Cocculus are many spasmodic and paretic affections, notably those affecting one-half of the body. Affects the cerebrum, will not cure convulsive seizures proceeding from the spinal cord (A. E. Hinsdale) *Painful contracture* of limbs and trunk; tetanus. Many of the evil *effects of night-watching* are relieved by it. It shows a special, attraction *for light-haired females*, especially during pregnancy, causing much nausea and backache. Unmarried and childless women, sensitive and romantic girls, etc. All its symptoms are worse riding in a carriage or on shipboard; hence its use in seasickness. Sensation of *hollowness*, or emptiness, as if parts had gone to sleep. Feels too weak to talk loud.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Capricious. Heavy and stupid. *Time passes too quickly*; absorbed in reveries. Inclination to sing irresistible. Slow of comprehension. Mind benumbed. *Profound sadness*. Cannot bear contradiction. Speaks hastily. Very anxious about the health of others.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo, nausea, *especially when riding* or sitting up. Sense of emptiness in head. Headache *in occiput* and nape; worse, lying on back of head. Sick headache from carriage riding, cannot lie on back part of head. Pupils contracted. Opening and shutting sensation, especially in occiput. Trembling of head. Pain in eyes as if torn out of head.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nausea from riding in cars, boat, etc, or looking at boat in motion; worse on becoming cold or taking cold. Nausea, with faintness and vomiting. *Aversion to food*, drink, tobacco. *Metallic taste*. Paralysis of muscles preventing deglutition. Dryness of oesophagus. Seasickness (*Resorcin*. 1x). Cramp, in stomach during and after meal. Hiccough and spasmodic yawning. Loss of appetite. Desire for cold drinks, especially beer. Sensation in stomach as if one had been a long time without food until hunger was gone. Smell of food disgusts (*Colch*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Distended, with wind, and feeling as *if full of sharp stones when moving*; better, lying on one side or the other. *Pain in abdominal ring*, as if something were forced through. *Abdominal muscles weak*; it seems as if a hernia would take place.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dysmenorrhoea, with profuse dark menses. Too early menses, clotted, with spasmodic colic. Painful pressing in uterine region, followed by haemorrhoids. Purulent, gushing leucorrhoea between menses; *very weakening*, can scarcely speak. So weak during menstruation, scarcely able to stand.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation of emptiness and cramp in chest. Dyspnoea as from constriction of trachea, as if irritated by smoke. Choking constriction in upper part of oesophagus, oppressing breathing and inducing cough.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cracking of cervical vertebrae when moving head. *Paralytic pain in small of the back*. Pain *in shoulder and arms as if bruised*. Pressure in scapula and nape. Stiffness on moving shoulders.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lameness; worse by bending. *Trembling* and pain in limbs. Arms go to sleep. One-sided paralysis; worse after sleep. Hands are alternately hot and cold; numbness and cold sweat now of one, now of the other hand. Numb and unsteady. *Knees crack on motion*. Lower limbs very weak. Inflammatory swelling of knee. Intensely painful, paralytic drawing. Limbs straightened out, painful when flexed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Spasmodic yawning. Coma vigil. Constant drowsiness. After loss of sleep, night-watching, nursing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chill, with flatulent colic, nausea, vertigo, coldness of lower extremities, and heat of head. Sweat general. Nervous form of low fever. *Chilliness, with perspiration, and heat of skin*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, eating, after loss of sleep, open air, smoking, riding, swimming, touch, noise, jar; afternoon. Menstrual period. After emotional disturbance.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes:; *Coffee; Nux*.
Compare: *Picrotoxin*-alkaloid of Cocculus--(epilepsy, attacks in the morning on leaving horizontal position, hernia, locomotor ataxia, night-sweats); *Symphoricarpus* (morning sickness); *Petrol; Puls; Ignat*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

coccinella-septempunctata.name: Coccinella Septempunctata
coccinella-septempunctata.essence: This remedy ought to be remembered in neuralgias, teeth, gums, mouth, etc. Is awakened by profuse accumulation of saliva. Uvula feels too long. Symptoms of hydrophobia; worse, by any bright object.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Lady Bug
This remedy ought to be remembered in neuralgias, teeth, gums, mouth, etc. Is awakened by profuse accumulation of saliva. Uvula feels too long. Symptoms of hydrophobia; worse, by any bright object.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in forehead over right eye, sensitive to touch; from superior molars to forehead. Aching in temples and occiput. Rush of blood to face. *Throbbing toothache. Cold sensation in teeth* and mouth (*Cistus*). Periodical attacks of frontal neuralgia. Cannot open eyes during paroxysm. Pain worse from any bright object; better, sleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hiccough and burning in stomach.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pain in region of kidneys and loins*. Icy cold extremities.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Canth; Magn c*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

cochlearia-armoracia.name: Cochlearia Armoracia
cochlearia-armoracia.essence: Frontal bone and sinus, antrum and salivary glands are specifically affected by this drug. Bloated sensation. Raises vital forces. Used as a gargle in scorbutic gums and sore throat. Hoarseness and in relaxed conditions of the fauces. Internally in gonorrhoea. Useful as a condiment in enfeebled states of the stomach. An infusion of the root in cider, for dropsy, causes copious diuresis. Locally cures dandruff.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Horse-radish (ARMORACIA SATIVA)
Frontal bone and sinus, antrum and salivary glands are specifically affected by this drug. Bloated sensation. Raises vital forces. Used as a gargle in scorbutic gums and sore throat. Hoarseness and in relaxed conditions of the fauces. Internally in gonorrhoea. Useful as a condiment in enfeebled states of the stomach. An infusion of the root in cider, for dropsy, causes copious diuresis. Locally cures dandruff.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thinking is difficult. Anxiety, driven to despair by pain. Pressing, boring pain as if frontal bone would fall out. Violent headache with vomiting. Impaired hearing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Sore and scrofulous*; traumatic inflammation of eyes, blearedness and cataract. Copious running from eyes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain towards back; worse, pressure on dorsal vertebrae. Belching and cramps. Colic with backache. *Violent cramp from stomach through both sides around to back*. Griping around navel.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in back as from incarcerated flatulence *from abdomen through to back and down into sacrum*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry, hacking, laryngeal cough, also post-influenzal cough, dry or loose, worse lying down. Chest painful to touch. Coryza, with hoarseness. Mucous asthma. OEdema of lungs. Throat feels rough and hoarse.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning and cutting at glans penis before, during, and after urination. Frequent urination.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse* evening and at night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Cannab; Sinapis; Caps*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third attenuation.

codeinum.name: Codeinum
codeinum.essence: Trembling of whole body. Involuntary twitching of muscles of arms and lower limbs. *Itching*, with feeling of warmth, numbness and prickling. Diabetes.
codeinum.dosing: One-quarter of a grain doses to third trituration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
An Alkaloid from Opium
Trembling of whole body. Involuntary twitching of muscles of arms and lower limbs. *Itching*, with feeling of warmth, numbness and prickling. Diabetes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain from occiput to back of neck. Skin of face and scalp sore after neuralgia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Involuntary twitching of lids (*Agar*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Spasmodic pain at pit of stomach. Eructations. Great thirst, with desire for bitter substances.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Short and irritating cough; worse, at night. Copious, purulent expectoration. Night cough of phthisis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Opium; Agaricus; Hyoscy; Ammon brom*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: One-quarter of a grain doses to third trituration.

colchicum-autumnale.name: Colchicum Autumnale
colchicum-autumnale.essence:
Affects markedly the muscular tissues, periosteum, and synovial membranes of joints. Has specific power of relieving the gouty paroxysms. It seems to be more beneficial in chronic affections of these parts. The parts are red, hot, swollen. Tearing pains; worse, in the evening and at night and from touch; stubbing the toes hurts exceedingly. *There is always great prostration*, internal

*coldness*, and tendency to collapse. Effects of night watching and hard study. Shocks as from electricity thr...

agg: motion, loss of sleep, smell of food in evening, mental exertion

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sharp pain down left arm. Tearing in limbs during warm weather, stinging during cold. Pins and needles in hands and wrists, fingertips numb. Pain in front of thigh. Right plantar reflex abolished. Limbs, lame, weak, tingling. Pain worse in evening and warm weather. Joints stiff and feverish; shifting rheumatism; pains worse at night. Inflammation of great toe, gout in heel, *cannot bear to have it touched or moved*. Tingling in the finger nails. Knees strike together, can hardly walk. OEdematous swelling and coldness of legs and feet.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aching in lumbar and lumbo-sacral region. Dull pain across loins. Backache, better, rest and pressure.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Meadow Saffron (COLCHICUM)
Affects markedly the muscular tissues, periosteum, and synovial membranes of joints. Has specific power of relieving the gouty paroxysms. It seems to be more beneficial in chronic affections of these parts. The parts are red, hot, swollen. Tearing pains; worse, in the evening and at night and from touch; stubbing the toes hurts exceedingly. *There is always great prostration*, internal
*coldness*, and tendency to collapse. Effects of night watching and hard study. Shocks as from electricity through one half of body. Bad effects from suppressed sweat. Dreams of mice.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Headache chiefly frontal and temporal, but also occipital and in nape of neck, worse afternoon and evening.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pupils unequal; left pupil contracted. Variations in visual acuity. Lachrymation worse in open air; violent tearing pain in eyes. Dim vision after reading. Spots before eyes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching in ears; sharp, shooting pains below right tragus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in facial muscles, moving about. Tingling and oedematous swelling; cheeks red, hot, sweaty. Very irritable with the pains (*Cham*). Pain behind angle of right lower jaw.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry mouth, tongue burns, gums and teeth pain. *Thirst*; pain in stomach and flatulence. The *smell of food causes nausea even to fainting*, especially fish. Profuse salivary secretion. Vomiting of mucus, bile and food; worse, any motion; *great coldness in stomach. Craving for various things*, but is averse to then when smelling them, seized them with nausea. Gouty gastralgia. Burning or *icy coldness in stomach* and abdomen. Thirst for effervescent, alcoholic beverages. Pain in transverse colon.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Distention* of abdomen, with gas, inability to stretch out legs. Borborygmi. Pain over liver. Caecum and ascending colon much distended. Fullness and continuous rumbling. Ascites.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Painful, scanty, transparent, jelly-like mucus; pain, as if anus were torn open, with prolapse. Autumnal dysentery; stools contain *while shreddy particles* in large quantities. Ineffectual pressing; feels feces in rectum, but cannot expel them.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pruritus of genitals. Cold feeling in thigh after period. Sensation of swelling in vulva and clitoris.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dark, scanty or suppressed; bloody, brown, black, inky; contains clots of putrid decomposed blood, albumin, sugar.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Anxiety in region of heart. Impulse not felt. Pericarditis, with severe pain, oppression and dyspnoea, pulse threadlike. Sound of heart become weaker, pulse of low tension.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Blotchy papular rash on face. Pink spots on back, chest and abdomen. Urticaria.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, sundown to sunrise; motion, loss of sleep, smell of food in evening, mental exertion. *Better*, stooping.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Thuja; Camph; Coccul; Nux; Puls*.
Compare: *Colchicine* (intestinal catarrh with shreddy membranes; convulsive jerkings of right hand; rheumatic fever, gout, endo and pericarditis, pleurisy, arthritis, deformans in early stages; *intense pain of rheumatism* 3x trit). Also, *Carbo; Arnica; Lilium; Arsen; Verat*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth attenuation.

collinsonia-canadensis.name: Collinsonia Canadensis
collinsonia-canadensis.essence: Pelvic and portal congestion, resulting haemorrhoids and constipation, especially in females. Depressed arterial tension, general atony of muscular fiber. *Chronic nasal, gastric, and pharyngeal catarrh*, due to portal obstruction. Dropsy from cardiac disease. Pruritus in pregnancy, with piles. *Constipation of children from intestinal atony*. Said to be of special value when given before operations, for rectal diseases. Sense of weight and constriction. Venous engorgement.

agg: from the slightest mental emotion or excitement

complementary: Aescul; Aloes; Hamam; Lycopus; Negundo; Sulph; Nux

collinsonia-canadensis.dosing: Tincture, to third attenuation. Higher potencies where there is organic heart affection.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Stone-Root
Pelvic and portal congestion, resulting haemorrhoids and constipation, especially in females. Depressed arterial tension, general atony of muscular fiber. *Chronic nasal, gastric, and pharyngeal catarrh*, due to portal obstruction. Dropsy from cardiac disease. Pruritus in pregnancy, with piles. *Constipation of children from intestinal atony*. Said to be of special value when given before operations, for rectal diseases. Sense of weight and constriction. Venous engorgement.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull frontal headache; from suppressed haemorrhoids. Chronic catarrh. Yellow-coated tongue. Bitter taste (*Colocy; Bry*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Sensation of sharp sticks in rectum. Sense of constriction*. Vascular engorgement of rectum. Dry feces. *Most obstinate constipation*, with protruding haemorrhoids. Aching in anus and hypogastrium. Constipation during pregnancy; with membranous dysmenorrhoea, following labor (*Nux*). Painful bleeding piles. Dysentery, with tenesmus. *Alternate constipation and diarrhoea*, and great flatulence. *Itching of anus* (*Teucrium; Ratanh*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dysmenorrhoea; *pruritus of vulva*; prolapse of womb; swelling and dark redness of genitals; pain on sitting down. Membranous dysmenorrhoea, with constipation. Pruritus. Cold feeling in thighs after menstruation. Sensation of swelling of labia and of clitoris.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Cough from excessive use of voice*; "minister's sore throat"; sharp pain in larynx. Hoarseness. Harassing, dry cough.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Palpitation; rapid but weak. Dropsy. After heart symptoms relieved, piles or menses return. Chest-pains alternate with haemorrhoids. Oppression, faintness, and dyspnoea (*Acon ferox*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, from the slightest mental emotion or excitement; cold. *Better*, heat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidote: Nux.
Compare: *Aescul; Aloes; Hamam; Lycopus; Negundo; Sulph; Nux*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third attenuation. Higher potencies where there is organic heart affection.

comocladia-dentata.name: Comocladia Dentata
comocladia-dentata.essence: Important eye and skin symptoms. Affections of antrum. Sacro-iliac and abdominal pain. *Throbbing pains worse by heat*. Pain in joints and ankles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Guao
Important eye and skin symptoms. Affections of antrum. Sacro-iliac and abdominal pain. *Throbbing pains worse by heat*. Pain in joints and ankles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ciliary neuralgia with eyes feeling large and protruded, especially *right*. *Worse, near warm stove*; feels as if pressed outward. Sees only glimmer of light with left eye. Glaucoma, sense of fullness; *eyeball feels too large*. Motion of eyes aggravates.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Swollen, with eyes projecting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itches, red and pimples. *Redness all over*, like scarlatina. Erysipelas. Deep ulcers, with hard edges. Leprosy. Red stripes on skin (*Euphorb*). Eczema (papular) of the trunk and extremities; also pustular type.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Acute pain in left mammary gland. Pain from right side of chest down arm to fingers. Cough with pain under left breast, going through to left scapula.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Better*, open air, scratching; by motion. *Worse*, touch, warmth, rest; night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Rhus; Anacard; Euphorb*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to thirtieth potency.

convallaria-majalis.name: Convallaria Majalis
convallaria-majalis.essence: A heart remedy. Increases energy of hearts' action, renders it more regular. Of use when the ventricles are overdistended and dilatation begins, and when there is an absence of compensatory hypertrophy, and when venous stasis is marked. Dyspnoea, dropsy, aneuric tendency. *Anasarca*.
convallaria-majalis.dosing: Third attenuation, and for symptoms of heart failure, tincture, one to fifteen drops.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Grating of teeth in the morning. Coppery taste. Tongue feels sore and scalded; broad and thick with heavy, dirty coating.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Raw feeling in back of throat when inspiring.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensitive. Clothes feel too tight. Gurgling and pain on taking deep breath. Movement in abdomen like fist of a child. Colicky pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aching in bladder; feels distended. Frequent urination; offensive; scanty urine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Great soreness in uterine region, with sympathetic palpitation of heart*. Pain in sacro-iliac joints, running down leg. Itching at urinary meatus and vaginal orifice.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pulmonary congestion. Orthopnea. *Dyspnoea* while walking. Hot feeling in throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Lily of the Valley
A heart remedy. Increases energy of hearts' action, renders it more regular. Of use when the ventricles are overdistended and dilatation begins, and when there is an absence of compensatory hypertrophy, and when venous stasis is marked. Dyspnoea, dropsy, aneuric tendency. *Anasarca*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull intellect. Grieves easily. Dull headache; worse, ascending, hawking. Scalp sensitive. Irritability. Hysterical manifestations.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hydroa in nose and lips; raw and sore. Epistaxis. Sees imaginary gray spot about three inches square.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feeling as if heart beat throughout the chest. Endocarditis, with extreme orthopnea. *Sensation as if heart ceased beating, then starting very suddenly*. Palpitation from the least exertion. Tobacco heart, especially when due to cigarettes. Angina pectoris. Extremely rapid and irregular pulse.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain and aching in lumbar region; aching of legs; in big toe. Trembling of hands. Aching in wrists and ankles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chilly in back and down spine, followed by fever, little sweat. Thirst and headache during chill. Dyspnoea during fever.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Digit; Crataeg; Lilium; Adonis* (feeble heart action due only to functional disturbance).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Better*, in open air. *Worse*, in warm room.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third attenuation, and for symptoms of heart failure, tincture, one to fifteen drops.

copaiva-officinalis.name: Copaiva Officinalis
copaiva-officinalis.essence: Acts powerfully on mucous membranes, especially that of the urinary tract, the respiratory organs, and the skin, here producing a well-marked nettle-rash. Cold and catarrhs.

complementary: Cannab; Canth; Barosma; Cubeb; Apis; Vespa; Erig; Senecio; Sepia

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Balsam of Copaiva (COPAIVA)
Acts powerfully on mucous membranes, especially that of the urinary tract, the respiratory organs, and the skin, here producing a well-marked nettle-rash. Cold and catarrhs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Excessive sensitiveness; pain in occiput. Dull, frontal headache, passes to occiput and back again, with throbbing, worse right side and motion. Scalp sensitive. Sensitive to sharp sounds.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rawness and soreness of nostrils with stopped-up feeling; dryness of posterior nares. Profuse, thick, fetid discharge from nasal passages, running down throat at night. *Burning and dryness*, crusts on turbinated bones. Marked catarrhal condition in upper respiratory tract.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Food seems too salty. Gastric troubles during menstruation or following urticaria. Gas and intestinal flatulence, urging to stool and difficult passage with pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning pressure; painful micturition by drops. Retention, with pain in bladder, anus, and rectum. *Catarrh of bladder*; dysuria. Swelling of orifice. Constant desire to urinate. Urine smells of violets. Greenish, turbid color; peculiar pungent odor.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Mucous Colitis*. Stools covered with mucus, with colic and chilliness. Burning and itching of anus, caused by piles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Testicles sensitive and swollen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching of vulva and anus, with bloody purulent discharge. Profuse, strong-smelling menstrual discharge, with pains radiating to hip bones, with nausea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cough, with profuse, gray, purulent expectoration. Tickling in larynx, trachea, and bronchi. Bronchial catarrh, with profuse greenish, offensive discharge.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Hives*, with fever and constipation. Roseola. Erysipelatous inflammation, especially around abdomen. Circumscribed lenticular patches, with itching; mottled appearance. Chronic urticaria in children. Bullous eruptions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Bell; Merc*.
Compare: *Santalum*--(aching in kidneys); *Cannab; Canth; Barosma; Cubeb; Apis; Vespa; Erig; Senecio; Sepia*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third attenuation.

cornus-circinata.name: Cornus Circinata
cornus-circinata.essence: Chronic malaria, hepatitis, jaundice. Weakness in morning. Pain in pit of stomach, with distended abdomen. Vesicular eruption associated with chronic liver disease or aphthous stomatitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Round-leaved Dogwood
Chronic malaria, hepatitis, jaundice. Weakness in morning. Pain in pit of stomach, with distended abdomen. Vesicular eruption associated with chronic liver disease or aphthous stomatitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ulceration of tongue, gums and mouth; aphthae. Burning in mouth, throat and stomach.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Loose, windy, dark stool, immediately after dinner. Burning in anus. Dark, bilious, offensive diarrhoea, with sallow complexion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vesicular eczema of face in infants, with nursing sore mouth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Cornus alternifolia*-Swamp Walnut--(Weak and tired; disturbed sleep, fever, restlessness, eczema; *skin cracked*; chest feels cold, as if full of ice); *Cornus florida* (chronic malaria; indigestion and distressing acid heartburn; general debility from loss of fluids and night sweats; neuralgic pains in arms, chest, and trunk, and sensation as if broken in two; intermittent fever, *with drowsiness*; feels cold, but is warm to touch; great exhaustion in intervals; general clammy sweat. Chill is preceded by drowsiness, heat is associated with drowsiness. Headache after quinine).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture to sixth attenuation.

corallium-rubrum.name: Corallium Rubrum
corallium-rubrum.essence: The provings of coral develop much coryza and epistaxis, and even ulceration within the nostrils. It is to be thought of for whooping and spasmodic coughs, especially when the attack comes on with a *very rapid cough*, and the attacks follow so closely as to almost run into each other. Often preceded by sensation of smothering, followed by exhaustion. Congestion of face after dinner. Patient becomes purple in face. *Violence of paroxysm*, even with *expectoration* of blood. Feeling as if cold ai...

agg: in open air, changing from a warm too cold room

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Red Coral (CORALLIUM)
The provings of coral develop much coryza and epistaxis, and even ulceration within the nostrils. It is to be thought of for whooping and spasmodic coughs, especially when the attack comes on with a *very rapid cough*, and the attacks follow so closely as to almost run into each other. Often preceded by sensation of smothering, followed by exhaustion. Congestion of face after dinner. Patient becomes purple in face. *Violence of paroxysm*, even with *expectoration* of blood. Feeling as if cold air were streaming through skull and air-passages. One is too cold when uncovered and too hot when covered; relieved by artificial heat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels very large; violent pain as if parietal bones were forced apart; worse stooping. Eyes hot and painful. Deep-seated frontal headache with severe pain back of eyeballs. Pain aggravated by breathing cold air through nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Odors of smoke, onions, etc. Painful ulcer in nostrils.
*Post-nasal catarrh. Profuse secretion of mucus dropping through posterior nares*; air feels cold. Dry coryza; nose stopped up and ulcerated. Epistaxis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Food tastes like sawdust. Bread tastes like straw. Beer tastes sweet. Pain in articulation of left lower jaw. Craves salt.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Hawking of profuse mucus. Throat very sensitive,
*especially to air*. Profuse, nasal catarrh. Inspired air feels cold (*Cistus*). *Profuse secretion of mucus dropping through posterior nares*. Dry, *spasmodic*, suffocative cough; very rapid cough, short, barking. Cough with great sensitiveness of air-passages; *feel cold on deep inspiration*. Continuous hysterical cough. Feels suffocated and greatly exhausted after whooping-cough.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ulcers on glans and inner prepuce, with yellow ichor. Emissions and weakened sexual power. Profuse perspiration of genitals.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Red, flat ulcers. Coral-colored, then dark red spots, changing to copper-colored spots. Psoriasis of palms and soles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse* in open air, changing from a warm too cold room.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Complementary: *Sulph*.
Compare: *Bellad; Droser; Mephit; Caust*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth attenuation.

corydalis-formosa.name: Corydalis Formosa
corydalis-formosa.essence: Syphilitic affections. Ulcers of mouth and fauces. Cancer cachexia pronounced. Gummata and night-pains. Chronic diseases, with atony. Tongue clean, broad, and full. Tissues flabby, doughy, cold. Gastric catarrh (*Hydrast*).
corydalis-formosa.dosing: Tincture, twenty drops three times a day.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Turkey-pea (CORYDALIS - DICENTRA CANADENSIS)
Syphilitic affections. Ulcers of mouth and fauces. Cancer cachexia pronounced. Gummata and night-pains. Chronic diseases, with atony. Tongue clean, broad, and full. Tissues flabby, doughy, cold. Gastric catarrh (*Hydrast*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry, scaly scabs on face of old people. Lymphatic glands swollen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Nit ac; Kali iod; Fluor ac*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, twenty drops three times a day.

cotyledon-umbilicus.name: Cotyledon Umbilicus
cotyledon-umbilicus.essence: Marked action on heart; oppression of chest; fullness in throat. Epilepsy. Numb aching in muscular and fibrous tissue. Sciatica. Well-marked pains through the breast to scapula. Catarrh of larynx and trachea. Hysterical joint.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Pennywort (COTYLEDON)
Marked action on heart; oppression of chest; fullness in throat. Epilepsy. Numb aching in muscular and fibrous tissue. Sciatica. Well-marked pains through the breast to scapula. Catarrh of larynx and trachea. Hysterical joint.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lost, confused feeling. Could not articulate for some time on awaking. Pressing vertex headache. Ailments from suppressed emotion. *Feeling as if a part of the body were absent*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain under left nipple, and aching in right breast. Pain through to scapula from region of left breast. Pain at angles of scapulae. Full, bursting feeling, as if from obstruction at heart. Choking fullness in throat. Breathing oppressed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aching in back and thighs. Aching in all joints. Skin sensitive, rubbing of trousers causes an acute sting. Legs and arms feel heavy and sore.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Ambra; Asafoet; Hepatica; Ignatia; Laches*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture to third potency.

crataegus-oxyacantha.name: Crataegus Oxyacantha
crataegus-oxyacantha.essence:
Produces giddiness, lowered pulse, and air hunger and reduction in blood-pressure. Acts on muscle of heart, *and is a heart tonic*. No influence on the endocardium.

Myocarditis. Failing compensation. *Irregularity of heart*. Insomnia of aortic sufferers; anaemia; oedema; cutaneous chilliness. High arterial tension. Is a sedative in cross, irritable patients with cardiac symptoms.

Chronic heart disease, with extreme weakness. Very feeble and irregular heart action. General anasarca. Very nervou...
crataegus-oxyacantha.dosing: Fluid extract or tincture, one to fifteen drops. Must be used for some time in order to obtain good results.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Hawthorn Berries (CRATAEGUS)
Produces giddiness, lowered pulse, and air hunger and reduction in blood-pressure. Acts on muscle of heart, *and is a heart tonic*. No influence on the endocardium.
Myocarditis. Failing compensation. *Irregularity of heart*. Insomnia of aortic sufferers; anaemia; oedema; cutaneous chilliness. High arterial tension. Is a sedative in cross, irritable patients with cardiac symptoms.
Chronic heart disease, with extreme weakness. Very feeble and irregular heart action. General anasarca. Very nervous, with pain in back of head and neck. Collapse of typhoid. Haemorrhage from bowels. Cold extremities, pallor; irregular pulse and breathing. Painful sensation of pressure in left side of chest below the clavicle. Dyspepsia and nervous prostration, with heart failure. In the beginning of heart mischief after rheumatism. *Arteriosclerosis. Said to have a solvent power upon crustaceous and calcareous deposits in arteries*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Apprehensive, despondent. Very nervous and irritable, with pain in back of head and neck. Mental dullness conjunctival irritation nasal discharges.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Diabetes*, especially in children.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Cardiac dropsy*. Fatty degeneration. Aortic disease. *Extreme dyspnoea on least exertion*, without much increase of pulse. Pain in region of heart *and under left clavicle*. Heart muscles seem flabby, worn out. Cough. *Heart dilated; first sound weak*. Pulse accelerated, *irregular, feeble, intermittent*. Valvular murmurs, angina pectoris. Cutaneous chilliness, blueness of fingers and toes; all aggravated by exertion or excitement. Sustains heart in infectious diseases.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Excessive perspiration. Skin eruptions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Insomnia of aortic patients.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, in warm room. *Better*, fresh air, quiet and rest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Strophantus; Digit; Iberis; Naja; Cactus*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fluid extract or tincture, one to fifteen drops. Must be used for some time in order to obtain good results.

crocus-sativus.name: Crocus Sativus
crocus-sativus.essence: Is a remedy often useful in haemorrhages that are black and stringy. Tingling in various parts. Chorea and hysterical affections. Frequent and extreme changes in sensations and mental conditions. Anger with violence followed by repentance, *Laughing* mania. Drowsiness and *lassitude*; better by literary labor.

agg: lying down, hot weather, warm room, in morning, fasting, before breakfast, looking fixedly at an object

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, lying down, hot weather, warm room, in morning, fasting, before breakfast, looking fixedly at an object. *Better*, in open air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidote: *Opium; Bell.*
Compare: *Ipec; Trillium; Plat; China; Sabina*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to thirtieth attenuation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Saffron (CROCUS SATIA)
Is a remedy often useful in haemorrhages that are black and stringy. Tingling in various parts. Chorea and hysterical affections. Frequent and extreme changes in sensations and mental conditions. Anger with violence followed by repentance, *Laughing* mania. Drowsiness and *lassitude*; better by literary labor.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Vacillating*; pleasant mania; sings and laughs. Happy and affectionate; then angry. Sudden changes from hilarity to melancholy. Vivid recollection from music heard (*Lyc*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Throbs, pulsates, during climacteric; worse during menses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Appearance as of electric sparks. Must wipe eyes as if mucus or water were in them. *Feeling in eyes as after violent weeping*. Sensation as if she had been looking through too sharp spectacles. *Eyes feel as if in smoke*. Pupils enlarged and react slowly. Lids heavy. Ciliary neuralgia, pain from eyes to top of head. *Sensation as if cold air was rushing through eye* (*Fluor ac; Syph*). Asthenopia with extreme photophobia. Threatened glaucoma; embolism of arteria centralis retinal.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Epistaxis. *Dark, stringy, clotted. Strings of dark blood* hanging down the nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Obstinate constipation* due to portal stagnation. Constipation in infants. Crawling and stitches in anus. *Sensation of something alive in abdomen, stomach, etc.*, especially on left side (*Calend*). Abdomen swollen, feeling of something heavy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Threatened abortion, especially when haemorrhage is *dark and stringy*. Urging of blood to genitals. Menses dark, viscid, too frequent and copious, *black and slimy*. Uterine haemorrhage; *clots with long strings*; worse from least movement. Jerking pain in interior of left breast, as if drawn toward back by means of thread (*Crot tig*). A bounding feeling, as if something alive in right breast.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Wheezy cough, with frothy expectoration, containing threads like fine twine; worse, lying down. Breath has offensive, sickly smell. Feeling as if the uvula is elongated in hysterical patients.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sudden feeling of coldness in back as if cold water were thrown over him; icy-cold extremities.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Spasmodic contractions and twitchings of single set of muscles. Chorea and hysteria, with great alterations of feeling. Whole upper extremity fall asleep. Cracking in hip-joint and *knees*. Weakness in knees and legs. Pain in ankles and soles.

crotalus-horridus.name: Crotalus Horridus
crotalus-horridus.essence:
Snake poisons are supposed to be chemically *Cyan hydrates* of Soda and other salts. Alcohol is the natural solvent of these salts and is an antidote. Has a profound trophic action. Old age nutritional troubles.

Low septic states. General disorganization of the blood, haemorrhages and jaundice. A crotalin injection decreases the rate of coagulation of the blood. In epilepsy the average rate is far greater than in normal conditions. Blood decomposition, *haemorrhages* (dark fluid that forms no c...

agg: in spring, coming on of warm weather

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Rattlesnake
Snake poisons are supposed to be chemically *Cyan hydrates* of Soda and other salts. Alcohol is the natural solvent of these salts and is an antidote. Has a profound trophic action. Old age nutritional troubles.
Low septic states. General disorganization of the blood, haemorrhages and jaundice. A crotalin injection decreases the rate of coagulation of the blood. In epilepsy the average rate is far greater than in normal conditions. Blood decomposition, *haemorrhages* (dark fluid that forms no clots), tendency to carbuncles, malignant scarlatina, *yellow fever*, the plague, cholera, give opportunity to use this remedy. *Haemorrhagic diathesis*. Acts as a sedative. Sleeps into his symptoms. More right-sided in its action.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Weeping mood; clouded perception and memory; impatient. Loquacious, with desire to escape. Sadness. Delusions of cerebral decay.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo, with weakness and trembling. Dull heavy occipital pain, on right side and right eye. Headache with pain in heart on lying on left side. Headache; must walk on tip-toe to avoid jarring.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Very sensitive to light, especially *lamp light*. Yellow color of eyes. Illusions; blue colors. *Ciliary neuralgia*; tearing, boring pain, as if a cut had been made around eye. *For absorption of intra-ocular haemorrhages*, into the vitreous, but particularly for non-inflammatory retinal haemorrhages. Diplobia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Auditory vertigo. Blood oozes from ears. Feeling of stoppage in right ear.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Epistaxis, *blood black and stringy*, ozaena, after exanthemata or syphilis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Acne. Lips swollen and numb. Leaden-colored and yellow face. Lockjaw.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue red and small, but feels swollen. Tongue fiery red, dry in center, smooth and polished. Moldy smell of breath. Fills up with saliva. Tongue when protruding, goes to right. Spasmodic grinding of teeth at night. Cancer of tongue with haemorrhage.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry, swollen, dark red. Spasm of oesophagus; cannot swallow any solid substance. Tight constriction. Gangrenous, with much swelling.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Intolerance of clothing around stomach. Unable to retain anything; violent vomiting of food; bilious vomiting, vomiting of blood. Constant nausea and vomiting every month, after menstruation. Cannot lie on right side, without vomiting dark-green matter. Black or coffee-grounds vomiting. Cancer of stomach with vomiting of bloody, slimy mucus. Trembling, fluttering feeling below the epigastrium. Intolerance of clothing about epigastrium. Faintness and sinking at stomach. Ulceration of the stomach. Atonic dyspepsia. Gastritis in chronic alcoholism. Hungry, craves stimulants, sugar; averse to meat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Distended, hot, and tender. Pain in region of liver.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Black, thin, offensive, like coffee-grounds. Intestinal haemorrhage; blood dark, fluid, non-coagulable. Blood oozes from rectum when standing or walking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Prolonged menses. Dysmenorrhoea; pain extends down thighs, with aching in region of heart. Uterine haemorrhage with faintness at stomach. Puerperal fever; offensive lochia. Phlegmasia alba dolens. Sensation as though uterus would drop out. Painful drawing in uterine ligaments. Cannot keep legs still.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dark, bloody urine. Casts. Inflamed kidney. Albuminous, dark, scanty (*Merc cor*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Action feeble, pulse tremulous. Palpitation, especially at menstrual period. Trembling feeling of heart.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cough, with bloody expectoration. Tickling from a dry spot in larynx.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hands tremble, swollen. Lower extremities go to sleep easily. *Right-sided paralysis*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Malignant fevers of a *haemorrhagic or putrescent character*. Low bilious remittents. Yellow fever. Bloody sweat. Cerebro-spinal meningitis (*Cicuta; Cup acet*). Cold sweats.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Swelling and discoloration, skin tense and shows every tint of color, with excruciating pain. Vesication. *Sallow*. Yellow color of the whole body. Great sensitiveness of skin of *right half* of body. *Purpura haemorrhagica*. Haemorrhage from every part of body. Bloody sweat. Chilblains, felons. Dissecting wounds. Pustular eruptions. Insect stings. Post-vaccination eruptions. Bad effects of vaccination. Lymphangitis and septicaemia. Boils, carbuncles, and eruptions are surrounded by purplish, mottled skin and oedema. Anthrax. Sore sensation relieved by pressure.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dreams of the dead. Starting in sleep. Yawning. Smothering sensation when awaking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, right side; open air; evening and morning; in spring, coming on of warm weather; yearly; on awaking; damp and wet; *jar*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Bothrops; Naja* (more nervous phenomena); *Lachesis* (more markedly worse on left side); *Elaps* (preferable in otorrhoea and affections of right lung); *Crotalus cascavella* (thoughts and dreams of death. Paralysis of articulation, embarrassed stertorous breathing and semi-consciousness. A magnetic state is produced; cutting sensation all around eyeball).
*Bungarus-Krait*--(poliomyelitis).
Antidote: *Lach; Alcohol*. Radiant heat; camphor.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to sixth potency.

croton-tiglium.name: Croton Tiglium
croton-tiglium.essence: Is a valuable remedy in diarrhoea, summer complaint, and *skin affections*. These may alternate with each other. Feels tight all over. It is one of the antidotes to Rhus poisoning, as is evident from its wide and intense action upon skin and mucous surface, causing both irritation and inflammation, with formation of vesicles and mucous discharges. Has elective affinity for skin of face and external genitals. *Burning in the oesophagus*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Feels hide-bound. Intense itching; but scratching is painful*. Pustular eruption, especially on face and *genitals*, with fearful itching, followed by painful burning. Vesicles; confluent oozing. Vesicular erysipelas, itching exceedingly. Herpes zoster; stinging, smarting pains of the eruption.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, least food or drink; during summer; *touch*, night and morning, washing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Croton-oil Seed
Is a valuable remedy in diarrhoea, summer complaint, and *skin affections*. These may alternate with each other. Feels tight all over. It is one of the antidotes to Rhus poisoning, as is evident from its wide and intense action upon skin and mucous surface, causing both irritation and inflammation, with formation of vesicles and mucous discharges. Has elective affinity for skin of face and external genitals. *Burning in the oesophagus*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pressing pain in forehead, especially orbits.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Granular lids; pustules of cornea. Red and raw appearance. *Feel drawn backward*. Eruptions around eyes. *Tensive pain above right orbit*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Copious watery stools, with much urging; *always forcibly shot out*, with gurgling in intestines; worse, drinking the least quantity, or even while eating. Constant urging to stool, followed by sudden evacuation. Swashing sensation in intestines.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Night urine foaming; dark orange color; turbid on standing; greasy particles floating on top. Day urine is pale, with white sediment.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Drawing-pain through the left chest into the back. Asthma*, with cough; cannot expand the chest. Nursing women; every suck the child gives produces *pain from nipple back*. Inflamed breasts. Cough; as soon as he touches the pillow must get up. Sensitive to deep breathing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Momordica charantia*-Hairy Mordica--(has marked drastic properties, producing colic, nausea, vomiting, cholera-like symptoms, abdomen seems full of fluid discharged explosively, thin, watery, yellow. Great thirst). *Rhus; Anagallis; Anacard; Sepia*.
Antidote: *Ant tart*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth potency.

cubeba-officinalis.name: Cubeba Officinalis
cubeba-officinalis.essence: Mucous membranes generally, but especially that of the urinary tract, are chiefly affected by this remedy. Frequent urination of a nervous origin. Leucorrhoea in little girls.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Cubebs (CUBEBA)
Mucous membranes generally, but especially that of the urinary tract, are chiefly affected by this remedy. Frequent urination of a nervous origin. Leucorrhoea in little girls.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Urethritis, with much mucus, especially in women. Cutting after urination, with constriction. Haematuria. Prostatitis, with thick yellow discharge. Cystitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Catarrh of nose and throat, with fetid odor and expectoration. Mucus trickles from posterior nares. Rawness of throat and hoarseness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Cucurbita; Copaiva; Piper meth; Sandal*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second and third attenuation.

cucurbita-citrullus.name: Cucurbita Citrullus
cucurbita-citrullus.essence: Infusion for painful urination with sense of constriction and backache.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Seeds of Watermelon
Infusion for painful urination with sense of constriction and backache.

cucurbita-pepo.name: Cucurbita Pepo
cucurbita-pepo.essence: Intense nausea immediately after eating. Vomiting of pregnancy. Seasickness. One of the most efficient and least harmful of teniafuges.
cucurbita-pepo.dosing: Tincture. The seeds are a valuable remedy for tapeworm. Scald the seeds and peel off the outer skins when softened, the green inner pulp being the part used. Dose: two ounces of seed, yielding one of pulp. May be mixed with cream and taken like porridge. Take-in morning after twelve hours' fasting, and follow in two hours by castor oil.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Pumpkin Seed
Intense nausea immediately after eating. Vomiting of pregnancy. Seasickness. One of the most efficient and least harmful of teniafuges.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Filix; Cuprum oxid nig*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture. The seeds are a valuable remedy for tapeworm. Scald the seeds and peel off the outer skins when softened, the green inner pulp being the part used. Dose: two ounces of seed, yielding one of pulp. May be mixed with cream and taken like porridge. Take-in morning after twelve hours' fasting, and follow in two hours by castor oil.

cundurango.name: Cundurango
cundurango.essence:
Stimulates the digestive functions and thus improves the general health. Allays the pain in gastralgia accompanying cancer of stomach. Modifies secretions of digestive glands. Varicose ulcers. Lupus.

*Painful cracks in corner of mouth* is a guiding symptom of this drug. Chronic gastric catarrh, syphilis, and cancer. Tumors; stricture of oesophagus. The active principle (*Condurangin*) produces locomotor ataxia.
cundurango.dosing: Tincture, or bark, 5-grain doses before meals in water. Also the thirtieth potency, in tumors.
