materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Condor Plant (CONDURANGO)
Stimulates the digestive functions and thus improves the general health. Allays the pain in gastralgia accompanying cancer of stomach. Modifies secretions of digestive glands. Varicose ulcers. Lupus.
*Painful cracks in corner of mouth* is a guiding symptom of this drug. Chronic gastric catarrh, syphilis, and cancer. Tumors; stricture of oesophagus. The active principle (*Condurangin*) produces locomotor ataxia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Painful affections of the stomach; ulceration. Vomiting of food and indurations, constant burning pain. Stricture of oesophagus, with burning pains behind sternum, where food seems to stick. Vomiting of food, and indurations in left hypochondrium with constant burning pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fissures form about the muco-cutaneous outlets. Epithelioma of lips or anus. Ulcerative stage of carcinoma cutis when fissures form.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Asterias; Conium; Hydrast; Arsenic*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, or bark, 5-grain doses before meals in water. Also the thirtieth potency, in tumors.

cupheavis-cosissima.name: Cupheavis Cosissima
cupheavis-cosissima.essence: Vomiting of undigested food. *Cholera infantum*, much acidity; frequent green, watery, acid stools. Tenesmus and great pain. High fever; restlessness, and sleeplessness. Obstinate constipation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Flux-weed (CUPHEA)
Vomiting of undigested food. *Cholera infantum*, much acidity; frequent green, watery, acid stools. Tenesmus and great pain. High fever; restlessness, and sleeplessness. Obstinate constipation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Aethusa; Coto*-Para-coto Bark--(intestinal catarrh, chronic, copious, exhausting diarrhoea and dysentery; colliquitine sweats of phthisis and chronic diarrhoea).
*Typha latifolia*-Cat-tail flag (diarrhoea, dysentery, summer complaint of children. Tincture and first attenuation).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture.

cuprum-aceticum.name: Cuprum Aceticum
cuprum-aceticum.essence: Hay-fever, with burning excoriation, paroxysmal cough; tough, tenacious mucus, and fear of suffocation. *Protracted labor*. Chronic psoriasis and lepra.

amel: chewing, pressure, night, lying on affected side, and warmth

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Acetate of Copper
Hay-fever, with burning excoriation, paroxysmal cough; tough, tenacious mucus, and fear of suffocation. *Protracted labor*. Chronic psoriasis and lepra.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent throbbing and lancinating pains in forehead. Left-sided brow ague. Brain seems void. Inclined to gape and cry. Loses consciousness; *head reels when in high-ceiled room*. Constant protrusion and retraction of tongue (*Laches*). Neuralgia with heaviness of head, burning, stinging and stitching in temples and forehead.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Collapsed, hippocratic. Facial neuralgia in cheek-bone, upper jaw, and behind right ear. Better by chewing, pressure, and external warmth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent spasmodic pains in stomach and abdomen. Vomiting. Slimy brown diarrhoea. Violent tenesmus. Cholera.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Attacks of angina pectoris coming on when excited. Violent spasmodic cough. Short, difficult respiration. Spasmodic constriction of chest. Dyspnoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Leprous-like eruption, without itching, over whole body, in spots of various sizes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, mental emotions, touch. *Better*, chewing, pressure, night, lying on affected side, and warmth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Acts similarly to *Cuprum met* but is more violent in action.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to sixth trituration.

cuprum-arsenicosum.name: Cuprum Arsenicosum
cuprum-arsenicosum.essence: A remedy for symptoms depending on deficient kidney action, various intestinal affections, cholera morbus and infantum; entero-colitis, diarrhoea, and dysentery. Gastro-intestinal disturbances of influenza and typhoid. *Uraemic convulsions*, headache, vertigo and unconscious conditions resulting from brain oedema. Nephritis of pregnancy. Convulsions preceded by gastro-intestinal symptoms. Chlorosis. Bronchial asthma and with emphysema. Purulent endocarditis (Royal). Painful neuroses, enteroptosi...

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Arsenite of Copper-Scheele's Green
A remedy for symptoms depending on deficient kidney action, various intestinal affections, cholera morbus and infantum; entero-colitis, diarrhoea, and dysentery. Gastro-intestinal disturbances of influenza and typhoid. *Uraemic convulsions*, headache, vertigo and unconscious conditions resulting from brain oedema. Nephritis of pregnancy. Convulsions preceded by gastro-intestinal symptoms. Chlorosis. Bronchial asthma and with emphysema. Purulent endocarditis (Royal). Painful neuroses, enteroptosis. Delirium and tremor cordis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue thickly coated, dirty brown, white, metallic taste; thirst. Dry mouth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cardiac rhythm and force altered due to defective elimination.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Gastro-enteritis. Violent abdominal pain. Diarrhoea in phthisis. Cholera (*Ars; Verat; Camph*). Rumbling and sharp cutting pain. Dark liquid stools.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Persistent lameness. Pain in lumbar region and in lower left shoulder-blade; chest feels tight.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Renal inefficiency and uraemia. *Garlicky odor*. Diabetes. Urine of high specific gravity; increased, acetones and diacetic acid.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Perspiration of scrotum; is constantly damp and moist. Boils on scrotum. Purulent discharge of a *white* color from urethra; tingling and burning in urethra; pain in prostate; pains in penis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Cramps in calves of legs*, worse after midnight, only relieved by getting out of bed and standing. Ulcers; gangrene.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Icy cold. Sweat, and skin even when dry. Cold, clammy perspiration of an intermittent nature. Acne, pustules on face and in the cruro-genital region; ulcers look like chancre. Gangrene; carbuncles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third trituration.

curare.name: Curare
curare.essence: Muscular paralysis without impairing sensation and consciousness. Paralysis of respiratory muscles. *Reflex action diminished*. Debility of the aged (*Baryta*) and from loss of fluids. Catalepsy. Nervous debility. Trismus. Glycosuria with motor paralysis. Curare decreases the output of adrenaline. Vomiting of bile in cirrhosis of liver. Diabetes mellitus, 4th dilution (Dr. Barkhard).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Arrow-poison (WOORARI)
Muscular paralysis without impairing sensation and consciousness. Paralysis of respiratory muscles. *Reflex action diminished*. Debility of the aged (*Baryta*) and from loss of fluids. Catalepsy. Nervous debility. Trismus. Glycosuria with motor paralysis. Curare decreases the output of adrenaline. Vomiting of bile in cirrhosis of liver. Diabetes mellitus, 4th dilution (Dr. Barkhard).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Indecision; no longer wishes to think, or act for herself.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lancinating pains all over head. Head drawn backward. Falling out of hair. Brain feels full of fluid.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sharp, stitching pains over right eye. Black spots before vision. Ptosis of right side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Noises; unbearable earache. Lancinating pains start from ears; extending down to legs. Swelling of lobes of ear.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ozaena. Tubercles on nose; fetid lumps of pus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Facial and buccal paralysis. Tongue and mouth drawn. Red face. Tongue and mouth drawn to right.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dysmenorrhoea. Menses too early, during menses, colic, headache, kidney pain. Leucorrhoea, thick, purulent, offensive.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Threatened paralysis of respiration* on falling asleep. Short breath. Short dry cough; provokes vomiting, followed by fainting. *Chest sore to pressure. Very distressing dyspnoea*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tired pain up and down spine. *Arms weak, heavy*. Cannot lift the fingers. Weakness of hands and fingers in pianists. Legs tremble; give way in walking. Debility; paralysis. Catalepsy. Favors development of corns. Reflexes lessened or abolished.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Leprosy. Dirty-looking skin. Boils. Tubercles on nose. Liver spots. Blood oozes through. Itching.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, dampness, cold weather, cold wind; 2 am; right side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Cystisin* (motor paralysis); *Conium; Causticum; Crotalus; Nux*. Curare antidotes *Strychnin*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth potency.

cyclamen-europaeum.name: Cyclamen Europaeum
cyclamen-europaeum.essence: Large doses produce violent purging and vomiting; disturbed digestion with very salty saliva. Anaemic and chlorotic conditions. Affections of uterus. Gastro-intestinal and genito-urinary tracts affected, inducing secondary anaemia and various reflexes. *Sleepiness, moroseness, and lassitude*. Cough at night while asleep without waking, especially in children (*Cham; Nitr ac*).

agg: open air, evenings, sitting, standing, and cold water
amel: during menstrual flow, by moving about, rubbing parts

complementary: Ambra; Pulsat; Cinchona; Fer cit et Chin

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Sow-bread (CYCLAMEN)
Large doses produce violent purging and vomiting; disturbed digestion with very salty saliva. Anaemic and chlorotic conditions. Affections of uterus. Gastro-intestinal and genito-urinary tracts affected, inducing secondary anaemia and various reflexes. *Sleepiness, moroseness, and lassitude*. Cough at night while asleep without waking, especially in children (*Cham; Nitr ac*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Terrors of conscience. Grieves over duty neglected. Depression, with weeping desire to be alone. Aching in morning, with *flickering before eyes*; sneezing with itching in ear. Vertigo; things turn in a circle; better in the room; worse, open air. One-sided headache. Frequent sneezing with itching in ears.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dim vision, worse on waking, with spots before eyes. *Flickering of various colors*. Convergent strabismus. *Sees countless stars*. Diplopia. Disturbance of vision, associated with gastric disturbances.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Salty taste*; hiccough-like eructation worse, fat food. Diarrhoea after every cup of coffee; *hiccough*. Satiety after a few mouthfuls. Disgust for meat, especially pork. Desire for lemonade. No thirst all day.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pain about anus and perineum*, as if a spot were suppurating, when walking or sitting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses *profuse, black*, membranous, *clotted, too early, with labor-like pains* from back to pubes. Flow less when moving about. Menstrual irregularities with megrim and blindness, or fiery spots before eyes. *Hiccough during pregnancy*. Post-partum haemorrhage, with colicky bearing-down pains, with relief after gush of blood. After menses, swelling of breasts, with milky secretion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pains in parts where bones lie near surface. Burning, *sore pain in heels*. Cramp-like contraction of right thumb and index finger. Pains in periosteum. Chilblains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Acne in young women, pruritus better scratching and appearance of menses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, open air, evenings, sitting, standing, and cold water. *Better*, during menstrual flow, by moving about, rubbing parts; in warm room, lemonade.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Ambra; Pulsat; Cinchona; Fer cit et Chin*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third attenuation.

cypripedium-pubescens.name: Cypripedium Pubescens
cypripedium-pubescens.essence: The skin symptoms correspond to those of poisoning by Rhus, for which it has been found an efficient antidote. Nervousness in children; from teething and intestinal troubles. Debility after gout. *Hydrocephaloid* symptoms, result of long, exhausting diarrhoea. *Sleeplessness*. Cerebral hyperasthesia in young children often the result of overstimulation of brain.

complementary: Ambra; Kali brom; Scutellar; Valerian; Ignat

cypripedium-pubescens.dosing: Tincture, to sixth attenuation. For Poison Oak, 5 drops of tincture per dose, also locally.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Yellow Lady's Slipper (CYPRIPEDIUM)
The skin symptoms correspond to those of poisoning by Rhus, for which it has been found an efficient antidote. Nervousness in children; from teething and intestinal troubles. Debility after gout. *Hydrocephaloid* symptoms, result of long, exhausting diarrhoea. *Sleeplessness*. Cerebral hyperasthesia in young children often the result of overstimulation of brain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Child cries out at night; is wakeful and begins to laugh and play. Headaches of elderly people and during climacteric.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Ambra; Kali brom; Scutellar; Valerian; Ignat*. Skin relatives: *Grindelia; Anacard*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to sixth attenuation. For Poison Oak, 5 drops of tincture per dose, also locally.

turnera-aphrodisiaca.name: Turnera Aphrodisiaca
turnera-aphrodisiaca.essence: Said to be of use in sexual neurasthenia; impotency. Sexual debility from nervous prostration. Incontinence of old people. Chronic prostatic discharge. Renal and cystic catarrh; *frigidity of females*. Aids the establishment of normal menstrual flow in young girls.
turnera-aphrodisiaca.dosing: Tincture and fluid extract-ten-to forty-drops doses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Turnera (TURNERA)
Said to be of use in sexual neurasthenia; impotency. Sexual debility from nervous prostration. Incontinence of old people. Chronic prostatic discharge. Renal and cystic catarrh; *frigidity of females*. Aids the establishment of normal menstrual flow in young girls.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture and fluid extract-ten-to forty-drops doses.

daphne-indica.name: Daphne Indica
daphne-indica.essence:
Acts on lower tissues, muscles, bones and skin. Sudden, lightning jerks in different parts of the body. *Craving for tobacco*. Burning in stomach. Parts of the body feel separated (*Bapt*).

*Fetid* breath, urine, sweat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Spurge Laurel
Acts on lower tissues, muscles, bones and skin. Sudden, lightning jerks in different parts of the body. *Craving for tobacco*. Burning in stomach. Parts of the body feel separated (*Bapt*).
*Fetid* breath, urine, sweat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels as if skull would burst; *as if head were separated from body*. Heat in head, especially in vertex. *Tongue coated on one side only* (*Rhus*). Foul-smelling, ptyalism hot.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thick, turbid, yellowish, like rotten eggs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Right toe swollen, painful. Pain shoots upward into abdomen and heart. Rheumatic pains in thighs and knees. Cold feeling on buttocks. Shooting pains, shift rapidly worse, cold air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Entire inability to sleep; sometimes caused by aching in bones. Dreams, with nightmare. Dreams of cats, black cats. Starting on falling to sleep with chilliness and clamminess.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Bry; Rhus*.
Compare: *Fluor ac; Aur; Mez; Staph*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to sixth attenuation.

digitalis-purpurea.name: Digitalis Purpurea
digitalis-purpurea.essence: Comes into play in all diseases where the heart is primarily involved, where the pulse is *weak, irregular, intermittent*, *abnormally slow*, and dropsy of external and internal parts. *Weakness and dilatation of the myocardium*. Its greatest indication is in failure of compensation and especially when *auricular fibrillation has set in*. Slow pulse in recumbent posture, but irregular and dicrotic on sitting up. Auricular flutter and fibrillation especially when subsequent to rheumatic fever. He...

agg: when sitting erect, after meals and music

complementary: aggravated by champagne and aerated waters

digitalis-purpurea.dosing: The third to thirtieth attenuation will bring about reaction when the drug is homeopathically indicated; but for palliative purposes the physiological dosage is required. For this purpose, the tincture made from the *fresh* plant, in doses of five to twenty drops, when the cardiac stimulation is desired, or the infusion of 1 1/2 per cent. Dose, one-half to one ounce if the diuretic action is wanted. The tincture may be given on sugar or bread, and nothing liquid be taken for twenty minutes before or after its administration. Of the powdered leaves, 1/2 to 2 grains in capsules. Digitoxin 1-250 grain. No matter what form of digitalis is given the dose should be reduced as soon as the pulse rate has been lowered to 80 beats a minute and the normal rhythm has been partially or completely restored. Under such conditions a good rule is to cut the dose in half and still more if there be a sudden falling off of the urinary output.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Blueness of eyelids. Dark bodies, like flies, before eyes. *Change in acuteness of perception of shades of green*. Objects, appear green and yellow. Mydriasis; lid margins red, swollen, agglutinated in morning. Detachment of retina. Dim vision, irregular pupils, diplopia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Foxglove (DIGITALIS)
Comes into play in all diseases where the heart is primarily involved, where the pulse is *weak, irregular, intermittent*, *abnormally slow*, and dropsy of external and internal parts. *Weakness and dilatation of the myocardium*. Its greatest indication is in failure of compensation and especially when *auricular fibrillation has set in*. Slow pulse in recumbent posture, but irregular and dicrotic on sitting up. Auricular flutter and fibrillation especially when subsequent to rheumatic fever. Heart block, very slow pulse. Other symptoms of organic heart disease, such as great weakness and sinking of strength, faintness, coldness of skin, and irregular respiration; cardiac irritability and ocular troubles after tobacco; jaundice from induration and *hypertrophy of the liver*, frequently call for Digitalis. Jaundice with heart disease. Faint, as if dying. *Bluish* appearance of face. *Cardiac muscular failure* when asystole is present. Stimulates the heart's muscles, increases force of systole, increases length. Prostration from slight exertion. Collapse.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Despondency; fearful; *anxious* about the future. Dullness of sense. Every shock strikes in epigastrium. Melancholia, dull lethargic with *slow* pulse.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo, when walking and on rising, in cardiac and hepatic affections. Sharp, shooting frontal pain, extending into nose, after drinking cold water or eating ice-cream. Heaviness of head, with sensation as if it would fall backward. Face bluish. Confusion, fullness and noise in head. Cracking sounds during a nap. Blue tongue and lips.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sweet taste with constant ptyalism. *Excessive nausea*, not relieved by vomiting. Faintness, *great weakness in stomach*. Burning in stomach extending to oesophagus. After cold water or ice-cream, sharp pain in forehead, extending to nose. *Faintness* and vomiting from motion. Discomfort, even after a small quantity of food, or from mere sight or smell. *Tenderness of epigastrium*. Copious salivation. *Neuralgic pain in stomach*, unconnected with taking food.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in left side apparently in descending colon and under false ribs. Severe abdominal pains, pulsation in abdominal aorta, and epigastric constriction. *Enlarged, sore, painful liver*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *White, chalk-like, ashy, pasty stools*. Diarrhoea during jaundice.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Continued urging, in drops, dark, hot, burning, with sharp cutting or *throbbing* pain at neck of bladder, *as if a straw was being thrust back and forth*; worse at night. Suppressed. Ammoniacal, and turbid. *Urethritis*, phimosis, strangury. Full feeling after urination. Constriction and burning, as if urethra was too small. Brick-dust sediment.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Labor-like pains in abdomen and back before menses. Uterine haemorrhage.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nightly emission (*Digitalin*), with great weakness of genitals after coitus. Hydrocele; scrotum enlarged like a bladder. Gonorrhoea, balanitis (*Merc*), with oedema of prepuce. Dropsical swelling of genitals (*Sulph*). Enlarged prostate.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Desire to take a deep breath. Breathing irregular, difficult; deep sighing. Cough, with raw, sore feeling in chest. Expectoration sweetish. Senile pneumonia. Great weakness in chest. *Dyspnoea*, constant desire to breathe deeply, lungs feel compressed. Chronic bronchitis; passive congestion of the lungs, giving bloody sputum due to failing myocardium. *Cannot bear to talk*. Haemoptysis with weak heart.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: The least movement causes violent palpitation, and sensation as if it would cease beating, if he moves (Opposite; Gels). Frequent stitches in heart. *Irregular heart especially of mitral disease. Very slow pulse. Intermits; weak*. Cyanosis. Inequality of pulse; it varies. *Sudden sensation as if heart stood still. Pulse weak, and quickened by least movement*. Pericarditis, copious serous exudation. Dilated heart, tired, irregular, with slow and feeble pulse. Hypertrophy with dilatation. Cardiac failure following fevers. Cardiac dropsy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Swelling of the feet. Fingers go to sleep easily. Coldness of hands and feet. Rheumatic pain in joints. Shining, white swelling of joints. Muscular debility. Nocturnal swelling of fingers. Sensation in legs as *if a red hot wire* suddenly darted through them (Dudgeon).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Starts from sleep in alarm* that he is falling from a height. Continuous sleepiness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sudden flushes of heat, followed by great nervous weakness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Erythema, deep red, worse on back, like measles. Blue distended veins on lids, ears, lips and tongue. *Dropsical*. Itching and jaundiced.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, when sitting erect, after meals and music. *Better*, when stomach is empty; in open air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Antidotes: *Camph; Serpentaria*. Incompatible: *China*. Compare: *Nerium odorum* (resembles in heart effects Digitalis, but also has an action like Strychnia on spinal cord. Spasms appear more in upper part of body. Palpitation; weak heart will be strengthened by it. Lock-jaw). *Adonia; Crataegus* (a true heat tonic); *Kalmia; Spigel; Liatris*; Compare also; *Digitoxinum* (Digitalis dissolved in Chloroform; which has yellow vision very marked, and distressing nausea, *aggravated by champagne and aerated waters*). *Nitri spir dulc* increases action of Digit. *Ichthyotoxin*. Eel Serum (Experiments show great analogy between the serum and the venom of vipera. Indicated whenever the systole of the heart is insufficient, decompensated valvular disease, irregular pulse due to fibrillation of the auricle. Assytole, feeble, frequent, irregular pulse, dyspnoea and scanty urine. Liver enlarged, dyspnoea, albuminuria. No oedema). *Convallaria* (heart disease with vertigo and digestive disturbances). *Quinidin*-Isomeric methoxyl compound.--(Restores normal rhythm in auricular fibrillation, often supplements the action of Digitalis. Two doses of 3 grains each, three hours apart-if no symptoms of cinchonism develop, 4 doses 6 grs each daily (C. Harlan Wells). Paroxysmal tachycardia. Establishes normal heart rhythm at least temporarily, less in valvular lesions).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: The third to thirtieth attenuation will bring about reaction when the drug is homeopathically indicated; but for palliative purposes the physiological dosage is required. For this purpose, the tincture made from the *fresh* plant, in doses of five to twenty drops, when the cardiac stimulation is desired, or the infusion of 1 1/2 per cent. Dose, one-half to one ounce if the diuretic action is wanted. The tincture may be given on sugar or bread, and nothing liquid be taken for twenty minutes before or after its administration. Of the powdered leaves, 1/2 to 2 grains in capsules. Digitoxin 1-250 grain. No matter what form of digitalis is given the dose should be reduced as soon as the pulse rate has been lowered to 80 beats a minute and the normal rhythm has been partially or completely restored. Under such conditions a good rule is to cut the dose in half and still more if there be a sudden falling off of the urinary output.

dioscorea-villosa.name: Dioscorea Villosa
dioscorea-villosa.essence: As a remedy for many kinds of *pain*, especially colic, and in severe, painful affections of abdominal and pelvic viscera; it ranks with the polychrests of the Materia Medica. Persons of feeble digestive powers; tea-drinkers, with much flatulence. *Gall stone colic*.

agg: evening and night, *lying down*, and doubling up
amel: standing erect, motion in open air

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Wild Yam
As a remedy for many kinds of *pain*, especially colic, and in severe, painful affections of abdominal and pelvic viscera; it ranks with the polychrests of the Materia Medica. Persons of feeble digestive powers; tea-drinkers, with much flatulence. *Gall stone colic*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Calls things by the wrong name.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull pain in both temples; better pressure, but worse afterwards. Buzzing in head.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Mouth dry and bitter in morning, tongue coated, no thirst. Belching of large quantities of offensive gas. Neuralgia of stomach. *Sinking at the pit of the stomach*; pyrosis. *Pain along sternum and extending into arms*. Eructations of sour, bitter wind, *with hiccough*. Sharp pain in epigastrium, relieved by standing erect.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pains suddenly shift to different parts; *appear in remote localities, as fingers and toes*. Rumbling, with emission of much flatus. Griping, cutting in hypogastric region, with intermittent cutting in stomach and small intestines. Colic; better walking about; pains radiate from abdomen, to back, chest, arms; worse, bending forwards and while lying. *Sharp pains from liver, shooting upward to right nipple*. Pain from gall-bladder to chest, back, and arms. Renal colic, with pain in extremities. Hurried desire for stool.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Angina pectoris; pain back of sternum into arms; labored breathing; *feeble action of heart*. Especially with flatulence and pain through chest and tightness across.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Haemorrhoids, with darting pains to liver; look like bunches or grapes or red cherries; protrude after stool, with pain in anus. Diarrhoea (worse in morning), yellowish, followed by exhaustion, as if flatus and feces were hot.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Relaxation and coldness of organs*. Pains shoot into testicles from region of kidneys. *Strong-smelling sweat* on scrotum and pubes. Emissions in sleep, or from sexual atony, *with weak knees*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Uterine colic; pains radiate from uterus. Vivid dreams.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tight feeling all along sternum. Chest does not seem to expand on breathing. Short-winded.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lameness in back; worse, stooping. Aching and stiffness in joints. Sciatica; pains shoot down thigh; worse, right side; better, when perfectly still. *Felons* in beginning, when pricking is first felt. Nails brittle. Cramps in flexors of fingers and toes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, evening and night, *lying down*, and doubling up. *Better*, standing erect, motion in open air; pressure.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Chamom; Camph*.
Compare: *Colocy* (differs in modalities); *Nux; Cham; Bry*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency.

diphtherinum.name: Diphtherinum
diphtherinum.essence: Adapted to patients prone to catarrhal affections of respiratory organs, scrofulous individuals. Diphtheria, laryngeal diphtheria, *post-diphtheritic paralysis*. Malignancy from the start. Glands swollen; tongue red, swollen; breath and discharge very offensive. Diphtheritic; membrane thick, dark. Epistaxis; profound prostration. Swallows without pain, but fluids are vomited or returned by the nose.
diphtherinum.dosing: Thirtieth, two hundredth or C. M potency. Must not be repeated too frequently.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Potentized Diphtheritic Virus
Adapted to patients prone to catarrhal affections of respiratory organs, scrofulous individuals. Diphtheria, laryngeal diphtheria, *post-diphtheritic paralysis*. Malignancy from the start. Glands swollen; tongue red, swollen; breath and discharge very offensive. Diphtheritic; membrane thick, dark. Epistaxis; profound prostration. Swallows without pain, but fluids are vomited or returned by the nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Diphtherotoxin* (Cahis) (Chronic bronchitis with rales. Cartier suggests it in the vago-paralytic forms of Bronchitis of the aged or in toxic bronchitis after grip).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thirtieth, two hundredth or C. M potency. Must not be repeated too frequently.

dolichos-pruriens.name: Dolichos Pruriens
dolichos-pruriens.essence: A right-sided medicine, with pronounced liver and skin symptoms. A general *intense itching* without eruption. Exalted nervous sensibility. Senile pruritus. Haemorrhoidal diathesis.

complementary: Rhus; Bell; Hep; Nit ac; Fagopyr

dolichos-pruriens.dosing: Sixth potency. Tincture, drop doses, in haemorrhoids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Cowhage (DOLICHOS PURIENS - MUCUNA)
A right-sided medicine, with pronounced liver and skin symptoms. A general *intense itching* without eruption. Exalted nervous sensibility. Senile pruritus. Haemorrhoidal diathesis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pain in throat, worse swallowing, below right angle of jaw, as if splinter were imbedded vertically*. Pain in gums prevents sleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Colic from getting feet wet. *Constipation, with intense itching; bloated abdomen*. White stools. Swelling of liver. *Haemorrhoids*, with burning sensation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Intense itching*, with no swelling or rash; worse across shoulders, also about elbows and knees and hairy parts. Jaundice. Yellow in spots; itching excessively at night. Herpes zoster (*Ars*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, at night, scratching, right side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Rhus; Bell; Hep; Nit ac; Fagopyr*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency. Tincture, drop doses, in haemorrhoids.

doryphora-decemlineata.name: Doryphora Decemlineata
doryphora-decemlineata.essence: The center of this drug's action seems to be in the urinary organs, and hence its employment in gonorrhoea and gleet. Urethritis in children from local irritation and gleet. Great trembling in extremities. Prostration. Swelling of body. *Burning sensation*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Colorado Potato-bug (DORYPHORA)
The center of this drug's action seems to be in the urinary organs, and hence its employment in gonorrhoea and gleet. Urethritis in children from local irritation and gleet. Great trembling in extremities. Prostration. Swelling of body. *Burning sensation*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Difficult micturition. Urethra inflamed, with excruciating pain when urinating. Pain in back and loins. Severe trembling in limbs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidote: *Stram*.
Compare: *Agar; Apis; Canth; Lach; Coccion*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth potency.

dulcamara.name: Dulcamara
dulcamara.essence: Hot days and cold nights towards the close of summer are especially favorable to the action of Dulcamara, and is one of the remedies that correspond in their symptoms to the conditions found as effects of damp weather, colds after exposure to wet, especially diarrhoea. It has a specific relation also to the *skin, glands*, and digestive organs, *mucous membranes* secreting more profusely while the skin is inactive. The *rheumatic troubles* induced by damp cold are aggravated by every cold change...

complementary: Rhus; Cimicif; Calc; Puls; Bry; Nat sulph

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second to thirtieth potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Bitter-sweet
Hot days and cold nights towards the close of summer are especially favorable to the action of Dulcamara, and is one of the remedies that correspond in their symptoms to the conditions found as effects of damp weather, colds after exposure to wet, especially diarrhoea. It has a specific relation also to the *skin, glands*, and digestive organs, *mucous membranes* secreting more profusely while the skin is inactive. The *rheumatic troubles* induced by damp cold are aggravated by every cold change and somewhat relieved by moving about. Results from sitting on cold, damp ground. Icy coldness. One-sided spasms with speechlessness. Paralysis of single parts. Congestive headache, with neuralgia and dry nose. Patients living or working in damp, cold basements (*Nat sulph*). Eruptions on hands, arms or face around the menstrual period.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Mental confusion. Occipital pain ascending from nape of neck. Headache relieved by conversation. Rejects things asked for. Back part of head chilly, heavy, aching, during cold weather. Ringworm of scalp. *Scaldhead, thick brown crusts*, bleeding when scratched. Buzzing in head.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry coryza. Complete stoppage of nose. *Stuffs up when there is a cold rain*. Thick, yellow mucus, bloody crusts. Profuse coryza. Wants nose kept warm, least cold air stops the nose. Coryza of the new born.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Every time he takes cold it settles in eyes. Thick, yellow discharge; granular lids. Hay-fever; profuse, watery discharge, worse in open air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Earache, buzzing, stitches, and swelling of parotids. Middle-ear catarrh (*Merc dulc; Kal mur*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tearing in cheek extending to ear, orbit, and jaw, *preceded by coldness of parts, and attended by canine hunger*. Humid eruption on cheeks and face generally.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Saliva tenacious, soapy. Dry, rough tongue, rough scraping in throat, after taking cold in damp weather. Cold-sores on lips. Facial neuralgia; worse, *slightest exposure to cold*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vomiting of white, tenacious mucus. *Aversion to food. Burning thirst for cold drinks*. Heartburn. Nausea accompanies the desire for stool. Chilliness during vomiting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Colic from cold. Acts prominently on umbilical region. *Cutting pain about navel*. Swelling of inguinal glands (*Merc*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Green, watery, slimy, bloody, *mucus*, especially in summer, when the weather suddenly becomes cold; *from damp, cold weather* and repelled eruptions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Must urinate *when getting chilled*. Strangury, painful micturition. Catarrh of bladder from taking cold. Urine has thick, *mucous*, purulent sediment. Ischuria from wading with bare feet in cold water.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Suppression of menses from cold or dampness. Before appearance of menses, *a rash appears on skin*, or sexual excitement. Dysmenorrhoea, with blotches all over; mammae engorged and sore, delicate, sensitive to cold.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cough worse cold, wet weather, with free expectoration, tickling in larynx. Cough, hoarse, spasmodic. Whooping-cough, with excessive secretion of mucus. Winter coughs, dry, teasing. Asthma with dyspnoea. Loose, rattling cough; worse wet weather. Must cough a long time to expel phlegm. Cough *after physical exertion*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stiff neck. *Pain in small of back*, as after long stooping. Stiffness and lameness across neck and shoulders, after getting cold and wet.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Paralysis; paralyzed limbs, *feet icy cold*. Warts on hands. Perspiration on palms of hands. Pain in shin-bones. Rheumatism alternates with diarrhoea. Rheumatic symptoms after acute skin eruptions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Adenitis. Pruritus, always worse in cold, wet weather*. Herpes zoster, pemphigus. Swelling and indurated glands from cold. Vesicular eruptions. Sensitive bleeding ulcers. Little boils. Red spots, *urticaria*, brought on by exposure, or sour stomach. Humid eruptions on face, genitals, hands, etc. *Warts*, large, smooth, on face and palmar surface of hands. Anasarca. Thick, brown-yellow crusts, bleeding when scratched.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry burning heat all over. Chilliness towards evening, mostly in back. Icy coldness, with pains. Dry heat and burning of skin. Chilliness with thirst.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, at night; from *cold* in general, *damp, rainy weather*. *Better*, from moving about, external warmth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Camph; Cupr*.
Complementary: *Baryta carb*.
Incompatible: *Bellad; Laches*.
Compare: *Pimpinello*--(Bibernell).--Respiratory mucous membrane sensitive to draughts, pain and coldness in occiput and nape. Whole body weak; heavy head and drowsiness; lumbago and stiff neck; pain from nape to shoulder; chilliness. *Rhus; Cimicif; Calc; Puls; Bry; Nat sulph*.

echinacea-angustifolia.name: Echinacea Angustifolia
echinacea-angustifolia.essence: We are indebted to the Eclectic school for this remarkable medicine as a "corrector of blood dyscrasia". Acute auto-infection. Symptoms of *blood poisoning, septic conditions generally*. Diarrhoea in typhoid. Gonorrhoea. Boils. *Erysipelas* and foul ulcers. *Gangrene*. Goitre with exophthalmic symptoms; full doses, also injecting 5-10 drops into thyroid gland. Tendency to malignancy in acute and subacute disorders. Last stages of cancer to ease pain. *Venom infection*. Cerebro-spinal meningitis....

complementary: Cenchris contortrix; Bothrops; Ars; Laches; Baptis; Rhus; Cistus; Hepar; Calendula

echinacea-angustifolia.dosing:
Tincture, one to ten drops, every two hours, and larger doses.
*Locally*, as a cleansing and antiseptic wash.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Purple Cone-flower (ECHINACEA - RUDBECKIA)
We are indebted to the Eclectic school for this remarkable medicine as a "corrector of blood dyscrasia". Acute auto-infection. Symptoms of *blood poisoning, septic conditions generally*. Diarrhoea in typhoid. Gonorrhoea. Boils. *Erysipelas* and foul ulcers. *Gangrene*. Goitre with exophthalmic symptoms; full doses, also injecting 5-10 drops into thyroid gland. Tendency to malignancy in acute and subacute disorders. Last stages of cancer to ease pain. *Venom infection*. Cerebro-spinal meningitis. Puerperal infections. *Tired feeling*. Piles. Pustules. Acts on vermiform appendix thus has been used for appendicitis, but remember it promotes suppuration and a neglected appendicitis with pus formation would probably rupture sooner under its use. Lymphatic inflammation; crushing injuries. *Snake bites* and bites and stings generally. Foul discharges with emaciation and great debility.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Confused, depressed. Aches with a peculiar periodical flushing of the face, even to the neck; dizziness and profound prostration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Foul-smelling discharge, membranous formations protruding. Post-nasal catarrh with ulceration and fetor. Nose feels stuffed up. Right nostril raw, bleeding.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Canker; gums recede and bleed easily; corners of mouth and lips crack; tongue dry and swollen; sores; dirty brownish. Tongue, lips, and fauces *tingle*, with sense of fear about heart (*Acon*). White coating of tongue, with red edges. Promotes the flow of saliva.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tonsils purple or black, gray exudation extending to posterior nares and air-passages. Ulcerated sore throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sour belching and heartburn. Nausea; better lying down.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain as of a lump in chest and under sternum. Pain in pectoral muscles (*Aristolochia*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Albuminous, scanty, frequent, and involuntary.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Puerperal septicaemia*; discharges suppressed; abdomen sensitive and tympanitic; offensive, excoriating leucorrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Aching in limbs* and general lassitude.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Recurring boils. Carbuncles. Irritations from insect bites and poisonous plants. Lymphatics enlarged. Old tibial ulcers. Gangrene.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Chilliness, with nausea*. Cold flashes all over back. *Malarial fever*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Cenchris contortrix; Bothrops; Ars; Laches; Baptis; Rhus; Cistus; Hepar; Calendula*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Tincture, one to ten drops, every two hours, and larger doses.
*Locally*, as a cleansing and antiseptic wash.

elaps-corallinus.name: Elaps Corallinus
elaps-corallinus.essence: Similar to snake-poisons generally. Has very marked *black discharges. Cold things disagree*. Desire for sweetened buttermilk. Nausea and vomiting. Prostrating diarrhoea of consumption. Acidity of stomach, with faint feeling. Sudden pain in stomach. Spasm of oesophagus; pharynx constricted; food and liquids suddenly arrested, and then fall heavily into stomach. Spasms followed by paresis. *Cold feeling in stomach*. Fruits and ice-water lie very cold. *Right-sided paralysis*. Must have oscillator...

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Coral-snake
Similar to snake-poisons generally. Has very marked *black discharges. Cold things disagree*. Desire for sweetened buttermilk. Nausea and vomiting. Prostrating diarrhoea of consumption. Acidity of stomach, with faint feeling. Sudden pain in stomach. Spasm of oesophagus; pharynx constricted; food and liquids suddenly arrested, and then fall heavily into stomach. Spasms followed by paresis. *Cold feeling in stomach*. Fruits and ice-water lie very cold. *Right-sided paralysis*. Must have oscillatory motion. Rheumatic constitutions. Ear, nose and throat symptoms important.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Depressed; imagines he hears someone talking; dreads to be left alone. *Fear of rain*. Can speak, but cannot understand speech. Fears apoplexy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent headache, extending from forehead *to occiput*; first one eye, then the other. Pain in ears. Vertigo with tendency to fall forward. Weight and pain in forehead. Fullness in head.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aversion to light; letters run together when reading. Veil before eyes. Burning in lids. Bloated around the eyes in the morning. Large red fiery spot before eyes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cerumen *black* and hard, with difficult hearing, or serous *greenish* discharge, offensive; buzzing, and illusion of hearing. Sudden attack of nightly deafness, with roaring and crackling in ears, cracking in ears on swallowing. Intolerable itching in ear.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Chronic nasal catarrh, with fetid odor and greenish crusts*. Ozaena; yellowish-green discharge. Mucous membrane wrinkled; nostrils plugged up with dry mucus. Pains from nose to ears on swallowing. *Nostrils stopped up*. Nasal bleeding. Pain at root of nose. Eruption about nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thick, very offensive, dry, greenish-yellow crusts upon the posterior pharyngeal wall and extremely foul breath. Spasmodic contraction of *oesophagus*; passage of fluids arrested.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Coldness in chest after drinking*. Haemorrhage from lungs black as ink and watery; stitches *in apex of right lung*. Fainting caused by stooping. Oppression in going upstairs. Peeling off of skin from palms and fingers. *Cough*, with terrible pain through lungs. Worse right and expectoration of black blood. Sensation of a sponge in oesophagus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Feels cold*. Sensation as if food turned like a corkscrew on swallowing; desire for sweetened buttermilk. Acidity after every mouthful.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dysmenorrhoea, with black blood. Discharge of black blood between menses. Itching of vulva and vagina.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dreams about dead persons.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Glands and skin of axillae affected; itching with tetter. Tips of fingers peel off. Itching eruption in axillae.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Icy cold feet. Vesicular eruptions on feet. Arms and hands swollen bluish. Knee-joints feel sprained. Pricking under the nails.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cold perspiration all over. Typhoid when ulcers have eaten into tissues, and black blood is discharged.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse* eating fruit; cold drinks; *wet weather*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Kino* from *Pterocarpus* (Haemoptysis and haemorrhage from intestines). *Eucalyptus rostrata* (offensive dark discharge from right ear). *Crotalus; Alumen; Carbo; Ars; Lach*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth potency.

elaterium.name: Elaterium
elaterium.essence: This is an invaluable remedy in violent vomiting and purging, especially if the evacuations are copious and watery. It is a very efficient remedy in certain forms of dropsy. Much yawning and stretching. *Beriberi*; choleraic conditions; urticaria and mental disorders coming on as a consequence of suppressed malaria. Irresistible desire to wander from home at night. Effects of damp weather.
elaterium.dosing: Third to thirtieth potency. As a hydragogue cathartic to produce free discharge in dropsies, Elaterin 1-20 of a grain. Palliative only.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sharp pains in fingers and thumbs, knees, toes, and instep. Gouty pain in great toes. Pain extends down extremities; pain in hip-joints with diarrhoea. Arthritic nodules.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Smarts, stings, and burns. Dropsical. Urticaria from suppressed intermittent. Skin, orange color.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Squirting Cucumber (ELATERIUM - ECBALIUM)
This is an invaluable remedy in violent vomiting and purging, especially if the evacuations are copious and watery. It is a very efficient remedy in certain forms of dropsy. Much yawning and stretching. *Beriberi*; choleraic conditions; urticaria and mental disorders coming on as a consequence of suppressed malaria. Irresistible desire to wander from home at night. Effects of damp weather.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nausea and vomiting, with great weakness. Griping pains in bowels.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Watery, copious, forceful. Squirting diarrhoea*; frothy, olive green, with cutting in abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chill comes on with much *yawning and stretching*, lasting all through chill. Pain in extremities, darting into fingers and toes. Chills and fever, with spurting diarrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, from exposure on damp ground.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Bry; Croton; Gambogia*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency. As a hydragogue cathartic to produce free discharge in dropsies, Elaterin 1-20 of a grain. Palliative only.

eosinum.name: Eosinum
eosinum.essence:
A remedy for cancer, polyarthritis. Proved in potencies by Dr. B. C. Woodbury.

Summary of symptoms:

*Burning* under finger nails and toe nails, on soles.

*Itching* and redness of knee-caps.

*Redness* of palms.

Redness, burning and *numbness* of tongue.

Peculiar sensation of being very tall with tendency to vertigo.

Burning in various parts on skin.

Shifting location after scratching which relieves.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
**(EOSIN)**
A remedy for cancer, polyarthritis. Proved in potencies by Dr. B. C. Woodbury.
Summary of symptoms:
*Burning* under finger nails and toe nails, on soles.
*Itching* and redness of knee-caps.
*Redness* of palms.
Redness, burning and *numbness* of tongue.
Peculiar sensation of being very tall with tendency to vertigo.
Burning in various parts on skin.
Shifting location after scratching which relieves.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second decimal (1 % sol).

epigea-repens.name: Epigea Repens
epigea-repens.essence: Chronic cystitis, with *dysuria*; tenesmus after micturition; *muco-pus and uric-acid deposit*, gravel, renal calculi. Fine sand in urine of a *brown color*. Burning in neck of bladder whilst urinating and tenesmus afterward. Pyelitis, incontinence of urine. Croaking noise and rumbling in bowels.
epigea-repens.dosing: Tincture in 5-drop doses every three hours.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Trailing Arbutus
Chronic cystitis, with *dysuria*; tenesmus after micturition; *muco-pus and uric-acid deposit*, gravel, renal calculi. Fine sand in urine of a *brown color*. Burning in neck of bladder whilst urinating and tenesmus afterward. Pyelitis, incontinence of urine. Croaking noise and rumbling in bowels.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Uva, Chimaph, Lyc; Pareira*. Epigea contains Arbutin, also Formic acid.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture in 5-drop doses every three hours.

epiphegus-virginicus.name: Epiphegus Virginicus
epiphegus-virginicus.essence: A remedy for sick, neurasthenic, and nervous headaches, especially in women, brought on or made worse by exertion, shopping, etc. Tongue coated yellow; bitter taste. Drowsy after meals. Loose stools. *Subinvolution*, with painful menstruation and congestion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Beechdrop (EPIPHEGUS - OROBANCHE)
A remedy for sick, neurasthenic, and nervous headaches, especially in women, brought on or made worse by exertion, shopping, etc. Tongue coated yellow; bitter taste. Drowsy after meals. Loose stools. *Subinvolution*, with painful menstruation and congestion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pressing pain in temples *from without inwards*, *worse, left side*. *Viscid salivation*, constant inclination to spit. Sick headache coming on when deviating from ordinary pursuits. Headaches from nerve tire caused by mental or physical exhaustion, *preceded by hunger*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, from working in open air. *Better*, from sleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Iris, Melilot; Sanguinar. Fagus-Beech-nuts*--(headache and salivation; swelling on mouth; dread of water).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to thirtieth potency.

equisetum-hyemale.name: Equisetum Hyemale
equisetum-hyemale.essence: Principal action on the bladder. A remedy for enuresis and dysuria.

complementary: Hydrangea; Ferr phos; Apis; Canth; Linaria; Chimaph

equisetum-hyemale.dosing: Tincture, to sixth potency. A decoction, teaspoonful doses, or the tincture in hot water, is found useful to allay irritability of urinary tract, calculus, dysuria, etc; also for pleuritic effusion and dropsy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Scouring-rush (EQUISETUM)
Principal action on the bladder. A remedy for enuresis and dysuria.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Severe, dull pain and feeling of fullness in bladder, not relieved by urinating. Frequent urging with severe pain *at the close of urination*. Urine flows only drop by drop. Sharp, *burning*, cutting pain in urethra while urinating.
Incontinence in children, with dreams or night-mares when passing urine. Incontinence in old women, also with involuntary stools. Retention and dysuria during pregnancy and after delivery. Much mucus in urine. Albuminuria. Involuntary urination.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Deep pain in region of right kidney, extending to lower abdomen, with urgent desire to micturate. Right lumbar region painful.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, right side; movement, pressure, touch, sitting down; *better*, in afternoon from lying down.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Hydrangea; Ferr phos; Apis; Canth; Linaria; Chimaph*. Equisitum contains silica in appreciable quantity.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to sixth potency. A decoction, teaspoonful doses, or the tincture in hot water, is found useful to allay irritability of urinary tract, calculus, dysuria, etc; also for pleuritic effusion and dropsy.

erechthites-hieracifolia.name: Erechthites Hieracifolia
erechthites-hieracifolia.essence: A haemorrhagic remedy. Epistaxis of bright blood. Haemorrhage from any part, especially lungs; always attended by excitement of the circulation. Flashes of heat and coldness. Scanty urine, oedema of the extremities.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Fire-weed (ERECHTHITES)
A haemorrhagic remedy. Epistaxis of bright blood. Haemorrhage from any part, especially lungs; always attended by excitement of the circulation. Flashes of heat and coldness. Scanty urine, oedema of the extremities.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Symptoms like Rhus poisoning*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Erig; Millef; Hamam; Rhus*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture. Locally for Poison Oak.

erigeron-canadense.name: Erigeron Canadense
erigeron-canadense.essence: Haemorrhages are caused and cured by this remedy. Persistent haemorrhage from the bladder. Haemorrhage from the uterus, with painful micturition. *Profuse bright-red blood*. Pain in left ovary and hip. Chronic gonorrhoea, with burning micturition; continual dribbling. *Dysentery*, with soreness and burning in bladder. *Tympanites*.
erigeron-canadense.dosing: Tincture, to third potency. Oil of Erigeron 1x internally for *tympanites*. An enema of one dram of the oil with the yolk of an egg and pint of milk will reduce the most enormous tympanites.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Fleabane (ERIGERON - LEPTILON CANADENSE)
Haemorrhages are caused and cured by this remedy. Persistent haemorrhage from the bladder. Haemorrhage from the uterus, with painful micturition. *Profuse bright-red blood*. Pain in left ovary and hip. Chronic gonorrhoea, with burning micturition; continual dribbling. *Dysentery*, with soreness and burning in bladder. *Tympanites*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Metrorrhagia, with violent irritation of rectum and bladder, and prolapsus uteri. Bright-red flow. Menorrhagia; profuse leucorrhoea; *bloody lochia returns after least motion*, comes in gushes; between periods, *leucorrhoea with urinary irritation*; pregnant women with "weak uterus;" a bloody discharge on slight exertion. Bleeding haemorrhoids; nosebleed instead of menses (*Bry*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, left side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Terebinthina similar.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency. Oil of Erigeron 1x internally for *tympanites*. An enema of one dram of the oil with the yolk of an egg and pint of milk will reduce the most enormous tympanites.

eriodyction-californicum.name: Eriodyction Californicum
eriodyction-californicum.essence: A remedy for asthmatic and bronchial affections. Bronchial phthisis, with night-sweats and emaciation. Asthma relieved by expectoration. *Cough after influenza*. Furthers absorption of effusion in plural cavity. Appetite poor and impaired digestion. Whooping cough.
eriodyction-californicum.dosing: Tincture in doses of 2 to 20 drops and attenuations.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Yerba Santa (ERIODICTYON)
A remedy for asthmatic and bronchial affections. Bronchial phthisis, with night-sweats and emaciation. Asthma relieved by expectoration. *Cough after influenza*. Furthers absorption of effusion in plural cavity. Appetite poor and impaired digestion. Whooping cough.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dizzy, feels intoxicated. Pressure outwards; worse, occiput. Pain in ears. Coryza. Burning in throat. Foul mouth in morning. Coryza with dizziness and sneezing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Wheezing; asthma, with coryza and *mucous secretions*. Dull pain in right lung. Burning in fauces. Chronic bronchitis, bronchial tuberculosis, with profuse, easily raised bronchial secretion, giving relief.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sore, dragging in testicle, could not bear any pressure; better gentle support.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Grind; Aral; Eucalyp; Ipec*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture in doses of 2 to 20 drops and attenuations.

eryngium-aquaticum.name: Eryngium Aquaticum
eryngium-aquaticum.essence: A remedy for urinary disorders. Strangury, etc, with nervous erethism. *Thick, yellow mucous discharges*. Influenza. Uridrosis, sweat of urinous odor in evening.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Button Snake-root
A remedy for urinary disorders. Strangury, etc, with nervous erethism. *Thick, yellow mucous discharges*. Influenza. Uridrosis, sweat of urinous odor in evening.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cough, with sense of constriction. Smarting in throat and larynx.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tenesmus of bladder and urethra. Difficult and frequent micturition. Pain behind pubes. Spasmodic stricture. *Renal colic* (*Pareira; Calc*). Congestion of kidneys with dull pain in back, running down the ureters and limbs. Irritable bladder from enlarged prostate gland, or from pressure of uterus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Discharge of prostatic fluid from slight causes. Seminal emissions without erections, with lassitude (*Dioscor; Phos ac*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Conium; Cannab; Dios; Ocim; Clemat*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency.

eucalyptus-globulus.name: Eucalyptus Globulus
eucalyptus-globulus.essence: Eucalyptus is a powerful antiseptic and destructive to low forms of life, a stimulating expectorant and an efficient diaphoretic. Atonic dyspepsia, gastric and intestinal catarrh. A remedy with marked effects on catarrhal processes, malaria, and intestinal disturbance. *Influenza*. Fevers of a *relapsing* character. Produces diuresis and great increase of urea. Haemorrhages internally and locally (*Hamam*). *Typhoid*. Symptoms of exhaustion and toxaemia. Conditions of the mucous surfaces of the ...
eucalyptus-globulus.dosing: Tincture in one to 20 drop doses, and lower potencies. Also Oil of Eucalyptus in five-drop doses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Blue Gum-tree
Eucalyptus is a powerful antiseptic and destructive to low forms of life, a stimulating expectorant and an efficient diaphoretic. Atonic dyspepsia, gastric and intestinal catarrh. A remedy with marked effects on catarrhal processes, malaria, and intestinal disturbance. *Influenza*. Fevers of a *relapsing* character. Produces diuresis and great increase of urea. Haemorrhages internally and locally (*Hamam*). *Typhoid*. Symptoms of exhaustion and toxaemia. Conditions of the mucous surfaces of the air passages, genito-urinary organs and gastro-intestinal tract. A gastro-intestinal irritant with pain in stomach and upper intestines several hours after eating.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Exhilaration. Desire for exercise. Dull congestive headache. *Coryza*; sore throat. Eyes smart and burn.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Stuffed-up sensation*; thin, watery coryza; nose does not stop running; tightness across bridge. *Chronic catarrhal, purulent and fetid discharge*. Ethmoid and frontal sinus involved.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Relaxed, aphthous condition of mouth and throat. Excessive secretion of saliva. Burns, feels full. Constant sensation of phlegm in throat. Enlarged, ulcerated tonsils and inflamed throat (Use tincture locally).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Slow digestion*. Much fetid gas. Beating and goneness with pulsation in epigastric arteries. Spleen hard and contracted. Pain in epigastrium and upper abdomen ameliorated by food. Malignant disease of stomach with vomiting of blood and sour fluid.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Acute diarrhoea*. Aching pains in bowels with feeling of impending diarrhoea. *Dysentery*, with rectal heat; tenesmus; haemorrhage. Diarrhoea; stools thin, watery, preceded by sharp pains. Typhoid diarrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Acute nephritis complicating influenza*. Haematuria. Suppurative inflammation of kidneys. Urine contains pus and is deficient in urea. Bladder feels loss of expulsive force. Burning and tenesmus; *catarrh of bladder*; diuresis; *urethral caruncle*. Spasmodic stricture; gonorrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Asthma*, with great dyspnoea and palpitation. Moist asthma. Expectoration white, thick mucus. Bronchitis in the aged. Bronchorrhoea (*Bals. Peru*). Profuse expectoration of offensive muco-pus. Irritative cough. Whooping-cough in rachitic children. Fetid form of bronchitis, bronchial dilatation and emphysema.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Leucorrhoea, acrid, fetid. Ulcer around orifice of urethra.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rheumatic pains; worse at night, walking or carrying anything. Stiff, weary sensation. *Pricking sensation, followed by painful aching*. Nodular swellings over metacarpal and metatarsal joints.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Glandular enlargements and nodular swelling over joints. Foul and indolent ulcers. Herpetic eruptions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Elevation of temperature. Continued and typhoid fevers. Scarlet fever (protective and curative). Discharges show a tendency to foulness, high temperature, accelerated but not strong pulse. Use the tincture.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: Oil of *Eucalyptus*.--(Produces remarkable bodily exhaustion, no desire for any motion, unable to do any real mental work, study, etc. The volatile oil possesses, in common with other terpenes, the property of converting water, in presence of air and sunlight, into hydrogen peroxide, or to convert oxygen into ozone, which is the explanation usually given of its deodorizing and antiseptic properties (Merrel). Locally, in catarrhal affections, especially when of a suppurating or putrid nature). *Eucalyptus tereticoris* (menstrual cough and prostration). *Eucalyptol* (depresses temperature of healthy body more than *Quinine*; acts on kidneys like *Terebinth*); *Anacard; Hydrast; Kali sulph. Eucalyptus* neutralizes ill effects of *Strychnin*.
*Angophora*-Red Gum--(dysentery, pains, tenesmus; better lying flat on face; obstinate constipation). *Eucalyptus rostrata; Kino*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture in one to 20 drop doses, and lower potencies. Also Oil of Eucalyptus in five-drop doses.

eugenia-jambos.name: Eugenia Jambos
eugenia-jambos.essence: *Eugenia* produces a state of intoxication like alcohol. Everything appears beautiful and larger; excitement soon changing to depression. Acne, simple and indurated. The pimples are painful for some distance around. Acne rosacea. *Nausea, better smoking. Comedones*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Rose-apple (JAMBOSA VULGARIS)
*Eugenia* produces a state of intoxication like alcohol. Everything appears beautiful and larger; excitement soon changing to depression. Acne, simple and indurated. The pimples are painful for some distance around. Acne rosacea. *Nausea, better smoking. Comedones*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Headache as if a board were lying on right side. Talkative. *Hot lachrymation*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Nightly cramp in soles of feet* (*Cupr; Zing*). Skin cracks about toes. Fissures between toes. Skin recedes from the nails, forming pus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: Eugenia chekun-Myrtus chekan (chronic Bronchitis); *Antim; Berb aquif*.

euonymus-atropurpurea.name: Euonymus Atropurpurea
euonymus-atropurpurea.essence: Brunettes more easily affected, producing headache, mental disturbances and much distress in hepatic and renal region; albuminuria. Migraine. Passive Congestion and torpor of liver; chronic catarrhal affections of stomach and intestines. Weak heart. Chronic rheumatism and gout.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aching in all joints, especially ankles. Feet feel swollen and tired.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Better* cool draught, pressure. *Worse* evening.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Wahoo, Burning Bush
Brunettes more easily affected, producing headache, mental disturbances and much distress in hepatic and renal region; albuminuria. Migraine. Passive Congestion and torpor of liver; chronic catarrhal affections of stomach and intestines. Weak heart. Chronic rheumatism and gout.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Mental confusion, despondent, irritable; loss of memory, unable to recall familiar names.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heavy frontal headache. Sore, tired feeling; bruised feeling of scalp. Pain over right eye extending back through the head. Bilious headache; coated tongue, bad taste, constipation. Vertigo, obscure vision and gastric derangement, associated with albuminuria. Headache over eyebrows.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Mouth dry, pasty taste; thirsty, stomach full and uncomfortable.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Flatus and pain. Anus very sore and burning. Constipation with haemorrhoids and severe backache. Diarrhoea; stools variable and profuse, bloody. Pain about umbilical region.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Urine scanty, high-colored; acidity increased, poured out rapidly.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull pain between shoulders and about renal and splenic region; pain in lumbar region better lying down.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Euonymus Europoea*-Spindle-tree (Liver disorders, biliousness, lumbago, gastric derangements with albuminuria. Cutting pains in malar bones, tongue, penis up to bladder); *Podophyl; Ammon pic; Chel; Euonymin* 1x trit (albuminuria).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture and lower attenuations.

eupatorium-aromaticum.name: Eupatorium Aromaticum
eupatorium-aromaticum.essence:
Nervous erethism; restlessness and morbid watchfulness. Hysteria and chorea. Low fevers, with extreme restlessness.

Aphthous disease. *Sore nipples*. Sore mouth in infants. Vomiting of bile, pain in stomach, headache, and fever.
eupatorium-aromaticum.dosing: Tincture, locally, in sore mouth and sore nipples. Internally, tincture to third attenuation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
