Contraction of limbs, stiffness and immobility. Feeling that he must stretch.

agg: from motion, heat, cold wet weather
pressure, touch, from 6 pm to 4 am

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Resin of Lignum Vitae (GUAIACUM)
Chief action on fibrous tissue, and is especially adapted to the arthritic diathesis, rheumatism, and tonsillitis. Secondary syphilis. Very valuable in acute rheumatism. *Free foul secretions. Unclean odor from whole body*. Promotes suppuration of abscesses. Sensitiveness and aggravation from local heat. Contraction of limbs, stiffness and immobility. Feeling that he must stretch.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Forgetful; thoughtless; staring. Slow to comprehend.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Gouty and rheumatic pain in head* and face, *extending to neck*. Tearing pain in skull; worse, cold, wet weather. Feels swollen, and blood-vessels distended. Aching in left ear. *Pains often end in a stitch*, especially in head.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pupils dilated. Eyelids appear too short. Pimples around eyes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rheumatic sore throat with weak throat muscles. Throat dry, burns, swollen, stitches toward ear. *Acute tonsillitis*. Syphilitic sore throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue furred. *Desire for apples* and other fruits. Aversion to milk. Burning in stomach. Constricted epigastric region.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Intestinal fermentation. Much wind in bowels. Diarrhoea, cholera infantum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sharp stitches after urinating. Constant desire.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Feels suffocated*. Dry, tight cough. Fetid breath after coughing. *Pleuritic stitches*. Chest pains in articulations of ribs, with shortness of breathing till expectoration sets in.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ovaritis in rheumatic patients, with irregular menstruation and dysmenorrhoea, and irritable bladder.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain from head to neck. *Aching in nape. Stiff neck and sore shoulders*. Stitches between scapulae to occiput. Contractive pain between scapulae.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rheumatic pain in shoulders, arms and hands. *Growing pains* (*Phos ac*). Pricking in nates. Sciatica and lumbago. Gouty tearing, with contractions. Immovable stiffness. Ankle pain extending up the leg, causing lameness. Joints swollen, painful, and intolerant of pressure; can bear no heat. Stinging pain in limbs. Arthritic lancinations followed by contraction of limbs. *A feeling of heat* in the affected limbs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, from motion, heat, cold wet weather; pressure, touch, from 6 pm to 4 am. *Better*, external pressure.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
*Guaiacol* (in the treatment of gonorrhoeal epididymitis, 2 parts to 30 vaselin, locally).
Antidote: *Nux*. Follow Sepia.
Compare: *Merc; Caust; Rhus; Mezer; Rhodod*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to sixth attenuation.

guarea-trichiloides.name: Guarea Trichiloides
guarea-trichiloides.essence: Eye symptoms have been verified. Chemosis and pterygium have been cured with it. Lupus of an ochre-red color.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Ballwood (GUAREA)
Eye symptoms have been verified. Chemosis and pterygium have been cured with it. Lupus of an ochre-red color.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Conjunctiva inflamed, swollen. Tearing pain in eyeballs; tension, forced-out feeling. Objects appear gray, upside down. Eye symptoms alternate with diminished hearing. Epiphora.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation as if brain were falling forwards; as from a blow on head.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cough with sweat, pain and tightness of chest; larynx irritated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture.

gymnocladus-canadensis.name: Gymnocladus Canadensis
gymnocladus-canadensis.essence: Sore throat, dark livid redness of fauces, and erysipelatous swelling of face are most marked. Hives. Desire for heat and quiet. Headache, throbbing in forehead and temples and over eyes, with *bluish-white coating of tongue*. Burning in eyes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
American Coffee-tree (GYMNOCLADUS)
Sore throat, dark livid redness of fauces, and erysipelatous swelling of face are most marked. Hives. Desire for heat and quiet. Headache, throbbing in forehead and temples and over eyes, with *bluish-white coating of tongue*. Burning in eyes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation as of flies crawling over face. Erysipelas. Great sensibility of teeth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sore; dark livid redness of fauces and tonsils. Sticking pain. Mucus in throat and hawking. Tickling, with dry cough.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Lachnant; Laches; Ailanth; Rhus*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lower attenuations.

haematoxylon-campechianum.name: Haematoxylon Campechianum
haematoxylon-campechianum.essence: Sense of constriction is characteristic. *Sensation as if a bar lay across chest*. Angina pectoris.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Logwood (HAEMATOXYLON)
Sense of constriction is characteristic. *Sensation as if a bar lay across chest*. Angina pectoris.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels constricted; heavy, hot. Eyelids heavy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Painful digging from abdomen to throat, causing pain in region of heart with oppression. Colic, tympanitis. Borborygmi and diarrhoea. Swollen, painful.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constriction, extending to epigastrium. Sensation of a bar across chest. Convulsive pain in heart region with oppression. Great soreness in region of heart. Palpitation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in hypogastrium, attended with slimy, whitish leucorrhoea. *Weak feeling, with painful bearing down sensation at menstrual period*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Cactus; Colocy; Naja*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

hamamelis-virginiana.name: Hamamelis Virginiana
hamamelis-virginiana.essence: Venous congestion, haemorrhages, varicose veins, and haemorrhoids, with *bruised soreness of affected parts*, seem to be the special sphere of this remedy. Acts upon the coats of the veins causing relaxation with consequent engorgement. Passive venous haemorrhages from any part. Great value in open, painful wounds, with weakness from loss of blood. After operations, supersedes the use of morphia (Helmuth).

complementary: Calc fluor; Aloe; Mur ac in varicose veins. Mangifera indica
Arnica; Calend; Trillium; Bellis; Sulph ac; Pulsatilla

hamamelis-virginiana.dosing: Tincture, to sixth attenuation. Distilled extract locally.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Witch-hazel (HAMAMELIS VIRGINICA)
Venous congestion, haemorrhages, varicose veins, and haemorrhoids, with *bruised soreness of affected parts*, seem to be the special sphere of this remedy. Acts upon the coats of the veins causing relaxation with consequent engorgement. Passive venous haemorrhages from any part. Great value in open, painful wounds, with weakness from loss of blood. After operations, supersedes the use of morphia (Helmuth).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Wants "the respect due to me" shown. Feeling as of a bolt from temple to temple. Fullness, followed by epistaxis. Numbness over frontal bone.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Painful weakness; *sore pain* in eyes; bloodshot appearance; inflamed vessels greatly injected. Hastens absorption of intraocular haemorrhage. Eyes feel forced out.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bleeding from nose profuse; flow passive, non-coagulable, with tightness in bridge of nose. Bad odor from nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Mucous membrane distended and bluish; varicosis of throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue feels burnt. Thirst. Blisters on side. Haematemesis of black blood. Throbbing and pain in stomach.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Anus feels sore and raw. *Haemorrhoids, bleeding profusely, with soreness*. Dysentery. Pulsation in rectum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Haematuria, with increased desire.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ovarian congestion and neuralgia; feel very sore. Vicarious menstruation. Uterine haemorrhage, bearing-down pain in back. Menses *dark, profuse, with soreness in abdomen. Metrorrhagia, occurring midway between menstrual periods*. Intermenstrual pain (Jas. W. Ward). Vagina very tender. Profuse leucorrhoea. Vulva itches. Milk-leg, haemorrhoids, and sore nipples, after confinement. Metrorrhagia; passive flow. Vaginismus, ovaritis, soreness over whole abdomen. Phlegmasia alba.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in spermatic cord, running into testes. Varicocele. Pain in testicles. Orchitis. Testicles enlarged, hot, and painful. Epididymitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Haemoptysis; tickling cough. Chest feels sore and constricted.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sore pain down cervical vertebrae. Severe pain in lumbar and hypogastric region, extending down legs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tired feeling in arms and legs. Very sore muscles and joints. Varicose veins. Chilliness in back and hips, extending down legs. Neuralgia of internal saphenous nerve.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bluish chilblains. Phlebitis. Purpura. Varicose veins and ulcers; very sore. Burns. Ecchymosis. Traumatic inflammations (*Arnica*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, warm, moist air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare in haemorrhoids: *Calc fluor; Aloe; Mur ac in varicose veins. Mangifera indica*.
Compare: *Arnica; Calend; Trillium; Bellis; Sulph ac; Pulsatilla*.
Antidote: *Arnica*.
Complementary: *Ferrum*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to sixth attenuation. Distilled extract locally.

hedeoma-pulegioides.name: Hedeoma Pulegioides
hedeoma-pulegioides.essence: Female symptoms are most marked; usually associated with nervous disturbances. Red sand in urine. *Pain along ureter*. Flatulent colic. Antidotes effects of Poison-oak (*Grindelia*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Pennyroyal (HEDEOMA)
Female symptoms are most marked; usually associated with nervous disturbances. Red sand in urine. *Pain along ureter*. Flatulent colic. Antidotes effects of Poison-oak (*Grindelia*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull, heavy feeling in morning. Sore pain, as from a cut. Weak, faint; better, lying down.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Gastritis. *Everything taken into stomach causes pain*. Tongue coated thin white. Nausea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Distended, sore, and sensitive.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frequent urging, cutting pains. Pain along left ureter. Dragging pain from kidney to bladder. Dull burning pain over left kidney. Burning irritation at neck of bladder causing frequent intense desire to urinate and inability to retain urine for more than few minutes, better urinating.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bearing-down pains, with much backache; worse, least movement. Leucorrhoea, with itching and burning Ovaries congested and painful; bearing-down spasmodic contractions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pain in thumb-joint*. Pain, coldness, and paretic condition. Twitchings, jerkings, soreness. Tendo-Achilles painful, as if sprained and swollen; walking painful.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Mentha; Sepia; Lilium; Ocimum* (uric acid diathesis, pain in ureters). *Hedera Helix*--Common Ivy--(Delirium and chronic convulsions. Chronic hydrocephalus Rhinorrhea, cerebro-spinalis. Cataract. Acts on blood vessels, menorrhagia). *Glechoma Hederacea*--Ground Ivy--(Haemorrhoids with rectal *irritation* and bleeding. Diarrhoea. Anus feels raw and sore. Cough with laryngeal and tracheal irritation. Glandula sub-mentalis inflamed).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First potency.

helianthus-annuus.name: Helianthus Annuus
helianthus-annuus.essence: Old cases of intermittent fever. Coryza, catarrh, nasal haemorrhage and thick scabs in nose. Rheumatic pain in left knee. Vomiting, black stools, congestion and dryness of mouth and pharynx, redness and heat of skin. Symptoms aggravated by heat and relieved by vomiting. Spleen remedy. Marked effects on stomach, with nausea and vomiting. Stools black (*Leptandra*). Dry mouth. Externally, as a vulnerary like Arnica and Calendula.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Sunflower (HELIANTHUS)
Old cases of intermittent fever. Coryza, catarrh, nasal haemorrhage and thick scabs in nose. Rheumatic pain in left knee. Vomiting, black stools, congestion and dryness of mouth and pharynx, redness and heat of skin. Symptoms aggravated by heat and relieved by vomiting. Spleen remedy. Marked effects on stomach, with nausea and vomiting. Stools black (*Leptandra*). Dry mouth. Externally, as a vulnerary like Arnica and Calendula.

helleborus-niger.name: Helleborus Niger
helleborus-niger.essence: Produces a condition of *sensorial depression*. Sees, hears, tastes imperfectly, and general *muscular weakness*, which may go on to complete paralysis, accompanied by dropsical effusions. Hence, a remedy in low states of vitality and serious disease. Characteristic aggravation from 4 to 8 pm (*Lycop*). *Sinking sensation*. State of effusion in hydrocephalus. Mania of a melancholy type.

agg: from evening until morning, from uncovering

complementary: Tuberc; Apis; Zinc; Opium; Cinch; Cicuta; Iodoform

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Snow-rose (HELLEBORUS)
Produces a condition of *sensorial depression*. Sees, hears, tastes imperfectly, and general *muscular weakness*, which may go on to complete paralysis, accompanied by dropsical effusions. Hence, a remedy in low states of vitality and serious disease. Characteristic aggravation from 4 to 8 pm (*Lycop*). *Sinking sensation*. State of effusion in hydrocephalus. Mania of a melancholy type.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Slow in answering. Thoughtless; staring. *Involuntary sighing*. *Complete unconsciousness*. *Picks lips and clothes*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Forehead wrinkled in folds. Cold sweat. Stupefying headache. *Rolls head* day and night; moaning, sudden screams. *Bores head into pillow*; beats it with hands. Dull pain in occiput, with sensation of water swashing inside. Headache culminates in vomiting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Eyeballs turn upwards; squinting, vacant look. Pupils dilated. Eyes wide open, sunken. Night-blindness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dirty, dry nostrils. Rubs nose. Smell diminished. Nose pointed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pale, sunken. Cold sweat. Wrinkled. Neuralgia on left side; parts so tender he cannot chew.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Horrible smell from mouth*. Lips dry and cracked. Tongue red and dry. *Falling of lower jaw*. Meaningless picking of lips. Grinding of teeth. *Chewing motion*. Greedily swallows cold water, though unconscious. Child nurses greedily, with disgust for food. Ptyalism, with sore corners of mouth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Gurgling, as if bowels were full of water. Swollen, painful to touch.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Jelly-like, white mucus; involuntary.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Suppressed; scanty, dark; coffee-grounds sediment. Frequent urging. Child cannot urinate. Bladder overdistended.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frequent sighing. Respiration irregular. Chest constricted; gasps for breath. Hydrothorax (*Merc sulph*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Automatic motion of one arm and leg*. Limbs heavy and painful. Stretching of limbs. Thumb drawn into palm (*Cupr*). Vesicular eruption between fingers and toes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sudden screams in sleep. Soporous sleep. *Cri encephalique*. Cannot be fully aroused.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pale, dropsical*, itching. Livid spots on skin. Sudden, watery, swelling of skin. Falling off of hair and nails. Angio-neurotic oedema.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, from evening until morning, from uncovering.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
(*Hellebor faetidus*, or, *Polymnia*-Bear's foot--Acts especially on spleen (*Ceanothus*); also rectum and sciatic nerve. Splenic pains extend to scapula, neck and head, worse left side and evening; chronic ague cake; hypertrophied uterus; glandular enlargements; hair and nails falling off; skin peeling). *Hellebor orientalis* (salivation).
Antidote: *Camphor; Cinch*.
Compare: Threatening effusion; *Tuberc; Apis; Zinc; Opium; Cinch; Cicuta; Iodoform*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency.

heloderma-h-s.name: Heloderma (+ -h., + -s.)
heloderma-h-s.essence: The result of the bite is a benumbing paralysis like paralysis agitans or locomotor ataxia. There is no tetanic phase-a condition almost reverse in objective symptoms to Hydrocy acid or Strychnia. The most unusual action of the drug is noted upon the eye of the mouse. *The eyeball becomes more prominent* and the cornea opacities. The exophthalmus is due to the pressure of the blood behind the eyeball (Boyd). Homeopathically, it is indicated in many forms of disease characterized by *great coldne...

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Gila Monster
The result of the bite is a benumbing paralysis like paralysis agitans or locomotor ataxia. There is no tetanic phase-a condition almost reverse in objective symptoms to Hydrocy acid or Strychnia. The most unusual action of the drug is noted upon the eye of the mouse. *The eyeball becomes more prominent* and the cornea opacities. The exophthalmus is due to the pressure of the blood behind the eyeball (Boyd). Homeopathically, it is indicated in many forms of disease characterized by *great coldness*-"arctic" coldness. Colic waves from occiput to feet or ascending.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Very depressed. Sensation as if would fall to right side. *Cold* band around head; cold pressure within the skull. Eyelids heavy. Pain beginning in right ear, extending round back of head to left ear.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cold crawling feeling, as if facial muscles were tight.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue cold, tender, and dry. Very thirsty. Swallowing difficult. Breath cold.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cold feeling in lungs and in heart. Slow labored thumping of heart.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coldness across scapulae. Burning along spine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Numbness and trembling. Cyanosis of hands. Coldness. Sensation as if walking on sponge, and as if feet were swollen. Staggering gait. Cock's gait. When walking, lifts feet higher than usual, and puts down heel hard. Feet cold as ice or burn. Stretching relieves pains in muscles and limbs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Internal coldness*, as if frozen to death. Cold rings around body. Cold waves (*Abies c; Acon*). *Cold spots*. Arctic coldness. Temperature subnormal-96 (*Camph*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Lacerta*-Green Lizard (skin eruptions. Vesicles under tongue. Increased mental acumen. Difficult swallowing. Constant accumulation of saliva in the mouth. *Nausea*; violent pressure in stomach). *Camphor; Lachesis*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thirtieth potency.

helonias-dioica.name: Helonias Dioica
helonias-dioica.essence: Sensation of weakness, dragging and weight in the sacrum and pelvis, with great languor and prostration, are excellent indications for this remedy. There is a sensitiveness expressed as a consciousness of a womb. Tired, backachy females. The weakness shows itself also in a tendency to prolapse and other malposition of the womb. The menses are often suppressed and the kidneys congested. It seems as if the monthly congestion, instead of venting itself as it should through the uterine vessels, had ...

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Profound melancholy. *Patient is better when kept busy*, with mind engaged, when doing something. Irritable; cannot endure the least contradiction.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning sensation on top. Headache, better mental exertion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pain and weight in back*; tired and weak. Aching and burning across the lumbar region; *can trace outlines of kidneys by constant burning*. Boring pain in lumbar region, extending down legs. Great languor, better exercising.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Unicorn-root (HELONIAS - CHAMAELIRIUM)
Sensation of weakness, dragging and weight in the sacrum and pelvis, with great languor and prostration, are excellent indications for this remedy. There is a sensitiveness expressed as a consciousness of a womb. Tired, backachy females. The weakness shows itself also in a tendency to prolapse and other malposition of the womb. The menses are often suppressed and the kidneys congested. It seems as if the monthly congestion, instead of venting itself as it should through the uterine vessels, had extended to the kidneys. With it all, there is a profound melancholia. Patient must be doing something to engage the mind. Remember it, for women with prolapsus from atony, enervated by indolence and luxury (better when attention is engaged-hence when the doctor comes), or for those worn out with hard work; tired, strained muscles burn and ache; sleepless. Diabetes mellitus, and insipidus. Constant aching and tenderness over kidneys.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dragging in sacral region, with prolapse, especially after a miscarriage. *Pruritus vulvae*. Backache after miscarriage (*Kali c*). Weight and soreness in womb; *conscious of womb. Menses too frequent, too profuse*. Leucorrhoea. Breasts swollen, nipples painful and tender. Parts hot, red, swollen; burn and itch terribly. Albuminuria during pregnancy. Debility attending the menopause.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Albuminous*, phosphatic; profuse and clear, saccharine. Diabetes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation as if a cool wind streamed up calves of legs. Feet feel numb when sitting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Better*, when doing something (mental diversion). *Worse*, motion, touch.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Agrimonia*-Cockleburr--(painful kidneys, impaired digestion and menstrual difficulties; Bronchorrhoea and catarrh of bladder. Cough with profuse expectoration attended with expulsion of urine. Tincture 1-10 gtt). *Aletris; Lilium; Puls; Senecio; Stannum*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to sixth attenuation.

hepatica-triloba.name: Hepatica Triloba
hepatica-triloba.essence: Pharyngeal catarrh, with profuse, serous sputa and hoarseness. Tickling and irritation of the throat. *Scraping and rough sensation*. Induces free and easy expectoration. Viscid, thick, tenacious phlegm causes continued hawking. Soreness at the nostrils. Sensation about epiglottis as *if particles of food remained*. Sputa sweet, profuse, creamy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Liver-Wort (HEPATICA)
Pharyngeal catarrh, with profuse, serous sputa and hoarseness. Tickling and irritation of the throat. *Scraping and rough sensation*. Induces free and easy expectoration. Viscid, thick, tenacious phlegm causes continued hawking. Soreness at the nostrils. Sensation about epiglottis as *if particles of food remained*. Sputa sweet, profuse, creamy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second potency.

heracleum-sphondylium.name: Heracleum Sphondylium
heracleum-sphondylium.essence: Recommended as a spinal stimulant; in epilepsy with flatulency, gouty and skin symptoms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Hogweed (HERACLEUM - BRANCA URSINA)
Recommended as a spinal stimulant; in epilepsy with flatulency, gouty and skin symptoms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aches, with drowsiness, worse moving in open air, better tying up head with cloth. *Much fatty perspiration on head* and violent itching. Seborrhoea capitis. Sick headache.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain with inclination to vomit. Bitter risings and taste. Hungry but unable to eat. Abdominal and spleenic pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

hippomanes.name: Hippomanes
hippomanes.essence: A Meconium Deposit out of the Amniotic Fluid taken from the Colt

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
A Meconium Deposit out of the Amniotic Fluid taken from the Colt
The old famous Aphrodisiacum of the Greek authors.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Icy coldness* in stomach.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sexual desire increased. Prostatitis. Drawing pain in testicles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent pain in wrist. Paralysis of wrists. *Sprained sensation in wrist*. Great weakness of hands and fingers. Weakness in joints of feet, knee, and soles. *Chorea*. Much weakness after growing too fast.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Caustic*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth potency.

hippozaeninum.name: Hippozaeninum
hippozaeninum.essence: This powerful nosode introduced by Dr. J. J. Garth Wilkinson, covers symptoms which suggest integral parts of consumption, cancer, syphilis, etc, and promises useful service in the treatment of ozaena, scrofulous swellings, pyaemia, erysipelas. Chronic rhinitis; saneous secretion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Gladerine-mallein-Farcine (HIPPOZAENIUM)
This powerful nosode introduced by Dr. J. J. Garth Wilkinson, covers symptoms which suggest integral parts of consumption, cancer, syphilis, etc, and promises useful service in the treatment of ozaena, scrofulous swellings, pyaemia, erysipelas. Chronic rhinitis; saneous secretion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Red, swollen. *Catarrh, ozaena*, ulceration. Discharge acrid, corroding, bloody, offensive. Tubercles on alae nasi. Papules and ulceration in frontal sinus and pharynx.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: All glands swollen; painful; form abscesses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hoarseness. Bronchial asthma. Noisy breathing; short, irregular. Cough, with dyspepsia. Excessive secretion. Suffocation imminent. *Bronchitis in the aged*, where suffocation from excessive secretion is imminent. Tuberculosis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lymphatic swellings. Articular non-fluctuating swellings. Nodules in arm. Malignant erysipelas. Pustules and abscesses. Ulcers. Rupia. Eczema.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Muco-toxin* (Cahis' preparation with the micrococcus catarrhalis. Friedlander's Bacillus of Pneumonia and the micrococcus tetragenius-for acute and chronic mucous catarrhs in children and old people); *Aur; Kali bich; Psor; Bacill*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thirtieth potency.

homarus-gammarus.name: Homarus Gammarus
homarus-gammarus.essence: Dyspepsia, sore throat, and headache seems to be a combination that may be controlled by this remedy. Frontal and temporal pain chiefly, with soreness in eyes. Throat sore, *raw*, burns, with tough mucus. Pain in stomach and abdomen, better after eating. Belching. Chilliness and pain all over. Itching of skin.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Digestive Fluid of Live Lobster
Dyspepsia, sore throat, and headache seems to be a combination that may be controlled by this remedy. Frontal and temporal pain chiefly, with soreness in eyes. Throat sore, *raw*, burns, with tough mucus. Pain in stomach and abdomen, better after eating. Belching. Chilliness and pain all over. Itching of skin.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, from milk, after sleep. *Better*, from motion, after eating.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Sepia; Asterias; Astacus; Aethusa*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency.

hura-crepitans-brasiliensis.name: Hura Crepitans, Brasiliensis
hura-crepitans-brasiliensis.essence: Used in leprosy, when skin feels as if it were hide bound Tense vesicles; sensation of splinter under thumb-nails. Skin of forehead feels drawn tight. Stiff neck, pain in back. Throbbing in finger tips. Itching, pimples on all projecting portions of bone, malar bones, etc.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Assacu
Used in leprosy, when skin feels as if it were hide bound Tense vesicles; sensation of splinter under thumb-nails. Skin of forehead feels drawn tight. Stiff neck, pain in back. Throbbing in finger tips. Itching, pimples on all projecting portions of bone, malar bones, etc.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare Calotropis or *Madura album*--(Leprosy; livid and gangrenous tubercles; thickening of the skin).

hydrastis-canadensis.name: Hydrastis Canadensis
hydrastis-canadensis.essence: Acts especially on mucous membranes, relaxing them and producing a *thick, yellowish, ropy* secretion. The catarrh may be anywhere,-throat, stomach, uterus, urethra,-it is always characterized by this peculiar mucous discharge. Hydrastis is especially active in old, easily-tired people, cachectic individuals, with great debility. Cerebral effects prominent, feels his wits sharpened, head cleared, facile expression. Weak muscular power, poor digestion and obstinate constipation. Lumbago. Emaciati...

complementary: Xanthorrhiza apifolia; Kali bich; Conium; Ars iod; Phytol; Galium

hydrastis-canadensis.dosing: Tincture, to thirtieth attenuation. Locally colorless. Hydrastis, mother tincture, or fluid extract.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Golden Seal (HYDRASTIS)
Acts especially on mucous membranes, relaxing them and producing a *thick, yellowish, ropy* secretion. The catarrh may be anywhere,-throat, stomach, uterus, urethra,-it is always characterized by this peculiar mucous discharge. Hydrastis is especially active in old, easily-tired people, cachectic individuals, with great debility. Cerebral effects prominent, feels his wits sharpened, head cleared, facile expression. Weak muscular power, poor digestion and obstinate constipation. Lumbago. Emaciation and prostration. Its action on the liver is marked. Cancer and cancerous state, before ulceration, when pain is principal symptom. *Goitre* of puberty and pregnancy. *Small-pox* internally and locally. The power of Hydrastis over smallpox seen in modifying the disease, abolishing its distressing symptoms, shortening its course, lessening its danger and greatly mitigating its consequences (J. J. Garth Wilkinson).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Depressed; sure of death, and desires it.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull, pressing frontal pain, especially connected with constipation. Myalgic pain in scalp and muscles of neck (*Cimicif*). Eczema on forehead along line of hair. *Sinusitis*, after coryza.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Roaring. Muco-purulent discharge. Deafness. *Estachian catarrh*, with high-pitched voice.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Thick, tenacious secretion from posterior nares* to throat. Watery, *excoriating* discharge. Ozaena, with ulceration of septum. Tends to blow nose all the time.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Peppery taste. Tongue white, swollen, large, flabby, slimy; *shows imprint of teeth* (*Merc*); as if scalded; stomatitis. Ulceration of tongue, fissures toward the edges.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Follicular pharyngitis. Raw, smarting, excoriating sensation. Hawking of yellow, tenacious mucus (*Kali bich*). Child is aroused suddenly from sleep by this tenacious post-nasal dropping. Goitre of puberty and pregnancy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sore feeling in stomach more or less constant. Weak digestion. *Bitter taste*. Pain as from a hard-cornered substance. Gone feeling. Pulsation in epigastrium. Cannot eat bread or vegetables. Atonic dyspepsia. Ulcers and cancer. Gastritis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Gastro-duodenal catarrh. Liver torpid, tender. Jaundice. Gallstones. Dull dragging in right groin with cutting sensation into right testicle.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull, heavy, dragging pain and stiffness, particularly *across lumbar region, must use arms in raising himself from seat*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Prolapsed; anus fissured. *Constipation*, with sinking feeling in stomach, and dull headache. During stool, smarting pain in rectum. After stool, long-lasting pain (*Nit ac*). Haemorrhoids; even a light flow exhausts. Contraction and spasm.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Gleety discharge*. Urine smells decomposed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Gonorrhoea, second stage; discharge thick and yellow.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Erosion and excoriation of cervix. Leucorrhoea, worse after menses (*Bov; Calc c*); acrid and corroding, shreddy, tenacious. Menorrhagia. Pruritus vulvae, with profuse leucorrhoea (*Calc c; Kreos; Sep*). Sexual excitement. Tumor of breast; nipple retracted.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chest raw, sore, burning. Dry, harsh cough. Bronchial catarrh, later stages. Bronchitis in old, exhausted persons, *with thick, yellow, tenacious expectoration*. Frequent fainty spells, with cold sweat all over. Feels suffocating when lying on left side. Pain from chest to left shoulder.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Eruption like variola. Lupus; *ulcers*, cancerous formations. General tendency to profuse perspiration and unhealthy skin (*Hepar*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidote: *Sulph*.
Useful after too much Chlorate of Potash for sore throat.
Compare: *Xanthorrhiza apifolia; Kali bich; Conium; Ars iod; Phytol; Galium* (cancer-nodulated tumor of the tongue); *Asterias; Stann; Puls*. Also *Manzanita* (diarrhoea, gonorrhoea, gleet, leucorrhoea, catarrhal conditions). *Hydrastinum muriaticum*-Muriate of Hydrastia (Locally, in aphthous sore mouth, ulcers, ulcerated sore throat, ozaena, etc. Internally, third dec trit. Is a uterine haemostatic and vasoconstrictor; metrorrhagia, especially from fibroid tumors; haemorrhages; *in dilatation of the stomach*, and chronic digestive disorders). *Hydrastin sulph* 1x (haemorrhage of bowels in typhoid). *Marrubium*-Hoarhound--(a stimulant to mucous membranes, especially laryngeal and bronchial; chronic bronchitis, dyspepsia, and hepatic disorders; colds and coughs).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to thirtieth attenuation. Locally colorless. Hydrastis, mother tincture, or fluid extract.

hydrocyanicum-acidum.name: Hydrocyanicum Acidum
hydrocyanicum-acidum.essence: One of the most toxic agents known. Convulsions and paralysis express the action of this remedy. Spasmodic constriction in larynx, feeling of suffocation, pain and tightness in chest, palpitation; pulse weak, irregular. *Singing sensation at the epigastrium*. Hysterical and epileptic convulsions. Cyanosis. Collapse, due to some pulmonary condition not a cardiac collapse. Catalepsy. Cholera. Stage of collapse (*Ars; Verat*). Coldness. Tetanus narcolepsy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Prussic Acid (HYDROCYANIC ACID)
One of the most toxic agents known. Convulsions and paralysis express the action of this remedy. Spasmodic constriction in larynx, feeling of suffocation, pain and tightness in chest, palpitation; pulse weak, irregular. *Singing sensation at the epigastrium*. Hysterical and epileptic convulsions. Cyanosis. Collapse, due to some pulmonary condition not a cardiac collapse. Catalepsy. Cholera. Stage of collapse (*Ars; Verat*). Coldness. Tetanus narcolepsy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Unconscious. Wild delirium. Fear of imaginary troubles.
*Fears* everything-horses, wagons, houses falling, etc.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent stupefying headache. Brain feels on fire. Pupils motionless or dilated. Supra-orbital neuralgia, with flushing on same side of face.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Jaws clenched in rigid spasm. Froths at mouth. Pale, bluish lips.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue cold. *Drink rumbles through throat and stomach*. Gastralgia; worse when stomach is empty. *Great sinking at pit of stomach*. Pulsative pain in praecordial region.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Noisy and agitated breathing. Dry, spasmodic, suffocative cough. Asthma, with contraction of throat. Whooping-cough. Paralysis of lungs (*Aspidos*). Marked cyanosis; venously congested lung.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent palpitation. Pulse, *weak irregular*. Cold extremities. Torturing pain in chest. Angina pectoris (*Spigel; Oxal ac*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Yawning with shivering. Irresistible drowsiness. Vivid, incoherent dreams.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Ammon; Camph; Opium*.
Compare: *Cicuta; Oenanthe; Camph; Lauroc*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth and higher potencies.

hydrangea-arborescens.name: Hydrangea Arborescens
hydrangea-arborescens.essence: A remedy for gravel, profuse deposit of white amorphous salts in urine. Calculus, renal colic, bloody urine. Acts on ureter. Pain in lumbar region. Dizziness. Oppression of chest.

complementary: Lycopod; Chimaphil; Berberis; Pareira; Uva; Sabal; Oxydendron; Geum

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Seven-barks (HYDRANGEA)
A remedy for gravel, profuse deposit of white amorphous salts in urine. Calculus, renal colic, bloody urine. Acts on ureter. Pain in lumbar region. Dizziness. Oppression of chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning in urethra and frequent desire. Urine hard to start. Heavy deposit of mucus. *Sharp pain in loins*, especially left. Great thirst, with abdominal symptoms and *enlarged prostate* (*Ferr pic; Sabal*). Gravelly deposits. Spasmodic stricture. Profuse deposit of white amorphous salts.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Lycopod; Chimaphil; Berberis; Pareira; Uva; Sabal; Oxydendron; Geum*-Water Avens--(Severe jerking pains from deep in the abdomen to end of urethra; affections of bladder, with pains in penis; worse, eating; relaxed mucous membranes, with excessive and depraved secretions; imperfect digestion and assimilation). *Polyctrichum*-Haircap moss--(according to Dr. A. M. Cushing in mother tincture or infusion for enlarged prostate-prostatitis).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture.

hydrocotyle-asiatica.name: Hydrocotyle Asiatica
hydrocotyle-asiatica.essence: Curative in disorders that exhibit interstitial inflammation and cellular proliferation in any part. Hypertrophy and induration of connective tissue. Has considerable reputation in *leprosy* and *lupus*, when there is no ulceration. The skin symptoms are very important. Of great use in ulceration of womb. Difficulty in maintaining the upright posture. Very copious perspiration. Pains of cervical cancer.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in left cheek-bones and about orbits.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Indian Pennywort (HYDROCOTYLE)
Curative in disorders that exhibit interstitial inflammation and cellular proliferation in any part. Hypertrophy and induration of connective tissue. Has considerable reputation in *leprosy* and *lupus*, when there is no ulceration. The skin symptoms are very important. Of great use in ulceration of womb. Difficulty in maintaining the upright posture. Very copious perspiration. Pains of cervical cancer.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pruritus of vagina. Inflammation of neck of bladder. *Heat within vagina*. *Granular ulceration of womb*. Profuse leucorrhoea. Dull pain in ovarian region. Cervical redness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry eruptions. *Great thickening of epidermoid layer and exfoliation of scales*. Psoriasis *gyrate*, on trunk and extremities, palms and soles. Pustules on chest. Circular spots, with scaly edges. *Intolerable itching, especially of soles*. Profuse sweat. Syphilitic affections. *Acne*. Leprosy. *Elephantiasis* (*Ars*). Lupus non-exedens.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Elaeis*-South American Palm--(scleroderma, elephantiasis, leprosy, skin thickened, itching and hardened. Anaesthesia). *Hura; Trychnos Gaultheriana* (bites of serpents, ulcers and cutaneous affections generally); *Hoang-Nan. Chaulomoogra oil* from seed of *Taraktogenos; Hydrast; Arsenic; Aurum; Sepia*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to sixth potency.

hyoscyamus-niger.name: Hyoscyamus Niger
hyoscyamus-niger.essence: Disturbs the nervous system profoundly. It is as if some diabolical force took possession of the brain and prevented its functions. It causes a perfect picture of *mania of a quarrelsome and obscene character*. Inclined to be unseemly and immodest in acts, gestures and expressions. Very talkative, and persists in stripping herself, or uncovering genitals. Is jealous, afraid of being poisoned, etc. Its symptoms also point to weakness and *nervous agitation*; hence typhoid and other infections wit...

agg: at night, during menses, after eating, when lying down

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Henbane (HYOSCYAMUS)
Disturbs the nervous system profoundly. It is as if some diabolical force took possession of the brain and prevented its functions. It causes a perfect picture of *mania of a quarrelsome and obscene character*. Inclined to be unseemly and immodest in acts, gestures and expressions. Very talkative, and persists in stripping herself, or uncovering genitals. Is jealous, afraid of being poisoned, etc. Its symptoms also point to weakness and *nervous agitation*; hence typhoid and other infections with *coma vigil. Tremulous weakness and twitching of tendons*. Subsultus tendinum. Muscular twitchings, spasmodic affections, generally with delirium. Non-inflammatory cerebral activity. *Toxic gastritis*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Very suspicious*. Talkative, obscene, lascivious mania, uncovers body; jealous, *foolish*. Great hilarity; *inclined to laugh at everything*. Delirium, with attempt to run away. Low, muttering speech; *constant carphologia, deep stupor*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels light and confused. Vertigo as if intoxicated. Brain feels loose, fluctuating. Inflammation of brain, with unconsciousness; head is shaken to and fro.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pupils dilated, sparkling, fixed. Eyes open, but does not pay attention; downcast and dull, fixed. Strabismus. Spasmodic closing of lids. Diplopia. Objects have colored borders.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue dry, red, cracked, stiff and immovable, protruded with difficulty; speech impaired. Foams at mouth. Teeth covered with sordes. Lower jaw drops.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stinging dryness. Constriction. Cannot swallow liquids. *Uvula elongated*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hiccough, eructations empty, bitter. Nausea, with vertigo. Vomiting, with convulsions; haematemesis; violent cramps, relieved by vomiting; burning in stomach; epigastrium tender. *After irritating food*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Colic, as if abdomen would burst. Distention. Colic, with vomiting, belching, hiccough screaming. Tympanites. Red spots on abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diarrhoea, colicky, pains; *involuntary*, aggravated by mental excitement or during sleep. Diarrhoea during the lying-in period. Involuntary defecation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Involuntary* micturition. Bladder paralyzed. Has no will to urinate (*Caust*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Impotence. Lascivious; exposes his person; plays with genitals during fever.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Before menses, hysterical spasms. Excited sexual desire. During menses, convulsive movements, urinary flux and sweat. Lochia suppressed. Spasms of pregnant women. Puerperal mania.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Suffocating fits. Spasm, forcing bending forward. *Dry, spasmodic cough at night* (*worse lying down*; better sitting up), from itching in the throat, as if uvula were too long. Haemoptysis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Picking at bed-clothes*; plays with hands; reaches out for things. Epileptic attacks ending in deep sleep. Spasms and convulsions. Cramps in calves and toes. Child sobs and cries without waking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Intense sleeplessness. Sopor, with convulsions. *Starts up frightened*. Coma vigil.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Great restlessness; *every muscle twitches*. Will not be covered.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, at night, during menses, after eating, when lying down. *Better*, stooping.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Bell; Camph*.
Compare: *Bellad; Stram; Agaric; Gels*.
*Hyosc hydrobrom.--Scopolamine hydrobromide* (Paralysis agitans); *tremors of disseminated sclerosis*. Sleeplessness and nervous agitation. Dry cough in phthisis. Similar in its effects to alcohol, both recent and remote. Corresponds to the effects of strong poisons introduced into or generated within the body. Symptoms of uraemia and acute nervous exhaustion. A remedy for shock. Third and fourth dec trituration. In physiological dosage (1-200 gr) mania and chorea; insomnia. *Scopola* (Japanese Belladonna)-chemically identical with Hyoscine (Joyous delirium, licking of lips and smacking of mouth; sleepless; tries to get out of bed; sees cats, picks imaginary hairs, warms hands before imaginary fire, etc).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth, to 200th potency.

iberis-amara.name: Iberis Amara
iberis-amara.essence: State of nervous excitement. Has marked action upon the heart. Possesses great efficacy in cardiac diseases. Control vascular excitement in hypertrophy with thickening of the heart's walls. Cardiac debility after influenza. Liver region full and painful. White stools.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Bitter Candytuft (IBERIS)
State of nervous excitement. Has marked action upon the heart. Possesses great efficacy in cardiac diseases. Control vascular excitement in hypertrophy with thickening of the heart's walls. Cardiac debility after influenza. Liver region full and painful. White stools.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sad and sighing; fearful and trembling. Irritable.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo and pains around heart. Constant hawking of thick, stringy mucus until after a meal. Hot, flushed face. Vertigo, *as if occiput were turning around*; eyes feel forced outwards.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Conscious of heart's action. On turning on left side, stitching pain as of needles through ventricles felt at each systole. Palpitation, *with vertigo and choking in throat*. Stitching pains in cardiac region. *Pulse full, irregular, intermittent*. Worse, least motion and in warm room. Sensation of weight and pressure, with occasional sharp, stinging pains. Dropsy, with enlarged heart. Violent palpitation *induced by slightest exertion, or by laughing, or coughing. Darting pains through heart. Cardiac dyspnoea*. Dilation of heart. Wakes with palpitation about 2 am. Throat and trachea fills up with mucus. Cough causes redness of face. *Tachycardia*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Numbness and tingling in left hand and arm. Whole body sore, lame and trembling.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, lying down; on left side; motion, exertion; warm room.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Cact; Dig; Amyl; Bell*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture and first potency.

ichthyolum.name: Ichthyolum
ichthyolum.essence: A Combination of Sulphonated Hydrocarbons, a Fossil Product of Complex Structure found in Tyrol, supposed to be Fish Deposits, contains 10 % Sulphur.

complementary: Hepar; Calc; Silica; Sulph; Ars; Petrol

ichthyolum.dosing:
Lower potencies.
Externally, it is used as an ointment, with Lanoline 20 to 50 per cent; for chronic eczema and psoriasis, also acne rosacea and gouty joints. Chilblains, scabies. Rectal suppositories for senile prostate.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
A Combination of Sulphonated Hydrocarbons, a Fossil Product of Complex Structure found in Tyrol, supposed to be Fish Deposits, contains 10 % Sulphur.
Its action on skin, mucous membranes, and kidneys is prompt and useful. It is strongly antiparasitic; redness, pain and inflammation; decreases tension. Excellent in winter coughs of old people. Polyarthritis. Chronic rheumatism. *Uric acid diathesis*. Hay-fever. *Chronic hives. Tuberculosis, aids nutrition*. Alcoholism when nothing will stay on stomach.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Irritable and depressed. Forgetful, lack of concentration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull, aching; better cold, pressure. Dull frontal and supra-orbital headache; worse moving eyes, cold air; better, warmth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Skin feels dry and itches. Acne on chin.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Irritated; pain to ears; sore, dry, with hawking and expectoration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burn, red; worse, any change of temperature.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bland coryza; stuffed feeling; feels sore inside. Irresistible desire to sneeze.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Disagreeable taste, burning sensation, very thirsty.
*Nausea. Increased appetite*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Disposition to soft, shapeless stools. Griping in umbilical and left hypogastric region. Early morning diarrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Increased in quantity and frequency. Burning pain in meatus. Uric acid deposits.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fullness in lower abdomen. Nausea at time of menses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coryza; *dry, teasing cough*. Bronchiectasis and phthisis. Bronchitis, especially of the aged.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heat and irritation; *itching*. Scaly and itching eczema. *Crops of boils*. Pruritus of pregnancy. Psorisis, Acne, rosacea, erysipelas.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lameness in right shoulder and right lower extremity.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Hepar; Calc; Silica; Sulph; Ars; Petrol*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Lower potencies.
Externally, it is used as an ointment, with Lanoline 20 to 50 per cent; for chronic eczema and psoriasis, also acne rosacea and gouty joints. Chilblains, scabies. Rectal suppositories for senile prostate.

ictodes-foetida.name: Ictodes Foetida
ictodes-foetida.essence: For asthmatic complaints; worse from inhaling any dust. *Hysteria*. Erratic spasmodic pains. "Will-o'-the-wisp" like character of its subjective symptoms and its physometric property are special features (Samuel Jones). *Inflation and tension in the abdomen*. Millar's asthma.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Skunk-cabbage-Ictodes (POTHOS FOETIDUS)
For asthmatic complaints; worse from inhaling any dust. *Hysteria*. Erratic spasmodic pains. "Will-o'-the-wisp" like character of its subjective symptoms and its physometric property are special features (Samuel Jones). *Inflation and tension in the abdomen*. Millar's asthma.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Absent-minded, irritable. Headache in *single spots*, with *violent pulsation of temporal arteries*. Outward drawing from glabella. Better in open air (*Puls*). Red swelling across the bridge of the nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Inflation and tension* in abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Spasmodic croup. Troublesome respiration, with sudden feeling of anguish and sweat.
Sneezing, with pain in throat. Pain in chest, with difficult breathing. Tongue feels numb. *Asthma; relieved by stool*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture and lower potencies.

ilex-aquifolium.name: Ilex Aquifolium
ilex-aquifolium.essence: Intermittent fever. Marked eye symptoms, spleen pain. All symptoms better in winter.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
American Holly
Intermittent fever. Marked eye symptoms, spleen pain. All symptoms better in winter.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Infiltration of cornea; staphyloma; nightly burning in orbits, rheumatic inflammation of eye; psilosis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Ilex Paraguayensis*-Yerba Mate--(Persistent epigastric pain; sense of dryness of mouth and pharynx, anorexia, pyrosis, nervous depression, neurasthenia. Somnolence; incapacity for work, diminution of urinary secretion, headache and pruritus. Hemicrania. Renal colic. Is said to be of use as a prophylactic against sunstroke, being a safe stimulant to the circulation, to diaphoresis and diuresis). *Ilex vomitoria*--Yaupon--(Emetic properties-Possesses also tonic and digestive qualities, free from sleepless effects. Has an active principle said to act as a powerful diuretic-employed in nephritis and gout). *Ilex Cassine*--(Christmas berry Tea)-Excellent diuretic and substitute for tea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
The Metal Indium (INDIUM)
Headaches and migraine. Seminal emissions. *Backache*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pain in head when straining at stool*. Bursting in head during stool. Dull pains in temples and forehead, *with nausea*, weakness, *sleepiness*. Gone feeling in stomach about 11 am. Violent attack of sneezing. Sexual psychopathy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Painful suppurating pimples. Corners of mouth cracked and sore (*Condur*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Horribly offensive smell of urine after standing a short time. Emissions too frequent. Diminished power. Testicles tender; drawing pains along spermatic cord.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Uvula enlarged, ulcerated; thick, tough mucus in back part of pharynx. Worse evening.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stiffness in neck and shoulders. Pain, especially in left arm. Legs restless and weary. Toes itch (*Agar*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to 200th potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Selenium; Titanium* (male sexual organs).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
The Metal (IRIDIUM)
Intestinal putrefaction and septicaemia. *Anaemia*, increases red corpuscles. Epilepsy; lupus. Rheumatism and gout. Uterine tumors. Spinal paresis. *Exhaustion after disease*. Children who are puny, weak-limbed, and grow too fast. Nephritis of pregnancy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Difficult concentration of thought. Sensation as if mind were void. Though confused. "Woodeny" feeling in right side of head. Right side of scalp sensitive. Profuse, watery coryza, better indoors. Ozaena.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hoarse cough, worse talking; posterior nares feel raw, inflamed, profuse, thick, yellowish discharge. Chronic laryngeal catarrh.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Weakness in the kidney region. Spinal paresis, especially for the aged and after disease. Pressing in groin and left thigh. Tension in both thighs, especially left. Dislocated feeling in left hip-joint and dull pain toward left gluteal region.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Iridium chloride* (Produces salivation and stiffness of jaws followed by head and nervous symptoms. Congestion of nares and bronchi. Dragging pain in lower back. Headache worse right side, heavy feeling as of liquid lead).
Compare: *Platina; Palladium; Osmium*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth and higher.

indigo-tinctoria.name: Indigo Tinctoria
indigo-tinctoria.essence: Marked action on the nervous system, and of undoubted benefit in the treatment of epilepsy with great sadness. Excited mood and desire to be busy. Neurasthenia and hysteria. Pure powdered Indigo placed on the wound cures snake and spider poison (*Kali permang; Golondrina; Cedron*). Stricture of oesophagus; blue color (*Cupr*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, during rest and sitting. *Better*, pressure, rubbing, motion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Cuprum; OEstrus cameli*, an Indian medicine for epilepsy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Indigo--Dye-stuff (INDIGO)
Marked action on the nervous system, and of undoubted benefit in the treatment of epilepsy with great sadness. Excited mood and desire to be busy. Neurasthenia and hysteria. Pure powdered Indigo placed on the wound cures snake and spider poison (*Kali permang; Golondrina; Cedron*). Stricture of oesophagus; blue color (*Cupr*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo with nausea. Convulsions. Sensation of a band around forehead. Undulating sensation through whole head. Sensation as if brain were frozen. Gloomy; cries at night. Hair feels pulled from vertex. Head feels frozen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Excessive sneezing and bleeding from nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pressure and roaring.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Metallic taste. *Eructations*. Bloating. Anorexia. Flushes of heat rising from stomach to head.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Falling of rectum. Aroused at night with horrible itching at anus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constant desire to urinate. Urine turbid. Catarrh of bladder.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Sciatica*. Pain from middle of thigh to knee. Boring pain in knee-joint; better, walking. *Pain in limbs worse after every meal*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hysterical symptoms where pain predominates Excessive nervous irritation. Epilepsy; flashes of heat from abdomen to head; fit begins with dizziness. Aura from a painful spot between shoulders. Reflex spasms from worms.

indolum.name: Indolum
indolum.essence: A Crystalline Compound Derivable from Indigo, but also a product of Putrefaction of Proteids

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
A Crystalline Compound Derivable from Indigo, but also a product of Putrefaction of Proteids
(INDOL)
Primary action is to increase the elimination of Indican. Auto-intoxication. Compare: *Skatol*.
Persistent desire to sleep, dull, discontented mental state, hideous, delusions and nervousness, constant motion of fingers and feet. Intestinal putrefaction.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull occipital and frontal headache in afternoon. Dull sensation over eyes. Eyeballs hot and hurt when moved. Pupils dilated with headache.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bloated feeling. Hungry sensation after full meal. Great thirst. Constipation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Very tired and sore in lower limbs. Feet burn. Knee-joints sore.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Sleepiness*. Continuous dreaming.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth attenuation.

inula-helenium.name: Inula Helenium
inula-helenium.essence: A mucous membrane medicine. Bearing-down sensations in pelvic organs and bronchial symptoms are most marked. Substernal pain. Diabetes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Scabwort (INULA)
A mucous membrane medicine. Bearing-down sensations in pelvic organs and bronchial symptoms are most marked. Substernal pain. Diabetes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo on stooping; throbbing after eating, pressure in temples and forehead.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry cough; worse at night and lying down; larynx painful. Chronic bronchitis; cough, with much thick expectoration, with languor and weak digestion. Stitches behind sternum. Teasing cough with much and free expectoration. Palliative in tubercular laryngitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses too early and painful. Labor-like pains; urging to stool; dragging in genitals, with violent backache. Itching of legs during menses, chattering of teeth from cold during menstruation. Moving about in abdomen, stitches in genitals. Chronic metritis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pressing toward rectum as of something extruding.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frequent urging to urinate; passes only in drops. Violet odor (*Tereb*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in right shoulder and wrist; tearing in left palm, unable to double fingers; pain in lower limbs, feet and ankles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Crocus; Ignatia; Arum dracontium* (loose cough worse at night on lying down).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third potency.

iodium.name: Iodium
iodium.essence:
Rapid metabolism: *Loss of flesh* great appetite. Hungry with much thirst. Better after eating. *Great debility, the slightest effort induces perspiration*. Iod individual is exceedingly thin, dark complexioned, with enlarged lymphatic glands, has voracious appetite but gets thin. Tubercular type.

All glandular structures, respiratory organs, circulatory system are especially affected; they atrophy. Iodine arouses the defensive apparatus of the system by assembling the mononuclear leucocytes wh...

agg: when quiet, in warm room, right side

complementary: Brom; Hepar; Mercur; Phosph; Abrot; Nat mur; Sanic; Tuber

iodium.dosing:
The crude drug in saturated solution may be required. Third to thirtieth potency. Ioduretted solution of Potass iod (35 grains Potassa and 4 grains Iodine to 1 oz of water, 10 drops three times a day) expels tapeworms dead.
Locally the most powerful, least harmful and easily managed microbicide. Ideal agent to keep wounds clean and disinfected. Bites of insects, reptiles, etc. Gunshot wounds and compound fractures, excellent. Great skin disinfectant.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Iodine (IODUM)
Rapid metabolism: *Loss of flesh* great appetite. Hungry with much thirst. Better after eating. *Great debility, the slightest effort induces perspiration*. Iod individual is exceedingly thin, dark complexioned, with enlarged lymphatic glands, has voracious appetite but gets thin. Tubercular type.
All glandular structures, respiratory organs, circulatory system are especially affected; they atrophy. Iodine arouses the defensive apparatus of the system by assembling the mononuclear leucocytes whose phagocytic action is marked, at a given point. Lead poisoning. Tremor. Iodine craves cold air.
*Acute exacerbation of chronic inflammation*. Arthritis deformans. *Acts prominently on connective tissue. The plague. Goitre*. Abnormal vaso-constriction, capillary congestion followed by oedema, ecchymosis, haemorrhages, and nutritive disturbances are the pathological conditions at the basis of its symptomatology. Sluggish vital reaction, hence chronicity in many of its aspects. Acute catarrh of all mucous membranes, rapid emaciation, notwithstanding good appetite, and glandular atrophy call for this remedy, in numerous wasting diseases and in scrofulous patients. Acute affections of the respiratory organs. *Pneumonia*, rapid extension. Iodine is warm, and wants cool surroundings. Weakness and loss of breath going upstairs. *Adenoid vegetations*. Tincture internally and locally to swollen glands and rattlesnake bites.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Anxiety *when quiet. Present* anxiety and depression, no reference to the future. Sudden impulse to run and do violence. Forgetful. Must be busy. Fear of people, shuns every one. Melancholy. Suicidal tendency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Throbbing; *rush of blood*, and feeling of a tight band. Vertigo; worse from stooping, worse in warm room. Chronic, congestive headache of old people (*Phos*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent lachrymation. Pain in eyes. Pupil dilated. Constant motion of eyeballs. *Acute dacryocystitis*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sneezing. Sudden violent influenza. Dry coryza becomes fluent in open air, also a *fluent hot coryza* with general heat of skin. Pain at root of nose and frontal sinus. Nose stopped up. Tendency to ulceration. Loss of smell. *Acute nasal engorgement* associated with high blood pressure.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Gums loose and bleed easily. Foul ulcers and salivation. Profuse, fetid ptyalism. Tongue thickly coated. Offensive odor from mouth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Larynx feels constricted. *Eustachian deafness*. Thyroid enlarged. Goitre, with sensation of constriction. Swollen submaxillary glands. Uvula swollen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Throbbing at pit of stomach. *Ravenous hunger* and much thirst. Empty eructations, as if every particle of food were turned into gas. Anxious and worried if he does not eat (*Cina; Sulph*). Loss flesh, yet hungry and eating well (*Abrot*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Liver and spleen sore and enlarged. Jaundice. Mesenteric glands enlarged. Pancreatic disease. Cutting pain in abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Haemorrhage at every stool. Diarrhoea, whitish, frothy, fatty. Constipation, with ineffectual urging; better by drinking cold milk. Constipation alternating with diarrhoea (*Ant cr*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frequent and copious, *dark yellow-green* (*Bovista*), thick, acrid with cuticle on surface.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Testicles swollen and indurated. Hydrocele. Loss of sexual power, with atrophied testes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Great weakness during menses (*Alum; Carbo an; Coccul; Haematox*). Menstruation irregular. Uterine haemorrhage. *Ovaritis* (*Apis; bell; Lach*).
*Wedge-like pain from ovary to uterus. Dwindling of mammary glands*. Nodosities in skin of mammae. Acrid leucorrhoea, thick, slimy, corroding the linen. *Wedge-like pain in the right ovarian region*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hoarse. *Raw* and tickling feeling provoking a dry cough. *Pain in larynx*. Laryngitis, with painful roughness; worse during cough. Child grasps throat when coughing. Right-sided pneumonia with high temperature. Difficult expansion of chest, blood-streaked sputum; internal dry heat, external coldness. Violent heart action. Pneumonia. Hepatization spreads rapidly with persistent high temperature; absence of pain in spite of great involvement, worse warmth; craves cool air. Croup in scrofulous children with dark hair and eyes (*Brom* opposite). Inspiration difficult. Dry, morning cough, from tickling in larynx. *Croupy cough*, with difficult respiration; wheezy. *Cold extends downwards* from head to throat and bronchi. Great weakness about chest. Palpitation from least exertion. Pleuritic effusion. Tickling all over chest. Iod cough is worse indoors, in warm, wet weather, and when lying on back.
