materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heart feels squeezed. Myocarditis, painful compression around heart. Feels as if squeezed by an iron hand (*Cactus*) followed by great weakness and faintness. Palpitation from least exertion. Tachycardia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Joints inflamed and painful. Pain in bones at night. White swelling. Gonorrhoeal rheumatism. Rheumatism of nape and upper extremities. Cold hands and feet. Acrid sweat of feet. Pulsation in large arterial trunks. Rheumatic pains, nightly pains in joints; constrictive sensations.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hot, dry, yellow and withered. Glands enlarged. Nodosities. Anasarca of cardiac disease.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Flushes of heat all over body. Marked fever, restlessness, red cheeks, apathetic. Profuse sweat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, when quiet, in warm room, right side. *Better*, walking about, in open air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Yatren. Iod pathogenesis is similar to that of *Carbol acid*. Antidotes: *Hepar; Sulph; Gratiola*.
Complementary: *Lycopod; Badiaga*.
Compare: *Brom; Hepar; Mercur; Phosph; Abrot; Nat mur; Sanic; Tuber*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
The crude drug in saturated solution may be required. Third to thirtieth potency. Ioduretted solution of Potass iod (35 grains Potassa and 4 grains Iodine to 1 oz of water, 10 drops three times a day) expels tapeworms dead.
Locally the most powerful, least harmful and easily managed microbicide. Ideal agent to keep wounds clean and disinfected. Bites of insects, reptiles, etc. Gunshot wounds and compound fractures, excellent. Great skin disinfectant.

iodoformium.name: Iodoformium
iodoformium.essence: Should not be forgotten in the treatment of tubercular meningitis, both as a local application to the head and internally (Bacil). *Tuberculous conditions*. Subacute and chronic diarrhoea of children.
iodoformium.dosing: Second trituration. Three grains on the back of the tongue will relieve attack of asthmatic breathing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Iodoform (IODOFORMUM)
Should not be forgotten in the treatment of tubercular meningitis, both as a local application to the head and internally (Bacil). *Tuberculous conditions*. Subacute and chronic diarrhoea of children.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sharp, neuralgic pain. Head feels heavy, as if it could not be lifted from pillow. Itching of occiput. *Meningitis*. Sleep interrupted by sighing and cries. Very drowsy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pupils, *dilated*; contract unequally, react poorly. Diplopia. Failing sight due to retro-bulbar neuritis, central scotoma-partial atrophy of optic disc.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sore pain in apex of right lung. Feeling of a weight on chest, as if smothering. Cough and wheezing on going to bed. Pain in left breast, like a hand grasping at the base of the heart. Haemoptysis. Asthmatic breathing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scaphoid abdomen. Chronic diarrhoea with suspected tuberculosis. Abdomen distended; mesenteric glands enlarged. *Cholera infantum. Chronic diarrhoea; stools greenish, watery, undigested, with irritable temper*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Legs weak; cannot stand and walk with eyes closed. Weakness of knees when going upstairs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second trituration. Three grains on the back of the tongue will relieve attack of asthmatic breathing.

iris-versicolor.name: Iris Versicolor
iris-versicolor.essence: Thyroid, *pancreas*, salivary, intestinal glands, and gastro-intestinal mucous membrane, are especially affected. Increases the flow of bile. Sick headaches and cholera morbus are a special therapeutic field for its action.

agg: in evening and at night, from rest

complementary: Ipec; Podoph; Sanguin; Ars; Ant cr

iris-versicolor.dosing: Tincture to thirtieth potency. Favorable reports from the very highest potencies.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Blue Flag
Thyroid, *pancreas*, salivary, intestinal glands, and gastro-intestinal mucous membrane, are especially affected. Increases the flow of bile. Sick headaches and cholera morbus are a special therapeutic field for its action.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frontal headache, with nausea. Scalp feels constricted. Right temples especially affected. Sick headache, worse rest; begins with a blur before eyes, after relaxing from a mental strain. Pustular eruption on scalp.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Roaring, buzzing, *ringing* in ears, with deafness. Aural vertigo, with intense noises in ears.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Neuralgia after breakfast, beginning in infra-orbital nerve, and involving whole face.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Mouth and tongue feel scalded. Heat and smarting in throat. *Burning*. Profuse flow of saliva; ropy. *Goitre*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Burning of whole alimentary canal. Vomiting*, sour bloody, biliary. Nausea. Profuse flow of saliva (*Merc; Ipec; Kali iod*). *Deficient appetite*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Liver sore. Cutting pain. Flatulent colic. Diarrhoea; stools watery, with *burning at anus* and through intestinal canal. Periodical night diarrhoea, with pain and green discharges. *Constipation* (give 30th)

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Shifting pains. Sciatica, as if left hip-joint were wrenched. Pain extends to popliteal space. Gonorrhoeal rheumatism (use *Irisin*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Herpes zoster, associated with gastric derangements. Pustular eruptions. Psoriasis; irregular patches with shining scales. Eczema, with nightly itching.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, in evening and at night, from rest. *Better*, from continued motion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidote: *Nux*.
Compare: *Iris florentina*-Orris-root--(delirium, convulsions, and paralysis); *Iris factissima* (headache and hernia); *Iris germanica*-Blue Garden Iris--(dropsy and freckles); *Iris tenax-I. minor*--(dry mouth; deathly sensation at point of stomach, *pain in ileo-caecal region*; appendicitis. Pain from adhesions after). *Pancreatinum*-a combination of several enzymes--(Indicated in intestinal indigestion; pain an hour or more after eating. Lienteric diarrhoea. Dose.--3-5 grains, better not given during the active period of stomachic digestion). *Pepsinum*--(Imperfect digestion with pain in gastric region. Marasmus of children who are fed on artificial foods. Diarrhoea due to indigestion. Dose.--3-4 grains) (Diseases of pancreas, gout, diabetes); *Ipec; Podoph; Sanguin; Ars; Ant cr*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture to thirtieth potency. Favorable reports from the very highest potencies.

jaborandi.name: Jaborandi
jaborandi.essence: Pilocarpus is a powerful glandular stimulant and the most efficient diaphoretic. Its most important effects are diaphoresis, salivation and myosis. Hot flushes, nausea, salivation and profuse perspiration. The face, ears and neck become in a few minutes after a dose of Jaborandi deeply flushed, and drops of perspiration break out all over the body whilst at the same time the mouth waters and saliva pours out in an almost continuous stream. Other secretions, lachrymal, nasal bronchial and intesti...

complementary: Amyl nit; Atrop; Physos; Lycop; Ruta. Pilocarpin mur

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Excessive perspiration from all parts of the body*. Persistent dryness of skin. Dry eczema. Semi-lateral sweats. Chilliness with sweat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Amyl nit; Atrop; Physos; Lycop; Ruta. Pilocarpin mur*, (Meniere's disease, rapidly progressive phthisis, with free haemorrhages, profuse sweating, 2x trit). Atropine is the antagonist to Pilocarpin, in dose of one one-hundredth grain for one-sixth of Pilocarpin.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chiefly as a powerful and rapid diaphoretic. It is of most service in renal disease, especially with uraemia, eliminating both water, and urea. Scarlatinal dropsy. Contra-indicated *in heart failure, and in post-puerperal uraemia*, and in senile cases.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: One-eighth to one-fourth grain hypodermically.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nausea on looking at objects moving; vomiting; pressure and pain in stomach.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diarrhoea, painless; during day with flushed face and profuse sweat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scanty; pain over pubes with much urging.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pulse irregular, dicrotic. Oppression of chest. Cyanosis; collapse. Nervous cardiac affections.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bronchial mucous membrane inflamed. Much inclination to cough and difficult breathing. OEdema of lungs. Foamy sputa. Profuse, thin, serous expectoration. Slow, sighing respiration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Jaborandi (PILOCARPUS MICROPHYLLUS)
Pilocarpus is a powerful glandular stimulant and the most efficient diaphoretic. Its most important effects are diaphoresis, salivation and myosis. Hot flushes, nausea, salivation and profuse perspiration. The face, ears and neck become in a few minutes after a dose of Jaborandi deeply flushed, and drops of perspiration break out all over the body whilst at the same time the mouth waters and saliva pours out in an almost continuous stream. Other secretions, lachrymal, nasal bronchial and intestinal also but in less degree. The sweat and saliva produced by a single dose is often enormous in quantity, not infrequently half a pint.
Is homeopathic to *abnormal sweats*, and has achieved great success in *night-sweats* of consumptives. Acts upon the thyroid and its sudorific action may possibly be due to it. *Exophthalmic goitre*, with increased heart's action and pulsation of arteries; tremors and nervousness; heat and sweating; bronchial irritation. A valuable remedy in limiting the duration of mumps.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Eye strain* from whatever cause. Irritability of the ciliary muscle. Eyes easily tire from slightest use. Heat and burning in eyes on use. Headache; smarting and pain in globe on use. Everything at a distance appears hazy; vision becomes indistinct every few moments. Retinal images retained long after using eyes. Irritation from electric or other artificial light. *Pupils contracted*; do not react to light. Staring eyes. *Near-sighted*. Vertigo and nausea after using eyes. *White spots before eyes. Smarting* pain in eyes. Lids twitch. Atrophic choroiditis. Spasm of the accommodation while reading.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Serous exudation into the tympanitic cavities. Tinnitus (*Pilocarpin* 2x).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Saliva viscid, like white of egg. Dryness. Free salivation, *with profuse sweating*.

jacaranda-caroba.name: Jacaranda Caroba
jacaranda-caroba.essence: Has reputation as a remedy in venereal diseases and rheumatism. Morning sickness. The urinary and sexual symptoms are important. Rheumatic symptoms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rheumatic pain in right knee. Weakness of lumbar region. Morning soreness and stiffness of muscles. Gonorrhoeal rheumatism. Itching pimples on hands. Gonorrhoeal and syphilitic arthritis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Thuja; Corallium; Jacaranda Gualandai* (in syphilitic symptoms, especially of eye and throat. Chancroids; *atonic ulcers*. Dark, painless diarrhoea).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Brazilian Caroba-tree (JACARANDA)
Has reputation as a remedy in venereal diseases and rheumatism. Morning sickness. The urinary and sexual symptoms are important. Rheumatic symptoms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo on rising, with heavy forehead. Eyes pain; are inflamed and watery. Coryza with heavy head.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sore, dry, constricted. Vesicles in pharynx.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Urethra inflamed; discharge of yellow matter.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heat and pain in penis; painful erections; phimosis. Prepuce painful and swollen. Chancroid. Chordee. Itching pimples on glans and prepuce.

jalapa.name: Jalapa
jalapa.essence: Causes and cures colic and diarrhoea. The child is good all day, but screams and is restless and troublesome at night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Jalap (EXOGONIUM PURGA)
Causes and cures colic and diarrhoea. The child is good all day, but screams and is restless and troublesome at night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue, smooth, glazed, dry, smarting.--Pain in right hypochondrium. Flatulence and nausea. Pinching and griping. Watery diarrhoea; thin, muddy stools. Abdomen distended. Face cold and blue. Anus sore.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aching in arms and legs. Pain in large joint of great toe. Smarting at root of nail. Burning of soles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Elater; Cann sat*.
Compare: *Camph; Colocy*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to twelfth potency.

jatropha-curcas.name: Jatropha Curcas
jatropha-curcas.essence: Of value in cholera and diarrhoea. The abdominal symptoms are most important. Suppressed measles (H. Farrington).

amel: by placing hands in cold water

complementary: Camph; Verat; Gambog; Croton; Jatropha urens

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Purging Nut (JATROPHA)
Of value in cholera and diarrhoea. The abdominal symptoms are most important. Suppressed measles (H. Farrington).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hiccough, followed by copious vomiting. Nausea and vomiting, brought on by drinking, with acrid feeling from throat. Great thirst. *Very easy vomiting*. Heat and burning in stomach, with crampy, constrictive pain in epigastrium.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Distended, with gurgling noises. Pain in hypochondria. Pain in region of liver and under right scapula to shoulder. Violent urging to urinate.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sudden, profuse, watery, like rice-water. *Diarrhoea; forced discharge; loud noise in abdomen like gurgling of water coming out of a bung-hole*, associated with coldness, cramps, nausea, and vomiting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cramps in muscles, especially calves, legs, and feet. *Coldness* of whole body. Pain in ankles, feet and toes. Heels sensitive.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Better*, by placing hands in cold water.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Camph; Verat; Gambog; Croton; Jatropha urens*--Sponge-nettle--(oedema and cardiac paresis).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

jequiritol.name: Jequiritol
jequiritol.dosing: Mother tincture diluted locally and 3x internally.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Jequiritol* (in cases of trachoma and pannus to engraft a new purulent inflammation. The proteid poisons contained in Jequirity seeds are almost identical in their physiological and toxic properties with the similar principles found in snake venom).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Mother tincture diluted locally and 3x internally.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Crab's Eye Vine (JEQUIRITY - ARBRUS PRECATORIUS)
Epithelioma, lupus, ulcers, granular lids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Purulent conjunctivitis; inflammation spreads to face and neck. Granular ophthalmia. Keratitis.

jonesia-asoka.name: Jonesia Asoka
jonesia-asoka.essence: Bark of an Indian Tree, introduced by Dr. ND Ray, Calcutta (JONOSIA ASOCA)

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Bark of an Indian Tree, introduced by Dr. ND Ray, Calcutta (JONOSIA ASOCA)
Has extensive sphere of action on female organs. Amenorrhoea and metrorrhagia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Unilateral headache; reflex uterine, congestive headache, better open air and by free flow. Pain in eyeballs; supraorbital pains, photophobia. Nasal catarrh, profuse, watery discharge. Loss of sense of smell.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Desire for sweets, also acid things. Thirsty, excessive nausea; obstinate constipation, haemorrhoids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Delayed and irregular menses; menstrual colic; amenorrhoea, pain in ovaries before flow; menorrhagia, irritable bladder; leucorrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Disturbed. Dreams of travelling.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain along spine radiating to abdomen and thighs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture.

juglans-cinerea.name: Juglans Cinerea
juglans-cinerea.essence: A faulty elimination that produces jaundice and various skin eruptions, is pictured by this drug. The sharp, *occipital headache*, usually associated with liver disturbances, is very characteristic. Pain in chest, axilla and scapula, with suffocative sensation. Feeling as if all internal organs were too large, especially those of left side. Cholelithiasis.

amel: getting heated, exercise, scratching, on rising in morning

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Butternut
A faulty elimination that produces jaundice and various skin eruptions, is pictured by this drug. The sharp, *occipital headache*, usually associated with liver disturbances, is very characteristic. Pain in chest, axilla and scapula, with suffocative sensation. Feeling as if all internal organs were too large, especially those of left side. Cholelithiasis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull, full head. Eruption on scalp. *Sharp, occipital headache*. Head feels enlarged. Pustules on lids and around eyes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tingling in nose; sneezing. Coryza, preceded by *pain under sternum*, with threatening suffocation. Later, copious, bland, thick mucous discharge.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Acrid feeling in mouth and throat. Soreness in region of tonsils externally. Dryness of root of tongue and fauces.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Atonic dyspepsia with much eructation and flatulent distention. Soreness in region of liver.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Muscles of neck rigid, lame. Pain between scapula and under right. Pain in lumbar vertebrae.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Red, like flush of scarlatina. Jaundice, with pain about liver and right scapula. *Itching* and pricking when heated. *Pustules*. Eczema, especially on lower extremities, sacrum and hands. Erythema and erysipelatous redness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Yellowish-green, with tenesmus and burning at anus. Camp diarrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Better*, getting heated, exercise, scratching, on rising in morning. *Worse*, walking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Juglandin* (duodenal catarrh; bilious diarrhoea); *Chelidon; Bryon; Iris*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Walnut
Skin eruptions are prominent.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Confused; feels as if head were floating in air. *Occipital sharp pain. Styes*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses early, black, pitch-like coagula. Abdomen distended.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Comedones and acne of the face. Crusta lactea, with soreness around ears. Itching and eruptions of small red pustules. Scalp red, and itches violently at night. Chancre-like ulcer. Axillary glands suppurate.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Juglans cinerea*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, and lower potencies.

juncus-effusus.name: Juncus Effusus
juncus-effusus.essence: A diuretic. Urinary affections. Dysuria, strangury, and ischuria. *Asthmatic symptoms in haemorrhoidal subjects*. Bubbling sensations. Abdominal flatulence. Arthritis and Lithiasis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica

Common Rush
A diuretic. Urinary affections. Dysuria, strangury, and ischuria. *Asthmatic symptoms in haemorrhoidal subjects*. Bubbling sensations. Abdominal flatulence. Arthritis and Lithiasis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Irritable, sensitive to external impressions; hot, full and heavy head; lachrymation, with *coryza, profuse*, fluent, with constant sneezing; loss of smell and taste; *coryza with cough*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry, pain during empty swallowing, tenacious mucus. Mouth dry.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry cough from sternal region all over chest. Hoarseness, larynx painful. *Paroxysmal cough*, with suffocative obstruction of respiration. *Cough with sneezing*. Severe dyspnoea with cough. *Tightness across chest*. Asthmatic attacks, cannot endure a close, warm room. *Whooping-cough*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Seems to come between *Cepa* and *Euphrasia*, which compare.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency and higher. Severe aggravation have been noticed from lower potencies.

kalium-arsenicosum.name: Kalium Arsenicosum
kalium-arsenicosum.essence: The *Kali ars* patient tends towards malignancy, and inveterate skin diseases. He is restless, nervous and anaemic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Fowler's Solution (KALI ARSENICUM)
The *Kali ars* patient tends towards malignancy, and inveterate skin diseases. He is restless, nervous and anaemic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Intolerable itching, worse undressing. *Dry*, scaly, wilted. Acne; pustules worse during menses. Chronic eczema; itching worse *from warmth*, walking, undressing. *Psoriasis*, lichen. Phagedaenic ulcers. Fissures in bends of arms and knees. Gouty nodosities; worse, change of weather. Skin cancer, where suddenly an alarming malignancy without any external signs sets in. Numerous small nodules under skin.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cauliflower excrescences of os uteri, with flying pains, foul smelling discharge, and pressure below pubis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Radium*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

kalium-bromatum.name: Kalium Bromatum
kalium-bromatum.essence: Like all Potash Salts, this weakens the heart and lowers temperature. Brominism is caused by it. General failure of mental power, loss of memory, melancholia, anaesthesia of the mucous membranes, especially of eyes, throat, and skin; acne; loss of sexual desire, paralysis. Leading remedy in psoriasis. Nodular form of chronic gout. *Symptoms of apoplectic attacks*, uraemic or otherwise; somnolence and stertor, convulsions, aphasia, albuminuria. Epilepsy (with salt-free diet).
kalium-bromatum.dosing: A few grains of the crude salt to the third trituration. Remember the unstable character of this salt. Said to be much more active if salt is eliminated from the diet.

materiaMedica.text: Profound, melancholic delusion; feeling of moral deficiency; religious depression; delusions of conspiracies against him. Imagines he is singled out as an object of divine wrath. Loss of memory. Must do something-move about; gets fidgety (*Tarant*). Fear of being poisoned (*Hyos*). Amnesic aphasia; can pronounce any word told, but cannot speak otherwise. *Night terrors*. Horrid illusions. Active delirium.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Suicidal mania with tremulousness. Face flushed. *Numb feeling in head*. Brain-fag. Coryza with tendency to extension into throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Congestion of uvula and fauces. *Anaesthesia* of fauces, pharynx, and larynx. Dysphagia, especially of liquids (*Hyos*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vomiting, with *intense thirst*, after each meal. *Persistent hiccough* (*Sulph ac*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation as if bowels were falling out. *Cholera infantum*, with reflex cerebral irritation, jerking and twitching of muscles. Green, watery stools with intense thirst, vomiting, eyes sunken. Prostration. *Internal coldness* of abdomen. Diarrhoea, with much blood. Green, watery stools. *Retraction* of abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensibility of urethra diminished. Urine profuse, with thirst. Diabetes (*Phos ac*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Debility and impotence. Effects of sexual excesses, especially loss of memory, impaired co-ordination, numbness and tingling in limbs. Sexual excitement during partial slumber.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pruritus. Ovarian neuralgia with great nervous uneasiness. *Exaggerated sexual* desire. Cystic tumors of ovaries.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Spasmodic croup. Reflex cough during pregnancy. Dry, fatiguing, hacking cough at night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Fidgety hands*; busy twitching of fingers. Jerking and twitching of muscles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Acne* of face, pustules. Itching; worse on chest, shoulders, and face. Anaesthesia of skin. *Psoriasis*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Restless sleep. Extreme drowsiness. Sleeplessness due to worry and grief and sexual excess. Night terrors. Grinding teeth in sleep. Horrible dreams. Somnambulism.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Better*, when occupied mentally or physically.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: A few grains of the crude salt to the third trituration. Remember the unstable character of this salt. Said to be much more active if salt is eliminated from the diet.

kalium-chloricum.name: Kalium Chloricum
kalium-chloricum.essence: Acts very destructively upon the kidneys, producing a croupous nephritis, hemoglobinuria, etc. Parenchymatous nephritis with stomatitis. Produces most acute ulcerative and follicular stomatitis. *Noma. Toxaemic conditions of pregnancy* (urinary symptoms). Chronic nephritis; hepatitis. Septicaemia. Anaemia.
kalium-chloricum.dosing: Second to sixth potency. Use cautiously locally as it is poisonous.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Chlorate of Potassium-K clo. 3 (KALI CHLORICUM)
Acts very destructively upon the kidneys, producing a croupous nephritis, hemoglobinuria, etc. Parenchymatous nephritis with stomatitis. Produces most acute ulcerative and follicular stomatitis. *Noma. Toxaemic conditions of pregnancy* (urinary symptoms). Chronic nephritis; hepatitis. Septicaemia. Anaemia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Profuse secretion of acid saliva. Whole mucous surface red, tumid, with gray-based ulcers. Tongue swollen. *Stomatitis*-aphthous and *gangrenous*. Fetor. Mercurial stomatitis (as a mouth wash).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feeling of weight in epigastric and umbilical region. Flatulence. Vomiting of greenish-black matter.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diarrhoea; profuse, greenish mucus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Albuminous, scanty, suppressed. Haematuria; diuresis. Nucleo-albumin and bile, high Phosphoric acid, with low total solids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Jaundice. Itching miliary or papular eruptions. Discolored; chocolate tint.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second to sixth potency. Use cautiously locally as it is poisonous.

kalium-cyanatum.name: Kalium Cyanatum
kalium-cyanatum.essence: Sudden sinking sensation. Cancer of tongue and agonizing neuralgia have been benefited by this drug. Sick headache; sciatica; epilepsy.

complementary: Platin; Stann; Cedron; Mezer; Mur ac

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Platin; Stann; Cedron; Mezer; Mur ac*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency and 200th.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Potassium Cyanide (KALI CYANATUM)
Sudden sinking sensation. Cancer of tongue and agonizing neuralgia have been benefited by this drug. Sick headache; sciatica; epilepsy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ulcer of tongue, with indurated edges. Speech difficult. Power of speech lost but intelligence intact.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Severe neuralgia in temporal region, recurring daily at same hour. Pain in orbital and supra-maxillary region, with screaming and loss of consciousness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cough prevents sleep; respiration weak; cannot take deep breath.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, from 4 am to 4 pm.

kalium-iodatum.name: Kalium Iodatum
kalium-iodatum.essence: The profuse, watery, acrid coryza that the drug produces serves as a sure guiding symptom, especially when associated with pain in frontal sinus. It acts prominently on fibrous and connective tissues, producing infiltration, oedema, etc. *Glandular swellings*. Purpura and haemorrhagic diathesis. *Syphilis* may be indicated in all stages: 1. In acute form with evening remitting fever, going off in nightly perspiration. 2. Second stage, mucous membranes and skin ulcerations. 3. Tertiary symptoms; ...

agg: warm clothing, warm room, at night, damp weather

kalium-iodatum.dosing: Crude drug, in material official dosage, but remember Dr. Meyhoffer's statements in his chronic diseases of organs of respiration: "From the moment the drug produces pathogenetic symptoms, it exaggerates the function of the tissue, exhausts the already diminished vitality, and thence, instead of stimulating the organic cell in the direction of life, impairs or abolishes its power of contraction. We use, as a rule, the first dilution from 6 to 20 drops a day; if after a week no decided progress is visible, one drop of the tincture of Iodine is added to each hundred of the first dilution. In this way, the mucous tubercles, gummy deposits and ulcerations resulting therefrom in the larynx undergo a favorable termination in laryngeal syphilis. " When strictly homeopathically indicated, as in acute respiratory affections to third potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Iodide of Potassium (KALI HYDRIODICUM)
The profuse, watery, acrid coryza that the drug produces serves as a sure guiding symptom, especially when associated with pain in frontal sinus. It acts prominently on fibrous and connective tissues, producing infiltration, oedema, etc. *Glandular swellings*. Purpura and haemorrhagic diathesis. *Syphilis* may be indicated in all stages: 1. In acute form with evening remitting fever, going off in nightly perspiration. 2. Second stage, mucous membranes and skin ulcerations. 3. Tertiary symptoms; nodes. Give material doses. *Diffused sensitiveness* --(glands, scalp, etc). Rheumatism in *neck, back*, feet, especially heels and soles; worse, cold and wet. Iodide of Potass in material doses acts in the different forms of Fungoid disease (thrush, ringworm, etc), offer simulating syphilis and bacterial diseases like tuberculosis. Symptoms like loss of weight, spitting of blood, etc. Tea-taster's cough due to inhaling the fungus; a also brings about often favorable reaction in many chronic ailments even when not clearly symptomatically indicated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sad, anxious; harsh temper. Irritable; congestion to head, heat and throbbing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain through *sides* of head. Violent headache. Cranium swells up in hard lump. Pain intense over eyes and *root of nose*. Brain feels enlarged. Hard nodes, with severe pain. *Facial neuralgia*. Lancinating pain in upper jaw.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Red, swollen. Tip of nose red; *profuse, acrid, hot, watery, thin discharge. Ozaena, with perforated septum*. Sneezing. Nasal catarrh, involving frontal sinus. Stuffiness and dryness of nose, without discharge. Profuse, *cool*, greenish, unirritating discharges.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Conjunctiva red, injected; profuse lachrymation. *Syphilitic iritis*. Pustular keratitis and chemosis. Bony tumors of the orbit.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Noises in ear. Boring pain in ears.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Saliva increased. Faintness at epigastrium. Cold food and drink, especially milk, aggravate. Much thirst. Throbbing, painful burning. Flatulence.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses late, profuse. During menses uterus feels as if squeezed. Corrosive leucorrhoea, with subacute inflammatory conditions of the womb in young married women. Fibroid tumors, metritis, sub-involution, hypertrophy, 1x or 1 gr crude, 3 times a day.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent cough; worse in morning. Pulmonary oedema. *Larynx feels raw*. Laryngeal oedema. Awakes choking. *Expectoration like soap-suds, greenish*. Pneumonia, when hepatization commences. *Pneumococcic meningitis*. Stitching pains through lungs to back. Asthma. Dyspnoea on ascending, with pain in heart. Hydrothorax (*Merc sulph*). *Pleuritic effusion. Cold travels downward to chest*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Severe bone-pains. Periosteum thickened, especially tibia; sensitive to touch (*Kali b; Asaf*). Rheumatism; pains at night and in damp weather. Contraction of joints. *Rheumatism of knees with effusion*. Pain in small of back and coccyx. Pain in hip, forcing limping. *Sciatica*; cannot stay in bed; worse at night and lying on affected side. Formication of lower extremities when sitting, better lying down.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Purple spots; worse on legs. Acne, hydroa. Small boils.
*Glands* enlarged, indurated. Hives. *Rough nodules* all over, worse any covering; heat of body intense. Fissured anus of infants. Tendency to oedematous swellings, eyelids, mouth, uvula, etc. *Acne rosacea*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, warm clothing, warm room, at night, damp weather. *Better*, motion, open air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidote: *Hepar*.
Compare: *Iod; Mercur; Sulph; Mezer. Chopheenee*, a Hindoo remedy for syphilitic eruptions, ulcerations and bone-pains. Used in tincture.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Crude drug, in material official dosage, but remember Dr. Meyhoffer's statements in his chronic diseases of organs of respiration: "From the moment the drug produces pathogenetic symptoms, it exaggerates the function of the tissue, exhausts the already diminished vitality, and thence, instead of stimulating the organic cell in the direction of life, impairs or abolishes its power of contraction. We use, as a rule, the first dilution from 6 to 20 drops a day; if after a week no decided progress is visible, one drop of the tincture of Iodine is added to each hundred of the first dilution. In this way, the mucous tubercles, gummy deposits and ulcerations resulting therefrom in the larynx undergo a favorable termination in laryngeal syphilis. " When strictly homeopathically indicated, as in acute respiratory affections to third potency.

kalium-muriaticum.name: Kalium Muriaticum
kalium-muriaticum.essence: Although not proven, this remedy has a wide clinical use, through its introduction by Schuessler. It certainly is of great value in catarrhal affections, in sub-acute inflammatory states, fibrinous exudations, and glandular swellings. *White or gray coating of base of tongue*, and expectoration of thick, white phlegm, seem to be special guiding symptoms. Bursitis praepatellaris.
kalium-muriaticum.dosing:
Third to twelfth potency.
External use in skin affections with burning sensation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Cloride of Potassium-KCl (KALI MURIATICUM)
Although not proven, this remedy has a wide clinical use, through its introduction by Schuessler. It certainly is of great value in catarrhal affections, in sub-acute inflammatory states, fibrinous exudations, and glandular swellings. *White or gray coating of base of tongue*, and expectoration of thick, white phlegm, seem to be special guiding symptoms. Bursitis praepatellaris.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Imagines he must starve. Headache, with vomiting. Crusta lactea. Dandruff.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: White mucus, purulent scabs. Superficial ulcer. Trachoma. Corneal opacities.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Chronic, catarrhal conditions of the middle ear*. Glands about the ear swollen. *Snapping and noises in the ear*. Threatened mastoid. Great effusion about the auricle.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Catarrh; phlegm white, thick. Vault of pharynx covered with adherent crusts. Stuffy cold. Nosebleed (*Arn; Bry*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cheek swollen and painful.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aphthae; thrush; white ulcers in mouth. Swollen glands about jaw and neck. Coating of tongue *grayish-white*, dryish, or slimy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Follicular tonsillitis*. Tonsils inflamed; enlarged so much, can hardly breathe. Grayish patches or spots in the throat and tonsils. Adherent crusts in vault of pharynx. "Hospital" sore throat. Eustachian catarrh.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Fatty or rich food causes indigestion*. Vomiting of white, opaque mucus; water gathers in the mouth. Pain in the stomach, with constipation. Bulimia; hunger disappears by drinking water.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Abdominal tenderness and swelling. Flatulence. Thread-worms, causing itching at the anus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constipation; light-colored stools. Diarrhoea, after fatty food; clay-colored, white, or slimy stools. Dysentery; purging, with slimy stools. *Haemorrhoids*; bleeding; blood dark and thick; fibrinous, clotted.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menstruation too late or suppressed, checked or too early; excessive discharge; *dark-clotted*, or tough, black blood, like tar (*Plat*). Leucorrhoea; discharge of milky-white mucus, thick, non-irritating, bland. Morning sickness, with vomiting of white phlegm. Bunches in breast feel quite soft and are *tender*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Loss of voice; hoarseness. Asthma, with gastric derangements; mucus white and hard to cough up. Loud, noisy stomach cough; cough short, acute, and spasmodic, like whooping-cough; expectoration thick and white. Rattling sounds of air passing through thick, tenacious mucus in the bronchi; difficult to cough up.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rheumatic fever; exudation and *swelling around the joints*. Rheumatic pains felt only during motion, or increased by it. Nightly rheumatic pains; worse from warmth of bed; lightning-like from small of back to feet; must get out of bed and sit up. Hands get stiff while writing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Acne, erythema, and eczema, with *vesicles* containing thick, white contents. Dry, flour-like scales on the skin (*Arsenic*). Bursitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, rich food, fats, motion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Bellad* which Kali mur follows well in catarrhal and hypertrophic conditions. *Kino* (otorrhoea, with stitches in right ear); *Bry; Mercur; Puls; Sulph*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Third to twelfth potency.
External use in skin affections with burning sensation.

kalium-permanganatum.name: Kalium Permanganatum
kalium-permanganatum.essence: Intense irritation of nose, throat, and larynx. Diphtheria. Dysmenorrhoea. Bites of serpents and for other animal poisons. Septic conditions; tissues infiltrated with tendency to sloughing.
kalium-permanganatum.dosing:
Locally, 1 dram to a quart of water, to correct fetor in cancer, ulcer, ozaena, and other foul odors. Also as an injection in leucorrhoea and gonorrhoea. Internally, 2x dilution in water. Saturated solution locally in eruption of smallpox.
Potassium Permanganate for Morphine Poisoning.--Potassium permanganate is recognized as being the most effective chemical antidote in cases of morphine or opium poisoning, acting directly on the morphine and oxidizing it to less toxic substances. To be effective the permanganate must come in direct contact with the opium or morphine in the stomach; hypodermatic or intravenous injections are absolutely useless, as the salt would be decomposed by the blood serum at once. The approved treatment is administration of two to five grains of potassium permanganate in dilute aqueous solution as soon as possible after the poison is taken, this amounts to be increased if very large doses of the poison have been taken. Washing out the stomach with a quantity of 1 to 500 solution of permanganate is also recommended, using at least a pint of this solution either by a stomach pump or by enforced vomiting. *Permang of Potash* counteracts effects of alkaloids of many poisonous plants. Owing to its oxidizing powers if given before the alkaloid has been absorbed (Dr. Chestnut in Dept of Agriculture).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Permanganate of Potassium (KALI PERMANGANICUM)
Intense irritation of nose, throat, and larynx. Diphtheria. Dysmenorrhoea. Bites of serpents and for other animal poisons. Septic conditions; tissues infiltrated with tendency to sloughing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bleeding from nose. Nasal discharge. Smarts and irritates. Constrictive, smarting sensation in throat. Larynx feels raw. Short, hacking cough.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Swollen and painful. Everything hawked up streaked with blood. Posterior nares painful. Muscles of neck feel sore. Swollen uvula. Fetor of breath.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Locally, 1 dram to a quart of water, to correct fetor in cancer, ulcer, ozaena, and other foul odors. Also as an injection in leucorrhoea and gonorrhoea. Internally, 2x dilution in water. Saturated solution locally in eruption of smallpox.

materiaMedica.text:
Nitrate of Potassium-Saltpeter (KALI NITRICUM - NITRUM)
Often indicated in asthma, also valuable in cardiac asthma; of great value in *sudden dropsical swellings over the whole body*. Gastro-intestinal inflammation, with much debility, and relapse in phthisis, call for this remedy. Suppurative nephritis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scalp very sensitive. Headache, with vertigo, as if falling to right side and backwards; worse, stooping. Ennui.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vision becomes clouded. Turbid corpus vitreum (*Arn; Ham; Solan n; Phos*). Variegated-colored rings before eyes. Burning and lachrymation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sneezing. Swollen feeling; *worse, right nostril*. Point red and itching. Polypus (*Sang nit*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue red, with burning pimples; burns at tip. Throat constricted and sore.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thin, watery, bloody. Membranous shreds, with tenesmus. *Diarrhoea from eating veal*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses too early, profuse, *black*; preceded and with violent backache. Leucorrhoea. Burning pains in the ovarian region only during menses (*Zinc* after).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hoarseness. Dry, morning cough, with pain in chest and bloody expectoration. Bronchitis, with sharp, short, dry, hacking cough. *Asthma*, with excessive dyspnoea, nausea, dull stitches, and burning in chest. Dyspnoea so great that breath cannot be held long enough to drink, though thirsty. Chest feels constricted. Oppression worse in morning. Sour-smelling expectoration. Expectoration of clotted blood, after hawking mucus. Acute exacerbations in phthisis; congestion of lungs. *Spasmodic croup*; paroxysm of crowing. Laryngeal diphtheria.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pulse weak, *small*, thready. Violent stitch in praecordia, and beating of heart.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stitches between shoulder-blades. Tearing and sticking in shoulders and joints. Hands and fingers seem swollen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, eating veal; towards morning and in afternoon. *Better*, drinking sips of water.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Opium; Nitr sp dulc*.
Antidote to Opium and Morphine poisoning, 8-10 grains to glass of water.
Compare: *Gun-powder* (Nitre with sulphur and charcoal-2x trit. "Blood poisoning. " Septic suppuration. Protractive against wound infection. Antidote to Ivy and Primula rash (Clarke) *Herpes facialis*; crops of boils. Carbuncles). Osteo-myelitis. *Cannab sat* (which contains a large amount of *Kali nit*).
*Lycop; Sanguin; Allium sat; Antimon iod*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

kalium-phosphoricum.name: Kalium Phosphoricum
kalium-phosphoricum.essence: One of the greatest nerve remedies. *Prostration*. Weak and tired. Especially adapted to the young. Marked disturbance of the sympathetic nervous system. Conditions arising from *want of nerve power*, neurasthenia, mental and physical depression, are wonderfully improved this remedy. The causes are usually excitement, overwork and worry. Besides, *it corresponds to states of adynamia and decay*, gangrenous conditions. In these two directions it has won many clinical laurels. Remember it in the t...

agg: excitement, worry, mental and physical exertion

complementary: Debility with wasting of muscular tissue
Zinc; Gels; Cimicif; Laches; Mur ac

kalium-phosphoricum.dosing: Third to twelfth trituration. The highest potencies seem to be indicated in certain cases.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Asthma; least food aggravates. Short breath on going upstairs. Cough; *yellow* expectoration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Paralytic lameness in back and extremities. Exertion aggravates. Pains, with depression, and subsequent exhaustion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Subnormal temperature.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, excitement, worry, mental and physical exertion; eating, cold, early morning. *Better*, warmth, rest, nourishment.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Phosphate of Potassium (KALI PHOSPHORICUM)
One of the greatest nerve remedies. *Prostration*. Weak and tired. Especially adapted to the young. Marked disturbance of the sympathetic nervous system. Conditions arising from *want of nerve power*, neurasthenia, mental and physical depression, are wonderfully improved this remedy. The causes are usually excitement, overwork and worry. Besides, *it corresponds to states of adynamia and decay*, gangrenous conditions. In these two directions it has won many clinical laurels. Remember it in the treatment of suspected malignant tumors. After removal of cancer when in healing process skin is drawn *tight* over the wound. Delayed labor.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Anxiety, *nervous dread*, lethargy. Indisposition to meet people. Extreme lassitude and depression. Very nervous, starts easily, *irritable*. Brain-fag; hysteria; *night terrors*. Somnambulance. Loss of memory. *Slightest labor seems a heavy task*. Great despondency about business. Shyness; disinclined to converse.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Occipital headache; better, after rising. Vertigo, from lying, on standing up, from sitting, and when looking upward (*Granat*).
*Cerebral anaemia*. Headache of students, and those worn out by fatigue. Headaches are relieved by gentle motion. Headache, with weary, empty, gone feeling at stomach (*Ign; Sep*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Weakness of sight; loss of perceptive power; after diphtheria; from exhaustion. Drooping of eyelids (*Caust*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Humming and buzzing in the ears*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nasal disease, with offensive odor; fetid discharge.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Livid and sunken, with hollow eyes. Right-sided neuralgia relieved by cold applications.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Breath offensive, fetid*. Tongue coated brownish, like mustard. *Excessively dry*, in the morning. Toothache, with easily-bleeding gums; they have a bright-red seam on them. Gums spongy and receding (*Caps; Hamam; Lach*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Gangrenous sore throat. Paralysis of the vocal cords.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: A nervous "gone" sensation at the pit of the stomach (*Ign; Sep; Sulph*). Feels seasick without nausea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diarrhoea; foul, *putrid odor*; occasioned by fright, with depression and exhaustion. Diarrhoea while eating. Dysentery; stools consist of pure blood; patient becomes delirious; abdomen swells. Cholera; stools have the appearance of rice water (*Verat; Ars; Jatrop*). Prolapsus recti (*Ign; Pod*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menstruation *too late or too scanty* in pale, irritable, sensitive, lachrymose females. Too profuse discharge, deep-red or blackish-red, thin and not coagulating; sometimes with offensive odor. Feeble and ineffectual labor pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nocturnal emissions; sexual power diminished utter prostration after coitus (*Kali carb*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Enuresis. Incontinence of urine. Bleeding from the urethra. *Very yellow urine*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Kali hypophosph* (*Debility with wasting of muscular tissue*. Phosphaturia with general anaemia or leucocythemia. Effects of excessive tea drinking. Chronic bronchitis where the expectoration is *thick* and *fetid*, sometimes *scanty and tough*. Dose.--5 grains of crude to 3x). *Genista*.--Dyer's Weed--(contains scopolamin; frontal headache and vertigo, worse motion, better open air and eating. Dry throat, awakes with waterbrash. Itching eruption on elbows, knees and ankles. Promotes diuresis in dropsical conditions). *Macrozamia Spiralis* (Extreme debility after severe illness; collapse. Weariness from no assignable cause, no pains. Boring pain at vertex; vomiting and retching all night; impossible to open eyes, giddiness and cold). *Zinc; Gels; Cimicif; Laches; Mur ac*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to twelfth trituration. The highest potencies seem to be indicated in certain cases.

kalium-sulphuricum.name: Kalium Sulphuricum
kalium-sulphuricum.essence: Ailments accompanied by profuse desquamation. Applicable to the later stages of inflammation. *Yellow*, mucous and serous discharges, profuse and intermittent. Has been found of much use in oxaluria.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Potassium Sulphate (KALI SULPHURICUM)
Ailments accompanied by profuse desquamation. Applicable to the later stages of inflammation. *Yellow*, mucous and serous discharges, profuse and intermittent. Has been found of much use in oxaluria.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rheumatic headache, beginning in evening. Bald spots. Dandruff and scaldhead.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Eustachian deafness. Discharge of *yellow* matter (*Hydr*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Cold, *with yellow*, slimy expectoration. Nose obstructed. Smell lost (*Nat mur*).
*Engorgement of the nasal pharyngeal mucous membrane*, mouth breathing, snoring, etc, remaining after removal of adenoids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aches in heated room. Epithelioma.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue coated yellow and slimy. Insipid, pappy taste. Gums painful. Burning thirst, nausea, and vomiting. Load feeling. Dread of hot drinks.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Colicky pains; abdomen feels cold to touch; tympanitic, tense. Yellow, slimy diarrhoea. Constipation, with haemorrhoids (*Sulph*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Gonorrhoea; discharge slimy, yellowish-green. Orchitis. Gleet.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses too late, scanty, with feeling of weight in abdomen. Metrorrhagia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coarse rales. *Rattling of mucus in chest* (*Tart em*). Post-grippal cough, especially in children. Bronchial asthma, with yellow expectoration. Cough; worse in evening and in hot atmosphere. Croupy hoarseness (*Hep; Spong*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in nape, back and limbs, worse in warm room. *Shifting, wandering pains*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rise of temperature at night. Intermittent fever, with yellow, slimy tongue.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Psoriasis (*Ars; Thyroid*). Eczema; burning, itching, papular eruption. Nettle-rash. Polypi. Epithelioma. Seborrhoea. Favus. Ring-worm of scalp or beard with abundant scales.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, in evening, heated room. *Better*, cool, open air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Kali sulph chromico.--Alum of chrome*-3x (Produces in the nasal passages very fine threads from the septum to external wall; affections of nasal fossae and hay-fever. Chronic colds. Sneezing, red, watery eyes, irritation of mucous membrane). *Pulsat; Kali bich; Nat m*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to twelfth potency.

kalium-silicum.name: Kalium Silicum
kalium-silicum.essence: A deep-acting remedy. Lassitude is very marked. Desire to lie down all the time. Emaciation.

agg: open air, drafts, cold, exertion, motion uncovering, bathing

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Silicate of Potash (KALI SILICATUM)
A deep-acting remedy. Lassitude is very marked. Desire to lie down all the time. Emaciation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Absent-minded, anxious, indolent, timid. Feeble will power. Head congested, blood surges from body to head. Vertigo, coldness of head; photophobia. Nasal catarrh, discharge *bloody*, excoriating, offensive nose, swollen, ulcerated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Weight in stomach after eating, nausea, pain, flatulence. Pain in liver region. Constipation. Construction of anus during stool.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stiffness over body and limbs. Creeping sensation over limbs. Twitching of muscles. Weak and weary.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, open air, drafts, cold, exertion, motion uncovering, bathing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Higher potencies.

kalmia-latifolia.name: Kalmia Latifolia
kalmia-latifolia.essence: A rheumatic remedy. Pains shift rapidly. Nausea and slow pulse frequently accompanying. Has also a prominent action on the heart. In small doses, it accelerates the heart's action; in larger it moderates it greatly. Neuralgia; *pains shoot downwards, with numbness. Fulgurating pains of locomotor ataxia*. Protracted and continuous *fevers*, with tympanites. Paralytic sensations; pains and aching in limbs accompany nearly every group of symptoms. *Albuminuria*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Neuralgia; worse *right side*. Stitches in tongue. Stitches and tearing in bones of jaw and face.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Mountain Laurel
A rheumatic remedy. Pains shift rapidly. Nausea and slow pulse frequently accompanying. Has also a prominent action on the heart. In small doses, it accelerates the heart's action; in larger it moderates it greatly. Neuralgia; *pains shoot downwards, with numbness. Fulgurating pains of locomotor ataxia*. Protracted and continuous *fevers*, with tympanites. Paralytic sensations; pains and aching in limbs accompany nearly every group of symptoms. *Albuminuria*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Vertigo*; worse stooping. Confusion of brain. Pain in front and temporal region from head to nape and to teeth; from cardiac origin.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vision impaired. *Stiff, drawing sensation when moving eyes*. Rheumatic iritis. Scleritis, *pain increased by moving the eye*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Warm, glowing sensation in epigastrium. *Nausea*; vomiting. *Pain in pit of stomach; worse by bending forward; relieved by sitting erect*. Bilious attacks, with nausea, vertigo, and headache. Sensation of something being pressed under the epigastrium.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frequent, with sharp pains in lumbar region. Post-scarlatinal nephritis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Weak, *slow* pulse (*Dig; Apoc can*). Fluttering of heart, with anxiety. *Palpitation; worse leaning forward*. Gouty and rheumatic metastasis of heart. Tachycardia, with pain (*Thyroid*). Tobacco heart. Dyspnoea and pressure from epigastrium toward the heart. *Sharp pains take away the breath*. Shooting through chest above heart into shoulder-blades. Frequent pulse. Heart's action tumultuous, rapid and visible. Paroxysms of anguish around heart.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses too early, or suppressed, with pain in limbs and back and inside of thighs. Leucorrhoea follows menses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain from neck down arm; in upper three dorsal vertebrae extending to shoulder-blade. Pain down back, as if it would break; in localized regions of spine; through shoulders. *Lumbar pains, of nervous origin*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Deltoid rheumatism especially right. Pains from hips to knees and feet. *Pains affect a large part of a limb*, or several joints, and pass through quickly. Weakness, numbness, pricking, and sense of coldness in limbs. *Pains along ulnar nerve*, index finger. Joints red, hot, swollen. Tingling and numbness of left arm.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sleepless, *wakes very early in morning*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, leaning forward (*opposite, Kali carb*); looking down; motion, open air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: Kalmia contains Arbutin g v. *Derris pinuta* (of great service in neuralgic headaches of rheumatic origin).
Compare: *Spigelia; Pulsat*.
Complementary: *Benz acid*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to sixth potency.

kaolinum.name: Kaolinum
kaolinum.essence: A remedy for croup and bronchitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Bolus alba (China Clay) Alumina Silicate (KAOLIN)
A remedy for croup and bronchitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching and burning. Discharge *yellow. Sore, scabby*, stopped up.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Soreness of chest* along trachea; cannot stand percussion. Gray sputa. Capillary bronchitis. Larynx and chest sore. Membranous croup-extends down trachea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lower triturations.

kousso.name: Kousso
kousso.essence: A *Vermifuge*-Nausea and vomiting, vertigo, praecordial anxiety slowing and irregular pulse, subdelirium and collapse. Rapid and extreme prostration. To expel tapeworm.
kousso.dosing: 1/2 oz. Mix with warm water and let stand 15 minutes; stir well and administer. May be preceded by a little lemon juice (Merrell).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Hagenia Abyssinica (KOUSSO - BRAYERA)
A *Vermifuge*-Nausea and vomiting, vertigo, praecordial anxiety slowing and irregular pulse, subdelirium and collapse. Rapid and extreme prostration. To expel tapeworm.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: 1/2 oz. Mix with warm water and let stand 15 minutes; stir well and administer. May be preceded by a little lemon juice (Merrell).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Mallotus*-Kamala-An efficient remedy for tapeworm in 30-60 minims of tincture taken in cinnamon water.

kreosotum.name: Kreosotum
kreosotum.essence:
Kreosotum is a mixture of phenols obtained from this distillation.

Pulsations all over the body, and profuse bleeding from small wounds. Very severe, old neuralgic affections; pains rather aggravated by rest. *Excoriating*, burning, and offensive discharges. Haemorrhages, ulcerations, cancerous affections. Rapid decomposition of fluids and secretions, and burning pains. Overgrown, poorly developed children. Post-climacteric diseases. Tumefaction, puffiness, gangrene. Ailings of teething childre...

agg: in open air, cold rest, when lying

complementary: Fuligo ligni; Carbol ac; Iod; Laches

kreosotum.dosing: Third to thirtieth potency. The 200th in sensitive patients.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in joints, hip and knee. Boring pain in hip-joints. Scapulae sore.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Beechwood Kreosote
Kreosotum is a mixture of phenols obtained from this distillation.
Pulsations all over the body, and profuse bleeding from small wounds. Very severe, old neuralgic affections; pains rather aggravated by rest. *Excoriating*, burning, and offensive discharges. Haemorrhages, ulcerations, cancerous affections. Rapid decomposition of fluids and secretions, and burning pains. Overgrown, poorly developed children. Post-climacteric diseases. Tumefaction, puffiness, gangrene. Ailings of teething children.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Music causes weeping and palpitation. Vanishing of thought; stupid, forgetful, peevish, irritable. Child wants everything but throws it away when given.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull pain, as from a board pressing against forehead. Menstrual headache. Occipital pain (*Gels; Zinc pic*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Salty lachrymation. Lids red and swollen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Eruption around and pimples within. Difficult hearing and buzzing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sick, suffering expression; hot, cheeks red.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lips red, bleeding. *Very painful dentition*; child will not sleep. *Very rapid decay of teeth, with spongy, bleeding gums*; teeth dark and crumbly (*Staph; Ant c*). Putrid odor and bitter taste.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Offensive smell and discharge. Chronic catarrh of old people. Acrid rawness. Lupus (*Ars*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning, choking sensation. *Putrid odor*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nausea; vomiting of food several hours after eating; of sweetish water in the morning. Feeling of coldness, as of ice water in stomach. Soreness; better eating. Painful hard spot. Haematemesis. Bitter taste after a swallow of water.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Distended. Burning haemorrhoids. Diarrhoea; very offensive; dark brown. Bloody, fetid stools. *Cholera infantum* in connection with painful dentition, green stools, nausea, dry skin, exhaustion, etc.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Offensive*. Violent itching of vulva and vagina, worse when urinating. Can urinate only when lying; cannot get out of bed quick enough during first sleep. Dreams of urinating. Enuresis in the first part of night. *Must hurry when desire comes to urinate*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Corrosive itching within vulva, burning and swelling of labia; violent itching between labia and thighs. During menses, *difficult hearing*; buzzing and roaring; eruption after. Burning and soreness in external and internal parts. Leucorrhoea, yellow, acrid; odor of green corn; worse between periods. Haemorrhage after coition. Menses too early, prolonged. Vomiting of pregnancy, with ptyalism. *Menstrual flow intermits* (*Puls*); ceases on sitting or walking; reappears on lying down. Pain worse after menses. Lochia offensive; *intermits*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Hoarse, with pain in larynx*. Cough; worse evening, with efforts to vomit, with pain in chest. Raw burning in chest; pains and oppression. Cough after influenza (*Eriodyction*). Winter coughs of old people, *with heavy pressure on sternum*. Gangrene of lungs. After every cough, *copious, purulent expectoration*. Haemoptysis; periodic attacks. Sternum feels pressed in.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dragging backache, extending to genitals and down thighs. Great debility.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching, worse towards evening. Burning in soles. Senile gangrene. Small wounds bleed freely (*Crot; Lach; Phos*). Pustules and herpes. Ecchymosis; dorsal surface of fingers and hands eczematous.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Disturbed with tossing. Paralytic sensation in limbs on waking. Anxious dreams of pursuit, fire, erections, etc.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, in open air, cold rest, when lying; after menstruation. *Better*, from warmth, motion, warm diet.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidote: *Nux*. Inimical: *Carbo*.
Complementary in malignant diseases: *Ars; Phos; Sulph*.
*Guaiacol* (is the principal constituent of Kreosote, and similar in action. Used in pulmonary tuberculosis. Dose 1 to 5 m).
*Matico*-Artanthe or Piper augustifolia, (Gonorrhoea, haemorrhage from lungs; catarrhal conditions of genito-urinary organs and gastro-intestinal tract. Topically a haemostatic. Difficult, dry, deep, winter cough. Use tincture).
Compare also: *Fuligo ligni; Carbol ac; Iod; Laches*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency. The 200th in sensitive patients.

cytisus-laburnum.name: Cytisus Laburnum
cytisus-laburnum.essence: All parts of this shrub are poisonous, producing inflammation of stomach and intestines, with vomiting, diarrhoea, headache, paleness of face and cold skin. Widespread anaesthesia, and convulsions are some of the chief effects of this drug. Cerebrospinal meningitis. Great prostration, sense of constriction in throat, stiffness of nape, tearing from nape into occiput, lusterless eyes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Laburnum (LABURNUM)
All parts of this shrub are poisonous, producing inflammation of stomach and intestines, with vomiting, diarrhoea, headache, paleness of face and cold skin. Widespread anaesthesia, and convulsions are some of the chief effects of this drug. Cerebrospinal meningitis. Great prostration, sense of constriction in throat, stiffness of nape, tearing from nape into occiput, lusterless eyes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stupefaction; indifference (*Phos ac*). Unequally dilated pupils; *giddiness*; twitching of facial muscles (*Agaric*). Hydrocephalus. Constant vertigo, intense sleepiness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Excessive thirst. Constant nausea, vomiting; burning pain in epigastrium.
Tenesmus and erections. Grass-green urine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Numbness and pain in hands. Difficulty in moving them.
Compare: *Nux; Gels. Cystine* (produces motor paralysis resembling that of curare and death through respiratory paralysis).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

lacticum-acidum.name: Lacticum Acidum
lacticum-acidum.essence: Is apparently formed in muscle tissue during the stage of muscle exhaustion. Differs from ordinary Lactic acid in its relation to polarized light. It represents a much broader and more profoundly acting drug and its pathogenesis is quite dissimilar from the normal acid. Proved by Wm. B. Griggs, M. D, who found it of great value in the most violent form of *Epidemic influenza, especially with violent and retching and greatest prostration*, when Arsenic had failed. Spinal neurasthenia, muscular we...
lacticum-acidum.dosing: Sixth to 30th potency. The 15x most marked action (Griggs).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
(SARCOLACTIC ACID)
Is apparently formed in muscle tissue during the stage of muscle exhaustion. Differs from ordinary Lactic acid in its relation to polarized light.
