It represents a much broader and more profoundly acting drug and its pathogenesis is quite dissimilar from the normal acid. Proved by Wm. B. Griggs, M. D, who found it of great value in the most violent form of *Epidemic influenza, especially with violent and retching and greatest prostration*, when Arsenic had failed. Spinal neurasthenia, muscular weakness, dyspnoea with myocardial weakness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tired feeling with *muscular prostration*, worse any exertion. Sore feeling all over, worse in afternoon. Restless at night. Difficulty in getting to sleep. Tired feeling in morning on getting up.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constriction in pharynx. Sore throat with tightness in naso-pharynx. Tickling in throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nausea. Uncontrollable vomiting even of water followed by extreme weakness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tired feeling in back and neck and shoulders. Paralytic weakness. Wrist tires easily from writing. Extreme weakness from climbing stairs. Stiffness of thigh and calves. Arms feel as if no strength in them. Cramp in the calves.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to 30th potency. The 15x most marked action (Griggs).

lac-caninum.name: Lac Caninum
lac-caninum.essence: This remedy is of undoubted value in certain form of sore throat and diphtheria, and rheumatism. Corresponds to a low-vitiated, non-feverish type of sickness. The keynote symptom is, *erratic pains, alternating sides*. Feels as if walking on air, or of not touching the bed when lying down. Great lassitude. Ozaena. Decided effect in drying up milk in women who cannot nurse the baby. *Great weakness and prostration*. Sinking spells every morning. Mastitis.

agg: morning of one day and in the evening of next

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Dog's Milk
This remedy is of undoubted value in certain form of sore throat and diphtheria, and rheumatism. Corresponds to a low-vitiated, non-feverish type of sickness. The keynote symptom is, *erratic pains, alternating sides*. Feels as if walking on air, or of not touching the bed when lying down. Great lassitude. Ozaena. Decided effect in drying up milk in women who cannot nurse the baby. *Great weakness and prostration*. Sinking spells every morning. Mastitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Very forgetful; in writing, makes mistakes. *Despondent*; thinks her disease incurable. Attacks of rage. *Visions of snakes*. Thinks himself of little consequence.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation of walking or floating in the air (*Sticta*). Pain first one side, then the other. Blurred vision, nausea and vomiting at height of attack of headache. Occipital pain, with shooting extending to forehead. Sensation as if brain were alternately contracted and relaxed. Noises in ears. Reverberation of voice.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coryza; one nostril stuffed up, the other free; alternate. Alae nasi and corners of mouth cracked. Bones of nose sore to pressure. Bloody pus discharged.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue coated white with bright red edges; profuse salivation. Drooling in diphtheria. *Cracking of jaw while eating* (*Nit ac; Rhus*). Putrid taste increased by sweets.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensitive to touch. Painful swallowing; pain extends to ears. Sore throat and cough with menstruation. *Tonsillitis and diphtheria symptoms change repeatedly from side to side. Shining glazed* appearance of deposit, *pearly-white* or like pure white porcelain. *Stiffness of neck* and tongue. Throat feels burned raw. Tickling sensation causes constant cough. Sore throat beginning and ending with menses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses too early, profuse, *flow in gushes. Breasts swollen; painful before* (*Calc c; Con; Puls*) and better on appearance of menses. Mastitis; *worse, least jar*. *Helps to dry up milk*. Sinking at epigastrium. Sexual organs easily excited. Backache; spine very sensitive to touch or pressure. *Galactorrhoea*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sciatica, right side. Legs feel numb and stiff, cramps in feet. Rheumatic pains in extremities and back, from one side to the other. Pain in arms to fingers. Burning in palms and soles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dreams of snakes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, morning of one day and in the evening of next. *Better*, cold, cold drinks.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Lach; Con; Lac felinum*-Cat's Milk--(ciliary neuralgia; eye symptoms, photophobia; *asthenopia*; dysmenorrhoea); *Lac vaccinum*-Cows' Milk--(headache, rheumatic pains, constipation); *Lac vaccinum coagulatum*-Curds--(nausea of pregnancy); *Lactis vaccini floc*--Cream--(diphtheria, leucorrhoea, menorrhagia, dysphagia); *Lactic ac*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thirtieth and the highest potencies.

lac-vaccinum-defloratum.name: Lac Vaccinum Defloratum
lac-vaccinum-defloratum.essence: A remedy for diseases with faulty nutrition; sick headaches, with profuse flow of urine *during* pain. *Car sickness*.
lac-vaccinum-defloratum.dosing: Sixth, to thirtieth potency and higher.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Skimmed Milk (LAC DEFLORATUM)
A remedy for diseases with faulty nutrition; sick headaches, with profuse flow of urine *during* pain. *Car sickness*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Despondent. Pain begins in forehead to occiput, in morning on rising. *Intense throbbing*, with nausea, vomiting, blindness, and obstinate constipation; worse, noise, light, motion, during menses, with great prostration, and better by pressure and bandaging head tightly.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Constipation*. Stools hard, large, with great straining; painful, lacerating anus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Colostrum* (Diarrhoea in infants. Whole body smells sour. Colic). *Nat mur*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth, to thirtieth potency and higher.

lachnanthes-tinctoria.name: Lachnanthes Tinctoria
lachnanthes-tinctoria.essence: Head, chest and circulation are affected. Bridge of nose as if pinched. A remedy for torticollis, rheumatic symptoms about neck. *Tuberculosis*-light-complexioned people. Early stages, and established chest cases, with much coldness. Produces a desire to talk-a flow of language and the courage to make a speech.
lachnanthes-tinctoria.dosing: Third potency. Tincture in phthisis, unit doses, once or twice a week, or three drops every four hours.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Chilliness between the shoulder-blades*; pain and stiffness in back.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Drawn over to one side* in sore throat. Rheumatism of the neck. Stiffness of neck. Pain in nape, as if dislocated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Body icy cold; face yellow; tendency to sweat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Dulc; Bry; Puls*; also *Fel tauri* (nape of neck pains, and great tension there).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency. Tincture in phthisis, unit doses, once or twice a week, or three drops every four hours.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Spirit-weed (LACHNANTHES)
Head, chest and circulation are affected. Bridge of nose as if pinched. A remedy for torticollis, rheumatic symptoms about neck. *Tuberculosis*-light-complexioned people. Early stages, and established chest cases, with much coldness. Produces a desire to talk-a flow of language and the courage to make a speech.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Right-sided pain, extending down to jaw; *head feels enlarged*; worse, least noise. Scalp painful. Sleepless. Circumscribed red cheeks; scalp feels sore, as if hair was standing on end; burning in palms and soles. Bridge of nose feels as if pinched.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation of heat-bubbling and boiling around heart region rising to head.

lactuca-virosa.name: Lactuca Virosa
lactuca-virosa.essence: This remedy acts principally upon the brain and circulatory system. Delirium tremens with sleeplessness, coldness, and tremor. Hydrothorax and ascites. Impotence. Sense of lightness and *tightness* affecting whole body, especially chest. Seems to be a *true galactogogue*. Marked action on extremities.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Acrid Lettuce
This remedy acts principally upon the brain and circulatory system. Delirium tremens with sleeplessness, coldness, and tremor. Hydrothorax and ascites. Impotence. Sense of lightness and *tightness* affecting whole body, especially chest. Seems to be a *true galactogogue*. Marked action on extremities.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stupefaction of sense. Great restlessness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull, heavy, confused, dizzy. Heat of face and headache, with general coldness. Headache, with affections of respiratory organs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation of weight, of fullness; borborygmi; abundant emission of wind. Colic in early morning, abdomen tense, relieved somewhat by evacuation and passing of wind.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Difficult breathing. Suffocative breathing from dropsy of the chest. Constant tickling cough. Incessant, spasmodic cough, as if chest would fly to pieces. Squeezing sensation in lower chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Promotes catamenia. *Increase of milk* in breasts (*Asafoet*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Restless; impossible to get to sleep. Deep, comatose sleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lame hip down left side; worse walking. Coldness and numbness of feet and legs. Tremor of hands and arms. Cramps in shin bones, extending to toes and side of leg involving calves.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Acet ac; Coff*.
Compare: *Nabalus*-Prenanthes Serpentaria-Rattlesnake root-White lettuce, similar to Lactuca, (chronic diarrhoea, worse after eating, nights and towards morning. Pain in abdomen and rectum; emaciation. Constipation and somnolence; susceptible to aura of others. Dyspepsia, with acid burning eructation. *Craving for acid food*. Leucorrhoea with throbbing in uterus); *Lach; Kali carb; Spiranthes* (galactagogue).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture.

lamium-album.name: Lamium Album
lamium-album.essence:
Has a special affinity for female and urinary organs.

Headache, *with backward and forward motion of head*. Leucorrhoea and menses too early and scanty. Haemorrhoids; hard stool, with blood. Sensation in urethra as though a drop of water were flowing through it. Tearing in the extremities. Haemoptysis. Blisters on heel from slight rubbing. Ulcers on heel (*Cepa*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
White Nettle (LAMIUM)
Has a special affinity for female and urinary organs.
Headache, *with backward and forward motion of head*. Leucorrhoea and menses too early and scanty. Haemorrhoids; hard stool, with blood. Sensation in urethra as though a drop of water were flowing through it. Tearing in the extremities. Haemoptysis. Blisters on heel from slight rubbing. Ulcers on heel (*Cepa*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

lapis-albus.name: Lapis Albus
lapis-albus.essence:
Affections of glands, *goitre*, pre-ulcerative stage of carcinoma. Burning, stinging pain in breast, stomach, and uterus. Connective tissue about glands specially affected. Fat anaemic babies with Iodine appetite. Ravenous appetite. Remarkably successful in scrofulous affections, except in malarial cases.

*Uterine carcinoma*. Fibroid tumors with *intense burning* pains through the part with *profuse haemorrhage*. Glands have a certain elasticity and pliability about them rather than the stony h...

complementary: Silica; Badiaga; Ars iod; Calc iod; Con; Kal iod; Asterias

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Silico-fluoride of Calcium
Affections of glands, *goitre*, pre-ulcerative stage of carcinoma. Burning, stinging pain in breast, stomach, and uterus. Connective tissue about glands specially affected. Fat anaemic babies with Iodine appetite. Ravenous appetite. Remarkably successful in scrofulous affections, except in malarial cases.
*Uterine carcinoma*. Fibroid tumors with *intense burning* pains through the part with *profuse haemorrhage*. Glands have a certain elasticity and pliability about them rather than the stony hardness of *Calc fluor* and *Cistus*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Otitis media suppurativa. Where Silica is indicated progress is hastened by *Lapis* (Bellows).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Persistent pains in mammary region. Glandular hardening.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scrofulous abscesses and sores. Enlargement and induration of glands, *especially cervical*. Lipoma, sarcoma, carcinoma. Pruritus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Silica; Badiaga; Ars iod; Calc iod; Con; Kal iod; Asterias*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to sixth potency.

lappa-arctium.name: Lappa Arctium
lappa-arctium.essence: Very important in skin therapeutics. Eruptions on the head, face, and neck; pimples; acne. Styes and ulcerations on the edge of the eyelids. Profuse and frequent urination. Crops of boils and styes (*Anthracin*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Burdock
Very important in skin therapeutics. Eruptions on the head, face, and neck; pimples; acne. Styes and ulcerations on the edge of the eyelids. Profuse and frequent urination. Crops of boils and styes (*Anthracin*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in hands, knees, and ankles extending downward to fingers and toes. Pain in all joints. Eruption on extremities.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Uterine displacements. An exceedingly sore, bruised feeling in uterus, with great relaxation of the vaginal tissues; apparently entire lack of tonicity of pelvic contents. These symptoms all aggravated by standing, walking, a misstep, or sudden jar.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency.

lathyrus-sativus.name: Lathyrus Sativus
lathyrus-sativus.essence: Affects the lateral and anterior columns of the cord. Does not produce pain. *Reflexes always increased*. Paralytic affections of lower extremities; spastic paralysis; lateral sclerosis; Beri-beri. Athetosis. Infantile paralysis. After influenza and wasting, exhaustive diseases where there is much weakness and heaviness, slow recovery of nerve power. Sleepy, constant yawning.

complementary: headache, burning from lower jaw to vertex

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Chick-pea (LATHYRUS)
Affects the lateral and anterior columns of the cord. Does not produce pain. *Reflexes always increased*. Paralytic affections of lower extremities; spastic paralysis; lateral sclerosis; Beri-beri. Athetosis. Infantile paralysis. After influenza and wasting, exhaustive diseases where there is much weakness and heaviness, slow recovery of nerve power. Sleepy, constant yawning.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Depressed; hypochondriacal. Vertigo when standing with eyes closed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning pain in *tip of tongue*; with tingling and numbness of tongue and lips, as if scalded.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tips of fingers numb. Tremulous, tottering gait. Excessive rigidity of legs; spastic gait. Knees knock against each other when walking. Cramps in legs worse cold, and cold feet. Cannot extend or cross legs when sitting. Myelitis, with marked spastic symptoms. Rheumatic paralysis. Gluteal muscles and lower limbs emaciated. Legs blue; swollen, if hanging down. Stiffness and lameness of ankles and knees, toe do not leave the floor, heels do not touch floor, Muscles of calves very tense. Patient sits bent forward, straightens with difficulty.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Increased bladder reflex. Frequent, must hurry, else voided involuntarily.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Oxytrop; Secale; Petiveria*, a South American plant (Paralysis; paraplegia with numbness. Sensation of internal coldness). *Agrostema githago*-Corn-cockle --(Burning sensations, in stomach, through oesophagus into throat, in lower abdomen and anus; nausea, bitter vomiting, impaired locomotion; difficulty in remaining erect; vertigo and *headache, burning from lower jaw to vertex*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

latrodectus-mactans.name: Latrodectus Mactans
latrodectus-mactans.essence: The bite produces tetanic effects that last several days. A picture of *Angina pectoris* is presented by the action of the drug. The praecordial region seems to be the center of attack. Constriction of chest muscles, with radiation to shoulders and back. Lowered coagulability.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Spider
The bite produces tetanic effects that last several days. A picture of *Angina pectoris* is presented by the action of the drug. The praecordial region seems to be the center of attack. Constriction of chest muscles, with radiation to shoulders and back. Lowered coagulability.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Anxiety. Screams with pain. Pain in neck to back of head. Occipital pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Extreme apnoea. Gasping respiration. Fears losing breath.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent, praecordial pain extending to the axilla and down the arm and forearm to fingers, with numbness of the extremity. Pulse feeble and rapid. Sinking sensation at the Cramping pain from chest to abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in left arm, feels paralyzed. Weakness of legs followed by cramps in the abdominal muscles. Paraesthesia of lower limbs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coldness of whole surface. Skin cold as marble.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Latrodectus Hasselti*-New South Wales Black Spider--(Long lasting effects seem to indicate it as a "*chronic*" blood poisoning. Arrests intense pain in pyaemia. Great oedema in neighborhood of wound; paralysis of limbs, with great wasting of muscles. Violent, darting, burning pains preceding paralysis; vertigo, tendency to fall forward; septicaemic conditions; constant delusion of *flying*. Loss of memory. Roaring noises). *Araena; Mygale; Theridion; Latrodectus Kalipo* -New Zealand spider--(lymphangitis and nervous twitchings, scarlet burning eruption). *Triatema*-Kissing bug --(Swelling with violent itching of fingers and toes. Smothering sensation and difficult breathing succeeded by fainting and rapid pulse).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency.

laurocerasus.name: Laurocerasus
laurocerasus.essence: Spasmodic tickling cough, especially in cardiac patients, is often magically influenced by this drug. *Lack of reaction*, especially in chest and heart affections. *Drink rolls audibly through oesophagus and intestines*. General coldness, not ameliorated by warmth. Violent pain in stomach with loss of speech. Spasm of facial muscles and oesophagus. Asphyxia neonatorum.

complementary: Hydrocy ac; Camphor; Secale; Ammon carb; Ambra

laurocerasus.dosing: Tincture to third potency. Cherry-laurel water, two to five drop doses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Cherry-laurel
Spasmodic tickling cough, especially in cardiac patients, is often magically influenced by this drug. *Lack of reaction*, especially in chest and heart affections. *Drink rolls audibly through oesophagus and intestines*. General coldness, not ameliorated by warmth. Violent pain in stomach with loss of speech. Spasm of facial muscles and oesophagus. Asphyxia neonatorum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coldness; chills and heat alternate. Thirst, with dry mouth in afternoon.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cyanosis and dyspnoea; worse, sitting up. Patient puts hands on heart. Cough, with valvular disease. Exercise causes pain around heart. Tickling, *dry cough*. Dyspnoea. Constriction of chest. Cough, with copious, jelly-like, or bloody expectoration. Small and feeble pulse. Threatening paralysis of lungs. *Gasping for breath*; clutches at heart.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Mitral regurgitation. Clutching at heart and palpitation. Cyanosis neonatorum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Spells of deep sleep, with snoring and stertorous breathing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Toe and finger nails become knotty. Skin blue. Sprained pains in hips, thighs and heels. Cold, clammy feet and legs. Clubbing of fingers. Veins of hands distended.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Hydrocy ac; Camphor; Secale; Ammon carb; Ambra*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture to third potency. Cherry-laurel water, two to five drop doses.

lava-hekla.name: Lava Hekla
lava-hekla.essence: Marked action upon *the jaws*. Of great use in exostosis, gum abscess, difficult teething. Nodosities, caries of bone, etc. Osteitis, periostitis, osteosarcoma; rachitis. *Tumors* in general. Bone necrosis. Necrosis and sinus after mastoid operation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Lava Scoriae from Mt. Hecla (HEKLA LAVA)
Marked action upon *the jaws*. Of great use in exostosis, gum abscess, difficult teething. Nodosities, caries of bone, etc. Osteitis, periostitis, osteosarcoma; rachitis. *Tumors* in general. Bone necrosis. Necrosis and sinus after mastoid operation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ulceration of nasal bones. *Facial neuralgia from carious teeth* and after extraction. Toothache, with swelling about jaws. Abscess of gums. *Enlargement of maxillary bone*. Cervical glands enlarged and indurated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Silica; Mercur; Phos; Conchiolinum*--Mother of pearl (diaphysis of bone affected; parts extremely sensitive to touch).
*Amphisbaena*-Snail-like lizard (great affinity for the jaw bones, worse by air and dampness).
*Slag*--(Great itching of parts).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lower triturations.

lecithinum.name: Lecithinum
lecithinum.essence: A Phosphorus-containing Complex Organic Body prepared from the yolk of egg and animal brains
lecithinum.dosing: One-half to 2 grains of crude and potencies. Twelfth potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
A Phosphorus-containing Complex Organic Body prepared from the yolk of egg and animal brains
(LECITHIN)
Lecithin is important in the vital processes of plant and animal organisms. Lecithin has a favorable influence upon the nutritive condition and especially upon the blood hence its use in anaemia and convalescence, neurasthenia and insomnia. Increasing the number of red corpuscles and amount of hemoglobin. Excellent galactagog, renders milk more nourishing and increases quantity.
Causes an immediate decrease in the excretion of the phosphates. Mental exhaustion and impotency. Tuberculosis, causing marked improvement in nutrition and general improvement. Tired, weak, short breath, loss of flesh; symptoms of general break-down. Sexually weak.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Forgetful, dull, confused.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aching, especially in occiput-pulsating and ringing in ears. Pain in zygoma; face pale.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Loss of appetite, thirsty, craves wine and coffee; bloated, sore pain in stomach rising toward throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scanty, with phosphates, sugar or albumen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Male power lost or enfeebled. Anaphrodisia and ovarian insufficiency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Soreness, aching, lack of energy. Tired and weak.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Phosphor*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: One-half to 2 grains of crude and potencies. Twelfth potency.

lemna-minor.name: Lemna Minor
lemna-minor.essence: A catarrhal remedy. Acts especially upon the nostrils. *Nasal polypi; swollen turbinates. Atrophic rhinitis*. Asthma from nasal obstruction; worse in wet weather.

agg: in damp, rainy weather, especially *heavy rains

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, in damp, rainy weather, especially *heavy rains*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Dulc* (damp surroundings and foggy weather). *Calc; Teucr; Calend; Nat sulph*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Duckweed
A catarrhal remedy. Acts especially upon the nostrils. *Nasal polypi; swollen turbinates. Atrophic rhinitis*. Asthma from nasal obstruction; worse in wet weather.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Putrid smell*; loss of smell. Crusts and muco-purulent discharge very abundant. Post-nasal dropping. Pain like a string from nostrils to ear. Reduces nasal obstruction when it is an oedematous condition. Dryness of naso-pharynx.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Putrid taste* on rising in the morning. Dry pharynx and larynx.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Disposition to noisy diarrhoea.

lepidium-bonariense.name: Lepidium Bonariense
lepidium-bonariense.essence:
Affections of breast, heart, lancinating pains.

With heart symptoms, numbness and pain in left arm, sensation of sinking in pit of stomach.

Left side of head, face, chest, hip to knee, all have lancinating pain.

A streak of pain from the temple to the chin, as if the face were cut with a razor. Burning in throat, roaring in ears. Sensation of a tight girdle around chest, as of a knife piercing the heart. Pain in neck, back, and extremities. Compare: *Arnica; Lachesis*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Cress-Brazilian Cress
Affections of breast, heart, lancinating pains.
With heart symptoms, numbness and pain in left arm, sensation of sinking in pit of stomach.
Left side of head, face, chest, hip to knee, all have lancinating pain.
A streak of pain from the temple to the chin, as if the face were cut with a razor. Burning in throat, roaring in ears. Sensation of a tight girdle around chest, as of a knife piercing the heart. Pain in neck, back, and extremities. Compare: *Arnica; Lachesis*.

leptandra-virginica.name: Leptandra Virginica
leptandra-virginica.essence: A liver remedy, with jaundice and *black, tarry stools*. Bilious states. Enfeebled portal circulation. Malarial conditions.

complementary: Podop; Iris; Bry; Merc; Ptel; Myrica

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Culver's Root (LEPTANDRA)
A liver remedy, with jaundice and *black, tarry stools*. Bilious states. Enfeebled portal circulation. Malarial conditions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull frontal pain; vertigo, drowsiness, and depression. Smarting and aching in eyes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue coated *yellow*. Great distress in stomach and intestines, with desire for stool. Aching in region of liver extending to spine, which feels chilly.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Profuse *black, fetid stools*, with pain at umbilicus. Bleeding piles. Typhoid stools turn black and look like tar. Clay colored stools with jaundice. Prolapse of rectum with haemorrhoids. Rectal haemorrhage.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Podop; Iris; Bry; Merc; Ptel; Myrica*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency.

liatris-spicata.name: Liatris Spicata
liatris-spicata.essence:
A vascular stimulant. Increases functional activity of the skin, mucous membranes.

Of use in dropsy due to liver and spleen diseases, also renal dropsy. Here the suppressed urination is most favorably influenced. *General anasarca* due to heart and kidney disease. *Diarrhoea* with violent urging and pain in lower part of back. Colic. Locally, applied to ulcers and unhealthy wounds.

A prompt diuretic.
liatris-spicata.dosing: 1 to 4 drams of tincture of infusion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Colic Root (LIATRIS SPICATA - SERRATULA)
A vascular stimulant. Increases functional activity of the skin, mucous membranes.
Of use in dropsy due to liver and spleen diseases, also renal dropsy. Here the suppressed urination is most favorably influenced. *General anasarca* due to heart and kidney disease. *Diarrhoea* with violent urging and pain in lower part of back. Colic. Locally, applied to ulcers and unhealthy wounds.
A prompt diuretic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: 1 to 4 drams of tincture of infusion.

lilium-tigrinum.name: Lilium Tigrinum
lilium-tigrinum.essence: Manifests powerful influence over the pelvic organs, and is adapted to many reflex states dependent on some pathological condition of uterus and ovaries. More often indicated in unmarried women. The action of the heart is very marked. Pain in small spots (*Oxal ac*). Rheumatic arthritis.

complementary: Cact; Helon; Murex; Sep; Plat; Pallad

lilium-tigrinum.dosing: The middle and higher potencies seem to have done best. Its curative action sometimes is slow in developing itself.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Tiger-lily
Manifests powerful influence over the pelvic organs, and is adapted to many reflex states dependent on some pathological condition of uterus and ovaries. More often indicated in unmarried women. The action of the heart is very marked. Pain in small spots (*Oxal ac*). Rheumatic arthritis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tormented about her salvation. Consolation aggravates. *Profound depression of spirits*. Constant inclination to weep. Anxious; *fears some organic and incurable disease*. Disposed to curse, strike, think obscene things. *Aimless, hurried manner;* must keep busy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hot, dull, heavy. Faint in warm room. Wild feeling in head.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hyperaesthesia of retina. Pain, extending back into head; lachrymation; and impaired vision. *Myopic astigmia*. Useful in restoring power to the weakened ciliary muscle (*Arg nit*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Flatulent; nausea, with sensation of lump in stomach. Hungry; longs for meat. Thirsty, drinks often and much, and before severe symptoms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Abdomen sore, distended; trembling sensation in abdomen. Pressure downwards and backwards against rectum and anus; worse, standing; better, walking in open air. Bearing down in lower part of abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frequent urging. Urine milky, scanty, *hot*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constant desire to defecate, *from pressure in rectum*, worse standing. Pressure down the anus. Early-morning urgent stool. Dysentery; mucus and blood, with tenesmus, especially in plethoric and nervous women at change of life.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation as if heart were grasped in a vise (*Cact*). Feels full to bursting. Pulsations over whole body. Palpitation; irregular pulse; very rapid. Pain in cardiac region, with feeling of a load on chest. Cold feeling about heart. Suffocating feeling in a crowded and warm room. Angina pectoris with pain in right arm.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses early, scanty, *dark, clotted, offensive; flow only when moving about. Bearing down sensation with urgent desire for stool, as though all organs would escape. Ceases when resting* (*Sep; Lac c; Bell*). *Congestion of uterus*, prolapse, and anteversion. Constant desire to support parts externally. Pain in ovaries and down thighs. Acrid, brown leucorrhoea; smarting in labia. Sexual instinct awakened. Bloated feeling in uterine region. Sub-involution. Pruritus pudendi.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cannot walk on uneven ground. Pain in back and spine, with trembling, but oftener in front of a pressing-down character. Pricking in fingers. Pain in right arm and hip. Legs ache; cannot keep them still. Pain in ankle joint. Burning palms and soles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Unrefreshing, with disagreeable dreams. Unable to sleep, with wild feeling in head.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Great heat and lassitude in afternoon, with throbbing throughout body.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse* consolation, warm room. *Better*, fresh air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Cact; Helon; Murex; Sep; Plat; Pallad*.
Antidote: *Helon*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: The middle and higher potencies seem to have done best. Its curative action sometimes is slow in developing itself.

limulus-cyclops.name: Limulus Cyclops
limulus-cyclops.essence:
Limulus was introduced by C. Hering and partially proved by him and Lippe. Hering was surprised to see the blood of the King-crab that he dissected, blue, which on investigation, was found to contain copper as he had surmised and which he thought would prove to be another medicine for Cholera. Further provings are necessary to establish this, though symptoms so far observed make this probable. Hering's fertile mind always lead him to pioneer paths into practical therapeutics.

Bodily and mental ...

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Horse-foot-King-crab (LIMULUS - XIPHOSURA)
Limulus was introduced by C. Hering and partially proved by him and Lippe. Hering was surprised to see the blood of the King-crab that he dissected, blue, which on investigation, was found to contain copper as he had surmised and which he thought would prove to be another medicine for Cholera. Further provings are necessary to establish this, though symptoms so far observed make this probable. Hering's fertile mind always lead him to pioneer paths into practical therapeutics.
Bodily and mental exhaustion; drowsiness *after sea bathing*. Gastro-enteric symptoms. Painful fullness of whole right side of body.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Mental depression. Difficult to remember names, confused with heat of face, rush of blood to face, worse when meditating. Pain behind left eye-ball.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fluent coryza. Sneezing worse drinking water. Constant nasal dropping. Pressure above nose and behind eyes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Colic with heat. Cramp-like pain with watery stools. Abdomen hot and constricted. Piles, constriction of anus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Husky voice. Dyspnoea after drinking water. Oppression of chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Crural neuralgia. Soles of feet ache, feel numb. Pain in right hip-joint. Heels sore.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Itching spots and vesicles* on face *and hands*. Burning in palms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Asterias; Homarus; Cuprum*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency.

linaria-vulgaris.name: Linaria Vulgaris
linaria-vulgaris.essence: Acts prominently within the domain of the pneumogastrics. Eructations, nausea, salivation, pressure on stomach. Jaundice, splenic and hepatic hypertrophy. Enteric symptoms and *great drowsiness* very marked. Cardiac *fainting*. Enuresis. Rectal symptoms. Tongue rough, dry; throat constricted. Coldness. Confusion in head. Irresistible sleepiness. Symptoms worse walking in open air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Toad-flax-Snap Dragon (LINARIA)
Acts prominently within the domain of the pneumogastrics. Eructations, nausea, salivation, pressure on stomach. Jaundice, splenic and hepatic hypertrophy. Enteric symptoms and *great drowsiness* very marked. Cardiac *fainting*. Enuresis. Rectal symptoms. Tongue rough, dry; throat constricted. Coldness. Confusion in head. Irresistible sleepiness. Symptoms worse walking in open air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

linum-usitatissimum.name: Linum Usitatissimum
linum-usitatissimum.essence: The application of Linseed poultice has produced in sensitive subjects severe respiratory disturbances, as asthma, hives, etc. Its action in such cases is marked by *intense irritation*. It has been found to contain small quantity of Hydrocyanic acid, which may account for this intensity. The decoction is of service in inflammation of the urinary passages, cystitis, strangury, etc. Also in diseases of the intestinal tract. It has a place in the treatment of asthma, hay-fever and urticaria. Trism...

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Common Flax
The application of Linseed poultice has produced in sensitive subjects severe respiratory disturbances, as asthma, hives, etc. Its action in such cases is marked by *intense irritation*. It has been found to contain small quantity of Hydrocyanic acid, which may account for this intensity. The decoction is of service in inflammation of the urinary passages, cystitis, strangury, etc. Also in diseases of the intestinal tract. It has a place in the treatment of asthma, hay-fever and urticaria. Trismus and paralysis of the tongue.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Linum Catharticum*-Purging flax --(Similar respiratory symptoms, but also colic and diarrhoea).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lower potencies.

lithium-carbonicum.name: Lithium Carbonicum
lithium-carbonicum.essence: Chronic *rheumatism connected with heart lesions* and asthenopia offer a field for this remedy. Rheumatic nodes. Uric acid diathesis Whole body is *sore*. Gout and tophi.

complementary: Lyc; Ammon phos; Benz ac; Calc; Lithium chlor

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Carbonate of Lithium
Chronic *rheumatism connected with heart lesions* and asthenopia offer a field for this remedy. Rheumatic nodes. Uric acid diathesis Whole body is *sore*. Gout and tophi.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tension, as if bound; better, sitting and going out. Externally sensitive. *Headache ceases while eating*. Trembling and throbbing. Pain in heart; extends to head. Dizzy states with ringing in ears. Both cheeks covered with dry, bran-like scales.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Half vision; invisible right half. Photophobia. Pain over eyes. Dry lids. Eyes pain after reading.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Acidity, nausea, *gnawing, relieved by eating* (*Anacard*). Cannot endure slightest pressure of clothes (*Laches*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tenesmus. Turbid urine, with mucus and red deposit. Pain in region of right kidney. Free and colorless. While urinating, pressure in heart. Cystitis, subacute and chronic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constriction of chest. Violent cough when lying down. Air feels cold when inspired. Pain in mammary glands, *which extend into the arms and fingers*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rheumatic soreness in cardiac region. Sudden shock in heart. Throbbing, dull stitch in cardiac region. Pains in heart before menses, and associated with pains in bladder, and before urinating; better, after. Trembling and fluttering in heart, extending to back.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Soreness of bladder; pain in right kidney and ureter. Turbid urine with mucus, scanty and dark, acrid; sandy deposit.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Paralytic stiffness all over. Itching about joints. Rheumatic pains throughout shoulder-joint, arm, and fingers and small joints generally. Pain in hollow of foot, extending to knee. Swelling and tenderness of finger and toe joints; better, hot water. Nodular swellings in joints. Ankles pain when walking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scabby, tettery eruption on hands, head, and cheeks, preceded by red, raw skin. Dull stitch, ending in itching. *Barber's itch* (use high). Rough rash all over body, much loose epithelium, tough, dry, itchy skin.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, in morning, right side. *Better*, rising and moving about.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Lyc; Ammon phos; Benz ac; Calc; Lithium chlor* (symptoms of cinchonism, viz.: *Dizzy* head, full, *bluring of vision* Ringing in ears; marked tremors; *general weakness*; marked muscular and general prostration; no gastro-intestinal effects. Nose sore, heartburn, pain in teeth). *Lithium lacticum* (rheumatism of shoulder, and small joints relieved by moving about; worse, resting). *Lithium benzoicum* (deep-seated pains in loins; in small of back; uneasiness in bladder. Cystic irritation. Gallstones. Frequent desire. Diminishing uric acid deposit). *Lithium bromatum* (cerebral congestion, threatened apoplexy, insomnia and epilepsy).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third trituration.

lobelia-inflata.name: Lobelia Inflata
lobelia-inflata.essence:
Is a vaso-motor stimulant; increases the activity of all vegetative processes; spends its force mainly upon the pneumogastric nerve, producing a depressed relaxed condition with oppression of the chest and epigastrium, impeded respiration, nausea and vomiting.

Languor, relaxation of muscles, *nausea, vomiting and dyspepsia* are the general indications that point to the use of this remedy, in asthma and gastric affections. Best adapted to light complexioned fleshy people. Bad effects of drunkenn...

agg: tobacco, afternoon, slightest motion, cold, especially cold washing
amel: (chest pain), toward evening, and from warmth

complementary: Tabac; Ars; Tart e; Verat; Rosa
Great oppression in lower part of chest
Pain in chest under short ribs of left side

lobelia-inflata.dosing: Tincture, to thirtieth potency. Locally the tincture is antidotal to Poison-oak. Often the *Acetum Lobelia* acts better than any other preparation. Lobelia hypodermically acts clinically almost precisely as the antitoxin of diphtheria does upon the infection and renders the system stronger to resist future infections (F. Ellingwood).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Indian Tobacco
Is a vaso-motor stimulant; increases the activity of all vegetative processes; spends its force mainly upon the pneumogastric nerve, producing a depressed relaxed condition with oppression of the chest and epigastrium, impeded respiration, nausea and vomiting.
Languor, relaxation of muscles, *nausea, vomiting and dyspepsia* are the general indications that point to the use of this remedy, in asthma and gastric affections. Best adapted to light complexioned fleshy people. Bad effects of drunkenness. *Suppressed discharges* (*Sulph*). Diphtheria. *Catarrhal jaundice* (*Chionanth*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo, and fear of death. Gastric headache, with nausea, vomiting, and great prostration; worse, afternoon until midnight; tobacco. Dull, heavy pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bathed in cold sweat. Sudden pallor.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Deafness due to suppressed discharges* or eczema. Shooting pain from throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Profuse flow of saliva; acrid burning taste; *mercurial taste*; tenacious mucus, tongue coated white.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Acidity, flatulence, shortness of breath after eating. Heartburn with profuse flow of saliva. *Extreme nausea and vomiting*. Morning sickness. *Faintness and weakness at epigastrium. Profuse salivation, with good appetite*. Profuse sweat and prostration. Cannot bear smell or taste of tobacco. Acrid, burning taste; acidity, with contractive feeling in pit of stomach. Flatulence, shortness of breath after eating. Heartburn.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Dyspnoea from constriction of chest*; worse, any exertion. Sensation of pressure or weight in chest; *better by rapid walking*. Feels as if heart would stop. Asthma; attacks, with weakness, felt in pit of stomach and preceded by *prickling* all over. Cramp, ringing cough, short breath, catching at throat. Senile emphysema.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in sacrum; cannot bear slightest touch. Sits leaning forward.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Deep red color and copious red sediment.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Prickling, itching with intense nausea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, tobacco, afternoon, slightest motion, cold, especially cold washing. *Better*, by rapid walking; (chest pain), toward evening, and from warmth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidote: *Ipec*.
Compare: *Tabac; Ars; Tart e; Verat; Rosa*.
*Lobelia syphilitica or cerulea* (gives a perfect picture of sneezing influenza, involving the posterior nares, palate, and fauces. Very depressed. Pain in forehead over eyes; pain and gas in bowels, followed by copious watery stools with tenesmus and soreness of anus. Pain in knees. Prickling in soles. *Great oppression in lower part of chest*, as if air could not reach there. *Pain in chest under short ribs of left side*. Dry, hacking cough. Breathing difficult. Dull, aching pain over root of nose. Eustachian catarrh. Pain in posterior part of spleen). *Lobelia erinus* (*malignant growths*, extremely rapid development; colloid cancer of the omentum; cork-screw-like pains in abdomen; great dryness of skin, nasal and buccal mucous membranes; distaste for brandy; dry, eczematous patches covering points of first fingers. Malignant disease of the face. Epithelioma).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to thirtieth potency. Locally the tincture is antidotal to Poison-oak. Often the *Acetum Lobelia* acts better than any other preparation. Lobelia hypodermically acts clinically almost precisely as the antitoxin of diphtheria does upon the infection and renders the system stronger to resist future infections (F. Ellingwood).

lobelia-purpurascens.name: Lobelia Purpurascens
lobelia-purpurascens.essence: Profound prostration of all the vital forces and of the nervous system; *respiratory paralysis. Nervous prostration of influenza*. Coma. Tongue white and paralyzed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Purple Lobelia
Profound prostration of all the vital forces and of the nervous system; *respiratory paralysis. Nervous prostration of influenza*. Coma. Tongue white and paralyzed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Confused and depressed. Headache with nausea, vertigo; especially between eyebrows. Cannot keep eyes open; spasmodic closure of lids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Superficial respiration; heart and lungs feel paralyzed; respiration slow. Heart beats sound to him like boom of a drum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Impossible to keep open. Drowsy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Baptisa; Lobelia cardinalis* (debility, especially of lower extremities; oppressed breathing, pleurisy, *sticking* pain in chest on taking a long breath. Pain in *left* lung, intermitting pricking during the day).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

lolium-temulentum.name: Lolium Temulentum
lolium-temulentum.essence: Has been made use of in cephalalgia, sciatica, paralysis. Prostration and restlessness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Darnel (LOLIUM TUMULENTUM)
Has been made use of in cephalalgia, sciatica, paralysis. Prostration and restlessness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Anxious and depressed, confused. Vertigo; must close eyes. Head heavy. Noises in ears.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nausea, vomiting. Pain in pit of stomach and abdomen. Severe purging.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Gait unsteady. *Trembling of all limbs*. Loss of power in extremities. *Violent pain in calves, as if bound with cords*. Cold extremities. Spasmodic motions of arms and legs. Cannot write; cannot hold a glass of water. Trembling of hands in paralysis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Secale; Lathyr; Astrag*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency.

lonicera-xylosteum.name: Lonicera Xylosteum
lonicera-xylosteum.essence: Convulsive symptoms. Uraemic convulsions. Albuminuria. Syphilis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Fly-woodbine
Convulsive symptoms. Uraemic convulsions. Albuminuria. Syphilis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Congestion of head and chest; coma. Contraction of one pupil and dilatation of the other. Sopor, eyes half open red face.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Jerking of limbs. Trembling of whole body. Violent convulsions. Limbs and head fall over as if paralyzed. Extremities cold. Cold perspiration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Lonicera pericylmenum*-Honeysuckle --(irritability of temper, with violent outburst (*Crocus*)).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to sixth potency.

lupulus-humulus.name: Lupulus Humulus
lupulus-humulus.essence: Is a good remedy in unstrung conditions of the nervous system attended with nausea, dizziness, headache following a night's debauch. *Infantile jaundice*, Urethral burning. Drawing and twitching in almost every muscle. Nervous tremors; wakefulness and delirium of drunkards. *Giddiness* and *stupefaction. Slow* pulse. Perspiration profuse, clammy, greasy.
lupulus-humulus.dosing: Tincture, to third potency. *Lupulin* 1X trit (Best in seminal emissions. Locally in painful cancers).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Hops
Is a good remedy in unstrung conditions of the nervous system attended with nausea, dizziness, headache following a night's debauch. *Infantile jaundice*, Urethral burning. Drawing and twitching in almost every muscle. Nervous tremors; wakefulness and delirium of drunkards. *Giddiness* and *stupefaction. Slow* pulse. Perspiration profuse, clammy, greasy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Morbid vigilance. Highly excited. Dull, heavy headache with dizziness. Drawing and twitching in every muscle.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Drowsy* during the day. Sopor.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Painful erections. Emissions, *depending on sexual weakness and after organism*. Spermatorrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scarlatina-like eruption on face. Feels like insects crawling under skin; feels chapped, skin peels.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Coffea; Vinegar*.
Compare: *Nux; Urtica; Cannab*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency. *Lupulin* 1X trit (Best in seminal emissions. Locally in painful cancers).

lycopersicon-esculentum.name: Lycopersicon Esculentum
lycopersicon-esculentum.essence: Marked symptoms of rheumatism and influenza. Severe aching pains all over body. *Pains left after influenza*. Head always shows signs of acute congestion. Hay-fever, with marked aggravation from breathing the least dust. Frequent urination and profuse watery diarrhoea.

agg: right side, open air, continued motion, jars, noises

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Decided decrease in pulse rate with anxiety and apprehensiveness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Tomato (SOLANUM LYCOPERSICUM)
Marked symptoms of rheumatism and influenza. Severe aching pains all over body. *Pains left after influenza*. Head always shows signs of acute congestion. Hay-fever, with marked aggravation from breathing the least dust. Frequent urination and profuse watery diarrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bursting pain, beginning in occiput and spreading all over. Whole head and scalp feels sore, bruised, after pain has ceased.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull, heavy; pupils contracted; eyeballs feel contracted; aching in and around eyes. Eyes suffused.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Profuse, watery coryza; drops down throat. Itching in anterior chamber; worse, breathing any dust; better, indoors.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Voice husky. Pain in chest, extending to head. Hoarseness; constant desire to clear throat. Expulsive cough, deep and harsh. Chest oppressed; dry, hacking cough coming on at night and keeping one awake.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constant dribbling *in open air*. Must rise at night to urinate.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Aching through back. Dull pain in lumbar region.
*Sharp pain in right deltoid and pectoralis muscles*. Pain deep in middle of right arm. Rheumatic pain in right elbow and wrist, and hands of both sides. Intense aching in lower limbs. Right crural neuralgia. Tingling along right ulnar nerve.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, right side, open air, continued motion, jars, noises. *Better*, warm room, tobacco.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Bellad* (follows well); *Eup perf; Rhus; Sanguin; Caps*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

lycopus-virginicus.name: Lycopus Virginicus
lycopus-virginicus.essence:
Lower the blood pressure, reduces the rate of the heart and increases the length of systole to a great degree. Passive haemorrhages (*Adrenaline* 6x).

A heart remedy, and of use in exophthalmic goitre and haemorrhoidal bleeding. Indicated in diseases with tumultuous action of the heart and more or less pain. *Haemoptysis due to valvular heart disease*. Beneficial in toxic goitre used in the pre-operative stage dose, 5 drops of tincture (Beebe).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Bugle-weed
Lower the blood pressure, reduces the rate of the heart and increases the length of systole to a great degree. Passive haemorrhages (*Adrenaline* 6x).
A heart remedy, and of use in exophthalmic goitre and haemorrhoidal bleeding. Indicated in diseases with tumultuous action of the heart and more or less pain. *Haemoptysis due to valvular heart disease*. Beneficial in toxic goitre used in the pre-operative stage dose, 5 drops of tincture (Beebe).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frontal headache; worse, frontal eminences; often succeeded by labored heart. Nosebleed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Protrusion, pressing, outward, with tumultuous action of heart. Supraorbital pain, with aching in testicles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Toothache in lower molars.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rapid heart action of smokers. Praecordial pain; constriction, tenderness, pulse, weak, irregular, intermittent, tremulous, rapid. Cyanosis. Heart's action tumultuous and forcible. Palpitation from nervous irritation, with oppression around heart. Rheumatoid, flying pains, associated with heart disease. Cardiac asthma (*Sumbul*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Wheezing. Cough, with *haemoptysis*, bleeding small but frequent.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Profuse flow of limpid, watery urine, especially when the heart is most irritable; also scanty urine. Bladder feels distended when empty. Diabetes. *Pain in testicles*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bleeding from rectum. Haemorrhoids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Wakefulness and morbid vigilance with inordinately active, but weak circulation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Ephedra*-Teamsters Tea--(in exophthalmic goitre; eyes feel pushed out with *tumultuous* action of heart); *Fucus; Spartein; Crataegus. Adrenaline* 6x.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to thirtieth potency.

hydrophobinum.name: Hydrophobinum
hydrophobinum.essence: Affects principally the nervous system; aching in bones. Complaints from abnormal sexual desire. Convulsions brought on by dazzling light or sight of running water.

agg: sight or sound of running water or pouring water, or even thinking of fluids

complementary: Canth; Bell; Stram; Lach; Nat mur

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Lyssin-Saliva of Rabid Dog (HYDROPHOBINUM)
Affects principally the nervous system; aching in bones. Complaints from abnormal sexual desire. Convulsions brought on by dazzling light or sight of running water.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lyssophobia; fear of becoming mad. Emotion and bad news aggravate; also, thinking of fluids. *Hypersensitiveness of all senses*. Chronic headache. Boring pain in forehead.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constant spitting; saliva tough, viscid. Sore throat; constant desire to swallow, which is difficult; gagging when swallowing water. Froths at mouth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lascivious; priapism, with frequent emissions. No emission during coition. Atrophy of testicles. Complaints from abnormal sexual desire.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Uterine sensitiveness; conscious of womb (*Helon*). Feels prolapsed. Vagina sensitive, rendering coition painful (*Berberis*). Uterine displacements.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Voice altered in tone. Breathing held for a time. Spasmodic contraction of respiratory muscles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Desire for stool on hearing or seeing running water. Profuse, watery stools, with pain in bowels; worse, evening. Constant desire to urinate on seeing running water.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, sight or sound of running water or pouring water, or even thinking of fluids; dazzling or reflected light; heat of sun; stooping.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Xanthium spinosum*-Cockle--(said to be specific for hydrophobia and is recommended for chronic cystitis in women). *Canth; Bell; Stram; Lach; Nat mur*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thirtieth potency.

magnesium-carbonicum.name: Magnesium Carbonicum
magnesium-carbonicum.essence: Gastro-intestinal catarrh, with marked acidity. Often used with advantage for complains arising in people who have been taking this drug to sweeten the stomach. Is frequently indicated in children; whole body smells sour, and disposed to boils. Broken-down, "worn-out" women, with uterine and climacteric disorders. With numbness and distension in various, parts and nerve prostration. Sensitive to the least start, noise, touch, etc. Affection of the antrum of Highmore. Effects of shock, blows, men...

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Carbonate of Magnesia (MAGNESIA CARBONICA)
Gastro-intestinal catarrh, with marked acidity. Often used with advantage for complains arising in people who have been taking this drug to sweeten the stomach. Is frequently indicated in children; whole body smells sour, and disposed to boils. Broken-down, "worn-out" women, with uterine and climacteric disorders. With numbness and distension in various, parts and nerve prostration. Sensitive to the least start, noise, touch, etc. Affection of the antrum of Highmore. Effects of shock, blows, mental distress. Sense of numbness; nerve prostration; tendency to constipation after nervous strain; *sensitive to least touch*, it causes starting, or cold winds or weather or from excess of care and worry with constipation and heaviness. Intense neuralgic pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sticking pain in the side of the head on which he lies, as if the hair was pulled; worse, mental exertion. Itching of scalp worse in damp weather. Pain above margin of right orbit. Blank motes before eyes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diminished hearing. Deafness; comes suddenly and varies. Numbness of outer ear. Feeling of distention of middle ear. Subdued tinnitus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tearing pain in one side; worse; quiet; must move about. Toothache, especially during pregnancy; worse at night; worse, cold and quiet. Teeth feel too long. Ailments from cutting wisdom teeth (*Cheiranthus*). Pain in malar bone, worse during rest, night. Swelling of malar bone with pulsating pain, worse exposure to cold wind.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry at night. Sour taste. Vesicular eruption; bloody saliva. Sticking pain in throat; hawking up fetid, pea-colored particles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Desire for fruit, acids, and vegetables. Eructations
*sour, and vomiting of bitter water*. Craving for meat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rumbling, gurgling. Dragging towards pelvis. *Very heavy*; contractive, pinching, pain in right illiac region.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Preceded by griping, colicky pain. *Green, watery, frothy, like a frog-pond's scum*. Bloody mucous stools. *Milk passes undigested in nursing children. Sour*, with tenesmus (*Rheum*). Constipation after mental shock or severe nervous strain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Sore throat before menses appear*. Before menses, coryza and nasal stoppage. Menses *too late and scanty*, thick, dark, like pitch; mucous leucorrhoea. Menses flow only in sleep; more profuse at night (*Amm m*), or when lying down; cease when walking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ticking cough, with *salty*, bloody expectoration. Constrictive pains in chest, with dyspnoea. Soreness in chest during motion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tearing in shoulders as if dislocated. Right shoulder painful, cannot raise it (*Sang*). Whole body feels tired and painful, especially legs and feet. Swelling in bend of knee.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Earthy, sallow and parchment-like; emaciation. Itching vesicles on hands and fingers. Nodosities under skin. Sore; sensitive to cold.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chilly in evening. Fever at night. Sour, greasy perspiration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Unrefreshing; more tired on rising than on retiring.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, warmth of bed; change of temperature; cold wind or weather; every *three weeks*; rest. *Better*, warm air; walking in open air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Ars; Merc*.
Complementary: *Cham*.
Compare: *Rheum; Kreos; Aloes; Cheiranthus*-Wall flower --(deafness, otorrhoea, nose stopped up at night *from irritation of cutting wisdom-teeth*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

magnesium-muriaticum.name: Magnesium Muriaticum
magnesium-muriaticum.essence: A liver remedy with pronounced characteristic constipation. Chronic liver affections with tenderness and pain, extending to spine and epigastrium, worse after food. Especially adapted to diseases of women, with a long history of indigestion and uterine disease; children who cannot digest milk. Evil effects of sea bathing.

agg: immediately after eating, lying on right side: *from sea bathing
amel: from pressure, motion: open air, except headache

complementary: Nat m; Puls; Sep; Amm m; Nasturtium equaticum

magnesium-muriaticum.dosing: 5 drops of tincture. Third to 200th potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Muriate of Magnesia (MAGNESIA MURIATICA)
A liver remedy with pronounced characteristic constipation. Chronic liver affections with tenderness and pain, extending to spine and epigastrium, worse after food. Especially adapted to diseases of women, with a long history of indigestion and uterine disease; children who cannot digest milk. Evil effects of sea bathing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensitive to noise; bursting headache; worse, motion, open air; better, pressure, and wrapping up warmly (*Sil; Stront*). Much sweating of head (*Calc, Sil*). Facial neuralgia pains, dull, aching, worse damp weather, slightest draft, better pressure heat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nostrils ulcerated, Coryza. Nose stopped and fluent. *Loss of smell and taste*, following catarrh. Cannot lie down. Must breathe through mouth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Blisters on lips. Gums swollen, bleed easily. Tongue feels burnt and scalded. Throat dry, with hoarseness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Appetite poor, had taste in mouth. Eructations like rotten eggs. Continued rising of while froth into mouth *Cannot digest milk*. Urine can be passed only by pressing abdominal muscles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pressing pain in liver; worse lying on right side. *Liver enlarged with bloating of abdomen*; yellow tongue. Congenital scrotal hernia. Must use abdominal muscles to enable him to urinate.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Urine difficult to void. Bladder can only be emptied by straining and pressure.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constipation of infants during dentition; only passing small quantity; *stools knotty*, like sheep's dung, *crumbling at verge of anus*. Painful smarting haemorrhoids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses black, clotted. Pain in back and thighs. Metrorrhagia; worse at night. Great excitement at every period. Leucorrhoea with every stool and after exercise. Tinea ciliaris, eruptions in face and forehead worse before menses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Palpitation and cardiac pain *while sitting; better by moving about* (*Gels*). Functional cardiac affections *with liver enlargement*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Spasmodic dry cough; worse forepart of night, with burning and sore chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in back and hips; in arms and legs. Arms "Go to sleep" when waking in morning.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sleep during day; restless at night on account of heat and shock: anxious dreams.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, immediately after eating, lying on right side: *from sea bathing. Better*, from pressure, motion: open air, except headache.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Antidotes: *Camph; Cham*.
Compare: *Nat m; Puls; Sep; Amm m; Nasturtium equaticum* -Water-cress--(useful in scorbutic affections and constipation, related to strictures of urinary apparatus; supposed to be aphrodisiacal in its action. Is also antidotal to *tobacco* narcosis and sedative in neurotic affections, neurasthenia, hysteria. Cirrhosis of liver and dropsy).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: 5 drops of tincture. Third to 200th potency.

magnolia-grandiflora.name: Magnolia Grandiflora
magnolia-grandiflora.essence: Rheumatism and cardiac lesions are prominent features in toe symptomatology of this drug. *Stiffness* and soreness. Alternating pains between spleen and heart. Patient tired and stiff. Soreness when quiet. Erratic shifting of pains.

agg: damp air, lying on left side

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Magnolia
Rheumatism and cardiac lesions are prominent features in toe symptomatology of this drug. *Stiffness* and soreness. Alternating pains between spleen and heart. Patient tired and stiff. Soreness when quiet. Erratic shifting of pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Oppression of chest with inability to expand the lungs. Feeling of a large bolus of food which distressed the stomach. Suffocated feeling when walking fast or lying on left side. Dyspnoea. Crampy pain in heart. Angina pectoris. Endocarditis and pericarditis. Tendency to faint. *Sensation as if heart had stopped beating*. Pains around heart accompanied by itching of the feet.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stiffness and sharp erratic pains; worse in joints. *Feet itch*. Numbness in left arm. Rheumatic pain in clavicles. Shooting in all limbs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, damp air, lying on left side; in morning on first rising. *Better*, dry weather, motion; intermenstrual flow (*Ham; Bovista; Bell; Elaps*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Rhus; Dulcam; Aurum

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

magnesium-sulphuricum.name: Magnesium Sulphuricum
magnesium-sulphuricum.essence: The skin, *urinary*, and female symptoms are most marked. The purgative action of Sulphate of Magnesia is not a quality of the drug, but a quality of its physical state, which renders its absorption impossible. The properties inherent in the substance itself can only be discovered by attenuation (Percy Wilde).
magnesium-sulphuricum.dosing: The pure salt to the third potency. Locally 1:4 in water in septic conditions, erysipelas, orchitis, boils, etc.
