materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Epsom Salt (MAGNESIA SULPHURICA)
The skin, *urinary*, and female symptoms are most marked. The purgative action of Sulphate of Magnesia is not a quality of the drug, but a quality of its physical state, which renders its absorption impossible. The properties inherent in the substance itself can only be discovered by attenuation (Percy Wilde).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Apprehensive; vertigo; head heavy during menses. Eyes burn, noises in ears.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frequent eructations, tasting like bad eggs. Rising of water in mouth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stitches and burning in the orifice of the urethra after urinating. Stream intermits and dribbles. The urine passed in the morning copious, bright yellow, soon becomes turbid, and deposits a copious red sediment. The urine is greenish as passed; is of a clear color, and in a large quantity. Diabetes (*Phos ac; Lact ac; Ars brom*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thick leucorrhoea, as profuse as the menses, with weary pain in the small of the back and thighs, on moving about. Some blood from the vagina between the menses. Menstruation returned after fourteen days; the discharge was thick, black, and profuse. Menses too early, intermit.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bruised and ulcerative pain between the shoulders, with a feeling as of a lump as large as the first, on which account she could not lie upon her back or side; relieved by rubbing. Violent pain in the small of the back, as if bruised, and as before menstruation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: The left arm and foot fall asleep in bed, in the morning after waking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Small pimples over the whole body, that itch violently. Suppressed itch (*Sulph*). Crawling in the tips of the fingers of the left hand; better on rubbing. *Warts*. Erysipelas (applied locally as a saturated solution). Dropsy (physiological doses).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chill from 9 to 10 am. Shuddering in back; heat in one part and chill in another.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: It is claimed that the addition of a small amount of *Magnes. Sulph* to the usual hypodermic of Morphine increases the value of the hypodermic from 50 to 100 %.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Magnes. Sulph is of diagnostic and therapeutic value in Gallstone colic. From 2 to 4 teaspoonfuls in glass hot water taken at onset of a colicky attack may abort or stop the colic.
Epsom salt is one of the most active saline cathertics, operating with little pain or nausea, especially if pure. It has but little if any effect on intestinal peristalsis, its action causing a rush of fluid into the intestine, which by producing a distention of the bowel produces evacuation. It causes little or no irritation in the intestine. In common with the other salines, it is the classical evacuant to be employed in connection with mercurials and anthelmintics and in cases of poisoning. Epsom salt usually acts within from one to two hours, more quickly if taken in hot water and in the morning before breakfast. The ordinary dose as a mild laxative is a heaping teaspoonful; as a cathartic, two to four teaspoonfuls. The taste may be improved, if necessary, by the addition of a little lemon juice and sugar.
Besides its chief use as a saline cathartic, magnesium sulphate is used to a considerable extent externally in saturated solution as an antiphlogistic and antipruritic in erysipelas, ivy poisoning, cellulitis and other local inflammations. Use on compresses saturated with solution.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: The pure salt to the third potency. Locally 1:4 in water in septic conditions, erysipelas, orchitis, boils, etc.

malandrinum.name: Malandrinum
malandrinum.essence: A very effectual protection against smallpox. Ill effects of vaccination (*Thuja; Silica*). Efficacious in clearing of the remnants of cancerous deposits (Copper).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Grease in Horses
A very effectual protection against smallpox. Ill effects of vaccination (*Thuja; Silica*). Efficacious in clearing of the remnants of cancerous deposits (Copper).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scab on upper lip, with stinging pain when torn off. Aching in forehead. *Dry, scaly; itching; rhagades of hands and feet in cold weather and from washing*. Toes feel scalded and itch terribly. Bone-like protuberances.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thirtieth potency and highest.

mancinella.name: Mancinella
mancinella.essence: Skin symptoms most marked. Dermatitis, with excessive vesiculation, oozing of sticky serum and formation of crusts. To be remembered in mental depressed states at puberty and at climacteric, with exalted sexuality (Hering). *Loss of vision*. Pain in the *thumb*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Intense erythema. *Vesicles*. Fungoid growths. Erysipelas. *Large blisters, as from scalds*. Heavy, brown crusts and scabs. *Pemphigus*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Croton; Jatropha; Canth; Anacard*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Hippomane-Manganeel Apple
Skin symptoms most marked. Dermatitis, with excessive vesiculation, oozing of sticky serum and formation of crusts. To be remembered in mental depressed states at puberty and at climacteric, with exalted sexuality (Hering). *Loss of vision*. Pain in the *thumb*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Silent mood, sadness. Wandering thoughts. *Sudden vanishing of thought*. Bashful. *Fear of becoming insane*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo; head feels lights, empty. Scalp itches. Hair falls out after acute sickness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Illusions of smell; of gunpowder, dung, etc. Pressure at root of nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels peppery. Copious, offensive saliva. Taste of blood. Burning of fauces. Dysphagia from constriction of throat and oesophagus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Continual choking sensation rising from stomach. Vomiting of ingesta, followed by gripping and copious stools. Burning pains and black vomit.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Icy coldness of hands and feet. Pain in thumb.

manganum-aceticum-c.name: Manganum Aceticum (+ -c.)
manganum-aceticum-c.essence:
Manganum causes anaemia with destruction of the red corpuscles. Jaundice, nephritis with albuminuria. Fatty degeneration of liver. Paralysis agitans. *Cellulitis*, subacute stage, promotes suppuration and hastens regeneration.

Symptoms of chronic poisoning, according to Professor yon Jaksch, were involuntary laughter and involuntary weeping and walking backwards. Strongly exaggerated reflexes and physical disturbances, evidenced by men making fun of each other's gait. Paraplegia progressive; wa...

agg: cold wet weather, change of weather

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Manganese Acetate
Manganum causes anaemia with destruction of the red corpuscles. Jaundice, nephritis with albuminuria. Fatty degeneration of liver. Paralysis agitans. *Cellulitis*, subacute stage, promotes suppuration and hastens regeneration.
Symptoms of chronic poisoning, according to Professor yon Jaksch, were involuntary laughter and involuntary weeping and walking backwards. Strongly exaggerated reflexes and physical disturbances, evidenced by men making fun of each other's gait. Paraplegia progressive; wasting, feeble and staggering gait.
Inflammation of bones or joints, with nightly digging pains Asthmatic persons who cannot lie on a feather pillow. Syphilitic and chlorotic patients with general anaemia and paralytic symptoms often are benefited by this drug. Gout. Chronic arthritis. For speakers and singers. Great accumulation of mucus. Growing pains and weak ankles. General soreness and aching; every part of the body feels sore when touched; early tuberculosis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Anxiety and fear; *better lying down*. Feels large and heavy, with rush of blood; pain from above downward. Field of vision contracted. Stolidy mask-like face.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nodes on palate. Toothache; *worse*, anything cold (*Coff* opposite). Hemming all the time. Low, monotonous voice.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry, obstructed. Chronic catarrh, with bleeding, dryness; *worse in cold damp weather*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feel stopped; cracking on blowing nose. *Pain from other parts extends to ears*. Deafness *in damp weather*. Whistling tinnitus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue sore and irritable with ulcers or warts. Flatulence; chronic enlargement of liver.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Chronic hoarseness*. Larynx dry, rough, constricted. Tuberculosis of larynx. Cough; worse evening, and *better lying down* and worse in damp weather. Mucus difficult to loosen. Stitches in larynx extending to ear. Heat in chest. Haemoptysis. *Every cold rouses up a bronchitis* (*Dulc*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Derangements of menstruation, amenorrhoea; menses too early and scanty, in anaemic subjects. *Flushes of heat at climacteric*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Muscular twitching. Cramps in calves. Stiffness in muscles of legs. Inflammation of bones and joints with insupportable nightly digging pains. *Every part of body feels sore when touched*. Cannot walk backwards without falling. *Tending to fall forward. Walks stooping forward*. Legs feel numb. Wilson's disease. Paralysis agitans. Peculiar slapping gait, walks on metacarpo-phalangeal joint; walks backwards. Ankles painful. Bones very sensitive. Shiny red swelling of joints. *Knees pain* and itch. Rheumatism of feet. Intolerable pain in skin of lower limbs. Burning spots about joints. Periosteal inflammation. Suppuration of skin around joints.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Languor and sleepiness. Vivid dreams. Sleepy very early in evening.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Suppuration of skin around joints. Red, elevated spots.
*Itching*; better, scratching. Deep cracks in bends of elbows, etc. Psoriasis and pityriasis. Burning around ulcers. *Chronic eczema* associated with amenorrhoea, worse at menstrual period or at menopause.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, cold wet weather, change of weather. *Better*, lying down (cough)

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Colloidal Manganese* (Boils and other staphylococcal infections); *Mangan mur* (painful ankles, bone-pains); *Mangan oxydat* (pain in tibia, dysmenorrhoea, colic, and diarrhoea. Easily fatigued and heated; sleepy. Stolid, mask-like facies; low monotonous voice "Economical Speech". Muscular twitching, cramps in calves; stiff leg muscles; occasional uncontrollable laughter. Peculiar slapping gait. Similar symptoms to paralysis agitans, progressive lenticular degenerations and pseudo sclerosis. Workers in Mangan binoxide are frequently affected with bulbar paralysis. Use 3x homeopathically). *Mangan sulph* (liver affections, excess of bile; a powerful intestinal stimulant); *Argent; Rhus; Sulph*.
Antidotes: *Coff; Merc*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

mangifera-indica.name: Mangifera Indica
mangifera-indica.essence: One of the best general remedies for passive haemorrhages, uterine, renal, gastric, pulmonary and intestinal. Rhinitis, sneezing, pharyngitis, and other acute throat troubles, suffocative sensation as if throat would close. Relaxation of mucous membrane of alimentary canal. Catarrhal and serous discharges, chronic intestinal irritation. Varicose veins. Drowsiness. Atomic conditions, poor circulation, relaxed muscles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Mango Tree
One of the best general remedies for passive haemorrhages, uterine, renal, gastric, pulmonary and intestinal. Rhinitis, sneezing, pharyngitis, and other acute throat troubles, suffocative sensation as if throat would close. Relaxation of mucous membrane of alimentary canal. Catarrhal and serous discharges, chronic intestinal irritation. Varicose veins. Drowsiness. Atomic conditions, poor circulation, relaxed muscles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching of palms. Skin as if sunburned, swollen. White spots, intense itching. Lobes of ears and lips swollen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Erigeron; Epilobium*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture.

medorrhinum.name: Medorrhinum
medorrhinum.essence: A powerful and deep-acting medicine, often indicated for chronic ailments due to suppressed gonorrhoea. For women with chronic pelvic disorders. Chronic *rheumatism*. Great disturbance and irritability of nervous system. Pains intolerable; tensive; nerves quiver and tingle. Children dwarfed and stunted. Chronic catarrhal conditions in children. Nose dirty, tonsils enlarged, thick yellow mucus from nostrils; lips thickened from mouth breathing. State of collapse and *trembling all over*. History ...

agg: when thinking of ailment, *from daylight to sunset*, heat, inland
amel: at the seashore, lying on stomach, damp weather (*Caust*)

medorrhinum.dosing: The very highest potencies only of service. Must not be repeated often.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Can pass stool only by leaning very far back. Painful lump sensation on posterior surface of sphincter. Oozing of fetid moisture. *Intense itching of anus*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Painful tenesmus when urinating. *Nocturnal enuresis*. Renal colic (*Berb; Ocim; Pareir*). Urine flows very slowly.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
The Gonorrhoeal Virus
A powerful and deep-acting medicine, often indicated for chronic ailments due to suppressed gonorrhoea. For women with chronic pelvic disorders. Chronic *rheumatism*. Great disturbance and irritability of nervous system. Pains intolerable; tensive; nerves quiver and tingle. Children dwarfed and stunted. Chronic catarrhal conditions in children. Nose dirty, tonsils enlarged, thick yellow mucus from nostrils; lips thickened from mouth breathing. State of collapse and *trembling all over*. History of sycosis. Often restores a gonorrhoeal discharge. Intensity of all sensations. OEdema of limbs; dropsy of serous sacs. Disseminated sclerosis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Weak memory. Loses the thread of conversation. Cannot speak without weeping. *Time passes too slowly* (*Cannab ind; Arg n*). Is in a great hurry. Hopeless of recovery. Difficult concentration. Fears going insane (*Mancinella*). Sensibility exalted. Nervous, restless. Fear in the dark and of some one behind her. Melancholy, with suicidal thoughts.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning pain in brain; worse, occiput. Head heavy and drawn backward. Headache from jarring of cars, exhaustion, or hard work. Weight and pressure in vertex. Hair dry, crispy. Itching of scalp; dandruff.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels *as if she stared*at everything. Eyeballs ache. Feels as if sticks in eyes. Lids irritated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Partial deafness, pulsation in ears. Quick, darting pains in right ear.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Intense itching. Coldness of tip. Posterior nares obstructed. Chronic nasal and pharyngeal catarrhs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pallor, acne, blotches of reddish color. *Small boils* break out during menses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue coated brown and thick, blistered; canker sores. Blisters on inner surface of lips and cheeks.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coppery taste and eructations of sulphuretted hydrogen. Ravenous hunger soon after eating. *Very thirsty*. Cravings for liquor, salt, sweets, etc, warm drinks. Pernicious vomiting of pregnancy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent pain in liver and spleen. Rests more comfortably lying on abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Intense pruritus. Menses *offensive*, profuse, dark, clotted; stains difficult to wash out, urinates frequently at that time. *Sensitive spot near os uteri*. Leucorrhoea thin, acrid, excoriating, fishy odor. Sycotic warts on genitals. Ovarian pain, worse left side, or from ovary to ovary. *Sterility*. Metrorrhagia. Intense menstrual colic. Breasts *cold*, sore, and sensitive.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nocturnal emissions, followed by great weakness. *Impotence*. Gleet; whole urethra feels sore. Urethritis. Enlarged and painful prostate with frequent urging and painful urination.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Much oppression of breathing. Hoarse while reading. Pain and soreness through chest and mammae. Incessant, dry, night cough. Asthma. Incipient consumption. Larynx feels sore. Dyspnoea; cannot exhale (*Samb*). Cough; better lying on stomach.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in back, with burning heat. Legs heavy; ache all night; *cannot keep them still* (*Zinc*). Ankles easily turn when walking. Burning of hands feet. Finger-joints enlarged, puffy. Gouty concretions. *Heels and balls of feet tender* (*Thuja*). *Soreness of soles*. Restless; better, clutching hands.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Yellow. Intense and incessant *itching*; worse night and when thinking of it. Fiery red rash about anus in babies. Copper-colored spots. Favus. Tumors and abnormal growth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Wants to be fanned all the time. Chills up and down back; coldness of legs, hands, and forearms. Flashes of heat in face and neck. Night-sweat and hectic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dreams she is drinking (*Ars; Phos*). Sleeps in knee-chest position.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, when thinking of ailment, *from daylight to sunset*, heat, inland. *Better*, at the seashore, lying on stomach, damp weather (*Caust*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: (Lactation: *Galega; Lactuca*). *Sulph; Syphil; Zinc*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: The very highest potencies only of service. Must not be repeated often.

medusa.name: Medusa
medusa.essence: Whole face puffed oedematous-eyes, nose, ears, lips.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Jelly-fish
Whole face puffed oedematous-eyes, nose, ears, lips.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Numbness; burning, pricking heat. Vesicular eruption especially on face, arms, shoulders, and breasts. *Nettlerash* (*Apis; Chloral; Dulc*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Marked action on *lacteal glands*. The secretion of milk was established after lack of it in all previous confinements.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Pyrarara, Physalia* (urticaria); *Urtica, Homar, Sep*.

mel-cum-sale.name: Mel Cum Sale
mel-cum-sale.essence: Prolapsus uteri and chronic metritis, especially when associated with subinvolution and inflammation of the cervix. The special symptom leading to its selection is a *feeling of soreness across the hypogastrium from ileum to ileum*. Uterine displacements, and in the commencement of metritis Sensation as if bladder were too full. Pain from sacrum towards pubes. Pain as if in ureters.
mel-cum-sale.dosing: Third to sixth potency. Honey for itching of anus and worms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Honey with Salt
Prolapsus uteri and chronic metritis, especially when associated with subinvolution and inflammation of the cervix. The special symptom leading to its selection is a *feeling of soreness across the hypogastrium from ileum to ileum*. Uterine displacements, and in the commencement of metritis Sensation as if bladder were too full. Pain from sacrum towards pubes. Pain as if in ureters.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to sixth potency. Honey for itching of anus and worms.

melilotus-officinalis.name: Melilotus Officinalis
melilotus-officinalis.essence: Congestions and haemorrhages seem to be the special manifestations of this drug. Violent congestive and nervous headaches. Infantile spasms. Epilepsy from blow on head. *Pain* and *debility* point to it. Coldness but also increase of temperature; tenderness, and pain. Muscular system depressed. Dreams and emissions.

agg: rainy, changeable weather, approach of storm, motion

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Yellow Melilot - Sweet Clover (MELILOTUS)
Congestions and haemorrhages seem to be the special manifestations of this drug. Violent congestive and nervous headaches. Infantile spasms. Epilepsy from blow on head. *Pain* and *debility* point to it. Coldness but also increase of temperature; tenderness, and pain. Muscular system depressed. Dreams and emissions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Unable to fix mind. Memory treacherous. Stupor. Wants to run away and hide. Delusions; thinks every one is looking at her, fears to talk loud, and wants to run away, etc.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Headache with retching, vomiting, sense of pressure over orbits, pallor, cold hands and feet, black spots before eyes. Heavy, oppressed; *frontal, throbbing*, undulating sensation in brain. *Sick headache*; relieved by epistaxis or *menstrual flow*. *Fullness all over head*. Eyes heavy; blurred sight; wants to close them tightly for relief. *Neuralgia* around and over right side of head and neck. Scalp sore and tender to touch.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stopped up, *dry*, must breathe through mouth; dry, hard clinkers in nose; *profuse epistaxis*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Intensely red and flushed, with throbbing carotids (*Bell*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Difficult, painful, constipated. Anus feels constricted, full, *throbs*. No desire until there is a large accumulation (*Bry; Alum*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses *scanty, intermit*, with nausea and bearing down sticking pain in external parts. Dysmenorrhoea. Ovarian neuralgia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels as if smothering, especially from rapid walking. Haemoptysis. Weight on chest. Tickling in throat with cough.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in knee; wants to stretch leg, but does not relieve. Joints sore. Skin and extremities cold. Numbness and aching in knee-joints.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, rainy, changeable weather, approach of storm, motion; 4 pm.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Melilotus alba*--(White Clover)--practically the same action (Haemorrhages, congestive headaches, engorged blood vessels, spasms). *Amyl; Bell; Glon*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, for inhaling; lower potencies.

menispermum-canadense.name: Menispermum Canadense
menispermum-canadense.essence: A remedy for megrim, associated with restlessness and dreams. Pain in spine. Dryness, itching all over. Dry mouth and throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Moonseed (MENISPERMUM)
A remedy for megrim, associated with restlessness and dreams. Pain in spine. Dryness, itching all over. Dry mouth and throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pressure *from within outward*, with *stretching and yawning* and pain down back. Sick headache; pain in forehead and temples, moving to occiput. Tongue swollen and much saliva.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in back, thighs, elbows, shoulders. Legs sore, as if bruised.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Cocculus; Bryon*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

mentha-piperita.name: Mentha Piperita
mentha-piperita.essence: Stimulates the cold-perceiving nerves, so just after taking it, a current of air at the ordinary temperature seems cold. Marked action on respiratory organs and skin. Useful in gastrodynia, flatulent cold.
mentha-piperita.dosing: Tincture, 1 to 20 drops, to thirtieth potency. Locally, in pruritus vaginae.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Peppermint
Stimulates the cold-perceiving nerves, so just after taking it, a current of air at the ordinary temperature seems cold. Marked action on respiratory organs and skin. Useful in gastrodynia, flatulent cold.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bloated, disturbing sleep. Infantile colic. Bilious colic with great accumulation of gas.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Voice husky. Tip of nose to touch. Throat dry and sore, as if pin crosswise in it. *Dry cough, worse from air into larynx, tobacco smoke, fog*, talking; *with irritation in suprasternal fossa* (*Rumex*). *Trachea painful to touch*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Every scratch becomes a sore. Itching of arm and hand when writing. Vaginal pruritus. Herpes zoster (*Ars; Ran bulb*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Rumex; Laches; Mentha pulegium*--European pennyroyal--(pain in bones of forehead and extremities). *Mentha viridis*-Spearmint--(scanty urine with frequent desire).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, 1 to 20 drops, to thirtieth potency. Locally, in pruritus vaginae.

mentholum.name: Mentholum
mentholum.essence: The stearopten from the essential oil of Mentha. Mucous membrane of naso-pharynx and spinal nerve plexus, producing neuritic pains and parethesias. Menthol has proved curative in acute nasal catarrh; in acute eustachian catarrh; pharyngitis; laryngitis; neuralgias, etc (Wm. B. Griggs, M. D). Itching, especially *pruritus* valvae.
mentholum.dosing: Sixth potency. Externally for itching, use 1 per cent solution or ointment.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
**(MENTHOL)**
The stearopten from the essential oil of Mentha. Mucous membrane of naso-pharynx and spinal nerve plexus, producing neuritic pains and parethesias. Menthol has proved curative in acute nasal catarrh; in acute eustachian catarrh; pharyngitis; laryngitis; neuralgias, etc (Wm. B. Griggs, M. D). Itching, especially *pruritus* valvae.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frontal headache, pain over frontal sinus, descends to eyeballs. Mental confusion. Supra orbital pain over left eye. Pain in face above zygoma with numbness. Pain in eyeballs. Coryza with post-nasal dripping. Cold sensation in nose. Eustachian tubes feel blocked and some deafness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tickling in the fauces. Stabbing pains in the praecordia, radiating over entire chest. Short, dry cough, worse smoking. Asthmatic breathing, with congestive headache.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Muscular pain in cervical region, Soreness of lumbar muscles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Kali bich; Spigel*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency. Externally for itching, use 1 per cent solution or ointment.

menyanthes-trifoliata.name: Menyanthes Trifoliata
menyanthes-trifoliata.essence: A remedy for certain headaches, intermittent fever. Coldness of abdomen. Twitchings. Sensation of tension and compression. Fidgets and urinary difficulties in women. Diabetes.

amel: pressure on affected part, stooping, motion

complementary: Caps; Puls; Calc; Phos ac; Sang

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Buck-bean (MENYANTHES)
A remedy for certain headaches, intermittent fever. Coldness of abdomen. Twitchings. Sensation of tension and compression. Fidgets and urinary difficulties in women. Diabetes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pressing in vertex; *better, hard pressure with hand*. Pressing-together pain. Weight pressing on brain with every step on ascending. Pain from nape over whole brain; better, stooping, sitting; worse, going upstairs. Cracking in jaw and twitching of facial muscles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: No thirst at any time. Revenous hunger; passing away after eating a little. Desire for meat. Sensation of coldness extending up to oesophagus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Distended and full; increased by smoking tobacco. Coldness of abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Icy coldness of hands and feet*. Cramp-like pain. As soon as patient lies down, *legs jerk and twitch*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coldness predominates; felt most acutely in abdomen and legs and tip of nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, during rest, ascending *better*, pressure on affected part, stooping, motion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Caps; Puls; Calc; Phos ac; Sang*.
Antidote: *Camph*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

mephitis-putorius.name: Mephitis Putorius
mephitis-putorius.essence: A great medicine for *whooping-cough*. In order to insure its full success, it should be given in the lower dilutions from 1x to 3x. Suffocative feeling, asthmatic paroxysms, spasmodic cough; cough so violent, seems as if each spell would terminate life. Child must be raised up, gets blue in face, cannot exhale, Mucous rales through upper part of chest. Patient wants to bathe in ice-cold water.
mephitis-putorius.dosing: First to third potency. Has a very short action.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Skunk (MEPHITIS)
A great medicine for *whooping-cough*. In order to insure its full success, it should be given in the lower dilutions from 1x to 3x. Suffocative feeling, asthmatic paroxysms, spasmodic cough; cough so violent, seems as if each spell would terminate life. Child must be raised up, gets blue in face, cannot exhale, Mucous rales through upper part of chest. Patient wants to bathe in ice-cold water.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Excited, full of fancies. Can neither sleep nor work.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain from overexertion; blur; unable to distinguish letters; conjunctiva red; eyes hot and painful.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Painful jerks in root of teeth. Bloated face. Coppery taste, as after eating onions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sudden contraction of glottis, when drinking or talking. *Food goes down wrong way*. False croup; *cannot exhale. Spasmodic and whooping-cough. Few paroxysms in day-time, but many at night*; with vomiting after eating. Asthma, as if inhaling sulphur; cough from talking; hollow, deep, with rawness, hoarseness, and pains through chest. *Violent spasmodic cough; worse* at night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Awakes at night with rush of blood to lower legs. Vivid dream of water, fire, etc.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Dros; Coral; Sticta*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third potency. Has a very short action.

mercurius-corrosivus.name: Mercurius Corrosivus
mercurius-corrosivus.essence: This salt leads all other remedies in tenesmus of the rectum, which is incessant, and is not relieved by the stool. The tenesmus often involves the bladder as well. Bright's disease. Gonorrhoea; second stage, with continuous tenesmus. Destroys the secreting portions of the kidneys. This process is slow, but sure. Albuminuria in early pregnancy (*Phosph* later and at full term).
mercurius-corrosivus.dosing: Sixth potency. In solution 1:1000, hypodermically injected under conjunctiva in choroditis with progressive myopia. Stops immediately the severe aching pain behind eye-balls (Dr. G. D. Hallet).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Penis and testes enormously swollen. Chancres assume phagedaenic appearance. *Gonorrhoea*; urethra orifice red, swollen; glans sore and hot. Discharge greenish, thick.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chilly from slightest exposure. Profuse perspiration; surface cold.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, evening, night, acids, *Better*, while at rest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in larynx as cut with knife. Aphonia. Cough, with bloody expectoration. Pulse rapid and intermittent. Stitches through side of chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Intense burning in urethra. Urine hot, burning, scanty or *suppressed*; bloody, *greenish discharge. Albuminous. Tenesmus of bladder*. Stabbing pain extending up urethra into bladder. Perspiration after urinating.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Corrosive Sublimate
This salt leads all other remedies in tenesmus of the rectum, which is incessant, and is not relieved by the stool. The tenesmus often involves the bladder as well. Bright's disease. Gonorrhoea; second stage, with continuous tenesmus. Destroys the secreting portions of the kidneys. This process is slow, but sure. Albuminuria in early pregnancy (*Phosph* later and at full term).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Delirium, stupor. Frontal pain, congestion of head with burning in cheeks. Drawing pain in periosteum of skull.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain behind eyeballs, as if forced out. Phlyctenulae; deep ulcers on cornea. Excessive photophobia and *acrid lachrymation. Iritis*, ordinary or syphilitic (Give in association with atropin locally for prevention of adhesions). Pain severe at night; burning, shooting, tearing. Little tendency to pus formation. *Iris muddy in color, thick, and neither contracts nor dilates*. Retinitis albuminuric, ophthalmia neonatorum. *Lids oedematous*, red, excoriated. *Severe burning. Soreness of the eyes*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Excessive coryza. Ozaena, with perforation of septum nasi (*Kali bich*). Rawness and smarting in nostrils. Post-nasal swelling, mucous membrane dry, red, and covered with bloody mucus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent pulsations. Fetid pus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Swollen. Red, puffy. Lips black, swollen. Sordes. Facial neuralgia within the bones.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Teeth loose. Gums purple, swollen, and spongy. Tongue swollen and inflamed. Salivation. Pyorrhea. Ptyalism. Taste salty and bitter.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Red, swollen, painful, intensely inflamed. Uvula swollen. Swallowing painful*. Most pain in *post-nasal with sharp pains to ears. Burning pain, with great swelling; worse, slight external pressure*. All glands about thorax swollen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Incessant, green, bilious vomiting. Epigastrium very sensitive.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bruised sensation; cecal region and transverse colon painful. Bloated; very painful to least touch.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dysentery; tenesmus, not relieved by stool; incessant. Stool hot, bloody, slimy, offensive, with cutting pains and shreds of mucous membrane.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Ars; Lach; Leonurus-Mother-wort* (Influences pelvic organs, allays spasm and nervous irritability, promotes secretion and reduces febrile excitement. Valuable in suppressed menses and *lochia*; dysentery; vomiting, frightful pains in abdomen, violent thirst. Tongue dry and cracked). *Monsonia*--An African plant belonging to the Geraniaceae--(Used for dysentery in material doses).
Antidote: *Calcium sulphide* is antidotal to Bichloride poisoning. Use intravenous injection of 7 1/2 grains in 7 1/2 ozs boiled water.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency. In solution 1:1000, hypodermically injected under conjunctiva in choroditis with progressive myopia. Stops immediately the severe aching pain behind eye-balls (Dr. G. D. Hallet).

mercurius-cyanatus.name: Mercurius Cyanatus
mercurius-cyanatus.essence:
Acute infections, pneumonia, nephritis. Its action is similar to that of the toxines of infections diseases. Great and rapid prostration, tendency toward haemorrhages, from the different orifices, of dark fluid blood, cyanosis, rapid respiration and heart action, albuminuria and twitching and jerking of muscles. Typhoid pneumonia.

Livid states from great struggling, where suffocation is imminent and paralysis of lung threatening; great sweat.

Affects most prominently the buccal cavity. This, t...
mercurius-cyanatus.dosing: Sixth to thirtieth potency. Aggravation is apt to occur from potencies below the sixth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Cyanide of Mercury
Acute infections, pneumonia, nephritis. Its action is similar to that of the toxines of infections diseases. Great and rapid prostration, tendency toward haemorrhages, from the different orifices, of dark fluid blood, cyanosis, rapid respiration and heart action, albuminuria and twitching and jerking of muscles. Typhoid pneumonia.
Livid states from great struggling, where suffocation is imminent and paralysis of lung threatening; great sweat.
Affects most prominently the buccal cavity. This, together with marked prostration, gives it a place in the treatment of *diphtheria*, where it has achieved unquestioned great results. Malignant types, with prostration. Coldness and nausea. Syphilitic ulcers when perforation threatens.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Great excitement, fits of passion; fury; talkativeness. Atrocious headache. Eyes sunken; face pale.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Covered with ulcerations. Tongue pale. Free salivation. Fetor of breath. Pain and swelling of salivary glands. Astringent taste. *Ulcerations* of mouth have a gray membrane.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels raw and sore. Mucous membranes broken down, ulcerated. Looks raw in spots, especially in public speakers. Hoarseness, and talking is painful. *Necrotic destruction of soft parts of palate and fauces*. Intense redness of fauces. Swallowing very difficult. Dark blood from nose. Diphtheria of the larynx and nose (*Kali bich*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nausea, vomiting, bilious, bloody; hiccough; abdomen painful, tender to pressure.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Intolerable pain. Redness around anus. Frequent haemorrhage; stools with tenesmus. Discharge of fetid liquid with gangrenous odor. Black stools.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Amber color, painful, albuminous, scanty. Nephritis with great debility and chilliness. Suppression of urine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Moisture, with icy coldness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth potency. Aggravation is apt to occur from potencies below the sixth.

mercurius-dulcis.name: Mercurius Dulcis
mercurius-dulcis.essence: Has marked effect on catarrhal inflammation of ear, and useful in Eustachian catarrh, deafness. Diarrhoea, with soreness of anus. *Prostatitis*. Remittent bilious attacks. *Pallor, flabby bloatedness*, and turgid flaccidity. Inflammation with plastic exudate. Especially indicated in systems disposed to remittent bilious fevers; in peritonitis and meningitis *with plastic exudate*. Dropsies due to combined renal and cardiac diseases, especially with jaundice (Hale). Cirrhosis of the liver, especi...
mercurius-dulcis.dosing: Third to sixth trituration. For palliative (non-homeopathic) purposes, to secure evacuation of bowels, two or three-grain doses of first decimal trituration, repeated several times every hour.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Calomel
Has marked effect on catarrhal inflammation of ear, and useful in Eustachian catarrh, deafness. Diarrhoea, with soreness of anus. *Prostatitis*. Remittent bilious attacks. *Pallor, flabby bloatedness*, and turgid flaccidity. Inflammation with plastic exudate. Especially indicated in systems disposed to remittent bilious fevers; in peritonitis and meningitis *with plastic exudate*. Dropsies due to combined renal and cardiac diseases, especially with jaundice (Hale). Cirrhosis of the liver, especially in the hypertrophic form. Use 1x (Jousset).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Otitis media; closure of Eustachian tube; ear troubles of scrofulous children; membrana tympani retracted, thickened and immovable.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Offensive breath; salivation; sore gums. Ulcers. Tongue black. Constant flow of dark, putrid saliva; very offensive. Ulceration of throat, with dysphagia. Granular pharyngitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nausea and vomiting. Cyclic vomiting of infants (*Cup ars; Iris*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scanty, bloody mucus, with bile, and *constant desire*, without tenesmus. Dark-green, watery, with griping. *Anus sore* and burning. Dysentery; small stools of *mucus and blood, covered with bile*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Flabby and ill nourished*. Swollen glands. Phagedenic ulcers. Copper-colored eruptions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Kali mur*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to sixth trituration. For palliative (non-homeopathic) purposes, to secure evacuation of bowels, two or three-grain doses of first decimal trituration, repeated several times every hour.

mercurius-iodatus-flavus.name: Mercurius Iodatus Flavus
mercurius-iodatus-flavus.essence: Throat affections, with greatly swollen glands and characteristic coating of tongue. Worse, right side. Chancre; induration remains long time. Swollen inguinal glands, large and hard. *Mammary tumors*, with tendency to much warm perspiration and gastric disturbances.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Proto-iodide of Mercury
Throat affections, with greatly swollen glands and characteristic coating of tongue. Worse, right side. Chancre; induration remains long time. Swollen inguinal glands, large and hard. *Mammary tumors*, with tendency to much warm perspiration and gastric disturbances.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Coated thickly; yellow at the base*. Tip and edges may be red and take imprint of teeth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lacunar tonsillitis. When only the superficial part of the tonsil is involved. Cheesy exudates with offensive breath. Swelling begins on right side. Small ulcers on posterior pharynx. Easily detached patches on inflamed pharynx and fauces; *worse on right tonsil*; much tenacious mucus. Sensation of a lump. *Constant inclination to swallow*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Plum iod* (in mammary tumors).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second trituration.

mercurius-iodatus-ruber.name: Mercurius Iodatus Ruber
mercurius-iodatus-ruber.essence: Diphtheria and ulcerated sore throats, especially on left side, with much glandular swelling. Chronic suppurating buboes. Hard chancres. Old cases of syphilis in scrofulous patients. Early stages of cold, especially in children.
mercurius-iodatus-ruber.dosing: Third trituration. Mercuric iodide is far more active as a bactericide than the other mercurials, including the chloride.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Bin-iodide of Mercury
Diphtheria and ulcerated sore throats, especially on left side, with much glandular swelling. Chronic suppurating buboes. Hard chancres. Old cases of syphilis in scrofulous patients. Early stages of cold, especially in children.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Fauces dark red*; swallowing painful. Phlegm in nose and throat. Disposition to hawk, with sensation of a lump in throat. *Stiffness of muscles of throat and neck*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coryza and dull hearing; right side of nose hot. Hawks mucus from posterior nares. Turbinated bones swollen. Boggy mucus membrane of nose and throat; closure of Eustachian tube, opening with a pop.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Gums swollen; toothache; glands swollen. Scalded feeling on tongue. Aphthae. Profuse saliva. Tongue feels stiff at base, and pains on moving.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diphtheria; submaxillary glands painfully engorged, fauces dark red; *worse on left tonsil*. Parenchymatous tonsillitis. Will often abort peritonsillitis if given frequently. Cough form elongated uvula, with sore throat, Laryngeal troubles with aphonia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Small fissures and cracks; hard papules; *Hunterian chancre*; syphilitic ulcers. Bubo. Sarcocele.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third trituration. Mercuric iodide is far more active as a bactericide than the other mercurials, including the chloride.

mercurius-sulphuricus.name: Mercurius Sulphuricus
mercurius-sulphuricus.essence:
Turpethum Minerale--Yellow Sulphate of Mercury (MERCURIUS SULPHURICUS - HYDRARG. OXYD. SUB-SULPH.)

Watery stools, burning in anus. Sore tip of tongue. OEdema of legs. Sneezing from direct rays of sun. Diarrhoea early in the morning; stool bursts out in a hot stream of yellow matter. Intense evacuations, like rice-water. Scanty, clear, scalding urine. *Intense dyspnoea*; must sit up. Respiration rapid, short; burning in chest. *Hydrothorax* (*Ars*). Cardiac pain and weakness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Turpethum Minerale--Yellow Sulphate of Mercury (MERCURIUS SULPHURICUS - HYDRARG. OXYD. SUB-SULPH.)
Watery stools, burning in anus. Sore tip of tongue. OEdema of legs. Sneezing from direct rays of sun. Diarrhoea early in the morning; stool bursts out in a hot stream of yellow matter. Intense evacuations, like rice-water. Scanty, clear, scalding urine. *Intense dyspnoea*; must sit up. Respiration rapid, short; burning in chest. *Hydrothorax* (*Ars*). Cardiac pain and weakness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Mercur acet* (cutting in urethra when last drop is flowing out).

mercurialis-perennis.name: Mercurialis Perennis
mercurialis-perennis.essence: Great exhaustion and drowsiness. Tumor at ensiform appendix, very sensitive. Affections of the muscular fibers of stomach, intestines, bladder.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Dog's Mercury
Great exhaustion and drowsiness. Tumor at ensiform appendix, very sensitive. Affections of the muscular fibers of stomach, intestines, bladder.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo on going down stairs. Head confused. Pain as from a band tightly across forehead. Nostrils sore, conscious of nose, feels as if she had two noses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Great dryness of mouth and throat, tongue feels heavy and dry, numb. Burning blisters of tongue, lips and cheeks. Ulcers on palate, tonsils and back of pharynx. Dryness of throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Amenorrhoea*, scanty menses, accompanied with orgasms. Pains and swelling of breasts. Dysmenorrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Borax; Croton; Euphorb*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

methylene-blue.name: Methylene Blue
methylene-blue.essence: A remedy for neuralgia, neurasthenia, malaria; *typhoid*, here it diminishes the tympanites, delirium, and fever; pus infection. Tendency to tremor, chorea and epilepsy. Nephritis (acute parenchymatous), scarlatinal nephritis. Urine acquires a green color. Bladder irritation from its use antidoted by a little nutmeg. Surgical kidney with large amount of pus in urine. Gonorrhoeal rheumatism and cystitis. Backache, sciatica. Later states of apoplexy (Gisevius).
methylene-blue.dosing:
3x attenuation. A 2 per cent solution locally, in chronic otitis with foul smelling discharge.
A 1 per cent aqueous solution for ulcers and abscesses of cornea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
One of the Aniline Dyes (METHYLENE BLUE)
A remedy for neuralgia, neurasthenia, malaria; *typhoid*, here it diminishes the tympanites, delirium, and fever; pus infection. Tendency to tremor, chorea and epilepsy. Nephritis (acute parenchymatous), scarlatinal nephritis. Urine acquires a green color. Bladder irritation from its use antidoted by a little nutmeg. Surgical kidney with large amount of pus in urine. Gonorrhoeal rheumatism and cystitis. Backache, sciatica. Later states of apoplexy (Gisevius).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
3x attenuation. A 2 per cent solution locally, in chronic otitis with foul smelling discharge.
A 1 per cent aqueous solution for ulcers and abscesses of cornea.

mezereum.name: Mezereum
mezereum.essence: Skin symptoms, affections of bones, and neuralgias most important, especially about teeth and face. Bruised, weary feeling in joints, with drawing and stiffness. *Pains of various kinds, with chilliness and sensitiveness to cold air*. Bone pains. Eruptions after vaccination. Burning, darting sensation in the muscles; subsultus tendinum. Pains shoot upward and seem to draw patient up out of bed. Semi-lateral complaints. *Patient is very sensitive to cold air*.

agg: night, evening until midnight, warm food, touch, motion

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Spurge Olive
Skin symptoms, affections of bones, and neuralgias most important, especially about teeth and face. Bruised, weary feeling in joints, with drawing and stiffness. *Pains of various kinds, with chilliness and sensitiveness to cold air*. Bone pains. Eruptions after vaccination. Burning, darting sensation in the muscles; subsultus tendinum. Pains shoot upward and seem to draw patient up out of bed. Semi-lateral complaints. *Patient is very sensitive to cold air*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hard work to talk. Headache; worse from talking. Stupefying headache in right side. Affections of external head; scaly eruption, white scabs. Head covered with *thick, leathery crusts, under which pus collects*, Violent neuralgia about face and teeth, running towards ear, at night; *worse, eating*; better near hot stove. Roots of teeth decay. Teeth feel elongated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sneezing, coryza, interior of nose, excoriated. Post-nasal adenoids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feel too much open, as *if tympanum was exposed to the cold air and it blew into the ear*. Desire to bore fingers in.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Ciliary neuralgia after operations*. Especially after removal of eyeball. Pains radiate and shoot downward, *with cold feeling and stiffness of bone*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Red. Eruption around mouth, with coryza.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Desire for ham-fat. Burning in tongue, extending to stomach. *Mouth waters*. Nausea felt in throat; better, eating. Chronic gastritis; burning, corroding pain; nausea, vomiting, chocolate color. *Gastric ulcer* with much burning.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Swelling of glands with large abdomen in children. Pressure in inguinal ring. Flatulent colic, with shivering and difficult respiration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constipation after confinement. Prolapse of rectum. Diarrhoea, with small, white particles. *Green discharges*. Constipation, with hepatic and uterine inertia. Constriction of anus; stitches and prolapse of rectum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Red flakes float on top of urine. Hot, bloody Biting, burning in forepart of urethra at the close of micturition. Haematuria preceded by cramp pain in the bladder, After urinating, a few drops of blood are passed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses too frequent, soon, profuse. Leucorrhoea like albumen; very corroding.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Enlargement of testicles*. Violent sexual desire. Gonorrhoea, with haematuria.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Soreness and burning in bones of thorax. Constriction across chest. Cough; worse; eating, irritation lower than can be reached, on taking a warm drink.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in neck and back; worse, motion and at night; intolerant of all touch. *Pain* and burning in tibia and long bones. Legs and feet go to sleep. Pain in hip and knee.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Eczema; *intolerable itching*; chilliness with pruritus; worse in bed. Ulcers itch and burn, surrounded by vesicles and shining, fiery-red areola. Zona, with burning pain. *Bones*, especially long bones, inflamed and swollen; caries, exostosis; pain worse night, touch, damp weather (*Merc; Syph*). *Eruptions ulcerate and form thick scabs under purulent matter exudes* (*Chrysophanic acid*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, cold air; night, evening until midnight, warm food, touch, motion. *Better*, open air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth potency.

millefolium-herba.name: Millefolium Herba
millefolium-herba.essence: An invaluable remedy for various types of haemorrhages; blood bright red. Incarcerated hernia; smallpox, with great pain in pit of stomach. After operations for stone. Bad effects from fall from a height; overlifting. *Continued high temperature*. Haemoptysis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses early, profuse, protracted. Haemorrhage from uterus; bright red, fluid. *Painful varices during pregnancy*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Haemoptysis in incipient phthisis. Cough, with bloody expectoration, in suppressed menses or haemorrhoids. Violent palpitation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Haemorrhage from bowels. Bleeding haemorrhoids. *Urine bloody* (*Senec aur*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Yarrow
An invaluable remedy for various types of haemorrhages; blood bright red. Incarcerated hernia; smallpox, with great pain in pit of stomach. After operations for stone. Bad effects from fall from a height; overlifting. *Continued high temperature*. Haemoptysis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo when moving slowly. Sensation as if he had forgotten something. The head seems full of blood. Convulsions and epilepsy from suppressed menses. *Piercing thrusts* of pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Nosebleed* (*Erecht*). Piercing pain from eyes to root of nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Ficus venosa* (*Pakur*). Haemorrhage from bowels and lungs. *Acalypha* and *Helix tosta*-Snail--(in haemoptysis, diseases of chest, consumption); also, *Secale; Ipec; Erecht; Geran; Hamam*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency.

mitchella-repens.name: Mitchella Repens
mitchella-repens.essence: Bladder symptoms accompany complaints, especially uterine congestion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Partridge-berry (MITCHELLA)
Bladder symptoms accompany complaints, especially uterine congestion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Irritation at neck of bladder, with urging to urinate (*Eup purp; Apis*). Dysuria. Catarrh of bladder.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cervix dark red, swollen. Dysmenorrhoea and uterine haemorrhage; blood bright red.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Chimaph; Senecio; Uva; Geran; Gossyp*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture.

morphinum-and-salts.name: Morphinum and salts
morphinum-and-salts.essence: Morphine bears the same relation to Opium as Atropine to Belladonna-i.e, represents its nervous side. It is less stimulating, less convulsant, and more decidedly hypnotic. Constipates less and affects contractility of the bladder more. It is less diaphoretic and more pruritic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
An Alkaloid of Opium
Morphine bears the same relation to Opium as Atropine to Belladonna-i.e, represents its nervous side. It is less stimulating, less convulsant, and more decidedly hypnotic. Constipates less and affects contractility of the bladder more. It is less diaphoretic and more pruritic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Profound depression*. Irritable, fault-finding, hysterical. *Shock induced by terror. Dream-like state*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Vertigo from the least movement of the head*. Headache with sensation of being "wound-up". Bursting pain; head drawn back.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bluish, drooping lids. *Itching* of eyes. Delusion of vision on closing eyes. Starting, injected; diverging strabismus. Pupils unequally contracted. *Look unsteady*. Ptosis. *Paresis of recti interni*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Left ear throbs painfully; better, heat. *Seems to hear circulation all over body*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Dusky red or pallid lividity of face, lips, tongue, mouth or throat*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sneezing in paroxysms. *Itching* and tingling on end of nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Very dry. Tongue dry, brown violet in middle. *Thirst*. Loss of appetite, *with aversion to meat*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry and constricted. Pharynx paralyzed, swallowing almost impossible; better hot drinks, worse solids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nausea *incessant and deathly*, faintness, constant retching. Vomiting of green fluid. *Nausea and vomiting on rising up*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Distended. Acute pain in abdomen and along spinal column. *Tympanitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diarrhoea watery, brown, or black with horrible tenesmus. Constipation; stools large, dry knotty, with tendency to bruise and fissure.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Paresis of bladder. *Strangury. Slow and difficult urination*. Retention of prostatic hypertrophy. *Uraemia*, acute and chronic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Impotency. Pain in right spermatic cord, (*Oxal ac*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Alternation of tachycardia and bradycardia*. Cardiac muscular tissue is intact, even if severely exhausted. Pulse small, weak, dicrotic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Faint and struggling for breath *diaphragmatic paralysis*; hiccough; dyspnoea, paroxysmal, on first falling asleep (*Lach; Grindel*). Cheyne-Stokes respiration. Chest tight. Pain in middle of sternum. Dry, hard, *teasing*, exhausting cough, worse at night. Strangling cough, with viscid mucus sputum; thin, scanty, but sounds loose and abundant.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain along spine. Weakness of loins. Aching across lumbo-sacral region; cannot walk erect (*Cimicif*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Staggering gait. *Numbness*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Livid*; purple spots; zoster-like herpes. *Itching*. Skin lost its elasticity. Urticaria appearing at climaxis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Restlessness and hyperethesia; trembling, twitching, jerking, convulsions. *Extremely susceptible to pain*. Pain causes twitching and jerking of limbs. Violent and *sudden* neuralgic pains and sudden fainting. *Delirium, melancholic in character*. Neuralgias *intensely painful*, left supraorbital; right intercostal, better from heat; *multiple neuritis*. Sore feeling all over. *Bed feels too hard*. Aggravation after sleep (*Lach*). Neuralgia after zoster (*Mezer*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Yawning, *drowsy*; prolonged, deep sleep, Sleepless; restless sleep, with frequent startings. Sleepy, but cannot sleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chills. Icy coldness. Burning heat; profuse sweat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to sixth trituration.

moschus.name: Moschus
moschus.essence: A remedy for hysteria and nervous paroxysms, *fainting fits* and convulsions, catalepsy, etc. The characteristic condition being aggravation by cold; there is great sensitiveness to air. Much nervous trembling and frequent fainting. Great flatulence. Diseases do not follow a normal course. *Coldness*. Tension in muscles, skin and mind.

agg: cold. The open air is felt very, very cold

complementary: Nux mosch; Asaf; Valer; Sumbul; Ign; Castor

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Profuse urination. *Diabetes*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Musk
A remedy for hysteria and nervous paroxysms, *fainting fits* and convulsions, catalepsy, etc. The characteristic condition being aggravation by cold; there is great sensitiveness to air. Much nervous trembling and frequent fainting. Great flatulence. Diseases do not follow a normal course. *Coldness*. Tension in muscles, skin and mind.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Uncontrollable laughter*. Scolding. Anxiety with palpitation; starting as if frightened. Sexual hypochondriasis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compressive pain over root of nose. Pressure on top of head. Vertigo on least motion; sensation as if falling from a great height. Scalp sensitive. Sounds in ears as from the report of a cannon.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Desire for black coffee, stimulants. Aversion to food. Everything tastes flat. With stomach symptoms, anxiety in chest. Distended. Faints when eating. Abdomen greatly distended. *Spasmodic, nervous hiccough* (*Hydrocy ac; Sulph ac; Ignat; Cajap*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Violent desire*; involuntary emissions. Impotence, associated with diabetes (*Coca*). Premature senility. Nausea and vomiting after coition.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses too early, too profuse, with disposition to faint (*Nux m; Veratr*). Sexual desire, with intolerable titillation in parts. Drawing and pushing in the direction of the genitals; sensation as if menses appear.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tightness of chest, is obliged to take a deeper breath. Sudden constriction of larynx and trachea. *Difficult respiration; chest oppressed*; hysterical spasm of chest; asthma. Spasm of glottis. Impending paralysis of lungs. Asthma, with intense anxiety, fear, and smothering sensation. *Cough ceases, mucus cannot be expectorated*. Globus hystericus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hysterical palpitation. Trembling around heart. Weak pulse and fainting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Better*, in open air, rubbing. *Worse*, cold. The open air is felt very, very cold.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Nux mosch; Asaf; Valer; Sumbul; Ign; Castor*.
Compatible: *Ambra*.
Antidotes: *Camph; Coff*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third potency.

muriaticum-acidum.name: Muriaticum Acidum
muriaticum-acidum.essence: This acid has an elective affinity for the blood, producing a septic condition similar to that found in low fevers with high temperature and great prostration. Patient becomes so weak she slides down the bed. Decomposition of fluids. Involuntary stools while passing urine. Haemorrhages. Mouth and anus chiefly effected.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Muriatic Acid
This acid has an elective affinity for the blood, producing a septic condition similar to that found in low fevers with high temperature and great prostration. Patient becomes so weak she slides down the bed. Decomposition of fluids. Involuntary stools while passing urine. Haemorrhages. Mouth and anus chiefly effected.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Irritable and peevish; fretful *Loud moaning*. Great restlessness. Sad, taciturn; *suffers in silence*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo; *worse lying on right side*; occiput heavy as if filled with lead. Sound of voice is intolerable. Pain as if brain were crushed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Haemorrhage*; much sneezing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lower jaw fallen; pimples and freckles; lips raw, dry, cracked.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue, pale, swollen, dry, leathery, paralyzed. Deep ulcers on tongue. Hard lumps in tongue. Epithelioma; edges bluish-red (*Carbol ac*). Aphthous mouth. Gums and glands swollen. Fetid Breath. *Sordes on teeth*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Uvula swollen. Ulcers and false membrane. OEdematous, dark, raw. Attempted swallowing produces spasm and choking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cannot bear sight or thought of meat. At times, ravenous appetite and constant desire to drink. Achlorhydria and fermentation of food.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tendency to involuntary evacuations while urinating. *Haemorrhoids most sensitive to all touch*; even sheet of toilet paper is painful. Anal itching and prolapsus ani while urinating. *Haemorrhoids during pregnancy; bluish, hot with violent stitches*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pulse rapid, *feeble, and small. Intermits every third beat*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cannot urinate without having bowels move at same time.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses appear too soon. Leucorrhoea. During menses, soreness of anus. Ulcer in genitals.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heavy, painful, and weak. Tottering gait. Pain in tendo-Achilles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Papular and vesicular eruptions, with great itching (*Rhus*). Carbuncles; foul-smelling ulcers on lower extremities. Scarlet fever, livid, with petechiae; scanty eruption. Eczema on back of hands.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cold extremities. Heat without thirst. Typhoid types, stupid. Haemorrhages. Restlessness. Involuntary discharges. Bed-sores. Pulse rapid and feeble. Excessive prostration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, in damp weather, before midnight. *Better*, lying on left side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Phos ac; Ars; Bapt*. Follows well after *Bry* and *Rhus*.
Antidote; *Bryonia*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third potency.

murex-purpurea.name: Murex Purpurea
murex-purpurea.essence: The symptoms of the female sexual organs are most-prominent, and have been clinically verified. Especially adapted to nervous, lively, affectionate women. Patient weak and run down.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Purple Fish (MUREX)
The symptoms of the female sexual organs are most-prominent, and have been clinically verified. Especially adapted to nervous, lively, affectionate women. Patient weak and run down.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Great sadness, anxiety, and dread.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sinking, all-gone sensation in stomach (*Sep*). Hungry, must eat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Conscious of a womb. Pulsation in neck of womb. *Desire easily excited*. Feeling as if something was pressing on a sore spot in the pelvis: worse sitting. *Pain from right side of womb to right or left breast. Nymphomania*. Least contact of parts causes *violent sexual excitement*. Sore pain in uterus. Menses irregular, profuse, frequent, large clots. Feeling of protrusion. Prolapse; enlargement of uterus, with pelvic tenesmus and sharp pains, extending toward breasts; aggravated lying down. Dysmenorrhoea and chronic endometritis, with displacement. *Must keep legs tightly crossed*. Leucorrhoea green or bloody, alternate with mental symptoms and aching in sacrum. Benign tumors in breasts. Pain in them during menstrual period.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Urine frequent at night; smells like Valerian constant urging (*Kreos*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, least touch.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Plat; Lil; Sep* (the latter lacks sexual erethism of *Murex*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

mygale-lasiodora.name: Mygale Lasiodora
mygale-lasiodora.essence: Weakness, palpitation, nervousness, fear, like other spider preparations. Chorea is the principal therapeutic field of this. Sexual symptoms are important.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
