Black Cuban Spider
Weakness, palpitation, nervousness, fear, like other spider preparations. Chorea is the principal therapeutic field of this. Sexual symptoms are important.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Delirious, restless, sad; fears death; despondent.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Twitching of facial muscles*. Mouth and eyes open in rapid succession. Hot and *flushed*. Tongue dry and parched; put out with difficulty. Head jerked to one side. Grating of teeth at night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nausea, with dim sight. Aversion to food. Excessive thirst.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent erections. Chordee (*Kali brom; Camph*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Unsteady gait. *Constant motion of whole body*. Tremulous. Intense redness in streaks, following course of lymphatics. Twitching of limbs. Restless hands. Convulsive, *uncontrollable movements of arms and legs*. Limbs drag while walking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Agar; Tarant; Cupr, Zizia*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Better*, during sleep. *Worse*, in morning.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Forget-me-not (MYOSOTIS)
Chronic bronchitis and phthisis. Night-sweats.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cough with profuse muco-purulent expectoration, gagging and vomiting during cough; worse while or after eating. Bronchorrhoea. Pain in left lung (lower); painful while coughing and sensitive to percussion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture to second potency.

myrica-cerifera.name: Myrica Cerifera
myrica-cerifera.essence: Marked action on the liver, with jaundice and mucous membranes. Persistent sleeplessness. *Jaundice.

complementary: Ptel; Cornus cir; Chelid; Lept; Fagop

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Despondent, irritable*, indifferent. *Gloomy*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Bayberry (MYRICA)
Marked action on the liver, with jaundice and mucous membranes. Persistent sleeplessness. *Jaundice.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scalp feels tight. Headache, with drowsiness; yellow sclerotica; aching in eyeballs. Pressure in vertex and forehead. *Dull, heavy aching in temples and forehead on waking in the morning*. Pain and stiffness in nape of neck.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Yellow, Itching and stinging. Creeping sensation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue furred, with bad taste in mouth, and nausea. *Tenacious, thick, nauseous secretion*. Tender, spongy and bleeding gums (*Merc*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constricted and rough feeling, with a constant desire to swallow. Stringy mucus; detached with difficulty.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Taste bitter and nauseous, with offensive breath. Complete loss appetite, but with a feeling of fullness in the stomach after a hearty meal. Strong desire for acids. Weak, sinking feeling in the epigastrium, approaching nausea; increased after eating; relieved by rapid walking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull pain in the region of the liver. Complete jaundice, with bronze-yellow skin; loss of appetite. Fullness in the stomach and abdomen. Scanty, yellow, frothy urine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constant discharge of flatus when walking. Urging to stool, with no other results than the expulsion of a great amount of flatus. Loose, light-colored stool; ash-colored and destitute of bile.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dark, frothy, scanty, high-colored, biliary.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Disturbed, bad dreams and frequent waking; insomnia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Staggering gait. Pain under shoulder-blades and back of neck, in all muscles, in hollow of right foot.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Yellow and itching. *Jaundice*. Creeping sensation, as of insects.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Ptel; Cornus cir; Chelid; Lept; Fagop*.
Antidote: *Digit* (*jaundice*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency.

myristica-sebifera.name: Myristica Sebifera
myristica-sebifera.essence: A remedy of great antiseptic powers. Inflammation of skin, cellular tissue and periosteum. Traumatic infections. Parotitis. Fistulas. Carbuncles. *Specific action in panaritium*. Pain in the finger nails with swelling of the phalanges. Hands are stiff, as if from squeezing something a long time. Coppery taste and burning in throat. Tongue white and cracked. Phlegmonous inflammations. Hastens suppuration and shortens its duration. Often does away with use of the knife. Inflammation of middle ear,...

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Brazilian Ucuba
A remedy of great antiseptic powers. Inflammation of skin, cellular tissue and periosteum. Traumatic infections. Parotitis. Fistulas. Carbuncles. *Specific action in panaritium*. Pain in the finger nails with swelling of the phalanges. Hands are stiff, as if from squeezing something a long time. Coppery taste and burning in throat. Tongue white and cracked. Phlegmonous inflammations. Hastens suppuration and shortens its duration. Often does away with use of the knife. Inflammation of middle ear, suppurative stage. Fistula in ano. Acts more powerfully often than Heper or Silica.

myrtus-communis.name: Myrtus Communis
myrtus-communis.essence: The leaves contain Myrtol, an active antiseptic. Chest pains, as found often in consumptives, call for this remedy. Incipient phthisis. Nerve sedative and stimulant to mucous membranes, bronchitis, cystitis and pyelitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Myrtle
The leaves contain Myrtol, an active antiseptic. Chest pains, as found often in consumptives, call for this remedy. Incipient phthisis. Nerve sedative and stimulant to mucous membranes, bronchitis, cystitis and pyelitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stitching pain *in left breast, running through to shoulder-blade* (*Illic; Therid; Pix*). Dry, hollow cough, with tickling in chest. Worse in the morning. Sensation of burning in left chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Myrtus Chekan* (Chronic bronchitis with dense, yellowish sputum, difficult to detach. Copious expectoration keeps patient distressed and coughing).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

naja-tripudians.name: Naja Tripudians
naja-tripudians.essence: Naja produces a typical bulbar paralysis (L. J. Boyd). Causes no haemorrhage but only oedema, hence the victims of this reptile frequently bear very little sign of external injury a small scratch or puncture being the only indication where the fangs have worked their havoc. The tissue lying beneath the wound is colored dark purple, and a large quantity of viscid blood-like fluid collects in the vicinity of the wound. An intense burning pain at the spot bitten is the first symptom. In man there f...

amel: from walking or riding in open air

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Virus of the Cobra
Naja produces a typical bulbar paralysis (L. J. Boyd). Causes no haemorrhage but only oedema, hence the victims of this reptile frequently bear very little sign of external injury a small scratch or puncture being the only indication where the fangs have worked their havoc. The tissue lying beneath the wound is colored dark purple, and a large quantity of viscid blood-like fluid collects in the vicinity of the wound. An intense burning pain at the spot bitten is the first symptom. In man there follows an interval before fresh symptoms occur. The average is about an hour. Once developed, the symptoms follow a rapid course. A feeling of intoxication is produced, followed by a loss of power over the limbs. The patient is bereft of speech, swallowing, and the control over the movement of the lips. The saliva is ejected in large quantities, the respiration gradually becomes slower and slower, and at length ceases. Conscious all time. Is not a haemorrhagic or septic, medicine like Lachesis and Crotalus. Its action settles around the heart; valvular troubles. Marked surging of blood upwards, marked dyspnoea, inability to lie on left side. Hypertrophy, and valvular lesions. *Organs seem to be drawn together*. Very susceptible to cold. With heart symptoms, pain in forehead and temples. Diseases, primarily depending upon degeneration of motor cells. Control of sphincters lost.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Broods constantly over imaginary troubles. Suicidal insanity (*Aur*). Depressed. Aversion to talking. Blurred speech. Melancholy. Dreads to be left alone. Fear of rain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pain in left temple and in left orbital region, extending to occiput, with nausea and vomiting*. Hay-fever, with dry larynx. Suffocative spells after sleeping (*Lach*). Eyes staring. Ptosis of both lids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Illusions of hearing; otalgia; chronic otorrhoea, black discharges; smells like herring brine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Grasping at throat, with sense of choking. *Irritating, dry cough, dependent on cardiac lesions* (*Spong; Lauroc*) Sticky mucus and saliva. Asthmatic constriction in evening. Asthma beginning with coryza.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dragging and anxiety in praecordia. Feeling of weight on heart. Angina pains extending to nape of neck, left shoulder and arm with anxiety and fear of death. With the heart symptoms pain in forehead and temples. *Pulse irregular in force*. Threatened paralysis of heart, body cold, pulse slow, weak, irregular, tremulous. *Acute and chronic endocarditis*. Palpitation. Stitching pain in region of heart. *Damaged heart after infections diseases*. Marked symptoms of *low* tension (*Elaps, Vipera*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Neuralgia of left ovary; often serviceable in obscure pain in left groin, especially in post-operative cases; *seems to be drawn to heart*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Profound, like a log, with stertorous breathing, a typical reptilian state.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, from use of stimulants; *better*, from walking or riding in open air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: Serpent poisons generally. *Bungarus Fasciatus* (Banded Krait). This venom produces a condition like an acute polioencephalitis and myelitis, both symptomatically and histologically. *Lach; Crotal; Spig; Spong*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth potency.

naphthalinum.name: Naphthalinum
naphthalinum.essence: A chemical compound from Coal-tar; Tar Camphor (NAPHTHALINE)

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
A chemical compound from Coal-tar; Tar Camphor (NAPHTHALINE)
Coryza, hay-fever, phthisis pulmonalis, also gonorrhoea have been influenced favorably by this drug. Pyelonephritis. Irritation of the periphery of the urinary apparatus. Whooping-cough.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lying as if stupefied by a narcotic. Restless. Face pale yellowish hue.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Marked affinity for the eye. It produces detachment of the retina; papillo-retinal infiltration; deposits in patches upon the retina; amblyopia and consecutive amaurosis; sparkling synchisis; soft cataract. Exudation in the retina, choroid and ciliary body. Cataract. *Opacity of the cornea*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Irresistible desire. Meatus red swollen, and oedema of prepuce. Black urine. Cutting pain down penis. Pain in bladder. Terribly offensive odor of decomposing ammoniacal urine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sneezing; eyes inflamed; painful; head hot. *Hay-fever. Spasmodic asthma*; better in open air. Soreness in chest and stomach; must loosen clothing. *Dyspnoea* and sighing inspiration. Emphysema in the aged with asthma. *Whooping-cough*, long and continued paroxysms of coughing, unable to get a respiration. Acute laryngo-tracheitis. Bronchitis when the spasmodic element is associated with tenacious expectoration and oppression (Cartier).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Dermatitis; itching infiltration. Eruptions at corners of mouth and pigmentation around nails.
*Non-homeopathic Uses*-For worms, and especially pin--worms, one-gramme dose. Externally in skin diseases, five per cent ointment.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Dros; Corall; Coccus. Terpin hydrat* (Whooping-cough, hay asthma and bronchial affections. 1-2 grain doses).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third trituration.

natrium-arsenicosum.name: Natrium Arsenicosum
natrium-arsenicosum.essence: A remedy for nasal catarrh, with headache, pain at root of nose, dry and painful eyes. Psoriasis (*Ars; Chrysoph ac; Thyroid*). Bronchitis of children over seven years. Facilitates the termination of the cold and conserves strength and appetite (Cartier).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Arseniate of Sodium (NATRUM ARSENICUM)
A remedy for nasal catarrh, with headache, pain at root of nose, dry and painful eyes. Psoriasis (*Ars; Chrysoph ac; Thyroid*). Bronchitis of children over seven years. Facilitates the termination of the cold and conserves strength and appetite (Cartier).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Floating sensation on turning head quickly; aching in frontal region and root of nose, over orbits. Headache; worse pressure and tobacco smoke.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Watery discharge; drops into throat. *Feels stopped; pain at root*. Dry crusts, on removal, leave mucous membrane raw. Post-nasal dropping of thick, bland, yellowish mucus. *Crusts in nose*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Catarrhal conjunctivitis and blepharitis marginalis. Eyes feel weak, stiffness of balls and tendency of lids to close. Feel heavy and droop. Lachrymation in wind. Agglutination in morning. Dry, painful, burning; soon tire. OEdema of orbital region. Supraorbital pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dark, *purplish, swollen, oedematous*; red and glassy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Racking cough, with profuse greenish expectoration. *Oppression of chest and about heart*, and also larynx. Miner's asthma. Lungs feel as though smoke had been inhaled.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aching in arms; worse in shoulder. Pain in anterior crural nerves. Joints stiff. Feels tired all over. Knee-joints crack.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Ars; Kali carb; Apis*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

natrium-carbonicum.name: Natrium Carbonicum
natrium-carbonicum.essence: All the Natrums stimulate cellular activity and increase oxidation and metabolish. Great debility *caused by summer heat*; chronic effects of sunstroke; exhaustion; anaemic; milky, watery skin; very weak ankles, are all peculiar Natrum carbonicum conditions.

agg: sitting, from music, summer *heat*, mental exertion, *thunderstorm*. Least draught, changes of weather, sun
amel: by moving, by boring in ears and nose

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Carbonate of Sodium (NATRUM CARBONICUM)
All the Natrums stimulate cellular activity and increase oxidation and metabolish. Great debility *caused by summer heat*; chronic effects of sunstroke; exhaustion; anaemic; milky, watery skin; very weak ankles, are all peculiar Natrum carbonicum conditions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Unable to think; difficult, slow comprehension. Mental weakness and depression; worries; very sensitive to noise; colds, change of weather. Anxious and restless during thunderstorm; worse from music (*Ambra*). Marked gayety. Sensitive to presence of certain individuals.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aches from *slightest mental exertion*, worse from *sun or working under gas-light* (*Glon*) Feels too large. Oversensitive of hearing. Head aches with return of hot weather. Vertigo from exposure to sun.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: All troubles of external nose which may attain a morbid size-pimples and puffiness. Constant coryza; obstruction of nose. *Catarrh; bad smell of nasal secretion*. Many troubles of external nose (*Caust*). *Posterior nasal catarrh. Hawking much mucus from throat; worse, slightest draught*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Freckles, *yellow spots, pimples*. Swelling of upper lip. Pale, with blue rings around eyes and swollen lids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels swollen and sensitive. Ill effects of drinking cold water when overheated. Water-brash. Hungry at 5 am. *Very weak digestion*, caused by slightest error of diet. Averse to milk. Depressed after eating. Bitter taste. Old dyspeptics, always belching, have sour stomach and rheumatism. Dyspepsia relieved by soda biscuits.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sudden call to stool. Escapes with haste and noise. *Yellow substance like pulp of orange in discharge*. Diarrhoea from milk.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Induration of cervix. Pudenda sore. Bearing-down sensation (*Sep; Murex*). Heaviness; worse, sitting; better by moving. Menses late, scanty like meat-washings (*Nitric ac*). Leucorrhoeal discharge, offensive, irritating preceded by colic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry cough, when coming into warm room from out of doors. Cough with coldness of left side of breast.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Wakes too early in morning. Amorous dreams. Drowsy during day.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Old sprains. Great weakness of limbs, especially in morning. *Easy dislocation and spraining of ankles*. Foot bends under (*Caust*). Soreness between toes and fingers. Heel and tendo-Achilles affected. Capped hands. The hollow of the knee is painful on motion. Icy cold up to knees.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Inclination to perspire easily, or dry, rough, cracked skin. Eruption on finger-tips, knuckles and toes. Vesicular eruption in patches and circles. Veins full. Soles of feet raw and sore.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, sitting, from music, summer *heat*, mental exertion, *thunderstorm*. Least draught, changes of weather, sun. *Better*, by moving, by boring in ears and nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Sodii bicarbonas* (in vomiting of pregnancy with acetonuria, 30 grains in water spread over twenty-four hours); *Nat sulph; Caust; Natr cacodyl* (Foul breath and mouth with bad odor. Dry dermatitis of the skin of abdomen. Malignant growths. In phthisis, 5 centigrammes hypodermically, daily. Increase number of red blood corpuscles to double. Also in *malignant disease*). *Arsynal*--(Disodium methylarsenate). Introduced by M. A. Gautier, for phthisis in the second stage 4 to 6 centigrammes per day for one week followed by a week's intermission. But much smaller doses, i.e, 1x to 3x are followed by improvement, lessened fever, night sweat and haemoptysis ceasing.
Antidote: *Ars. Camph*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency.

natrium-hypochlorosum.name: Natrium Hypochlorosum
natrium-hypochlorosum.essence: In congested and atonic states of the uterus and its ligaments, with hepatic disorders. Chronic catarrhal diseases of the middle ear. *Flabby, debilitated constitution*. Both hands swollen in morning. Phlegmatic. Depressed, faint.

complementary: Aur mur nat; Calc; Sepia; Heliotropium

natrium-hypochlorosum.dosing: Fifteen to twenty drops of Labarraque's solution in water. Third attenuation made with dilute alcohol, lower with water.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Labarraque's Solution (NATRUM CHLORATUM)
In congested and atonic states of the uterus and its ligaments, with hepatic disorders. Chronic catarrhal diseases of the middle ear. *Flabby, debilitated constitution*. Both hands swollen in morning. Phlegmatic. Depressed, faint.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo, with aching across forehead. Swimming feeling, as if top of head would float off. Bleeding of nose in clots.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sore irritable spots along sides of tongue and throat, gums sore, tongue swollen; aphthous ulceration. Putrid taste. Furred tongue, large, flabby, intended. Cough with aphonia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Drowsy after meals*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dark, with albumen and casts. Diffuse nephritis. Much pain across small of back.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feeling as if uterus were pushed up on sitting down (*Ferr iod*). Feels as if it opened and shut. Violent metrorrhagia. Leucorrhoea and backache. Passive, bearing-down from heavy condition of uterus. Womb is heavy, sodden, with tendency to prolapse. Subinvolution.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hands swollen every morning. Extreme weakness in ankles and knees.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Aur mur nat; Calc; Sepia; Heliotropium* (uterine displacement, with active bearing-down sensation and loss of voice; membranous dysmenorrhoea).
Antidote: *Pulsat; Guaiacum*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fifteen to twenty drops of Labarraque's solution in water. Third attenuation made with dilute alcohol, lower with water.

natrium-nitricum.name: Natrium Nitricum
natrium-nitricum.essence: A Rademacherian remedy for *inflammations*. Haemoptysis. Haematuria. Purpura haemorrhagica. Haemorrhagic Variola. Drowsiness. Pains of tabes. *Influenza*. Hemoglobinuria. Uric acid diathesis. Asthma with urine supersaturated with solids. Anaemia and hydraemia. Exhaustion, must rest frequently when walking.
natrium-nitricum.dosing: Second trituration, also watery solution; 1 dram of salt to 8 oz water. Dram doses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Nitrate of Sodium (NATRUM NITRICUM)
A Rademacherian remedy for *inflammations*. Haemoptysis. Haematuria. Purpura haemorrhagica. Haemorrhagic Variola. Drowsiness. Pains of tabes. *Influenza*. Hemoglobinuria. Uric acid diathesis. Asthma with urine supersaturated with solids. Anaemia and hydraemia. Exhaustion, must rest frequently when walking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull. Indisposed to mental and bodily exertion. Pressing inward pain. Otalgia. Inward pressing in malar bones. *Nosebleed*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sour risings. Aversions to coffee. Flatulence, with pressure in pit of stomach and pain in chest; worse motion, better eructation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Abdominal muscles painfully contracted towards the spine. Distended. Difficult stool; feels as if more remained to pass.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in region of heart. Pulse slower and softer.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second trituration, also watery solution; 1 dram of salt to 8 oz water. Dram doses.

natrium-phosphoricum.name: Natrium Phosphoricum
natrium-phosphoricum.essence: Natrum phosphoricum is the remedy for conditions arising from excess of lactic acid, often resulting from too much sugar. Ailments, with *excess of acidity*. Sour eructations and taste. Sour vomiting. *Yellow, creamy coating at the back of the roof of mouth and tongue*. Inflammation of any part of the throat, with sensation of a lump in throat. Flatulence, with sour risings. Colic, with symptoms of worms. Cracking of joints. *Jaundice* (1x trit). Oxaluria.
natrium-phosphoricum.dosing: Third to twelfth trituration. In Jaundice 1x. Non-homeopathically, Phosphate Soda used hypodermically for Morphine habit, by Dr. M. J. Luys. Phosphate Soda, 75 gr daily, for constitutional iodism, thyroidism and Grave's disease.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Phosphate of Sodium
Natrum phosphoricum is the remedy for conditions arising from excess of lactic acid, often resulting from too much sugar. Ailments, with *excess of acidity*. Sour eructations and taste. Sour vomiting. *Yellow, creamy coating at the back of the roof of mouth and tongue*. Inflammation of any part of the throat, with sensation of a lump in throat. Flatulence, with sour risings. Colic, with symptoms of worms. Cracking of joints. *Jaundice* (1x trit). Oxaluria.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Imagines, on waking at night, that pieces of furniture are persons; that the hears footsteps in next room. *Fear.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels dull in the morning, full feeling and throbbing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
*Discharge of golden-yellow*,
*creamy matter* from the eyes. Dilation of one pupil. Whites of eyes dirty yellow.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: One ear red, hot, frequently itchy, accompanied by gastric derangements and acidity.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Offensive odor. Itching of nose. Naso-pharyngeal catarrh, with thick, yellow, offensive mucus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Paleness of bluish, florid appearance of face.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Canker sores of lip and cheeks. *Blisters on tip of tongue*, with stinging in evening. *Thin, moist coating on the tongue. Yellow, creamy coating at the back part of the roof of the mouth. Dysphagia*. Thick, creamy membrane over tonsils and soft palate.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Sour eructations, sour vomiting, greenish diarrhoea*. Spits mouthful of food.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Emissions without dreams, with *weakness in back and trembling in limbs*. Desire without erection. Gonorrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses too early; pale, thin, watery. Sterility, with acid secretions from vagina. Leucorrhoea; discharge creamy or honey-colored, or acid and watery. Sour-smelling discharges from uterus. Morning sickness, with sour vomiting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rheumatism of the knee-joint.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Weariness; aching in wrists and finger-joints. Hamstrings sore. *Synovial crepitation*. Rheumatic arthritis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Yellow. Itching in various parts, *especially of ankles. Hives*. Smooth, red, shining. Erysipelas. Feet icy cold in daytime, burn at night. Swelling of lymphatic glands.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Natrum lactic* (rheumatism and gout; gouty concretions, rheumatism with diabetes); *Natrum nitrosum* (angina pectoris. Cyanosis, fainting, copious liquid stools at night; throbbing and fullness; faintness, nervous pain in head, nausea, eructations, blue lips). *Natrum silicofluoricum-Salufer*--(a cancer remedy; tumors, bone affection, caries, lupus, ethmoiditis. Must be used carefully); *Nat selen* (chronic laryngitis and laryngeal phthisis; hoarseness of singers, expectorate small lumps of mucus with frequent clearing of throat); *Nat sulphurosum* (diarrhoea, with *yeasty stools*); *Nat sulphocarbol* (pyaemia; purulent pleurisy, 3 to 5 grains every three hours*); Nat telluricum* (breath has odor of garlic; nightsweats of phthisis) *calc; Robin; Phos*. In oxaluria 1x four times daily prevents formation of calculi; keeps the oxal of lime in solution (Schwartz).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to twelfth trituration. In Jaundice 1x. Non-homeopathically, Phosphate Soda used hypodermically for Morphine habit, by Dr. M. J. Luys. Phosphate Soda, 75 gr daily, for constitutional iodism, thyroidism and Grave's disease.

complementary: nape of neck pains; tendency to sleep after eating

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Sulphate of Sodium-Glauber's Salt (NATRUM SULPHURICUM)
A liver remedy, especially indicated for the so-called hydrogenoid constitution, where the complaints are such as are due to living in damp houses, basements, cellars. They are worse in rainy weather, water in any form. *Feels every change from dry to wet*; cannot even eat plants growing near water, nor fish. Always feels best in warm, dry air. Clinically, it has been found a valuable remedy for *spinal meningitis*, head symptoms *from injuries to head*, mental troubles therefrom. Every spring, return of skin affections. Tendency to warts. Fingers and toes affected. Chronic gout (*Lycop*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lively music saddens. Melancholy, with periodical attacks of mania. Suicidal tendency; *must exercise restraint*. Inability to think. Dislikes to speak, or to be spoken to.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Occipital pain. Piercing stitches in ears. Vertigo; relieved by sweat on head. Bursting feeling on coughing. Hot feeling on top of head. Bursting feeling on coughing. Hot feeling on top of head. Boring in right temple, preceded by burning in stomach. Ill-effects of falls and injuries to the head, and mental troubles arising therefrom. Dreams of running water.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sticking pain, earache, lightning-like stitches in damp weather.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nasal catarrh, with thick, yellow discharge and salty mucus. Coryza. Epistaxis. Ethmoiditis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Conjunctiva yellow. Granular lids. *Photophobia* (*Graphites*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Slimy, thick, tenacious, white mucus. *Bitter taste*, blisters on palate.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thick, yellow mucus, drops from posterior nares.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vomits sour. *Brown, bitter coating on tongue*. Yellow complexion. Thirst for something cold. Bilious vomiting, *acid* dyspepsia, with heartburn and flatulence.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Duodenal catarrh; hepatitis; icterus and vomiting of bile; liver sore to touch, with sharp, stitching pains; cannot bear tight clothing around waist, worse, lying on left side. *Flatulency*; wind colic in ascending colon; worse, before breakfast. Burning in abdomen and anus. Bruised pain and urging to stool. Diarrhoea yellow, watery stools. *Loose morning stools*, worse, after spell of wet weather. Stools involuntary, when passing flatus. *Great size of the fecal mass*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Loaded with bile. Brisk-dust sediment. Excessive secretion. Diabetes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nosebleed during menses, which are acrid and profuse. Burning in pharynx during menstruation. Herpetic vulvitis. *Leucorrhoea* yellowish-green, *following gonorrhoea in female*. Leucorrhoea with hoarseness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Condylomata; soft, fleshy excrescences; greenish discharges. Gonorrhoea; discharge thick, greenish; little pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dyspnoea, during damp weather. *Must hold chest when coughing*. Humid asthma; rattling in chest, at 4 and 5 am. *Cough*, with thick ropy, greenish expectoration; chest feels all gone. Constant desire to take deep, long breath. *Asthma in children*, as a constitutional remedy. Delayed resolution in pneumonia. Springs up in bed the cough hurts so; holds painful side (*Bry*). Pain through *lower left chest*. Every fresh cold brings on attack of asthma.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Itching when undressing. Violent pains in back of neck,
*and at base of brain*. Piercing pain between scapulae. Spinal meningitis; opisthotonos.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Swelling of axillary glands. Inflammation around root of nails. Burning in soles; oedema of feet; itching between toes. Gout. Pain in limbs, compels frequent change in position. Run-arounds. Pain in hip-joints, worse left, worse, stooping. Stiffness of knees, cracking of joints. Rheumatism, worse in damp cold weather.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching while undressing. Jaundiced, watery blisters. Sycotic excrescences; wart-like red lumps all over body.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, music (makes her sad); lying on left side; dampness of basement, damp weather. *Better*, dry weather, pressure, changing position.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to twelfth trituration.

natrium-salicylicum.name: Natrium Salicylicum
natrium-salicylicum.essence: Has an extensive range of action affecting the head, ear, throat, kidneys and liver and on metabolism. Haemorrhages, especially epistaxis. Produces marked effects upon the internal ear, with vertigo, deafness, noises in ears and loss of bone conduction, hence, its use in Meniere's disease. *One of the best remedies for the prostrating after-effects of influenza*. Lassitude, drowsiness, listlessness, tremor. Incipient dementia. Increases the quantity of bile. Follicular tonsillitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Salicylate of Sodium (NATRUM SALICYLICUM)
Has an extensive range of action affecting the head, ear, throat, kidneys and liver and on metabolism. Haemorrhages, especially epistaxis. Produces marked effects upon the internal ear, with vertigo, deafness, noises in ears and loss of bone conduction, hence, its use in Meniere's disease. *One of the best remedies for the prostrating after-effects of influenza*. Lassitude, drowsiness, listlessness, tremor. Incipient dementia. Increases the quantity of bile. Follicular tonsillitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Perfectly rational periods, alternate with manifestations of insanity of a somber character. *Vertigo; worse*, raising head. All objects seem to move to the right. Dull headache and confusion. Fibrositis of the scalp.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Retinal haemorrhage, albuminuric retinitis with haemorrhage. Iridocychitis due to traumatism with infection, and in sympathetic disease secondary to it (Dr. Gradel).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Tinnitus* of a low tone. Deafness. Auditory vertigo.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dyspnoea; breathing noisy, shallow, panting; pulse irregular. Complete loss of voice.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: OEdema, urticaria, red in circumscribed patches. Tingling and itching. Pemphigoid eruption.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Lobelia purpurascens* (drowsiness; dizzy headache between eyebrows; cannot keep eyes open; tongue-white-feels paralyzed as also do the heart and lungs intense prostration of all vital forces; deadly chill, without shivering; useful for the low, nervous prostration of grippe);
*Gaulth; China. Pyrus malus*-Crab apple tree--(Labyrinthine vertigo. Dr. Cooper).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: In acute articular rheumatism, lumbago, sciatica, etc. Usual doses, ten to twenty grains every three hour. Must be used carefully, as it is often destructive of kidney tissue. Ordinary allopathic doses allay the pain of dysmenorrhoea and promote menstrual flow.

niccolum-metallicum.name: Niccolum Metallicum
niccolum-metallicum.essence: Periodical nervous sick headaches, with asthenopia, weak digestion, constipation. Catarrh. Suits debilitated, nervous, literary patients, with frequent headaches, dyspepsia and constipation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Metallic Nickel (NICCOLUM)
Periodical nervous sick headaches, with asthenopia, weak digestion, constipation. Catarrh. Suits debilitated, nervous, literary patients, with frequent headaches, dyspepsia and constipation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cracking in cervical vertebrae when moving the head. Pain on top as from a nail. Pressure on vertex, in morning; worse till noon and in warm room. Stitches. Objects appear too large. Migraine; first on left side. Twitching of upper lip.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent sneezing; stopped up. Nasal catarrh, with redness and swelling at tip of nose. Acute pain at root of nose, extending to vertex and through temples.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sore, right side with great tenderness; *soreness* *to touch externally*. Strangulated feeling.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Gone, empty feeling in epigastrium, *without desire for food*. Acute gastralgia with pains extending to shoulder. Thirst and *intense hiccough*. Sour, fetid secretions ooze from molar teeth. Diarrhoea and tenesmus after milk.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses late, scanty, with great debility and burning in eyes. Profuse leucorrhoea; worse, after urinating (*Mag mur, Plat*); also worse after menses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hoarseness. Dry, hacking cough, with stitches in chest. *Obliged to set up and hold head. Must put arms on thighs, when coughing*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching all over, worse on neck, not relieved by scratching.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, periodically, every two weeks; yearly, forenoon. *Better*, in evening.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third trituration.

niccolum-sulphuricum.name: Niccolum Sulphuricum
niccolum-sulphuricum.essence: Useful in climacteric disturbances. Periodic neuralgias of malarial origin. Urine and saliva increased. Coppery taste. Weak, asthenopic literally persons with weak digestion and constipation, are worse in morning and suffer from periodic headaches and hoarseness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Sulphate of Nickel
Useful in climacteric disturbances. Periodic neuralgias of malarial origin. Urine and saliva increased. Coppery taste. Weak, asthenopic literally persons with weak digestion and constipation, are worse in morning and suffer from periodic headaches and hoarseness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nervous, uneasy, desire to recline, tired, cannot settle down to any occupation. Periodic headaches, occipital pain, extending down to spine, worse lying on back; sore pain in eyes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stiff, numb sensation, worse in neck. Spine sore. Awakened in morning with burning soles, Spinal pains, legs and arms heavy and weak, cannot lie on back.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull aching in ovaries, with sensation as if menses appear. *Hot flashes*, followed by perspiration on parts touching each other, when separated become dry.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second trituration.

nitricum-acidum.name: Nitricum Acidum
nitricum-acidum.essence:
Selects for its special seat of action the outlets of the body where the mucous membrane and skin meet; these pain *as from splinters. Sticking pains*. Marked improvement of all symptoms while riding in a carriage. Acts best on the dark complexioned and past middle life. Syphilis, after abuse of Mercury. Pains appear and disappear quickly (*Bell*). Hydrogenoid constitution. Sycotic remedy.

Blisters and ulcers in mouth, tongue, genitals; bleed easily. Fissures, with pain during stool, as if rect...

agg: evening and night, cold climate, and also hot weather

nitricum-acidum.dosing: Sixth potency. As the nitric acid patient begins to improve skin symptoms may appear for a time, a favorable indication.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Great hunger, with sweetish taste. Longing for indigestible things-chalk, earth, etc. Pain in cardiac orifice. Dyspepsia with excess of oxalic acid, uric acid and phosphates in urine and great mental depression. *Loves fat and salt* (*Sulph*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Great straining, but little passes, Rectum feels torn. Bowels constipated, with fissures in rectum. Tearing pains during stools. Violent cutting pains *after stools, lasting for hours* (*Ratanh*). Haemorrhages from bowels, profuse, bright. Prolapsus ani. Haemorrhoids bleed easily. Diarrhoea, slimy and offensive. After stools, irritable and exhausted. Colic relieved from tightening clothes. Jaundice, aching in liver.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Nitric Acid
Selects for its special seat of action the outlets of the body where the mucous membrane and skin meet; these pain *as from splinters. Sticking pains*. Marked improvement of all symptoms while riding in a carriage. Acts best on the dark complexioned and past middle life. Syphilis, after abuse of Mercury. Pains appear and disappear quickly (*Bell*). Hydrogenoid constitution. Sycotic remedy.
Blisters and ulcers in mouth, tongue, genitals; bleed easily. Fissures, with pain during stool, as if rectum were torn. All discharges very offensive, especially urine, feces, and perspiration. Persons who have chronic diseases, and take cold easily and disposed to diarrhoea. Excessive physical irritability. Cachexia, due to syphilis, scrofula, intermittent fever with liver involvement and anaemia, etc. Gravel; arthritis. Capillary bleeding after curettage.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Irritable*, hateful, vindictive, headstrong. Hopeless despair. Sensitive to noise, pain, touch, jar. Fear of death.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation of a *band around head*. Headache from pressure of hat; full feeling; worse from street noises. Hair falls out. Scalp sensitive.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Difficult hearing; better by riding in carriage or train. *Very sensitive to noise*, as the rattle of wagons over pavements (*Coff; Nux*). Cracking in ears when chewing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Double vision; *sharp, sticking pains*. Ulceration of cornea. Gonorrhoeal ophthalmia, photophobia, constant lachrymation. Syphilitic iritis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ozaena. Green casts from nose every morning. Coryza, with sore and bleeding nostrils. Tip red. Stitches, as of a splinter in nose. *Caries of mastoid. Nosebleed*, with chest affections. Chronic nasal catarrh, with yellow, offensive, *corrosive* discharge. Nasal diphtheria, with watery and exceedingly excoriating discharge.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Putrid breath. Salivation. Bleeding of gums. Painful pimples on the sides of the tongue. *Tongue clean, red and wet with center furrow*. Teeth become loose; gums soft and spongy. *Ulcers in soft palate, with sharp, splinter-like pains*. Salivation and fetor oris. *Bloody saliva*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry. Pain into ears. Hawks mucus constantly. White patches and *sharp points, as from splinters*, on swallowing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scanty, dark, *offensive*. Smells like horse's urine. *Cold on passing*. Burning and stinging. Urine bloody and albuminous. Alternation of cloudy, phosphatic urine with profuse urinary secretion in old prostatic cases.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Soreness and burning in glans and beneath prepuce. Ulcers; burn and sting; exude, offensive matter.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: External parts sore, with ulcers (*Hep.: Merc; Thuja*). Leucorrhoea brown, flesh-colored, watery, or stringy, offensive. Hair on genitals falls out (*Natr m, Zinc*). Uterine haemorrhages. Menses early, profuse, like muddy water, with pain in back, hips and thighs. Stitches through vagina. Metrorrhagia after parturition.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hoarseness. Aphonia, with dry hacking cough, from tickling in larynx and pit of stomach. Soreness at lower end of sternum. *Short breath on going upstairs* (*Ars; Calc*). Cough during sleep (*Cham*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fetid foot-sweat, causing soreness of toes, with sticking pain; chilblains on toes. Sweating of palms, hands; cold, blue nails. Offensive sweat in axillae at night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Warts, large jagged; bleed on washing. Ulcers bleed easily, sensitive; splinter-like pains; zigzag, irregular edges; base looks like raw flesh. Exuberant granulations. Black pores on face, papules worse on forehead.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, evening and night, cold climate, and also hot weather. *Better*, while riding in carriage (Reverse: *Cocculus*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Complementary: *Ars; Calad; Lac can; Sepia*.
Inimical: *Lach*.
Compare: *Merc; Kali; Thuja; Hepar; Calc*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency. As the nitric acid patient begins to improve skin symptoms may appear for a time, a favorable indication.

nitromuriaticum-acidum.name: Nitromuriaticum Acidum
nitromuriaticum-acidum.essence: Almost a specific in Oxaluria. Removes the distressing skin symptoms resembling psoriasis. Three to five drops three times a day. So-called bilious conditions; torpid liver, hepatitis and early cirrhosis of liver. More adapted to hepatic torpor and gastric catarrh common in hot and damp climates and aggravated by meat eating and alcohol (Hale). Constricted anus. Gravel.
nitromuriaticum-acidum.dosing: Five to ten drops, well diluted.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Aqua Regia (NITRO-MURIATIC ACID)
Almost a specific in Oxaluria. Removes the distressing skin symptoms resembling psoriasis. Three to five drops three times a day. So-called bilious conditions; torpid liver, hepatitis and early cirrhosis of liver. More adapted to hepatic torpor and gastric catarrh common in hot and damp climates and aggravated by meat eating and alcohol (Hale). Constricted anus. Gravel.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Gums bleed easily. Ptyalism. *Constant drooling at night* (*Merc*). Cankers; small, superficial ulceration over inside of mouth and tongue. Metallic taste (*Cupr met*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sour eructations, with empty hungry feeling in stomach; not relieved by eating. *Salivation, worse at night*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constipated, with ineffectual urging. Sphincter constricted. Anus moist and sore.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cloudy. Burning in urethra. Oxaluria.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Five to ten drops, well diluted.

nitri-spiritus-dulcis.name: Nitri Spiritus Dulcis
nitri-spiritus-dulcis.essence: *Sensorial apathy* in low fevers when there is stupor, difficulty of arousing patient, is met by this remedy. Dry skin, nausea, flatulence. Salty taste. *Ill-effects of salt* (halophagia) (*Ars; Phos*). Catching cold in stormy weather. Acute nephritis following Scarlet fever. Dropsy. Is an excellent diuretic.

agg: from mental disturbance, during winter and spring

nitri-spiritus-dulcis.dosing: A few drops of the pure spirits in water every two or three hours.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Sweet Spirits of Nitre
*Sensorial apathy* in low fevers when there is stupor, difficulty of arousing patient, is met by this remedy. Dry skin, nausea, flatulence. Salty taste. *Ill-effects of salt* (halophagia) (*Ars; Phos*). Catching cold in stormy weather. Acute nephritis following Scarlet fever. Dropsy. Is an excellent diuretic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Prosopalgia, with photophobia. Burning in cheeks, *and vomiting, followed by lassitude*. Boring in facial bones; in angles of lower jaw. Very sensitive to cold.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Very rapid breathing by going only a short walk. Painful constriction beneath sternum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, from mental disturbance, during winter and spring.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Increases the action of Digitalis.
Compare: *Phos ac; Lycop*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: A few drops of the pure spirits in water every two or three hours.

nuphar-luteum.name: Nuphar Luteum
nuphar-luteum.essence: Produces nervous weakness, with marked symptoms in the sexual sphere.

complementary: Agnus; Kali brom; Lycop; Selen; Yohimbin

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Yellow Pond-lily
Produces nervous weakness, with marked symptoms in the sexual sphere.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Complete absence of sexual desire; parts relaxed; penis retracted. Impotency, with involuntary emissions during stool, when urinating. Spermatorrhoea. Pain in testicles and penis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Entero-colitis. Yellow diarrhoea; worse in the morning. Diarrhoea during typhoid.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: in sexual weakness; *Agnus; Kali brom; Lycop; Selen; Yohimbin*. In diarrhoea: *Chelid; Gambog; Sulph, Nymphea odorata*-Sweet Water Lily--(early morning diarrhoea, backache); acrid leucorrhoea, offensive ulcers; bronchorrhoea; ulcerative sore throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture to sixth potency.

nux-moschata.name: Nux Moschata
nux-moschata.essence: Marked tendency to *fainting fits*, with heart failure. Cold extremities, *extreme dryness of mucous membranes* and skin. Strange feeling, with irresistible *drowsiness*. Indicanuria. General inclination to become unconscious during acute attacks. Lypothymia (*Ignatia*). Staggers on trying to walk.

agg: cold moist wind, cold food, cold washing, lying on painful side, motion, jar

complementary: Nux v; Puls; Rhus; Ign; Asaf

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Great drowsiness (*Indol*).
*Complaints cause sleepiness*. Coma.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Nutmeg
Marked tendency to *fainting fits*, with heart failure. Cold extremities, *extreme dryness of mucous membranes* and skin. Strange feeling, with irresistible *drowsiness*. Indicanuria. General inclination to become unconscious during acute attacks. Lypothymia (*Ignatia*). Staggers on trying to walk.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Changeable; laughing and crying. Confused, impaired memory. Bewildered sense, as in a dream. Thinks she has two heads.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo when walking in open air; aches from eating a little too much. Feeling of expansion, *with sleepiness*. Pulsating in head. Cracking sensation in head. Sensitive to slightest touch in a draught of air. Bursting headache; *better hard pressure*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Objects look larger, very distant, or vanish. Motes before eyes. Mydriasis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Oversensitive to smell; nosebleed, dark blood; dry, stopped up.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Very dry. Tongue adheres to roof of mouth; but no desire for water. Saliva like cotton (*Berb*). Toothache in pregnancy. Tongue numb, paralyzed. Dryness of throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Excessively bloated. Flatulent dyspepsia*. Hiccough, and craving for highly-seasoned food. Retrocession of gout to stomach.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Paralytic weakness of intestines. *Enormously distended*. Stool is soft, and yet is *unable to expel it*, even with long straining (*Alum*). *Faintness during or after stool*. Protruding piles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Uterine haemorrhage. Menses too long, dark, thick. Leucorrhoea muddy and bloody. Suppression, with persistent fainting attacks and sleepiness (*Kali c*). *Variableness* *of menstruation irregularity of time and quantity*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Loss of voice from walking against the wind (*Hep*). Cough when getting warm in bed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Trembling, fluttering. Sensation as if something grasped heart. Palpitation; pulse intermits.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in right hip to knee; worse, motion, especially going upstairs. Rheumatism from getting feet wet, from exposure to draughts. Rheumatism relieved by dry, warm clothes. Fatigue on slight exertion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chill begins in left hand (Carbo). Chilliness and heat without thirst; *want of perspiration. Dry skin* and of inner parts, also of eyes, nose, lips, mouth, tongue, throat, etc.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, cold moist wind, cold food, cold washing, lying on painful side, motion, jar. *Better*, warmth, dry weather.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
*Oleum myristicae*-Oil of Nutmeg--(as a remedy for boils, felons, poisonous ulcers, it has been used in the 2x potency); *Ornithogalum* (*flatulence*, swollen feeling across lower chest; whenever she turns in bed, *feels as if a bag of water* turned also; gastric ulcer and cancer). *Myristica Sebifera* (phlegmonous inflammations, hastens suppuration; powerful antiseptic. Ulcerative tendency in all tissues. Said to act more powerfully than Hepar and Silica).
Compare: *Nux v; Puls; Rhus; Ign; Asaf*.
Antidotes: *Camph; Gels; Valer*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to sixth potency.

nyctanthes-arbor-tristis.name: Nyctanthes Arbor Tristis
nyctanthes-arbor-tristis.essence: Bilious and obstinate remittent fever; sciatica; rheumatism. Constipation of children.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Paghala-malli-Sad Tree
Bilious and obstinate remittent fever; sciatica; rheumatism. Constipation of children.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Anxious and restless; dull headache. Tongue coated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning sensation, better cold application. Thirst, better vomiting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tenderness of liver. Profuse, bilious stool, with nausea. Constipation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thirst, before and during chill and heat; better vomiting as close of chill; sweat no marked.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, drop doses.

ocimum-canum.name: Ocimum Canum
ocimum-canum.essence: Is to be remembered in diseases of the kidneys, bladder and urethra. Uric acid diathesis. Red sand in the urine is its chief characteristic, and frequently verified. Swelling of glands, inguinal and mammary. Renal colic, especially right side. Symptoms of renal calculus are pronounced.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Brazilian Alfavaca
Is to be remembered in diseases of the kidneys, bladder and urethra. Uric acid diathesis. Red sand in the urine is its chief characteristic, and frequently verified. Swelling of glands, inguinal and mammary. Renal colic, especially right side. Symptoms of renal calculus are pronounced.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: High acidity, formation of spike crystals of uric acid. Turbid, thick, purulent, bloody; *brick-dust red* or yellow *sediment. Odor of musk. Pain in ureters*. Cramps in kidneys.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heat and swelling of left testicle.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Valva swollen; darting pain in labia. Nipples painful to least contact. Breasts feel full and tense; itching. Prolapsus vaginae.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Berb; Hedeoma; Lycop; Pareir; Urtica*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth potency.

oenanthe-crocata.name: Oenanthe Crocata
oenanthe-crocata.essence: Epileptiform convulsions; worse, during menstruation and pregnancy. Puerperal eclampsia; uraemic convulsions. Burning in throat and stomach, nausea and vomiting. Red spots in face. Convulsive facial twitching. Skin affections, especially lepra and ichthyosis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Water Dropwart
Epileptiform convulsions; worse, during menstruation and pregnancy. Puerperal eclampsia; uraemic convulsions. Burning in throat and stomach, nausea and vomiting. Red spots in face. Convulsive facial twitching. Skin affections, especially lepra and ichthyosis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Pains all over head, dizzy. Sudden and complete unconsciousness. Furious delirium, giddiness. Countenance livid, eyes fixed, pupils dilated,
*convulsive twitching of facial muscles*, trismus, foaming at mouth, locked jaws. Much yawning. Tendency to cry over little things.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tickling cough, with rattling in the lower part of the chest, and thick, frothy expectoration. Heavy, spasmodic, stertorous breathing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Convulsions; opisthotonos. Pain along crural and sciatic nerves, commencing in back. Cold hands and feet. Numbness of hand and foot.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Cicuta; Kali brom*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to sixth potency.

oleum-animale-aethereum.name: Oleum Animale Aethereum
oleum-animale-aethereum.essence: Acts on the nervous system, especially on pneumo-gastric region. Useful in migraine and neuralgia of spermatic cord. Burning pains and stitches. "*Pulled upward*" and "*from behind forward*" pains.
oleum-animale-aethereum.dosing: Third to thirtieth potency and higher.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Dippel's Animal Oil (OLEUM ANIMALE)
Acts on the nervous system, especially on pneumo-gastric region. Useful in migraine and neuralgia of spermatic cord. Burning pains and stitches. "*Pulled upward*" and "*from behind forward*" pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tearing pain, with sadness and irritability; worse after dinner; relieved by rubbing. Itching, burning vesicles; better, friction. Malar bones feel pulled forcibly upward. Migraine with polyuria.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Smarting in eyes; misty vision. Glistening bodies before eyes. Lachrymation when eating. Short-sighted. Twitching of lids (*Agar*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Watery, excoriating discharge; worse in open air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels drawn. Cramp-like pains. *Twitching of lips*. Malar bone feels pulled upward. Toothache, *better pressing teeth together*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bites cheek while eating (*Caust*). Tongue feels sore. Greasy feeling in mouth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sore, dry, constricted. Air feels cold.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Sensation as if water were in stomach*; of coldness, of constriction, and of burning; better, eructations.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Flatulence and rumbling. Ineffectual urging stool, with burning in anus. After stool, bruised pain in abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Polyuria*. Greenish urine, frequent and urgent want to urinate, with tenesmus and scanty emission. Itching in urethra.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Desire increased; ejaculation too soon. Pain along spermatic cord to testicles. *Testicles feel seized and pulled forcibly upward*; worse, right. *Pressure in the perineum*. Prostatic hypertrophy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Early and scanty menstruation*; flow black.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chest feels constricted. Asthma from suppressed foot-sweat. Oppression. *Stitches in breast from behind forward*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sprained feeling in small of back. Cracking of vertebrae on raising head (*Aloe, Nat c, Thuj*). Restlessness. Rheumatic pain in shoulders. Fish-brine odor of sweat of heels.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, after eating, from 2 to 9 pm. *Better*, by rubbing, eructation, open air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Puls; Ars; Silic; Sepia*.
Antidotes: *Camph; Op*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency and higher.

oleum-jecoris-aselli.name: Oleum Jecoris Aselli
oleum-jecoris-aselli.essence: Internally, a nutrient and a hepatic and pancreatic remedy (Burnett). Emaciation, lassitude, scrofulous diseases, rheumatic affections. *Atrophy of infants*; emaciation with hot hands and head; restless and feverish at night. *Pains in liver region*. Tuberculosis in the beginning.
oleum-jecoris-aselli.dosing: First to third trituration. Locally in ringworm, and nightly rubbing, for dwarfish, emaciated babies.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Cod-liver Oil
Internally, a nutrient and a hepatic and pancreatic remedy (Burnett). Emaciation, lassitude, scrofulous diseases, rheumatic affections. *Atrophy of infants*; emaciation with hot hands and head; restless and feverish at night. *Pains in liver region*. Tuberculosis in the beginning.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Hoarseness. Sharp stitching pains. Burning spots. *Dry, hacking, tickling cough*, especially at night. Whooping-cough in miserable, scrofulous children. Here give drop doses, increasing daily one drop up to twelve, then descend in the same way (Dahlke). *Soreness through chest*. Haemoptysis (*Acalypha; Millef*).
*Palpitation*, accompanies other symptoms. *Yellowness*. Children who cannot take milk.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aching in elbows and knees, in *sacrum*. Chronic rheumatism, with rigid muscles and tendons. *Burning in palms*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constantly chilly towards evening. *Hectic fever*. Night-sweats.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Cholesterine; Tubercul; Phosph; Iod*. One liter of Ol. Jecoris contains 0. 4 gram Iod. *Gadus morrhua*--Cod--(frequent breathing, with flapping of alae nasi; rush of blood to chest; pain in lungs and cough; dry heat in palms).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third trituration. Locally in ringworm, and nightly rubbing, for dwarfish, emaciated babies.

oleander.name: Oleander
oleander.essence: Has a marked action on the skin, heart and nervous system, producing and curing paralytic conditions with cramp-like contractions of upper extremities. Hemiplegia. Difficult articulation.

complementary: Con; Nat m; Rhus; Caust; Lathyr

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Rose-laurel (NERIUM ODORUM)
Has a marked action on the skin, heart and nervous system, producing and curing paralytic conditions with cramp-like contractions of upper extremities. Hemiplegia. Difficult articulation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Memory weak; slow perception. Melancholy, with obstinate constipation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo and diplopia, when looking down. Vertigo, when looking fixedly at an object, and on rising in bed. Pain in brain, as if head would burst. Numb feeling. Dull, unable to think. Indolence. *Eruption on scalp*. Humid, fetid spots *behind ears* (*Graph; Petrol*) and occiput, with red, rough, herpetic spots in front. *Corrosive itching on forehead and edge of hair*; worse, heat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Can see objects only when looking at them sideways. Eyes water on reading. Double vision. *Sensation as if eyes were drawn back into the head*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pale, sunken, with blue rings around eyes (*Phos ac*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Canine hunger, with hurried eating*, without appetite. Thirst. Empty belching. Vomiting of food; greenish water. Throbbing in pit.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Borborygmus, with profuse, fetid flatus. Gnawing around navel. Ineffectual urging. *Undigested feces. Stool passes when emitting flatus*. Burning pain in anus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Oppression as from a weight; asthmatic when lying down. *Palpitation*, with weakness and empty feeling in chest. Dyspnoea. Obtuse stitches in chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Weakness of lower limbs*. Paralysis of legs and feet. Want of animal heat in limbs. Cold feet. Painless paralysis. Constant cold feet. Swelling, burning stiffness of fingers. Veins and hands swollen. OEdema. Stiffness of joints.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching, scurfy pimples; herpes; sensitive and numb. Nocturnal burning. *Very sensitive skin*; slightest friction causes soreness and chapping. *Violent itching eruption, bleeding, oozing*; want of perspiration. Pruritus, especially of scalp, which is sensitive.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, undressing, rest, friction of clothes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Con; Nat m; Rhus; Caust; Lathyr*. Oleander contains Oleandrin and also Nerein which latter is said to be closely related if not identical with Digitalin. The pulse becomes slower, more regular, more powerful. *Diuresis*; palpitation, oedema and dyspnoea of valvular disease disappear.
Antidotes: *Camph; Sulph*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

oleum-santali.name: Oleum Santali
oleum-santali.essence: The action in the urinary and sexual spheres is most utilizable, especially in gonorrhoea. It is also a stimulating, disinfectant expectorant. Two or three drops on sugar will frequently relieve the hacking cough, when but little sputum is expectorated.
oleum-santali.dosing: Two to ten m in capsules.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Oil of Sandalwood
The action in the urinary and sexual spheres is most utilizable, especially in gonorrhoea. It is also a stimulating, disinfectant expectorant. Two or three drops on sugar will frequently relieve the hacking cough, when but little sputum is expectorated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Painful erections; swelling of the prepuce. Thick, yellowish, muco-purulent discharge. Deep pain in perineum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frequent, burning, smarting swelling, and redness of meatus. Stream small and slow. *Acute aching in kidney region*. Sensation of a ball pressing against the urethra; worse, standing. Gleet, with profuse, thick discharge; chronic cystitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Two to ten m in capsules.

oleum-succinum.name: Oleum Succinum
oleum-succinum.essence: Nervous and hysterical symptoms. Asthma. Affections of spleen.
oleum-succinum.dosing: Third trituration. Five drop doses of the oil.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
**Electron. Amber-A Fossil Resin**
Nervous and hysterical symptoms. Asthma. Affections of spleen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fear of trains and close places. Headache, lachrymation, sneezing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Asthma, incipient phthisis, chronic bronchitis, pains in chest. Whooping-cough.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: Do not confound with Ambergris (Ambra). *Succinic acid* (Hay-fever. Paroxysmal sneezing, dropping of watery mucus from nostrils; asthma. Inflammation through respiratory tract; causing asthma, chest pains, etc; itching of eyelids and canthi and nose worse drafts. Use 6 to 30th potency). Compare: *Arundo, Wyethia, Sabadilla, Sinapis*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third trituration. Five drop doses of the oil.

oniscus-asellus.name: Oniscus Asellus
oniscus-asellus.essence: Has distinct diuretic properties; hence its use in dropsies. Asthmatic conditions, with bronchial catarrh.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Wood-louse (MILLEPEDES)
Has distinct diuretic properties; hence its use in dropsies. Asthmatic conditions, with bronchial catarrh.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Boring pain behind right ear in mastoid process (*Caps*). Violent pulsation of arteries (*Pothos; Glonoine*). Painful pressure above the root of nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Persistent pressure in cardiac orifice. Vomiting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Distended; *meteorism; very severe colic*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cutting, burning in urethra. *Tenesmus of bladder and rectum*, with absence of stool and urine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Pothos foet; Canth*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency.

onosmodium-virginianum.name: Onosmodium Virginianum
onosmodium-virginianum.essence:
