Want of power of concentration and co-ordination. Vertigo, numbness and muscular prostration. Marked association of head and eye symptoms, with muscular tiredness and weariness.

A remedy for *migraine*. Headaches from eyestrain and sexual weakness. It produces diminution of sexual desire in both sexes; hence its homeopathicity, in *sexual neurasthenia*. Depressed or lost sexual life in women. Neuralgic pains. General prostration. Acts as if born tired.

agg: from motion, jar, and tight clothing
amel: when undressed, when lying down on back, from cold drinks, and eating

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
False Gromwell (ONOSMODIUM)
Want of power of concentration and co-ordination. Vertigo, numbness and muscular prostration. Marked association of head and eye symptoms, with muscular tiredness and weariness.
A remedy for *migraine*. Headaches from eyestrain and sexual weakness. It produces diminution of sexual desire in both sexes; hence its homeopathicity, in *sexual neurasthenia*. Depressed or lost sexual life in women. Neuralgic pains. General prostration. Acts as if born tired.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Loss of memory. Nose feels dry. Confused. Dull, heavy, dizzy, pressing upward in occiput. Occipito-frontal pain in morning on waking, *chiefly left side*. Pain in temples and mastoid (*Capsic*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vision blurred; optic disc hyperaemic, and retinal vessels enlarged. Strained feeling in eyes; worse, using eyes. Eyes heavy and dull, muscular asthenopia; *ocular muscles tense*. Internal eye muscles paretic. *Pain in eyeballs* between orbit and ball, extending to left temple.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Severe dryness. Discharge from posterior nares. Raw, scraping. Stuffed feeling in posterior nares. Symptoms worse by cold drinks.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Craving for ice-water and cold drinks; wants to drink often. Abdomen feels bloated

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in dorsal and lumbar regions. Numbness and tingling in feet and legs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sore, aching in breasts; feels swollen and sore. Pain in heart; pulse, rapid, irregular, weak.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constant sexual excitement. *Psychical impotence*. Loss of desire. Speedy emissions. Deficient erections.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Severe uterine pains; bearing-down pains; old pains return. *Sexual desire completely destroyed*. Feels as if menses would appear. Aching in breasts. Nipples itch. Menses too early and too prolonged. Soreness in uterine region. Leucorrhoea, yellow, acrid, profuse.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in back. *Tired and numb* feeling in legs, popliteal spaces, and below knees. *Staggering gait*. Sidewalk seems too high. Pain in left scapular region. Great muscular weakness and weariness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, from motion, jar, and tight clothing. *Better*, when undressed, when lying down on back, from cold drinks, and eating.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Nat mur; Lilium; Gels; Ruta*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thirtieth attenuation.

operculina-turpenthum.name: Operculina Turpenthum
operculina-turpenthum.essence: A remedy for plague, fevers, diarrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Nishope (OPERCULINA TURPETHUM)
A remedy for plague, fevers, diarrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Delirium associated with restlessness, loquacity. Tendency to escape from bed; ravings, pains cause fainting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Watery diarrhoea, profuse with sinking sensation, Cholera morbus. Haemorrhoids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lymphatic glands enlarged and indurated. Boils and slowly suppurating abscesses.

oreodaphne-californica.name: Oreodaphne Californica
oreodaphne-californica.essence: Neuralgic headache, cervico-occipital pain, cerebro-spinal meningitis, atonic diarrhoea, and intestinal colic.
oreodaphne-californica.dosing: First to Third potency. Olfaction of the tincture.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
California Laurel (OREODAPHNE)
Neuralgic headache, cervico-occipital pain, cerebro-spinal meningitis, atonic diarrhoea, and intestinal colic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dizziness; worse on stopping or moving. Head heavy, eyelids heavy, twitching. Intense aching, *with pressure at inner angle of either orbit*, generally left, extending through brain and across scalp to the base of the occiput; worse light, noise; better, closing eyes and perfect quiet. Constant, dull ache in *cervical and occipital region*, extending to scapula down spine, into the head; pain into the ears. Great heaviness of head, with constant desire to move the head, which does not relieve. Drooping eyelids. Twitching. Atonic diarrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Eructations, with nausea and shuddering.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to Third potency. Olfaction of the tincture.

origanum-majorana.name: Origanum Majorana
origanum-majorana.essence: Acts on nervous system generally, and is effective in masturbation and excessively aroused sexual impulses. Affections of the breasts (*Bufo*). Desire for active exercise *impelling her to run*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Sweet Marjoram (ORIGANUM)
Acts on nervous system generally, and is effective in masturbation and excessively aroused sexual impulses. Affections of the breasts (*Bufo*). Desire for active exercise *impelling her to run*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Frotomania*; powerful lascivious impulses; leucorrhoea; hysteria. Lascivious ideas and dreams.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Ferula glauca* (in violent sexual excitement in women; icy coldness in occiput); *Plat; Valer; Canth; Hyos*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

ornithogalum-umbellatum.name: Ornithogalum Umbellatum
ornithogalum-umbellatum.essence:
To be considered in chronic gastric and other abdominal indurations, possibly cancer of intestinal tract, especially of stomach and Caecum. Center of action is the pylorus, causing painful contraction with duodenal distention.

Depression of spirits. Complete prostration. Feeling of sickness keeps patient awake at night.
ornithogalum-umbellatum.dosing: Single doses of mother tincture and await action.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Star of Bethlehem
To be considered in chronic gastric and other abdominal indurations, possibly cancer of intestinal tract, especially of stomach and Caecum. Center of action is the pylorus, causing painful contraction with duodenal distention.
Depression of spirits. Complete prostration. Feeling of sickness keeps patient awake at night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue coated. Agonizing feeling in chest and stomach, staring from pylorus with flatus that rolls in balls from one side to the other, loss of appetite, phlegmy retchings and loss of flesh. Gastric ulceration even with haemorrhage. *Pains increased when food passes pyloric outlet. Vomiting of coffee-ground*-looking matter. Distention of stomach. Frequent belching of offensive flatus. Painful sinking across epigastrium.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Single doses of mother tincture and await action.

osmium-metallicum-ac.name: Osmium Metallicum (+ -ac.)
osmium-metallicum-ac.essence: Irritation and catarrh of respiratory organs. Eczema. Albuminuria. *Pain in trachea*. Increases and gives odor to local perspiration. Causes *adhesion of the nail fold*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
The Element
Irritation and catarrh of respiratory organs. Eczema. Albuminuria. *Pain in trachea*. Increases and gives odor to local perspiration. Causes *adhesion of the nail fold*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels as if a band around head. Falling off of hair (*Kali carb; Fluor ac*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coryza, with full feeling in nose. Nose and larynx sensitive to air. Small lumps of phlegm from posterior nares.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Glaucoma*; with iridescent vision. Violent supra and infra-orbital neuralgia; violent pains and lachrymation. *Green colors surround candle-light*. Conjunctivitis. Increase in intra-ocular tension, dim sight, photophobia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Acute laryngitis; cough and expectoration of tough, stringy mucus. Convulsive cough; feels as though membrane were torn from larynx. Noisy, *dry, hard, cough*, in violent short bursts, coming from low down, shaking the whole body. Talking causes pain in larynx. Hoarse; *pain in larynx*; sore sternum. Twitching of fingers, with spasmodic cough.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Eczema, with pruritus. Irritated skin. Itching pimples. Bromidrosis, sweat in axilla smelling of garlic, worse evening and night. Fold remains attached to growing nail.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Argent; Iridium; Selen; Mangan*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency.

ostrya-virginica.name: Ostrya Virginica
ostrya-virginica.essence: Of great value in anaemia from malaria. Bilious conditions and intermittent fever.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Ironwood
Of great value in anaemia from malaria. Bilious conditions and intermittent fever.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Tongue yellow; coated at the root*. Loss of appetite. *Frequent nausea*, with dull, frontal headache. Sickening pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third potency.

oophorinum.name: Oophorinum
oophorinum.essence: Suffering following excision of the ovaries. *Climacteric disturbances* generally. Ovarian cysts. Cutaneous disorders and acne rosacea. Prurigo.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Ovarian Extract (OOPHORINUM)
Suffering following excision of the ovaries. *Climacteric disturbances* generally. Ovarian cysts. Cutaneous disorders and acne rosacea. Prurigo.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Orchitinum*-Testicular Extract--(after ovariotomy, sexual weakness, senile decay).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Low triturations.

ovi-gallinae-pellicula.name: Ovi Gallinae Pellicula
ovi-gallinae-pellicula.essence: Sudden pains. Bearing-down sensation. Intolerance of bands on wrist, arms, waist, etc. Backache and pain in left hip. Debility. Pain in heart and left ovary.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Membrane of Egg-shell
Sudden pains. Bearing-down sensation. Intolerance of bands on wrist, arms, waist, etc. Backache and pain in left hip. Debility. Pain in heart and left ovary.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Calc; Naja; Ova tosta-Tosta praeparata*-Roasted egg-shells-Calcarea ovorum--(leucorrhoea and backache. A feeling as if the spine were broken and wired, or tied together with a string. Pain of cancer. Warts). Also *Egg Vaccine for Asthma*. Much interest is shown in Dr. Fritz Talbot's method to cure one form of asthma in children by the use of egg vaccine. Asthma due to susceptibility of the proteid substance in eggs can be cured by immunizing against egg poisons by repeated doses of egg white. After the skin has been cleansed with soap and alcohol the egg-white is rubbed into a slight scratch.

oxalicum-acidum.name: Oxalicum Acidum
oxalicum-acidum.essence: Although certain oxalates are constant constituents of vegetable food and of the human body, the acid itself is a violent poison when taken internally, producing gastro-enteritis, motor paralysis, collapse, stupor and death. Influences the spinal cord, and produces motor paralysis. Pains very violent, *in spots* (*Kali bich*) *worse*, motion, and *thinking of them*. *Periodical remissions*. Spasmodic symptoms of throat and chest. *Rheumatism of left side*. *Neurasthenia*. Tuberculosis.

agg: shaving. Aroused about 3 am with gastric and abdominal pain. *All conditions made worse by thinking about self

complementary: Ars; Colch; Arg; Pic ac; Cicer arietinum

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Sorrel Acid
Although certain oxalates are constant constituents of vegetable food and of the human body, the acid itself is a violent poison when taken internally, producing gastro-enteritis, motor paralysis, collapse, stupor and death. Influences the spinal cord, and produces motor paralysis. Pains very violent, *in spots* (*Kali bich*) *worse*, motion, and *thinking of them*. *Periodical remissions*. Spasmodic symptoms of throat and chest. *Rheumatism of left side*. *Neurasthenia*. Tuberculosis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sense of heat. Confusion and vertigo. Headache, before and during stool.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Severe pain in eyes; feel expanded. *Hyperaesthesia of retina*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent pain in epigastrium, discharge of flatus relieves. Gastralgia, pyrosis, sensation of coldness below epigastrium. Burning pain, extending upwards; slightest touch causes excruciating pain. Bitter and sour eructation, worse at night. Cannot eat strawberries.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in upper part and region of navel two hours after eating, with much flatulence. Stitches in liver. Colic. Burning in small spots in abdomen. Diarrhoea from coffee.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Terrible neuralgic pains in spermatic cord*. Testicles feel contused and heavy. Seminal vesiculitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frequent and copious. Burning in urethra and pain in glans when urinating. Must urinate when thinking of it. Urine contains oxalates.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nervous aphonia with cardiac derangement (*Coca; Hydrocy ac*). Burning sensation from throat down. Breathing spasmodic, with constriction of larynx and chest. *Hoarseness. Left lung painful. Aphonia*. Paralysis of the tensors of vocal cord. *Dyspnoea; short, jerking inspirations*. Sharp pain through lower region of left lung, extending down to epigastrium.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Palpitation and dyspnoea in organic heart disease; *worse*, when thinking of it. Pulse feeble. Heart symptoms alternate with aphonia, *angina pectoris; sharp, lancinating pain in left lung coming on suddenly, depriving of breath*. Praecordial pains which dart to the left shoulder. Aortic insufficiency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Numb, weak, tingling. Pains start from spine and extend through extremities. Drawing and *lancinating pains* shooting down extremities. *Backache*; numb, weak, Myelitis. Muscular prostration. Wrist painful, as if sprained (*Ulmus*). Lower extremities blue, cold, insensible. Sensation of numbness. Multiple cerebral and posterior spinal sclerosis. Lancinating pains in various parts; jerking pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensitive, smarting and soreness, worse shaving; mottled, marbled in circular patches. Perspires easily.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse, left* side; slightest touch; light; shaving. Aroused about 3 am with gastric and abdominal pain. *All conditions made worse by thinking about self*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Ars; Colch; Arg; Pic ac; Cicer arietinum*-Chick-pea--(Lithiasis, jaundice, liver affections; diuretic). *Scolopendra*-Centipede--(terrible pains in back and loins, extending down limbs; return periodically, commencing in head, to toes. Angina pectoris. Inflammation, pain and gangrene. Pustules and abscesses). *Caesium*--(Pain in lumber region and testicle. Headache, darting through temples. Diarrhoea and colic. Languor).
*Lime Water*-Antidote to poisoning of Oxal acid.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth potency.

oxydendron-arboreum.name: Oxydendron Arboreum
oxydendron-arboreum.essence: A remedy for dropsy-ascites and anasarca. Urine suppressed. Deranged portal circulation. Prostatic enlargement. Vesical calculi. Irritation of neck of bladder. Great difficulty of breathing. Tincture. Compare: *Cerefolius* (dropsy, Bright's disease, cystitis).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Sorrel-tree (OXYDENDRON - ANDROMEDA ARBOREA)
A remedy for dropsy-ascites and anasarca. Urine suppressed. Deranged portal circulation. Prostatic enlargement. Vesical calculi. Irritation of neck of bladder. Great difficulty of breathing. Tincture. Compare: *Cerefolius* (dropsy, Bright's disease, cystitis).

oxytropis-lamberti.name: Oxytropis Lamberti
oxytropis-lamberti.essence: Marked action on nervous system. Trembling, sensation of emptiness. Walks backwards. Congestion of spine and paralysis. Pains come and go quickly. Sphincters relaxed. Staggering gait. Reflexes lost.

agg: thinking of symptoms (mono-maniac tendency). *Worse*, every other day

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Loco-weed (OXYTROPIS)
Marked action on nervous system. Trembling, sensation of emptiness. Walks backwards. Congestion of spine and paralysis. Pains come and go quickly. Sphincters relaxed. Staggering gait. Reflexes lost.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Desires to be alone. Disinclined to work or talk. Worse, thinking of symptoms (*Oxalic ac*). *Mental depression*. Vertigo (*Granatum*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo. Full, warm feeling about head. Feeling of intoxication, with loss of vision. Pain in maxillary bones and masseter muscles. Mouth and nose dry.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sight obscured; pupils contracted; do not respond to light. Paralysis of nerves and muscles of eyes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Eructations with colicky pains. Epigastrium tender.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sphincter seems relaxed. Stools slip from anus, *like lumps of jelly*, mushy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Urging to urinate when thinking of it. *Profuse flow*. Pain in kidneys (*Berberis*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: No desire or ability. Pain in testicles and along spermatic cord and down thighs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain along ulnar nerve. Numb feeling about spine. *Staggering gait*. Loss of co-ordination. Patellar tendon reflex lost. Pains come and go quickly, but muscles remain sore and stiff.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Restless, dreams of quarrel.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, thinking of symptoms (mono-maniac tendency). *Worse*, every other day. *Better*, after sleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Astrag; Lathyr; Oxal ac; Baryta* (Loco plant is rich in Baryta). *Lolium*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency and higher.

paeonia-officinalis.name: Paeonia Officinalis
paeonia-officinalis.essence: The rectal and anal symptoms are most important. Chronic ulcers on lower parts of body, leg, foot, toe, also breast, rectum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Peony (PAEONIA)
The rectal and anal symptoms are most important. Chronic ulcers on lower parts of body, leg, foot, toe, also breast, rectum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rush of blood to head and face. Nervous. Vertigo when moving. Burning in eyes and ringing in ears.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Biting, *itching in anus*; orifice swollen. Burning in anus after stool; then internal chilliness. Fistula ani, diarrhoea, with anal burning and internal chilliness. Painful ulcer, oozing offensive moisture on perineum. *Haemorrhoids, fissures, ulceration of anus and perineum, purple, covered with crusts*. Atrocious pains with and after each stool. Sudden, pasty diarrhoea, with faintness in abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sticking pain in left chest. Heat in chest. Dull shooting from front to back through heart.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in wrist and fingers; knees and toes. Weakness of legs, inhibiting walking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Terrifying dreams, nightmare.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensitive, painful. Ulcers below coccyx, around sacrum; varicose veins. Ulcers in general, from pressure, bedsores, etc. Itching, burning, as from nettles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Glechoma*-Ground Ivy--(rectal symptom). *Hamam; Sil; Aesc; Ratanh* (*great constriction* of anus; stools forced with great effort).
Antidotes: *Ratanh; Aloe*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

palladium-metallicum.name: Palladium Metallicum
palladium-metallicum.essence: An ovarian remedy; produces the symptom-complex of chronic Oophoritis. Useful where the parenchyma of the gland is not totally destroyed. Acts also on mind and skin. Motor weakness, averse to exercise.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
The Metal (PALLADIUM)
An ovarian remedy; produces the symptom-complex of chronic Oophoritis. Useful where the parenchyma of the gland is not totally destroyed. Acts also on mind and skin. Motor weakness, averse to exercise.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Weeping mood. *Love of approbation*. Pride; *easily offended*. Inclined to use violent language. *Keeps up brightly when in company*, much exhausted afterwards, and pains aggravated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels as if swung backward and forward. Temporo-parietal neuralgia with pain in shoulder. *Pain across top of head from ear to ear*; worse after an evening's entertainment, with irritability and sour eructations. Sallow complexion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Shooting pain from navel to pelvis. Sensation as if intestines were bitten off. Intestines feel strangulated. Soreness of abdomen, swelling in right groin. Flatulency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Uterine prolapse and retroversion. Subacute pelvic peritonitis, with right-sided pain and backache; menorrhagia. Cutting pain in uterus; relieved after stool. *Pain and swelling in region of right ovary*. Shooting or burning pain in pelvis and bearing-down; relieved by rubbing. Soreness and shooting pain from navel of breast. Glairy leucorrhoea. Menstrual discharge while nursing. Stitches in right breast near nipple. It is indicated in that gynaecological condition where the disease had its inception in the right ovary, the uterine prolapse and retroversion, the subacute pelvic peritonitis and concomitant symptoms being secondary (F. Aguilar, M. D).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pruritus. Tired feeling in small of back. Fleeting, neuralgic pains in extremities, Heavy and tired in limbs. Darting pain from toes to hips. Rheumatic pain in right shoulder; in right hip. Sciatica.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Complementary; *Plat*.
Compare: *Arg; Helon; Lil; Apis*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth potency.

paris-quadrifolia.name: Paris Quadrifolia
paris-quadrifolia.essence: Head symptoms marked and verified. Sensation of expansion and consequent tension. Coldness of right side of body, left hot. Catarrhal complaints, stuffed feeling at root of nose. Disorder of sense of touch.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
One-berry
Head symptoms marked and verified. Sensation of expansion and consequent tension. Coldness of right side of body, left hot. Catarrhal complaints, stuffed feeling at root of nose. Disorder of sense of touch.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Imaginary foul smells. Feels too large. *Garrulous*, prattling, vivacious.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation as if scalp were contracted and bones scraped. Soreness of top of head; cannot brush hair. Aches, as from *pulling a string from eyes to occiput*. Occipital headache, with a feeling of weight. Head feels very large, expanded. Scalp sensitive. Numb feeling on left side of head.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Affections of the eyebrows. Eyes feel heavy, as if they were projected; *sensation of a string through eyeballs*. Expanded, as though lids did not cover.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Neuralgia; hot stitches in left malar bone, which is very sore. Has relieved in inflammation of the antrum, where eye symptoms co-existed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Tongue dry when awaking*-Coated white, *without thirst*, with bitter or diminished taste.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stuffed condition and fullness at root of nose. Periodical, *painless hoarseness*. Cough as from vapor of sulphur in trachea. Constant hawking, on account of viscid, green mucus in larynx and trachea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sense of *weight and weariness in nape of neck* and across shoulders. Neuralgia, beginning in left intercostal region, and extending into left arm. Arm becomes stiff, fingers clenched. Neuralgia of coccyx; pulsating, sticking, when sitting. *Fingers often feel numb*. Numbness of upper limbs. Everything feels rough.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Pastinaca-Parsnip*--(Loquacity; delirium tremens; illusions of vision; intolerance on milk; Roots used dietetically, cooked in water or as broth or as salad for consumptives and "kidney stones"). *Sil; Calc; Nux; Rhus*.
Incompatible; *Ferr phos*.
Antidote: *Coff*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

paraffinum.name: Paraffinum
paraffinum.essence: Valuable in uterine affections. Particularly serviceable in constipation. Knife-like pains. Pains extend from one part to another, and alternate. Pain in stomach alternates with pain in throat and spine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Purified Paraffin (PARAFFINE)
Valuable in uterine affections. Particularly serviceable in constipation. Knife-like pains. Pains extend from one part to another, and alternate. Pain in stomach alternates with pain in throat and spine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Left side of head and face suffer most; pains stinging and twisting. Pain as if a nail were driven in left side of vertex. Twisting in left ear.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vision dim; black specks before. Lids red. Sensation as if there were fat on the eyes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tearing, twisting pain in teeth down to lower jaw. Full of saliva; feels sticky; bitter taste.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hungry all the time. Pain across stomach. Pain in stomach alternates with pain in throat and spine, extends to chest with belching. Fixed pain in left hypochondrium, as if parts were being twisted. Palpitation with stomach pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in lower abdomen, extending to genitals, rectum and coccyx; better, sitting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frequent desire for stool. *Obstinate constipation in children* (*Alumina; Nyctanthes*). Chronic constipation, with haemorrhoids and continual urging to stool, without result.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses too late, black, abundant. Milky leucorrhoea. Nipples pain when touched, as if sore inside. Stabbing pain in mons veneris. Very hot urine with burning pains in vulva.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in spine extending to inguinal region and in both loins, when ascending the stairs. Feeling of electric shocks in all joints. Wrenching pain in calves, extending into toes, in joints. Feet swollen with tearing in ankles and soles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burns, even of third degree, with sloughing and sepsis. Wash with sterile water and dry and spray with paraffin, and cover with thin layer of cotton. Useful also in frost bites.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Naphthalin; Petrol; Kreos; Eupion*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lower triturations and thirtieth potency.

pareira-brava.name: Pareira Brava
pareira-brava.essence: The urinary symptoms are most important. Useful in renal colic, prostatic affections, and catarrh of bladder. Sensation as if bladder were distended, with pain. *Pain going down thigh*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Virgin-vine (CHONDRODENDRON TOMENTOSUM)
The urinary symptoms are most important. Useful in renal colic, prostatic affections, and catarrh of bladder. Sensation as if bladder were distended, with pain. *Pain going down thigh*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Black, bloody, thick mucous urine. *Constant urging; great straining; pain down thighs during efforts to urinate*. Can emit urine only when he goes on his knees, pressing head firmly against the floor. Feeling of the bladder being distended and neuralgic pain in the anterior crural region. (*Staph*.) Dribbling after micturition. (*Selen*.) *Violent pain in glans penis*. Itching along urethra; urethritis, with prostatic trouble. Inflammation of urethra; becomes almost cartilaginous.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Parietaria* (renal calculi; nightmare, patient dreaming of being buried alive); *Chimaphila* (chronic catarrhal congestion following cystitis; acute prostatitis; feeling of a ball in perineum when sitting); *Fabiana*, see *Pichi* (dysuria; post-gonorrhoeal complications; gravel; vesical catarrh); *Uva; Hydrang; Berber; Ocim; Hedeom*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency.

parthenium-hysterophorus.name: Parthenium Hysterophorus
parthenium-hysterophorus.essence: A Cuban remedy for fevers, especially malarial. Increased flow of milk. Amenorrhoea and general debility. Cheyne-Stokes breathing. After Quinine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Bitter-broom (PARTHENIUM - ESCOBA AMARGO)
A Cuban remedy for fevers, especially malarial. Increased flow of milk. Amenorrhoea and general debility. Cheyne-Stokes breathing. After Quinine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aches, extending to nose; feels swelled; pain in frontal eminence. Eyes heavy; eyeballs ache. Ringing in ears. Pain at root of nose; feels swollen. Aching in teeth. *Teeth feel on edge*; too long. Disordered vision. Tinnitus and pain in ears.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in left hypochondrium. Spleen affections.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, after sleep, sudden motion. *Better*, after rising, and walking about.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *China; Ceanoth; Helianth*.

passiflora-incarnata.name: Passiflora Incarnata
passiflora-incarnata.essence: An efficient anti-spasmodic. Whooping-cough. Morphine habit. Delirium tremens. Convulsions in children; neuralgia. Has a quieting effect on the nervous system. Insomnia, produces normal sleep, no disturbance of cerebral functions, neuroses of children, worm-fever, teething, spasms. *Tetanus*. Hysteria; puerperal convulsions. Painful diarrhoea. Acute mania. *Atonic condition* generally present. *Asthma*, 10-30 gtt every ten minutes for a few doses. Locally, in erysipelas.
passiflora-incarnata.dosing: Large doses of mother tincture are required-thirty to sixty drops, repeated several times.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Passion-flower
An efficient anti-spasmodic. Whooping-cough. Morphine habit. Delirium tremens. Convulsions in children; neuralgia. Has a quieting effect on the nervous system. Insomnia, produces normal sleep, no disturbance of cerebral functions, neuroses of children, worm-fever, teething, spasms. *Tetanus*. Hysteria; puerperal convulsions. Painful diarrhoea. Acute mania. *Atonic condition* generally present. *Asthma*, 10-30 gtt every ten minutes for a few doses. Locally, in erysipelas.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent ache as if top of head would come off-eyes felt as if pushed out.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Leaden, dead feeling after or between meals; flatulence and sour eructations.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Restless and wakeful, resulting from exhaustion. Especially in the feeble, infants and the aged. Insomnia of infants and the aged, and the mentally worried, and overworked, with tendency to convulsions. Nocturnal cough.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Large doses of mother tincture are required-thirty to sixty drops, repeated several times.

paullinia-sorbilis.name: Paullinia Sorbilis
paullinia-sorbilis.essence: Contains a large percentage of Caffeine, which may explain its use as a remedy for certain forms os sick headache.
paullinia-sorbilis.dosing: Must be given in material doses-fifteen to sixty grains of the powder.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Guarana (PAULLINIA SORBILIS)
Contains a large percentage of Caffeine, which may explain its use as a remedy for certain forms os sick headache.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Intellectual excitement. Sick headache in persons who have used tea and coffee in excess. Throbbing headache after use of liquor.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stools profuse, bloody, bright green; flakes inter-mixed; odorless. Cholera infantum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chloasmata on temples and arms. Urticaria (*Dulc; Apis; Chloral*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Uncontrollable sleepiness and heaviness of head, with flushed face after eating.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Must be given in material doses-fifteen to sixty grains of the powder.

penthorum-sedoides.name: Penthorum Sedoides
penthorum-sedoides.essence: A remedy for coryza, with rawness and wet feeling in nose. Throat feels raw. Chronic disorders of mucous membranes, with irritability. Chronic post-nasal catarrh; chronic pharyngitis, mucous membrane purple and relaxed. Posterior nares feel moist and raw; nose and ears feel full. Aphonia, hoarseness, relaxed vocal cords. Hypersecretion of mucous membranes. Itching of anus and burning in rectum. Trouble in pharyngeal vault and Eustachian tube.
penthorum-sedoides.dosing: Not very active, and better adapted to chronic affections; its use should be persisted in for some time. Lower potencies.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Virginia Stonecrop (PENTHORUM)
A remedy for coryza, with rawness and wet feeling in nose. Throat feels raw. Chronic disorders of mucous membranes, with irritability. Chronic post-nasal catarrh; chronic pharyngitis, mucous membrane purple and relaxed. Posterior nares feel moist and raw; nose and ears feel full. Aphonia, hoarseness, relaxed vocal cords. Hypersecretion of mucous membranes. Itching of anus and burning in rectum. Trouble in pharyngeal vault and Eustachian tube.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Constant wet feeling in nose*, which no amount of blowing will relieve. Discharge thick, pus-like, streaked with blood. *Post-nasal catarrh* of puberty.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Not very active, and better adapted to chronic affections; its use should be persisted in for some time. Lower potencies.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Penthororun* often follows *Pulsat. Sang; Hydr*.

coqueluchinum.name: Coqueluchinum
coqueluchinum.essence: Taken from the glairy and stringy mucus containing the virus of whooping-cough. Introduced by John H. Clarke for the treatment of whooping-cough and other spasmodic coughs.

complementary: Drosera; Corallium; Cuprum; Naphthal; Mephitis; Passiflor; Coccus Cacti; Magnes phos

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Coqueluchin (PERTUSSIN)
Taken from the glairy and stringy mucus containing the virus of whooping-cough. Introduced by John H. Clarke for the treatment of whooping-cough and other spasmodic coughs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Drosera; Corallium; Cuprum; Naphthal; Mephitis; Passiflor; Coccus Cacti; Magnes phos*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: The thirtieth potency.

petroleum.name: Petroleum
petroleum.essence:
Strumous diathesis, especially the dark type, who suffer from catarrhal conditions of the mucous membranes, gastric acidity and cutaneous eruptions.

Very marked skin symptoms, acting on sweat and oil glands; Ailments are worse during the winter season. Ailments from riding in cars, carriages, or ships; lingering gastric and lung troubles; chronic diarrhoea. *Long-lasting complaints* follow mental states-fright, vexation, etc. Chlorosis in young girls with or without ulceration of the stomach.

agg: dampness*, before and during a thunder-storm, from riding in cars, *passive motion
in winter*, eating, from mental states

petroleum.dosing: Third to thirtieth and higher potencies. Material doses often better.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chronic sprains. Fetid sweat in axillae. Knees stiff. *Tips of fingers rough, cracked, fissured every winter*. Scalding sensation in knee. Cracking in joints.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in nape of neck, stiff and painful. Weakness in small of back. Coccyx painful.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hoarseness (*Carbo; Caust; Phos*) dry cough and oppression of chest; worse, cold air. Dry cough at night, coming deep from chest. Croup and laryngeal diphtheria.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation of coldness (*Carb an; Nat mur*). Fainting, with ebullitions, heat and palpitation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Crude Rock-oil
Strumous diathesis, especially the dark type, who suffer from catarrhal conditions of the mucous membranes, gastric acidity and cutaneous eruptions.
Very marked skin symptoms, acting on sweat and oil glands; Ailments are worse during the winter season. Ailments from riding in cars, carriages, or ships; lingering gastric and lung troubles; chronic diarrhoea. *Long-lasting complaints* follow mental states-fright, vexation, etc. Chlorosis in young girls with or without ulceration of the stomach.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Marked aggravation from mental emotions. Loses his way in streets. Thinks he is double, or some one else lying alongside. *Feels that death is near, and must hurry to settle affairs*. Irritable, easily offended, vexed at everything. *Low-spirited, with dimness of sight*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensitive, *as of a cold breeze blowing on it*. Feels numb, as if made of wood; *occiput heavy, as of lead* (*Opium*). *Vertigo on rising*, felt in occiput, as if intoxicated, or like sea-sickness. *Moist eruption on scalp*; worse, back and ears. Scalp sore to touch, followed by numbness. Headache, must hold temples to relieve; provoked by shaking while coughing. Use thirtieth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Loss of eyelashes. Dim sight; far-sighted; cannot read fine print without glasses; blenorrhoea of lachrymal sac; *marginal blepharitis*. Canthi fissured. Skin around eyes dry and scurfy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Noise unbearable, especially from several people talking together. Eczema, intertrigo, etc, in and behind ears, with intense itching. Parts sore to touch. Fissures in meatus. Dry catarrh, with deafness and noises. Ringing and cracking in ears. Chronic Eustachian catarrh. Diminished hearing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Nostrils ulcerated, cracked, burn*; tip of nose itches. Epistaxis. Ozaena, with scabs and muco-purulent discharge.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry; feels constricted, as if covered with albumin.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heartburn; hot, sharp, sour eructation. Distention. Feeling of great emptiness. Strong aversion to fat food, meat; worse, eating cabbage. *Hunger*, immediately after stool. *Nausea*, with accumulation of water in mouth. Gastralgia when stomach is empty; relieved by constant eating (*Anac; Sep*). Ravenous hunger. Must rise at night and eat (*Psorin*). Odor of garlic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Diarrhoea only in the daytime*; watery, gushing and *Itching of anus*. After cabbage; with empty feeling of stomach.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Herpetic eruption on perineum. Prostate inflamed and swollen. Itching in urethra.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Before menses, throbbing in head (*Kreos*). Leucorrhoea, profuse, albuminous (*Alum; Bor; Bov; Calc p*). Genitals sore and moist. Sensation of moisture (*Eup purp*). Itching and mealy coating of nipple.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching at night. Chilblains, moist, itch and burn. Bed-sores. *Skin dry, constricted, very sensitive, rough and cracked, leathery*. Herpes. Slightest scratch makes skin suppurate (*Hepar*). Intertrigo; psoriasis of hands. *Thick, greenish crusts, burning and itching; redness, raw; cracks bleed easily*. Eczema. Rhagades *worse in winter*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chilliness, followed by sweat. Flushes of heat, particularly of the face and head; worse at night. Perspiration on feet and axillae.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse, dampness*, before and during a thunder-storm, from riding in cars, *passive motion; in winter*, eating, from mental states. *Better*, warm air; lying with head high; dry weather.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Carbo; Graph; Sulph; Phos*.
Complementary: *Sepia*.
Antidotes: *Nux; Coccul*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth and higher potencies. Material doses often better.

petroselinum-sativum.name: Petroselinum Sativum
petroselinum-sativum.essence: The urinary symptoms give the keynotes for this remedy. *Piles with much itching*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Parsley (PETROSELINUM)
The urinary symptoms give the keynotes for this remedy. *Piles with much itching*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning, tingling, from perineum throughout whole urethra; *sudden urging, to urinate*; frequent, voluptuous tickling in fossa navicularis. Gonorrhoea; *sudden, irresistible desire to urinate; intense biting, itching, deep in urethra*; milky discharge.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thirsty and hungry, but desire fails on beginning to eat or drink.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Apiol*-the active principle of Parsley--(in dysmenorrhoea); *Canth; Sars.: Cannab; Merc*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third potency.

phaseolus-nanus.name: Phaseolus Nanus
phaseolus-nanus.dosing: Sixth and higher. A decoction of the shells as a drink for diabetes, but look out for severe headache.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Breathing slow and sighing. Pulse rapid. *Palpitation*. Sick feeling about heart, with weak pulse. Right ribs sore. Dropsical effusion into pleura or pericardium.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diabetic urine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fearful palpitation and feeling that death is approaching.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Crataeg; Lach*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth and higher. A decoction of the shells as a drink for diabetes, but look out for severe headache.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pupils dilated, insensible to light. Eyeballs painful to touch.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Dwarf-bean (PHASEOLUS)
Heart symptoms quite pronounce. Diabetes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aches chiefly in forehead or orbits from fullness of brain; worse any movement or mental exertion.

phellandrium-aquaticum.name: Phellandrium Aquaticum
phellandrium-aquaticum.essence: The respiratory symptoms are most important, and have been frequently verified clinically. A very good remedy for the *offensive expectoration and cough in phthisis*, bronchitis, and emphysema. Tuberculosis, affecting generally the middle lobes. *Everything tastes sweet*. Haemoptysis, hectic and colliquative diarrhoea.

complementary: Con; Phyt; Sil; Ant iod; Myosotis arvensis

phellandrium-aquaticum.dosing: Tincture, to sixth potency. In phthisis not below the sixth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Water Dropwort (PHELLANDRIUM)
The respiratory symptoms are most important, and have been frequently verified clinically. A very good remedy for the *offensive expectoration and cough in phthisis*, bronchitis, and emphysema. Tuberculosis, affecting generally the middle lobes. *Everything tastes sweet*. Haemoptysis, hectic and colliquative diarrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Weight on vertex; aching and burning in temples and above eyes*. Crushing feeling in vertex. Vertigo, dizzy when lying down.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ciliary neuralgia; worse any attempt to use eyes: burning in eyes. Lachrymation. Cannot bear light. Headache; involving nerves going to eye.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pain in milk ducts*; intolerable between nursing. Pain in nipples.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Sticking pain through right breast near sternum, extending to back near shoulders*. Dyspnoea, and continuous cough, early in morning. Cough, with profuse and fetid expectoration; compels him to sit up. Hoarseness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hectic; profuse and debilitating perspiration; intermittent, with pain in arms. Desire for acids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tired feeling when walking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Con; Phyt; Sil; Ant iod; Myosotis arvensis*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to sixth potency. In phthisis not below the sixth.

physostigma-venenosum.name: Physostigma Venenosum
physostigma-venenosum.essence: This remedy and its active principle, *Eserine*, form a valuable addition to Materia Medica. Stimulates heart, raises blood pressure, and increases peristalsis. Causes contraction of the pupil and of the ciliary muscles. Induces a condition of short-sightedness. *Spinal irritation*, loss of motility, prostration, with very sensitive vertebrae Fibrillary tremors. Rigidity of muscles; paralysis. Depresses the motor and reflex activity of the cord and causes loss of sensibility to pain, muscular we...
physostigma-venenosum.dosing:
Third potency. The neutral sulphate of Eserine is instilled into the eye, from one-half to four grains to one ounce distilled water, to induce
*contraction of pupil*, in mydriasis, injuries to the eye, iritis, corneal ulcers, etc.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Calabar Bean
This remedy and its active principle, *Eserine*, form a valuable addition to Materia Medica. Stimulates heart, raises blood pressure, and increases peristalsis. Causes contraction of the pupil and of the ciliary muscles. Induces a condition of short-sightedness. *Spinal irritation*, loss of motility, prostration, with very sensitive vertebrae Fibrillary tremors. Rigidity of muscles; paralysis. Depresses the motor and reflex activity of the cord and causes loss of sensibility to pain, muscular weakness, followed by complete paralysis, although muscular contractility is not impaired. Paralysis and tremors, chorea. Meningeal irritation, with rigidity of muscles. *Tetanus* and trismus. Polymyelitis anterior. Eserine is used locally to produce contraction of pupil.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constant pain on top; vertigo, with constrictive feeling of head. Pain over orbits; *cannot bear to raise eyelids*. Cerebro-spinal meningitis; general tetanic rigidity. Spastic conditions of the face-muscles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Night-blindness (Opposite: *Bothrops*); photophobia; *contraction of pupils; twitching of ocular muscles*. Lagophthalmus. Muscae volitantes; flashes of light; partial blindness. *Glaucoma*; paresis of accommodation; astigmatism. Profuse lachrymation. *Spasm of ciliary muscles, with irritability after using eyes. Increasing myopia*. Post-diphtheritic paralysis of eye and accommodation muscles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fluent coryza; burning and tingling of nostrils; nose stuffed and hot. Fever-blisters around nostrils.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Tongue feels sore on tip*. Feeling as if a ball came up throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Strong heart-pulsation felt in throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Great pain immediately after eating. Sensitive to pressure in epigastric region. Pain extends into chest and down arms. Gastralgia; chronic constipation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Irregular menstruation, with palpitation. Congestion of eyes. Rigid muscles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feeble pulse; palpitation; spasmodic action, with feeling pulsation through the whole body. Beats of heart distinctly perceptible in chest and head. *Fluttering of heart felt in throat*. Fatty degeneration (*Cup ac*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pain in right popliteal space*. Burning and tingling in spine. Hands and feet numb. Sudden jerking of limbs on going to sleep. Tetanic convulsions. Locomotor ataxia. Numbness in paralyzed parts, crampy pains in limbs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Eserine*-the alkaloid of Physostigma--(slows action of heart and increases arterial tension; in ciliary spasm and spasmodic *astigmatism* due to irregular action of ciliary muscles; blepharo-spasms; *pupils contracted*. Twitching of lids, soreness of eyeballs, blurring of vision *after using eyes*, pains around eyes and head). Used locally to contract the pupil. *Eserine* contracts the pupils dilated by *Atropin*, but not those dilated by *Gelsemium*. Internally 6x.
*Eserin Salicylate* (post-operative intestinal paralysis; meteorism. Hypodermically 1/60-1/40 gr).
Compare also: *Muscarin; Conium; Curare; Gels; Thebainum* (tetanus); *Piperazinum*--(Uric acid conditions. Pruritus. Gout and urinary calculi. *Constant backache*. Skin dry, urine scanty. Rheumatic urthritis. Give one grain daily in carbonated water. First and second decimal trituration three times a day).
Antidote: *Atropia*. In full medicinal doses will relieve most of the effects of *physostigmine*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Third potency. The neutral sulphate of Eserine is instilled into the eye, from one-half to four grains to one ounce distilled water, to induce
*contraction of pupil*, in mydriasis, injuries to the eye, iritis, corneal ulcers, etc.

physalia-pelagica.name: Physalia Pelagica

agg: cold camp evening. After going heated

physalia-pelagica.dosing: Tincture to third attenuation. The juice of the berries is used in dropsical conditions and irritable bladder.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Alkekengi-Winter Cherry (PHYSALIS - SOLANUM VESICARIUM)
Marked urinary symptoms confirming its ancient uses in gravel, etc. Lithiasis; marked diuretic action. Languor and muscular weakness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo, hazy feeling; memory weakness; desire to talk constantly. Throbbing pain, heavy over eyes in forehead. Facial paralysis. Dryness of mouth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stiff limbs; tonic cramps. Paralysis. When walking, every jar seems repeated in the head.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chilly in open air. Feverish in evening. Sweat during stool, with creeping sensation, with abundant urine. Pain in liver during, fever.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cough. Hoarse voice; throat irritated; chest oppressed, causing insomnia. Stabbing in chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Acrid, foul, retained, abundant. Polyuria. Sudden inability to hold it in women. Nocturnal incontinence. Enuresis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Excoriation between fingers and toes; pustules on thighs; nodes on forehead.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, cold camp evening. After going heated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture to third attenuation. The juice of the berries is used in dropsical conditions and irritable bladder.

phytolacca-decandra.name: Phytolacca Decandra
phytolacca-decandra.essence: Aching, soreness, restlessness, prostration, are general symptoms guiding to Phytolacca. Pre-eminently a glandular remedy. Glandular swellings with heat and inflammation. Has a powerful effect on fibrous and osseous tissues; fasciae and muscle sheaths; acts on scar tissue. Syphilitic bone pains; chronic rheumatism. Sore throat, quinsy, and diphtheria. Tetanus and opisthotonos. Decrease of weight. Retarded dentition.

agg: sensitive to electric changes. Effects of a wetting, when it *rains*, exposure to *damp*, cold weather, night exposure, motion, right side

complementary: Bry; Rhus; Kali hyd; Merc; Sang; Arum triph

phytolacca-decandra.dosing: Tincture, to third potency. Externally for mastitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, sensitive to electric changes. Effects of a wetting, when it *rains*, exposure to *damp*, cold weather, night exposure, motion, right side. *Better*, warmth, dry weather, rest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: Tincture of *Phytolacca Berry* (sore throats and in the treatment of obesity); *Bry; Rhus; Kali hyd; Merc; Sang; Arum triph*.
Inimical: *Mercur*.
Antidotes: Milk and salt; *Bellad; Mezer*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Poke-root (PHYTOLACCA)
Aching, soreness, restlessness, prostration, are general symptoms guiding to Phytolacca. Pre-eminently a glandular remedy. Glandular swellings with heat and inflammation. Has a powerful effect on fibrous and osseous tissues; fasciae and muscle sheaths; acts on scar tissue. Syphilitic bone pains; chronic rheumatism. Sore throat, quinsy, and diphtheria. Tetanus and opisthotonos. Decrease of weight. Retarded dentition.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Loss of personal delicacy, disregard of surrounding objects. Indifferent to life.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo on rising. Brain feels sore. Pain from frontal region backward. Pressure in temples and over eyes. Rheumatism of scalp; pains come on every time it rains. Scaly eruption on scalp.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Smarting*. Feeling of sand under lids. Tarsal edges feel hot. Fistula lachrymalis (*Fluor ac*). *Abundant lachrymation, hot*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coryza; flow of mucus from *one nostril and from posterior nares*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Teething children with irresistible desire *to bite the teeth together*. Teeth clenched; lower lip drawn down; lips everted; jaws firmly set; chin drawn down on sternum. Tongue *red tip*, feels rough and scalded; bleeding from mouth; blisters on side. Mapped, indented, fissured, with yellow patch down center. Much stringy saliva.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Dark red or bluish red*. Much pain at root of tongue; soft palate and tonsils swollen. Sensation of a lump in throat (*Bell; Lach*). *Throat feels rough, narrow, hot. Tonsils swollen*, especially right; dark-red appearance. *Shooting pain into ears on swallowing*. Pseudo-membranous exudation, grayish white; thick, tenacious yellowish mucus, difficult to dislodge. *Cannot swallow anything hot* (*Lach*). Tension and pressure in parotid gland. Ulcerated sore throat and diphtheria; *throat feels very hot; pain at root of tongue extending to ear*. Uvula large, dropsical. *Quinsy; tonsils and fauces swollen*, with burning pain; cannot swallow even water. *Mumps. Follicular pharyngitis*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sore spot in right hypochondrium. Rheumatism of abdominal muscles. Colic at navel. Burning griping pains. Bruised feeling through epigastrium and abdomen. Constipation of the aged and those with weak heart. Bleeding from rectum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scanty, suppressed, *with pain in kidney region*. Nephritis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Mastitis; *mammae hard and very sensitive*. Tumors of the breasts with enlarged axillary glands. Cancer of breast. Breast is hard, painful and of purple hue. Mammary abscess. When child nurses, *pain goes from nipple all over body*. Cracks and small ulcers about nipples. Irritable breasts, before and during menses. Galactorrhoea (*Calc*). Menses too copious and frequent. Ovarian neuralgia of right side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Painful induration of testicles. *Shooting along perineum to penis*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feeling as if heart leaped into throat (*Pod*). Shock of pain in cardiac region alternating with pain in right arm.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aphonia. Difficult breathing; dry hacking, tickling cough; worse at night (*Mentha; Bellad*). Aching pains in chest, through mid-sternum; with cough. Rheumatism of lower intercostals.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aching pains in lumbar region; pains streaking up and down spine into sacrum. Weakness and dull pain in region of kidneys. Back stiff, especially in morning on rising and during damp weather.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Shooting pain in right shoulder, with stiffness and inability to raise arm (*see Heart*). Rheumatism pains; worse in morning. *Pains fly like electric shocks*, shooting, lancinating, shifting rapidly (*Puls; Kali bich*). Pain in under side of thighs. Syphilitic sciatica. *Aching of heels*; relieved by elevating feet. Pains like shocks. Pain in legs, patient dreads to get up. Feet puffed; pain in ankles and feet. Neuralgia in toes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: High fever, alternating with chilliness and great prostration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itches, becomes dry, shrunken, pale. Papular and pustular lesions. Most useful in early stages of cutaneous diseases. *Disposition to boils*, and when sloughing occurs. Squamous eruptions. Syphilitic eruptions. Swelling and induration of glands. *Venereal buboes*. Scarlatina-like rash. Warts and moles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency. Externally for mastitis.

picricum-acidum.name: Picricum Acidum
picricum-acidum.essence: Causes degeneration of the spinal cord, with paralysis. Brainfag and sexual excitement. Acts upon the generative organs probably through the lumbar centers of the spinal cord; prostration, weakness and pain of back, pins and needle sensation in extremities. *Neurasthenia* (*Oxal ac*). Muscular debility. Heavy tired feeling. Myelitis with spasms and prostration. Writer's palsy. Progressive, pernicious anaemia. *Uraemia* with complete anuria. A one per cent solution applied on lint, is the best ap...

agg: least exertion, especially mental, after sleep, wet weather. A summer or hot weather remedy
amel: from cold air, cold water, tight pressure

complementary: Oxal ac; Gels; Phos; Sil; Arg nit

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Picric Acid-Trinitrophenol
Causes degeneration of the spinal cord, with paralysis. Brainfag and sexual excitement. Acts upon the generative organs probably through the lumbar centers of the spinal cord; prostration, weakness and pain of back, pins and needle sensation in extremities. *Neurasthenia* (*Oxal ac*). Muscular debility. Heavy tired feeling. Myelitis with spasms and prostration. Writer's palsy. Progressive, pernicious anaemia. *Uraemia* with complete anuria. A one per cent solution applied on lint, is the best application for burns until granulations begin to form. Sallow complexion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lack of will-power; disinclined to work. Cerebral softening. Dementia with prostration, sits still and listless.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Head pains; *relieved by bandaging tightly. Occipital pain*; worse, slightest mental exertion. Vertigo and noises in ear. Boils *within* ears and back of neck. After prolonged mental strain, with anxiety and dread of failure at examination. Brain fag.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chronic catarrhal conjunctivitis with copious, thick yellow discharge.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bitter taste. Aversion to food.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Scanty*; complete anuria. Dribbling micturition. Urine contains much indican, granular cylinders and fatty degenerated epithelium. Inflammation of kidneys with profound weakness, dark, bloody, scanty urine. Nightly urging.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Emissions profuse, followed by great exhaustion, without sensual dreams. *Priapism*; satyriasis. Hard erections, with pain in testicles and up cord. Prostatic hypertrophy, especially in cases not too far advanced.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in left ovary and leucorrhoea before menstruation. Pruritus vulvae.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning along spine. *Great weakness. Tired, heavy feeling all over body, especially limbs; worse, exertion*. Feet cold. Cannot get warm. Acute descending paralysis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, least exertion, especially mental, after sleep, wet weather. A summer or hot weather remedy; patient is worse then. *Better*, from cold air, cold water, tight pressure.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Oxal ac; Gels; Phos; Sil; Arg nit*. Compare: *Zinc pic* (facial palsy and paralysis agitans); *Ferr pic* (buzzing in ears, deafness; chronic gout; epistaxis; prostatic troubles); *Calc pic* (boils in and around ears).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency.

pinus-silvestris.name: Pinus Silvestris
pinus-silvestris.essence: Has been found of real use in the treatment of *weak ankles* and tardiness in walking, in scrofulous and rachitic children. Emaciation of lower extremities. Pinus sylvestris combines rheumatic, bronchial and urticarious symptoms; the chest seems thin and to give way.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Scotch Pine
Has been found of real use in the treatment of *weak ankles* and tardiness in walking, in scrofulous and rachitic children. Emaciation of lower extremities. Pinus sylvestris combines rheumatic, bronchial and urticarious symptoms; the chest seems thin and to give way.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stiffness; gouty pain in all joints, especially finger-joints. Cramps in calves.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nettle-rash. Itching all over, especially about joints and on abdomen. Nose itches.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Pinus Lambertina*-Sugar Pine--(constipation, amenorrhoea, abortion). *Pinus Lambertina* sap is a decided carthartic. Delayed and painful menstruation.
Also, *Abies can; Abies nig*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency.

piper-methysticum.name: Piper Methysticum
piper-methysticum.essence:
The intoxication produced by *Kava* is of a silent and drowsy character with incoherent dreams, loss of muscular power.

Urinary and skin symptoms have been verified. Marked modality. *Arthritis deformans*. Colic with flatulence.

amel: by turning mind to another topic

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Kava-kava
The intoxication produced by *Kava* is of a silent and drowsy character with incoherent dreams, loss of muscular power.
Urinary and skin symptoms have been verified. Marked modality. *Arthritis deformans*. Colic with flatulence.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Very sensitive. Exaltation of mind. *Amelioration of pains for a time by diverting attention*. Restless desire to change position.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Increased. Burning during micturition, gonorrhoea, and gleet. Cystitis. *Chordee*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scaly. Fall of scales leaves *white spots*, which often ulcerate. *Leprosy*. Ichthyosis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in right arm. Hands feel paralyzed. Pain in thumb-joint.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Chaulmoogra*-Taraktogenos--(The oil and its derivatives are to a certain extent effective in the treatment of *leprosy*, especially in early cases).
*Bixa orellana*, a South American plant related to Chaulmoogra, recommended for leprosy, eczema and elephantiasis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Better*, by turning mind to another topic; changing position.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, and lower potencies.

piper-nigrum.name: Piper Nigrum
piper-nigrum.essence: Sensation of burning and pressure everywhere.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Black Pepper
Sensation of burning and pressure everywhere.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sad, apprehensive. Unable to concentrate; starts at any noise.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heavy headache, as if temples were pressed in; pressure in nasal and facial bones. Eyes inflamed and burning. Red burning face. Bursting aching in eyeballs. Nose itches; sneezing; nosebleed. Lips dry and cracked.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sore, feels raw, burns. Burning pain in tonsils.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Gastric discomfort. Full feeling. Great thirst. Flatulence. Tympanites. Colic and cramps.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dyspnoea, cough with pain in chest in spots, feels as if spitting blood. Palpitation, cardiac pain slow intermittent pulse. Great flow of milk.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning in bladder and urethra. Difficult micturition. Bladder feels full, swollen; frequent inclination without success. Priapism.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Low attenuations.

pituitaria-glandula.name: Pituitaria Glandula
pituitaria-glandula.essence: Pituitary exercises a superior control over the growth and development of the sexual organs, stimulates muscular activity and overcomes uterine inertia. Its influence over unstriped muscular fiber is marked. Cerebral haemorrhage. Will check haemorrhage and add absorption of clot. Uterine inertia in second stage of labor where os is fully dilated. High blood pressure, chronic nephritis, prostatitis. Ten drops after meals (Dr. Geo. Fuller). Vertigo, difficult mental concentration, confusion and fu...

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
(PITUITARY GLAND)
Pituitary exercises a superior control over the growth and development of the sexual organs, stimulates muscular activity and overcomes uterine inertia. Its influence over unstriped muscular fiber is marked. Cerebral haemorrhage. Will check haemorrhage and add absorption of clot. Uterine inertia in second stage of labor where os is fully dilated. High blood pressure, chronic nephritis, prostatitis. Ten drops after meals (Dr. Geo. Fuller). Vertigo, difficult mental concentration, confusion and fullness deep in frontal region. Use 30th potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pituitrin*--(Is a vaso-constrictor and parturient. Used chiefly for its action on the uterus either to aid in childbirth or to check bleeding after delivery. In doses of 1 c.c.m. intravenously to stimulate labor pains, expulsive period only. Contra indicated in myocarditis, nephritis and arteriosclerosis. A watery solution made from the posterior portion of the gland is put up in ampules containing about 15 minims each and is considered the hypodermic dose. No effect per os).

pix-liquida.name: Pix Liquida
pix-liquida.essence:
Tar and its constituents act on various mucous membranes.

Its skin symptoms most important. A great cough medicine. Bronchial irritation after influenza (*Kreosot; Kali bich*). Scaly eruptions. Much itching. *Constant vomiting of blackish fluid, with pain in stomach*. Alopecia (*Fluor ac*).

complementary: Kreosol; Petrol; Pinus; Eupion; Terebinth; Carbolic acid

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Pine-tar
Tar and its constituents act on various mucous membranes.
Its skin symptoms most important. A great cough medicine. Bronchial irritation after influenza (*Kreosot; Kali bich*). Scaly eruptions. Much itching. *Constant vomiting of blackish fluid, with pain in stomach*. Alopecia (*Fluor ac*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pain at a spot about the third left costal cartilage where it joins the rib*. Rales through the lungs, and *muco-purulent sputum*; offensive odor and taste. Chronic bronchitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
