materiaMedica.text: Cracked; *itches intolerably*; bleeds on scratching. Eruptions on *back of hands*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare its constituents: *Kreosol; Petrol; Pinus; Eupion; Terebinth; Carbolic acid*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to sixth potency.

plantago-major.name: Plantago Major
plantago-major.essence: Has considerable clinical reputation in the treatment of earache, toothache, and enuresis. Sharp pain in eyes, reflex from decayed teeth or inflammation of middle ear. Eyeball very tender to touch. Pain plays between teeth and ears. Pyorrhea alveolaris. Depression and insomnia of chronic Nicotinism. Causes an aversion to tobacco.
plantago-major.dosing: Tincture, and lower potencies. Local use in toothache in hollow teeth, otorrhoea, pruritus, and Poison-oak. Incised wounds.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Plantain
Has considerable clinical reputation in the treatment of earache, toothache, and enuresis. Sharp pain in eyes, reflex from decayed teeth or inflammation of middle ear. Eyeball very tender to touch. Pain plays between teeth and ears. Pyorrhea alveolaris. Depression and insomnia of chronic Nicotinism. Causes an aversion to tobacco.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Periodical prosopalgia, worse 7 am to 2 pm, accompanied with flow of tears, photophobia; pains radiate to temples and lower face.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hearing acute; noise painful. Sticking pain in ears. Neuralgic earache; *pain goes from one ear to the other through the head*. Otalgia, with toothache. Loud noises go through one.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sudden, yellowish, watery discharge.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Teeth ache and are sensitive and sore to touch. Swelling of cheeks. Salivation; teeth feel too long; worse, cold air and contact. Toothache, better while eating. Profuse of saliva. Toothache, with reflex neuralgia of eyelids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Wants to defecate; goes often, but cannot bad, can hardly stand. Diarrhoea, with brown watery

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Profuse flow; *nocturnal enuresis* (*Rhus arom; Caust; Bellad*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching and burning; papulae. Urticaria, chilblains (*Agar; Tamus*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Kalm; Cham; Puls*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, and lower potencies. Local use in toothache in hollow teeth, otorrhoea, pruritus, and Poison-oak. Incised wounds.

platinum-metallicum.name: Platinum Metallicum
platinum-metallicum.essence: Is pre-eminently a woman's remedy. Strong tendency to paralysis, anaesthesia, localized *numbness and coldness* are shown. Hysterical spasms; pains increase and decrease gradually (*Stannum*). Tremulousness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
The Metal (PLATINA)
Is pre-eminently a woman's remedy. Strong tendency to paralysis, anaesthesia, localized *numbness and coldness* are shown. Hysterical spasms; pains increase and decrease gradually (*Stannum*). Tremulousness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Irresistible impulse to kill. Self-exaltation; *contempt for others*. Arrogant, proud. Weary of everything. Everything seems changed. Mental trouble pressed menses. Physical symptoms disappear as mental symptoms develop.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tense, pressing pain, confined to a small spot. *Cramplike, squeezing pain*. Constriction about forehead and right temples. *Numbness, with headache*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Objects look smaller than they are*. Twitching of lids (*Agar*). Eyes feel cold. Cramp-like pain in orbits.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels numb. Cramp-like twinges. Roaring and rumbling.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Prosopalgia, with numb feeling in malar bones, as if the parts were between screws. Pain at root of nose, as if squeezed in a vise. *Coldness, creeping, and numbness*, in whole right side of face. Pains increase and decrease gradually (*Stann*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fermentation, much flatulence; *constriction; ravenous* hunger; persistent nausea, with anxiety and weakness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Painter's colic. Pain in umbilical region; extending through to back. Pressing and bearing down in abdomen; extending into pelvis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Retarded; feces scanty; evacuated with difficulty. Adheres to rectum, like soft clay. *Sticky stool*. Constipation of travelers, who are constantly changing food and water. Stool as if burnt.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Parts hypersensitive. Tingling internally and externally (*Kali brom; Orig*). Ovaries sensitive and burn. Menses too early, too profuse, *dark-clotted*, with spasms and painful bearing-down, chilliness, and sensitiveness of parts. Vaginismus. Nymphomania. Excessive sexual development; vaginismus. Pruritus vulvae. Ovaritis with sterility. Abnormal sexual appetite and melancholia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tightness of thighs, as if too tightly wrapped. Numb and weary sensation. Feel paralyzed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sleeps with legs far apart (*Chamom*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, sitting and standing; evening. *Better*, walking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Rhodium; Stann; Valer; Sep*. Compare, also: *Platinum muriaticum* (this remedy has achieved beneficial results after Iodide of Potash failed to cure in syphilitic affection; violent occipital headaches, dysphagia, and syphilitic throat and bone affections; caries of bones of feet); *Plat mur nat* (polyuria and salivation); *Sedum acre* (sexual irritability, relieves irritation of nerve centers and gives rest).
Antidote: *Puls*. Platina antidotes the bad effects of lead.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth trituration to thirtieth potency.

platanus.name: Platanus
platanus.essence: *Tarsal tumors*. Apply the tincture. Both acute and old neglected cases, where destruction of tissue occurred and cicatricial contraction caused marked deformity of lid, restored to practically normal conditions. Acts best in children. Must be used for some time. Ichtyosis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Sycamore-Buttonwood
*Tarsal tumors*. Apply the tincture. Both acute and old neglected cases, where destruction of tissue occurred and cicatricial contraction caused marked deformity of lid, restored to practically normal conditions. Acts best in children. Must be used for some time. Ichtyosis.

plumbum-metallicum.name: Plumbum Metallicum
plumbum-metallicum.essence:
The great drug for general sclerotic conditions. Lead paralysis is chiefly of extensors, forearm or upper limb, from center to periphery with partial anaesthesia or excessive hyperasthesia, preceded by pain. Localized neuralgic pains, neuritis. The blood, alimentary and nervous systems are the special seats of action of Plumbum. Hematosis is interfered with, rapid reduction in number of red corpuscles; hence pallor, icterus, anaemia. Constrictive sensation in internal organs.

Delirium, coma and...

complementary: Indurations of mammary glands, especially when a tendency to become inflamed appears; sore and painful
Alumina; Plat; Opium; Podoph; Merc; Thall. Plectranthus

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pale and cachetic*. Yellow, corpse-like; cheeks sunken. Skin of face greasy, shiny. Tremor of naso-labial muscles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Gums swollen, pale; *distinct blue lines along margins of gums*. Tongue tremulous, red on margin. Cannot put it out, seems paralyzed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Contraction in oesophagus and stomach; pressure and tightness. *Gastralgia*. Constant vomiting. Solids cannot be swallowed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Lead
The great drug for general sclerotic conditions. Lead paralysis is chiefly of extensors, forearm or upper limb, from center to periphery with partial anaesthesia or excessive hyperasthesia, preceded by pain. Localized neuralgic pains, neuritis. The blood, alimentary and nervous systems are the special seats of action of Plumbum. Hematosis is interfered with, rapid reduction in number of red corpuscles; hence pallor, icterus, anaemia. Constrictive sensation in internal organs.
Delirium, coma and convulsions. Hypertension and arteriosclerosis. *Progressive muscular atrophy*. Infantile paralysis. Locomotor ataxia. Excessive and rapid emaciation. Bulbar paralysis. Important in peripheral affections. The points of attack for Plumbum are the neuraxons and the anterior horns. Symptoms of multiple sclerosis, posterior spinal sclerosis. Contractions and boring pain. All the symptoms of acute. Nephritis with amaurosis and cerebral symptoms. *Gout* (Chronic).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Mental depression. Fear of being assassinated*. Quiet melancholy. Slow perception; loss of memory; amnesic aphasia. Hallucinations and delusions. Intellectual apathy. Memory impaired (*Anac; Baryta*). Paretic dementia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Delirium alternating with colic. Pain as if a ball rose from throat to brain. Hair very dry. *Tinnitus* (*Chin; Nat salic; Carbon sulph*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pupils contracted. Yellow. Optic nerve inflamed. Intraocular, suppurative inflammation. *Glaucoma*, especially if secondary to spinal lesion. Optic neuritis, central scotoma. Sudden loss of sight after fainting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Excessive colic, *radiating to all parts of body. Abdominal wall feels drawn by a string to spine*. Pain causes desire to stretch. Intussusception; strangulated hernia. *Abdomen retracted*. Obstructed flatus, with intense colic. Colic alternates with delirium and pain in atrophied limbs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constipation; *stools hard, lumpy, black with urging and spasm of anus*. Obstructed evacuation from impaction of feces (*Plat*). Neuralgia of rectum. *Anus drawn up with constriction*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frequent, ineffectual tenesmus. Albuminous; low specific gravity. *Chronic interstitial nephritis*, with great pain in abdomen. Urine scanty. Tenesmus of bladder. Emission drop by drop.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Loss of sexual power*. Testicles drawn up, feel constricted.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Vaginismus*, with emaciation and constipation. *Induration of mammary glands*. Vulva and vagina hypersensitive. Stitches and burning pains in breasts (*Apis; Con; Carb an; Sil*). Tendency to abortion. Menorrhagia with sensation of string pulling from abdomen to back. Disposition to yawn and stretch.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cardiac weakness. Pulse soft and small, dichrotic. Wiry pulse, camp-like constriction of peripheral arteries.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Spinal cord sclerosed. Lightning-like pains; temporarily better by pressure. Paralysis of lower extremities.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Yellow, dark-brown liver spots. Jaundice. Dry. Dilated veins of forearms and legs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Paralysis of single muscles. Cannot raise or lift anything with the hand. Extension is difficult. Paralysis from overexertion of the extensor muscles in piano players (*Curare*). Pains in muscles of thighs; *come in paroxysms*. *Wrist-drop*. Cramps in calves. Stinging and tearing in limbs, also twitching and tingling, numbness, pain or tremor. Paralysis. Feet swollen. Pain in atrophied limbs alternates with colic. Loss of patellar reflex. Hands and feet cold. Pain in
*right big toe* at night, very sensitive to touch.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, at night, motion. *Better*, rubbing, hard pressure, physical exertion (*Alumen*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Plumb acet* (painful cramps in paralyzed limbs; severe pain and muscular cramps in gastric ulcer; locally, as an application (non-homeopathic) in moist eczema, and to dry up secretions from mucous surfaces. Care must be used, as sufficient lead can be absorbed to produce lead poison, one to two drams of the *liquor plumbi subacetatis* to the ounce of water; also in pruritus pudendi, equal parts of the *liquor plumbi* and *glycerin*). *Plumb iodat* (Has been used empirically in various forms of paralysis, sclerotic degenerations, especially of spinal cord, atrophies, arterio-sclerosis, pellagra. *Indurations of mammary glands, especially when a tendency to become inflamed appears; sore and painful*. Indurations of great hardness and associated with a very dry skin. Lancinating pains of *Tabes*). Compare: *Alumina; Plat; Opium; Podoph; Merc; Thall. Plectranthus* (paralysis, spastic, spinal form); *Plumb chromicum* (convulsions, with terrible pains; pupils greatly dilated; retracted abdomen;); *Plumb phosph* (loss of sexual power; *locomotor ataxia*).
Antidotes: *Plat; Alum; Petrol*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

polygonum-hydropiperoides.name: Polygonum Hydropiperoides
polygonum-hydropiperoides.essence: Metrorrhagia, also Amenorrhoea in young girls. *Varicosis*; haemorrhoids and rectal pockets. Burning in stomach followed by feeling of coldness in the pit of the stomach.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Painful constriction at neck of bladder.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Hydropiper - Smartweed (POLYGONUM PUNCTATUM)
Metrorrhagia, also Amenorrhoea in young girls. *Varicosis*; haemorrhoids and rectal pockets. Burning in stomach followed by feeling of coldness in the pit of the stomach.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Griping pain, with great rumbling, nausea, and liquid feces. *Flatulent colic*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Interior of anus studded with itching eminence. *Haemorrhoids*. Liquid feces.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aching pains in hips and loins. *Sensation as if hips were being drawn together*. Sensation of weight and tension within pelvis. Shooting pains through breasts. Amenorrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Superficial ulcers and sores on lower extremities*, especially in females at climacteric.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Carduus mar* (ulcers); *Hamam; Senecio; Polygonum persicaria* (renal colic and calculi; *gangrene*); *Polygonum sagitatum*-arrow-leaved. Tear-thumb--(2x for *pains of nephritic colic*; suppurative nephritis; lancinating pains along spine; itching of hard palate; burning inner side of right foot and ankle. C. M. Boger); *Polygonum aviculare*-knot-grass--(in material doses of tincture, found useful in phthisis pulmonalis and intermittent fever, and especially in *arterio-sclerosis*. Erythema).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture.

polyporus-pinicola.name: Polyporus Pinicola
polyporus-pinicola.essence: Useful in intermittent, remittent and bilious fevers, with headache, yellow tongue, constant nausea, faintness at epigastrium, and constipation. Similar to its botanical relative, *Polyp officinalis*, or *Boletus laricis, q.v*. Deep dull, severe pain in shin bones, preventing sleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Pine Agaric
Useful in intermittent, remittent and bilious fevers, with headache, yellow tongue, constant nausea, faintness at epigastrium, and constipation. Similar to its botanical relative, *Polyp officinalis*, or *Boletus laricis, q.v*. Deep dull, severe pain in shin bones, preventing sleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Great lassitude, congestion of head, with vertigo, face hot and flushed, prickling sensation all over; restless at night from pain in wrists and knee; rheumatic pains; profuse perspiration. Headache about 10 am, with pain in back, ankles and legs increasing until 3 pm, then gradually better.

populus-tremuloides.name: Populus Tremuloides
populus-tremuloides.essence: The gastric and urinary symptoms point to its usefulness in dyspepsia and catarrh of the bladder, especially in old people. Good remedy in vesical troubles after operations and in pregnancy. Cystitis. Fullness of head, and sensation of heat of the surfaces of the body. *Night-sweats. Ague*.

complementary: Nux; China; Cornus flor; Cannabis; Cantharis

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
American Aspen
The gastric and urinary symptoms point to its usefulness in dyspepsia and catarrh of the bladder, especially in old people. Good remedy in vesical troubles after operations and in pregnancy. Cystitis. Fullness of head, and sensation of heat of the surfaces of the body. *Night-sweats. Ague*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Indigestion, with flatulence and acidity*. Nausea and vomiting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Severe tenesmus; painful scalding. Urine contains mucus and pus. Prostate enlarged. Pain behind pubis, at end of urination.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Nux; China; Cornus flor; Cannabis; Cantharis*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture or *Populin* trit, 1x.

populus-candicans.name: Populus Candicans
populus-candicans.essence: Seems to have a remarkable power over acute colds, especially when accompanied by a deep, hoarse voice, or even aphonia. General insensibility of surface (worse, back and abdomen); rubbing and pounding borne without pain, and is grateful on account of warmth produced. Finger-ends thickened, horny; insensible to pinching and pricking. Instantaneous voice-producer (*Coca*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Balm of Gilead
Seems to have a remarkable power over acute colds, especially when accompanied by a deep, hoarse voice, or even aphonia. General insensibility of surface (worse, back and abdomen); rubbing and pounding borne without pain, and is grateful on account of warmth produced. Finger-ends thickened, horny; insensible to pinching and pricking. Instantaneous voice-producer (*Coca*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Discusses her symptoms with every one. Hot head with cold extremities. Cold-sores on lips (*Nat mur*). Tongue feels thick and numb. Burning irritation of eyes, nose, mouth, throat, and air passages.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Acute hoarseness*. Throat and nostrils burn. Sits bent forward with dry cough. Pharynx and larynx feel dry, and the voice weak and toneless. Rawness and soreness of chest and throat. Cough of children caused by naso-pharyngeal catarrh; mucus drops from posterior nares.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture.

primula-obconica.name: Primula Obconica
primula-obconica.essence:
The poison of the Primrose occurs in its *glandular hairs*, which break easily and discharge an irritating fluid which is absorbed into the skin.

But skin symptoms of poisoning appear in sensitive patients even without coming in direst contact with the plant, mere nearness being sufficient, just like Poison ivy. Intermittency of symptoms; worse right side. Pain in liver and spleen. Deep infiltration and tension of tissues; blisters. *Paralyzed sensation. Weakness*. Pharyngeal soreness alternate...

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Primrose
The poison of the Primrose occurs in its *glandular hairs*, which break easily and discharge an irritating fluid which is absorbed into the skin.
But skin symptoms of poisoning appear in sensitive patients even without coming in direst contact with the plant, mere nearness being sufficient, just like Poison ivy. Intermittency of symptoms; worse right side. Pain in liver and spleen. Deep infiltration and tension of tissues; blisters. *Paralyzed sensation. Weakness*. Pharyngeal soreness alternates with diminished facial irritation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Moist eczema. Papular eruption on chin. Burns at night. Urticaria-like eruption. Eyelids swollen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Eczema on arms, wrists, forearms, hands, papular and excoriated. Rheumatic pain around shoulder. Palms dry and hot. Cracking over joints and fingers. Eruption between fingers. Purple blotches on back of hands, palmar surface stiff. Blisters on fingers.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Great itching*, worse at night, red and swollen like erysipelas. Tumefied. *Small papules on a raised base*. Skin symptoms accompanied by febrile symptoms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Rhus; Fagopyrum* (Antidotal). *Humea Elegans*, similar skin symptoms.

primula-veris.name: Primula Veris
primula-veris.essence: Cerebral congestion, with neuralgia; migraine; rheumatic and gouty pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Cowslip
Cerebral congestion, with neuralgia; migraine; rheumatic and gouty pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation of a band around head; cannot keen hat on (*Carbol ac*). Skin of forehead tense. Fear of falling when standing up. Violent vertigo, as if everything turned around. Buzzing in ears; better in open air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cough, with burning and pricking in respiratory tracts. Weak voice.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Urine smells strongly of violets (*Terebinth*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Right axillary muscles painful. Weight and lassitude in limbs, especially the *shoulders*. Burning in hollow of right hand. Drawing pain in thumb and big toe.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Cyclamen; Ranunc; OEnothera*--Evening Primrose--(exhausting, watery diarrhoea; cholera infantum; hydrocephaloid); *Primula farinosa*-the wild Primrose--(dermatitis, especially on index fingers and thumbs).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

trimethylaminum.name: Trimethylaminum
trimethylaminum.essence:
Distilled Herring-brine (PROPYLAMIN - TRIMETHYLAMINUM)

In acute rheumatism, dissipates fever and pain in a day or two. Rheumatic prosopalgia, and rheumatic metastases, especially heart lesions.
trimethylaminum.dosing: Ten to fifteen drops, in about six ounces of water; teaspoonful doses every two hours.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Distilled Herring-brine (PROPYLAMIN - TRIMETHYLAMINUM)
In acute rheumatism, dissipates fever and pain in a day or two. Rheumatic prosopalgia, and rheumatic metastases, especially heart lesions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pain in wrists and ankles*; worse, slightest motion (*Bry*). Great restlessness and thirst. Rheumatism, needle held in fingers gets too heavy. *Tingling and numbness of fingers*. Pain in wrist and ankle, unable to stand.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: (*Chenopodium vulvaria*. The plant has an odor of decaying fish and contains a large amount of Propylamine. Weakness is lumbar and lower dorsal region).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ten to fifteen drops, in about six ounces of water; teaspoonful doses every two hours.

prunus-spinosa.name: Prunus Spinosa
prunus-spinosa.essence: Special action on the urinary organs and head. Very valuable in certain neuralgias, anasarca, and especially oedema pedum. Ankle and foot feel sprained. *Ciliary neuralgia* (*Spig*).

complementary: cough, worse at night on lying down

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Black-thorn
Special action on the urinary organs and head. Very valuable in certain neuralgias, anasarca, and especially oedema pedum. Ankle and foot feel sprained. *Ciliary neuralgia* (*Spig*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pressing-asunder pain beneath skull. *Shooting from right frontal bone through brain to occiput. Pain in right eyeball, as if it would burst*. Piercing toothache, as if teeth were pulled out; worse, taking anything warm.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Ciliary neuralgia*. Bursting pain in right eyeball shooting like lightning through the brain to occiput. *Sudden pain in left eye as if it would burst*, better by lachrymation. Irido-choroiditis. Opacity of vitreous humor. Eyes feel as if bursting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ascites. Cramp-like pain in bladder region; worse, walking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hard, nodular stool, with rectal pain, as if angular body were pressed inward. Burning in anus after slimy diarrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tenesmus of bladder. Ineffectual effort to urinate. *Hurriedly impelled to urinate; the urine seems to pass as far as glans, and then returns and causes pain in urethra*. Neuralgic dysuria. *Must press a long time before urine appears*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Wheezing when walking. Oppression of chest; anxious, short respiration. Angina pectoris. Furious beating of heart; worse, slightest motion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Herpes zoster. *Dropsy*. Itching on tips of fingers, as if frozen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Lauroc; Prumus padus*-Bird--cherry--(sore throat, pressure behind sternum and sticking pain in rectum); *Prunus Virginiana*-Wild Cherry--(*heart tonic*; relieves the flagging and distended ventricle; irritable heart; dilatation of right heart; *cough, worse at night on lying down*; weak digestion, especially in elderly people; chronic bronchitis; increases muscular tone); *Pyrus*-Mountain Ash--(irritation of eyes; constriction around waist; spasmodic pains in uterus, bladder, heart, cold-water sensation in stomach, coldness extends up oesophagus; neuralgic and gouty pains).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to sixth potency.

psorinum.name: Psorinum
psorinum.essence:
The therapeutic field of this remedy is found in so-called psoric manifestations. Psorinum is a cold medicine; wants the head kept warm, *wants warm clothing* even in summer. *Extreme sensitiveness to cold. Debility*, independent of any organic disease, especially the weakness remaining after acute disease. *Lack of reaction*, i.e, phagocytes defective; when well-chosen remedies fail to act. Scrofulous patients. Secretions

*have a filthy smell*. Profuse sweating. Cardiac weakness. Skin symptoms...

agg: Psorinum patient does not improve while using coffee. *Worse*, changes of weather, in hot sunshine, from cold. *Dread of least cold air or draft
amel: heat, warm clothing, even in summer

psorinum.dosing: Two hundredth and higher potencies. Should not be repeated too often. *Psorinum* requires something like 9 days before it manifests its action, and even a single dose may elicit other symptoms lasting for weeks (Aegedi).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Scabies Vesicle
The therapeutic field of this remedy is found in so-called psoric manifestations. Psorinum is a cold medicine; wants the head kept warm, *wants warm clothing* even in summer. *Extreme sensitiveness to cold. Debility*, independent of any organic disease, especially the weakness remaining after acute disease. *Lack of reaction*, i.e, phagocytes defective; when well-chosen remedies fail to act. Scrofulous patients. Secretions
*have a filthy smell*. Profuse sweating. Cardiac weakness. Skin symptoms very prominent. Often gives immunity from cold-catching. Easy perspiration when walking. Syphilis, inherited and tertiary. *Offensive discharges*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hopeless; despairs of recovery. *Melancholy*, deep and persistent; religious. Suicidal tendency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Awakens at night with pain as from blow on head. Chronic headaches; hungry during attacks; with vertigo. Hammering pain; brain feels too large; worse, change of weather. Dull, pressive pain in occiput. Humid eruption on scalp; hair matted. Hair dry.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Agglutinated. Blepharitis. *Chronic ophthalmia, that constantly recurs*. Edges of lids red. Secretion acrid.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Obstinate rhagades at corners. Tongue, gums ulcerated; tough mucus of foul taste adheres to soft palate.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry, coryza, with stoppage of nose. Chronic catarrh; dropping from posterior nares. Acne rosacea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Raw, red, *oozing scabs around ears*. Sore pain behind ears. Herpes from temples over ears to cheeks. *Offensive discharge from eczema around ears. Intolerable itching*. Chronic otorrhoea. *Most fetid pus from ears*, brownish, offensive.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Swelling of upper lip. Pale, delicate. *Humid eruption on face*. Sickly.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tonsils greatly swollen; painful swallowing, with pain in ears. Profuse, offensive saliva; tough mucus in throat. Recurring quinsy. *Eradicates tendency to quinsy*. Hawking up of cheesy, pea-like balls of disgusting smell and taste (*Agar*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Eructations like bad eggs. *Very hungry always*; *must have something to eat in the middle of the night*. Nausea; vomiting of pregnancy. Pain in abdomen after eating.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Mucous, *bloody, excessively fetid, dark fluid*. Hard, difficult stool, with blood from rectum and burning piles. *Constipation of infants*, in pale, sickly scrofulous children.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Leucorrhoea* fetid, lumpy, with much backache and *debility*. Mammae swollen and painful. Pimples oozing an acrid fluid that burns and excoriates the glands.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Asthma, with dyspnoea; worse, sitting up; better, lying down and keeping arms spread wide apart. Dry, hard cough, with great weakness in chest. *Feeling of ulceration under sternum*. Pain in chest; better, lying down. Cough returns every winter, from suppressed eruption. *Hay-fever* returning irregularly every year.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Weakness of joints, as if they would not hold together. *Eruption around finger-nails*. Fetid foot-sweats.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dirty, dingy look. Dry, lusterless, rough hair. *Intolerable itching*. Herpetic eruptions, especially on scalp and bends of joints with itching; worse, from warmth of bed. Enlarged glands. Sebaceous glands secrete excessively; oily skin. Indolent ulcers, slow to heal. Eczema behind ears. Crusty eruptions all over. Urticaria after every exertion. Pustules near finger-nails.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Profuse, offensive perspiration; night-sweats.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sleepless from intolerable itching. Easily startled.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, coffee; Psorinum patient does not improve while using coffee. *Worse*, changes of weather, in hot sunshine, from cold. *Dread of least cold air or draft. Better*, heat, warm clothing, even in summer.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Complementary: *Sulphur*.
Compare: *Pediculus*-Head-louse--(psoric manifestations in children. Eruption on dorsum of hands, feet neck. Prurigo; pellagra. Unusual aptitude for study and work). *Pediculus* (Cooties) transmit typhus and trench fever). In lack of reaction compare *Calcarea* and *Natrum ars. Gaertner* (Pessimistic, lack of confidence, subjective troublesome eye symptoms, fear of heights. Urticaria. Use 30th and 200th (Wheeler).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Two hundredth and higher potencies. Should not be repeated too often. *Psorinum* requires something like 9 days before it manifests its action, and even a single dose may elicit other symptoms lasting for weeks (Aegedi).

ptelea-trifoliata.name: Ptelea Trifoliata
ptelea-trifoliata.essence: Is a remarkable remedy in stomach and liver affections. The aching and heaviness in the region of the liver is *greatly aggravated by lying* on the left side. *Atonic states of stomach*. Asthma.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Wafer-ash (PTELEA)
Is a remarkable remedy in stomach and liver affections. The aching and heaviness in the region of the liver is *greatly aggravated by lying* on the left side. *Atonic states of stomach*. Asthma.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels dull and stupid. *Pain from forehead to root of nose; pressing-outward pain. Frontal headache*; worse, noise, motion, night, rubbing eyes, with acidity. Temples as if pressed together.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Excess of saliva*, with dry *bitter taste*. Tongue coated white or yellow; feels rough, swollen. Papillae *red and prominent* (*Arg n*). Coating may be brownish-yellow.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Weight and fullness. Griping in epigastric region, with dryness of mouth. Eructations, nausea, vomiting. Constant sensation of corrosion, heat and burning in stomach. Stomach feels empty after eating. *Stomach and liver symptoms associated with pain in limbs*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Much weight and pain in right side; heavy, aching feeling, relieved by lying on right side. Liver sore, swollen, sensitive to pressure. Retraction of abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feeling of pressure on lungs and of suffocation, when lying on back. *Asthma*; dyspnoea; cramp-like pain in cardiac region.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Restless, with frightful dreams; nightmare, awakes languid and unrefreshed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, lying on left side; early morning. *Better*, eating sour things.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Mercur; Magn mur; Nux; Chelid*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to thirtieth potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Common Flea
Marked urinary and female symptoms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Very impatient, cross, and irritable. Frontal headache, with *enlarged feeling of eyes*. *Face wrinkled and old-looking*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Metallic taste. Sensation of a thread in throat. Thirsty, especially during headache.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Breath and taste foul. Intense nausea, with vomiting, purging, and faintness. Stool very offensive. Abdomen bloated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scanty with frequent urging, with pressure on bladder and burning in urethra. Flow stops suddenly followed by pain. Urine foul. Cannot retain urine; must attend to the call without delay. Irritable bladder before menses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses delayed. Increased flow of saliva during. Intense burning in vagina. Leucorrhoea, profuse, foul, staining a greenish yellow; stains of menses and leucorrhoea very hard to wash out. Backache (*Oxal ac*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aches, weak; drawing of muscles below scapulae.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels a glow all over, like being over steam; *chilly*, while sitting beside the fire.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Prickly itching. Sore spots all over. Skin emits foul odor.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Better*, sitting or lying down. *Worse*, left side, moving about.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: The higher potencies.

pyrogenium.name: Pyrogenium
pyrogenium.essence:
This remedy was introduced by English Homeopathists, prepared from decomposed lean beef allowed to stand in the sun for two weeks and then potentized. The provings and most of the clinical experience have been obtained from this preparation. But, subsequently, Dr. Swan potentized some septic pus, which preparation has also been proved and clinically applied. There does not seem to be any marked difference in their effects.

Pyrogen is the great remedy for *septic states*, with intense restlessne...

complementary: Echinacea; Carbo; Ars; Lach; Rhus; Bapt

pyrogenium.dosing: Sixth to thirtieth and higher potencies. Should not be repeated too frequently.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Artificial Sepsin
This remedy was introduced by English Homeopathists, prepared from decomposed lean beef allowed to stand in the sun for two weeks and then potentized. The provings and most of the clinical experience have been obtained from this preparation. But, subsequently, Dr. Swan potentized some septic pus, which preparation has also been proved and clinically applied. There does not seem to be any marked difference in their effects.
Pyrogen is the great remedy for *septic states*, with intense restlessness. "In septic fevers, especially puerperal, Pyrogen has demonstrated its great value as a homeopathic dynamic antiseptic. " (H. C. Allen). Hectic, typhoid, typhus, ptomaine poisoning, diphtheria, dissecting wounds, sewer-gas poisoning, chronic malaria, after-effects of miscarriage, all these conditions at times may present symptoms calling for this unique medicine. *All discharges are horribly offensive*-menstrual, lochial, diarrhoea, vomit, sweat, breath, etc. Great pain and violent burning in abscesses. Chronic complaints that date back to septic conditions. Threatening heart failure in zymotic and septic fevers. Influenza, typhoid symptoms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Full of anxiety and insane notions. Loquacious. Thinks he is very wealthy. *Restless*. Feels if crowded with arms and legs. Cannot tell whether dreaming while awake or asleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Painless throbbing. Fan-like motion of alae nasi (*Lyc; Phos*). Bursting headache with restlessness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue red and *dry*, clean, cracked, smooth, as though varnished. Throat dry, articulation difficult. Nausea and vomiting. Taste terribly fetid. Breath horrible.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coffee-grounds vomiting. Vomits water, when it becomes warm in stomach.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Intolerable tenesmus o both bladder and rectum. Bloated, sore, cutting pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diarrhoea; horribly offensive, brown-black, painless, involuntary. Constipation, with complete inertia (*Opium*); obstinate from impaction. Stools large, black, carrion-like, or small black balls.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Tired feeling about heart. *Palpitation*. Sensation as if heart were too full. Always can hear her heart beat. Pulse abnormally rapid,
*out of proportion to the temperature* pain in region of left nipple. Conscious of heart.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Puerperal peritonitis, with extreme fetor. Septicaemia following abortion. Menses horribly offensive. Uterine haemorrhages. Fever at each menstrual period, consequent upon latent pelvic inflammation. *Septic puerperal infection*. Pelvic calculitis. Inflammatory exudate. Post-operative cases, with overwhelming sepsis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coldness and chilliness. *Septic fevers*. Latent pyogenic condition. Chill begins in back. Temperature rises rapidly. Great heat with profuse hot sweat, but *sweating does not cause a fall in temperature*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Throbbing in vessels of neck. Numbness of hands, arms, feet. Aching in all limbs and bones. *Bed feels too hard* (*Arn*). Great debility in the morning. Soreness; better by motion (*Rhus*). Rapid decubitus of septic origin.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Small cut or injury becomes much swollen and inflamed-discolored. Dry.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Seems to be in semi-sleep. Dreams all night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Relief from motion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Streptoccin* (anti-febrile action; septic symptoms in infectious diseases). Rapid in its action, especially in its effect on temperature; *Staphyloccin* in diseases where the staphylococcus is the chief bacterial factor, as acne, abscess, furuncle; empyaema, endocarditis, etc. ; *Sepin*-A toxin of Proteus vulgaris, prepared by Dr. Shedd, same symptoms as Pyrogen, of which it is the main constituent; *Echinacea; Carbo; Ars; Lach; Rhus; Bapt*.
Complementary: *Bryon*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth and higher potencies. Should not be repeated too frequently.

quassia-amara.name: Quassia Amara
quassia-amara.essence: Acts on gastric organs as a tonic (*Gentian; Hydr*). Seems to possess marked action on eyes, producing amblyopia and cataract. Pain in right intercostal muscles above the liver. Pressure and stitches in liver, and sympathetically in spleen.
quassia-amara.dosing: First to third potency, or spoonful doses of Aqua Quassiae.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Quassia-wood (QUASSIA - PICRAENA EXCELSA)
Acts on gastric organs as a tonic (*Gentian; Hydr*). Seems to possess marked action on eyes, producing amblyopia and cataract. Pain in right intercostal muscles above the liver. Pressure and stitches in liver, and sympathetically in spleen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Atonic dyspepsia, with gas and acidity. Heart-burn and gastralgia. Regurgitation of food. Abdomen feels empty and retracted. Dyspepsia after infectious diseases; especially grip, dysentery. Tongue dry or with brown sticky coating. Cirrhosis of liver with ascites.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Excessive desire-impossible to retain urine; copious micturition day and night. As soon as the child wakes up the bed is drenched.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Inclination to yawn and stretch (*Rhus*). Sensation of coldness over back. Prostration, with hunger. Cold extremities, with sensation of internal coldness (*Helo-derma*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third potency, or spoonful doses of Aqua Quassiae.

quebracho-aspidosperma.name: Quebracho Aspidosperma
quebracho-aspidosperma.essence: The digitalis of the lungs (Hale). Removes temporary obstruction to the oxidation of the blood by stimulating respiratory centers, increasing oxidation and excretion of carbonic acid. Pulmonary stenosis. Thrombosis of pulmonary artery. Uraemic dyspnoea. An effective remedy in many cases of asthma. It stimulates the respiratory centers and increases the oxygen in the blood. "Want of breath" during exertion is the guiding symptom. *Cardiac asthma*.
quebracho-aspidosperma.dosing: First trituration of tincture, or Aspidospermin hydrochlorid 1 grain of 1x trit. Every hour for a few doses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Quebracho (ASPIDOSPERMA)
The digitalis of the lungs (Hale). Removes temporary obstruction to the oxidation of the blood by stimulating respiratory centers, increasing oxidation and excretion of carbonic acid. Pulmonary stenosis. Thrombosis of pulmonary artery. Uraemic dyspnoea. An effective remedy in many cases of asthma. It stimulates the respiratory centers and increases the oxygen in the blood. "Want of breath" during exertion is the guiding symptom. *Cardiac asthma*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Coca; Arsenic*;
*Coffea-Catalpa* (difficult respiration).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First trituration of tincture, or Aspidospermin hydrochlorid 1 grain of 1x trit. Every hour for a few doses.

quercus-glandibus.name: Quercus Glandibus
quercus-glandibus.essence: Spirit distilled from Tincture of Acorn Kernels (QUERCUS GLANDIUM SPIRITUS)
quercus-glandibus.dosing: Ten drops to a teaspoonful of the distilled spirit three to four times a day. A passing diarrhoea often appears for a times a day. A passing diarrhoea often appears for a time when using it. Curative effect. Quercus acts well in trituration of the acorn 3x in splenic cases, flatulence, old malaria and alcoholic history (Clark).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Spirit distilled from Tincture of Acorn Kernels (QUERCUS GLANDIUM SPIRITUS)
Used first by Rademacher for chronic spleen affections; *spleen-dropsy*. Antidotes effects of Alcohol. Vertigo; deafness, with noises in head. *Takes away craving for alcoholics*; give dose as below for several months. Dropsy and liver affections. Useful in gout, old malarial cases with flatulence.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Angelica* (in tincture, five drops, three times daily, produces disgust for liquor; also for atony of different organs, dyspepsia, nervous headache, etc; chronic bronchitis to increase expectoration). *Ceanoth; Lach; Nat mur; Helianthus* (spleen enlarged and painful).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ten drops to a teaspoonful of the distilled spirit three to four times a day. A passing diarrhoea often appears for a times a day. A passing diarrhoea often appears for a time when using it. Curative effect. Quercus acts well in trituration of the acorn 3x in splenic cases, flatulence, old malaria and alcoholic history (Clark).

quillaya-saponaria.name: Quillaya Saponaria
quillaya-saponaria.essence: Produces and cures symptoms of acute catarrh, sneezing and sore throat. *Most effective in the beginning of coryza*, checking its further development. Colds with sore throat; heat and dryness of throat. Cough with difficult expectoration. Squamous skin

complementary: Kali hyd; Gels; Cepa; Squilla. Saponaria

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Chile Soap-bark
Produces and cures symptoms of acute catarrh, sneezing and sore throat. *Most effective in the beginning of coryza*, checking its further development. Colds with sore throat; heat and dryness of throat. Cough with difficult expectoration. Squamous skin

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Kali hyd; Gels; Cepa; Squilla. Saponaria* (sore throat, involuntary urination). Senega.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture and first potency.

ranunculus-bulbosus.name: Ranunculus Bulbosus
ranunculus-bulbosus.essence: Acts especially upon the muscular tissue and skin, and its most characteristic effects are upon the chest walls, like pleurodynia. *Bad effects of Alcohol; delirium tremens*. Spasmodic hiccough. Hydrothorax. Shocks throughout the whole body. Sensitive to air and touch. Chronic sciatica.

agg: open air, motion, contact, atmospheric changes, wet, stormy weather, evening. Cold air brings on all sorts of ailments

ranunculus-bulbosus.dosing: Mother tincture, in ten to thirty drop doses in delirium tremens; third to thirtieth potency generally. Chronic sciatica, apply tincture to heel of affected leg (M. Jousset).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Buttercup
Acts especially upon the muscular tissue and skin, and its most characteristic effects are upon the chest walls, like pleurodynia. *Bad effects of Alcohol; delirium tremens*. Spasmodic hiccough. Hydrothorax. Shocks throughout the whole body. Sensitive to air and touch. Chronic sciatica.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Irritable, pains in forehead and eyeballs. Creeping sensation in scalp. Pressing pain in forehead from within outward.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Day-blindness; mist before eyes; pressure and smarting in eyes, as from smoke. Pain over right eye; better, standing and walking. Herpes on cornea. Vesicles on cornea, with intense pain, photophobia, and lachrymation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Various kinds of pains and soreness, *as if bruised in sternum*, ribs, intercostal spaces, and both hypochondria. *Inter-costal rheumatism. Chilliness in chest when walking in open air*. Stitches in chest, between shoulder-blades; worse, inspiring, moving. Rheumatic pain in chest, as from subcutaneous ulceration. *Tenderness of abdomen to pressure. Muscular pain along lower margin of the shoulder-blade*; burning in small spots from sedentary employment.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Burning and intense itching; worse, contact*. Hard excrescences. *Herptic eruptions*, with great itching. *Shingles, bluish vesicles*. Itching in palms. Blister-like eruption in palms. Corns sensitive. Horny skin. Finger-tips and palms chapped. Vesicular and pustular eruptions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, open air, motion, contact, atmospheric changes, wet, stormy weather, evening. Cold air brings on all sorts of ailments.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Incompatible: *Sulph; Staph*.
Compare: *Ranunc acris* (pain in lumbar muscles and joints by bending and turning body); *Ranunc glacialis*-Reindeer flower Carlina--(Pulmonary affections; broncho-pneumonical Influenza-enormous weight in head with vertigo and sensation as of impending apoplexy; night-sweats-more on thighs); *Ranunc repens* (crawling sensation in forehead and scalp in evening in bed); *Ranunc flammula* (ulceration; gangrene of arm). Compare, also: *Bry; Croton; Mez; Euphorb*.
Antidotes: *Bry; Camph; Rhus*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Mother tincture, in ten to thirty drop doses in delirium tremens; third to thirtieth potency generally. Chronic sciatica, apply tincture to heel of affected leg (M. Jousset).

ranunculus-sceleratus.name: Ranunculus Sceleratus
ranunculus-sceleratus.essence: Is more irritating than others of this botanical family, as seen in the skin symptoms. *Boring, gnawing pain* very marked. *Pemphigus*. Periodical complaints. Fainting with pain in stomach.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Marsh Buttercup
Is more irritating than others of this botanical family, as seen in the skin symptoms. *Boring, gnawing pain* very marked. *Pemphigus*. Periodical complaints. Fainting with pain in stomach.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Gnawing in one spot left of vertex. Frightful dreams about corpses, serpents, battles, etc. Fluent coryza, with sneezing and burning micturition.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Teeth and gums sensitive. *Tongue mapped* denuded patches. Mouth sore and raw. *Burning and rawness of tongue*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation of a plug behind umbilicus. *Pain over region of liver, with sensation as if diarrhoea would set it*. Pressure as of a plug behind right false ribs; worse, deep inspiration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Integument sensitive. Bruised pain and weakness in the chest every evening. *Sore burning behind xiphoid cartilage*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Vesicular eruption, with tendency to form large blisters. Acrid exudation, which makes surrounding parts sore*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Boring pain*. Sudden burning sticking *in right toe*. Corns, with burning and soreness, especially when feet hang down. Gout in fingers and toes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third potency.

raphanus-sativus.name: Raphanus Sativus
raphanus-sativus.essence: Produces pain and stitches in liver and spleen. Increases of bile and salivary secretion. Symptoms will not appear if salt is used with the Radish. Great accumulation and incarceration of flatulence. "Globus" symptoms. Seborrhoea, with greasy skin. Pemphigus. Hysteria; chilliness in back and arms. Sexual insomnia (*Kali brom*). Nymphomania. *Post-operative gas pains*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Black Garden Radish (RAPHANUS)
Produces pain and stitches in liver and spleen. Increases of bile and salivary secretion. Symptoms will not appear if salt is used with the Radish. Great accumulation and incarceration of flatulence. "Globus" symptoms. Seborrhoea, with greasy skin. Pemphigus. Hysteria; chilliness in back and arms. Sexual insomnia (*Kali brom*). Nymphomania. *Post-operative gas pains*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sadness, aversion to children, especially girls. Headache, brain feels tender and sore. OEdema of lower eyelids. Mucus in posterior nares.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hot-ball feeling from uterus to throat, stopping there. Heat and burning in throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Putrid eructations. Burning in epigastrium, followed by hot eructation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Retching and vomiting, loss of appetite. Distended, *tympanitic, hard. No flatus emitted upward or downward*. Griping about navel. Stool liquid, frothy, profuse, brown, with colic, and pad-like swelling of intestines. Vomiting of fecal matter.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nervous irritation of genitals. Menses very profuse and long-lasting. *Nymphomania*, with aversion to her own sex and to children, and sexual insomnia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Turbid, with yeast-like sediment. Urine more copious, thick like milk.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in chest extends to back and to throat. Heavy lump and coldness in center of chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Momordica* (worse, near splenic flexure); *Carbo; Anarc; Arg nit; Brassica*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

ratanhia-peruviana.name: Ratanhia Peruviana
ratanhia-peruviana.essence: The rectal symptoms are most important, and have received much clinical confirmation. It has cured pterygium. *Violent hiccough*. Cracked nipples (*Graph; Eup ar*). *Pin worms*.
ratanhia-peruviana.dosing: Third to sixth potency. Locally, the Cerate has proved invaluable in many rectal complaints.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Krameria-Mapato (RATANHIA)
The rectal symptoms are most important, and have received much clinical confirmation. It has cured pterygium. *Violent hiccough*. Cracked nipples (*Graph; Eup ar*). *Pin worms*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bursting in head after stool, and when sitting with head bent forward. Sensation as if scalp from nose to vertex were stretched.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain like knives cutting the stomach.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aches, as if full of broken glass. Anus aches and burns for hours after stool. Feels constricted. Dry heat at anus, with sudden knife-like stitches. Stools must be forced with great effort; protrusion of haemorrhoids. *Fissures of anus, with great constriction, burning like fire*, as do the haemorrhoids; temporarily relieved by cold water. Fetid, thin diarrhoea; stools burn; burning pains before and after stools. Oozing at anus. *Pin-worms* (*Sant; Teuc; Spig*). Itching of anus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Paeon; Croton* (rectal neuralgia); *Sanguin nit* (diseases of rectum); *Macuna prurens-Dolichos-piles, with* burning; haemorrhoidal diathesis; *Silico-sulphocalcite of Alumina; Stag*-blast iron furnace cinder--(anal itching, piles, and constipation; housemaid's knee); abdominal flatulent distension and lumbago. Analogue to Lycopod.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to sixth potency. Locally, the Cerate has proved invaluable in many rectal complaints.

rhamnus-californica.name: Rhamnus Californica
rhamnus-californica.essence:
One of the most positive remedies for rheumatism and *muscular pains*. Pleurodynia, lumbago, gastralgia. Vesical tenesmus; *dysmenorrhoea* of myalgic origin; pain in head, neck, and face. *Inflammatory rheumatism*, joints swollen, painful; tendency to metastasis; profuse sweat. Rheumatic heart (Webster).

Provings of students. 2x potency.
rhamnus-californica.dosing: Tincture in 15-drop doses every four hours.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
California Coffee-tree
One of the most positive remedies for rheumatism and *muscular pains*. Pleurodynia, lumbago, gastralgia. Vesical tenesmus; *dysmenorrhoea* of myalgic origin; pain in head, neck, and face. *Inflammatory rheumatism*, joints swollen, painful; tendency to metastasis; profuse sweat. Rheumatic heart (Webster).
Provings of students. 2x potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nervous, restless, irritable. Lassitude; mentally dull and dazed; unable to concentrate mind on studies.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Dizzy* full feeling. Heavy bruised sensation; better from pressure. *Bursting* feeling with every step. Soreness, especially in occiput and vertex, worse, bending over. Dull pain in left temple. Dull aching in frontal region (left), extending backwards and over forehead. Deep, right-sided frontal headache. Twitching eyelids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Dullness of hearing*. Soreness, deep under right tragus on swallowing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Flushed, hot and glowing. Outward pressure from malar processes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Canker sore between gums and lips. Tongue coated, with clean, pink central patch.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry, rough. Soreness on right side and tonsil.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Constipation* with some flatus. Tenesmus and dry stool. Flatulent diarrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Increased urination. Tickling in anterior urethra, small morning drop (no previous gonorrhoea). Sexual desire increased.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Substernal oppression. Tenderness on pressure of right intercostal muscles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Variation of pulse. Slow pulse.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Unable to control muscular action. Legs sore. Walked like a drunken man.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Symptoms *worse* in evening.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Rhamnus cathartica* or *Rhamnus Frangula*-European Buckthorn-a rheumatic remedy--(abdominal symptoms, colic, diarrhoea; haemorrhoids, especially chronic). *Rhamnus Purshiana-Cascara Sagrada*--(palliative in constipation, as an intestinal tonic, and dyspepsia dependent thereon. 10-15 drops of tincture).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture in 15-drop doses every four hours.

rheum-palmatum.name: Rheum Palmatum
rheum-palmatum.essence: Of frequent use in children with sour diarrhoea; difficult dentition. *Whole child smells sour*.

complementary: Mag phos; Hep; Pod; Cham; Ipec

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Rhubarb (RHEUM)
Of frequent use in children with sour diarrhoea; difficult dentition. *Whole child smells sour*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Impatient and vehement; desires many things and cries (*Cina*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sweat on hairy scalp; constant and profuse. *Cool sweat on the face, especially about mouth and nose*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Much saliva. Sensation of coolness in teeth. Difficult teething; restless and irritable. Breath smells sour (*Cham*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Desire for various kinds of food, but soon tires of all. Throbbing in pit. Feels full.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Colicky pain about navel. Colic when uncovering. Wind seems to rise up to chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Before stool, unsuccessful urging to urinate. *Stools smell sour*, pasty, with shivering and tenesmus, and burning in anus. Sour diarrhoea during dentition. Colicky, even ineffectual urging to evacuate altered fecal stools.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, uncovering, after eating, moving about.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Mag phos; Hep; Pod; Cham; Ipec*.
Antidotes: *Camph; Cham*.
Complementary: *Mag carb*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to sixth potency.

rodium-metallicum.name: Rodium Metallicum
rodium-metallicum.essence:
(Proved by MacFarlan with the 200th potency).

Nervous and tearful. Frontal headache; shocks through head. Fleeting neuralgic pains in head, over eyes, in ear, both sides of nose, teeth. Loose cold in head. Lips dry. Nausea especially from sweets. Dull headache. Stiff neck and rheumatic pain down left shoulder and arm. Itching in arms, palms and face. Loose stools with gripings in abdomen. Hyper-active peristalsis, tenesmus after stool. More urine passed. Cough scratchy, wheezy. Thick, yellow mu...

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Metal Chemical Element (RHODIUM)
(Proved by MacFarlan with the 200th potency).
Nervous and tearful. Frontal headache; shocks through head. Fleeting neuralgic pains in head, over eyes, in ear, both sides of nose, teeth. Loose cold in head. Lips dry. Nausea especially from sweets. Dull headache. Stiff neck and rheumatic pain down left shoulder and arm. Itching in arms, palms and face. Loose stools with gripings in abdomen. Hyper-active peristalsis, tenesmus after stool. More urine passed. Cough scratchy, wheezy. Thick, yellow mucus from chest. Feels weak, dizzy and a tired feeling.

rhus-aromatica.name: Rhus Aromatica
rhus-aromatica.essence: Renal and urinary affections, especially *diabetes*. Enuresis due to vesical atony; senile incontinence. Haematuria and cystitis come within the range of this remedy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Fragrant Sumach
Renal and urinary affections, especially *diabetes*. Enuresis due to vesical atony; senile incontinence. Haematuria and cystitis come within the range of this remedy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pale*, albuminous. *Incontinence. Severe pain at beginning or before urination*, causing great agony in children. Constant dribbling. *Diabetes*, large quantities of urine of low specific gravity (*Phos ac; Acet ac*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, in rather material doses.

rhus-glabra.name: Rhus Glabra
rhus-glabra.essence: Epistaxis and *occipital headache. Fetid flatus*. Ulceration of mouth. *Dreams of flying through the air* (*Sticta*). *Profuse perspiration arising from debility* (*China*). It is claimed that this remedy will so disinfect the bowels that the flatus and stools will be free from odor. It acts well in putrescent conditions with tendency to ulceration.
rhus-glabra.dosing: Tincture. Usually locally to soft, spongy gums, aphthae, pharyngitis, etc. Internally, first potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Smooth Sumach
Epistaxis and *occipital headache. Fetid flatus*. Ulceration of mouth. *Dreams of flying through the air* (*Sticta*). *Profuse perspiration arising from debility* (*China*). It is claimed that this remedy will so disinfect the bowels that the flatus and stools will be free from odor. It acts well in putrescent conditions with tendency to ulceration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scurvy; nursing sore mouth (*Veronica*). Aphthous stomatitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Said to be antidotal to the action of Mercury, and has been employed in the treatment of secondary syphilis after mercurialization.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture. Usually locally to soft, spongy gums, aphthae, pharyngitis, etc. Internally, first potency.

rhus-venenata.name: Rhus Venenata
rhus-venenata.essence: The skin symptoms of this species of Rhus are most severe.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Poison-elder
The skin symptoms of this species of Rhus are most severe.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Great melancholy; no desire to live, gloomy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heavy, frontal headache; worse, walking or stooping. Eyes nearly closed with great swelling. Vesicular inflammation of ears. Nose red and shiny. Face swollen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Red at tip. Fissured in middle. Vesicles on under side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Profuse, watery, white stools in morning, 4 am, with colicky pains; expelled with force. Pain in hypogastrium before every stool.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Paralytic drawing in right arm, especially wrist, and extending to fingers.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching; relieved by hot water. *Vesicles. Erysipelas; skin dark red*. Erythema nodosum, with nightly itching and pains in long bones.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Antidote: *Clematis*. The California Poison-oak (Rhus diversiloba) is identical with it. It antidotes *Radium* and follows it well. Compare: *Anacard*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth potency.

ricinus-communis.name: Ricinus Communis
ricinus-communis.essence: Has marked action on gastro-intestinal tract. *Increase the quantity of milk* in nursing women. Vomiting and purging. Languor and weakness.
ricinus-communis.dosing: Third potency. Five drops every four hours for increasing flow of milk; also locally a poultice of the leaves.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Castor-oil (RICINUS COMMUNIS - BOFAREIRA)
Has marked action on gastro-intestinal tract. *Increase the quantity of milk* in nursing women. Vomiting and purging. Languor and weakness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo, occipital pain, congestive symptoms, buzzing in ears. Face pale, twitching of mouth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Anorexia with great thirst, burning in stomach, pyrosis, nausea *profuse vomiting*, pit of stomach sensitive. Mouth dry.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rumbling with contraction of recti muscles, colic, incessant diarrhoea with purging. Rice water stools with cramps and chilliness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Loose, incessant, painless, with painful cramps in muscles of extremities. Anus inflamed. Stools green, slimy, and bloody. Fever, emaciation, somnolence.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Resorcin* (summer complaint with vomiting); destroys organic germs of putrefaction; *Cholos terrapina* (cramps of muscles). *Ars; Verat*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency. Five drops every four hours for increasing flow of milk; also locally a poultice of the leaves.

robinia-pseudacacia.name: Robinia Pseudacacia
robinia-pseudacacia.essence: The remedy for hperchlorhydria. In cases where albuminoid digestion is too rapid and starch digestion is perverted. The gastric symptoms with the most *pronounced acidity* are well authenticated, and are the guiding symptoms. The acidity of Robinia is accompanied by frontal headache. *Intensely acrid eructations*. Acrid and greenish vomiting, colic and flatulence, nightly burning pains in stomach and constipation with urgent desire.--*Acidity of children*. Stools and perspiration sour. Incarcera...
robinia-pseudacacia.dosing: Third potency. Must be continued a long time.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Yellow Locust (ROBINIA)
The remedy for hperchlorhydria. In cases where albuminoid digestion is too rapid and starch digestion is perverted. The gastric symptoms with the most *pronounced acidity* are well authenticated, and are the guiding symptoms. The acidity of Robinia is accompanied by frontal headache. *Intensely acrid eructations*. Acrid and greenish vomiting, colic and flatulence, nightly burning pains in stomach and constipation with urgent desire.--*Acidity of children*. Stools and perspiration sour. Incarcerated flatus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull, throbbing, frontal pain; worse, motion and reading. Gastric headache with acid vomiting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull, heavy aching. Nausea; *sour*, eructations; profuse vomiting of an *intensely sour* fluid (*Sulph ac*). Great distention of stomach and bowels. Flatulent colic (*Cham; Diosc*). Sour stools; child smells sour.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nymphomania. Acrid, fetid leucorrhoea. Discharge of blood between menstrual periods. Herpes on vagina and vulva.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Magnes phos; Arg nit; Orexine tannate*. (Hyperchlorhydria; deficient acid and slow digestion; 14 hourly doses)

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency. Must be continued a long time.

rosa-damascena.name: Rosa Damascena
rosa-damascena.essence: Useful in the beginning of hay-fever, with involvement of Eustachian tube.

complementary: Succin acid; Sabad; Euph; Psor; Kali hyd; Naphth

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Damask Rose
Useful in the beginning of hay-fever, with involvement of Eustachian tube.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hardness of hearing; tinnitus. *Eustachian catarrh* (*Hydr; Merc dulc*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: in hay-fever: *Phleum pratense*--Timothy grass--(Hay-fever with asthma; watery coryza, itching of nose and eyes; frequent sneezing, dyspnoea. Use 6-30 potency. Rabe). *Succin acid; Sabad; Euph; Psor; Kali hyd; Naphth*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
