materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency. Oil of Solidago, 1 oz to 8 oz. Alcohol. 15 drops doses to promote expectoration in bronchitis and bronchial asthma in old people (Eli G. Jones).

solanum-nigrum.name: Solanum Nigrum
solanum-nigrum.essence: Used with success in ergotism, with tetanic spasms and stiffness of whole body, with mania. Marked action on head and eyes. *Meningitis*. Chronic intestinal toxaemia. Brain irritation during dentition. Restlessness of a violent and convulsive nature. Formication with contraction of extremities.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Black Nightshade
Used with success in ergotism, with tetanic spasms and stiffness of whole body, with mania. Marked action on head and eyes. *Meningitis*. Chronic intestinal toxaemia. Brain irritation during dentition. Restlessness of a violent and convulsive nature. Formication with contraction of extremities.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Furious delirium. Vertigo; terrible headache and complete cessation of the mental faculties. Night terrors. *Congestive* headache.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Acute coryza; *profuse, watery discharge from right nostril*; left stopped up, with chilly sensation, alternating with heat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain over both eyes. Alternate dilatation and contraction of pupils; weak sight; floating spots.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constructive feeling in chest, with difficult breathing; cough with tickling in throat. Expectoration *thick, yellow*. Pain in *left* chest, sore to touch.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Alternation of coldness and heat. Scarlet fever; eruption in spots, large and vivid.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Bellad; Solanum Carolinense*-Horse-nettle--(conclusions and epilepsy, twenty to forty-drop doses; is of great value in grand mal of idiopathic type, where the disease has begun beyond age of childhood; hystero-epilepsy, also in whooping-cough); *Solan mammosum*-Apple of Sodom--(pain in left hip-joint); *Solan oleraceum* (swelling of mammary gland, with profuse secretion of milk); *Solan tuberosum* (cramps in calves and contraction of fingers; spitting through closed teeth); *Solan vesicarium* (recommended in facial paralysis); *Solaninum aceticum* (threatening paralysis of the lungs in the course of bronchitis in the aged and children must cough a long time before able to raise expectoration); *Solan pseudocaps* (acute pains, in lower abdomen); *Solan tuberos aegrotans*-Diseased potato--(prolapse of the rectum, patulous anus; offensive breath and odor of body; tumors of rectum look like decayed potato; dreams of pools of blood); *Solanum tuberosum*-Potato berries--(cramps in the calves of the legs and fingers).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second to thirtieth potency.

spigelia-anthelmia.name: Spigelia Anthelmia
spigelia-anthelmia.essence:
Spigelia is an important remedy in pericarditis and other diseases of the heart, because the provings were conducted with the greatest regard for objective symptoms and the subjective symptoms are by innumerable confirmations proved to be correct (C. Hering).

Has marked elective affinity for the eye, heart, and nervous system. Neuralgia of the fifth nerve is very prominent in its effects. Is especially adapted to anaemic, debilitated, rheumatic, and scrofulous subjects. Stabbing pains. Heart af...

agg: from touch, motion, noise, turning, washing, concussion
amel: lying on right side with head high

spigelia-anthelmia.dosing: Sixth to thirtieth potency for neuralgic symptoms; second to third potency for inflammatory symptoms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, from touch, motion, noise, turning, washing, concussion. *Better*, lying on right side with head high; inspiring.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chilliness on the slightest motion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Pinkroot (SPIGELIA)
Spigelia is an important remedy in pericarditis and other diseases of the heart, because the provings were conducted with the greatest regard for objective symptoms and the subjective symptoms are by innumerable confirmations proved to be correct (C. Hering).
Has marked elective affinity for the eye, heart, and nervous system. Neuralgia of the fifth nerve is very prominent in its effects. Is especially adapted to anaemic, debilitated, rheumatic, and scrofulous subjects. Stabbing pains. Heart affections and neuralgia. *Very sensitive to touch. Parts feel chilly; send shudder through frame*. A remedy for symptoms due to the presence of worms. *Child refers to the navel as the most painful part* (*Granat; Nux mosch*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Afraid of sharp, pointed things, pins, needles, etc.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pain beneath frontal eminence and temples, extending to eyes* (*Onos*). Semi-lateral, involving left eye; pain violent, throbbing; worse, making a false step. Pain as if a band around head (*Carbol ac; Cact; Gels*). Vertigo, hearing exalted.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feel too large; *pressive pain on turning them*. Pupils dilated; photophobia; rheumatic ophthalmia. *Severe pain in and around eyes, extending deep into socket*. Ciliary neuralgia, a true neuritis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Forepart of nose always dry; *discharge through posterior nares chronic catarrh*, with post-nasal dropping of bland mucus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue fissured, painful. Tearing toothache; worse, after eating and cold. *Foul odor from mouth*. Offensive taste.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Prosopalgia, involving eye, zygoma, cheek, teeth, temple*, worse, stooping, touch, from morning until sunset.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent palpitation. Praecordial pain and great aggravation from movement. Frequent attacks of palpitation, especially with foul odor from mouth. Pulse weak and irregular. Pericarditis, with sticking pains, palpitation, dyspnoea. Neuralgia extending to arm or both arms. Angina pectoris. Craving for hot water which relieves. Rheumatic carditis, trembling pulse; whole left side sore. *Dyspnoea; must lie on right side with head high*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching and crawling. Frequent ineffectual urging to stool. Ascarides.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth potency for neuralgic symptoms; second to third potency for inflammatory symptoms.

spiranthes-autumnalis.name: Spiranthes Autumnalis
spiranthes-autumnalis.essence: Has been used for milk-flow in nursing women, lumbago and rheumatism, colic, with drowsiness and spasmodic yawning. Is an anti-phlogistic remedy akin to Acon its symptoms showing congestion and inflammation. Acidity and burning in oesophagus with eructation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Lady's Tresses (SPIRANTHES)
Has been used for milk-flow in nursing women, lumbago and rheumatism, colic, with drowsiness and spasmodic yawning. Is an anti-phlogistic remedy akin to Acon its symptoms showing congestion and inflammation. Acidity and burning in oesophagus with eructation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pruritus; vulva red; dryness and burning in vagina. Burning pain in vagina during coition. Leucorrhoea, bloody.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sciatic pain, especially right side. Pain in shoulders. Swelling of veins of hands. Pain in all articulations of hands. Coldness of feet and toes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Flushes of heat. Sweat on palms. Hands alternately hot and cold.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third potency.

spiraea-ulmaria.name: Spiraea Ulmaria
spiraea-ulmaria.essence: Burning and pressure in oesophagus, feels contracted but not made worse by swallowing. *Morbidly conscientious*. Relieves irritation of the urinary passages; influences the prostate gland; checks gleet and prostatorrhoea; has been used for eclampsia, epilepsy, and hydrophobia. Bites of mad animals. Heat in various parts (Salicylic acid is found in Spiraea).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Hardhack
Burning and pressure in oesophagus, feels contracted but not made worse by swallowing. *Morbidly conscientious*. Relieves irritation of the urinary passages; influences the prostate gland; checks gleet and prostatorrhoea; has been used for eclampsia, epilepsy, and hydrophobia. Bites of mad animals. Heat in various parts (Salicylic acid is found in Spiraea).

squilla-maritima.name: Squilla Maritima
squilla-maritima.essence:
A slow acting remedy. Corresponds to ailments requiring several days to reach their maximum. Persistent, dull, rheumatic pains permeate the body. A spleen medicine; stitches under left free ribs. Important heart and kidneys medicine. *Broncho-pneumonia*.

Acts especially on mucous membranes of the respiratory and digestive tracts, and also upon the kidneys. Valuable in chronic bronchitis of old people with mucous rales, dyspnoea, and scanty urine.

complementary: Digit; Strophant; Apocyn can; Bry; Kali carb

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Digit; Strophant; Apocyn can; Bry; Kali carb*. Squilla follows *Digitalis*, if this fails to relieve water-logged cases.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Sea-onion
A slow acting remedy. Corresponds to ailments requiring several days to reach their maximum. Persistent, dull, rheumatic pains permeate the body. A spleen medicine; stitches under left free ribs. Important heart and kidneys medicine. *Broncho-pneumonia*.
Acts especially on mucous membranes of the respiratory and digestive tracts, and also upon the kidneys. Valuable in chronic bronchitis of old people with mucous rales, dyspnoea, and scanty urine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feel irritable; child bores into them with fists. Sensation as if swimming in cold water.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pressure like a stone.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fluent coryza; margins of nostrils feel sore. Sneezing; throat irritated; short, dry cough; must take a deep breath. *Dyspnoea and stitches in chest*, and painful contraction of abdominal muscles. *Violent*, furious, exhausting cough, with much mucus; profuse, salty, slimy expectoration, and with *involuntary spurting of urine and sneezing. Child rubs face with fist during cough* (*Caust; Puls*). Cough provoked by taking a deep breath or cold drinks, from exertion, change from warm to cold air. Cough of measles. Frequent calls to urinate at night, passing large quantities (*Phos ac*). *Sneezing with coughing*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: A cardiac stimulant affecting the peripheral vessels and coronary arteries.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Great urging; *much watery urine*. *Involuntary* spurting of urine when coughing (*Caustic; Puls*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Small, red spots over body, with prickling pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Icy cold hands and feet, with warmth of the rest of the body (*Menyanthes*). Feet get sore from standing. Tender feet with shop girls.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
*Better*, rest;
*worse*, motion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Betony Wood (BETONICA)
Produces pains in various parts.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stitches in right temple. Inability to concentrate mind.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pains in abdomen, hepatic region and of transverse colon, also in gall-bladder and right inguinal region and spermatic cords.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Shooting pain in back of both wrist joints. Wrist drops. Pain in right popliteal space down leg, which feels paralyzed.

stannum-metallicum.name: Stannum Metallicum
stannum-metallicum.essence: Chief action is centered upon the nervous system and respiratory organs. Debility is very marked when Stannum is the remedy, especially the debility of chronic bronchial and pulmonary conditions, characterized by profuse muco-purulent discharges upon tuberculosis basis. *Talking causes a very weak feeling in the throat and chest. Pains that come and go gradually*, call unmistakably for Stannum. Paralytic weakness; spasms; paralysis.

agg: using voice (i.e, laughing, talking, singing), lying on right side, warm drinks

complementary: Caust; Calc; Sil; Tuberc; Bacil; Helon. Myrtus chekan

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Tin (STANNUM)
Chief action is centered upon the nervous system and respiratory organs. Debility is very marked when Stannum is the remedy, especially the debility of chronic bronchial and pulmonary conditions, characterized by profuse muco-purulent discharges upon tuberculosis basis. *Talking causes a very weak feeling in the throat and chest. Pains that come and go gradually*, call unmistakably for Stannum. Paralytic weakness; spasms; paralysis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sad, anxious. *Discouraged*. Dread of seeing people.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aching in temples and forehead. Obstinate acute coryza and influenza with cough. Pain worse motion; *gradually increasing and decreasing* as if constricted by a band; forehead feels pressed inwards. Jarring of walking resounds painfully in head. Drawing pains in malar bones and orbits. Ulceration of ringhole in lobe of ear.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Much adhesive mucus, difficult to detach; efforts to detach cause nausea. Throat dry and stings.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hunger. *Smell of cooking causes vomiting*. Bitter taste. Pain better pressure, but sore to touch. Sensation of *emptiness in stomach*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cramp-like colic around navel, with a feeling of emptiness. *Colic relieved by hard pressure*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Bearing-down sensation*. Prolapsus, with *weak, sinking feeling in stomach* (*Sep*). *Menses early and profuse*. Pain in vagina, upward and back to spine. Leucorrhoea, with great debility.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hoarse; mucus expelled by forcible cough. Violent, dry cough in evening until midnight. Cough excited by *laughing*, singing, talking; worse lying on right side. During day, with *copious green, sweetish*, expectoration. Chest feels sore. *Chest feels weak*; can hardly talk. Influenzal cough from noon to midnight with scanty expectoration. Respiration short, oppressive; stitches in left side when breathing and lying on same side. *Phthisis mucosa. Hectic fever*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sleeps with one leg drawn up, the other stretched out.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Paralytic weakness; drops things. Ankles swollen. Limbs suddenly *give out when attempting to sit down. Dizziness and weakness when descending*. Spasmodic twitching of muscles of forearm and hand. Fingers jerk when holding pen. Neuritis. Typewriters' paralysis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heat in evening; *exhausting night-sweats*, especially towards morning. Hectic. Perspiration, principally on forehead and nape of neck; debilitating; smelling musty, or offensive.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, using voice (i.e, laughing, talking, singing), lying on right side, warm drinks. *Better*, coughing or expectorating, hard pressure.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Complementary: *Puls*.
Compare: *Stann iod*. 3x (Valuable in chronic chest diseases characterized by plastic tissue changes). Persistent inclination to cough, excited by tickling dry spot in the throat, apparently at root of tongue. Dryness of throat. Trachial and bronchial irritation of smokers. Pulmonary symptoms; cough, loud, hollow, ending with expectoration (Phellandrium). State of purulent infiltration. *Advanced* phthisis sometimes when Stann jod has not taken effect, an additional dose of Iodine in milk caused the drug to have its usual beneficial effect (Stonham). Compare: *Caust; Calc; Sil; Tuberc; Bacil; Helon. Myrtus chekan* (chronic bronchitis, cough of phthisis, emphysema, with gastric catarrhal complications and thick, yellow difficult sputum. Old persons with weakened power of expectoration).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

stellaria-media.name: Stellaria Media
stellaria-media.essence:
Induces a condition of stasis, congestion, and sluggishness of all functions. Morning aggravation.

Sharp, *shifting*, rheumatic pains in all parts very pronounced. *Rheumatism*; darting pains in almost every part; stiffness of joints; parts sore to touch; worse, motion. *Chronic rheumatism. Shifting pains* (*Puls; Kali sulph*). Psoriasis. Enlarged and inflamed gouty finger joints.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Chickweed
Induces a condition of stasis, congestion, and sluggishness of all functions. Morning aggravation.
Sharp, *shifting*, rheumatic pains in all parts very pronounced. *Rheumatism*; darting pains in almost every part; stiffness of joints; parts sore to touch; worse, motion. *Chronic rheumatism. Shifting pains* (*Puls; Kali sulph*). Psoriasis. Enlarged and inflamed gouty finger joints.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: General irritability. Lassitude, indisposition to work. Smarting and burning in eyes, feel protruded. Dull, frontal headache; worse in morning and left side with sleepiness. Neck muscles stiff and sore. Eyes feel protruded.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Liver engorged, swollen, with stitching pain and sensitive to pressure*. Clay-colored stools. Hepatic torpor. Constipation or alternating constipation and diarrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rheumatoid pains in different parts of the body. Sharp pain in small of back, over kidneys, in gluteal region, extending down thigh. Pain in shoulders and arms. *Synovitis*. Bruised feeling. Rheumatic pains in calves of legs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, mornings, warmth, tobacco. *Better*, evenings, cold air, motion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Pulsat* (similar in rheumatism, pains shifting, worse rest, warmth; better cold air).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, externally. Internally, 2x potency.

sticta-pulmonaria.name: Sticta Pulmonaria
sticta-pulmonaria.essence: Offers a set of symptoms like coryza, bronchial catarrh and influenza, together with nervous and *rheumatic* disturbances. There is a general feeling of dullness and malaise, as when a cold is coming on; dull, heavy pressure in forehead, catarrhal conjunctivitis, etc. *Rheumatic stiffness of neck*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Lungwort (STICTA)
Offers a set of symptoms like coryza, bronchial catarrh and influenza, together with nervous and *rheumatic* disturbances. There is a general feeling of dullness and malaise, as when a cold is coming on; dull, heavy pressure in forehead, catarrhal conjunctivitis, etc. *Rheumatic stiffness of neck*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Feels as if floating in air* (*Datura arborea; Lac. Can*). Confusion of ideas; *patient must talk*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Dull headache, with dull heavy pressure in forehead and
*root of nose. Catarrhal headache before discharge appears*. Burning in eyes and soreness of balls. Sensation as if scalp were too small. Burning in eyelids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Feeling of fullness at the root of the nose* (*Nux*). Atrophic rhinitis (*Calc fluor*). *Dryness of nasal membrane. Constant need to blow the nose, but no discharge*. Dry scabs, especially in evening and night. *Hay-fever*; incessant sneezing (*Sabad*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scanty flow of milk.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Diarrhoea; stools profuse, frothy; worse, morning. Urine increased, with soreness and aching in bladder.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Throat raw; dropping of mucus posteriorly. *Dry, hacking cough during night; worse, inspiration*. Tracheitis, facilitates expectoration. Loose cough in morning. Pain through chest from sternum to spiral column. Cough after measles (*Sang*); *worse towards evening and when tired. Pulsation from right side of sternum down to abdomen*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rheumatic pain in right shoulder joint, deltoid, and biceps. Swelling, heat, redness of joints. *Spot of inflammation and redness over affected joint*. Pain severe and drawing. Chorea-like spasms; legs feel floating in air. *Housemaid's knee* (*Rhus; Kali hyd; Slag*). Shooting pains in knees. Joints and neighboring muscles red, swollen, painful. Rheumatic pains precede catarrhal symptoms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, sudden changes of temperature.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Datura arborea-Bougmancia candida* (cannot concentrate thoughts; brain floats in thousands of problems and grand ideas. Floating sensation as if ideas were floating outside of brain. Headache, heartburn. Burning sensation around cardiac and of stomach, extending to oesophagus with sense of constriction. Heat and fullness over liver region). *Cetraria*-Iceland Moss (chronic diarrhoea, phthisis, bloody expectoration. Is used as a decoction and boiled with milk as an expectorant and nutrient in bronchorrhoea, catarrh, etc). Also compare: *Eryng; Dros; Stilling; Rumex; Sambuc*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to sixth potency.

stillingia-sylvatica.name: Stillingia Sylvatica
stillingia-sylvatica.essence: Chronic periosteal rheumatism, syphilitic and scrofulous affections. Respiratory symptoms well marked. Torpor of lymphatics; torpid liver, with jaundice and constipation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Queen's Root (STILLINGIA)
Chronic periosteal rheumatism, syphilitic and scrofulous affections. Respiratory symptoms well marked. Torpor of lymphatics; torpid liver, with jaundice and constipation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Gloomy forebodings*; depressed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry, spasmodic cough. Larynx constricted, with stinging in fauces. Trachea feels sore when pressed. *Hoarseness* and chronic laryngeal affections of public speakers.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Urine colorless. *Deposits white sediment*; urine milky and thick.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aching pains in *bones* of extremities and back.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ulcers; chronic eruptions on hands and fingers. *Enlarged cervical glands*. Burning, itching of legs; worse, exposure to air. Exostosis. Scrofuloderma; syphilis, secondary eruption and later symptoms. Valuable for intercurrent use.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, in afternoons, damp air, motion. *Better*, in morning, dry air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Staphis; Mercur; Syphil; Aur; Corydalis* (syphilitic nodes).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture and first potency.

stramonium.name: Stramonium
stramonium.essence: The entire force of this drug seems to be expended on the brain, through the skin and throat show some disturbance. Suppressed secretions and excretions. Sensation as if limbs were separated from body. Delirium tremens. Absence of pain and muscular mobility especially of muscles of expression and of locomotion. Gyratory and graceful motions. Parkinsonism.

agg: in dark room, when alone, looking at bright or shining objects, after sleep, on swallowing

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Thorn-apple
The entire force of this drug seems to be expended on the brain, through the skin and throat show some disturbance. Suppressed secretions and excretions. Sensation as if limbs were separated from body. Delirium tremens. Absence of pain and muscular mobility especially of muscles of expression and of locomotion. Gyratory and graceful motions. Parkinsonism.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Devout, earnest, beseeching and ceaseless talking*. Loquacious, garrulous, laughing, singing, swearing, praying, rhyming. Sees ghosts, hears voices, talks with spirits. Rapid changes from joy to sadness. Violent and lewd. Delusions about his identity; thinks himself tall, double, a part missing. Religious mania. Cannot bear solitude or darkness; *must have light and company*. Sight of water or anything glittering brings on spasms. Delirium, with desire to escape (*Bell; Bry; Rhus*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Raises head frequently from the pillow*. Pain in forehead and over eyebrows, beginning at 9 am; worse until noon. Boring pain, preceded by obscure vision. Rush of blood to head; staggers, with tendency to fall forward and to the left. Auditory hallucinations.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Seem prominent, *staring wide open*; pupils dilated. Loss of vision; complains that it is dark, *and calls for light*. *Small objects look large*. Parts of the body seem enormously swollen. Strabismus. All objects look black.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hot, red; circumscribed redness of cheeks. Blood rushes to face; distorted. *Expression of terror*. Pale face.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry; dribbling of viscid saliva. Aversion to water. *Stammering*. Risus sardonicus. Cannot swallow on account of spasm. Chewing motion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Food tastes like straw. Violent thirst. Vomiting of mucus and *green* bile.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Suppression*, bladder empty.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Sexual erethism*, with indecent speech and action. Hands constantly kept on genitals.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Metrorrhagia*, with *loquacity, singing*, praying. Puerperal mania, with characteristic mental symptoms and profuse sweatings. Convulsions after labor.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Awaken terrified; screams with fright. Deep snoring sleep. Sleepy, but cannot sleep (*Bell*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Graceful, rhythmic motions*. Convulsions of upper extremities and of isolated groups of muscles. *Chorea*; spasms partial, constantly changing. *Violent pain in left hip*. Trembling, twitching of tendons, staggering gait.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Shining red flash. *Effects of suppressed eruption in scarlatina*, with delirium, etc.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Profuse sweat, which does not relieve. Violent fever.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, in dark room, when alone, looking at bright or shining objects, after sleep, on swallowing. *Better*, from bright light, company, warmth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare especially: *Hyoscy* and *Bellad*. It has less fever than *Bellad*, but more than *Hyos*. It causes more functional excitement of the brain, but never approaches the true inflammatory condition of Bellad.
Antidotes: *Bellad; Tabac; Nux*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thirtieth potency and lower.

strontium-carbonicum.name: Strontium Carbonicum
strontium-carbonicum.essence: Rheumatic pains, chronic sprains, stenosis of oesophagus. Pains make patient faint or sick all over. Chronic *sequelae of haemorrhages*, after operations with much oozing of blood and coldness and prostration. Arterio-sclerosis. High blood pressure with flushed face pulsating arteries, threatened apoplexy. Violent involuntary starts. Affections of bones, especially femur. Restlessness at night, smothering feeling. *For shock after surgical operations*. *Neuritis*, great sensitiveness to cold.

complementary: Arnica; Ruta; Sil; Baryta c; Carbo; Stront jodat

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Carbonate of Strontia (STRONTIA)
Rheumatic pains, chronic sprains, stenosis of oesophagus. Pains make patient faint or sick all over. Chronic *sequelae of haemorrhages*, after operations with much oozing of blood and coldness and prostration. Arterio-sclerosis. High blood pressure with flushed face pulsating arteries, threatened apoplexy. Violent involuntary starts. Affections of bones, especially femur. Restlessness at night, smothering feeling. *For shock after surgical operations*. *Neuritis*, great sensitiveness to cold.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Vertigo with headache and nausea*. Distensive pressure. Aches from nape of neck, spreading upwards; better wrapping head up warmly (*Sil*). Flushes in face; violent pulsating. Supraorbital neuralgia; pains increase and decrease slowly (*Stann*). Bloody crusts in nose. Face red; burns, itches. Itching, redness and burning of nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning and redness of eyes. Pain and lachrymation on using eyes, with dancing and chromatic alterations of objects looked at.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Loss of appetite, aversion to meat, craves bread and beer. Food tasteless. Eructations after eating. Hiccough causes chest pains; cardialgia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sticking in abdominal ring. Diarrhoea; *worse at night; continuous urging*; better towards morning. Burning in anus lasts a long time after stool (*Ratanh*). Uncomfortable fullness and swelling of abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sciatica with oedema of ankle. Rheumatic pain in right shoulder. Rheumatism with diarrhoea. Gnawing as if in marrow of bones. Cramps in calves and soles. *Chronic* spasms, particularly of ankle-joint. OEdematous swelling. Icy-cold feet. Rheumatic pains, especially in joints. Veins of hands engorged.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heat, with aversion to uncover or undress.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Moist, itching, burning eruption; better in open air, especially warm sunshine. *Sprains of ankle-joint, with oedema*. Violent perspiration at night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Better* immersing in *hot water; worse*, change of weather; from being quiet; when beginning to move; great sensitiveness to cold.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Arnica; Ruta; Sil; Baryta c; Carbo; Stront jodat* (arterio-sclerosis). *Strontium brom* (often gives excellent results where a bromide is indicated. Vomiting of pregnancy. Nervous dyspepsia. It is anti-fermentative and neutralizes excessive acidity). *Stront nit* (Morbid cravings; headache and eczema behind ears).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth trituration and thirtieth potency.

strophanthus-hispidus.name: Strophanthus Hispidus
strophanthus-hispidus.essence: Strophanthus is a muscle poison; it increases the contractile power of all striped muscles. Acts on the heart; *increasing the systole and diminishes the rapidity*. May be used with advantage to tone the heart, and run off dropsical accumulations. In small doses for weak heart; it feels enlarged. In mitral regurgitation, where oedema and dropsy have supervened (*Digit*). Strophanthus occasions no gastric distress, has no cumulative effects, is a greater diuretic, and is safer for the aged, as it...
strophanthus-hispidus.dosing: Tincture and 6x potency. In more acute cases, five to ten drops of the tincture three times a day.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Dyspnoea*, especially on ascending. Lungs congested. OEdema of lungs. Bronchial and cardiac asthma.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pulse quickened. Heart's action weak, rapid irregular, due to muscular *debility*; and *insufficiency*. Cardiac pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Urticaria, especially more chronic forms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Swollen, dropsical. Anasarca.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Kombe-seed
Strophanthus is a muscle poison; it increases the contractile power of all striped muscles. Acts on the heart; *increasing the systole and diminishes the rapidity*. May be used with advantage to tone the heart, and run off dropsical accumulations. In small doses for weak heart; it feels enlarged. In mitral regurgitation, where oedema and dropsy have supervened (*Digit*). Strophanthus occasions no gastric distress, has no cumulative effects, is a greater diuretic, and is safer for the aged, as it does not affect the vaso-motors. In pneumonia and in severe prostration from haemorrhage after operations and acute diseases. After the long use of stimulants; *irritable heart* of tobacco-smokers. Arterio-sclerosis; rigid arteries of aged. Restores tone to a *brittle* tissue, especially of the heart muscle and valves. Especially useful in failing compensation dependent upon fatty heart. *Hives*. Anaemia with palpitation and breathlessness. Exophthalmia goitre. Corpulent persons.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Temporal pains with double vision, impaired sight; brilliant eyes, flushed face. Senile vertigo.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nausea with special disgust for alcohol and so aids in treatment of dipsomania. Seven drops of tincture.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Increased secretion; scanty and albuminous.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menorrhagia; uterine haemorrhage; uterus heavily congested. Aching pain through hips and thighs during climacteric.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Digit* (but is slower than *strophant* in its action); *Phos ac* (weak heart, irregular pulse, fluttering sensation in cardiac region, palpitation during sleep, fainting).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture and 6x potency. In more acute cases, five to ten drops of the tincture three times a day.

strychninum.name: Strychninum
strychninum.essence: Its primary function is to stimulate the motor centers and the reflex action of the spinal cord. Homeopathic to spasms of muscles, cramps from an undue reflex excitability of the cord, spasms of the bladder, etc. Strychnin stimulates the central nervous system, mental activities, special senses rendered more acute. Respiration increased. All reflexes are made more active. Stiffness in muscles and face and neck. Opisthotonos. Tetanic convulsions with opisthotonos. The muscles relax between paroxy...
strychninum.dosing: Third to thirtieth potency. For non-homeopathic use, to produce its direct physiological effects in paralysis the dose will range from one-fiftieth to one-twentieth of a grain, repeated three times a day. Under twelve years of age, one-fiftieth to one two-hundredth of a grain. *Strych*, hypodermically, is capable of arresting progressive muscular atrophy, and is a certain stimulant to the respiratory centers, and is useful in embarrassed breathing, in the course of pneumonia especially. Is an antidote to Chloral, used in asphyxia from gas and chloroform and early stages of Opium poisoning. Dose, one one-hundredth to one-sixtieth grain every three hours.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Alkaloid of Nux Vomica (STRYCHNINUM)
Its primary function is to stimulate the motor centers and the reflex action of the spinal cord. Homeopathic to spasms of muscles, cramps from an undue reflex excitability of the cord, spasms of the bladder, etc. Strychnin stimulates the central nervous system, mental activities, special senses rendered more acute. Respiration increased. All reflexes are made more active. Stiffness in muscles and face and neck. Opisthotonos. Tetanic convulsions with opisthotonos. The muscles relax between paroxysms; worse slightest touch, sound, odor. Influences more directly the spinal cord and is less appropriate in visceral derangements than Nux. *Tetanus*. Explosive nervousness. The pains and sensations come *suddenly* and return at *intervals*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Restless. *Over-irritability*. Full and bursting headache, with heat in eyes. Vertigo, with roaring in ears. Jerking of head forwards. Scalp sore. Itching of scalp and nape.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hot, painful, protruding, staring. Pupils dilated. Sparks before eyes. Spasmodic contraction of ocular muscles; twitching and trembling of lids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hearing very acute; burning, itching, and roaring in ears.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pale, anxious, livid. Jaws stiffened; lower jaw spasmodically closed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry, contracted; feeling of a lump. Deglutition impossible. Burning along and spasms of oesophagus. Violent itching in roof of mouth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constant retching. Violent vomiting. Nausea of pregnancy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sharp pain in abdominal muscles, griping pain in bowels.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feces discharged involuntarily during spasms. Very obstinate constipation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Desire for coitus (*Canth; Camph; Fl ac; Lach; Phos; Plat*). Any touch on body excites a voluptuous sensation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Spasm of muscles* about larynx. Excessive dyspnoea. Sharp, contractive pains in muscles of chest. Persistent cough, recurring after influenza.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Rigitidy of cervical muscles*. Sharp pain in nape and down spine. *Back stiff*; violent jerks in spinal column. *Icy sensation down spine*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Limbs stiff. Rheumatism with stiff joints. *Violent jerking, twitching, and trembling*. Tetanic convulsions and opisthotonos; spasms provoked by slightest touch and attempt to move. Shocks in the muscles. *Cramp-like pains*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cold chills down spine. Perspiration in a stream down head and chest. Lower extremities cold.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching of whole body, especially nose. Icy sensation down the spine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, morning; touch; noise; motion; after meals. *Better*, lying on back.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Eucalyptus* (neutralizes ill effects of *Strychnin*). *Strych ars* (Paresis in the aged, relaxed musculature. Prostration. Psoriasis; chronic diarrhoea with paralytic symptoms; compensatory hypertrophy of heart with beginning fatty degeneration; marked dyspnoea when lying down; oedema of lower extremities, urine scanty, high specific gravity, heavily loaded with glucose. Diabetes. 6x trit). *Strych et Ferr cit* (chlorotic and paralytic conditions; dyspepsia, with vomiting of ingesta; 2x and 3x trit); *Strychnin nit* (2x and 3x. Said to remove craving for alcohol. Use for two weeks); *Strychnin sulph* (Gastric atony); *Strych valerin* (exhaustion of brain-power; women of high nervous erethism; 2x trit). Compare: *Cicuta; Arnica* (tetanus).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency. For non-homeopathic use, to produce its direct physiological effects in paralysis the dose will range from one-fiftieth to one-twentieth of a grain, repeated three times a day. Under twelve years of age, one-fiftieth to one two-hundredth of a grain. *Strych*, hypodermically, is capable of arresting progressive muscular atrophy, and is a certain stimulant to the respiratory centers, and is useful in embarrassed breathing, in the course of pneumonia especially. Is an antidote to Chloral, used in asphyxia from gas and chloroform and early stages of Opium poisoning. Dose, one one-hundredth to one-sixtieth grain every three hours.

strychnos-gaultheriana.name: Strychnos Gaultheriana
strychnos-gaultheriana.essence: Exhaustion with vertigo; numbness and tingling in hands and feet; involuntary action of lower jaw. Pustules and boils; tertiary syphilis and Paralysis, Eczema, prurigo, old ulcers, leprosy, cancer of glandular structures and bites of serpents. Removes fetor and haemorrhage in cancer, revives the healing process. Follows Arsenic.
strychnos-gaultheriana.dosing: Five drops of the tincture. May be increased to twenty.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Tropical Bind-weed (HOANG NAN)
Exhaustion with vertigo; numbness and tingling in hands and feet; involuntary action of lower jaw. Pustules and boils; tertiary syphilis and Paralysis, Eczema, prurigo, old ulcers, leprosy, cancer of glandular structures and bites of serpents. Removes fetor and haemorrhage in cancer, revives the healing process. Follows Arsenic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Five drops of the tincture. May be increased to twenty.

strychninum-phosphoricum.name: Strychninum Phosphoricum
strychninum-phosphoricum.essence: This drug acts through the cerebro-spinal system upon muscles, causing twitching, stiffness, weakness and loss of power; upon circulation, producing irregularity of pulse, and upon the mind, producing lack of control, *uncontrollable desire to laugh* and disinclination to use the brain. Very irregular pulse. Tachycardia. Rapid and weak pulse. Useful in chorea, hysteria, acute asthenia after acute fevers. Symptoms *worse* motion, *better* rest and in open air. An excellent remedy in anaemia of sp...

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Phosphate of Strychnin (STRYCHNIA PHOSPHORICA)
This drug acts through the cerebro-spinal system upon muscles, causing twitching, stiffness, weakness and loss of power; upon circulation, producing irregularity of pulse, and upon the mind, producing lack of control, *uncontrollable desire to laugh* and disinclination to use the brain. Very irregular pulse. Tachycardia. Rapid and weak pulse. Useful in chorea, hysteria, acute asthenia after acute fevers. Symptoms *worse* motion, *better* rest and in open air. An excellent remedy in anaemia of spinal cord; paralysis; burning, aching, and weakness of spine; pain extends to front of chest; tenderness on pressure in mid-dorsal region; cold, clammy feet; *hands and axillae covered with clammy perspiration*. Atelectasis and break in the compensation of a hypertrophied heart; the beginning of fatty degeneration of the heart muscle (Royal).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third trituration.

sulphuricum-acidum.name: Sulphuricum Acidum
sulphuricum-acidum.essence: The "debility" common to acids shows itself here, especially in the digestive tract, giving a very relaxed feeling in the stomach, with craving for stimulants. *Tremor and weakness*; everything must be done in a hurry. *Hot flushes*, followed by perspiration, with trembling. Tendency to gangrene following mechanical injuries. Writer's cramp. Lead poisoning. Gastralgia and hypochlorrhydria. Purpura haemorrhagia.

agg: from excess of heat or cold in forenoon and evening
amel: from warmth, and lying on affected side

sulphuricum-acidum.dosing: Sulphuric acid mixed with three parts of alcohol, ten to fifteen drops three times daily for several weeks, has been successfully used to subdue the craving for liquor. For homeopathic purposes second to thirtieth potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Sulphuric Acid
The "debility" common to acids shows itself here, especially in the digestive tract, giving a very relaxed feeling in the stomach, with craving for stimulants. *Tremor and weakness*; everything must be done in a hurry. *Hot flushes*, followed by perspiration, with trembling. Tendency to gangrene following mechanical injuries. Writer's cramp. Lead poisoning. Gastralgia and hypochlorrhydria. Purpura haemorrhagia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fretful, impatient. Unwilling to answer questions; hurried.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Right-sided neuralgia; painful shocks; skin feels pinched. Sensation as if brain was loose in forehead and falling from side to side (*Bell; Rhus*). Concussion of brain where skin is cold, body bathed in cold sweat. Compressive pain in side of occiput; *relieved by holding the hands near the head*. Pain of outer parts, as if there were subcutaneous ulceration; painful to touch. *Thrust in right temple as if plug were pressed in*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Intra-ocular haemorrhage following traumatism. Great chemosis of conjunctiva, with aching and sharp pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aphthae; gums bleed readily. Offensive breath. Pyorrhea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heartburn; *sour eructations; sets teeth on edge* (*Robin*). *Craving for alcohol. Water causes coldness of stomach*; must be mixed with liquors. *Relaxed feeling in stomach*. Averse to smell of coffee. Sour vomiting. Desire for fresh food. *Hiccough*. Coldness of stomach relieved by applied heat Nausea with chilliness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Weak feeling, with dragging into the hips and small of back. *Feeling as if hernia would protrude*, especially left side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Piles; oozing dampness. Rectum feels as if it had a big ball. Diarrhoea, fetid, black, with sour odor of body, and empty faint feeling in abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menstruation early and profuse. Erosion of cervix in the aged; easily bleeding. Acrid, burning leucorrhoea, often of bloody mucus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Respiration rapid with shooting in cervical muscles and movement of wings of nose; *larynx moves up and down violently*. Bronchitis in children with short, teasing cough.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cramp-like paralytic contraction in arms, hands; jerking of fingers while writing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bad effects from mechanical injuries, with bruises and livid skin. Ecchymosis. Petechiae. *Purpura haemorrhagica*. Livid, red, itching blotches. Haemorrhage of black blood from all outlets. Cicatrices turn red and blue and become painful. Chilblains with gangrenous tendency. Carbuncles, boils and other staphylococcic and streptococcic infections.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, from excess of heat or cold in forenoon and evening. *Better*, from warmth, and lying on affected side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Complementary: *Puls*.
Compare: *Arn; Calend; Led; Sep; Calc*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sulphuric acid mixed with three parts of alcohol, ten to fifteen drops three times daily for several weeks, has been successfully used to subdue the craving for liquor. For homeopathic purposes second to thirtieth potency.

sulfonalum.name: Sulfonalum
sulfonalum.essence: Vertigo of cerebral origin, cerebellar disease, ataxic symptoms and chorea, present a field for the homeopathic employment of this drug. *Profound weakness*, gone, faint feeling, and despondency. Loss of control of sphincter. Muscular inco-ordination.
sulfonalum.dosing:
Third trituration.
*Non-Homeopathic Uses.--*As a hypnotic. Dose, ten to thirty grains in hot water. Takes about two hours to act.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
A Coal-tar Product (SULFONAL)
Vertigo of cerebral origin, cerebellar disease, ataxic symptoms and chorea, present a field for the homeopathic employment of this drug. *Profound weakness*, gone, faint feeling, and despondency. Loss of control of sphincter. Muscular inco-ordination.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Mental confusion, incoherency, illusions; apathetic. *Alternation of happy, hopeful states with depression and weakness*. Extreme irritability.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dropsy, stupid; pain on attempting to raise head. Double vision; heavy look about eyes; tinnitus, aphasia; *tongue as if paralyzed. Eyes bloodshot and restless*. Vertigo, unable to rise. Double vision; ptosis; tinnitus; dysphagia, difficult speech.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Albuminuria, with casts. Scanty. Pink color. Constant desire to urinate; scanty, brownish red. Haemato-porphyrinuria.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Congestion of lungs; stertorous breathing. Sighing dyspnoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ataxic movements, *staggering gait*; cold, weak, trembling; legs seem too heavy. Extreme restlessness; muscular twitchings. Knee-jerks disappear. Stiffness and paralysis of both legs. Anaesthesia of legs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Fidgety, wakeful, drowsy. Insomnia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching, bluish purpura. Erythema.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Trional*; insomnia associated with physical excitement; (vertigo, loss of equilibrium, ataxia, nausea, vomiting, diarrhoea, stertorous breathing, cyanosis, tinnitus, hallucinations).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Third trituration.
*Non-Homeopathic Uses.--*As a hypnotic. Dose, ten to thirty grains in hot water. Takes about two hours to act.

sulphur-iodatum.name: Sulphur Iodatum
sulphur-iodatum.essence: Obstinate skin affections, notably in *barber's itch* and *acne*. Weeping eczema.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Iodide of Sulphur
Obstinate skin affections, notably in *barber's itch* and *acne*. Weeping eczema.

sulphurosum-acidum.dosing: As a spray in tonsillitis. According to Ringer, ten to fifteen minims taken ten minutes before each meal will remedy pyrosis and prevent fermentation and flatulence. It also removes thrush. Homeopathically, third attenuation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica

Numbness on left side. *Insomnia* of delirium tremens (fifteen drops of tincture). Sensation as if water dropped down spine. Asthma. A tissue remedy for sclerosed arteries.
sumbulus-moschatus.dosing: Tincture, to third potency. Dr. W. McGeorge advises the 2x every 3 hours for arterio-sclerosis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica

Numbness on left side. *Insomnia* of delirium tremens (fifteen drops of tincture). Sensation as if water dropped down spine. Asthma. A tissue remedy for sclerosed arteries.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Emotional and fidgety. Dull in morning, clear in evening. Mistakes in writing and adding. Comedones. Tenacious, yellow, mucus in nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chocking constriction; constant swallowing. Belching of gas from stomach. Spasm of pharyngeal muscles. Tenacious mucus in throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Nervous palpitation*. Neuralgia around left breast and left hypochondriac region. *Cardiac asthma*. Aching in left arm, heavy, numb an weary. Loses breath on any exertion. Pulse irregular.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ovarian neuralgia. *Abdomen full, distended, and painful*. Climacteric flushes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Oily pellicle on surface of urine*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, active exercise; left side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency. Dr. W. McGeorge advises the 2x every 3 hours for arterio-sclerosis.

symphytum-officinale.name: Symphytum Officinale
symphytum-officinale.essence:
The root contains a crystalline solid, that stimulates the growth of epithelium on ulcerated surfaces. It may be administered internally in the treatment of gastric and duodenal juries to sinews, tendons and the periosteum. Acts on joints generally. Neuralgia of knee.

Of great use in wounds penetrating to perineum and bones, *and in non-union of fractures*; irritable stump after amputation, irritable bone at point of fracture. Psoas abscess. *Pricking pain* and soreness of periosteum.
symphytum-officinale.dosing:
Tincture.
Externally as a dressing for sores and ulcers and pruritus ani.

Of great use in wounds penetrating to perineum and bones, *and in non-union of fractures*; irritable stump after amputation, irritable bone at point of fracture. Psoas abscess. *Pricking pain* and soreness of periosteum.

materiaMedica.text: Pain in occiput, top and forehead; changing places. Pain comes down bone of nose. Inflammation of inferior maxillary bone, hard, red, swelling.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pain in eye after a blow of an obtuse body*. For traumatic injuries of the eyes no remedy equals this.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica

Tincture.

symphoricarpus-racemosus.essence:
This drug is highly recommended for the persistent *vomiting of pregnancy*. Gastric disturbances, fickle appetite, nausea, waterbrash, bitter taste. *Constipation*. Nausea during menstruation. Nausea,

*worse any motion*. *Averse to all food*. *Better*, lying on back.
symphoricarpus-racemosus.dosing:
Second and third potency.
200th has proved curative.

*worse any motion*. *Averse to all food*. *Better*, lying on back.

Second and third potency.

syphilinum.name: Syphilinum
syphilinum.essence:
Utter prostration and debility in the morning.

Shifting rheumatic pains. Chronic eruptions and rheumatism.

Ichthyosis. Syphilitic affections. Pains from darkness to daylight; decrease and increase gradually. Hereditary tendency to alcoholism. *Ulceration of* mouth, nose, genitals, skin. *Succession of abscesses*.

agg: at night, sundown to sunrise, seashore, in summer
amel: inland and mountains, during day, moving about slowly

complementary: Merc; Kal hyd; Nit ac; Aur; Alum

syphilinum.dosing: The highest potencies only, and in infrequent doses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: The highest potencies only, and in infrequent doses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica

The Syphilitic Virus - A Nosode
Utter prostration and debility in the morning.
Shifting rheumatic pains. Chronic eruptions and rheumatism.
Ichthyosis. Syphilitic affections. Pains from darkness to daylight; decrease and increase gradually. Hereditary tendency to alcoholism. *Ulceration of* mouth, nose, genitals, skin. *Succession of abscesses*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Loss of memory; remembers everything previous to his illness. Apathetic; *feels as if going insane or being paralyzed. Fears the night*, and the suffering from exhaustion on awakening. Hopeless; *despairs of recovery*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Linear pains from temple across, or from eyes backward; cause sleeplessness and delirium at night. *Falling of the hair*. Pain in bones of head. Top of head feels as if coming off. Stupefying cephalalgia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Chronic, recurrent, phlyctenular inflammation of cornea*; successive crops of phlyctenular and abrasions of epithelial layer of cornea; photophobia intense, lachrymation profuse. Lids swollen; *pain intense at night*; ptosis. Tubercular iritis. Diplopia; one image seen below the other. Feeling of cold air blowing on eye (*Fluor ac*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Caries of ossicles in ear of syphilitic origin.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Caries of nasal bones, hard palate and septum, with perforation; ozaena.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Teeth decay at gum; edges serrated, dwarfed. Tongue coated, teeth-indented; deep longitudinal cracks. Ulcers smart and burn. *Excessive flow of saliva; it runs out of mouth when sleeping*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Craves alcohol*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels tied up with strictures. Enemas very painful. Fissures, prolapse.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sciatica; worse at night; better about day-break. Rheumatism of shoulder-joint, at insertion of deltoid. Run-around. Severe pain in long bones. Redness and rawness between toes (*Sil*). Rheumatism, muscles are caked in hard knot or lumps. *Always washing the hands*. Indolent ulcers. Muscles contracted in hard knots.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ulcers on labia. Leucorrhoea *profuse, thin, watery, acrid*, with sharp, knife-pain in ovaries.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aphonia; chronic asthma in summer, wheezing and rattling (*Tart emet*). Cough dry, hard; worse at night; windpipe sensitive to touch (*Lach*). Lancinating pains from base of heart to apex at night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Reddish-brown eruption, with a disagreeable odor. Extreme emaciation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Merc; Kal hyd; Nit ac; Aur; Alum*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, at night, sundown to sunrise, seashore, in summer. *Better*, inland and mountains, during day, moving about slowly.

syzygium-jambolanum.name: Syzygium Jambolanum
syzygium-jambolanum.essence:
Has an immediate effect of increasing the blood sugar, glycosuria results.

A most useful remedy in diabetes mellitus. *No other remedy causes in so marked degree the diminution and disappearance of sugar in the urine. Prickly heat in upper part of the body*; small red pimples itch violently. Great thirsts, weakness, emaciation. Very large amount of urine, specific gravity high. Old ulcers of skin. Diabetic ulceration. The seeds powdered, ten grains three times a day; also the tincture.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Insulin*-An aqueous solution of an active principle from pancreas which affects sugar metabolism. If administered at suitable intervals in diabetes mellitus, the blood sugar is maintained at a normal level and the urine remains free of sugar. Overdosage is followed by weakness and fatigue and tremulousness and profuse sweating.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Jambol Seeds - Enlexing, active principle
Has an immediate effect of increasing the blood sugar, glycosuria results.
A most useful remedy in diabetes mellitus. *No other remedy causes in so marked degree the diminution and disappearance of sugar in the urine. Prickly heat in upper part of the body*; small red pimples itch violently. Great thirsts, weakness, emaciation. Very large amount of urine, specific gravity high. Old ulcers of skin. Diabetic ulceration. The seeds powdered, ten grains three times a day; also the tincture.

tabacum.name: Tabacum
tabacum.essence:
The symptomatology of Tabacum is exceedingly well marked. The nausea, giddiness, death-like pallor, vomiting, icy coldness, and sweat, with the intermittent pulse, are all most characteristic. Has marked antiseptic qualities, antidotal to cholera germs. Complete prostration of the entire muscular system. Collapse. Gastralgia, enteralgia,

*seasickness*, cholera infantum; cold, but *wants abdomen uncovered*. Vigorous peristaltic activity diarrhoea. Produces high tension and arteriosclerosis of th...
tabacum.dosing: Third to thirtieth and higher potencies.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Tobacco
The symptomatology of Tabacum is exceedingly well marked. The nausea, giddiness, death-like pallor, vomiting, icy coldness, and sweat, with the intermittent pulse, are all most characteristic. Has marked antiseptic qualities, antidotal to cholera germs. Complete prostration of the entire muscular system. Collapse. Gastralgia, enteralgia,
*seasickness*, cholera infantum; cold, but *wants abdomen uncovered*. Vigorous peristaltic activity diarrhoea. Produces high tension and arteriosclerosis of the coronary arteries. Should prove the most homeopathic drug for angina pectoris, with coronaritis and high tension (Cartier). Constriction of throat, chest, bladder, rectum. Pallor, breathlessness, hard-cordlike pulse.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation of excessive wretchedness. *Very despondent*. Forgetful. Discontented.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vertigo *on opening eyes*; sick headache, with deathly nausea; periodical. Tight feeling as from a band. Sudden pain, as if struck by a hammer. Nervous deafness. Secretion from eyes, nose and mouth increased.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dim sight; sees as through a veil; strabismus. *Amaurosis*; muscae volitantes. Central scotoma. Rapid blindness without lesion, followed by venous hyperaemia and atrophy of optic nerve.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pale, blue, pinched, sunken, collapsed, covered with cold sweat (*Ars; Verat*). Freckles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nasopharyngitis and tracheitis, *hemming*, morning cough, sometimes with vomiting. Hoarseness of public speakers.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Incessant nausea; worse, smell of tobacco smoke (*Phos*); vomiting on least motion, sometimes of fecal matter, *during pregnancy with much spitting. Seasickness; terrible faint, sinking feeling at pit of stomach*. Sense of relaxation of stomach, with nausea (*Ipec*). Gastralgia; pain from cardiac end extending to left arm.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cold. *Wants abdomen uncovered*. It lessens the nausea and vomiting. Painful distension. Incarcerated hernia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constipation; rectum paralyzed, prolapsed. Diarrhoea, sudden, watery, with nausea and vomiting, prostration, and cold sweat; discharges look like sour milk, thick, curdled, watery. Rectal tenesmus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Renal colic; violent pain along ureter, left side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Palpitation when lying on left side. Pulse intermits, feeble, imperceptible. Angina pectoris, pain in praecordial region. Pain radiates from center of sternum. Tachycardia. Bradycardia. *Acute dilatation* caused by shock or violent physical exertion (Royal).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Difficult, violent constriction of chest. Praecordial oppression, with palpitation and pain between shoulders. Cough followed by hiccough. Cough dry, teasing, must take a swallow of cold water (*Caust; Phos*). Dyspnoea, with tingling down left arm when lying on left side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Legs and hands icy cold; limbs tremble. Paralysis following apoplexy (*Plumb*). Gait shuffling, unsteady. Feebleness of arms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Insomnia with dilated heart, with cold, clammy skin and anxiety.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chills, with *cold sweat*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, opening eyes; evening; extremes of heat and cold. *Better*, uncovering, open fresh air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Hydrobromic acid; Camph; Verat; Ars*. Compare: *Nicotinum* (Alternate tonic and clonic spasms, followed by general relaxation and trembling; nausea, cold sweat, and speedy collapse; head drawn back, contraction of eyelids and masseter muscles; muscles of neck and back rigid; hissing respiration from spasm of laryngeal and bronchial muscles).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vinegar; sour apples. *Camphor* in the physiological antagonist. *Ars* (chewing tobacco); *Ign*; (smoking); *Sep* (neuralgia and dyspepsia); *Lycop* (impotency); *Nux* (bad taste due to tobacco); *Calad* and *Plantag* (cause aversion to tobacco); *Phosph* (tobacco heart, sexual weakness).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth and higher potencies.

tannicum-acidum.name: Tannicum Acidum
tannicum-acidum.essence: Mostly used locally against excessive secretion of mucous membranes, to contract tissue and check haemorrhage. In Osmidrosis, corrects fetor of the perspiration. Obstinate nervous coughs. Haematuria. Obstinate constipation. Pain in abdomen, sensitive to pressure. Intestines can be felt like cylindrical enlargements. One-half per cent solution.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Tannin - Digallic Acid (TANNIC ACID)
Mostly used locally against excessive secretion of mucous membranes, to contract tissue and check haemorrhage. In Osmidrosis, corrects fetor of the perspiration. Obstinate nervous coughs. Haematuria. Obstinate constipation. Pain in abdomen, sensitive to pressure. Intestines can be felt like cylindrical enlargements. One-half per cent solution.

tanacetum-vulgare.essence: Abnormal lassitude. Nervous and tired feeling. "Half dead, half alive feeling" all over. Of use in chorea and reflex spasms (worms). Said to be a specific against effects of poison ivy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
