Tansy
Abnormal lassitude. Nervous and tired feeling. "Half dead, half alive feeling" all over. Of use in chorea and reflex spasms (worms). Said to be a specific against effects of poison ivy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heavy, dull, confused. Headache with least exertion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Irritable, sensitive to noise. Mental fatigue, nausea and vertigo, worse in a closed room.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Roaring and ringing; voice sounds strange; *ears seem to close up suddenly*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in bowels; relieved by stool. Desire for stool immediately after eating. *Dysentery*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dysmenorrhoea, with bearing-down pains, tenderness, drawing in groins. Menses suppressed; later, profuse.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hurried, labored, stertorous respiration. Frothy mucus obstructs the air-passages.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Cimicif; Cina; Absinth. Nux* follows well.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency.

taraxacum-officinale.name: Taraxacum Officinale
taraxacum-officinale.essence: For gastric headaches, bilious attacks, with characteristically mapped tongue and jaundiced skin. Cancer of bladder. Flatulence. *Hysterical tympanites*.
taraxacum-officinale.dosing: Tincture, to third potency. In cancer 1-2 drams fluid extract.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Dandelion
For gastric headaches, bilious attacks, with characteristically mapped tongue and jaundiced skin. Cancer of bladder. Flatulence. *Hysterical tympanites*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation of great heat on top of head. *Sterno-mastoid* muscle very painful to touch.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Mapped tongue. Tongue covered with a white film; feels raw; comes off in patches, leaving *red, sensitive spots*. Loss of appetite. Bitter taste and eructations. Salivation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Liver enlarged and indurated. Sharp stitches in left side. Sensation of bubbles bursting in bowels. Tympanites. Evacuation difficult.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Very restless limbs. *Neuralgia of knee; better, pressure*. Limbs painful to touch.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chilliness after eating, worse drinking; *finger tips cold. Bitter taste*. Heat without thirst, in face, *in toes*. Sweat on falling asleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Profuse night-sweats*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, resting, lying down, sitting. *Better*, touch.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Choline*, a constituent of Taraxacum root, has given encouraging results in the treatment of cancer. Choline is closely related to *Neurin*, it is the "Cancronie" of Prof. Adamkiewicz (E. Schlegel). *Bry; Hydrast; Nux. Tela aranea* (nervous asthma and sleeplessness).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency. In cancer 1-2 drams fluid extract.

tarentula-hispanica.name: Tarentula Hispanica
tarentula-hispanica.essence: Remarkable nervous phenomena; hysteria with chlorosis; *chorea*, dysmenorrhoea, spinal irritability. Bladder tenesmus. *Constriction* sensations. Formication; *Extreme restlessness*; must keep in constant motion even though walking aggravates. Hysterical epilepsy. Intense sexual excitement.

amel: in open air, *music*, bright colors, rubbing affected parts

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Spanish Spider
Remarkable nervous phenomena; hysteria with chlorosis; *chorea*, dysmenorrhoea, spinal irritability. Bladder tenesmus. *Constriction* sensations. Formication; *Extreme restlessness*; must keep in constant motion even though walking aggravates. Hysterical epilepsy. Intense sexual excitement.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sudden alteration of mood. Foxy. Destructive impulses; *moral relaxation*. Must constantly busy herself or walk. *Sensitive to music*. Averse to company, but wants some one present. Ungrateful, discontented. Guided by whims.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Intense pain, as if thousands of needles were pricking into brain. *Vertigo*. Wants hair brushed or head rubbed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sexual excitement; lasciviousness reaching almost to insanity; seminal emissions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Palpitation; praecordial anguish, sensation as if heart twisted and turned around.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Vulva dry and hot, with much itching. Profuse menstruation, with frequent erotic spasms. *Pruritus vulvae*;
*nymphomania*. Dysmenorrhoea, with very sensitive ovaries.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Weakness of legs; choreic movements. Numbness of legs. Multiple sclerosis, with trembling. *Twitching and jerking*. Yawning with uneasiness of legs, must move them constantly. Extraordinary contractions and movements.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, motion, contract, noise. *Better*, in open air, *music*, bright colors, rubbing affected parts. *Worse*, seeming others in trouble.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Agar; Ars; Cupr; Mag phos*.
Antidotes: *Lach*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth potency.

tarentula-cubensis.name: Tarentula Cubensis
tarentula-cubensis.essence: A toxaemic medicine, septic conditions. *Diphtheria*. Adapted to the most severe types of inflammation and pain, early and persistent prostration. Various forms of malignant suppuration. Purplish hue and burning, stinging pains. Bubo. It is the remedy for *pain of death; soothes the last struggles. Pruritus, especially about genitals*. Restless feet. Intermittent septic chills. Bubonic plague. As a curative and preventive remedy especially during the period of invasion.

complementary: Ars; Pyrog; Crotal; Echin; Anthrac; Bellad; Apis

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Cuban Spider
A toxaemic medicine, septic conditions. *Diphtheria*. Adapted to the most severe types of inflammation and pain, early and persistent prostration. Various forms of malignant suppuration. Purplish hue and burning, stinging pains. Bubo. It is the remedy for *pain of death; soothes the last struggles. Pruritus, especially about genitals*. Restless feet. Intermittent septic chills. Bubonic plague. As a curative and preventive remedy especially during the period of invasion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dizziness after heat and hot perspiration. Dull ache on top of head. Shooting pain through left eye across frontal region.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stomach feels hard, sore. Loss of appetite, except for breakfast.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itches across kidney region.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hands tremble, turgid with blood.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Retention. Cannot hold urine on coughing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Red spots and pimples. Feels puffed all over. *Carbuncles*, burning, stinging pains. Purplish hue. Gangrene. Abscesses, where pain and inflammation predominate. Scirrhus of breasts. "Senile" ulcers.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Drowsiness. Sleep restless. Sleep prevented by harsh cough.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Ars; Pyrog; Crotal; Echin; Anthrac; Bellad; Apis*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Better*, smoking. *Worse*, night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth potency.

tartaricum-acidum.name: Tartaricum Acidum
tartaricum-acidum.essence:
Found in grapes, pineapple, sorrel and other fruits. It is an antiscorbutic antiseptic, stimulating the mucous and salivary secretions.

Dullness and lassitude. Great weakness, with diarrhoea, with dry and brown tongue. Pain in heels (*Phytol*).
tartaricum-acidum.dosing: Third trituration. The pure acid 10-30 grains dissolved in water.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Tartaric Acid
Found in grapes, pineapple, sorrel and other fruits. It is an antiscorbutic antiseptic, stimulating the mucous and salivary secretions.
Dullness and lassitude. Great weakness, with diarrhoea, with dry and brown tongue. Pain in heels (*Phytol*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Excessive thirst, continued vomiting burning in throat and stomach. Dyspepsia with copious secretions of mucus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain around umbilicus and region of loins. Stool color of coffee-grounds (worse at night), with brown and dry tongue, and dark-green vomiting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third trituration. The pure acid 10-30 grains dissolved in water.

taxus-baccata.name: Taxus Baccata
taxus-baccata.essence: In pustular diseases of skin and night-sweats. Also in gout and chronic rheumatism.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: In pustular diseases of skin and night-sweats. Also in gout and chronic rheumatism.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Supra-orbital and temporal pain on right side, with lachrymation. Pupils dilated. Face puffy and pale.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Saliva hot*, acrid. Nausea. Pain in pit of stomach and region of navel. After eating, cough. Feeling of pins and needles at pit of stomach; of *emptiness*, must eat frequently (compare the coniferae).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Large, flat, itching pustules. Badly smelling night-sweats. Podagra. Erysipelas.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency.

tellurium.name: Tellurium
tellurium.essence: Marked skin (herpes circinatus), spinal, eye and ear symptoms. Very *sensitive back*. Pains all over body. Offensive discharges. Slow development of symptoms (*Radium*) Sacral and sciatic pains.

agg: while at rest at night, cold weather, from friction, coughing, laughing, lying on painful side, touch

tellurium.dosing: Sixth potency and higher. Takes long time to develop its action, which is very prolonged.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, while at rest at night, cold weather, from friction, coughing, laughing, lying on painful side, touch.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
The Metal Tellurium (TELLURIUM)
Marked skin (herpes circinatus), spinal, eye and ear symptoms. Very *sensitive back*. Pains all over body. Offensive discharges. Slow development of symptoms (*Radium*) Sacral and sciatic pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Neglectful and forgetful. Pain in left side of head and in forehead above left eye. Distortion and twitching of left facial muscles; when speaking left angle of mouth drawn upwards and to left. Fear of being touched in sensitive places. Congestion to head and nape of neck, followed by weakness and faintness in stomach. Itching of scalp; red spots.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lids *thickened, inflamed*, itching. Pterygium; pustular conjunctivitis. Cataract, following ocular lesions; aids the absorption of infiltrations in iris and choroid.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Eczema behind ear. Catarrh of middle ear, discharge acrid, smells like fish-pickle. Itching, swelling, throbbing in meatus*. Deafness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coryza, lachrymation and hoarseness; better in open air (*Cepa*). Obstructed; hawks salty phlegm from posterior nares.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Craving for apples. Empty and weak feeling. Heartburn.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pruritus ani et perinei after every stool.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in sacrum.--*Pain from last cervical to fifth dorsal vertebra*, very sensitive; worse touch (*Chin s; Phosph*) *Sciatica*; worse right side, *coughing, straining*, and at night, with sensitive vertebral column. *Contraction of tendons in bends of knees*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching of hands and feet. Herpetic spots; *ringworm* (*Tuberc*). *Ring-shape lesions*, offensive odors from affected parts. Barber's itch. Stinging in skin. *Fetid exhalations* (*Sulph*). Offensive foot-sweat. Eczema, back of ears and occiput. Circular patches of eczema.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Radium; Selenium; Tetradymite*-crystals from Georgia and North Carolina containing *Bismuth, Tellurium* and *Sulphur*--(coccygodynia, ulceration of nails; pains in hands, in small spots, ankles, heels, and tendo-Achilles); *Sep; Ars; Rhus*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency and higher. Takes long time to develop its action, which is very prolonged.

terebinthiniae-oleum.name: Terebinthiniae Oleum
terebinthiniae-oleum.essence: Has a selective affinity for *bleeding mucous surfaces*. Tympanites and urinary symptoms very marked. Inflammation of kidneys, with haemorrhages-dark, passive, fetid. Bright's disease preceded by dropsy (Goullon). Drowsiness and strangury. Coma. *Unbroken chilblains*.

complementary: Alumen; Secale; Canth; Nit ac. Terebene

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Turpentine (TEREBINTHINA)
Has a selective affinity for *bleeding mucous surfaces*. Tympanites and urinary symptoms very marked. Inflammation of kidneys, with haemorrhages-dark, passive, fetid. Bright's disease preceded by dropsy (Goullon). Drowsiness and strangury. Coma. *Unbroken chilblains*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dull pain like from a band around the head (*Carb ac*). Vertigo, with vanishing of vision. Disturbed sense of equilibrium. Tired and difficult concentration of thoughts. Cold in head with sore nostrils with disposition to bleed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ciliary neuralgia over right eye. Intense pain in eye and side of head. Amblyopia from alcohol.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Own voice sounds unnatural; humming as of a seashell, talking loudly is painful. Otalgia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue *dry, red sore, shining*; burning in tip, with prominent papillae (*Arg n; Bell; Kali b; Nux m*). Breath cold, foul. Choking sensation in throat. Stomatitis. Dentition.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nausea and vomiting; heat in epigastric region.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Enormous distention*. Diarrhoea; stools watery, greenish, fetid, bloody. Pain before flatus with and relief after stool. Haemorrhage from bowels. Worms; lumbrici. Abdominal dropsy; pelvic peritonitis. Fainting after every stool Entero-colitis, with haemorrhage and ulceration of bowels.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Strangury, with bloody urine*. Scanty, suppressed, *odor of violets*. Urethritis, with painful erections (*Canthar*). Inflamed kidneys following any acute disease. Constant tenesmus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Intense *burning in uterine region*. Metritis; puerperal peritonitis. Metrorrhagia with burning in uterus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Difficult breathing; lungs feel distended; haemoptysis. Bloody expectoration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pulse rapid, small, thready, intermittent.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Burning pain in region of kidneys*. Drawing in right kidney extending to hip.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Acne. Erythema; itching pustular, vesicular eruption; urticaria. Purpura, ecchymosis, dropsies. Scarlatina. Chilblains; with excessive itching and pulsative pains. Aching soreness of the muscles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heat, with violent thirst, dry tongue, profuse cold, clammy sweat. Typhoid with tympanites, haemorrhages, stupor, delirium. Prostration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Alumen; Secale; Canth; Nit ac. Terebene* 1x; (chronic bronchitis and winter coughs; subacute stages of inflammation of respiratory tract. Loosens secretion, relieves tightened feeling, makes expectoration easy). *Neurotic coughs*. Huskiness of public speakers, and singers. Cystitis when urine is alkaline and offensive.
*Ononis spinosa*-Rest Harrow--(Diuretic, Lithontriptic. Chronic nephritis; diuretic effects like *Juniper*; calculus nosebleed, worse washing face).
Antidote: *Phos*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to sixth potency.

teucrium-marum-verum.name: Teucrium Marum Verum
teucrium-marum-verum.essence: Nasal and rectal symptoms marked. *Polypi*. Affections of children. Suitable after too much medicine has been taken. Oversensitiveness. *Desire to stretch*. A remedy of first importance in chronic nasal catarrh with atrophy; large, offensive crusts and clinkers. *Ozaena. Loss of sense of smell*.
teucrium-marum-verum.dosing: First to sixth potency. Locally for polypi, dry powder.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Cat-thyme (TEUCRIUM MARUM)
Nasal and rectal symptoms marked. *Polypi*. Affections of children. Suitable after too much medicine has been taken. Oversensitiveness. *Desire to stretch*. A remedy of first importance in chronic nasal catarrh with atrophy; large, offensive crusts and clinkers. *Ozaena. Loss of sense of smell*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Excited, tremulous feeling. Frontal pain; worse, stooping. Strengthens brain after delirium tremens.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Smarting in canthi; lids red and puffy; tarsal tumor (*Staph*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hissing and ringing otalgia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Catarrhal condition of both anterior and posterior nostrils. *Mucous polypus*. Chronic catarrh; *discharge of large*, *irregular clinkers*. Foul breath. *Crawling in nostrils*, with lachrymation and sneezing. Coryza, with stoppage of nostrils.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Vomiting of large quantities of dark-green masses. Constant hiccough, attended with pain in back. Unnatural appetite. Hiccough on eating, after nursing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry cough, tickling in trachea; *moldy taste in throat* when hawking up mucus, expectoration profuse.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Affection of finger-tips and joints of toes. Tearing pains in arms and legs. *Pain in toe-nails*, as if they had grown into flesh.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Itching of anus, and constant irritation in the evening in bed. Ascarides, with nightly restlessness*. Crawling in rectum after stool.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Restless, with twitching, choking, and starting up frightened.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching causes tossing about all night. Very dry skin. Suppurating grooves in the nails.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Teucrium scorodonia*-Wood-sage (in tuberculosis with muco-purulent expectoration; dropsy; orchitis and *tuberculous epidymitis; especially* in young, thin individuals with tuberculosis of lungs, glands; bones and urogenitals, 3x). *Cina; Ignat; Sang; Sil*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to sixth potency. Locally for polypi, dry powder.

thallium-metallicum-act.name: Thallium Metallicum (+ -act.)
thallium-metallicum-act.essence: Thallium seems to influence the endocrines, especially the thyroid and adrenaline. Most horrible neuralgic, spasmodic, shooting pains. Muscular atrophy. Tremors. Relieves the violent pains in locomotor ataxia. *Paralysis of lower limbs*. Pain in stomach and bowels, like electric shocks. Paraplegia. *Alopecia* following acute, exhausting diseases. Night sweats. Polyneuritis. Dermal trophic lesions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
The Metal Thallium (THALLIUM)
Thallium seems to influence the endocrines, especially the thyroid and adrenaline. Most horrible neuralgic, spasmodic, shooting pains. Muscular atrophy. Tremors. Relieves the violent pains in locomotor ataxia. *Paralysis of lower limbs*. Pain in stomach and bowels, like electric shocks. Paraplegia. *Alopecia* following acute, exhausting diseases. Night sweats. Polyneuritis. Dermal trophic lesions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Trembling. Paralytic feeling*. Lancinating pains, like electric shocks. Very tired. Chronic myelitis. Numbness in fingers and toes, with extension up lower extremities, involving lower abdomen and perineum. *Paralysis of lower limbs*. Cyanosis of extremities. Formication, beginning in fingers and extending through pelvis, perineum and inner thighs to feet.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Lathyr; Caust; Arg nit; Plumbum*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lower trituration to thirtieth potency.

thea-chinensis.name: Thea Chinensis
thea-chinensis.essence: Nervous sleeplessness, heart troubles, palpitation, and dyspepsia of old tea-drinkers. Produces most of the sick headaches Tabacum antidotal (Allen).

agg: night, on walking in open air, after meals

antidotes: Kali hypophos; Thuja; Ferr; Kali hyd

thea-chinensis.dosing:
Third to thirtieth potency.
Theine 1/4-1/2 grain hypodermically for sciatica and supra-orbital neuralgia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Anxious oppression. Praecordial distress. Palpitation; unable to lie on left side. Fluttering. Pulse rapid, irregular, intermittent.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sleepy in daytime; sleepiness at night, with vascular excitement and restlessness, and dry skin. Horrible dreams cause no horror.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, night, on walking in open air, after meals. *Better* warmth; warm bath.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Antidote: *Kali hypophos; Thuja; Ferr; Kali hyd* (Material doses for tea-taster's cough).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Third to thirtieth potency.
Theine 1/4-1/2 grain hypodermically for sciatica and supra-orbital neuralgia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sinking sensation at epigastrium. *Faint, gone feeling* (*Sep; Hyd; Oleand*). Craves acids. Sudden production of wind in large quantities.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Borborygmi liability to hernia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Soreness and tenderness in ovaries.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Tea (THE)
Nervous sleeplessness, heart troubles, palpitation, and dyspepsia of old tea-drinkers. Produces most of the sick headaches Tabacum antidotal (Allen).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Temporary mental exaltation. Ill-humored. Sick headache radiating from one point. Sleepless and restless. Hallucinations of hearing. Cold damp feeling at back of head.

theridion-curassavicum.name: Theridion Curassavicum
theridion-curassavicum.essence: Nervous hyperaesthesia. Has affinity for the tubercular diathesis. Vertigo, sick headache, peculiar pain around heart region, phthisis florida, scrofula have all been treated successfully with this remedy. *Sensitive to noise; it penetrates the body, especially teeth*. Noises seem to strike on painful spots over the body. Rachitis, caries, necrosis. Phthisis, stitch high up in left apex (*Anthrax*). Where the indicated remedy does not hold long.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Orange-spider (THERIDION)
Nervous hyperaesthesia. Has affinity for the tubercular diathesis. Vertigo, sick headache, peculiar pain around heart region, phthisis florida, scrofula have all been treated successfully with this remedy. *Sensitive to noise; it penetrates the body, especially teeth*. Noises seem to strike on painful spots over the body. Rachitis, caries, necrosis. Phthisis, stitch high up in left apex (*Anthrax*). Where the indicated remedy does not hold long.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Restless; finds pleasure in nothing. Time passes too quickly.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain worse anyone walking over floor. *Vertigo, with nausea and vomiting on least motion*, particularly when closing eyes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Luminous vibrations before eyes; sensitive to light. Pressure behind eyeballs. Throbbing over left eye.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Discharge yellowish, thick, offensive; ozaena (*Puls; Thuja*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Seasickness. Nausea and vomiting when closing eyes and on motion (*Tabac*). Stinging pain on left side over anterior aspect of spleen. Burning in liver region.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in upper left chest (*Myrt; Pix; Anis*). *Pain in left floating ribs. Cardiac anxiety and pain*. Pinching in left pectoral muscle.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensitiveness between vertebrae; avoids pressure on spine. Stinging pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Stinging thrusts everywhere*. Sensitive skin in thighs. Itching sensations.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, touch; pressure; on shipboard; riding in carriage; closing eyes; jar; noise, coitus; left side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thirtieth potency.

thiosinaminum.name: Thiosinaminum
thiosinaminum.essence: A Chemical Derived from Oil of Mustard-seed (RHODALLIN)
thiosinaminum.dosing: Inject under skin, or, into the lesion a 10 per cent solution in glycerine and water, 15-30 drops twice a week. Internally in capsules 1/2 grain daily. Obstinate arterio-sclerotic ailments in doses of 1/2 grain, never more, 3 times a day. Vertigo and arthritis (Bartlett). 2x attenuation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
A Chemical Derived from Oil of Mustard-seed (RHODALLIN)
Are solvent, externally and internally, for *dissolving scar tissue*, tumors, enlarged glands; lupus, strictures, adhesions. Ectropion, opacities of cornea, cataract, ankylosis, fibroids, scleroderma. Noises in ear. Suggested by Dr. A. S. Hard for retarding old age. A remedy for Tabes dorsalis, improving the lightning pains. Gastric, vesicle and rectal crises. Stricture of rectum, 2 grains twice daily.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Arterio-sclerotic *vertigo. Tinnitus*. Catarrhal deafness with cicatricial thickening. Subacute suppurative otitis media, formation of fibrous bands impeding free movement of the ossicles. Thickened drum. Deafness due to some fibrous change in the nerve.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Inject under skin, or, into the lesion a 10 per cent solution in glycerine and water, 15-30 drops twice a week. Internally in capsules 1/2 grain daily. Obstinate arterio-sclerotic ailments in doses of 1/2 grain, never more, 3 times a day. Vertigo and arthritis (Bartlett). 2x attenuation.

thlaspi-bursa-pastoris.name: Thlaspi Bursa Pastoris
thlaspi-bursa-pastoris.essence: Is an anti-haemorrhagic and anti-uric-acid remedy. Albuminuria during gestation. Chronic neuralgia. Renal and vesical irritation. Haemorrhage from uterine fibroid with aching in back or general bruised soreness. Aching between scapulae. Uterine haemorrhage, with cramps and expulsion of clots. Craves buttermilk. Effects of suppressed uterine disease (Burnett).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Shepherd's Purse (CAPSELLA)
Is an anti-haemorrhagic and anti-uric-acid remedy. Albuminuria during gestation. Chronic neuralgia. Renal and vesical irritation. Haemorrhage from uterine fibroid with aching in back or general bruised soreness. Aching between scapulae. Uterine haemorrhage, with cramps and expulsion of clots. Craves buttermilk. Effects of suppressed uterine disease (Burnett).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Eyes and face puffy. Frequent epistaxis. Vertigo; worse, rising. Frontal pain; worse toward evening. Scaly eruption behind ears. Tongue white, coated. Mouth and lips cracked. Sharp pain over right eye drawing eye upwards.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bleeding in nasal operations. Especially passive haemorrhage.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Spermatic cord sensitive to concussion of walking or riding.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Metrorrhagia; too frequent and copious menses. Haemorrhage, with violent uterine colic. Every alternate period very profuse. Leucorrhoea before and after menses; bloody, dark, offensive; *stains indelibly. Sore pain in womb on rising*. Scarcely recovers from one period before another begins.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frequent desire; urine *heavy*, phosphatic. Chronic cystitis. Dysuria and spasmodic retention. Haematuria. Accumulation of gravel. Renal colic. *Brick-dust sediment*. Urethritis; urine runs away in little jets. Often replaces the use of the catheter.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Urtica; Croc; Trill; Millefol*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to sixth potency.

thymus-serpyllum.name: Thymus Serpyllum
thymus-serpyllum.essence:
Respiratory infections of children; dry nervous asthma, whooping-cough, severe spasms but little sputum.

Ringing in ears with feeling of pressure in head. Burning in pharynx, sore, throat worse empty swallowing; blood vessels distended, dark.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Wild Thyme
Respiratory infections of children; dry nervous asthma, whooping-cough, severe spasms but little sputum.
Ringing in ears with feeling of pressure in head. Burning in pharynx, sore, throat worse empty swallowing; blood vessels distended, dark.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture.

thymolum.name: Thymolum
thymolum.essence: A remedy having a wide field in genito-urinary diseases. It is indicated in pathological emissions, priapism and prostatorrhoea. The provings show an action limited to the sexual organs, producing a typical sexual neurasthenia. Specific for hookworm disease (*Chenopodium*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Thyme Camphor (THYMOL)
A remedy having a wide field in genito-urinary diseases. It is indicated in pathological emissions, priapism and prostatorrhoea. The provings show an action limited to the sexual organs, producing a typical sexual neurasthenia. Specific for hookworm disease (*Chenopodium*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Irritable, arbitrary, must have his own way. Craves company. Energy gone.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tired, aching throughout lumbar region. Worse, mental and physical labor.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Profuse, nightly, seminal emissions with lascivious dreams of a perverted character. Priapism. Urinary burning and subsequent dribbling of urine. Polyuria. Urates increased. Phosphates decreased.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Awakes tired and unrefreshed. Lascivious and fantastic dreams.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Carbon Tetrachloride* as a remedy for Hookworms, according to Dr. Lambert, Suva, Fiji who employed it in 50,000 cases.
"1. Carbon tetrachloride is a vermifuge and vermicide of great potency, and has shown itself to be the best vermifuge for the treatment of hookworm in a country where the disease predominates.
"2. It gives little discomfort to the patient, is palatable, required no preparation of the patient, and when pure is apparently not toxic-all of which features are of advantage in a popular campaign.
"W. G. Smillie, and S. B. Pessoa, of Sao Paulo, Brazil, also have found carbon tetrachloride to be extremely efficient in removing hookworms. A single dose of 3 Cc given to adults has been proved to remove 95 per cent of all the hookworms harbored".

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thymol. *Worse*, mental and physical labor.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth attenuation.

thyreoidinum.name: Thyreoidinum
thyreoidinum.essence: Thyroid produces anaemia, emaciation, muscular weakness, sweating, headache, nervous tremor of face and limbs, tingling sensations, paralysis. Heart rate increased, exophthalmus and dilation of pupils. *In myxoedema and cretinism* its effects are striking. Rheumatoid arthritis. Infantile wasting. Rickets. Delayed union of fractures. In half grain doses twice a day over a considerable period said to be *effective in undescended testicle* in boys. Thyroid exercises a general regulating influence o...
thyreoidinum.dosing: Crude Thyroid at times; better sixth to thirtieth potency. If the crude Thyroid is taken (two to three grains or more daily); the pulse should be watched. Must not be given in physiological doses where with feeble heart there is high blood pressure and not in tubercular patients.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Dried Thyroid Gland of the Sheep
Thyroid produces anaemia, emaciation, muscular weakness, sweating, headache, nervous tremor of face and limbs, tingling sensations, paralysis. Heart rate increased, exophthalmus and dilation of pupils. *In myxoedema and cretinism* its effects are striking. Rheumatoid arthritis. Infantile wasting. Rickets. Delayed union of fractures. In half grain doses twice a day over a considerable period said to be *effective in undescended testicle* in boys. Thyroid exercises a general regulating influence over the mechanism of the organs of nutrition, growth and development. Thyroid weakness causes decided craving for large amount of sweets.
Of use in psoriasis; and *tachycardia*. Arrested development in children. Improves the memory. *Goitre*. Excessive obesity. Acts better with pale patients, rather than those of high color. Amblyopia. *Mammary tumor. Uterine fibroid*. Great weakness and hunger, yet loses flesh. *Nocturnal enuresis. Agalactea*. Begin treatment early in pregnancy. Dose 1 1/2 gr. 2 to 3 times daily. *Vomiting of pregnancy* (give early in morning before patient gets up). *Fibroid tumors of the breast*, 2x trit. Dilates arterioles (*Adrenaline contacts them*). Sensation of faintness and nausea. Marked sensitiveness to cold Hypothyroidism after acute diseases, i.e, weakness. Easy fatigue, weak pulse, tendency to fainting, palpitation, cold hands and feet, low blood pressure, chilliness and sensitive to cold (Thyroid 1x3 times daily). Has a powerful diuretic action in myxodema and various types of oedema.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stupor, alternating with restless melancholy. Irritable, worse least opposition; goes into a rage over trifles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feeling of lightness in brain. *Persistent frontal* headache. Eyeballs prominent. Face flushed; lips burn. Tongue thickly coated. Fullness and heat. Face flushed. Bad taste in mouth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Weak, frequent pulse, with inability to lie down. *Tachycardia* (*Naja*). Anxiety about chest, *as if constricted*. *Palpitation from least exertion*. Severe heart pain; Ready excitability of heart. Heart's action weak, with numbness of fingers.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Progressive diminution of sight with central scotoma (*Carbon sulf*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry, congested, raw, burning; worse left side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Desire for sweets and thirst for cold water. Nausea worse riding in car. Flatulence, much flatus in abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Increased flow; polyuria; some albumen and sugar. *Enuresis* in weakly children who are nervous and irritable (1/2 gr night and morning). Urine smells of violets, burning along urethra, increase of uric acid.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rheumative arthritis with tendency to obesity, coldness and cramps of extremities. Peeling of skin of lower limbs. Cold extremities. Aching pains. OEdema of legs. Trembling of limbs and entire body.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry, painful cough with scanty, difficult expectoration and burning in pharynx.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Psoriasis* associated with adiposity (*not* in developing stage). Skin *dry*, impoverished. Cold hands and feet. *Eczema*. Uterine fibroids. *Browny swelling*. Swelling of glands of stony hardness. Sluggish cases. Jaundice with pruritus. Ichtyosis, lupus. Itching without eruption, worse night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Spongia; Calc; Fucus; Lycopus; Iodothyrine*, (the active principle isolated from thyroid gland, a substance rich in Iodine and nitrogen, affects metabolism, reducing weight, may produce glycosuria. Use cautiously in obesity, for a fatty heart may not be able to maintain the accelerated rhythm. Milk contains the internal secretion of the thyroid). *Thymus gland extract* (arthritis deformans; metabolic osteoarthritis, 5-grain tablets 3 times daily). High potencies very efficient in exophthalmic goitre.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Crude Thyroid at times; better sixth to thirtieth potency. If the crude Thyroid is taken (two to three grains or more daily); the pulse should be watched. Must not be given in physiological doses where with feeble heart there is high blood pressure and not in tubercular patients.

tilia-europaea.name: Tilia Europaea
tilia-europaea.essence: Of value in muscular weakness of the eye; haemorrhage o thin, pale blood. Puerperal metritis. Diseases of the antrum (*Kali hyd; Chelid*).

agg: in warm room, heat of bed

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Linden (TILIA EUROPA)
Of value in muscular weakness of the eye; haemorrhage o thin, pale blood. Puerperal metritis. Diseases of the antrum (*Kali hyd; Chelid*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Neuralgia* (first right, then left side), *with veil before eyes*. Confusion, with dimness of vision. Much sneezing, with fluent coryza. Bleeding from nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation as of gauze before eyes (*Calc; Caust; Nat m*). Binocular vision imperfect.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Intense sore feeling about uterus*; bearing-down, with hot sweat, but without relief. Much slimy leucorrhoea when walking (*Bov; Carb an; Graph*). Soreness and redness of external genitals (*Thuj; Sulph*). Pelvic inflammation, tympanites, abdominal tenderness and hot sweat which does not relieve.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Urticaria. Violent itching, and burning like fire after scratching. Eruption of small, red itching pimples. *Sweat warm and profuse* soon after falling asleep. Sweat increases as rheumatic pains increase.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, in afternoon and evening; in warm room, heat of bed. *Better*, cool room, motion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Lilium; Bellad*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to sixth potency.

titanium-metallicum.name: Titanium Metallicum
titanium-metallicum.essence: Is found in the bones and muscles. Has been used in lupus and tuberculosis processes externally, also in skin disease, nasal catarrh, etc. Apples contain 0. 11 per cent of Titan. Imperfect vision, the peculiarity being that *half an object* only could be seen at once. Giddiness with *vertical hemiopia*. Also, sexual weakness, with too *early ejaculation* of semen in coitus. Bright's disease. Eczema, lupus, rhinitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
The Metal (TITANIUM)
Is found in the bones and muscles. Has been used in lupus and tuberculosis processes externally, also in skin disease, nasal catarrh, etc. Apples contain 0. 11 per cent of Titan. Imperfect vision, the peculiarity being that *half an object* only could be seen at once. Giddiness with *vertical hemiopia*. Also, sexual weakness, with too *early ejaculation* of semen in coitus. Bright's disease. Eczema, lupus, rhinitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lower and middle potencies.

tongo-odorata.name: Tongo Odorata
tongo-odorata.essence: Seeds of Coumarouna-a tree in Guiana (TONGO - DIPTRIX ODORATA)

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Seeds of Coumarouna-a tree in Guiana (TONGO - DIPTRIX ODORATA)
Useful in neuralgia; pertussis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tearing pain in supra-orbital nerve, with heat and throbbing pain in head and epiphora. Confused, especially the occiput, with somnolence and a sort of intoxication. Trembling in right upper lid. Coryza; nose stopped, must breathe through mouth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tearing pains in hip-joints, femur, and knee, especially left side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Melilotus. Anthoxanthum, Asperula*, and *Tonga* contain *Coumarin*, the active principle. Compare them in hay-fever; also, *Trifol; Napth; Sabad*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture and lower potencies.

tribulus-terrestris.name: Tribulus Terrestris
tribulus-terrestris.essence: An East Indian drug useful in urinary affections, especially dysuria, and in debilitated states of the sexual organs, as expressed in seminal weakness, ready emissions and impoverished semen. Prostatitis, calculous affections and sexual neurasthenia. It meets the auto-traumatism of masturbation correcting the emissions and spermatorrhoea. Partial impotence caused by overindulgence of advancing age, or when accompanied by urinary symptoms, incontinence, painful micturition, etc.
tribulus-terrestris.dosing: Ten to twenty drops of the tincture three times daily.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Ikshugandha
An East Indian drug useful in urinary affections, especially dysuria, and in debilitated states of the sexual organs, as expressed in seminal weakness, ready emissions and impoverished semen. Prostatitis, calculous affections and sexual neurasthenia. It meets the auto-traumatism of masturbation correcting the emissions and spermatorrhoea. Partial impotence caused by overindulgence of advancing age, or when accompanied by urinary symptoms, incontinence, painful micturition, etc.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ten to twenty drops of the tincture three times daily.

trifolium-pratense.name: Trifolium Pratense
trifolium-pratense.essence: *Produces most marked ptyalism*. Feeling of fullness with congestion of salivary glands, followed by increased copious flow of saliva. Feeling as if mumps were coming on. *Crusta lactea*; dry, scaly crusts. Stiff neck. *Cancerous diathesis*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Red Clover
*Produces most marked ptyalism*. Feeling of fullness with congestion of salivary glands, followed by increased copious flow of saliva. Feeling as if mumps were coming on. *Crusta lactea*; dry, scaly crusts. Stiff neck. *Cancerous diathesis*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Confusion and headache on awaking. Dullness in anterior brain. Mental failure, loss of memory.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Increased flow of saliva* (*Merc; Syphil*). Sore throat, with hoarseness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coryza like that which precedes hay-fever; thin mucus, with much irritation. *Hoarse and choking; chills with cough at night*. Cough on coming into the open air. Hay-fever. Spasmodic cough; *whooping cough*, paroxysms; worse at night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Neck stiff; cramp in sterno-cleido muscles; relieved by heat and irritation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tingling in palms. Hands and feet cold. Tibial ulcers.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Trifolium repens*.--White clover- (Prophylactic against mumps, feeling of congestion in salivary glands, pain and hardening, especially submaxillary; *worse, lying down*. Mouth filled with watery saliva, worse lying down. Taste of blood in mouth and throat. Sensation as if heart would stop, with great fear, better sitting up or moving about; worse, when alone, with cold sweat on face).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture

trillium-pendulum.name: Trillium Pendulum
trillium-pendulum.essence: A general haemorrhagic medicine, *with great faintness* and *dizziness*. Chronic diarrhoea of bloody mucus. Uterine haemorrhage. Threatened abortion. *Relaxation of pelvic region*. Cramp-like pains. Phthisis with purulent and copious expectoration and spitting of blood.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
White Beth-root
A general haemorrhagic medicine, *with great faintness* and *dizziness*. Chronic diarrhoea of bloody mucus. Uterine haemorrhage. Threatened abortion. *Relaxation of pelvic region*. Cramp-like pains. Phthisis with purulent and copious expectoration and spitting of blood.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in forehead; worse, noise. Confused; eyeballs feel too large. Vision blurred; everything looks bluish. *Nose-bleed* (*Millef; Melilot*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Haemorrhage from gums. *Bleeding after tooth extraction*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heat and burning stomach rising up in oesophagus. Haematemesis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chronic diarrhoea; discharge bloody. Dysentery,; passage almost pure blood.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Uterine haemorrhages, *with sensation as though hips and back were falling to pieces; better tight bandages*. Gushing of bright blood on least movement. Haemorrhage from fibroids (*Calc; Nitr ac; Phos; Sulph ac*). Prolapse, with great bearing-down. Leucorrhoea copious, yellow, stringy (*Hydras; Kali b; Sabin*). Metrorrhagia at climacteric. *Lochia suddenly becomes sanguinous*. Dribbling of urine after labor.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cough, with spitting of blood. Copious, purulent expectoration. Haemoptysis. Aching at end of sternum. Suffocative attack of irregular breathing with sneezing. Shooting pains through chest.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Trillium cernum* (eye symptoms; everything looks bluish; greasy feeling in mouth); *Ficus* (haemorrhages; menorrhagia, haematuria, epistaxis, Haematemesis, bleeding piles); *Sanguisuga*-Leech--(haemorrhages; bleeding from anus). *Ipec; Sab; Lach; Hamam*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture and lower potencies.

triosteum-perfoliatum.name: Triosteum Perfoliatum
triosteum-perfoliatum.essence: Triosteum is a very valuable remedy in diarrhoea attended with colicky pains and nausea, *numbness of lower limbs after stool*, and increased flow of urine; also in influenza. Quiets nervous symptoms (*Coffea, Hyos*). Biliousness. Bilious colic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Fever-root
Triosteum is a very valuable remedy in diarrhoea attended with colicky pains and nausea, *numbness of lower limbs after stool*, and increased flow of urine; also in influenza. Quiets nervous symptoms (*Coffea, Hyos*). Biliousness. Bilious colic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Occipital pain, with nausea on rising, followed by vomiting. Influenza, with aching pains all over, and heat in the limbs. *Ozaena*; frontal pain.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Loathing of food; nausea on rising, followed by vomiting and cramps. Stools watery, frothy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stiffness of all joints; calves numb; aching in bones. Rheumatic pain in back. Pains in limbs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching welts. *Urticaria* from gastric derangement.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency.

triticum-repens.name: Triticum Repens
triticum-repens.essence: An excellent remedy in excessive irritability of the bladder, dysuria, cystitis, gonorrhoea.

complementary: Chimaph; Senecio; Populus trem; Buchu; Uva

triticum-repens.dosing: Tincture or infusion by boiling two ounces in a quart of water until it is reduced to a pint. To be taken in four doses in 24 hours.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frequent, *difficult*, and painful urination (*Pop*). Gravelly deposits. Catarrhal and purulent discharges (*Pareira*). Strangury, pyelitis; enlarged prostate. Chronic cystic irritability. Incontinence; constant desire. Urine is dense and causes irritation of the mucous surfaces.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Always blowing nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Couch-Grass (TRITICUM)
An excellent remedy in excessive irritability of the bladder, dysuria, cystitis, gonorrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Tradescantia*; (Haemorrhage from ear and upper air passages; painful urination, urethral discharge; scrotum inflamed). *Chimaph; Senecio; Populus trem; Buchu; Uva*.
*Polytrichum Juniperinum*-Ground Moss--(Painful urination of old people; dropsy, urinary obstruction and suppression).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture or infusion by boiling two ounces in a quart of water until it is reduced to a pint. To be taken in four doses in 24 hours.

trombidium-muscae-domesticae.name: Trombidium Muscae Domesticae
trombidium-muscae-domesticae.essence: Has a specific place in the treatment of dysentery. Symptoms *are worse by food and drink*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Red acarus of the fly (TROMBIDIUM)
Has a specific place in the treatment of dysentery. Symptoms *are worse by food and drink*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Much pain before and after stool; stool only after eating. Griping in hypochondrium in morning. Congestion of the liver, with urgent, loose, stools on rising. Brown, thin, bloody stools, with tenesmus. During stool, sharp pain in left side, shooting downward. Burning in anus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth potency.

tuberculinum-bovinum-kent.name: Tuberculinum Bovinum Kent
tuberculinum-bovinum-kent.essence: A Nucleo-protein, a Nosode from Tubercular Abscess
tuberculinum-bovinum-kent.dosing:
*Tuberculin* needs more frequent repetition in children's complaints than nearly every other chronic remedy (H. Fergie Woods). Thirtieth and much higher, in infrequent doses. When Tuberculinum fails *Syphilinum* often follows advantageously, producing a reaction.
"The use of Tuberculinum in phthisis pulmonalis demands attention to the following points: In apyretic purely tubercular phthisis results are marked, provided the eliminative organs are in good order, but nothing below the 1000th should be used, unless absolutely necessary. With patients where streptostaphylo-pneumococci are in the bronchi; where also after washing the sputum, a pure "t b. " bacilli-mass remains, the same treatment is indicated. With mixed infection-found in the majority of cases-where the sputum swarms with virulent micro-organisms in addition to the "t b. ", other procedure is necessary. If the heart is in good shape, a single dose of Tuberculinum 1000-2000 is given, provided there are no marked indications for other remedies. With due attention to temperature and possible excretions, the dose is allowed to work until effects are no longer observed, eight days to eight weeks. Usually a syndrome then presents, permitting the accurate choice of an antipsoric Silica, Lycopodium, Phosphorus, etc. After a while the picture again darkens and now a high potency of the isopathic remedy corresponding to the most virulent and prominent micro-organism found in the sputum is given: Staphylo-Strepto-, or Pneumococcin. The accurate bacteriological analysis of the sputum is absolutely essential; the choice of the ison again clears the picture, and so, proceeding on the one side etiologically (where these isopathica have not yet been proved); on the other side symptomatically with antipsoric remedies, the disease is dominated.
My own experience warns, in the case of mixed infection, against the use of Strepto-, Staphylo-, or Pneumococcin below the 500th. I use them only from 2000 to 1000, having seen terrible aggravations from the 30, 100, 200, with a lowering temperature from 104 to 96. Hence the admonition, which need not concern scoffers, but those alone who wish to avail themselves of a potent weapon. The toxins used as remedies are, like Tuberculinum, prepared from pure and virulent cultures.
And cases, seemingly condemned to speedy death, are brought in a year or two back to normal temperature, though, of course, sacrificing a large portion of lung tissue. This result is sure when the patient can and will take care of himself, where the heart has withstood the toxin and the stomach and liver are in good function. Further, climatic variations must be avoided. With the great mineral metabolism of the phthisic, diet regulation is imperative, and should be preponderately vegetable, together with the addition of physiological salts in low potency, Calcarea carb, 3x, 5x, Calcarea phos, 2x, 6x, and intercurrently according to indications organ-remedies as Cactus Tr. 30, Chelidonium Tr. 30, Taraxacum Tr, Nasturtium Tr, Urtica urens Tr, Tussilago farfara Tr, Lysimachia numularia Tr, for short periods.
The first dose of Tuberculinum in any difficult case is, however, the most weighty prescription. The remedy should not be given without a most careful cardiac examination. As the surgeon before the anaesthetic, so must the physician know the heart before administering this drug, especially to children, and seniles-and to young seniles. He who observes this rule will have fewer clinical reproaches on his conscience. When Tuberculinum is contraindicated, recourse must be had to the nearest antipsoric.
The above caution applies also to asthma, pleuritis, peritonitis in scrofulous (tuberculous) subjects. " (Dr. Nebel Montreux)

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
A Nucleo-protein, a Nosode from Tubercular Abscess
Tuberculinum is indicated in renal affections, but caution is necessary, for where skin and intestines do not perform normally even high potencies are dangerous. In chronic cystitis, brilliant and permanent results (Dr. Nebel Montreux).
Of undoubted value in the treatment of *incipient tuberculosis*. Especially adapted to the light-complexioned, narrow-chested subjects. Lax fiber, low recuperative powers, and very susceptible to changes in the weather. Patient always tired; motion causes intense fatigue; aversion to work; wants constant changes. When *symptoms are constantly changing and well-selected remedies fail to improve, and cold is taken from the slightest exposure*. Rapid emaciation. Of great value in epilepsy, neurasthenia and in nervous children. Diarrhoea in children running for weeks, extreme wasting, bluish pallor, exhaustion. Mentally deficient children. Enlarged tonsils. Skin affections, *acute articular rheumatism*. Very sensitive, mentally and physically. General exhaustion. Nervous weakness. Trembling. Epilepsy. Arthritis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Contradictory characteristics of Tuberculinum are mania and melancholia, insomnia and sopor. Irritable, especially when awakening. *Depressed*, melancholy. *Fear of dogs. Animals especially*. Desire to use foul language, curse and swear.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Subject to deep brain headaches and intense neuralgias. Everything seems strange. Intense pain, as of an iron band around head. Meningitis. When critical discharges appear, sweat, polyuria, diarrhoea, exanthema, repeating the dose only when crises come on. Nocturnal hallucinations, awakes frightened. Plica polonica (*Vinca*). Crops of small boils, intensely painful, successively appear in the nose; *green, fetid pus*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Persistent, offensive otorrhoea. *Perforation in membrana tympani, with ragged edges*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Averse to meat. All-gone, hungry sensation (*Sulph*). Desire for cold milk.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Early-morning, sudden diarrhoea (*Sulph*). Stools dark-brown, offensive, discharged with much force. Tabes mesenterica.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Benign mammary tumors*. Menses too early, too profuse, long-lasting. *Dysmenorrhoea. Pains increase with the establishment of the flow*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Enlarged tonsils*. Hard, dry cough during sleep. Expectoration thick, easy; profuse bronchorrhoea. Shortness of breath. Sensation of suffocation, even with plenty of fresh air. Longs for cold air. Broncho-pneumonia in children. Hard, hacking cough, profuse sweating and loss of weight, rales all over chest. Deposits begin in apex of lung (Repeated doses).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tension in nape of neck and down spine. Chilliness between shoulders or up the back.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Poor; wakes early. Overpowering sleepiness in daytime. Dreams vivid and distressing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Post-critical temperature of a remittent type. Here repeat dose every two hours (MacFarlan). Profuse sweat. General chilliness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, motion, music; before a storm; standing; dampness; from draught; early morning, and after sleep. *Better*, open air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
*Tuberculin* needs more frequent repetition in children's complaints than nearly every other chronic remedy (H. Fergie Woods). Thirtieth and much higher, in infrequent doses. When Tuberculinum fails *Syphilinum* often follows advantageously, producing a reaction.
"The use of Tuberculinum in phthisis pulmonalis demands attention to the following points: In apyretic purely tubercular phthisis results are marked, provided the eliminative organs are in good order, but nothing below the 1000th should be used, unless absolutely necessary. With patients where streptostaphylo-pneumococci are in the bronchi; where also after washing the sputum, a pure "t b. " bacilli-mass remains, the same treatment is indicated. With mixed infection-found in the majority of cases-where the sputum swarms with virulent micro-organisms in addition to the "t b. ", other procedure is necessary. If the heart is in good shape, a single dose of Tuberculinum 1000-2000 is given, provided there are no marked indications for other remedies. With due attention to temperature and possible excretions, the dose is allowed to work until effects are no longer observed, eight days to eight weeks. Usually a syndrome then presents, permitting the accurate choice of an antipsoric Silica, Lycopodium, Phosphorus, etc. After a while the picture again darkens and now a high potency of the isopathic remedy corresponding to the most virulent and prominent micro-organism found in the sputum is given: Staphylo-Strepto-, or Pneumococcin. The accurate bacteriological analysis of the sputum is absolutely essential; the choice of the ison again clears the picture, and so, proceeding on the one side etiologically (where these isopathica have not yet been proved); on the other side symptomatically with antipsoric remedies, the disease is dominated.
My own experience warns, in the case of mixed infection, against the use of Strepto-, Staphylo-, or Pneumococcin below the 500th. I use them only from 2000 to 1000, having seen terrible aggravations from the 30, 100, 200, with a lowering temperature from 104 to 96. Hence the admonition, which need not concern scoffers, but those alone who wish to avail themselves of a potent weapon. The toxins used as remedies are, like Tuberculinum, prepared from pure and virulent cultures.
And cases, seemingly condemned to speedy death, are brought in a year or two back to normal temperature, though, of course, sacrificing a large portion of lung tissue. This result is sure when the patient can and will take care of himself, where the heart has withstood the toxin and the stomach and liver are in good function. Further, climatic variations must be avoided. With the great mineral metabolism of the phthisic, diet regulation is imperative, and should be preponderately vegetable, together with the addition of physiological salts in low potency, Calcarea carb, 3x, 5x, Calcarea phos, 2x, 6x, and intercurrently according to indications organ-remedies as Cactus Tr. 30, Chelidonium Tr. 30, Taraxacum Tr, Nasturtium Tr, Urtica urens Tr, Tussilago farfara Tr, Lysimachia numularia Tr, for short periods.
The first dose of Tuberculinum in any difficult case is, however, the most weighty prescription. The remedy should not be given without a most careful cardiac examination. As the surgeon before the anaesthetic, so must the physician know the heart before administering this drug, especially to children, and seniles-and to young seniles. He who observes this rule will have fewer clinical reproaches on his conscience. When Tuberculinum is contraindicated, recourse must be had to the nearest antipsoric.
The above caution applies also to asthma, pleuritis, peritonitis in scrofulous (tuberculous) subjects. " (Dr. Nebel Montreux)

Antidote: *Curare*.

*Rheumatism associated with urticaria-like eruptions. Neuritis*.

Burn confined to skin. Urticaria nodosa (*Bov*). Erythema, with burning and stinging. *Burns and scalds. Chicken-pox* (*Dulc*). Angioneurotic oedema. Tincture of leaves). *Vaccinum myrtillus*-Huckleberries--(dysentery; typhoid, keeps intestines aseptic and prevents absorption and reinfection).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hunger, with nausea. Eructations foul. Heartburn with gulping of rancid fluid. Nausea, with faintness. *Child vomits curdled milk in large lumps after nursing*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bloated. Hysterical cramps. Thin, watery diarrhoea, with lumps of coagulated milk, *with violent screaming in children*. Greenish, papescent, bloody stool. Spasms in bowels after food and at night in bed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Choking on falling asleep. Spasmodic asthma; convulsive movements of the diaphragm.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses late and scanty (*Puls*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rheumatic pains in limbs. *Constant jerking*. Heaviness. Sciatica; *pain worse standing and resting on floor* (*Bell*); better walking. Pain in heels *when sitting*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sleepless, with nightly itching and muscular spasms. Worse on waking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Long lasting heat, often with sweat on face. *Heat predominates*. Sensation of icy coldness (*Heloderma; Camp; Abies c*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Asaf; Ign; Croc; Castor; Amm valer* (in neuralgia, gastric disturbance, and great nervous agitation). Insomnia especially during pregnancy and menopause. Feeble, hysterical nervous patients.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture.

vanadium-metallicum.name: Vanadium Metallicum
vanadium-metallicum.essence: Its action is that of an oxygen carrier and a catalyzer, hence its use in wasting diseases. Increases amount of hemoglobin, also combines its oxygen with toxines and destroys their virulence. Also increases and stimulates phagocytes. A remedy in degenerative conditions of the liver and arteries. Anorexia and symptoms of gastro intestinal irritation; albumen, casts and blood in urine. Tremors; vertigo; hysteria and melancholia; neuro-retinitis and blindness. Anaemia, emaciation. Cough dry, irrita...
vanadium-metallicum.dosing: 6-12 potency. The best form is Vanadiate of Soda, 2 mg daily, by mouth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
The Metal (VANADIUM)
Its action is that of an oxygen carrier and a catalyzer, hence its use in wasting diseases. Increases amount of hemoglobin, also combines its oxygen with toxines and destroys their virulence. Also increases and stimulates phagocytes. A remedy in degenerative conditions of the liver and arteries. Anorexia and symptoms of gastro intestinal irritation; albumen, casts and blood in urine. Tremors; vertigo; hysteria and melancholia; neuro-retinitis and blindness. Anaemia, emaciation. Cough dry, irritating and paroxysmal, sometimes with haemorrhages. Irritation of nose, eyes and throat. Tuberculosis, chronic rheumatism, diabetes. *Acts as a tonic to digestive function* and in early tuberculosis. Arterio-sclerosis, sensation as if heart was compressed, as if blood had no room in the aorta. Anxious pressure on whole chest. Fatty heart. Degenerative states, has brain softening. Atheroma of arteries of brain and liver. Compare: *Ars; Phos. Ammon vanad* (fatty degeneration of liver).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: 6-12 potency. The best form is Vanadiate of Soda, 2 mg daily, by mouth.

variolinum.name: Variolinum
variolinum.essence: Used for "internal vaccination." Seems to be efficacious in protecting against, modifying and aiding in the cure of smallpox.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Lymph from Small-pox Pustule
Used for "internal vaccination." Seems to be efficacious in protecting against, modifying and aiding in the cure of smallpox.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Morbid fear of small-pox. Deafness. Pain in occiput. Inflamed eyelids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Oppressed breathing. Throat feels closed. Cough with thick viscid, bloody mucus. Feeling of a lump in right side of throat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
*Excruciating backache*.
*Aching in legs*. Tired all over with restlessness. Wrists pain. Pains shift from back to abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hot fever, with intense radiating heat. Profuse, bad-smelling sweat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hot, dry. Eruption of pustules. *Shingles*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: Vaccin (same action); *Malandrinum*--the morbid product of the grease of the horse (a prophylactic of small-pox and a remedy for the ill-effects of vaccination; chronic eczema following vaccination).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth to thirtieth potency.

veratrum-viride.name: Veratrum Viride
veratrum-viride.essence: Paroxysms of auricular fibrillation. Induces fall of both systolic and diastolic blood pressure. Congestions, especially to lungs, base of brain, with nausea and vomiting. Twitchings and convulsions. Especially adapted to full-blooded, plethoric persons. Great prostration. Rheumatism of heart. *Bloated, livid face*. Furious delirium. Effects of sunstroke. *OEsophagitis.* (Farrington). *Verat vir*, will raise the opsonic index against the *diploccus pneumonia*, 70 to 109 per cent. Congestive stag...

complementary: Gels; Bapt; Bell; Acon; Ferr phos

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rigid os (*Bell; Gels*). Puerperal fever. Suppressed menstruation, with congestion to head (*Bell*). Menstrual colic before the appearance of the discharge with strangury.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
White American Hellebore
Paroxysms of auricular fibrillation. Induces fall of both systolic and diastolic blood pressure. Congestions, especially to lungs, base of brain, with nausea and vomiting. Twitchings and convulsions. Especially adapted to full-blooded, plethoric persons. Great prostration. Rheumatism of heart. *Bloated, livid face*. Furious delirium. Effects of sunstroke. *OEsophagitis.* (Farrington). *Verat vir*, will raise the opsonic index against the *diploccus pneumonia*, 70 to 109 per cent. Congestive stage and early manifestations of hepatization in pneumonia. Zigzag temperature. Clinically, it is known that such diseases as Tiegel's contracture, Thompson's Disease, athetosis and pseudo-hypertrophic muscular paralysis present a symptomatology quite like that produced by Veratrum vir upon muscular tissue (A. E. Hinsdale, M. D).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Quarrelsome and delirious.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Congestion intense, almost apoplectic. Hot head, bloodshot eyes. Bloated, livid face. Hippocratic face. Head retracted, *pupils dilated*, double vision. Meningitis. *Pain from nape of neck*; cannot hold head up. Sunstroke; head full, throbbing arteries (*Bell; Glon; Usnea*). *Face flushed*. Convulsive twitching of facial muscles (*Agaricus*). Vertigo with nausea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: White or yellow, *with red streak down the middle*. Feels scalded. Increased saliva.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thirsty. Nausea and vomiting. Smallest quantity of food or drink immediately rejected. Constrictive pain; increased by warm drinks. *Hiccough*; excessive and painful, with *spasms of oesophagus*. Burning in stomach and oesophagus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain above pelvis, with soreness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Congestion of lungs. Difficult breathing. Sensation of a heavy load on chest. Pneumonia, with faint feeling in stomach and violent congestion. *Croup*. Menstrual colic before the appearance of the discharge with strangury.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Scanty with cloudy sediment.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pulse *slow, soft, weak*, irregular, intermittent. Rapid pulse, low tension (*Tabac; Dig*). Constant, dull, burning pain in region of heart. Valvular diseases. *Beating of pulses throughout body*, especially in right thigh.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aching pain in back of neck and shoulders. Severe pain in joints and muscles. Violent electric-like shocks in limbs. Convulsive twitchings. *Acute rheumatism. Fever*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
