materiaMedica.text: Erysipelas, with cerebral symptoms. Erythema. Itching in various parts. *Hot sweating*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hyperthermy in the evening and hypothermy in the morning. Suppurative fevers with great variation of temperature.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Gels; Bapt; Bell; Acon; Ferr phos*. Antidotes Strychnin-fluid extract, 20-40 drops.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to sixth potency.

verbascum-thapsus.name: Verbascum Thapsus
verbascum-thapsus.essence: Has a pronounced action on the inferior maxillary branch of the fifth pair of the cranial nerves; on the ear; and respiratory tract and bladder. *Catarrhs*, and colds, *with periodical prosopalgia*. Quiets nervous, and bronchial, and urinary irritation, and cough.

agg: change of temperature, talking, sneezing, biting hard (inferior dental nerve)

verbascum-thapsus.dosing: *Mullein oil*, (locally, for earache and dry, scaly condition of meatus. Also for teasing cough at night or lying down. Internally, tincture and lower potencies). *Enuresis*, five-drop doses night and morning.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Mullein (VERBASCUM)
Has a pronounced action on the inferior maxillary branch of the fifth pair of the cranial nerves; on the ear; and respiratory tract and bladder. *Catarrhs*, and colds, *with periodical prosopalgia*. Quiets nervous, and bronchial, and urinary irritation, and cough.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Neuralgia affecting zygoma, temporo maxillary joint, and ear (*Menyanth*), particularly of left side, with lachrymation, coryza, and sensation *as if parts were crushed with tongs*. Talking, sneezing, and change of temperature aggravate the pains; also, pressing teeth together. Pains seem to come in flashes, excited by least movement, occurring periodically at same hour in morning and afternoon each day.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Otalgia, with a sense of obstruction. Deafness. Dry, scaly condition of meatus (use locally).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain extends deep down, causing contraction of sphincter ani.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Many movements a day, with twisting about navel. Haemorrhoids, with obstructed, hardened stool. Inflamed and painful piles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Hoarse*; voice deep, harsh; sounds like a trumpet; "basso profundo". Cough; worse at night. Asthma. Soreness in pharynx, cough during sleep.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constant dribbling. *Enuresis*. Burning urination. Increase with pressure in bladder.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cramp-like pain in soles, right foot, and knee. Lower extremities feel heavy. Thumb feels numb. Neuralgic pain in left ankle. Stiffness *and soreness of joints of lower extremities*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, change of temperature, talking, sneezing, biting hard (inferior dental nerve); from 9 am to 4 pm.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Rhus arom; Caust; Platin; Sphingurus* (pain in zygoma).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Mullein oil*, (locally, for earache and dry, scaly condition of meatus. Also for teasing cough at night or lying down. Internally, tincture and lower potencies). *Enuresis*, five-drop doses night and morning.

vespa-crabro.name: Vespa Crabro
vespa-crabro.essence:
Skin and female symptoms marked. Indurated feeling. Vasomotor symptoms of skin and mucous membranes.

Dizzy, better lying on back. Fainting. Numbness and blindness. Nausea and vomiting, followed by creeping chills from feet upward. Cramping pain in bowels. Axillary glands swollen with soreness of upper arms. Perspiration on parts laid on with itching.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Live Wasp
Skin and female symptoms marked. Indurated feeling. Vasomotor symptoms of skin and mucous membranes.
Dizzy, better lying on back. Fainting. Numbness and blindness. Nausea and vomiting, followed by creeping chills from feet upward. Cramping pain in bowels. Axillary glands swollen with soreness of upper arms. Perspiration on parts laid on with itching.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Painful and swollen. Erysipelatous inflammation of lids. *Chemosis of conjunctiva*. Swelling of mouth and throat, with violent burning pains.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Burning* with micturition; also itching.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Menstruation, preceded by depression, pain, pressure, and constipation. *Left ovary markedly affected*, with *frequent burning, micturition*; sacral pains extending up back.
*Erosion around external os*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Erythema; *intense itching*; burning. *Boils*; stinging and soreness, relieved by bathing with vinegar. Wheals, macules and swellings with burning, stinging and soreness. Erythema multiforme, *relieved* by bathing with vinegar.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Scorpio* (salivation; strabismus; tetanus); *Apis*.
Antidote: *Sempervivum tector*, locally.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

viburnum-opulus.name: Viburnum Opulus
viburnum-opulus.essence: A general remedy for cramps. Colicky pains in pelvic organs. Superconscious of internal sexual organs. Female symptoms most important. *Often prevents miscarriage*. False labor-pains. Spasmodic and congestive affections, dependent upon ovarian or uterine origin.

agg: lying on affected side, in warm room, evening and night

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, and lower potencies.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
High Cranberry
A general remedy for cramps. Colicky pains in pelvic organs. Superconscious of internal sexual organs. Female symptoms most important. *Often prevents miscarriage*. False labor-pains. Spasmodic and congestive affections, dependent upon ovarian or uterine origin.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Irritable. Vertigo; feels as if falling forward. Severe pain in temporal region. Sore feeling in eyeballs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constant nausea; relieved by eating. No appetite.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Sudden cramps and colic pains*. Tender to pressure about umbilicus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses *too late, scanty, lasting a few hours*, offensive in odor, with crampy pains, cramps extend down thighs (*Bell*). Bearing-down pains before. Ovarian region feels heavy and congested. Aching in sacrum and pubes, with pain in anterior muscles of thighs (*Xanthox*); *spasmodic and membranous dysmenorrhoea* (*Borax*). Leucorrhoea, excoriating. Smarting and itching of genitals. Faint on attempting to sit up. *Frequent and very early miscarriage*, causing seeming sterility. Pains from back to loins and womb worse early morning.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frequent urging. Copious, pale, light-colored urine. Cannot hold water on coughing or walking.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stools large and hard, with cutting in rectum and soreness of anus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stiff, sore feeling in nape of neck. Feels as if back would break. Sacral backache. Lower extremities weak and heavy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, lying on affected side, in warm room, evening and night. *Better*, in open air and resting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Virburnum prunifolium*-Black Haw--(habitual miscarriage; *after-pains*; cancer of the tongue; obstinate hiccough; supposed to be a uterine tonic. Morning sickness; menstrual irregularities of sterile females with uterine displacements). *Cimicif; Cauloph; Sep; Xanthox*.

vinca-minor.name: Vinca Minor
vinca-minor.essence: A remedy for skin affections, eczema, and especially plica polonica; also for haemorrhages and diphtheria.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Lesser Periwinkle
A remedy for skin affections, eczema, and especially plica polonica; also for haemorrhages and diphtheria.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tearing pain in vertex, ringing and whistling in ears. Whirling vertigo, with flickering before eyes. *Spots on scalp, oozing moisture, matting hair together. Corrosive itching of scalp*. Bald spots. *Plica polonica*. Irresistible desire to scratch.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tip gets red easily. Moist eruption on septum. Stoppage of one nostril. *Sores in nose*. Seborrhoea upper lip and base of nose.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Difficult swallowing. Ulcers. Frequent hawking. *Diphtheria*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Excessive menstruation with great weakness. *Passive uterine haemorrhages* (*Ust; Trill; Secale*). Menorrhagia; continuous flow, particularly at climacteric (*Lach*). Haemorrhages from fibroids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Corrosive itching. *Great sensitiveness of skin, with redness and soreness* from slight rubbing. Eczema of head and face; pustules, itching, burning, and offensive odor. Hair matted together.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Oleand; Staph*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to third potency.

viola-odorata.name: Viola Odorata
viola-odorata.essence: Has a specific action on the ear. Affects especially dark-haired patients; supra-orbital and orbital regions; rheumatism in upper parts of the body when on the *right* side. *Worm affections* in children (*Teuc*). Locally, for pain due to uterine fibroids. Also against snake-bites, bee-stings. *Tension* extends to upper half of face and ears.

complementary: ears; serous or bloody effusion in the labyrinth
deafness to the voice, but sensitive to sounds
Aur; Puls; Sep; Ign; Cina; Cauloph

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Violet
Has a specific action on the ear. Affects especially dark-haired patients; supra-orbital and orbital regions; rheumatism in upper parts of the body when on the *right* side. *Worm affections* in children (*Teuc*). Locally, for pain due to uterine fibroids. Also against snake-bites, bee-stings. *Tension* extends to upper half of face and ears.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Burning of the forehead*. Vertigo; everything in head seems to whirl around. Heaviness of head, with sensation of weakness in muscles of nape of neck. *Scalp tense; must knit the brows. Tendency to pain immediately above eyebrows*. Throbbing under eye and temple. *Headache across the forehead*. Acts upon frontal sinuses. Hysterical attacks in tuberculous patients.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heaviness of lids. Eyeball feels compressed. Flames before eyes. Myopia. Choroiditis. Illusions of vision; fiery, serpentine circles.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Shooting in ears. Aversion to music. Roaring and tickling. Deep stitches beneath ears. Deafness; *otorrhoea*. Ear affections with pain in eyeballs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Torpor in the end of nose, as from a blow. Dry, short, spasmodic cough and dyspnoea; worse in daytime. Oppression of chest. Pertussis, with hoarseness. *Dyspnoea during pregnancy*. Difficult breathing, anxiety and palpitation, with hysteria.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rheumatism of the deltoid muscle. Trembling of limbs. *Pressing pain in right carpal and metacarpal joints.* (*Ulmus*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Milky urine*; smells strong. Enuresis in nervous children.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, cool air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Ulmus* (formication in feet, numb, creeping pain in legs and feet; rheumatic pains above wrists; numbness, tingling, and full soreness where gastrocnemius gives off its tendon); *Chenopodium* (*ears; serous or bloody effusion in the labyrinth*; chronic otitis media; progressive *deafness to the voice, but sensitive to sounds* of passing vehicles and other sounds; buzzing; absent or deficient bone conduction; a consciousness of the ear; hearing better for shrill, high-pitched sounds than for low ones); *Aur; Puls; Sep; Ign; Cina; Cauloph* (in rheumatism of small joints).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to sixth potency.

viola-tricolor.name: Viola Tricolor
viola-tricolor.essence: The principal uses of this remedy are for eczema in childhood and nocturnal emission accompanied by very vivid dreams.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Pansy
The principal uses of this remedy are for eczema in childhood and nocturnal emission accompanied by very vivid dreams.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Heavy, pressing-outward pain. Eczema of scalp, with swollen glands. Face hot and sweating after eating.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Much phlegm, causing hawking; worse in the air. Swallowing difficult.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Copious; disagreeable, cat-like odor.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Swelling of prepuce, burning in glans. Itching. Involuntary, seminal emissions at stool.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Impetigo*. Intolerable itching. Eruptions, particularly over face and head, with burning, itching; worse at night. Thick scabs, which crack and exude a tenacious yellow pus. Eczema impetigonoides of the face. Sycosis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, winter; 11 am. Compare: *Lycop*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Rhus; Calc; Sepia*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lower potencies.

vipera-berus.name: Vipera Berus
vipera-berus.essence:
Viper poisoning causes a temporary increase in reflexes, paresis supervenes, a paraplegia of the lower extremities extending upwards. Resembles acute ascending paralysis of Landry (Wells). Has special action on kidneys and induces haematuria. Cardiac dropsy.

Indicated in inflammation of veins with great swelling; *bursting sensation. Enlargement of liver*. Ailments of menopause. OEdema of glottis. Poly-neuritis, polio-myelitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
The German Viper (VIPERA)
Viper poisoning causes a temporary increase in reflexes, paresis supervenes, a paraplegia of the lower extremities extending upwards. Resembles acute ascending paralysis of Landry (Wells). Has special action on kidneys and induces haematuria. Cardiac dropsy.
Indicated in inflammation of veins with great swelling; *bursting sensation. Enlargement of liver*. Ailments of menopause. OEdema of glottis. Poly-neuritis, polio-myelitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Excessively swollen. Lips and tongue swollen, livid, protruding. Tongue dry, brown, black. Speech difficult.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent pain in enlarged liver, with jaundice and fever; extends to shoulder and hip.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Patient is obliged to keep the extremities elevated. *When they are allowed to hang down, it seems as if they would burst, and the pain is unbearable* (*Diad*).
*Varicose veins* and acute phlebitis. Veins swollen, sensitive; bursting pain. Severe cramps in lower extremities.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Livid. Skin peels in large plates. Lymphangioma, boils, carbuncles, with *bursting* sensation, relieved by elevating parts.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pelius berus*-Adder (Prostration and fainting, faltering pulse, skin yellow, *pain about navel*. Swelling of arm, tongue, right eye; giddiness, nervousness, faintness, sickness, compression of chest, could not breathe properly or take a deep breath; aching and stiffness of limbs, joints stiff, collapsed feeling, great thirst). *Eel serum* (heart and kidney diseases. Failure of compensation and impending asystole).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Twelfth potency.

viscum-album.name: Viscum Album
viscum-album.essence:
Lowered blood pressure. Dilated blood vessels but does not act on the centers in the medulla. Pulse is slow due to central irritation of the vagus.

The symptoms point especially to rheumatic and gouty complaints; neuralgia, especially sciatica. Epilepsy, *chorea*, and metrorrhagia. *Rheumatic deafness. Asthma*. Spinal pains, due to uterine causes. Rheumatism with *tearing pains*. Hypertensive albuminuria. Valvular disease, with disturbances in sexual sphere. Symptoms like epileptic aura and pet...

complementary: Secale: Convallar; Bry; Puls; Rhodod. Guipsine

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dyspnoea; *feeling of suffocation when lying on left side*. Spasmodic cough. *Asthma*, if connected with gout or rheumatism. Stertorous breathing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Mistletoe
Lowered blood pressure. Dilated blood vessels but does not act on the centers in the medulla. Pulse is slow due to central irritation of the vagus.
The symptoms point especially to rheumatic and gouty complaints; neuralgia, especially sciatica. Epilepsy, *chorea*, and metrorrhagia. *Rheumatic deafness. Asthma*. Spinal pains, due to uterine causes. Rheumatism with *tearing pains*. Hypertensive albuminuria. Valvular disease, with disturbances in sexual sphere. Symptoms like epileptic aura and petit mal.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feeling as if whole vault of skull were lifted up. Blue ring around eyes. Double vision. Buzzing and stopped-up feeling in ear. Deafness from cold. Facial muscles in constant agitation. Persistent vertigo.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Haemorrhage, with pain; blood partly clots and bright red. Climacteric complaints (*Lach; Sulph*). Pain from sacrum into pelvis, with tearing, shooting pains from above downwards. Retained placenta (*Secale*). Chronic endometritis. Metrorrhagia. Ovaralgia, especially left.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hypertrophy with valvular insufficiency; pulse small and weak; unable to rest in a reclining position. Palpitation during coitus. Low tension. Failing compensation, dyspnoea worse lying on left side. Weight and oppression of heart; as if a hand were squeezing it; tickling sensation about heart.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pains alternate in the knee and ankle with shoulder and elbow. *Sciatica. Tearing*, shooting pains in both thighs and upper extremities. A *glow* rises from the feet to the head; seems to be on fire. Periodic pains from sacrum into pelvis, *worse in bed*, with pains into thighs and upper extremities. General tremor, as if all muscles were in state of fibrillary contraction. Dropsy of extremities. Sensation of a spider crawling over back of hand and foot. Itching all over. Compressing pain in feet.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, winter, cold, stormy weather; in bed. Movement; lying on left side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Secale: Convallar; Bry; Puls; Rhodod. Guipsine* -active principle--(exalts the hypotensive properties of Viscum). *Hedera Helix*-Ivy--(Intercranial pressure).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture and lower potencies.

wyethia-helenoides.name: Wyethia Helenoides
wyethia-helenoides.essence: Has marked effects on the throat, and has proven an excellent remedy in *pharyngitis*, especially the follicular form. Irritable throats of singers and public speakers. Useful also in haemorrhoids. Hay-fever symptoms; *itching in posterior nares*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Poison-weed (WYETHIA)
Has marked effects on the throat, and has proven an excellent remedy in *pharyngitis*, especially the follicular form. Irritable throats of singers and public speakers. Useful also in haemorrhoids. Hay-fever symptoms; *itching in posterior nares*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nervous, uneasy, depressed. Dizzy. Rush of blood to head. Sharp pain in forehead.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels as if scalded; sensation of heat down oesophagus. Itching of the palate.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constant clearing and hemming. *Dry*, posterior nares; no relief from clearing. *Throat feels swollen*; epiglottis dry and burning. Difficult swallowing. Constant desire to swallow saliva. Uvula feels elongated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sense of weight. Belching of wind alternating with hiccough. Nausea and vomiting.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain below ribs of right side.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Loose, dark, at night. Itching of anus. Constipation, *with haemorrhoids*; not bleeding.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry, *hacking cough*, caused by tickling of the epiglottis. Burning sensation in the bronchial tubes. Tendency to get hoarse talking or singing; throat hot, dry. Dry asthma.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in left ovary, shooting down to knee. Pain in uterus; could outline its contour.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in back; extends to end of spine. Pain right arm, stiffness of wrist and hand. Aching pains all over.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Chill at 11 am. Thirst for ice-water during chill. No thirst with heat. Profuse sweat all night. Terrific headache during sweat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Arum; Sang; Lach*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to sixth potency.

xantoxylum-fraxineum.name: Xantoxylum Fraxineum
xantoxylum-fraxineum.essence: Its specific action is on the nervous system and mucous membranes. Paralysis, especially *hemiplegia*. Painful haemorrhages, after-pains, *neuralgic dysmenorrhoea*, and rheumatic affections, offer a therapeutic field for this remedy, especially in patients of spare habit and nervous, delicate organization. Indigestion from over-eating or from too much fluid. Sluggish capillary circulation. Neurasthenia, poor assimilation, insomnia, occipital headache. Increases mucous secretion of mouth and stim...

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Prickly Ash (XANTHOXYLUM)
Its specific action is on the nervous system and mucous membranes. Paralysis, especially *hemiplegia*. Painful haemorrhages, after-pains, *neuralgic dysmenorrhoea*, and rheumatic affections, offer a therapeutic field for this remedy, especially in patients of spare habit and nervous, delicate organization. Indigestion from over-eating or from too much fluid. Sluggish capillary circulation. Neurasthenia, poor assimilation, insomnia, occipital headache. Increases mucous secretion of mouth and stimulates the secretion from all glands with ducts opening in the mouth.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nervous, frightened. Mental depression.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels full. Weight and pain on vertex. Pain over eyes, throbbing pressure over nose, pressure in forehead; head seems divided; ringing in ears. Occipital headache. Sick headache with dizziness and flatulence.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Neuralgia of lower jaw. Dryness of mouth and fauces. Pharyngitis (*Wyethia*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Griping and diarrhoea. Dysentery, with *tympanites*, tenesmus; inodorous discharges.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses too early and painful. Ovarian neuralgia, with pain in loins and lower abdomen; worse, *left side*, extending down the thigh, along genito-crural nerves. *Neuralgic dysmenorrhoea*, with neuralgic headaches; *pain in back and down legs*. Menses thick, almost black. *After-pains* (*Arnica; Cup; Cham*). Leucorrhoea at time of menses. Neurasthenic patients who are thin, emaciated; poor assimilation with insomnia and occipital headache.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aphonia. Constant desire to take a long breath; oppression of chest. Dry cough, day and night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Paralysis of left side following spinal disorders. Numbness of left side; impairment of nerves of motion. Hemiplegia. Pain in nape, extending down back. Sciatica; worse, hot weather. Anterior, crural neuralgia (*Staph*). Left arm numb. Neuralgic shooting pain, as from electricity, all over limb.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hard and unrefreshing; dreams of flying. Sleeplessness in neurasthenics.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Gnaph; Cimicif; Staph; Mezer; Piscidia*-White dogwood--(a nerve sedative. *Insomnia due* to worry, nervous excitement, spasmodic coughs; pains of irregular menstruation; regulates the flow. Neuralgic and spasmodic affections. Use tincture in rather material doses).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to sixth potency.

xerophyllum.name: Xerophyllum
xerophyllum.essence: Should prove curative in eczematous conditions, poison-oak, early typhoid states, etc.

agg: application of cold water, in afternoon and evening
amel: application of hot water, in morning, moving affected part

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Tamalpais Lily, Basket Grass Flower
Should prove curative in eczematous conditions, poison-oak, early typhoid states, etc.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Dull, cannot concentrate mind for study; forgets names;
*writes last letters of words first*; misspells common words.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels full, stuffed up, pain across forehead and above eyes. Great pressure at root of nose. Bewildered. Loss of consciousness. Pulsating headache.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Painful, as of sand, smarting; difficult to focus for close work. Eyes feel sore, burn.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stuffed; tightness at bridge of nose; acute nasal catarrh.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bloated in morning. Puffy under eyes.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Stitching pain upon swallowing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels full and heavy. Eructations sour; offensive, an hour after luncheon and dinner. Vomiting at 2 pm.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Intestinal flatulence. In morning rumbling in bowels, with desire for stool.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Constipation, stools hard, small lumps. Difficult, soft stools, with much straining. Much flatus. Bearing-down pain in rectum.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Difficulty of retaining; dribbling when walking. Frequent urination at night.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bearing-down sensation. Vulva inflamed, with furious itching. Increased sexual desire, with ovarian and uterine pains and leucorrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Posterior nares raw; discharge thick, yellow mucus. Sneezing. Trachea sore; lumps feel constricted.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels hot from sacrum to scapulae. Backache, extending down legs. Pain over kidneys. Heat deep in spine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Muscular lameness, trembling. Pain in knees. Limbs feel stiff (*Rhus*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Erythema, with vesication and intense itching, stinging, and burning. Blisters, little lumps. Skin rough and cracked; feels like leather. Dermatitis, especially around knees. Inflammation resembling poison-oak. Inguinal glands and behind knee swollen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, application of cold water, in afternoon and evening. *Better*, application of hot water, in morning, moving affected part.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Rhus; Anacard; Grindelia*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency or higher.

x-ray.name: X-ray
x-ray.essence:
Repeated exposure to Roentgen (*X-ray*) has produced skin lesions often followed by cancer. Distressing pain. Sexual glands are particularly affected. Atrophy of ovaries and testicles. Sterility. Changes take place in the blood lymphatics and bone marrow. Anaemia and leukaemia. Corresponds to stubbornness as in burns, they refuse to heal. Psoriasis.

Has the property of stimulating cellular metabolism. Arouses the reactive vitality, mentally and physically. Brings to the surface suppressed sympt...

agg: in bed, afternoon, evening and night

x-ray.dosing:
Twelfth potency and higher.
Compare: *Electricitas*.--Sugar of milk saturated with the current (Anxiety, nervous tremors, restlessness, palpitation, headaches. Dreads approach of thunder-storms; heaviness of limbs).
*Magnetis Poli Ambo*.--The Magnet.--Sugar of milk or distilled water exposed to influence of entire mass (Burning lancinations throughout the body; pains as if broken in joints, when cartilages of two bones touch; shooting and jerkings; headache as if a nail were driven in; tendency of old wounds to bleed afresh).
*Magnetis Polus Arcticus*.--North pole of the magnet.--(Disturbed sleep, somnambulism, cracking in cervical vertebrae, sensation of coldness; toothache).
*Magnetis Polus Australis*.--South pole of the magnet.--(Severe pain in inner side of nail of the big toe, *ingrowing toenail*; easy dislocation of joints of foot; feet are painful when letting them hang down).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Vial containing alcohol exposed to X-Ray
Repeated exposure to Roentgen (*X-ray*) has produced skin lesions often followed by cancer. Distressing pain. Sexual glands are particularly affected. Atrophy of ovaries and testicles. Sterility. Changes take place in the blood lymphatics and bone marrow. Anaemia and leukaemia. Corresponds to stubbornness as in burns, they refuse to heal. Psoriasis.
Has the property of stimulating cellular metabolism. Arouses the reactive vitality, mentally and physically. Brings to the surface suppressed symptoms, especially sycotic and those due to mixed infections. Its homeopathic action is thus centrifugal, towards the periphery.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sticking pains in different parts of head and face. Dull pain in right upper jaw. Stiff neck. Sudden cricks in neck, pains more severe behind ears. Pain in muscles of neck when lifting head from pillow. Fullness in ears, ringing in head.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue dry, rough, sore. Throat painful on swallowing. Nausea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Lewd dreams. Sexual desire lost. Re-establishes suppressed gonorrhoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rheumatic pains. General tired and sick feeling. Palms rough and scaly.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry, itching eczema. Erythema around roots of nails. Skin dry, wrinkled. Painful cracks. Warty growths. Nails thicken. Psoriasis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, in bed, afternoon, evening and night; open air.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Twelfth potency and higher.
Compare: *Electricitas*.--Sugar of milk saturated with the current (Anxiety, nervous tremors, restlessness, palpitation, headaches. Dreads approach of thunder-storms; heaviness of limbs).
*Magnetis Poli Ambo*.--The Magnet.--Sugar of milk or distilled water exposed to influence of entire mass (Burning lancinations throughout the body; pains as if broken in joints, when cartilages of two bones touch; shooting and jerkings; headache as if a nail were driven in; tendency of old wounds to bleed afresh).
*Magnetis Polus Arcticus*.--North pole of the magnet.--(Disturbed sleep, somnambulism, cracking in cervical vertebrae, sensation of coldness; toothache).
*Magnetis Polus Australis*.--South pole of the magnet.--(Severe pain in inner side of nail of the big toe, *ingrowing toenail*; easy dislocation of joints of foot; feet are painful when letting them hang down).

yohimbinum.name: Yohimbinum
yohimbinum.essence: Excites sexual organs and acts on central nervous system and respiratory center. An aphrodisiac, used in physiological doses, but contraindicated in all acute and chronic inflammations of abdominal organs. Homeopathically, should be of service in congestive conditions of the sexual organs. Causes hyperaemia of the milk glands and stimulates the function of lactation. Menorrhagia.
yohimbinum.dosing: As a sexual stimulant, ten drops of a one per cent solution, or hypodermic tablets of 0. 005 gm. Homeopathic dose, third potency.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Coryanthe Yohimbe
Excites sexual organs and acts on central nervous system and respiratory center. An aphrodisiac, used in physiological doses, but contraindicated in all acute and chronic inflammations of abdominal organs. Homeopathically, should be of service in congestive conditions of the sexual organs. Causes hyperaemia of the milk glands and stimulates the function of lactation. Menorrhagia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Agitation, with flying sensations of heat in face. Disagreeable, metallic taste. Copious salivation. Nausea and eructation.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Strong and lasting erections*. Neurasthenic impotence. Bleeding piles. Intestinal haemorrhage. Urethritis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rigor; intense heat, waves of heat and chilliness, tendency to sweat.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Sleepless*. Thoughts of events of whole past life keep him awake.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: As a sexual stimulant, ten drops of a one per cent solution, or hypodermic tablets of 0. 005 gm. Homeopathic dose, third potency.

yucca-filamentosa.name: Yucca Filamentosa
yucca-filamentosa.essence: So-called bilious symptoms, with headache. Despondent and irritable.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Bear-grass
So-called bilious symptoms, with headache. Despondent and irritable.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aches as if top of head would fly off. Arteries of forehead throb. Nose red.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Yellow; tongue yellow, coated, taking imprint of teeth (*Merc; Pod; Rhus*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Taste as of rotten eggs (*Arnica*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sensation as if something hung down from posterior nares; cannot get it up or down.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Deep pain in right side over liver, going through back. Stool yellowish brown, with bile.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning and swelling of the prepuce, with redness of meatus. Gonorrhoea (*Cann; Tussil*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Erythematous redness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency.

zincum-metallicum.name: Zincum Metallicum
zincum-metallicum.essence: The provings picture cerebral depression. The word "fag" covers a large part of zinc action. Tissues are worn out faster than they are repaired. Poisoning from suppressed eruptions or discharges. The nervous symptoms of most importance. Defective vitality. Impending brain paralysis. *Period of depression in disease*. Spinal affections. Twitchings. Pain, as if between skin and flesh. Great relief from discharges. Chorea, from fright or suppressed eruption. *Convulsions, with pale face and no heat...

agg: at menstrual period, from touch, between 5 to 7 pm
amel: while eating, discharges, and appearance of eruptions

complementary: Agaric; Ign; Plumb; Argent; Puls; Helleb; Tuberc
for those who are compelled to work, on an insufficient amount of sleep

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Zinc (ZINC)
The provings picture cerebral depression. The word "fag" covers a large part of zinc action. Tissues are worn out faster than they are repaired. Poisoning from suppressed eruptions or discharges. The nervous symptoms of most importance. Defective vitality. Impending brain paralysis. *Period of depression in disease*. Spinal affections. Twitchings. Pain, as if between skin and flesh. Great relief from discharges. Chorea, from fright or suppressed eruption. *Convulsions, with pale face and no heat*. Marked anaemia with profound prostration. It causes a decrease in the number, and destruction of red blood corpuscles. Repercussed eruptive diseases. In chronic diseases with brain and spinal symptoms, trembling, convulsive twitching and fidgety feet are guiding symptoms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Weak memory. *Very sensitive to noise*. Averse to work, to talk. *Child repeats everything said to it*. Fears arrest on account of a supposed crime. Melancholia. *Lethargic, stupid*. Paresis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels as if he would fall to left side. Headache from the smallest quantity of wine. Hydrocephalus. Rolls head from side to side. Bores head into pillow. *Occipital* pain, with weight on vertex. Automatic motion of head and hands. Brain-fag; headaches of overtaxed school children. *Forehead cool; base of brain hot*. Roaring in head. Starting in fright.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pterygium; smarting, lachrymation, itching. Pressure as if pressed into head. Itching and soreness of lids and *inner angles*. Ptosis. *Rolling of eyes*. Blurring of one-half of vision; worse, stimulants. *Squinting*. Amaurosis, with severe headache. Red and inflamed conjunctiva; *worse, inner canthus*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tearing, stitches, and external swelling. Discharge of fetid pus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sore feeling high up; pressure upon root.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Pale* lips, and corners of mouth cracked. Redness and itching eruption on chin. Tearing in facial bones.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Teeth loose. Gums bleed. Gnashing of teeth. Bloody taste. Blisters on tongue. Difficult dentition; child weak; cold and restless feet.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry; constant inclination to hawk up tenacious mucus. Rawness and dryness in throat and larynx. Pain in muscles of throat when swallowing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hiccough, nausea, vomiting of bitter mucus. Burning in stomach, heartburn from sweet things. *Cannot stand smallest quantity of wine. Ravenous hunger* about 11 am (*Sulph*). Great greediness when eating; cannot eat fast enough. Atonic dyspepsia, feeling as if stomach were collapsed.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain after a light meal, with tympanitis. Pain in spot beneath navel. Gurgling and griping; distended. Flatulent colic, with retraction of abdomen (*Plumb*). Enlarged, indurated sore liver. Reflex symptoms from floating kidney. *Griping after eating*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Can only void urine when sitting bent backwards. Hysterical retention. Involuntary urination when walking, coughing or sneezing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hard, small, constipated stool. *Cholera infantum*, with tenesmus; green mucous discharges. Sudden cessation of diarrhoea, followed by cerebral symptoms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Testicles swelled, drawn up. Erections violent. Emissions with hypochondriasis. Falling off of hair (pubic). Drawing in testicles up to spermatic cord.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Ovarian pain, *especially left; can't keep still* (*Viburn*). Nymphomania of lying-in women. Menses too late, suppressed; lochia suppressed (*Puls*). Breasts painful. Nipples sore. Menses flow more at night (*Bov*). Complaints all *better during menstrual flow.* (*Eupion; Lach*). *All the female symptoms are associated with restlessness, depression, coldness spinal tenderness and restless feet*. Dry cough before and during menses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning pressure beneath sternum. Constriction and cutting in chest. Hoarseness. Debilitating, spasmodic cough; worse, eating sweet things. Child grasps genitals during cough. Asthmatic bronchitis, with constriction, of chest. *Dyspnoea better as soon as expectoration appears*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in small of back. Cannot bear back *touched* (*Sul; Therid; Cinch*). Tension and stinging between shoulders. Spinal irritation. *Dull aching about the last dorsal or first lumbar vertebrae; worse sitting. Burning along spine. Nape of neck weary from writing or any exertion*. Tearing in shoulder-blades.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Lameness, *weakness, trembling and twitching* of various muscles. Chilblains (*Agar*).
*Feet in continued motion; cannot keep still. Large varicose veins on legs*. Sweaty. Convulsions, *with pale face. Transverse pains*, especially in upper extremity. *Soles of feet sensitive*. Steps with entire sole of foot on floor.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cries out during sleep; body jerks; wakes frightened, stared. Nervous motion of feet when asleep. Loud screaming out at night in sleep without being aware of it. Somnambulism (*Kali phos*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
*Varicose veins*, especially of lower extremities (*Puls*). Formication of feet and legs as from bugs crawling over the skin, preventing sleep. Eczema, especially in the anaemic and neurotic. Itching of thighs and *hollow of knees*.
*Retrocession of eruptions*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frequent, febrile shiverings down back. Cold extremities. Night-sweat. Profuse sweat on feet.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, at menstrual period, from touch, between 5 to 7 pm; after dinner, from wine. *Better*, while eating, discharges, and appearance of eruptions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second to sixth potency.

zincum-valerianicum.name: Zincum Valerianicum
zincum-valerianicum.essence: A remedy for *neuralgia*, hysteria, angina pectoris, and other *painful* affections, notably in *ovarian affections*. Epilepsy without aura. Hysterical heart-pain. *Facial* neuralgia, violent in left temple and inferior maxillary. Sleeplessness in children. Obstinate *hiccough*.
zincum-valerianicum.dosing: First and second trituration. Must be continued for some time in treatment of neuralgia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Valerinate of Zinc (ZINCUM VALERIANUM)
A remedy for *neuralgia*, hysteria, angina pectoris, and other *painful* affections, notably in *ovarian affections*. Epilepsy without aura. Hysterical heart-pain. *Facial* neuralgia, violent in left temple and inferior maxillary. Sleeplessness in children. Obstinate *hiccough*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent, neuralgic, *intermittent headaches*. Becomes almost insane with pain, which is piercing and stabbing. Uncontrollable sleeplessness from pain in head with melancholy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Ovaralgia; pain shoots down limbs*, even too foot.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Severe pain in neck and spine. Cannot sit still; must keep legs in constant motion. Sciatic neuralgia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First and second trituration. Must be continued for some time in treatment of neuralgia.

zingiber-officinale.name: Zingiber Officinale
zingiber-officinale.essence: States of debility in the digestive tract, and sexual system and respiratory troubles, call for this remedy. Complete cessation of function of kidneys.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching of prepuce. Sexual desire excited; painful erections. Emissions.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Ginger (ZINGIBER)
States of debility in the digestive tract, and sexual system and respiratory troubles, call for this remedy. Complete cessation of function of kidneys.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hemicrania; sudden glimmering before eyes; feels confused and empty. Pain over eyebrows.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Feels obstructed and dry. Intolerable itching; red pimples.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Taste of food remains long, especially of bread and toast. Feels heavy, like from a stone. *Complaints from eating melons and drinking impure water. Acidity* (*Calc; Robinia*). Heaviness in stomach on awakening with wind and rumbling, great thirst and emptiness. Pain from pit to under sternum, worse eating.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Colic, diarrhoea, extremely loose bowels. Diarrhoea from drinking bad water, with much flatulence, cutting pain, relaxation of sphincter. Hot, sore, painful anus during pregnancy. Chronic intestinal catarrh. Anus red and inflamed. Haemorrhoids hot, painful, sore. (*Aloe*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frequent desire tu urinate. Stinging, burning in orifice. Yellow discharge from urethra. Urine thick, turbid, of strong odor, suppressed. Complete suppression after typhoid. After urinating, continues to ooze in drops.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hoarseness. *Smarting below larynx*; breathing difficult. *Asthma*, without anxiety, *worse* toward morning. Scratching sensation in throat; stitches in chest. Cough dry, hacking; copious morning sputa.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Very weak in all joints. Back lame. Cramps in soles and palms.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Compare: *Calad*.
Antidote: *Nux*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to sixth potency.

zizia-aurea.name: Zizia Aurea
zizia-aurea.essence: Hysteria, epilepsy, chorea, hypochondriasis, come within the sphere of this remedy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Meadow Parsnip (THASPIUM AUREUM - ZIZIA)
Hysteria, epilepsy, chorea, hypochondriasis, come within the sphere of this remedy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Suicidal; depressed; laughing and weeping moods alternate.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pressure on top, in right temple, associated with backache.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Great lassitude following coitus. Sexual power increased.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Intermittent neuralgia of left ovary. Acrid, profuse leucorrhoea, with retarded menses.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry cough, with stitches in chest. Dyspnoea.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Unusual tired feeling. *Chorea, especially during sleep. Fidgety legs* (*Tarant*). Lameness in arms and spasmodic twitching.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse, during sleep*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Agar; Stram; Tarant; Cicuta; Aethusa*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture, to third potency.

areca.name: Areca
areca.essence: Of use in Helminthiasis. Its alkaloid, *Areolin Hydrobrom* contracts the pupil, acting more promptly and energetically but of shorter duration than *Eserine*. Serviceable in glaucoma. Acts also as a salivatory like *Pilocarpin*. Also increases the amplitude of pulsations of the heart and promotes the contractility of the intestines.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Betel Nut (ARECA)
Of use in Helminthiasis. Its alkaloid, *Areolin Hydrobrom* contracts the pupil, acting more promptly and energetically but of shorter duration than *Eserine*. Serviceable in glaucoma. Acts also as a salivatory like *Pilocarpin*. Also increases the amplitude of pulsations of the heart and promotes the contractility of the intestines.

arundo-mauritanica.name: Arundo Mauritanica
arundo-mauritanica.essence: A remedy for catarrhal states. Hay-fever.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Reed (ARUNDO)
A remedy for catarrhal states. Hay-fever.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching; falling off of hair; roots of hair painful. Pustules. Pain in occiput, extends to right ciliary region. Deep seated pain in sides of head.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning and itching in auditory canals. Eczema behind ears.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hay-fever begins with burning and *itching of palate* and conjunctiva. *Annoying itching in the nostrils and roof of the mouth* (*Wyethia*). Coryza; loss of smell (*Nat mur*). Sneezing, *itching of nostrils*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning and itching; bleeding of gums. Ulcers and exfoliations in the commissures. Fissures in tongue.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Coldness in stomach. Longing for acids.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Movement as from something alive. Flatulence pain at pubic region.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Greenish. Burning at anus. Diarrhoea of nursing children (*Cham; Calc phos*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Burning. Red sediment (*Lyc*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pain in spermatic cord after embrace.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Menses too early and profuse. Neuralgic pains from face to shoulders and pubis. Desire with vaginal pruritus.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dyspnoea; cough; bluish expectoration. Burning and pain in nipples.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Itching, burning; oedema of hands and feet. Burning and swelling of soles. Copious and offensive sweat of feet.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Eczema; itching and crawling, especially of chest, upper extremities. Fissures in fingers and heels.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Anthoxantum*-sweet vernal grass (a popular medicine for hay-fever and coryza). *Lolium; Cepa; Sabad; Silica*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to sixth potency.

euphorbia-lathyris.name: Euphorbia Lathyris
euphorbia-lathyris.essence: The fresh milky juice is exceedingly acrid when applied to the skin and the fruit is highly purgative and poisonous. The juice causes redness, itching, pimples, sometimes gangrene. The symptoms point to its use in erysipelas. Poison Oak, etc. Rheumatic pains during rest. Paralytic, weakness in joints.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Gopher-Plant, Caper Spurge
The fresh milky juice is exceedingly acrid when applied to the skin and the fruit is highly purgative and poisonous. The juice causes redness, itching, pimples, sometimes gangrene. The symptoms point to its use in erysipelas. Poison Oak, etc. Rheumatic pains during rest. Paralytic, weakness in joints.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Delirium and hallucinations. Stupor, coma.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Almost closed from *oedema of lids*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: End of nose very much inflamed externally. Very *sensitive and oedematous* mucous membranes with ulceration.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: At first ruddy glow on cheeks, afterwards death-like pallor. Cold perspiration in beads on forehead. Red, puffed, and in spots suppurating. Erythema, beginning on face, gradually extending into the hair parts, and then spreading over whole body, taking eight days to do so; eruption glossy, rough oedematous, with burning and smarting; aggravated by touch and cold air; ameliorated by close room and sweet-oil applications. Fine bran-like desquamation. Sensation of cobwebs. Stinging, smarting, and burning of face when touched.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue coated, slimy; acrid taste. Breath cold, musty odor.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nausea and vomiting of copious clear water, intermingled with white, gelatinous lumps.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Drastic purgation from large doses; mild laxative condition from smaller doses; followed several weeks afterwards by obstinate constipation. Stools of white, transparent, gelatinous mucus; later mingled with blood.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Copious flow of urine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Inflammation of scrotum resulting in deep acrid ulcers, with intense itching and burning; worse, touching the parts from washing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Labored breathing. Breath cold, musty odor. Cough; first, a hacking, as from inhalation of sulphur; later on, paroxysmal, like whooping-cough, in regular paroxysms, ending in diarrhoea and vomiting, with sleepiness between each paroxysm.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Weak and fluttering heart-action. Pulse 120, full, bounding, somewhat irregular.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Restlessness at night. Sleep disturbed, anxious dreams.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Temperature increased. Body bathed in profuse perspiration, standing out like beads on forehead; later, cold, clammy perspiration on forehead.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Erythema, beginning on uncovered parts, on face, and spreading over whole body; glossy, rough, oedematous, with burning and smarting. Fine bran-like desquamation following in the wake of the erythema. Eruption rough, scaly, smarting, and burning; when scratched forms deep, ragged ulcers; skin where ulcerated remains red.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, touch and cold air; *better*, close room and sweet-oil application.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Antidoted by *Rhus tox* (skin symptoms); *Veratr alb* (vomiting, purging, cough and coma).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to thirtieth potency.

fuchsin.name: Fuchsin
fuchsin.essence:
A Coloring Substance Used in Adulteration of Wine (FUCHSINA - MAGENTA)

Produces redness of ears, deep red discoloration of mouth swollen gums, with burning and tendency to salivation; deep red urine, albuminous, and light red, profuse diarrhoea, with abdominal pains. Cortical substance of kidneys degenerated. Useful in cortical nephritis with albuminuria.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
A Coloring Substance Used in Adulteration of Wine (FUCHSINA - MAGENTA)
Produces redness of ears, deep red discoloration of mouth swollen gums, with burning and tendency to salivation; deep red urine, albuminous, and light red, profuse diarrhoea, with abdominal pains. Cortical substance of kidneys degenerated. Useful in cortical nephritis with albuminuria.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: 6x to 30th potency.

juniperus-communis.name: Juniperus Communis
juniperus-communis.essence: Catarrhal inflammation of kidneys. Dropsy, with suppression of urine. Old persons, with poor digestion and scanty secretion of urine. Chronic pyelitis.
juniperus-communis.dosing: Best form is the infusion. One ounce to a pint of boiling water. Dose, one-half to two ounces, or tincture, one to ten drops.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry, pain during empty swallowing, tenacious mucus. Mouth dry.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Juniper Berries
Catarrhal inflammation of kidneys. Dropsy, with suppression of urine. Old persons, with poor digestion and scanty secretion of urine. Chronic pyelitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Strangury; bloody, scanty urine, violet odor (*Tereb*). Weight in kidney region. Prostatic discharge. Renal hyperaemia (*Eucalyptol*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Cough with scanty, loaded urine.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Sabina; Juniperus Virginianus*-Red Cedar--(Violent tenesmus vesical. Persistent dragging in back; hyperaemia of the kidneys; pyelitis and cystitis; dropsy of the aged with suppressed urine. Dysuria, burning, cutting pain in urethra when urinating. Constant urging apoplexy, convulsions, strangury, uterine haemorrhage). *Terebinthina*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Best form is the infusion. One ounce to a pint of boiling water. Dose, one-half to two ounces, or tincture, one to ten drops.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
An Indian Shrub, Singhee (JUSTICIA ADHATODA BASAKA)
Highly efficacious medicine for acute catarrhal conditions of the respiratory tract (used in the beginning)

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Irritable, sensitive to external impressions; hot, full and heavy head; lachrymation, with *coryza, profuse*, fluent, with constant sneezing; loss of smell and taste; *coryza with cough*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dry cough from sternal region all over chest. Hoarseness, larynx painful. *Paroxysmal cough*, with suffocative obstruction of respiration. *Cough with sneezing*. Severe dyspnoea with cough. *Tightness across chest*. Asthmatic attacks, cannot endure a close, warm room. *Whooping-cough*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Seems to come between *Cepa* and *Euphrasia*, which compare.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Third potency and higher. Severe aggravation have been noticed from lower potencies.
**An Indian Shrub, Singhee (JUSTICIA ADHATODA BASAKA)**
Highly efficacious medicine for acute catarrhal conditions of the respiratory tract (used in the beginning)

narcissus-pseudo-narcissus.name: Narcissus-Pseudo-Narcissus
narcissus-pseudo-narcissus.essence:
Symptoms of nausea followed by violent vomiting and diarrhoea.

Daffodil bulbs contain an alkaloid the action of which, according to authorities, varies as to whether the alkaloid is extracted from the flowering bulb or from the bulb after flowering. Thus in the former case the alkaloid *produces dryness of the mouth, checks cutaneous secretions, dilates the pupil of the eye, quickens the pulse, and slows and weakens the heart contractions*. On the other hand, the alkaloid from the bulbs after f...

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Daffodil (NARCISSUS)
Symptoms of nausea followed by violent vomiting and diarrhoea.
Daffodil bulbs contain an alkaloid the action of which, according to authorities, varies as to whether the alkaloid is extracted from the flowering bulb or from the bulb after flowering. Thus in the former case the alkaloid *produces dryness of the mouth, checks cutaneous secretions, dilates the pupil of the eye, quickens the pulse, and slows and weakens the heart contractions*. On the other hand, the alkaloid from the bulbs after flowering *produces copious salivation, increases cutaneous secretion, contracts the pupil of the eye, produces slight relaxation of the pulse, and slight faintness and nausea.--The Lancet*.
A remedy for cough and bronchitis. Continuous cough, Coryza; frontal headache. Convulsive stage of whooping-cough.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Erythema of a papular, vesicular and pustular type, aggravation in wet weather.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First attenuation.

anemopsis-californica.name: Anemopsis Californica
anemopsis-californica.essence: A mucous membrane medicine. Chronic forms of inflammation of the Schneiderian membrane with considerable relaxation and profuse discharge. Chief value in *catarrhal states*, with full stuffy sensation in head and throat. Useful in cuts, bruises and sprains; and as a diuretic and in malaria. Not yet proven, but found useful in profuse mucous or serous discharges; in nasal and pharyngeal catarrh, diarrhoea and urethritis. Recommended in heart disease, as a quieting agent when unduly excited. Flatu...
anemopsis-californica.dosing: The tincture internally and locally as a spray.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Yerba Mansa-Household Herb
A mucous membrane medicine. Chronic forms of inflammation of the Schneiderian membrane with considerable relaxation and profuse discharge. Chief value in *catarrhal states*, with full stuffy sensation in head and throat. Useful in cuts, bruises and sprains; and as a diuretic and in malaria. Not yet proven, but found useful in profuse mucous or serous discharges; in nasal and pharyngeal catarrh, diarrhoea and urethritis. Recommended in heart disease, as a quieting agent when unduly excited. Flatulence; promotes digestion.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare *Piper meth*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: The tincture internally and locally as a spray.

beta-vulgaris.name: Beta Vulgaris
beta-vulgaris.essence: Influences chronic catarrhal states and tuberculosis. The salt *Betainum hydrochloricum* obtained from the Beet root itself seem to be the best adapted to phthisical patients. Children yield very quickly to the action of the remedy. Use about the 2x Trit.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Beet-root
Influences chronic catarrhal states and tuberculosis. The salt *Betainum hydrochloricum* obtained from the Beet root itself seem to be the best adapted to phthisical patients. Children yield very quickly to the action of the remedy. Use about the 2x Trit.

corallorhiza-odontorhiza.name: Corallorhiza Odontorhiza
corallorhiza-odontorhiza.essence: Hectic fever, coming on 9 to 10 am, and lasting till midnight. Intensely nervous and restless, burning of palms and soles; no thirst, chill or perspiration. Can bear only slightest covering.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Crawley Root (CORALLORHIZA)
Hectic fever, coming on 9 to 10 am, and lasting till midnight. Intensely nervous and restless, burning of palms and soles; no thirst, chill or perspiration. Can bear only slightest covering.

duboisia-myoporoides.name: Duboisia Myoporoides
duboisia-myoporoides.essence: Acts chiefly on the nervous system, eyes, upper respiratory tract. Recommended in pharyngitis sicca, with black, stringy mucus. It dilates the pupil, dries the mouth, checks perspiration, causes headache and drowsiness. On the eye it acts more promptly than Atropia, much stronger as a mydriatic. *Red spots floats in the field of vision*. Sensation as if stepping on empty space. *Vertigo with pale face*; not gastric in origin. Scarlet fever; locomotor ataxia. Palliative in exophthalmic goitre.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Corkwood Elm (DUBOISIA)
Acts chiefly on the nervous system, eyes, upper respiratory tract. Recommended in pharyngitis sicca, with black, stringy mucus. It dilates the pupil, dries the mouth, checks perspiration, causes headache and drowsiness. On the eye it acts more promptly than Atropia, much stronger as a mydriatic. *Red spots floats in the field of vision*. Sensation as if stepping on empty space. *Vertigo with pale face*; not gastric in origin. Scarlet fever; locomotor ataxia. Palliative in exophthalmic goitre.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Absent-minded, incoherent, *silly and nonsensical*, memory impaired.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Impossible to stand with eyes shut, tendency to fall backwards.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Conjunctivitis*, acute and chronic. *Mydriasis*. Paralysis of accommodation. Hyperaemia of retina with weakness of accommodation, fundus red, blood-vessels full and tortuous; pupils dilated, with dim vision. *Pain over eye*, between it and brow.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Larynx dry, voice hoarse, phonation difficult. Dry cough with oppressed breathing.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Loss of power in limbs, staggers; feels as if he stepped on empty space. Trembling, numbness and weakness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: It antagonizes *Muscarine. Duboisin sulphate 1-100 gr sedative in mania*. 2-4 milligrams a day. Hystero-epilepsy. Motor restlessness of insane (*Has been used as a substitute for Atropia* in doses of 1-20 of a grain hypodermically). Antidotes: *Morphia; Pilocarp*. Compare: *Bellad; Stram; Hyos*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Third to twelfth potency.

diosma-lincaris.name: Diosma Lincaris
diosma-lincaris.essence: Pathogenically it produces: Somnolence; nervous insomnia; night sweats. Erratic pains, with bad humor, desire to weep or fear of sickness. Violent vertigo. Cephalalgia, chiefly frontal, radiating to the occiput. Eyes brilliant, with lachrymation or itching, the conditions accompanied by a species of stupefaction, with hardness of hearing or noises from aural pressure. Earthy face with disseminated rosaceous eruption. Nausea, fetid breath, with sensation of emptiness. *Sensation of meteorism, wit...

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Buku-from Cape of Good Hope
Pathogenically it produces: Somnolence; nervous insomnia; night sweats. Erratic pains, with bad humor, desire to weep or fear of sickness. Violent vertigo. Cephalalgia, chiefly frontal, radiating to the occiput. Eyes brilliant, with lachrymation or itching, the conditions accompanied by a species of stupefaction, with hardness of hearing or noises from aural pressure. Earthy face with disseminated rosaceous eruption. Nausea, fetid breath, with sensation of emptiness. *Sensation of meteorism, with stinging pains in the spleen*. Painful sensation in the abdomen, with pubic pressure-the pressure of the clothing becomes insupportable, with emission of high-colored, bloody urine. Frequent yellow diarrhoea, worse at night. Catamenia abundant, anticipating, sometimes metrorrhagic in type; crampy pains on ingesting food. Sensation of heat or of cold in the hands, with convulsive movements of the fingers. Weakness of the legs, aggravated by sitting down.
Clinically, this pathogeny should be useful in cerebral affections with dullness or stupefaction; in convulsive or epileptiform attacks; in *hysteria*; in *hepatitis* (cirrhosis or atrophy); in haematuria with ovarian or uterine lesions.
In splenitis, where it should surpass Ceanothus. Mental disorders in nervous or ascetic individuals, particularly where there is constant fear of death, or erotic or maniacal attacks. *Gastralgia. Gastro-enteritis*. Sudden fright, with trembling and weakness of the legs (Dr. C. Leal La Rota).

eschscholtzia-californica.name: Eschscholtzia Californica
eschscholtzia-californica.essence:
Experiments upon animals showed it to act more powerfully than morphine which is contained in the plant. It causes general weakness, torpor, accelerated respiration, complete paralysis of the limbs. Slowing of circulation.

A soporific remedy which is harmless. Use the tincture.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
California Poppy
Experiments upon animals showed it to act more powerfully than morphine which is contained in the plant. It causes general weakness, torpor, accelerated respiration, complete paralysis of the limbs. Slowing of circulation.
A soporific remedy which is harmless. Use the tincture.

insulinum.name: Insulinum
insulinum.essence: An active principle from the pancreas which affects sugar metabolism (INSULIN)

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
An active principle from the pancreas which affects sugar metabolism (INSULIN)
Besides the use of Insulin in the treatment of diabetes, restoring the lost ability to oxidize carbohydrate and again storing glycogen in the liver, some use of it homeopathically has been made by Dr. Wm. F. Baker, showing its applicability in acne, carbuncles, erythema with itching eczema. In the gouty, transitory glycosuria when skin manifestations are persistent give three times daily after eating. Given a persistent case of skin irritation, boils or varicose ulceration with polyuria, it is indicated.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: 3x to 30x.

kola.name: Kola
kola.essence:
Neurasthenia. Regulates the circulation, is tonic and anti-diarrheic, regulates cardiac rhythm and acts diuretically. Weak heart.

The remedy for the drinking habit. It promotes the appetite and digestion, and lessens the craving for liquor. *Asthma*. Gives power to endure prolonged physical exertion without taking food and without feeling fatigued.
kola.dosing: Three to ten drops, even one dram doses, three times a day.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Kola-nut (STERCULIA)
Neurasthenia. Regulates the circulation, is tonic and anti-diarrheic, regulates cardiac rhythm and acts diuretically. Weak heart.
The remedy for the drinking habit. It promotes the appetite and digestion, and lessens the craving for liquor. *Asthma*. Gives power to endure prolonged physical exertion without taking food and without feeling fatigued.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Coca*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Three to ten drops, even one dram doses, three times a day.

momordica-balsamica.name: Momordica Balsamica
momordica-balsamica.essence: Griping, colic, pain in back and hypogastrium with painful and excessive menses. Accumulation of flatus in splenic flexure of colon. Dropsy.
momordica-balsamica.dosing: Tincture. Used also externally as a liniment and poultice for burns, chapped hands, etc.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
