materiaMedica.text:
Balsam Apple
Griping, colic, pain in back and hypogastrium with painful and excessive menses. Accumulation of flatus in splenic flexure of colon. Dropsy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Rumbling, griping, colicky pains, starting from back, spreading over abdomen.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Painful and profuse menses; labor-like pains, followed by gushes of blood; pain at small of back coming towards front of pelvis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Momordica charantia*-Indian variety--(more sever symptoms-intestines full of yellow watery fluid, discharged *explosively*-cramps, thirst, prostration. Choleraic symptoms. Similar to Croton, Elaterium. Use 3x).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture. Used also externally as a liniment and poultice for burns, chapped hands, etc.

micromeria-douglasii.name: Micromeria Douglasii
micromeria-douglasii.essence: A California mint-like plant acting on stomach and bowels. Used as a tea to cure colic and relieve flatulence. Is a pleasant beverage and febrifuge, blood purifyer and tonic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica

A California mint-like plant acting on stomach and bowels. Used as a tea to cure colic and relieve flatulence. Is a pleasant beverage and febrifuge, blood purifyer and tonic.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nausea; pain in stomach and bowels; flatulence.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture.

opuntia-ficus.name: Opuntia Ficus
opuntia-ficus.essence: Diarrhoea, with nausea. *Feels as if bowels were settled down in lower abdomen*. Sick feeling in lower third of abdomen. Enteroptosis with loose and frequent evacuations.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica

Diarrhoea, with nausea. *Feels as if bowels were settled down in lower abdomen*. Sick feeling in lower third of abdomen. Enteroptosis with loose and frequent evacuations.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare; *Chaparra amargosa* (which Mexican physicians laud as a specific in chronic diarrhoea). *Ricinus communis* (diarrhoea, dysentery, obstinate chronic diarrhoea).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Second attenuation.

rhododendron-ferrugineum.name: Rhododendron Ferrugineum
rhododendron-ferrugineum.essence: Rheumatic and gouty symptoms well marked. Rheumatism in the hot season. The modality (worse before a storm) is a true guiding symptom.

agg: before a storm. *All symptoms reappear in rough weather*, night, towards morning
amel: after the storm breaks, warmth, and eating

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica

Snow-rose (RHODODENDRON)
Rheumatic and gouty symptoms well marked. Rheumatism in the hot season. The modality (worse before a storm) is a true guiding symptom.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Dread of a storm; particularly afraid of thunder. Forgetful.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aching in temples. Tearing pain in bones. Headache; worse, wine, wind, cold and wet weather. Pain in eyes before a storm. *Ciliary neuralgia*, involving eyeball, orbit, and head. Heat in eyes when using them.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Muscular asthenopia; darting pains through eyes from head, worse before a storm.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Difficult hearing, with whizzing and ringing in ears. Hearing better in the morning; noises come on after patient has been up a few hours.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Prosopalgia; violent jerking pain involving dental nerves, from temple to lower jaw and chin; *better, warmth and eating.* toothache in damp weather and before a storm. Swollen gums. Stumps of teeth are loosened.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Violent pleuritic pains running downward in left anterior chest. Breathless and speechless from violent pleuritic pains running down the anterior chest. Stitches in spleen from fast walking. Crampy pain under short ribs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Testicles, worse left, swollen, painful, drawn up. Orchitis; glands feel crushed. Induration and swelling of testes after gonorrhoea. *Hydrocele* (*Sil*).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Joints swollen. Gouty inflammation of great toe-joint. *Rheumatic tearing in all limbs*, especially right side; worse, at rest and in stormy weather. Stiffness of neck. Pain in shoulders, arms, wrists; worse when at rest. Pains in bones in spots, and reappear by change of weather. *Cannot sleep unless legs are crossed*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, before a storm. *All symptoms reappear in rough weather*, night, towards morning. *Better*, after the storm breaks, warmth, and eating.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Ampelopsis* (hydrocele and renal dropsy); *Dulc; Rhus; Nat sulph*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: First to sixth potency.

stigmata-maydis.name: Stigmata Maydis
stigmata-maydis.essence: Has marked urinary symptoms, and has been used with success in organic heart disease, with much oedema of lower extremities and scanty urination. Enlarged prostate and retention of urine. Uric and phosphatic Gonorrhoea. Cystitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Corn-silk (ZEA)
Has marked urinary symptoms, and has been used with success in organic heart disease, with much oedema of lower extremities and scanty urination. Enlarged prostate and retention of urine. Uric and phosphatic Gonorrhoea. Cystitis.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
Suppression and *retention*. Dysuria. Renal lithiasis; nephritic colic; blood and red sand in urine. Tenesmus after urinating. Vesical catarrh. Gonorrhoea. Cystitis.
*Shucks* (as a decoction used for chronic malaria, teaspoonful doses freely. Dr. E. C. Lowe, England).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tincture in tent-to fifty-drop doses.

scatolum.name: Scatolum
scatolum.essence:
Represents the ultimate end of proteid decomposition and is a constituent of human feces.

Acne with auto-intoxication dependent upon intestinal decomposition.

Stomach and abdominal symptoms and frontal headache. Sluggishness with no ambition. Desire to curse and swear.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Tongue coated, *foul taste*. Salty taste to all cereals. *Belching*. Appetite increased. Light, yellow, narrow, *very offensive* stool. Intestinal dyspepsia.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frequent, scanty, burning, difficult.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Increased desire to sleep; wakes unrefreshed, half doped feeling.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Indol; Baptis; Sulph*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Sixth potency.

materiaMedica.text:
(SKATOL)
Represents the ultimate end of proteid decomposition and is a constituent of human feces.
Acne with auto-intoxication dependent upon intestinal decomposition.
Stomach and abdominal symptoms and frontal headache. Sluggishness with no ambition. Desire to curse and swear.

materiaMedica.text: Lack of concentration; impossible to study; *despondent*; desire to be with people. Irritable. Felt mean towards everyone.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Frontal headache, worse over left eye, in the evening, *better by short sleep*.

torula-cerevisiae.name: Torula Cerevisiae
torula-cerevisiae.essence: Introduced by Drs. Lehman and Yingling. Not proved, hence clinical symptoms only but many have been verified. Sycotic remedy Anaphylactic states produced by proteins and enzymes (Yingling).
torula-cerevisiae.dosing: Pure yeast cake or potencies from 3rd to high. Yeast poultices are much used in skin diseases, boils and swelling.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Aching back of head and neck. Headache and sharp pains all over. Worse from constipation. Sneezing and wheezing. Catarrhal discharge from posterior nares. Irritable and nervous.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bad taste. Nausea. Poor digestion. Belching of gas in stomach and abdomen. Soreness all over abdomen. Sense of fullness. Rumbling, pains shift, flatulence. *Constipation*. Sour, yeasty, moldy odor from discharges.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Backache, tired and weak from elbows and knees down. Hands cold like ice and go to sleep easily.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Disturbed with much restlessness.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Boils, recurrent. Itching eczema around ankles. Tinea versicolor.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Pure yeast cake or potencies from 3rd to high. Yeast poultices are much used in skin diseases, boils and swelling.

materiaMedica.text:
Saccharomyces - Yeast Plant
Introduced by Drs. Lehman and Yingling. Not proved, hence clinical symptoms only but many have been verified. Sycotic remedy Anaphylactic states produced by proteins and enzymes (Yingling).

trinitroto-luenum.essence:
Symptoms found in munition workers handling T. N. T who inhale and ingest it and also absorb some through the skin. They were compiled by Dr. Conrad Wesselhoeft and published in the December, 1926 number of the Journal of the American Institute of Homeopathy.

The destructive action of T. N. T on the red blood corpuscles is responsible for the anaemia and the jaundice with their secondary symptoms. The hemoglobin is changed so it cannot act satisfactorily as an oxygen carrier and as a result we ...

agg: alcohol (falls after one or two drinks of whisky). *Tea* (marked aversion)

trinitroto-luenum.dosing: Thirtieth potency has been used with success.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text:
T. N. T. (TRINITROTOLUENE)
Symptoms found in munition workers handling T. N. T who inhale and ingest it and also absorb some through the skin. They were compiled by Dr. Conrad Wesselhoeft and published in the December, 1926 number of the Journal of the American Institute of Homeopathy.
The destructive action of T. N. T on the red blood corpuscles is responsible for the anaemia and the jaundice with their secondary symptoms. The hemoglobin is changed so it cannot act satisfactorily as an oxygen carrier and as a result we have breathlessness, dizziness, headache, faintness, palpitation, undue fatigue, muscle cramps and cyanosis; also drowsiness, depression and insomnia. Later stages of the poisoning produce toxic jaundice and aplastic anaemia. The jaundice is the result of cellular destruction in contrast to obstructive jaundice.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Depression and headache (frontal). Aversion to company, apathetic and weeps easily. Faintness, dizziness, mental sluggishness; delirium, convulsions, coma. Face very dark.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Nose dry with stuffed sensation. Sneezing, coryza, burning of trachea, choking weight on chest; dry, convulsive cough, raising mucous plugs.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Bitter taste, much thirst, sour regurgitation; dull burning behind the ensiform; nausea, vomiting, constipation followed by diarrhoea with cramps.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Palpitation, tachycardia, bradycardia, intermittent pulse.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: High colored urine, burning on urination, sudden desire, incontinence and retention.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Hands stained yellow. Dermatitis, nodular erythema, vesicles, itching and burning; puffiness. *Tendency to haemorrhage* under the skin and from the nose. *Tired pain in back of knees*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: *Worse*, alcohol (falls after one or two drinks of whisky). *Tea* (marked aversion).

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Compare: *Zinc; Phosph; Cina; Ars; Plumbum*.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica
materiaMedica.text: Thirtieth potency has been used with success.

verbena-urticaefolia.name: Verbena Urticaefolia
verbena-urticaefolia.essence: Affects the skin and *nervous system*. Nervous depression, weakness and irritation and spasms. Promotes the absorption of blood and allays pain in bruises. Vesicular erysipelas. Passive congestion and intermittent fever. One of the remedies for Poison-oak. *Epilepsy*, insomnia, mental exhaustion. In epilepsy, it *brightens up the patient's mental powers* and helps the constipation.
verbena-urticaefolia.dosing: Single dose of the tincture. In epilepsy must be continued for a long time. Verbena in the form of a tea as a diuretic drink is used by Vannier (Paris) to aid elimination in tubercular therapy.

materiaMedica.source: Pocket manual of homoeopathic materia medica

Blue Vervain (VERBENA)
Affects the skin and *nervous system*. Nervous depression, weakness and irritation and spasms. Promotes the absorption of blood and allays pain in bruises. Vesicular erysipelas. Passive congestion and intermittent fever. One of the remedies for Poison-oak. *Epilepsy*, insomnia, mental exhaustion. In epilepsy, it *brightens up the patient's mental powers* and helps the constipation.

materiaMedica.text: Single dose of the tincture. In epilepsy must be continued for a long time. Verbena in the form of a tea as a diuretic drink is used by Vannier (Paris) to aid elimination in tubercular therapy.

vanilla-aromatica.name: Vanilla Aromatica
vanilla-aromatica.essence: Marked skin irritation resembling milk Poison-oak; is sometimes produced by handling the beans, also by local use of vanilla essence in a hair wash. Vanilla is supposed to stimulate the brain and sexual propensities. Do not use the synthetic Vanilla extract. Various disorders of the nervous system and circulation are produced in workers with Vanilla. Is an emmagogue and aphrodisiac. Menses prolonged.
vanilla-aromatica.dosing: Vanilla, 6th to 30th, has been found effective in curing the skin affection.

Marked skin irritation resembling milk Poison-oak; is sometimes produced by handling the beans, also by local use of vanilla essence in a hair wash. Vanilla is supposed to stimulate the brain and sexual propensities. Do not use the synthetic Vanilla extract. Various disorders of the nervous system and circulation are produced in workers with Vanilla. Is an emmagogue and aphrodisiac. Menses prolonged.
